GE07hv_apppu:2523: varaṃ cāsmai dadau prītaḥ sa vai pannagapuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,18.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:2524: śrāvayat kanyakā sarvā yathākramam adīnavat // HV_App.I,18.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:2525: etāsu te sutāḥ pañca sutāsu mama mānada / HV_App.I,18.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:2526: utpatsyante pitus tejo mātuś caiva samāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,18.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:2528: tava vaṃśe bhaviṣyanti pārthivāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:2529: sa varaṃ kanyakāś caiva labdhvā yaduvṛṣas tadā / HV_App.I,18.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:2530: unmamajjātha vegena salilāc candramā yathā // HV_App.I,18.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:2531: sa pañcakanyāmadhyastho ruruce tatra pārthivaḥ / HV_App.I,18.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:2533: sa tad antaḥpuraṃ sarvaṃ dadarśa nṛpasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,18.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:2535: samāśvasya ca tāḥ sarvāḥ patnīr vai pāvakopamāḥ / HV_App.I,18.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:2536: jagāma svapuraṃ rājā gatvā vai ramate bhṛśam // HV_App.I,18.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:2537: [k: After 141a, K1 Ñ3 V B1 Dn D2.3.5.6 T2 G2.5 M ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2542: sa tāsu nāgakanyāsu kālena mahatā nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,18.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:2543: janayām āsa vikrāntān pañca putrān kulodvahān // HV_App.I,18.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:2544: mucukundaṃ mahābāhuṃ padmavarṇaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,18.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:2545: mādhavaṃ sārasaṃ caiva haritaṃ caiva pārthivam // HV_App.I,18.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:2546: etān pañca sutān saumyān pañcabhūtopamān bhuvi / HV_App.I,18.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:2548: te prāptavayasaḥ sarve sthitāḥ pañca yathādrayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:2549: te jitā baladarpeṇa ūcuḥ pitaram agrataḥ // HV_App.I,18.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:2550: tāta yuktāḥ sma vayasā bale mahati tasthuṣaḥ / HV_App.I,18.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:2551: kṣipram ājñaptum icchāmaḥ kiṃ kurmas tava śāsanāt // HV_App.I,18.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:2552: sa tān nṛpatiśārdūlaḥ śārdūlān iva tejitān / HV_App.I,18.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:2553: prāha prītyā paramayā sutavīrye kutūhalaḥ // HV_App.I,18.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:2554: vindhyarkṣavantāv abhito dve puryau parvatāśraye / HV_App.I,18.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:2555: niveśayatv ayaṃ tāvan mucukundaḥ suto mama // HV_App.I,18.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:2556: sahyasya copari purīṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āśritaḥ / HV_App.I,18.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:2557: padmavarṇo 'pi me putro niveśayatu māciram // HV_App.I,18.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:2558: tasyaiva parataḥ kānte deśe campakabhūṣite / HV_App.I,18.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:2559: sāraso me puraṃ tatra niveśayatu putrakaḥ // HV_App.I,18.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:2561: dvīpaṃ pannagarājasya suto me pālayiṣyati // HV_App.I,18.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:2562: mādhavo 'yaṃ mama suto jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhaś ca dharmavit / HV_App.I,18.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:2564: te nṛpaprakriyāṃ prāptā abhiṣiktāḥ sacāmarāḥ / HV_App.I,18.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:2566: svaṃ svaṃ niveśanaṃ sarve bhejire nṛpasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,18.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:2568: mucukundas tu rājarṣir vindhyamadhye vyarocata / HV_App.I,18.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:2570: sa tu taṃ śodhayām āsa vivikte vicacāra ha / HV_App.I,18.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:2571: setuṃ caiva samaṃ cakre parikhāś cāmitodakāḥ // HV_App.I,18.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:2572: sthāpayām āsa bhāgeṣu devatāyatanāni ca / HV_App.I,18.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:2573: rathyā vīthyo nṛṇāṃ mārgāś catvarāṇi gṛhāṇi ca // HV_App.I,18.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:2574: sa tāṃ purīṃ dhanavatīṃ puruhūtapurīprabhām / HV_App.I,18.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:2576: [k: K1.2 Ñ3 V B1 Dn Ds D2-6 Cal. ed. ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2578: nāma cāsyāḥ śubhaṃ cakre nirmitaṃ svena tejasā / HV_App.I,18.176 /
GE07hv_apppu:2581: māhiṣmatī nāma purī prakāśam upayāsyati // HV_App.I,18.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:2583: madhye niveśayām āsa śriyā paramayā vṛtām // HV_App.I,18.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:2584: purikāṃ nāma dharmātmā purīṃ devapurīprabhām / HV_App.I,18.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:2586: [k: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G M4 ins. (T1 after line 182) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2588: nirmitā sā purī rājñā purīkā nāma nāmataḥ // **HV_App.I,18.183**15:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2589: sa te dve vipule puryau rājapuryupame śubhe / HV_App.I,18.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:2590: pālayām āsa dharmātmā rājā dharmeṇa vīryavān // HV_App.I,18.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:2592: cakāra nadyā veṇṇāyās tīre tarulatākule // HV_App.I,18.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:2593: viṣayasyālpatāṃ jñātvā saṃpūrṇaṃ rāṣṭram eva ca / HV_App.I,18.188 /
GE07hv_apppu:2594: niveśayām āsa nṛpaḥ sa vapraprāyam uttamam // HV_App.I,18.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:2595: padmavantaṃ janapadaṃ karavīraṃ ca tatpuram / HV_App.I,18.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:2597: sārasenāpi vihitaṃ ramyaṃ krauñcapuraṃ mahat / HV_App.I,18.192 /
GE07hv_apppu:2599: vanavāsīti vikhyātaḥ sphīto janapado mahān / HV_App.I,18.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:2600: puraṃ tu tasya tac chrīmad drumaiḥ sarvartukair vṛtam // HV_App.I,18.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:2605: tasya dāśā jale magnā madgurā nāma viśrutāḥ / HV_App.I,18.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:2606: ye haranti sadā śaṅkhān samudrodaracāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:2608: saṃcinvanti sadā yuktā jātarūpaṃ ca mauktikam // HV_App.I,18.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:2609: jalajāni ca ratnāni niṣādās tasya mānavāḥ / HV_App.I,18.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:2611: matsyamāṃsena te sarve vartayanti sadā narāḥ / HV_App.I,18.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:2613: taiḥ saṃyānagatā ratnair vaṇijo dūradeśajāḥ / HV_App.I,18.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:2614: haritaṃ tarpayanty ekaṃ yathaiva dhanadaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,18.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:2615: evam ikṣvākuvaṃśāt tu yaduvaṃśo viniḥsṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,18.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:2616: caturdhā yaduputrais tu caturbhir bhidyate punaḥ // HV_App.I,18.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:2617: sa yadur mādhave rājyaṃ visṛjya yadupuṃgave / HV_App.I,18.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:2618: triviṣṭapaṃ gato rājā tyaktvā dehaṃ mahītale // HV_App.I,18.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:2619: babhūva mādhavasutaḥ satvato nāma vīryavān / HV_App.I,18.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:2621: satvatasya suto rājā bhīmo nāma mahān abhūt / HV_App.I,18.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:2622: yena bhaimāḥ sma saṃvṛttāḥ satvatāt sātvatāḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,18.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:2623: rājyasthe tu nṛpe tasmin rāme rājyaṃ praśāsati / HV_App.I,18.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:2624: śatrughno lavaṇaṃ hatvā ciccheda sa madhor vanam // HV_App.I,18.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:2625: tasmin madhuvanasthāne purīṃ ca mathurām imām / HV_App.I,18.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:2627: paryāye caiva rāmasya bharatasya tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,18.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:2628: sumitrāyāḥ sutābhyāṃ ca sthānaṃ prāptaṃ ca vaiṣṇavam // HV_App.I,18.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:2629: [k: For line 221, K1.2.4 V2 B Ds D3.5 M1-3 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2633: yādavena purī vyāptā bhīmena tu mahātmanā / **HV_App.I,18.222**18:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2634: svavaṃśe sthāpitā pūrvaṃ svayam adhyāsitā tathā // HV_App.I,18.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:2635: tataḥ kuśe sthite rājye lave ca yuvarājani / HV_App.I,18.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:2636: andhako nāma bhīmasya suto rājyam akārayat // HV_App.I,18.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:2637: andhakasya suto jajñe raivato nāma pārthivaḥ / HV_App.I,18.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:2638: ṛkṣas tu raivatāj jajñe ramye parvatamūrdhani // HV_App.I,18.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:2639: tatas tu raivatasutaḥ parvataḥ sāgarāntike / HV_App.I,18.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:2640: nāmnā raivatako nāma bhūmau bhūmidharaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,18.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:2642: babhūva pṛthivīpālaḥ pṛthivyāṃ prathitaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,18.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:2643: tasya bhāryāsu tisṛṣu divyarūpāsu keśava / HV_App.I,18.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:2644: catvāro jajñire putrā rucyā proṣṭhapadopamāḥ // HV_App.I,18.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:2645: vasur babhruḥ suṣeṇaś ca śubhākṣaś caiva vīryavān / HV_App.I,18.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:2647: tair ayaṃ yādavo vaṃśaḥ pārthivair bahulīkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,18.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:2648: ye sma te kṛṣṇa loke 'smin prajāvantaḥ prajeśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,18.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:2649: vasos tu kuntiviṣaye vasudevaḥ suto 'bhavat / HV_App.I,18.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:2652: janayām āsa caivātra suprabhe dve ca dārike // HV_App.I,18.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:2653: kuntīṃ ca pāṇḍor mahiṣīṃ devatām iva bhūcarīm / HV_App.I,18.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:2654: bhāryāṃ ca cedirājasya damaghoṣasya suprabhām // HV_App.I,18.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:2655: [k: For line 241, K Ñ3 V1.2 B D T2-4 G1.4.5 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2657: eṣa te svasya vaṃśasya prabhavaḥ parikīrtitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:2658: śruto mayā purā kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇadvaipāyanāntikāt // HV_App.I,18.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:2659: tvaṃ tv idānīṃ pranaṣṭe 'smin vaṃśe vaṃśabhṛtāṃ vara / HV_App.I,18.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:2660: svayaṃbhūr iva saṃprāpto bhavāyāsmajjayāya ca // HV_App.I,18.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:2661: na tvāṃ paurāṇamātreṇa śaktā gūhayituṃ vayam / HV_App.I,18.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:2662: devaguhyeṣv api bhavān sarvajñaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:2663: śaktaś cāsi jarāsaṃdhaṃ nṛpaṃ yodhayituṃ prabho / HV_App.I,18.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:2665: śakyaṃ cemaṃ jarāsaṃdhaṃ nṛpaṃ drāvayituṃ hare / **HV_App.I,18.248**21:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2666: tvadbuddhivaśagāḥ sarve vayaṃ yogavrate sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,18.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:2667: jarāsaṃdhas tu balavān nṛpāṇāṃ mūrdhani sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:2668: aprameyabalaś caiva vayaṃ ca kṛśasādhanāḥ // HV_App.I,18.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:2669: na ceyam ekāham api purī rodhaṃ sahiṣyati / HV_App.I,18.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:2674: kaṃsasya balavattvāt tu nātiguptā purī janaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:2675: sadyo nipatite kaṃse rājye 'smākaṃ navodaye / HV_App.I,18.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:2676: purī pratyagrarodheyaṃ na rodhaṃ visahiṣyati // HV_App.I,18.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:2677: balaṃ saṃmardabhagnaṃ ca kliśyamānaṃ pareṇa ha / HV_App.I,18.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:2678: asaṃśayam idaṃ rāṣṭraṃ janaiḥ saha vinaṅkṣyati // HV_App.I,18.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:2681: ārto vakṣyati naḥ sarvo rudhyamānaḥ pure janaḥ / HV_App.I,18.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:2682: yādavaiḥ sma virodhena yojito rājyakāmukaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:2683: [k: K Ñ2.3 V1 B D T2.3 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2685: te sarve dvaidham icchanti yat kṣamaṃ tad vidhīyatām / **HV_App.I,18.265**22:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:2686: etan mama mataṃ kṛṣṇa viśrambhāt samudāhṛtam / HV_App.I,18.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:2687: tvayi sarvasvam ity eva paras tvaṃ caiva buddhimān // HV_App.I,18.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:2688: [k: For l. 267, K Ñ2 B1.3 D T2-4 G1.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2689: tvaṃ tu vijñāpitaḥ sarvaṃ na punaḥ saṃprabodhitaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.167**23:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2690: yad atra naḥ kṣamaṃ kṛṣṇa tat svairam abhidhīyatām / HV_App.I,18.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:2691: tvam asya netā sainyasya vayaṃ tvacchāsane sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,18.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:2692: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 (G2 after l. 268) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2693: tvanmūlaś ca virodho 'yaṃ rakṣāsmān ātmanā saha / **HV_App.I,18.169**24:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2696: vikadros tu vacas tathyaṃ niśamya yadupuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,18.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:2699: [k: After line 270,K2 Ñ2.3 V B Dn D2-6 Bom. Poona eds ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2702: sat tattvaṃ ca hitaṃ caiva kṛṣṇoktaṃ khila dhīmatā / **HV_App.I,18.270**26:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2703: bhāṣitā rājadharmāś ca satyāś ca jagato hitāḥ // **HV_App.I,18.270**26:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2704: etac chrutvā pitur vākyaṃ vikadroś ca mahātmanā / **HV_App.I,18.270**26:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:2705: [k: After l. 4, Bom. Poona ed. ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2706: vikadruṇā yaduśreṣṭha yad dhitaṃ tad vidhīyatām / HV_App.I,18.270*26A /
GE07hv_apppu:2707: vākyam uttamam ekāgro babhāṣe cārubhāṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,18.271 //
GE07hv_apppu:2708: bruvatāṃ vaḥ śrutaṃ vākyaṃ hetutaḥ kramatas tathā / HV_App.I,18.272 /
GE07hv_apppu:2709: nyāyataḥ śāstrataś caiva daivaṃ caivānupaśyatām // HV_App.I,18.273 //
GE07hv_apppu:2710: śrūyatām uttamaṃ vākyaṃ mama buddhyā ca gṛhyatām / HV_App.I,18.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:2711: nayena vyavahartavyaṃ pārthivena yathā mayā // HV_App.I,18.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:2712: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2713: saṃdhiṃ ca vigrahaṃ caiva yānam āsanam eva ca / **HV_App.I,18.175**27:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2714: dvaidhībhāvaṃ saṃśrayaṃ ca ṣāḍguṇyaṃ cintayet sadā // **HV_App.I,18.175**27:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2715: balinaḥ saṃnikarṣe tu na stheyaṃ paṇḍitena ca / **HV_App.I,18.175**27:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2716: apakramed dhi kālajñaḥ samartho yuddham āvahet // **HV_App.I,18.175**27:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2717: ahaṃ tāvat sahāryeṇa muhūrte 'smin prakāśitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:2721: jīvanāśaṃ gamiṣyāmi śaktimān apy aśaktavat // HV_App.I,18.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:2724: karavīrapuraṃ caiva ramyaṃ krauñcapuraṃ tathā / HV_App.I,18.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:2726: vikadros tad vacaḥ śrutvā baladevānujasya ca / **HV_App.I,18.280**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2727: praśaśaṃsa tathā mene tathyaṃ tadvacanaṃ hitam / **HV_App.I,18.280**29:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:2728: kṛṣṇaṃ prāha rato raṅgaṃ gamyatāṃ tatra saṃgatau / **HV_App.I,18.280**29:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2729: drakṣyāvas tatra sahitau gomantaṃ ca nagottamam // HV_App.I,18.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:2730: āvayor gamanaṃ śrutvā jitakāśī ca pārthivaḥ / HV_App.I,18.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:2731: aspṛṣṭvaiva purīṃ darpād anusāraṃ kariṣyati // HV_App.I,18.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:2732: tataḥ sahyavaneṣv eva rājā yāsyati sānugaḥ / HV_App.I,18.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:2733: āvayor darśanād eva yuddhaprītim avāpsyati // HV_App.I,18.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:2734: eṣā naḥ śreyasī yātrā bhaviṣyati kulasya vai / HV_App.I,18.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:2735: paurāṇām atha puryāś ca deśasya ca sukhāvahā // HV_App.I,18.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:2736: na ca śatrau paribhraṣṭe rājāno vijigīṣavaḥ / HV_App.I,18.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:2737: pararāṣṭreṣu mūrchanti mṛdhe śatrukṣayaṃ vinā // HV_App.I,18.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:2738: evam uktvā tu tau vīrau kṛṣṇasaṃkarṣaṇāv ubhau / HV_App.I,18.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:2740: māgadhasya puraḥ sthitvā vākyam etad avocatām // **HV_App.I,18.290**30:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:2741: āvāṃ paśya mahārāja yat kāryaṃ tad vadasva nau / **HV_App.I,18.290**30:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:2742: yac ca kartuṃ pravṛtto 'si tat kuruṣva yathecchasi // **HV_App.I,18.290**30:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:2743: tac chrutvā roṣatāmrākṣo babhāṣe māgadhas tadā / **HV_App.I,18.290**30:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:2744: eṣa vāṃ pratiyotsyāmi haniṣyāmi ca vāṃ yudhi // **HV_App.I,18.290**30:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:2745: ity uktvā dhanur ādatta jarāputraḥ pratāpavān / **HV_App.I,18.290**30:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:2746: tac chrutvā tau tu deveśau gantuṃ vyavasitau kila // **HV_App.I,18.290**30:7 //
GE07hv_apppu:2748: tau tu rāṣṭrāṇi śataśaś carantau kāmarūpiṇau / HV_App.I,18.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:2749: dakṣiṇāṃ diśam āsthāya ceratur mārgagau sukham // HV_App.I,18.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:2750: sahyapṛṣṭheṣu ramyeṣu modamānāv ubhau tadā / HV_App.I,18.294 /
GE07hv_apppu:2752: tau ca svalpena kālena sahyācalavibhūṣitam / HV_App.I,18.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:2754: tau tatra gatvā veṇṇāyā nadyās tīraṃ samāśritau / HV_App.I,18.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:2756: adhastāt tasya vṛkṣasya muniṃ dīptatapodhanam / HV_App.I,18.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:2761: klinnaṃ triṣavaṇāmbhobhir ādyaṃ devaguruṃ yathā // HV_App.I,18.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:2770: yasya nāmāni rājānaḥ śrotuṃ śaktāḥ sadā na hi // **HV_App.I,18.307**32:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2771: dadarśatus tau sahitāv apariśrāntam avyayam / HV_App.I,18.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:2772: bhārgavaṃ rāmam āsīnaṃ mandarasthaṃ yathā ravim // HV_App.I,18.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:2773: nyāyatas tau tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā pādamūle kṛtāsanau / HV_App.I,18.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:2774: vasudevasutau vīrau sadhiṣṇyāv iva pāvakau // HV_App.I,18.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:2775: kṛṣṇas tam ṛṣiśārdūlam uvāca vadatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,18.312 /
GE07hv_apppu:2777: bhagavañ jāmadagnyaṃ tvāṃ avagacchāmi bhārgavam / HV_App.I,18.314 /
GE07hv_apppu:2778: rāmaṃ munīnām ṛṣabhaṃ kṣatriyāṇāṃ kulāntakam // HV_App.I,18.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:2779: tvayā sāyakavegena kṣipto bhārgava sāgaraḥ / HV_App.I,18.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:2780: iṣupātena nagaraṃ kṛtaṃ sūrpārakaṃ tvayā // HV_App.I,18.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:2781: [k: K Ñ V B D T2-4 G1 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2783: sahyasya ca nikuñjeṣu sphīto janapado mahān / HV_App.I,18.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:2786: tvayā ca sāgaro vipra velām utsārito mahān / **HV_App.I,18.317**34:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2787: tvayā tat kārtavīryasya sahasraṃ bāhumaṇḍalam / HV_App.I,18.320 /
GE07hv_apppu:2788: chinnaṃ drumavanaprakhyaṃ smaratā nidhanaṃ pituḥ // HV_App.I,18.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:2789: iyam adyāpi rudhiraiḥ kṣatriyāṇāṃ hatatviṣām / HV_App.I,18.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:2791: raiṇukeyaṃ vijāne tvāṃ kṣitau kṣatriyaroṣaṇam / HV_App.I,18.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:2792: paraśūpagrahe yuktaṃ yathaiveha raṇe tathā // HV_App.I,18.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:2793: tad icchāvas tvayā vipra kaṃcid artham upaśrutam / HV_App.I,18.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:2794: uttaraṃ ca śrutārthena pratyuktam aviśaṅkayā // HV_App.I,18.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:2796: yādavau svo muniśreṣṭha yadi te śrutim āgatau // HV_App.I,18.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:2797: vasudevo yaduśreṣṭhaḥ pitā nau hi dhṛtavrataḥ / HV_App.I,18.330 /
GE07hv_apppu:2798: janmaprabhṛti caivāvāṃ vrajeṣv eva niyojitau // HV_App.I,18.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:2799: tau sma kaṃsabhayatrastau śaṅkitau parivardhitau / HV_App.I,18.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:2800: āvāṃ ca prathamaṃ prāptau mathurāṃ ca praveśitau // HV_App.I,18.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:2801: tāv āvāṃ vyutthitaṃ hatvā samāje kaṃsam ojasā / HV_App.I,18.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:2802: pitaraṃ tatra tasyaiva sthāpayitvā janeśvaram / HV_App.I,18.335 /
GE07hv_apppu:2803: svam eva karma cārabdhau gavāṃ vyāpārakārakau // HV_App.I,18.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:2804: athāvayoḥ puraṃ roddhuṃ jarāsaṃdho vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,18.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:2805: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2806: saṃgrāmān subahūn kṛtvā labdhalakṣāv api svayam / **HV_App.I,18.337**35:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2807: tataḥ svapurarakṣārthaṃ prajānāṃ ca mahāvrata / HV_App.I,18.338 /
GE07hv_apppu:2809: arathau pattinau yuddhe nistanutrau nirāyudhau / HV_App.I,18.340 /
GE07hv_apppu:2810: jarāsaṃdhārpitapurau purād dvāv eva niḥsṛtau // HV_App.I,18.341 //
GE07hv_apppu:2811: ubhāv āvām anuprāptau muniśreṣṭha tavāntikam / HV_App.I,18.342 /
GE07hv_apppu:2812: āvayor mantramātreṇa kartum arhasi satkriyām // HV_App.I,18.343 //
GE07hv_apppu:2813: śrutvaitad bhāṣitaṃ rāmas tayor vākyam aninditam / HV_App.I,18.344 /
GE07hv_apppu:2815: aparāntād ahaṃ kṛṣṇa saṃpratīhāgataḥ prabho / HV_App.I,18.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:2816: eka eva vinā śiṣyair yuvayor mantrakāraṇāt // HV_App.I,18.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:2817: vidito me vraje vāsas tava padmanibhekṣaṇa / HV_App.I,18.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:2818: dānavānāṃ vadhaś cāpi kaṃsasya ca durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:2819: vigrahaṃ ca jarāsaṃdhe viditvā puruṣottama / HV_App.I,18.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:2821: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M3(marg.).4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2822: jāne tvāṃ kṛṣṇa goptāraṃ jagataḥ prabhum avyayam / **HV_App.I,18.351**36:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2824: na tvayāviditaṃ kiṃcit triṣu lokeṣu vidyate / **HV_App.I,18.351**36:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:2825: tathāpi bhaktimātreṇa śṛṇu vakṣyāmi te vacaḥ // **HV_App.I,18.351**36:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:2826: pūrvajais tava govinda pūrvaṃ puram idaṃ kṛtam / HV_App.I,18.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:2827: karavīrapuraṃ nāma rāṣṭraṃ caiva niveśitam // HV_App.I,18.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:2828: pure 'smin nṛpatiḥ kṛṣṇa vāsudevo mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,18.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:2829: sṛgāla iti vikhyāto nityaṃ paramakopanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:2830: nṛpeṇa tena govinda svavaṃśaprabhavā nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,18.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:2831: dāyādā nihatāḥ sarve vīra dveṣānuyāyinā // HV_App.I,18.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:2834: tan neha bhavataḥ sthānaṃ rocate me nararṣabhau / HV_App.I,18.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:2838: tīrtvā veṇṇām imāṃ puṇyāṃ nadīm adyaiva saṃgatāḥ / HV_App.I,18.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:2839: viṣayānte nivāsāya giriṃ gacchāma durgamam // HV_App.I,18.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:2840: ramyaṃ yajñagiriṃ nāma sahyasya praruhaṃ girim / HV_App.I,18.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:2842: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 (M4 after 364)ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2844: uṣya tatra niśām ekāṃ khaṭvāṅgāṃ nāma nimnagām / HV_App.I,18.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:2848: amānakāmān mānārhān gatvā tān dharaṇīdharān / HV_App.I,18.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:2849: drakṣyāmas tatra tān viprāñ śrāmyato vai tapodhanān // HV_App.I,18.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:2850: tāṃ tīrtvā nimnagāṃ tatra tāṃś ca dṛṣṭvā tapodhanān / HV_App.I,18.374 /
GE07hv_apppu:2851: ramyaṃ krauñcapuraṃ nāma gamiṣyāmaḥ purottamam // HV_App.I,18.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:2852: vaṃśajas tatra te rājā kṛṣṇa dharmarataḥ sadā / HV_App.I,18.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:2853: mahākapir iti khyāto vanasyāsya janādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,18.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:2854: tam adṛṣṭvaiva rājānaṃ nivāsāya gate 'hani / HV_App.I,18.378 /
GE07hv_apppu:2855: tīrtham ānaḍuhaṃ nāma prayāsyāmaḥ sanātanam // HV_App.I,18.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:2856: tataś cyutā gamiṣyāmaḥ sahyasya vivare girim / HV_App.I,18.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:2863: udayāstamane sūryaṃ somaṃ ca jyotiṣāṃ patim // HV_App.I,18.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:2865: prekṣamāṇau sukhaṃ tatra nagāgre vicariṣyatha / HV_App.I,18.389 /
GE07hv_apppu:2866: śṛṅgasthau tatra śailasya gomantasya vanecarau / HV_App.I,18.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:2868: tatra śailagatau dṛṣṭvā bhavantau yuddhadurmadau / HV_App.I,18.392 /
GE07hv_apppu:2870: bhavadbhyām api yuddhe tu pravṛtte tatra dāruṇe / HV_App.I,18.394 /
GE07hv_apppu:2871: āyudhaiḥ saha saṃyogaṃ paśyāmi nacirād iva // HV_App.I,18.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:2872: saṃgrāmaś ca mahān kṛṣṇa nirdiṣṭas tatra daivataiḥ / HV_App.I,18.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:2874: tatra cakraṃ halaṃ caiva gadāṃ kaumodakīṃ tathā / HV_App.I,18.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:2875: saunandaṃ musalaṃ caiva vaiṣṇavāny āyudhāni ca // HV_App.I,18.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:2876: [k: After line 399a, T1 G2.3.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2879: darśayiṣyanti saṃgrāme pāsyanti ca mahīkṣitām / HV_App.I,18.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:2881: sa cakramusalo nāma saṃgrāmaḥ kṛṣṇa viśrutaḥ / HV_App.I,18.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:2883: tatra te kṛṣṇa saṃgrāme suvyaktaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ vapuḥ / HV_App.I,18.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:2884: drakṣyanti ripavaḥ sarve surāś ca surabhāvana // HV_App.I,18.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:2885: tāṃ bhajasva gadāṃ kṛṣṇa cakraṃ ca ciravismṛtam / HV_App.I,18.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:2886: bhajasva svena rūpeṇa surāṇāṃ vijayāya vai // HV_App.I,18.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:2887: balaś cāyaṃ halaṃ ghoraṃ musalaṃ cārimardanam / HV_App.I,18.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:2889: eṣa te prathamaḥ kṛṣṇa saṃgrāmo bhuvi pārthivaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:2891: āyudhāvāptir atraiva vapuṣo vaiṣṇavasya ca / HV_App.I,18.412 /
GE07hv_apppu:2892: lakṣmyāś ca tejasaś caiva vyūhānāṃ ca vidāraṇam // HV_App.I,18.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:2894: bhaviṣyati mahān kṛṣṇa bhārataṃ caiva vaiśasam // HV_App.I,18.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:2895: tad gaccha kṛṣṇa śailendraṃ gomantaṃ ca nagottamam / HV_App.I,18.416 /
GE07hv_apppu:2897: [k: For line 417, K1.3.4 Ñ2 B D2.4.5 T3.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2898: jarāsaṃdho mṛdhe cāpi vijaye tvām upasthitaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.417**39:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2899: [k: K2 Ñ3 V Dn Ds D1.3.6 T2 G1.4.5 M4 G(ed.) ins., K1.3.4 Ñ2 B D2.4.5 T3.4 cont. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2901: pītvā gacchata bhadraṃ vo mayoddiṣṭena vartmanā // **HV_App.I,18.417**40:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:2904: tatas tau rāmasahitau prasthitau yadupuṃgavau / HV_App.I,18.418 /
GE07hv_apppu:2905: [k: K1 om. the ref. K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. after the ref., K2 after line 418:k]
GE07hv_apppu:2906: tat tu dhenvāḥ payaḥ pītvā baladarpasamanvitau / **HV_App.I,18.418**41:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2907: [k: After line 418, K Ñ2.3 V B D T2-4 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2910: jāmadagnyatṛtīyās te trayas traya ivāgnayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.419 /
GE07hv_apppu:2911: śobhayanti sma panthānaṃ tridivaṃ tridaśā iva // HV_App.I,18.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:2912: adhvānaṃ vidhinā sarve tribhis te divasaiḥ kramāt / HV_App.I,18.421 /
GE07hv_apppu:2913: gomantam agamaṃ prāptā mandaraṃ tridaśā iva // HV_App.I,18.422 //
GE07hv_apppu:2924: kīrṇaṃ mṛgagaṇaiḥ kāntair mainākam iva kāmagam / HV_App.I,18.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:2930: drumaiḥ sarjarasānāṃ ca sarvataḥ pratiśobhitam / HV_App.I,18.439 /
GE07hv_apppu:2933: [k: Ds D5 cont., K Ñ3 V1.2. B Dn D1-4.6 T2-4 ins. (Ñ2 V3 after line 438; G2.4.5 after line 446) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2936: hintālaiś ca tamālaiś ca punnāgaiś copaśobhitam // HV_App.I,18.441 //
GE07hv_apppu:2937: jaleṣu jalajaiś caiva sthaleṣu sthalajair api / HV_App.I,18.442 /
GE07hv_apppu:2938: paṅkajair drumakhaṇḍaiś ca sarvataḥ pratibhūṣitam / HV_App.I,18.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:2941: kuṭajair nāgapuṣpaiś ca samantād upaśobhitam // HV_App.I,18.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:2944: [k: Ds Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2948: sevitaṃ vāridhārābhiś candrapādaiś ca sevitam / HV_App.I,18.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:2950: vanaspatīnāṃ divyānāṃ puṣpair uccāvacaiś citam / HV_App.I,18.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:2954: kānanair ānanākārair unmiṣantam iva śriyā / HV_App.I,18.457 /
GE07hv_apppu:2955: [k: After line 457a, K2 Ñ2.3 V1 B Ds D6 T2-4 G1.2 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2957: [k: Ñ2.3 V1 B T3.4 cont. (K3.4 V2 Dn D2-5 ins. after line 456):k]
GE07hv_apppu:2960: kāñcanaiḥ sānubhir yuktaṃ visarpadbhir iva śriyam / **HV_App.I,18.457**48:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2961: sthalībhir mṛgavīthibhiḥ kāntābhir iva śobhitam // HV_App.I,18.458 //
GE07hv_apppu:2962: pārśvair upalakalmāṣair meṣair iva vibhūṣitam / HV_App.I,18.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:2964: maṇḍitaṃ vanarājībhiḥ pramadābhiḥ patiṃ yathā / HV_App.I,18.461 /
GE07hv_apppu:2965: darībhiḥ sundarībhiś ca kandarābhis tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,18.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:2966: teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu sadāram iva śobhitam / HV_App.I,18.463 /
GE07hv_apppu:2968: jātarūpair vanoddeśaiḥ kṛtrimair iva maṇḍitam / HV_App.I,18.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:2969: mūlena suviśālena śirasā cocchritena ca / HV_App.I,18.466 /
GE07hv_apppu:2970: pṛthivīṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca gāhayantam iva sthitam // HV_App.I,18.467 //
GE07hv_apppu:2971: [k: T1.3 G2.3 M ins. (T2 G1 cont. after *46):k]
GE07hv_apppu:2973: te tam āsādya gomantaṃ ramyaṃ bhūmidharottamam / HV_App.I,18.468 /
GE07hv_apppu:2975: ruruhus te girivaraṃ kham ūrdhvam iva pakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,18.470 /
GE07hv_apppu:2977: te tu tasyottamaṃ śṛṅgam ārūḍhās tridaśā iva / HV_App.I,18.472 /
GE07hv_apppu:2978: agāraṃ ruciraṃ cakrur manasā nirmitopamam // HV_App.I,18.473 //
GE07hv_apppu:2979: niviṣṭau yādavau dṛṣṭvā jāmadagnyo mahāmuniḥ / HV_App.I,18.474 /
GE07hv_apppu:2981: kṛṣṇa yāsyāmy ahaṃ tāta puraṃ sūrpārakaṃ vibho / HV_App.I,18.476 /
GE07hv_apppu:2983: kṛṣṇaṃ saṃkarṣaṇaṃ caiva yāsye śūrpārakaṃ prati / **HV_App.I,18.476**50:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:2984: yuvayor nāsti vaimukhyaṃ saṃgrāme dānavair api // HV_App.I,18.477 //
GE07hv_apppu:2985: prāptavān asmi yāṃ prītiṃ mārgānugamanād api / HV_App.I,18.478 /
GE07hv_apppu:2986: sā me kṛṣṇānugṛhṇāti śarīram idam avyayam // HV_App.I,18.479 //
GE07hv_apppu:2987: idaṃ tat sthānam uddiṣṭaṃ yatrāyudhasamāgamaḥ / HV_App.I,18.480 /
GE07hv_apppu:2988: yuvayor vihito devaiḥ samayaḥ sāṃparāyikaḥ // HV_App.I,18.481 //
GE07hv_apppu:2989: devānāṃ mukhya vaikuṇṭha viṣṇo devair abhiṣṭutaḥ / HV_App.I,18.482 /
GE07hv_apppu:2990: [k: D6 T1-3 G M G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2995: [k: T1.3 G3 ins. after line 4a (G2 after line 4) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:2998: kṛṣṇa sarvasya lokasya śṛṇu me naiṣṭhikaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,18.483 //
GE07hv_apppu:2999: yad idaṃ prastutaṃ karma tvayā govinda laukikam / HV_App.I,18.484 /
GE07hv_apppu:3001: tasyāyaṃ prathamaḥ kalpaḥ kālena bhuvi yojitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.486 /
GE07hv_apppu:3002: jarāsaṃdhena vai sārdhaṃ saṃgrāme samupasthite // HV_App.I,18.487 //
GE07hv_apppu:3003: tatrāyudhabalaṃ caiva rūpaṃ ca raṇakarkaśam / HV_App.I,18.488 /
GE07hv_apppu:3004: svayam evātmanā kṛṣṇa tvam ātmānaṃ vidhatsva ha // HV_App.I,18.489 //
GE07hv_apppu:3005: cakrodyatakaraṃ dṛṣṭvā tvāṃ gadāpāṇinaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,18.490 /
GE07hv_apppu:3007: adyaprabhṛti te yātrā svargoktā samupasthitā / HV_App.I,18.492 /
GE07hv_apppu:3008: pṛthivyām amarārthe ca kīrtyarthaṃ ca satāṃ vara // HV_App.I,18.493 //
GE07hv_apppu:3012: kuru śīghraṃ mahābāho govinda vadatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,18.495 //
GE07hv_apppu:3016: ekaveṇīdharā ceyaṃ vasudhā tvāṃ pratīkṣate // HV_App.I,18.499 //
GE07hv_apppu:3017: sagrahaṃ kṛṣṇa nakṣatraṃ tvatpratīkṣam upasthitam / HV_App.I,18.500 /
GE07hv_apppu:3020: tvayi mānuṣyam āpanne yuddhe ca samupasthite // HV_App.I,18.501 //
GE07hv_apppu:3021: tvarasva kṛṣṇa yuddhāya dānavānāṃ vadhāya ca / HV_App.I,18.502 /
GE07hv_apppu:3022: svargāya ca narendrāṇāṃ devatānāṃ sukhāya ca // HV_App.I,18.503 //
GE07hv_apppu:3023: satkṛto 'haṃ tvayā kṛṣṇa lokaiś caiva sahāmaraiḥ / HV_App.I,18.504 /
GE07hv_apppu:3024: tvayā satkṛtarūpeṇa yena satkṛtavān aham // HV_App.I,18.505 //
GE07hv_apppu:3026: smartavyaś cāsmi yuddheṣu kaṃsāre pṛthivīkṣitām // HV_App.I,18.507 //
GE07hv_apppu:3027: [k: Ñ3 V ins. (B3 B6 subst. for line 507):k]
GE07hv_apppu:3028: smartavyas tatra tatrāhaṃ yatra yuddhaṃ bhavet sadā / **HV_App.I,18.507**54:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3030: na ca kṛtyaṃ mayā tubhyaṃ tvaṃ ca kartā jagadguruḥ / **HV_App.I,18.507**55:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3031: māṃ smṛtvā yo raṇaṃ yāti dhruvaṃ tasya jayo bhavet / **HV_App.I,18.507**55:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:3032: [k: B1 Ds2 D5 cont. (Ñ3 V B3 D6 after *54); K Ñ2 Dn Ds1 D1-4 T G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3033: ity uktvā jāmadagnyas tu kṛṣṇam akliṣṭakāriṇam / **HV_App.I,18.507**56:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3037: jāmadagnye gate rāme tau yādavakulodvahau / HV_App.I,18.508 /
GE07hv_apppu:3041: tau śailadhātudigdhāṅgau yuvānau śikhare sthitau / HV_App.I,18.512 /
GE07hv_apppu:3042: ceratus tatra kānteṣu vaneṣu ratilālasau // HV_App.I,18.513 //
GE07hv_apppu:3043: udayantaṃ nirīkṣantau śaśinaṃ jyotiṣāṃ varam / HV_App.I,18.514 /
GE07hv_apppu:3044: udayāstamane caiva grahāṇāṃ bhāskarasya ca // HV_App.I,18.515 //
GE07hv_apppu:3045: atha saṃkarṣaṇaḥ śrīmān vinā kṛṣṇena vīryavān / HV_App.I,18.516 /
GE07hv_apppu:3046: cacāra tasya śikhare nagasya nagasaṃnibhaḥ // HV_App.I,18.517 //
GE07hv_apppu:3047: sa phullasya kadambasya pracchāye niṣasāda ha / HV_App.I,18.518 /
GE07hv_apppu:3048: vāyunā madagandhena vījyamānaḥ sukhena vai // HV_App.I,18.519 //
GE07hv_apppu:3049: tasya tenānilaughena sevyamānasya tatra vai / HV_App.I,18.520 /
GE07hv_apppu:3050: madhyasaṃsparśajo bhāvaḥ saṃspṛśan ghrāṇam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,18.521 //
GE07hv_apppu:3051: tṛṣā cainaṃ viveśāśu vāruṇīprabhavā tadā / HV_App.I,18.522 /
GE07hv_apppu:3052: śuṣoca ca mukhaṃ tasya mattasyevāpare 'hani // HV_App.I,18.523 //
GE07hv_apppu:3053: smāritaḥ sa purāvṛttam amṛtaprāśanaṃ vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,18.524 /
GE07hv_apppu:3054: tṛṣito madirānveṣī tatas taṃ tarum ākṣipat // HV_App.I,18.525 //
GE07hv_apppu:3057: tasya prāvṛṣi phullasya yad ambho jaladojjhitam / HV_App.I,18.526 /
GE07hv_apppu:3058: tat koṭharasthā madirā samajāyata nirmalā // HV_App.I,18.527 //
GE07hv_apppu:3059: tāṃ tu tṛṣṇābhibhūtātmā pibann ārta ivāsakṛt / HV_App.I,18.528 /
GE07hv_apppu:3060: madāc ca calitākāraḥ samajāyata sa prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,18.529 //
GE07hv_apppu:3061: tasya mattasya vadanaṃ kiṃcic calitalocanam / HV_App.I,18.530 /
GE07hv_apppu:3063: kadambakoṭare jātā nāmnā kādambarīti sā / HV_App.I,18.532 /
GE07hv_apppu:3064: rūpiṇī vāruṇī tatra devānām amṛtāraṇiḥ // HV_App.I,18.533 //
GE07hv_apppu:3066: tisras tridaśanāryas tam upatasthuḥ priyaṃvadāḥ // HV_App.I,18.535 //
GE07hv_apppu:3067: madirā rūpiṇī bhūtvā kāntiś ca śaśinaḥ priyā / HV_App.I,18.536 /
GE07hv_apppu:3068: śrīś ca devī variṣṭhā strī svayam evāmbujadhvajā // HV_App.I,18.537 //
GE07hv_apppu:3070: vāruṇy ātmahitaṃ vākyam uvāca madaviklavam // HV_App.I,18.539 //
GE07hv_apppu:3072: ahaṃ te dayitā kāntā vāruṇī samupasthitā // HV_App.I,18.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:3073: tvām evāntarhitaṃ śrutvā śāśvataṃ vaḍavāmukhe / HV_App.I,18.542 /
GE07hv_apppu:3077: sāhaṃ kadambam ālīnā meghakāle sukhapriyā / HV_App.I,18.546 /
GE07hv_apppu:3078: tṛṣitaṃ manyamānā tvāṃ svena rūpeṇa chāditā // HV_App.I,18.547 //
GE07hv_apppu:3080: samīpaṃ preṣitā pitrā varuṇena tavānagha // HV_App.I,18.549 //
GE07hv_apppu:3082: tvayopayoktum icchāmi saṃmatas tvaṃ hi me guruḥ // HV_App.I,18.551 //
GE07hv_apppu:3083: na tvānanta parityakṣye bhartsitāpi tvayāvyava / HV_App.I,18.552 /
GE07hv_apppu:3084: nāhaṃ tvayā vinā lokān utsahe deva sevitum // HV_App.I,18.553 //
GE07hv_apppu:3090: provāca praṇayāt kāntiḥ saṃkarṣaṇam upasthitā / HV_App.I,18.556 /
GE07hv_apppu:3091: jayapūrveṇa yogena sasmitaṃ yogam icchatī // HV_App.I,18.557 //
GE07hv_apppu:3092: ahaṃ candrād api guruṃ sahasraśirasaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,18.558 /
GE07hv_apppu:3093: svair guṇair anuraktā tvāṃ yathaiva madirā tathā // HV_App.I,18.559 //
GE07hv_apppu:3094: śrīś ca padmālayā devī vidheyā vaiṣṇavorasi / HV_App.I,18.560 /
GE07hv_apppu:3096: sā mālām amalāṃ gṛhya balasyorasi daṃśitā / HV_App.I,18.562 /
GE07hv_apppu:3097: padmāsyaṃ padmahastā vai saṃkarṣaṇam athābravīt // HV_App.I,18.563 //
GE07hv_apppu:3098: [k: Ñ3 V2 B2 D6 T1.2 G2-5 M G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3099: yady asti mayi kāruṇyaṃ vijñāpyaṃ śrūyatām idam / **HV_App.I,18.563**59:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3100: rāma rāmābhirāmas tvaṃ vāruṇyā samalaṃkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,18.564 /
GE07hv_apppu:3101: kāntyā mayā ca deveśa saṃgataś candramā yathā // HV_App.I,18.565 //
GE07hv_apppu:3102: iyaṃ ca sā mayā maulir uddhṛtā varuṇālayāt / HV_App.I,18.566 /
GE07hv_apppu:3103: mūrdhni śīrṣasahasrasya yā te bhānur ivābabhau // HV_App.I,18.567 //
GE07hv_apppu:3105: ādipadmaṃ ca padmākṣa divyaṃ śravaṇabhūṣaṇam // HV_App.I,18.569 //
GE07hv_apppu:3106: kauśeyāni ca nīlāni samudrābhāṇi bhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,18.570 /
GE07hv_apppu:3112: saṃgṛhya tam alaṃkāraṃ tāś ca tisraḥ surastriyaḥ / HV_App.I,18.574 /
GE07hv_apppu:3115: mudaṃ paramikāṃ lebhe grahamuktaḥ śaśī yathā // HV_App.I,18.577 //
GE07hv_apppu:3116: tābhyām ubhābhyāṃ saṃlāpe vartamāne gṛhe yathā / HV_App.I,18.578 /
GE07hv_apppu:3120: suptasya śayane divye kṣīrode varuṇālaye / HV_App.I,18.582 /
GE07hv_apppu:3121: viṣṇoḥ kirīṭaṃ daityena hṛtaṃ vairocanena vai // HV_App.I,18.583 //
GE07hv_apppu:3122: tadarthaṃ tena saṃgrāmaḥ kṛto gurvartham ojasā / HV_App.I,18.584 /
GE07hv_apppu:3123: kirīṭārthe samudrasya madhye daityagaṇaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,18.585 //
GE07hv_apppu:3124: mokṣayitvā kirīṭaṃ tu vaiṣṇavaṃ patatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,18.586 /
GE07hv_apppu:3126: sa dadarśa guruṃ śaile viṣṇuṃ kāryāntarāgatam / HV_App.I,18.588 /
GE07hv_apppu:3128: sa dṛṣṭvā mānuṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ śailarājaśirogatam / HV_App.I,18.590 /
GE07hv_apppu:3130: abhijñas tasya bhāvānām garutmān patatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,18.592 /
GE07hv_apppu:3131: cikṣepa khagato mauliṃ viṣṇoḥ śirasi hṛṣṭavat // HV_App.I,18.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:3132: [k: K1.3.4 Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3136: [k: M1-3 (G2.5 M4 after line 1 of *61) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3137: saṃyuktaḥ kṛṣṇaśirasā sa maulim adhikaṃ babhau / **HV_App.I,18.593**62:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3140: kṛṣṇaḥ prahṛṣṭavadano rāmaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,18.595 //
GE07hv_apppu:3141: tvarate tu kāryārtho devatānāṃ na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.596 /
GE07hv_apppu:3142: yatheyam āvayoḥ śaile saṃgrāmaracanā kṛtā // HV_App.I,18.597 //
GE07hv_apppu:3144: mūrdhni dṛṣṭvātra daityena hṛtā kṣiptvā garutmatā / **HV_App.I,18.597**63:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3145: [k: V3 (cont.) K2 Ñ2.3 V1.2 B Dn2 Ds2 D2.5.6 T1.2 G4 M4 (Dn after line 598) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3148: śakrasya sadṛśaṃ rūpaṃ divyam āsthāya sāgarāt / HV_App.I,18.598 /

GE07hv_apppu:3150: [k: K2 Ñ2.3 V1.3 B3 Ds D2.6 G M4 subst. (V2 B1.2D4.5 T1.3 ins. after line 598) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3152: suvyaktaṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaḥ sa jarāsaṃdho narādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,18.600 /
GE07hv_apppu:3153: lakṣyante ca dhvajāgrāṇi rathānāṃ vātaraṃhasām // HV_App.I,18.601 //
GE07hv_apppu:3155: [k: K Ñ3 V1.2 B D T2-4 G1.4 M4 subst. for line 602:k]
GE07hv_apppu:3157: chatrāṇy ārya virājante daṃśitāni sitāni ca // HV_App.I,18.603 //
GE07hv_apppu:3159: abhivartanti naḥ śubhrā yathā khe haṃsapaṅktayaḥ // HV_App.I,18.605 //
GE07hv_apppu:3160: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3163: etāni nūnaṃ samare pārthivair āyudhāni ca / **HV_App.I,18.605**67:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:3165: kāle khalu nṛpaḥ prāpto jarāsaṃdho mahīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,18.606 /
GE07hv_apppu:3167: ārya tiṣṭhāva sahitau na khalv anvāgate nṛpe / HV_App.I,18.608 /
GE07hv_apppu:3168: yuddhārambhaḥ prayoktavyo balaṃ tāvad vimṛśyatām // HV_App.I,18.609 //
GE07hv_apppu:3169: evam uktvā tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ saṃsthaḥ saṃgrāmalālasaḥ / HV_App.I,18.610 /
GE07hv_apppu:3171: vīkṣamāṇaś ca tān sarvān nṛpān yaduvaro 'vyayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.612 /
GE07hv_apppu:3172: ātmānam ātmanovāca yat pūrvaṃ divi mantritam // HV_App.I,18.613 //
GE07hv_apppu:3173: ime te pṛthivīpālāḥ pārthive vartmani sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,18.614 /
GE07hv_apppu:3174: ye vināśaṃ gamiṣyanti śāstradṛṣṭena karmaṇa // HV_App.I,18.615 //
GE07hv_apppu:3175: prokṣitān khalv imān anye mṛtyunā nṛpasattamān / HV_App.I,18.616 /
GE07hv_apppu:3177: sthāne bhārapariśrāntā vasudheyaṃ divaṃ gatā / HV_App.I,18.618 /
GE07hv_apppu:3179: [k: K1 Ñ1.3 V B2 Dn Ds D2-4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3181: alpena khalu kālena viviktaṃ pṛthivītalam / HV_App.I,18.620 /
GE07hv_apppu:3182: bhaviṣyati narendraughair ākīrṇaṃ ca nabhastalam // HV_App.I,18.621 //
GE07hv_apppu:3185: jarāsaṃdhas tataḥ prāpto nṛpaṃ sarvamahākṣitām / HV_App.I,18.622 /
GE07hv_apppu:3187: nirgataṃ sa hariṃ jñātvā mathurāto mahīpatiḥ / **HV_App.I,18.622**69:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3191: tatas te calitāḥ sarve gomantaṃ sabalā nṛpāḥ / **HV_App.I,18.622**69:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:3195: rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair yuktair asaṅgagatibhiḥ kvacit // HV_App.I,18.625 //
GE07hv_apppu:3198: svārūḍhaiḥ sādibhir yuktaiḥ preṅkhamāṇaiḥ pravalgitaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.628 /
GE07hv_apppu:3199: vājibhir vāyusaṃkāśaiḥ plavadbhir iva patribhiḥ // HV_App.I,18.629 //
GE07hv_apppu:3202: evaṃ caturvidhaiḥ sainyaiḥ kampamānair ivāmbudaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.632 /
GE07hv_apppu:3208: sa rathair neminirghoṣair gajaiś ca madasiñjitaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.634 /
GE07hv_apppu:3209: heṣadbhiś caiva turagaiḥ kṣveḍitograiś ca pattibhiḥ // HV_App.I,18.635 //
GE07hv_apppu:3210: saṃnādayan diśaḥ sarvāḥ sarvāṃś cāpi guhāśayān / HV_App.I,18.636 /
GE07hv_apppu:3211: sa rājā sāgarākāraḥ sasainyaḥ pratyadṛśyata // HV_App.I,18.637 //
GE07hv_apppu:3215: rathī khaḍgī śarī cāpī niṣaṅgī hemakuṇḍalī / **HV_App.I,18.637**72:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:3219: kim etair nṛpasiṃhaiś ca ity avocan mahābalaḥ / **HV_App.I,18.637**72:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:3222: rathaiḥ pavanasaṃpātair gajaiś ca jaladopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.640 /
GE07hv_apppu:3223: turagaiś ca sitābhrābhaiḥ pattibhiś cāpi daṃśitaḥ / HV_App.I,18.641 /
GE07hv_apppu:3224: vyāmiśraṃ tad balaṃ bhāti mattadviparathākulam / HV_App.I,18.642 /
GE07hv_apppu:3228: babhau tasya niviṣṭasya babhau śrīḥ śibirasya vai / HV_App.I,18.646 /
GE07hv_apppu:3229: śuklaparvaṇi pūrṇasya yathā rūpaṃ mahodadheḥ // HV_App.I,18.647 //
GE07hv_apppu:3230: vītarātre tataḥ kāle nṛpās te kṛtakautukāḥ / HV_App.I,18.648 /
GE07hv_apppu:3232: samavāyīkṛtāḥ sarve giriprastheṣu te nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,18.650 /
GE07hv_apppu:3234: teṣāṃ sutumulaḥ śabdaḥ śuśruve pṛthivīkṣitām / HV_App.I,18.652 /
GE07hv_apppu:3235: yugānte bhidyamānānām sāgarāṇāṃ yathā svaraḥ // HV_App.I,18.653 //
GE07hv_apppu:3237: cerur mā śabda ity evaṃ bruvanto rājaśāsanāt // HV_App.I,18.655 //
GE07hv_apppu:3238: tasya rūpaṃ balasyāsīn niḥśabdastimitasya vai / HV_App.I,18.656 /
GE07hv_apppu:3240: tasmin stimitaniḥśabde yogād iva mahārṇave / HV_App.I,18.658 /
GE07hv_apppu:3241: jarāsaṃdho bṛhad vākyaṃ bṛhaspatir ivādade // HV_App.I,18.659 //
GE07hv_apppu:3243: sarvataḥ parvataś caiva balaughaiḥ parivāryatām // HV_App.I,18.661 //
GE07hv_apppu:3244: aśmayantrāṇi yujyantāṃ kṣepaṇīyāś ca mudgarāḥ / HV_App.I,18.662 /
GE07hv_apppu:3245: ūrdhvaṃ cāpi pravāhyantāṃ prāsā vai tomarāṇi ca // HV_App.I,18.663 //
GE07hv_apppu:3246: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B D G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3247: ūrdhvaṃ prekṣamāṇārthāya dṛḍhāni ca laghūni ca / **HV_App.I,18.663**73:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3250: yathā narapatiḥ prāha tathā śighraṃ vidhīyatām // **HV_App.I,18.663**73:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:3251: dāryatām eṣa ṭaṅkaughaiḥ khanitaiś ca nagottamaḥ / HV_App.I,18.664 /
GE07hv_apppu:3252: nṛpāś ca durgayuddhajñā vinyasyantām adūrataḥ // HV_App.I,18.665 //
GE07hv_apppu:3253: adyaprabhṛti sainyair me girirodhaḥ pravartyatām / HV_App.I,18.666 /
GE07hv_apppu:3254: yāvad etau pātayāmo vasudevasutāv ubhau // HV_App.I,18.667 //
GE07hv_apppu:3256: ākāśam api bāṇaughair niḥsaṃpātaṃ vidhīyatām // HV_App.I,18.669 //
GE07hv_apppu:3258: teṣu teṣv avakāśeṣu śīghram āruhyatāṃ giriḥ // HV_App.I,18.671 //
GE07hv_apppu:3261: drumaḥ kiṃpuruṣaś caiva pārvatīyāś ca mānavāḥ / HV_App.I,18.674 /
GE07hv_apppu:3262: parvatasyāparaṃ pārśvaṃ kṣipram ārohayantv amī // HV_App.I,18.675 //
GE07hv_apppu:3263: pauravo veṇudāriś ca vaidarbhaḥ somakas tathā / HV_App.I,18.676 /
GE07hv_apppu:3264: rukmī ca bhojādhipatiḥ sūryākṣaś caiva yāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,18.677 //
GE07hv_apppu:3265: pāñcalānām adhipatir drupadaś ca narādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,18.678 /
GE07hv_apppu:3266: vindānuvindāv āvantyau dantavaktraś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,18.679 //
GE07hv_apppu:3267: chāgaliḥ purumitraś ca virāṭaś ca mahīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,18.680 /
GE07hv_apppu:3268: kauśāmbyo mālavaś caiva śatadhanvā vidūrathaḥ // HV_App.I,18.681 //
GE07hv_apppu:3269: bhūriśravās trigartaś ca bāṇaḥ pañcanadas tathā / HV_App.I,18.682 /
GE07hv_apppu:3270: uttaraṃ parvatāroham ete durgasahā nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,18.683 /
GE07hv_apppu:3272: ulūkaḥ kaitaveyaś ca vīraś cāṃśumataḥ sutaḥ / HV_App.I,18.685 /
GE07hv_apppu:3273: ekalavyo dṛḍhākṣaś ca rathavarmā jayadrathaḥ // HV_App.I,18.686 //
GE07hv_apppu:3274: uttamaujās tathā sālvaḥ kairaleyaś ca kaiśikaḥ / HV_App.I,18.687 /
GE07hv_apppu:3275: vaidiśo vāmadevaś ca suketuś cāpi vīryavān // HV_App.I,18.688 //
GE07hv_apppu:3276: pūrvaṃ parvatanirvyūham eteṣv āyattam astu naḥ / HV_App.I,18.689 /
GE07hv_apppu:3278: ahaṃ ca daradaś caiva cedirājaś ca saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,18.691 /
GE07hv_apppu:3280: evam eṣa giriḥ kṣipraṃ samantād veṣṭito balaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.693 /
GE07hv_apppu:3282: gadino ye gadābhis te parighaiḥ parighāyudhāḥ / HV_App.I,18.695 /
GE07hv_apppu:3283: apare vividhaiḥ śastrair dārayantu nagottamam // HV_App.I,18.696 //
GE07hv_apppu:3285: kāryo bhūmisamaḥ sarvo bhavadbhir vasudhādhipaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.698 //
GE07hv_apppu:3286: jarāsaṃdhavacaḥ śrutvā pārthiveṣu ca śāsanam / HV_App.I,18.699 /
GE07hv_apppu:3287: [k: K1.2.4 Ñ2.3 V B Dn Ds D2.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3288: gomantaṃ veṣṭayām āsuḥ sāgarāḥ pṛthivīm iva / **HV_App.I,18.699**74:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3289: uvāca rājā cedīnāṃ devānāṃ maghavā iva // HV_App.I,18.700 //
GE07hv_apppu:3290: kiṃ no yuddhena durge 'smin gomante ca nagottame / HV_App.I,18.701 /
GE07hv_apppu:3292: kāṣṭhais tṛṇaiś ca bahubhiḥ parivārya samantataḥ / HV_App.I,18.703 /
GE07hv_apppu:3293: adyaiva dīpyatāṃ kṣipram alam anyena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,18.704 //
GE07hv_apppu:3294: kṣatriyāḥ sukumārā hi raṇe sāyakayodhinaḥ / HV_App.I,18.705 /
GE07hv_apppu:3295: na yuktāḥ parvate durge niyoktuṃ pādayodhinaḥ // HV_App.I,18.706 //
GE07hv_apppu:3296: na nāma pratibandhena nāpy avaskandakarmaṇā / HV_App.I,18.707 /
GE07hv_apppu:3297: śakya eṣa giris tāta devair apy abhimarditum // HV_App.I,18.708 //
GE07hv_apppu:3300: vayaṃ bahava ity evaṃ nāpy eṣa nipuṇo nayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.711 /
GE07hv_apppu:3301: yādavau nāvamantavyau dvāv apy etau raṇe sthitau // HV_App.I,18.712 //
GE07hv_apppu:3303: karmabhis tv amarau vidmo bālāv atibalānvitau // HV_App.I,18.714 //
GE07hv_apppu:3305: karmabhis tv atulair vīrāv ubhāv api balotkaṭau / **HV_App.I,18.714**75:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3306: [k: K Ñ V B D T G M4 G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3312: vākyam etat tu ruruce sabalānāṃ mahīkṣitām / HV_App.I,18.715 /

GE07hv_apppu:3321: dadāha śailaṃ śrīmantaṃ gomantaṃ kāntapādapam // HV_App.I,18.724 //

GE07hv_apppu:3325: ālimpatīva vidhivat samantād arciṣāṃ cayaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.728 //

GE07hv_apppu:3340: resuś codvejitāḥ siṃhāḥ śārdūlāś cānalāvilāḥ / HV_App.I,18.741 /

GE07hv_apppu:3365: na tu cakre tayoḥ sparśaṃ vahnitāpo mahīpate // **HV_App.I,18.748**78:16 //

GE07hv_apppu:3369: dhūmabhārair anālakṣye mūle śithilatāṃ gate // HV_App.I,18.752 //
GE07hv_apppu:3370: saroṣaṃ hi tadā rāmo vacanaṃ keśisūdanam / HV_App.I,18.753 /
GE07hv_apppu:3371: babhāṣe padmapatrākṣaṃ sa sākṣān madhusūdanam // HV_App.I,18.754 //
GE07hv_apppu:3373: āvayoḥ kṛṣṇa vaireṇa vairibhir vasudhādhipaiḥ // HV_App.I,18.756 //
GE07hv_apppu:3376: ayaṃ yady āvayor arthe gomantas tāta dahyate / HV_App.I,18.759 /
GE07hv_apppu:3377: ayaśasyam idaṃ loke kaulīnaṃ ca bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,18.760 //
GE07hv_apppu:3378: tad asyānṛṇyahetor hi nagasya nagasaṃnibha / HV_App.I,18.761 /
GE07hv_apppu:3379: kṣatriyān nihaniṣyāmi dorbhyām iva yudhāṃ vara // HV_App.I,18.762 //
GE07hv_apppu:3380: ete te kṣatriyāḥ sarve girim ādīpya daṃśitāḥ / HV_App.I,18.763 /
GE07hv_apppu:3381: rathinas tāta dṛśyante yathādeśaṃ yuyutsavaḥ // HV_App.I,18.764 //
GE07hv_apppu:3385: evam uktvā gireḥ śṛṅgān meruśṛṅgād ivoḍurāṭ / HV_App.I,18.765 /

GE07hv_apppu:3428: tato 'mbarāt patanti sma divyāny āhavasaṃplave / HV_App.I,18.785 /

GE07hv_apppu:3431: nikṣipya yāni tatraiva tāni prāptau sma yādavau / **HV_App.I,18.786**86:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:3436: halaṃ saṃvartakaṃ nāma saunandaṃ musalaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,18.791 /
GE07hv_apppu:3437: cakraṃ sudarśanaṃ nāma gadā kaumodakī tathā // HV_App.I,18.792 //
GE07hv_apppu:3438: catvāry etāni tejāṃsi viṣṇupraharaṇāni vai / HV_App.I,18.793 /

GE07hv_apppu:3447: darśanīyaṃ ca lokeṣu cakram ādityavarcasam / HV_App.I,18.799 /

GE07hv_apppu:3451: nāmnā śārṅgam iti khyātaṃ prīto jagrāha vīryavān // **HV_App.I,18.800**88:2 //

GE07hv_apppu:3462: halam udyamya rāmas tu sarpendram iva kopitam / HV_App.I,18.809 /
GE07hv_apppu:3463: cacāra samare vīro dviṣatām antakopamaḥ // HV_App.I,18.810 //
GE07hv_apppu:3465: cakāra roṣaṃ saphalaṃ nāgeṣu ca hayeṣu ca // HV_App.I,18.812 //
GE07hv_apppu:3468: te vadhyamānā rāmeṇa samare kṣatriyarṣabhāḥ / HV_App.I,18.815 /

GE07hv_apppu:3471: dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttiṃ vaḥ samare kātarātmanām // HV_App.I,18.818 //
GE07hv_apppu:3475: bhītāḥ kiṃ vinivartadhvaṃ dhig etāṃ kṣatravṛttitām // HV_App.I,18.822 //

GE07hv_apppu:3478: atha vā tiṣṭhata rathaiḥ prekṣakāḥ samavasthitāḥ / **HV_App.I,18.823**90:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:3482: te hayaiḥ kāñcanāpīḍai rathaiś caivendusaprabhaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.827 /

GE07hv_apppu:3490: tad yuddham abhavat tatra tayos teṣāṃ ca saṃyuge / HV_App.I,18.835 /

GE07hv_apppu:3530: śivānām aśivaiḥ śabdair nādite ghoradarśane // HV_App.I,18.868 //

GE07hv_apppu:3575: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.899 /
GE07hv_apppu:3576: yakṣāś cāpsarasaś caiva samājagmuḥ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,18.900 //
GE07hv_apppu:3578: śuśubhe 'bhyadhikaṃ rājan nabho jyotirgaṇair iva // HV_App.I,18.902 //

GE07hv_apppu:3586: gadā gadābhṛtāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vindhyaṃ girim ivānalaḥ // HV_App.I,18.910 //

GE07hv_apppu:3589: tato 'ntarikṣe vāg āsīt susvarā lokasākṣiṇī / HV_App.I,18.913 /

GE07hv_apppu:3610: tan narendraiḥ parityaktaṃ bhagnadarpair mahārathaiḥ / HV_App.I,18.924 /
GE07hv_apppu:3611: ghoraṃ kravyādabahulaṃ raudram āyodhanaṃ babhau // HV_App.I,18.925 //

GE07hv_apppu:3626: [k: T1 G3 M1-3 ins. (T2 G1.5 cont. after *103) :k]
GE07hv_apppu:3627: jarāsaṃdhe gate rājñi kṛṣṇād bhīte raṇotsavāt / **HV_App.I,188.927**104:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3629: saṃbandhakāmo govindam idam evāha cedirāṭ // HV_App.I,18.929 //
GE07hv_apppu:3630: ahaṃ pitṛṣvasur bhartā tava yādavanandana / HV_App.I,18.930 /
GE07hv_apppu:3631: sabalas tvām upāvṛttas tvaṃ hi me dayitaḥ prabho // HV_App.I,18.931 //
GE07hv_apppu:3634: uktaś caiṣa mayā rājā jarāsaṃdho 'lpacetanaḥ / HV_App.I,18.932 /
GE07hv_apppu:3635: kṛṣṇād virama durbuddhe vigrahād raṇakarmaṇi // HV_App.I,18.933 //
GE07hv_apppu:3636: tad eṣa sa parityakto mama vākyasya dūṣakaḥ / HV_App.I,18.934 /
GE07hv_apppu:3637: bhagno yuddhe jarāsaṃdhas tvayā dravati sānugaḥ // HV_App.I,18.935 //
GE07hv_apppu:3638: nirvairo naiṣa saṃyāti svapuraṃ pṛthivīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,18.936 /
GE07hv_apppu:3641: tvayy eva bhūyo 'py aparaṃ darśayiṣyati kilbiṣam // HV_App.I,18.937 //
GE07hv_apppu:3644: tad imāṃ saṃtyajāśu tvaṃ mahīṃ hatanarākulām / HV_App.I,18.938 /
GE07hv_apppu:3650: sṛgālaṃ vāsudevaṃ vai drakṣyamas tatra pārthivam // HV_App.I,18.941 //
GE07hv_apppu:3651: imau rathavarodagrau yuvayoḥ kāritau mayā / HV_App.I,18.942 /
GE07hv_apppu:3653: śīghram āruha bhadraṃ te baladevasahāyavān / HV_App.I,18.944 /
GE07hv_apppu:3654: tvarāmaḥ karavīrasthaṃ draṣṭuṃ taṃ vasudhādhipam // HV_App.I,18.945 //
GE07hv_apppu:3664: tad gaccha rāmasahitaḥ sahāyaiḥ saha saṃgataḥ / **HV_App.I,18.945**109:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:3666: pitṛṣvasuḥ pater vākyaṃ śrutvā cedipates tadā / HV_App.I,18.946 /
GE07hv_apppu:3667: vākyaṃ hṛṣṭamanāḥ kṛṣṇo jagāda jagato guruḥ // HV_App.I,18.947 //
GE07hv_apppu:3671: vākyasya durlabhā loke vaktāraś cedisattama // HV_App.I,18.951 //
GE07hv_apppu:3672: cedinātha sanāthau svaḥ saṃvṛttau tava darśanāt / HV_App.I,18.952 /
GE07hv_apppu:3673: nāvayoḥ kiṃcid aprāpyaṃ yayos tvaṃ bandhur īdṛśaḥ // HV_App.I,18.953 //
GE07hv_apppu:3674: jarāsaṃdhasya nidhanaṃ ye cānye tatsamā nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,18.954 /
GE07hv_apppu:3675: paryāptau tvatsanāthau svaḥ kartuṃ cedikulodvaha // HV_App.I,18.955 //
GE07hv_apppu:3677: yuddham apratimaṃ viddhi pravṛttaṃ nau raṇe nṛpaiḥ / **HV_App.I,18.955**110:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:3678: mayā tena mahārāja jarāsaṃdhena vai tadā / **HV_App.I,18.955**110:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:3679: saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān vṛttaḥ pratyakṣaṃ tava cedipa // **HV_App.I,18.955**110:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:3680: yadūnāṃ prathamo bandhus tvaṃ hi sarvamahīkṣitām / HV_App.I,18.956 /
GE07hv_apppu:3682: cakramausalam ity evaṃ saṃgrāmaṃ raṇavṛttayaḥ / HV_App.I,18.958 /
GE07hv_apppu:3683: kathayiṣyanti loke 'smin ye dhariṣyanti pārthivāḥ // HV_App.I,18.959 //
