GE07hv_apppu:5439: āsanāni yathāyogaṃ prāpnuvan svāni sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,21.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5440: keśavo 'pi ca dharmātmā rāmeṇa saha saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,21.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:5442: uvāca ca muniśreṣṭhaṃ vīṇāsaktam asaṅgagam // HV_App.I,21.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:5443: kuśalaṃ sarvakāryeṣu vada kiṃ munisattama / HV_App.I,21.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:5444: api te kuśalaṃ vipra tapaso munisattama // HV_App.I,21.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:5445: kuśalaṃ tava vīṇāyā vada vipra yathātatham // HV_App.I,21.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:5446: jagatām adya viprendra kā vārtā vada me prabho // HV_App.I,21.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:5447: atha vā kuśalaṃ nāma yuṣmākaṃ niyatātmanām / HV_App.I,21.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:5448: diṣṭyā dṛṣṭo 'si saṃprāptaḥ pāvayānaś ca no vibho // HV_App.I,21.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:5449: prītā vayaṃ muniśreṣṭha pūtāś caiva tvadāgamāt / HV_App.I,21.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:5450: adyeyaṃ yādavakulaṃ loke khyātiṃ prayāsyati / HV_App.I,21.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:5451: tvādṛśāṃ puṇyakīrtīnāṃ saṃyogād vada sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,21.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5452: ādyo hi munimukhyānāṃ bhavāṃl loke prathiṣyati / HV_App.I,21.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:5453: dhanyāḥ khalu vayaṃ vipra yato dṛṣṭās tvayā vibho / HV_App.I,21.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:5454: evamādi jagannāthaḥ kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭavān munim // HV_App.I,21.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:5455: tac chrutvā kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,21.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:5456: muniḥ prītamanā bhūtvā provāca yadusaṃsadi // HV_App.I,21.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:5457: rāmeṇa saṃgataṃ kṛṣṇam ūrdhvabāhum avasthitam / HV_App.I,21.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:5458: sarvāṃs tahtā yadūn vipraḥ samābhāṣya vacas tadā // HV_App.I,21.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:5459: kim ayaṃ kuśalapraśnaḥ pṛṣṭaḥ kṛṣṇa mayi prabho / HV_App.I,21.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:5460: na yuktaṃ pratibhāty etad devadeva jagatpate // HV_App.I,21.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:5461: yatas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānām ādiḥ kuśaladas tadā / HV_App.I,21.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:5462: tvadicchayā jagat sarvaṃ kuśale viniyujyate // HV_App.I,21.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:5463: vayaṃ tu devadeveśa nityaṃ kuśalino hare / HV_App.I,21.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:5464: tathā hi mūlabhṛtyā vai viṣṇo tava yuge yuge // HV_App.I,21.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:5465: idaṃ tu citraṃ deveśa yad uktaṃ bhavato hare / HV_App.I,21.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:5466: pāvayāna iti śrīmaṃl lokanātha sureśvara // HV_App.I,21.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:5467: tvaṃ hi śuddhaḥ sadā yogī pūtaḥ kila mamāgamāt / HV_App.I,21.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:5468: kim anyad vada deveśa prasādāt tava mānada // HV_App.I,21.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5469: prasādāt iśayād etad yuktaṃ vaktuṃ jagatpate / HV_App.I,21.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:5470: idaṃ niścitavān adya prasanno mayi mānada // HV_App.I,21.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:5471: sarvathā kṛtakṛtyo 'smi dṛṣṭo yena tvayā vibho / HV_App.I,21.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:5472: prītir me hy atulā viṣṇo tava saṃdarśanena hi // HV_App.I,21.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:5473: ity uktvā sa jagannāthaṃ bhūyaḥ stotuṃ pracakrame / HV_App.I,21.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:5474: purāṇajñaḥ sadā vipro munīnām ādir avyayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:5475: tattvārthavit tadā viṣṇoḥ sākṣād vedārthatattvavit / HV_App.I,21.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:5476: ādāya nihitāṃ vīnāṃ saṃsthāpya layam uttamam // HV_App.I,21.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:5479: [k: Pāda b begins with three stars in the original,
GE07hv_apppu:5480: probably marking lacuna. The numbering of *--passages continues from app. 20. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5481: tantrīṃ ca sudṛḍhāṃ kṛtvā jagau geyair jagatpatim / HV_App.I,21.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:5484: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya haraye vedhase bhūtadhāriṇe / HV_App.I,21.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:5485: devadeva jagannātha namas te cakradhāriṇe // HV_App.I,21.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:5487: namas te sakaleśāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane // HV_App.I,21.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:5489: namas te kroḍarūpāya daṃṣṭrayā kṣitidhāraṇe // HV_App.I,21.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:5491: trivikrama namas tubhyaṃ trayīrūpa janārdana // HV_App.I,21.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:5494: udgīthāya namas tubhyaṃ rathaṃtara namo 'stu te / HV_App.I,21.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:5495: yaṃ vidur vedatattvajñā brahmādyāḥ sanakādayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:5497: so 'si deva jagannātha yo dṛṣṭo brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,21.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:5498: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante yogino yatacetasaḥ / HV_App.I,21.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:5499: so 'si deva purāṇātmaṃs tubhyaṃ deva namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,21.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:5500: tvām āhuḥ sakalā vedā brahmeti jñānaniścaye / HV_App.I,21.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:5501: tvamevedaṃ jagatsarvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pratiṣṭhitam // HV_App.I,21.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:5502: tvanmāyāpaṭalacchannāḥ prāṇinaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,21.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:5503: ahaṃ mānakṛtā bhraṣṭrāḥ patanti narakeṣu ca / HV_App.I,21.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:5504: ye ca tvāṃ viṣṇur ity āhus te ca tvāṃ yānti yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,21.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:5505: ye tu jñānasahā martyā vedāntajñānabṛṃhitāḥ / HV_App.I,21.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:5506: te tu tvāṃ devadeveśa praviśanti purātanam // HV_App.I,21.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:5507: tavaiṣā bhagavan māyā yām āśritya jaganmayīm / HV_App.I,21.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:5508: prāṇino niḥśvasanti sma duḥsahā sā hi nityaśaḥ / HV_App.I,21.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:5509: vihāraḥ sarva evaiṣa prāṇinām udayāya hi // HV_App.I,21.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:5510: pūrvamāsīj jagannātha vārāha iti saṃjñitaḥ / HV_App.I,21.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:5511: adadhā bhūtadhātrīṃ tvaṃ prāṇināṃ ca hitāya hi / HV_App.I,21.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:5512: punar aśvaśirā bhūtvā vedān āhṛtya tiṣṭhasi // HV_App.I,21.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:5513: āsīr vāmanarūpas tvam abadhnā balim adhvare / HV_App.I,21.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:5514: āhṛtya rājyaṃ tasmāt tvam indrāya prāhiṇor vibho // HV_App.I,21.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:5515: abhūs tvaṃ nārasiṃhaś ca hatavān daityapuṃgavam // HV_App.I,21.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:5516: raghoratha jagannātha vaṃśe vaṃśavatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,21.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:5517: āsīś ca rāmasaṃjñas tvaṃ rāvaṇaṃ hatavān vibho / HV_App.I,21.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:5518: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokam akaror devasattama // HV_App.I,21.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:5519: abhūś ca jāmadagnyas tvaṃ gṛhītvā paraśuṃ prabho / HV_App.I,21.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:5520: hatavāṃs tvaṃ mahāvīryaṃ kṛtavīryasutaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,21.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:5521: niḥkṣatriyam imaṃ lokam adadāḥ kāśyapāya vai // HV_App.I,21.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:5522: idānīm api govinda lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā / HV_App.I,21.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:5523: mānuṣaṃ vapur āsthāya dvāravatyāṃ pratiṣṭhasi // HV_App.I,21.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:5524: hatavān pūtanāṃ bālye gokule viharan prabho / HV_App.I,21.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:5525: arjunau hatavān bhūyo baddho lūkhalasaṃpuṭaḥ // HV_App.I,21.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:5526: punaś ca krīḍatā viṣṇo tvayaiva nihato hayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:5527: adadhās tvaṃ punaḥ śailaṃ gavāṃ saṃrakṣaṇāya hi / HV_App.I,21.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:5529: nanarta bhagavān bhūyo yamunāyā hrade hare / HV_App.I,21.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:5530: akaroḥ kāliyaṃ viṣṇo vimadaṃ yamunātaṭe // HV_App.I,21.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:5531: raṅgamadhye hatau viṣṇo tvayā cāṇūramuṣṭikau / HV_App.I,21.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:5532: duḥsahaṃ lokavidviṣṭaṃ hatavān kaṃsam ojasā // HV_App.I,21.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:5534: sa idānīṃ sthito rājye tvām āśrityendravad divi // HV_App.I,21.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:5535: kim anena jagannātha sarvaṃ tvadvaśagaṃ jagat / HV_App.I,21.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:5537: namas te devadeveśa namo bhūyo namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,21.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:5538: iti stutvā jagannātham upāraṃsīt sa nāradaḥ / HV_App.I,21.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:5539: tac chrutvā yādavāḥ sarve paraṃ vismayam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,21.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:5540: manasā tuṣṭuvur viṣṇuṃ nāradāc chrutavistarāḥ / HV_App.I,21.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:5541: dhanyā vayaṃ jagannātham āśritya sukhinas tathā / HV_App.I,21.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:5542: nirvṛtā vayam eveti nāradaṃ ca śaśaṃsire // HV_App.I,21.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:5543: punaḥ prītiyutāḥ sarve vilokya ca parasparam / HV_App.I,21.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:5544: dhanyā vayaṃ punar dhanyā dhanyānām agrataḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,21.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:5547: kimartham iha saṃprāpto vada nārada sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,21.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:5548: alam etaiḥ stutipadair yathārthair vāpi nārada // HV_App.I,21.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:5549: tvad āgamanajaṃ vipra tatkāryaṃ vada sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,21.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:5550: kutūhalaṃ mama vibho vṛṣṇīnāṃ caiva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,21.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:5554: arcayitvā haraṃ śarvaṃ dakṣine sāgare vibhum // HV_App.I,21.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:5556: tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ devadeveśa vasantaṃ vṛṣṇisaṃsadi // HV_App.I,21.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:5557: vindhyasya dakṣiṇaṃ pārśvaṃ gatavān bhīṣmapālitām / HV_App.I,21.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:5558: praviśya ca purīṃ tāṃ tu vidarbhasya mahīpateḥ / HV_App.I,21.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:5560: tatra dṛṣṭo hṛṣīkeśa rājñāṃ samudayo mahān // HV_App.I,21.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:5561: jarāsaṃdhaṃ puraskṛtya rājānaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,21.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:5562: yathāsukhaṃ yathāyogaṃ dṛṣṭāḥ keśava māciram // HV_App.I,21.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:5563: śiśupālo hi nṛpatiś cedīnām īśvaraś ca saḥ / HV_App.I,21.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:5564: pauṇḍrako vāsudevaś ca nityaṃ tvāṃ dveṣṭi yo vibho // HV_App.I,21.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:5565: drṣṭaś cātha mayā rājā bhīṣmako mābravīd vacaḥ / HV_App.I,21.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:5566: śiśupālasya viprarṣe rukmiṇyā saha saṃgamaḥ / HV_App.I,21.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:5567: bhavitā śvaḥ prabhāte tu tadarthaṃ rājasaṃgamaḥ // HV_App.I,21.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:5568: tac chrutvā tvarito deva prāptas tvāṃ vṛṣṇipuṃgava / HV_App.I,21.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:5569: tad gaccha vṛṣṇibhiḥ sārdhaṃ nagaraṃ tasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,21.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:5570: gṛhāṇa rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇa jitvā nṛpatipuṃgavān // HV_App.I,21.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:5571: śiśupālo 'tha rājā tu varaveṣeṇa viṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:5572: udvaheta jagannātha yadi rājā sa rukmiṇīm / HV_App.I,21.149 /
GE07hv_apppu:5573: akṛtyam ayaśasyaṃ ca bhavato nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:5574: yācitā sā bhavadbhis tu na dattā bhīṣmakeṇa hi // HV_App.I,21.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:5575: ārakṣako jarāsaṃdhaḥ pauṇḍraś ca nṛpapuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,21.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:5576: ekalavyo hṛṣīkeśa rukmī tasya tu dāsyati // HV_App.I,21.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:5577: bhavantaṃ yaḥ sadā dveṣṭi na tvāmāhvayati prabho // HV_App.I,21.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:5578: jarāsaṃdhas tu vṛṣṇīnāṃ sadā dveṣṭā na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,21.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:5579: tad gacchatu bhavāñ śīghraṃ yānair aśvair gajair api // HV_App.I,21.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:5580: ugrasenaṃ puraskṛtya sātyakiṃ ca mahābalam / HV_App.I,21.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:5581: tām ādāya jagannātha gatvā yāsyasi māciram // HV_App.I,21.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:5582: sā ca dṛṣṭā hṛṣīkeśa śokopahatacetanā / HV_App.I,21.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:5583: tvayy eva mana ādhāya sadā tvāṃ smarati prabho // HV_App.I,21.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:5584: yadi bhartā bhavec caidyaḥ syān mṛtā rukmiṇī hare / HV_App.I,21.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:5585: ujjīvaya hare viṣṇo rukmiṇīṃ rukmabhūṣaṇām // HV_App.I,21.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:5586: ity ahaṃ deva saṃprāptaḥ kṛtyaśeṣaṃ vicintyatām / HV_App.I,21.163 /
GE07hv_apppu:5587: na kiṃcid api duḥsādhyaṃ cakrapāṇe hare tava // HV_App.I,21.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:5588: sādhayāmo vayaṃ deva gacchet yuktvā jagāma saḥ // HV_App.I,21.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:5591: ity uktvā nārade yāte brahmalokaṃ sanātanam / HV_App.I,21.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:5592: vāsudevas tu dharmātmā yadūnām agraṇīr hariḥ // HV_App.I,21.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:5593: gamanāya matiṃ cakre rukmiṇyāharaṇe tadā / HV_App.I,21.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:5594: uvāca ca yadūn sarvān sajjībhavata māciram // HV_App.I,21.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:5595: asminn eva muhūrte tu yāsyāmaḥ kuṇḍinaṃ prati / HV_App.I,21.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:5596: rathamānaya me śīghraṃ sārathe dāruka prabho // HV_App.I,21.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:5597: āruhyantāṃ rathā aśvā gajāś ca parikalpitāḥ // HV_App.I,21.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:5598: agrataś cāstu no vīraḥ sātyakiḥ satyavikramaḥ / HV_App.I,21.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:5599: madhyato balabhadras tu rājā caiva tu pṛṣṭhataḥ // HV_App.I,21.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:5600: ahaṃ khaḍgī gadī cakrī śārṅgī śāṅkhī talatravān / HV_App.I,21.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:5601: ratham āsthāya gacchāmi dārukeṇa sahāyavān // HV_App.I,21.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:5604: badhvā vā bhīṣmakaṃ saṃkhye hatvā caiva tu rukmiṇam / HV_App.I,21.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:5605: ānayiṣyāmi tāṃ rājan rukmiṇīṃ matpriyāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,21.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:5606: sajjībhavantu rājāno rathair aśvair gajais tathā / HV_App.I,21.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:5607: kiṃ vilambatha rājāno yāsyāmaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,21.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:5608: ity uktvā vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve gamanāyopacakrire // HV_App.I,21.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:5609: kṛṣṇasyājñāṃ puraskṛtya sarve te yadupuṃgavāḥ / HV_App.I,21.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:5610: rathān āruhya yātās te saṃnaddhāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,21.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:5611: sātyakis tu mahārāja ratham āruhya daṃśitaḥ / HV_App.I,21.186 /
GE07hv_apppu:5612: dhanvī khaṅgī rathī bāṇī sainyāgre pratyadṛśyata / HV_App.I,21.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:5613: baladevo 'pi dharmātmā gajam āruhya daṃśitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:5614: sainyamadhye mahārāja mṛgamadhye yathā hariḥ // HV_App.I,21.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:5615: bhagavān api govindo rathaṃ dārukasaṃskṛtam / HV_App.I,21.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:5616: āruhya sahasā viṣṇur dārukeṇa samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,21.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:5617: gantum aichaj jagannātho hartuṃ bhojapateḥ sutām // HV_App.I,21.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:5619: samāśvastā tadā sā tu sa ca rājā suduḥkhitaḥ // HV_App.I,21.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:5621: āhatya duṃdubhīn sarve śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthak pṛthak / HV_App.I,21.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:5622: krameṇaiva gatās te tu bhīṣmakasya purīṃ prati // HV_App.I,21.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:5629: pitṛṣv asuḥ priyārthaṃ ca rāmakṛṣṇāv ubhāv api / HV_App.I,22.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5630: prayayur vṛṣṇayaś cānye mānyās tejobalānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,22.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5631: dṛṣṭvā tān āgatān sarvān vāsudevapurogamān / HV_App.I,22.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:5633: pūjayām āsa pūjārhān niviṣṭān bahir eva tān / HV_App.I,22.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:5634: nyaveśayac ca tān sarvān bhīṣmako nagarād bahiḥ // HV_App.I,22.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5635: sthite tasmiñ jarāsaṃdhe ripau teṣāṃ mahātmani / HV_App.I,22.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:5636: saṃbhārās tatra sarvatra vivāhāya samāhṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,22.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5637: śaṅkhāś ca paṭahāś caiva sasvanuḥ sarvatas tadā / HV_App.I,22.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:5638: brāhmaṇāś ca samāyātā nānādigbhyas tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,22.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:5639: ucchritāś caiva sarvatra dhvajā vai samalaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,22.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:5640: śvobhāvini vivāhe tu rukmiṇī niryayau bahiḥ / HV_App.I,22.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:5643: keśavo me bhaved bhartā nānyaḥ kaścid bhaved iti / HV_App.I,22.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:5644: evaṃ manasi saṃkalpaṃ kurvatī rukmiṇī śubhā / HV_App.I,22.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:5645: dīpyamānena vapuṣā balena mahatā vṛtā // HV_App.I,22.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:5646: tāṃ dadarśa tadā kṛṣṇo lakṣmīṃ sākṣād iva sthitām / HV_App.I,22.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:5648: vahner iva śikhāṃ dīptāṃ māyāṃ bhūmigatām iva / HV_App.I,22.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:5649: pṛthivīm iva gambhīrām utthitāṃ dharaṇītalāt // HV_App.I,22.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:5650: marīcim iva somasya saumyāṃ strīvigrahām iva / HV_App.I,22.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:5651: vinā padmaṃ śriyam iva bhujiṣyāstrīsahāyinīm // HV_App.I,22.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:5652: kṛṣṇena manasā dṛṣṭā durnirīkṣyā surair api // HV_App.I,22.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5653: śyāmāvadātā sā hy āsīt pṛthucārvañcitekṣaṇā / HV_App.I,22.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:5658: nāsty anyā pramadā loke rūpeṇa yaśasā śriyā / HV_App.I,22.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:5660: tāṃ dṛṣṭvāṃ vavṛdhe kāmaḥ kṛṣṇasya priyadarśanām / HV_App.I,22.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:5662: rukmiṇī ca tathā devī dadṛśe kṛṣṇam īśvaram / HV_App.I,22.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:5663: acintayac ca sā devī dṛṣṭvā kṛṣṇam avasthitam / HV_App.I,22.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:5664: so 'yaṃ viṣṇur jagannāthaḥ sākṣād rāmānujaḥ kṛtī // HV_App.I,22.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5665: asya cakraṃ sadā śaṅkho bhujayor ubhayor api / HV_App.I,22.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:5666: śobhayetāṃ sadā tau tu daityadānavadāriṇau // HV_App.I,22.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:5667: asya haste sthitaṃ śārṅgaṃ daityadānavabhīṣaṇam / HV_App.I,22.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:5668: sadā bhāti mahācāpaṃ loke khyātataraṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,22.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:5669: yamāśritya sadā devaṃ gadā kaumodakīti sā / HV_App.I,22.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:5671: yad anujñāṃ samāśritya khaḍgo nandakasaṃjñitaḥ / HV_App.I,22.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:5672: ripūn hanti mahāvīryān asahyān daivatair api // HV_App.I,22.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:5673: asyābhūd vāhanaṃ viṣṇor garutmān pakṣipuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,22.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:5675: so 'yaṃ viṣṇur vibhuḥ sākṣād gopaveṣavibhūṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,22.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:5676: gopastrīs tan abhāreṣu vijahāra yathāsukham // HV_App.I,22.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:5677: yo nanarta hrade tasyā yamunāyās tadā hariḥ / HV_App.I,22.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:5679: ayaṃ govardhanaṃ śailaṃ dadhāraikena pāṇinā / HV_App.I,22.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:5680: līlayā sa jagannātho golakaṃ bālako yathā // HV_App.I,22.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:5681: ayaṃ sa puṇḍarīkākṣo yo gajaṃ prajaghāna ha // HV_App.I,22.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5682: yaś cāṇūraṃ mṛdhe hatvā kaṃsaṃ caiva mahābalam / HV_App.I,22.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:5683: nanarta raṅge govindo gopaiḥ sārdhaṃ sayādavaiḥ // HV_App.I,22.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:5685: śyāmāvadātaḥ saśrīkaḥ sākṣād indrānujaḥ kṛtī / HV_App.I,22.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:5686: yuvā hariḥ purāṇātmā padmākṣaḥ padmasaprabhaḥ // HV_App.I,22.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:5687: so 'yam adya jagannāthaḥ prāpto mām iha yādavaḥ / HV_App.I,22.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:5688: amuṣya pādayoryugmam udvahāmi na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,22.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:5690: evaṃ vicintayitvā sā vavande taṃ śacīṃ tadā // HV_App.I,22.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:5691: rāmeṇa saha niścitya keśavas tu mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,22.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:5692: tatpramāthe 'karod buddhiṃ vṛṣṇibhiḥ praṇidhāya ca // HV_App.I,22.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:5693: kṛtvā tu devakāryāṇi niṣkrāmantīṃ surālayāt // HV_App.I,22.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:5694: unmathya sahasā kṛṣṇaḥ svaṃ nināya rathottamam // HV_App.I,22.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:5696: samanahyanta dāśārhās tad ājñāya tu sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,22.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:5698: vājibhir vāraṇaiś caiva parivavrur halāyudham // HV_App.I,22.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:5699: ādāya rukmiṇīṃ kṛṣṇo jagāmāśu puraṃ prati / HV_App.I,22.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:5700: rāme tv āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yuyudhāne ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,22.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:5701: akrūre vipṛthau caiva gade ca kṛtavarmaṇi / HV_App.I,22.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:5702: vasudeve sudeve ca sāraṇe ca mahābale // HV_App.I,22.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:5704: ugrasenātmaje kahve śatadyumne ca keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,22.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:5705: rājādhideve mṛdare prasene citrake tathā / HV_App.I,22.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:5706: agnidatte bṛhaddurge śvaphalke satyake pṛthau // HV_App.I,22.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:5708: gurum āsajya taṃ bhāraṃ yayau dvāravatīṃ prati // HV_App.I,22.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:5709: te cāpi yādavāḥ sarve yuddhāya samupasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,22.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:5718: balabhadrahatāḥ śiṣṭāḥ puruṣās tatra rakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5719: nyavedayanta tad vṛttaṃ jarāsaṃdhāya mānada // HV_App.I,22A.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5720: rukmiṇe bhīṣmakāyāpi pauṇḍrāya ca mahātmane / HV_App.I,22A.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:5721: dantavaktrāya śūrāya caidyāya ca sumedhase // HV_App.I,22A.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:5723: anyebhyaś cāpi rājabhyaḥ praśaśaṃsur yathātatham // HV_App.I,22A.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5724: śrutyaivaṃ tan nṛpabalaṃ vivāhārthaṃ samāgatam / HV_App.I,22A.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:5725: kṣubdhaṃ narāvarānīkaṃ śirasi prahṛtaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,22A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5726: cacāla rājakaḥ sarvas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:5727: aho vīryam aho dhairyaṃ kṛṣṇasyākliṣṭakarmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:5728: hatā vayaṃ nirānandā avajñātāś ca savaśaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:5729: ity ūcus te nṛpatayo māgadhapramukhās tadā // HV_App.I,22A.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:5731: uvāca rājñas tān sarvān māgadhaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:5732: niṣpīḍya caraṇau rājā dantān kaṭakaṭāpayan // HV_App.I,22A.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:5733: śrūyatāṃ mama vākyāni rājānaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,22A.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:5734: eṣa gopakadāyādo yat karoti mamāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,22A.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:5735: tasyādya phalabhākso æstu yadi jīvāmi bhūmipāḥ // HV_App.I,22A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:5736: eṣo æhaṃ sagaṇaṃ hatvā gopālaṃ nṛpasaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,22A.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:5737: dvārakāṃ yādavapurīṃ bhaṅktvānīya ca rukmiṇīm // HV_App.I,22A.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:5738: dāsyāmi nṛpatiśreṣṭhāḥ kiṃ tiṣṭhatha vilambatha / HV_App.I,22A.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:5739: saṃnahyantāṃ rathaśreṣṭhā ratha āyātu me tvarāt // HV_App.I,22A.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5740: ityuktvā sa jarāsaṃdhaḥ siṃhanādam athākarot / HV_App.I,22A.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:5741: cacāla ca balaṃ sarvaṃ jarāsaṃdhapriye sthitam // HV_App.I,22A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5743: āhatya tu sabhāstambhaṃ jarāsaṃdham abhāṣata // HV_App.I,22A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:5744: sthātavyaṃ bhavatā rājan sthite mayi narādhipa / HV_App.I,22A.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:5745: bhṛtyo æsmi tava rājendra kim etat sāhasaṃ tava // HV_App.I,22A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:5746: sthite bhṛtye kathaṃ svāmī kāryaṃ kuryād vicakṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:5749: aham ekaḥ sa evaikaḥ kṛṣṇo gopakakilbiṣaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:5750: hatvā taṃ gopakaṃ yuddhe balabhadrasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,22A.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:5751: aṅgāni ca mahārāja cūrṇayitvā gadābhṛtam / HV_App.I,22A.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:5752: vṛkebhyo hi prayacchāmi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,22A.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:5753: aham eva bhaviṣyāmi vāsudevo mahītale / HV_App.I,22A.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:5754: hate tasmiñ jarāsaṃdha gopake mama nāmake // HV_App.I,22A.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:5755: ity uktvā dhanur ādāya jagarja nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,22A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5756: caidyo æpy atha mahārāja sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,22A.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:5758: ādāya parighaṃ ghoram idam āha nṛpottamān // HV_App.I,22A.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:5759: anenaiva tu rājāno yādavān sabalān yudhi / HV_App.I,22A.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:5760: hatvā tu yamarājāya dāsyāmi nṛpapuṃgavāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:5761: tiṣṭhadhvam iha rājāno mamaivāyaṃ parābhavaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:5764: tat tu yuktaṃ yadukule kṣatriyā na hi te vibho / HV_App.I,22A.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:5765: viśeṣato ætha gopāle ballaveṣu vivardhite // HV_App.I,22A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:5766: gavāṃ vṛttiṃ tu gopālā vartayanti sadā tathā / HV_App.I,22A.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:5767: kṛṣṇo æpi gokule vṛddho gopaiḥ sahacaraḥ kila // HV_App.I,22A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:5768: paradārābhiyukto hi keśavaḥ satataṃ vibho / HV_App.I,22A.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:5769: sarvathā taṃ durātmānaṃ haniṣye sagaṇaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,22A.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:5770: tāṃ cānayāmi rājānas tiṣṭhadhvam iha bhūmipāḥ // HV_App.I,22A.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:5771: kva nu te bāndhavās teṣāṃ yānāśritya tu yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:5772: avajñāṃ kṛtavanto no yuṣmābhir iha cintyatām // HV_App.I,22A.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:5773: ity uktvātha sa caidyas tu yuddhāya samupasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:5774: te ca sarve nṛpatayaḥ kruddhā yuddhāya daṃśitāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:5776: jarāsaṃdho ætha nṛpatī ratham āruhya daṃśitaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:5777: yuddhāya vai mahārāja mano dadhre mahīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:5778: pauṇḍro æpy atha mahārāja vāsudevo mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:5779: ratham āruhya sahasā yuddhāyaiva mano dadhe // HV_App.I,22A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:5780: dantavaktro jarāsaṃdhaḥ śiśupālaś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:5781: saṃnaddhā niryayuḥ kruddhā jighāṃsanto janārdanam // HV_App.I,22A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:5783: niryayau cedirājaś ca bhrātṛbhiḥ saha bandhubhiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:5784: kva vāsudevaḥ kva ca gopakas tathā @ HV_App.I,22A.65 @
GE07hv_apppu:5787: kuto nu vīro yudhi sātyakiḥ kila || HV_App.I,22A.68 ||
GE07hv_apppu:5790: śaraiś ca khaḍgair yudhi pātayanto @ HV_App.I,22A.71 @
GE07hv_apppu:5794: atha sainye mahārāja māgadhasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:5796: mādhavo 'pi mahārāja śaṅkhaṃ dadhmau pṛthak tadā // HV_App.I,22A.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:5797: bherīṇāṃ ca mṛdaṅgānāṃ jharjharīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:5798: nādāḥ samabhavaṃs tatra yadūnāṃ sainyasaṃcaye // HV_App.I,22A.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:5799: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavat senayor ubhayos tadā / HV_App.I,22A.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:5801: tān pratyagṛhṇāt saṃrabdhān vṛṣṇivīrān mahārathān / HV_App.I,22A.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:5803: taṃ pratyagṛhṇan saṃrabdhā vṛṣṇivīrā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:5804: saṃkarṣaṇaṃ puraskṛtya vāsavaṃ tv amarā iva // HV_App.I,22A.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:5805: āpatantaṃ hi vegena jarāsaṃdhaṃ mahābalam / HV_App.I,22A.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:5806: ṣaḍbhir vivyādha nārācair yuyudhāno mahāmṛdhe // HV_App.I,22A.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:5807: akrūro dantavaktraṃ tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:5808: taṃ pratyavidhyat kārūṣo bāṇair daśabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:5809: vipṛthuḥ śiśupālaṃ tu śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:5810: aṣṭabhiḥ pratyavidhyat taṃ śiśupālaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,22A.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:5811: gaveṣaṇo 'pi caidyaṃ tu ṣaḍbhir vivyādha mārgaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:5812: anirdāntas tathāṣṭābhir bṛhaddurgas tu pañcabhiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:5813: prativivyādha tāṃścaidyaḥ pañcabhiḥ pañcabhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:5814: jaghāna cāśvāṃś caturaś caturbhir vipṛthoḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:5815: bṛhaddurgasya bhallena śiraś ciccheda cārihā / HV_App.I,22A.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:5816: vipṛthoḥ sārathiṃ caiva prāhiṇod yamasādanam // HV_App.I,22A.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:5817: hatāśvaṃ tu rathaṃ tyaktvā vipṛthuḥ sumahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:5818: āruroha rathaṃ tūrṇaṃ bṛhaddurgasya vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:5819: āruhya javanān aśvān niyantum upacakrame // HV_App.I,22A.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:5820: te kruddhāḥ śaravarṣeṇa sunīthaṃ samavākiran / HV_App.I,22A.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:5823: paṭuśaḥ pañcabhiś cāpi vivyādha yudhi mārgaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:5824: tābhyāṃ sa viddho daśabhir bāṇair marmātigaiḥ śitaiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:5825: tato balī śakradevaṃ bibheda daśabhiḥ krudhā // HV_App.I,22A.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:5826: pañcabhiś cāpi vivyādha so 'vidūrād vidūratham // HV_App.I,22A.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:5827: vidūratho 'pi taṃ ṣaḍbhir vivyādhājau śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:5828: triṃśatā pratyavidhyat taṃ balī bāṇair mahāratham / HV_App.I,22A.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:5829: kṛtavarmā bibhedāśu rājaputraṃ tribhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:5830: nyahanat sārathiṃ cāsya dhvajaṃ ciccheda sūcchritam / HV_App.I,22A.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:5831: prativivyādha taṃ kruddhaḥ pauṇḍraḥ ṣaḍbhiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:5832: dhanuś cāsya praciccheda bhallena nataparvaṇā / HV_App.I,22A.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:5833: nikṛttaśatruḥ kāliṅgaṃ bibhedāṅgaṃ ca mārgaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:5834: tomareṇāṃ sadeśe taṃ bibheda ca kaliṅgajaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:5835: gajenāsādya kahvas tu gajam aṅgasya vīryavān // HV_App.I,22A.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:5836: tomareṇa jaghānāśu bibhedāṅgaṃ ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:5837: citrakaś ca śvaphalkaś ca sātyakiś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:5838: kaliṅgasya rathānīkaṃ nārācair bibhiduḥ śitaiḥ // HV_App.I,22A.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:5840: jaghāna rāmaḥ saṃkruddho vaṅgarājaṃ ca saṃyuge // HV_App.I,22A.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:5841: taṃ hatvā gajam āruhya dhanur ādāya vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:5842: saṃkarṣaṇo jaghānograir nārācaiḥ kāśikān bahūn // HV_App.I,22A.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:5843: ṣaḍbhir nihatya kārūṣān maheṣvāsāṃś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,22A.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:5844: śataṃ jaghāna saṃrabdho māgadhānāṃ mahārathaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:5845: nihatya tān mahārāja jarāsaṃdhaṃ tato 'bhyayāt // HV_App.I,22A.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:5846: tam āpanantaṃ vivyādha nārācair māgadhas tribhiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:5848: taṃ bibhedāṣṭabhiḥ kruddho nārācair musalāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:5849: ciccheda cāsya bhallena dhvajaṃ rukmavibhūṣitam / HV_App.I,22A.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:5850: cāpaṃ ca mahādāyattaṃ śarair eva halāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:5851: rathaṃ cāsya mahārāja tilaśaś ca samāhanat // HV_App.I,22A.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:5852: sa cchinnadhanvā viratho gadāmādāya māgadhaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:5853: vivyādha balabhadraṃ tu ciccheda ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:5854: rathaṃ ca cūrṇayām āsa gadayāsya sa māgadhaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:5855: pātyamāno rathāt tasmād avaplutya halāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:5856: sātyakes tu rathaṃ prāyāt sarvakṣatrasya paṣyataḥ / HV_App.I,22A.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:5857: sātyakis tu mahārāja śarair vivyādha māgadham // HV_App.I,22A.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:5858: baladevo mahārāja gadāṃ saṃgṛhya satvaram / HV_App.I,22A.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:5859: jaghāna māgadhaṃ saṃkhye vajreṇeva giriṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,22A.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:5860: tad yuddham abhavat teṣāṃ ghoraṃ devāsuropamam / HV_App.I,22A.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:5862: gajair gajāś ca saṃkruddhāḥ saṃnipetuḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:5863: rathā rathais tu saṃrabdhāḥ sādibhiś cāpi sādinaḥ // HV_App.I,22A.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:5865: chindantaś cottamāṅgāni vinedur yudhi te pṛthak // HV_App.I,22A.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:5867: śarāṇāṃ patatām ājau pakṣiṇām iva śuśruve // HV_App.I,22A.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:5868: bherīśaṅkhamṛdaṅgānāṃ veṇunāṃ ca mṛdhe dhvaniḥ / HV_App.I,22A.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:5869: babhūva ghoṣaḥ śastrāṇāṃ jyāghoṣaś ca mahātmanām // HV_App.I,22A.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:5870: etasminn antare vīro balabhadro mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,22A.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:5871: jaghāna gadayā vīraṃ jarāsaṃdhaṃ mahāmṛdhe / HV_App.I,22A.149 /
GE07hv_apppu:5872: mūrchāṃ jagāma rājā tu nipapāta ca bhūtale // HV_App.I,22A.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:5873: sātyakir vaṅgarājaṃ tu jaghāna niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,22A.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:5874: tat sainyaṃ vimukhaṃ cāsīj jarāsaṃdhe nipātite // HV_App.I,22A.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:5875: sātyakir balabhadraś ca jitvā yodhān sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:5876: śaṅkhaṃ dadhmatū rājānau sarveṣām agrataḥ sthitau / HV_App.I,22A.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:5877: tataś ca vidrute sainye jarāsaṃdhe parājite // HV_App.I,22A.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:5878: tayoḥ śaṅkhasvanaṃ śrutvā gacchann eva janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,22A.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:5880: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,22A.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:5889: alaṃ kurvantu rathyāś ca patākāś caiva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,23.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5891: sūtāś ca māgadhāś caiva bandinaś ca tathāpare // HV_App.I,23.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:5892: kalaśāś ca prapūryantāṃ sumudrair api vāribhiḥ / HV_App.I,23.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:5893: ucchrīyantāṃ dhvajāḥ sarve āneyā vārayoṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,23.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:5894: purohitāś ca hūyantāṃ kumārāś caiva sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,23.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:5895: āhanyantāṃ mahābheryo mṛdaṅgāḥ sarvataḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,23.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5896: nṛtyantāṃ nartakāḥ sarve gāyantāṃ gāyakās tathā / HV_App.I,23.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:5897: bhojyantāṃ brāhmaṇāḥ sarve dīyantāṃ ca dhanāni ca // HV_App.I,23.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:5898: alaṃ kriyantāṃ sarvatra prāsādāḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,23.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:5900: te ca sarve yathājñaptaṃ cakruś caiva sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,23.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:5901: kvacic ca susvaraṃ geyaṃ gāyakāś cakrire tadā / HV_App.I,23.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:5902: kvacid bheryaḥ samāghnātā mahāghoṣaṃ prapūrire / HV_App.I,23.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:5903: rodasī pūrayāmāsuḥ pātālaṃ ca prapūritam // HV_App.I,23.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:5904: kvacic chaṅkhā mahārāja vyādhmātā yādaveśvaraiḥ / HV_App.I,23.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:5905: pṛthivīṃ kampayanto vai samudrān abhyavardhayan // HV_App.I,23.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:5906: kvacid gajā hayāś caiva heṣāṃ cakrur mahotsave / HV_App.I,23.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:5908: adhyakṣaḥ sātyakiś cāsīt keśave hy utsavonmukhe / HV_App.I,23.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:5909: itaś cetaś ca saṃyāti niyuṅkte tatra tatra ha // HV_App.I,23.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5910: yasya yasya ca yatkāryaṃ taṃ taṃ tatra niyuktavāṇ // HV_App.I,23.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:5911: baladevo æpi dharmātmā rājabhiḥ sārdham acyutaḥ / HV_App.I,23.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:5912: yathārhaṃ tu yathāyogaṃ saṃmānaṃ samyojayat // HV_App.I,23.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:5913: evaṃ kolāhale tasmin keśavaḥ paravīrahā / HV_App.I,23.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:5914: brāhmaṇāṃś ca mahārāja nānādigbhyaḥ samāgatān // HV_App.I,23.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:5916: namaskṛtya hṛṣīkeśo vivāhāya mano dadhe // HV_App.I,23.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:5917: anujñātaś ca tai rājan dhautavāsāḥ svalaṃkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,23.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:5918: rukmiṇyāḥ keśavaḥ pāṇiṃ jagrāha vidhivat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,23.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:5922: papāta puṣpavarṣaṃ ca vavau vāyuḥ sukhaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,23.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:5923: brāhmaṇebhyas tadā dattvā ratnāni ca janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,23.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:5925: saṃyojya ca hṛṣīkeśo vāsāṃsi vividhāni ca // HV_App.I,23.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:5926: gajānāṃ ca śataṃ sāgraṃ sahasram ayutaṃ gavām / HV_App.I,23.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:5928: idaṃ covāca rājendra keśavaḥ paravīrahā / HV_App.I,23.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:5929: yad yac ca śobhanaṃ vastu dīyantām ratnasaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,23.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:5930: arcitāś cārthino rājan bhūyāsuś ca mahotsave // HV_App.I,23.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:5931: evam ājñāpya govindo rukmiṇyā saha yādavān / HV_App.I,23.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:5933: ugrasenaṃ ca rājendraṃ vṛddhān anyān sayādavān / HV_App.I,23.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:5934: te sarve cakrur aśrūṇi harṣajāni yadūttamāḥ // HV_App.I,23.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:5935: nirvṛtte tu tadā rājan vivāhe keśavasya ha / HV_App.I,23.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:5936: ye ye samāgatās tatra nṛpā viprāḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,23.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:5937: anubhūya vivāhaṃ tu jagmuḥ sarve yathāgatam // HV_App.I,23.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:5938: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 24, transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March 5, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:5939: [k: K Ñ2.3 V2 B Dn D1-5 S (T3 missing) ins. after adhy. 99, V1.3 Ds D6 after adhy. 89 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5941: atrāścaryādbhutaṃ mantram āhnikaṃ japatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,24.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5943: pradyumne dvārakāṃ prāpte hatvā taṃ kālaśambaram / **HV_App.I,24.1**1:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:5945: yaṃ japtvā tu nṛpaśreṣṭha sāyaṃ prātaḥ śubhaṃ labhet // HV_App.I,24.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:5947: dharmakāmaiś ca munibhir ṛṣibhiś cāpi kīrtitam // HV_App.I,24.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:5949: mahadbhir munibhiś caiva ṛṣibhiś cāpi kīrtitam / **HV_App.I,24.4**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5955: kiṃcit stotraṃ mama brūhi yaj japtvā nirbhayo 'bhavam / **HV_App.I,24.4**3:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:5956: surāsuragurur brahmā pātu māṃ jagatīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,24.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:5958: ṛco yajūṃṣi sāmāni cchandāṃsy ātharvaṇāni ca / HV_App.I,24.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:5959: catvāraḥ sakalā vedāḥ saharasyāḥ savistarāḥ // HV_App.I,24.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:5960: purāṇam itihāsaṃ ca khilāny upakhilāni ca / HV_App.I,24.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:5961: aṅgāny upāṅgāni tathā savyākhyānāni pāntu mām // HV_App.I,24.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:5962: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam / HV_App.I,24.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:5963: indriyāṇi mano buddhis tathā sattvaṃ rajas tamaḥ // HV_App.I,24.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:5964: vyānodānaḥ samānaś ca prāṇo 'pānaś ca pañcamaḥ / HV_App.I,24.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:5965: vāyavaḥ sapta caivānye yeṣv āyattam idaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,24.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:5967: āvāhaḥ pravahaś caiva udvahaḥ saṃvahas tathā / **HV_App.I,24.14**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5969: [k: the first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5970: marīcir aṅgirāś cātriḥ pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ / HV_App.I,24.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:5971: bhṛgur vasiṣṭho bhagavān pāntu te māṃ maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,24.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:5972: kaśyapādyāś ca munayaś caturdaśa diśo daśa / HV_App.I,24.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:5973: naranārāyaṇau devau sagaṇau pāntu māṃ sadā // HV_App.I,24.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:5974: rudrāś caikādaśa proktā ādityā dvādaśaiva tu // HV_App.I,24.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:5975: aṣṭau ca vasavo devā aśvinau dvau prakīrtitau // HV_App.I,24.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:5976: hrīḥ śrīr lakṣmīḥ svadhā medhā tuṣṭiḥ puṣṭiḥ smṛtir dhṛtiḥ / HV_App.I,24.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:5977: aditir ditir danuś caiva siṃhikā daityamātaraḥ // HV_App.I,24.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:5978: [k: the first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many :k]
GE07hv_apppu:5979: himavān hemakūṭaś ca niṣadhaḥ śvetaparvataḥ / HV_App.I,24.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:5980: ṛṣabhaḥ pāriyātraś ca vindhyo vaidūryaparvataḥ // HV_App.I,24.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:5983: śeṣaś ca vāsukiś caiva viśālākṣaś ca takṣakaḥ / HV_App.I,24.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:5986: tathā pūraṇakaś caiva nāgaś ca karavīrakaḥ // HV_App.I,24.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:5988: maṇināgaś ca bhagavāṃs triṣu lokeṣu viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,24.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:5989: nāgarāḍ dadhikarṇaś ca tathā hāridrako 'paraḥ / HV_App.I,24.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:5990: ete cānye ca bahavo ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ // HV_App.I,24.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:5991: bhūdharāḥ satyadharmāṇaḥ pāntu māṃ bhujageśvarāḥ / HV_App.I,24.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:5992: samudrāḥ pāntu catvāro gaṅgā ca saritāṃ varā // HV_App.I,24.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:5993: sarasvatī candrabhāgā śatadrur devikā śubhā / HV_App.I,24.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:5994: irāvatī vipāśā ca śarayūr yamunā tathā // HV_App.I,24.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:5996: kauśikī devikā caiva puṇyā divyā dṛṣadvatī / **HV_App.I,24.38**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:5997: kulmāṣī rathavāmā ca bāhudā ca hiraṇyadā / HV_App.I,24.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:5998: plakṣā cekṣumatī caiva tāpanī ca bṛhadrathā / HV_App.I,24.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:5999: khyātā carmaṇvatī caiva puṇyā caiva vadhūsarā // HV_App.I,24.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6000: etāś cānyāś ca sarito yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:6002: veṇṇā godāvarī sītā kāverī kāñcanāvatī // HV_App.I,24.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6005: nadī vaitaraṇī puṇyā vidarbhā narmadā śubhā / HV_App.I,24.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:6006: vitastā vai bhīmarathī elā caiva mahānadī / HV_App.I,24.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:6007: kālindī gomatī puṇyā nadaḥ śoṇaś ca viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,24.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:6008: etāś cānyāś ca vai nadyo yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:6010: siprā carmaṇvatī puṇyā mahī sābhramatī tathā / HV_App.I,24.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:6011: sindhur vetravatī caiva bhojā ca vanamālikā // HV_App.I,24.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:6013: khyātā vetravatī caiva cāpadāsīti viśrutā // HV_App.I,24.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:6014: prasthāvatī puṇyanadī nadī puṇyā sarasvatī / HV_App.I,24.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:6015: mitraghnī cendumālā ca tathā madhumatī nadī // HV_App.I,24.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:6016: umā gurunadī caiva tāpī ca vimalodakā / HV_App.I,24.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:6017: vimalā vimalodā ca mattagaṅgā payasvinī // HV_App.I,24.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:6018: etāś cānyāś ca vai nadyo yāś cānyā nānukīrtitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:6019: tā māṃ samabhiṣiñcantu paścimām āśritā diśam // HV_App.I,24.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:6020: [k: Ñ2 V1 B1.2 D2.3 T1 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6022: sā tu dahatu me pāpaṃ kīrtitā śaṃbhunā dhṛtā / **HV_App.I,24.61**6:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6023: prabhāsaṃ ca prayāgaṃ ca naimiṣaṃ puṣkarāṇi ca / HV_App.I,24.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:6025: rāmahradam vinaśanaṃ rāmatīrthaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,24.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:6026: gaṅgādvāraṃ kanakhalaṃ somo vai yatra cotthitaḥ // HV_App.I,24.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:6027: kapālamocanaṃ tīrthaṃ jambūmārgaṃ ca viśrutam / HV_App.I,24.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:6031: vikhyātaṃ phālgunītīrthaṃ tīrthaṃ bhadravaṭaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,24.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:6032: kokāmukhaṃ puṇyanadaṃ gaṅgāsāgaram eva ca / HV_App.I,24.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:6033: magadheṣu tapodaś ca gaṅgodbhedaś ca viśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,24.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6035: tīrthāny etāni puṇyāni sevitāni maharṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,24.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:6036: māṃ pāvayantu salilaiḥ kīrtitākīrtitāni ca // HV_App.I,24.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:6037: [k: Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. after line 73, Dn1 after line 74:k]
GE07hv_apppu:6038: sūkaraṃ yogamārgaṃ ca śvetadvīpaṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,24.73**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6042: taṃ śāpamocanaṃ tīrthaṃ punantv etāni kilbiṣāt / **HV_App.I,24.73**8:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:6043: dharmārthakāmavidhayo yaśaḥ prāptiḥ śamo damaḥ / HV_App.I,24.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:6044: varuṇo 'ṃśo 'tha dhanado yamo niyama eva ca // HV_App.I,24.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6045: kālo nayaḥ saṃnatiś ca krodho mohaḥ kṣamā dhṛtiḥ / HV_App.I,24.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:6047: yakṣāḥ piśācā gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāḥ siddhacāraṇāḥ / HV_App.I,24.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:6049: lambodarāś ca balinaḥ piṅgākṣā viśvarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,24.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:6051: nakṣatrāṇi grahāś caiva ṛtavaḥ śiśirādayaḥ / HV_App.I,24.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:6053: āmodaś ca pramodaś ca praharṣaḥ śoka eva ca / HV_App.I,24.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:6054: manyus tamas tapaḥ satyaṃ siddhir vṛddhiḥ śrutir dhṛtiḥ // HV_App.I,24.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:6055: rudrāṇī bhadrakālī ca bhadraṣaṣṭhā ca vāruṇī / HV_App.I,24.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:6056: bhāsī ca kālikā caiva śāṇḍilī ceti viśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,24.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:6057: āryā kuhūḥ sinīvālī bhīmā citravatī ratiḥ / HV_App.I,24.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:6058: ekānaṃśā ca kūṣmāṇḍī devī kātyāyanī ca yā // HV_App.I,24.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:6059: lohityāyanamātā ca devakanyāś ca yāḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,24.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:6060: gonandā devapatnī ca māṃ rakṣantu sabāndhavam // HV_App.I,24.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6069: mattonmattapramattāś ca praharantyaś ca dhiṣṭhitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:6070: piṅgākṣyaḥ piṅgakeśyaś ca tato 'nyā lūnamūrdhajāḥ // HV_App.I,24.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:6071: ūrdhvakeśyaḥ kṛṣṇakeśyaḥ śvetakeśyas tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,24.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:6075: mukhamaṇḍī biḍālī ca pūtanā gandhapūtanā / HV_App.I,24.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:6079: naktaṃcarāḥ sukhodarkāḥ sadā parvaṇi dāruṇāḥ / HV_App.I,24.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:6080: mātaro mātṛvat putraṃ rakṣantu mama nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,24.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:6082: kumāraskandajāś caiva jvarā vai vaiṣṇavādayaḥ // HV_App.I,24.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:6095: vāmanā vikaṭāḥ kubjāḥ karālā lūnamūrdhajāḥ / HV_App.I,24.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:6099: ekapādā dvipādāś ca tathā dviśiraso 'pare / HV_App.I,24.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:6100: nirmāṃsās tālajaṅghāś ca vyāditāsyā bhayaṃkarāḥ // HV_App.I,24.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:6103: ete grahāś ca satataṃ rakṣantu mama sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,24.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:6105: māheśvaro vaiṣṇavaś ca jvarau lokabhayāvahau // HV_App.I,24.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:6106: grāmaṇīś caiva gopālo bhṛṅgarīṭir gaṇeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,24.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:6107: devaś ca vāmadevaś ca ghaṇṭākarṇaḥ karaṃdhamaḥ // HV_App.I,24.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:6108: śvetamodaḥ kapālī ca jambhakaḥ śatrutāpanaḥ / HV_App.I,24.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:6110: nijaghāso ghasaś caiva sthūṇākarṇaḥ praśoṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,24.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:6113: kūṣmāṇḍaḥ kumbhamūrdhā ca rocano vaikṛto grahaḥ // HV_App.I,24.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:6114: aniketaḥ surārighnaḥ śivaś cāśiva eva ca / HV_App.I,24.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:6115: kṣemakaḥ piśitāśī ca surārir harilocanaḥ // HV_App.I,24.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:6121: pārvatyā roṣasaṃbhūtāḥ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca // HV_App.I,24.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:6124: rātrāvahani durgeṣu kīrtitāḥ sakalair guṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,24.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:6125: teṣāṃ gaṇānāṃ patayaḥ sagaṇāḥ pāntu māṃ sadā // HV_App.I,24.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:6126: nāradaḥ parvataś caiva gandharvāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,24.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:6127: pitaraḥ kāraṇaṃ kāryam ādhayo vyādhayas tathā // HV_App.I,24.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:6128: agastyo gālavo gārgyaḥ śaktidhaumyaḥ parāśaraḥ / HV_App.I,24.160 /
GE07hv_apppu:6129: kṛṣṇātreyaś ca bhagavān asito devalo 'malaḥ // HV_App.I,24.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:6130: bṛhaspatir utathyaś ca mārkaṇḍeyaḥ śrutaśravāḥ / HV_App.I,24.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:6131: dvaipāyano vidarbhaś ca jaiminir māṭharaḥ kaṭhaḥ // HV_App.I,24.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:6132: viśvāmitro vasiṣṭhaś ca lomaśaś ca mahān ṛṣiḥ / HV_App.I,24.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:6133: uttaṅkaś caiva raibhyaś ca paulomaś ca dvitas tritaḥ // HV_App.I,24.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:6134: ṛṣir vaikālavṛkṣīyo munir medhātithis tathā / HV_App.I,24.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:6135: sārasvato yavakrītaḥ kuśiko gautamas tathā // HV_App.I,24.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:6136: [k: T4 M1-3 ins. after line 167, K2 after line 166 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6138: saṃvarto ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca svastyātreyo vibhāṇḍakaḥ / HV_App.I,24.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:6139: ṛcīko jamadagniś ca tathaurvas tapasāṃ nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,24.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:6140: bharadvājaḥ sthūlaśirāḥ kaśyapaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ / HV_App.I,24.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:6141: bṛhadagnir hariśmaśrur vijayaḥ kaṇva eva ca // HV_App.I,24.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:6142: [k: G5 ins. after line 171, T1.2 G1.3 after the repetition of line 165:k]
GE07hv_apppu:6144: vaitaṇḍī dīrghatapāś caiva vedaś cāthāṃśumāñ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,24.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:6145: [k: The first Pāda of this line has one syllable too many. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6148: aṣṭāvakro dadhītiś ca śvetaketus tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,24.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:6149: uddālakaḥ kṣārapāṇiḥ śṛṅgī gauramukhas tathā / HV_App.I,24.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:6150: agniveśyaḥ śamīkaś ca pramucur mumucus tathā // HV_App.I,24.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:6151: ete cānye ca bahavo ṛṣayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,24.176 /
GE07hv_apppu:6152: munayaḥ saṃśitātmāno ye cānye nānukīrtitāḥ / HV_App.I,24.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:6153: ṛjavaḥ ślāghinaḥ śāntāḥ śāntiṃ kurvantu me sadā // HV_App.I,24.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:6154: trayo 'gnayas trayo vedās traividyaṃ kaustubho maṇiḥ / HV_App.I,24.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:6155: uccaiḥśravā hayaḥ śrīmān vaidyo dhanvaṃtarir hariḥ // HV_App.I,24.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:6156: amṛtaṃ gauḥ suvarṇaṃ ca dadhigaurāś ca sarṣapāḥ / HV_App.I,24.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:6157: śuklāḥ samanasaḥ kanyāḥ śvetacchatraṃ yavākṣatāḥ // HV_App.I,24.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:6158: dūrvā hiraṇyaṃ gandhāś ca vālavyajanam eva ca / HV_App.I,24.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:6159: tathāpratihataṃ cakraṃ mahokṣaś candanaṃ viṣam // HV_App.I,24.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:6160: śveto vṛṣaḥ karī mattaḥ siṃho vyāghro hayaḥ śarāḥ / HV_App.I,24.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:6161: pṛthivī coddhṛtā lājā brāhmaṇā madhupāyasam // HV_App.I,24.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:6162: svastiko vardhamānaś ca nandyāvartaḥ priyaṅgavaḥ / HV_App.I,24.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:6163: śrīphalaṃ gomayaṃ matsyā duṃdubhiḥ paṭahasvanaḥ // HV_App.I,24.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:6164: ṛṣipatnyaś ca kanyāś ca śrīmad bhadrāsanaṃ dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,24.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:6165: rocanā rucakaś caiva nadīnāṃ saṃgamodakam // HV_App.I,24.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:6166: suparṇāḥ śatapatrāś ca cakorā jīvajīvakāḥ / HV_App.I,24.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:6169: puṇyaṃ vai vigatakleśaṃ śrīmad vai maṅgalānvitam / HV_App.I,24.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:6171: yaś cedaṃ śrāvayed vidvān yaś caivaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ / HV_App.I,24.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:6172: maṅgalāṣṭaśataṃ snāto japet parvaṇi parvaṇi // HV_App.I,24.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:6174: na ca prāpnoti vaikalyaṃ paratreha ca nandati // HV_App.I,24.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:6175: dhanyaṃ yaśasyām āyuṣyaṃ pavitraṃ vedasaṃmitam // HV_App.I,24.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:6176: śrīmat svargyaṃ sadā puṇyam apatyajananaṃ śivam // HV_App.I,24.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:6177: śubhaṃ kṣemakaraṃ nṝṇāṃ medhājananam uttamam / HV_App.I,24.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:6179: śraddadhāno dayābhūtaḥ prapaṭhed ātmavān naraḥ / HV_App.I,24.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:6180: sarvapāpaviśuddhātmā gatiṃ ca labhate parām // HV_App.I,24.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:6182: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 25 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of March 5, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:6185: sa jātu vismayaṃ kurvan diśāṃ dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,25.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6187: devalokaṃ jagāmāśu kurvan siṃhadhvaniṃ muhuḥ // HV_App.I,25.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:6188: indrasya sadanaṃ gatvā kavāṭaṃ ghaṭṭayan danuḥ / HV_App.I,25.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:6189: yudhyatām iti hovāca jayo vā pratidīyatām // HV_App.I,25.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:6190: tac chrutvā devarājo 'pi devaiḥ sarvaiḥ samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,25.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:6191: airāvataṃ samāruhya devasainyaiś ca pālitaḥ // HV_App.I,25.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6193: nirjagāma purāt tasmād dānavānāṃ samīpataḥ / HV_App.I,25.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:6194: airāvataṃ samāsthāya tasthau tatra śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,25.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:6195: tato yuddhaṃ samabhavad dānavānāṃ durātmanām / HV_App.I,25.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:6196: devaiḥ śakrasahāyaiś ca nighnatām itaretaram // HV_App.I,25.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:6197: devāḥ śaraiḥ samājaghnur dānavān nagasaṃnibhān / HV_App.I,25.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:6198: dānavāś ca mahārāja devān indrapurogamān / HV_App.I,25.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:6199: nijaghnuḥ samare tatra khaṅgaiḥ prāsaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,25.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:6200: siṃhanādaṃ mahac cakrur daityā yudhi mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,25.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:6201: devān babādhire te tu pratyakṣaṃ ca śacīpateḥ // HV_App.I,25.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6202: ārtā yuddhapariśrāntā devāgacchan diśo daśa / HV_App.I,25.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:6203: śakreṇa vāritāś cāpi sthātuṃ śaktā na devatāḥ // HV_App.I,25.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:6204: tāṃs tu vidrāvitān dṛṣṭvā vṛtrahā balasūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,25.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:6205: sthātavyam iti hovāca nirjarān sa mahāprabhuḥ // HV_App.I,25.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:6206: dhanur ādāya vidhivaj jyāghoṣaṃ samavāsṛjat / HV_App.I,25.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:6207: tataḥ śarasahasrāṇi mumoca yudhi vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,25.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:6208: lokapālās tathā rājan samājagmuḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,25.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:6209: yakṣaiś ca guhyakaiś caiva saha vaiśravaṇas tathā // HV_App.I,25.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:6210: varuṇo yādasāṃ rājā vāruṇaiś ca samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,25.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:6211: nāgaiś ca śatasāhasrair anuyāto digīśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,25.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6213: yayau yoddhuṃ mahārāja narakaṃ dānavottamam // HV_App.I,25.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:6214: taiḥ sārdhaṃ devarājo 'pi yuddhaṃ cakre mahāmatiḥ / HV_App.I,25.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:6215: narako 'pi mahārāja yuddhaṃ cakre sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,25.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:6216: hayagrīvo nisumbhaś ca muraś ca ripumardanaḥ / HV_App.I,25.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:6217: cakrur yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ narakeṇa saha prabho // HV_App.I,25.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6218: lokapālā mahārāja saṃsaktā yoddhum īhate // HV_App.I,25.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:6220: cakre yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ yathā vṛtravadhe purā // HV_App.I,25.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:6221: nisumbho daṇḍahastena yamena saha saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,25.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:6222: muro 'pi rājan vikrānto rājarājena saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,25.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:6224: te ca devā mahārāja dānavaiḥ saha saṃgatāḥ // HV_App.I,25.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6225: te devā dānavāś caiva parasparajayaiṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,25.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:6227: hayagrīvaṃ mahārāja varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ / HV_App.I,25.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:6228: jaghāna niśitair bāṇair marmabhedibhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,25.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:6230: paraḥśataiḥ śarāṇāṃ tu vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,25.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:6231: śarāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi tatra devapatī raṇe / HV_App.I,25.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:6232: mumoca yudhi pāśeśas tam asyantaṃ śitāñ śarān // HV_App.I,25.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:6233: punaḥ kruddho mahārāja dānavo nagasaṃnibhaḥ / HV_App.I,25.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:6234: varuṇasya mahaccāpaṃ muṣṭideśe babhañja ha / HV_App.I,25.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:6236: visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ pāśam ādāya pāśabhṛt / HV_App.I,25.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:6237: samājaghne sa pāśena hayagrīvaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,25.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:6238: tam āpatantaṃ vegena pāśaṃ jagrāha dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,25.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:6239: tenaiva taṃ samājaghne varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim / HV_App.I,25.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:6240: sa tu pāśo 'tra nirvīryaḥ svāminaṃ na babādha ha // HV_App.I,25.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:6241: tataḥ kruddho hayagrīvo varuṇaṃ yādasāṃ patim / HV_App.I,25.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:6242: jaghāna gadayā rājan mūrdhni deśe mahābalam // HV_App.I,25.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:6243: sa tenābhihato mūrdhni vamañ soṇitam ulbaṇam / HV_App.I,25.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:6245: vāruṇais taiḥ samāyuktoḥ nirjito dānavottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,25.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:6246: nisumbhaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā yamaṃ jaghne mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,25.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:6247: yamo 'pi dhanur ādāya śareṇa nataparvaṇā / HV_App.I,25.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:6248: jaghāna dānavaṃ saṃkhye paśyatas tu śacīpateḥ // HV_App.I,25.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:6249: nisumbho roṣatāmrākṣo dhanuś ciccheda tasya tat // HV_App.I,25.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:6250: utsṛjya dhanuratnaṃ ca daṇḍam udyamya dānavam / HV_App.I,25.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:6251: dhāvati sma yamo rājan hantukāmo mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,25.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:6252: utsṛjya tu mahārāja dānavo dhanur uttamam / HV_App.I,25.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:6253: ādāya niśitaṃ khaṅgaṃ prāyāt pretapatiṃ tadā // HV_App.I,25.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:6254: tayos tābhyāṃ mahāyuddham āyudhābhyāṃ tadābhavat / HV_App.I,25.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:6255: purā devāsure yuddhe balivāsavayor iva // HV_App.I,25.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6259: khaṅgena prāharat taṃ tu yamaṃ vaivasvataṃ yudhi // HV_App.I,25.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6260: saṃchinnavarmā deveśo yamo yāmyaiḥ samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,25.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:6262: jagāmāśu puraṃ yuddhād bhīto dānavasattamāt // HV_App.I,25.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:6263: rājarājas tathā sārdhaṃ guhyakair devasaṃnibhaiḥ / HV_App.I,25.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:6265: muraṃ tu mauravaiḥ sārdhaṃ samājaghne paraḥśataiḥ / HV_App.I,25.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:6268: jaghāna rājarājaṃ tu śaraiḥ suniśitair api / HV_App.I,25.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:6269: vidhvā tu rājarājaṃ taṃ guhyakāṃś ca samāhanat // HV_App.I,25.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:6270: khaḍgaiḥ pāśaiḥ samājaghne yakṣān devaripus tadā / HV_App.I,25.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:6271: yakṣāś ca guhyakāś caiva bhītā dudruvur āhavāt / HV_App.I,25.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:6273: yakṣasainyaṃ parājitya muro vaiśravaṇaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,25.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:6274: śarair āśīviṣākārair vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,25.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:6275: stanayor vakṣasi tathā cakṣuṣor netrasaṃpuṭe / HV_App.I,25.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:6276: yatheṣṭaṃ dharṣayām āsa dānavo yuddhadurmadaḥ / HV_App.I,25.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:6277: sa cāpy ārto viṣaṇṇaś ca nirjagāma raṇājirāt // HV_App.I,25.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:6278: te ca yakṣās tadā rājan guhyakāś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,25.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:6279: alakāṃ ca samājagmur bhītā yuddhaparāṅmukhāḥ // HV_App.I,25.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:6280: yamo 'tha varuṇaś caiva kuberaś ca mahāmatiḥ / HV_App.I,25.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:6281: nirjitā dānavendreṇa svaṃ svaṃ nagaram āyayuḥ // HV_App.I,25.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:6282: devāś ca nirjitāḥ sarve dānavair nagasaṃnibhaiḥ / HV_App.I,25.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:6283: diśo daśa drutāḥ sarve bhītā vṛttavilocanāḥ // HV_App.I,25.100 //
GE07hv_apppu:6286: nirjitaṃ svabalaṃ dṛṣṭvā devarājaḥ śacīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,25.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:6287: āruhyairāvataṃ nāgaṃ prāṃśuṃ śaśinibhaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,25.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:6288: māhendram atha cāpaṃ ca sajyaṃ kṛtvā sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,25.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:6289: cakre yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ narakeṇa durātmanā // HV_App.I,25.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:6290: narako 'pi mahārāja śakraṃ dṛṣṭvā śacīpatim / HV_App.I,25.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:6291: nanāda vividhaṃ nādaṃ siṃho gajapatiṃ yathā // HV_App.I,25.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:6292: āgaccheti tadovāca jyāghoṣaṃ ca cakāra saḥ / HV_App.I,25.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:6293: tayoḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ yathā vṛtravadhe purā // HV_App.I,25.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:6294: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ narako duṣṭacetanaḥ / HV_App.I,25.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:6295: ākarṇapūrṇaṃ saṃdhāya jaghne vṛtraripuṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,25.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:6296: āhatas tena devendro vihvalaḥ samapadyata / HV_App.I,25.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:6297: susrāva rudhiraṃ śakro gatasaṃjñas tadābhavat // HV_App.I,25.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:6298: samāśvastas tadā śakraḥ śarair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ / HV_App.I,25.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:6299: rathaṃ vivyādha saptatyā sārathiṃ navabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,25.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:6300: kṣurapreṇa tadā rājan dhvajaṃ ciccheda cottamam / HV_App.I,25.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:6301: sārathiṃ prāhiṇot tasya yamāya niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,25.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:6302: jaghānāśvāṃś caturbhis tu bāṇaiḥ suniśitair api / HV_App.I,25.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:6303: dhanuś ciccheda bhallena narakasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,25.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:6304: sa cchinnadhanvā viratho vibāṇo hatasārathiḥ / HV_App.I,25.119 /
GE07hv_apppu:6305: ādāya niśitaṃ khaḍgam utpapāta śacīpatim / HV_App.I,25.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:6307: vyāvidhya tu punar daityo devarājasya vakṣasi / HV_App.I,25.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:6309: visaṃjño vihvalaś caiva devarājaḥ śatakratuḥ / HV_App.I,25.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:6310: utsṛjyairāvataṃ nāgaṃ gacchati sma tadārtavat // HV_App.I,25.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:6311: nāgaṃ taṃ pothayām āsa kumbhadeśe sa dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,25.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:6312: sa ca nāgo mahārāja prādravac ca bhayāt tadā // HV_App.I,25.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:6313: jitvātha narako bhaumo vṛtrahantāram āhave / HV_App.I,25.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:6314: nanāda vividhān nādān rodasī ca vinādayan // HV_App.I,25.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:6315: nirjityākhaṇḍalaṃ śakraṃ lokāpālāṃs tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,25.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:6316: jayam āghoṣayām āsa narako dānavottamaḥ // HV_App.I,25.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:6317: amarāvatīṃ tadā daityaḥ praviśya ca mahāsuraiḥ / HV_App.I,25.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:6318: [k: the first Pada of this line has one syllable too many :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6319: urvaśīṃ ca samāhūya vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,25.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:6320: bhaja mām iha vāmoru nirjitaḥ śakra āhave / HV_App.I,25.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:6321: aham indro yamo rājā varuṇo yādasāṃ patiḥ / HV_App.I,25.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:6322: aham eva sadā bhadre rājarājo 'smi suprabhe // HV_App.I,25.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:6324: ṛṣayo yadi te rājan yakṣyanti kratubhiḥ sadā / HV_App.I,25.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:6325: tadā bhajāmi daityendra nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,25.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:6326: evam uktas tadā daityo bāḍham ity abravīd vacaḥ // HV_App.I,25.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:6327: svargaśreṇīr mahārāja pramathya ditijaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,25.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:6330: jagāma daityarājas tu yatheṣṭaṃ dānavaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,25.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:6331: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 26, transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June 9, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:6332: [k: After the addl. colophon of 91.21, D6 S (except G2) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6334: saṃprāpya mānuṣaṃ lokaṃ narako dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,26.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6335: dvāravatyāṃ jagannāthe tasmin rakṣati bhūtalam / HV_App.I,26.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6336: babādhe mānuṣān sarvān ṛṣīn viprāṃś ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,26.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:6337: rakṣaty eva jagannāthe viprān munigaṇāṃs tathā / HV_App.I,26.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:6338: bādhate sma tadā daityo viprān munigaṇāṃś ca saḥ // HV_App.I,26.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:6339: tataḥ kadācid daityendra urvaśīvacanaṃ smaran / HV_App.I,26.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:6340: badaryāṃ hi mahārāja yaṣṭuṃ munigaṇāṃs tadā / HV_App.I,26.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:6341: satreṇa śakraṃ deveśaṃ tathā devagaṇān api // HV_App.I,26.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6342: dṛṣṭvā tān munivīrāṃs tu narako dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,26.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:6343: provāca vacanaṃ kāle yaṣṭavyo 'smi munīśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,26.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:6344: asmin kāle jagannātha indro 'haṃ vibudhādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,26.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:6345: jitaḥ śakro raṇe viprā lokapālaiḥ sahāmaraiḥ / HV_App.I,26.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:6346: tata ijyo namaskāryo vandyo lokahitāya vai // HV_App.I,26.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:6347: tad etad vacanaṃ śrutvā narakasya durātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,26.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:6348: āhus te munayaḥ sarve badarīvāsatatparāḥ // HV_App.I,26.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:6349: yakṣyāmo na vayaṃ daitya dānavo 'si durātmavān / HV_App.I,26.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:6350: indraṃ devagaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ yakṣyāmo vigatajvarāḥ // HV_App.I,26.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:6351: tac chrutvā roṣatāmrākṣo dānavān idam abravīt / HV_App.I,26.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:6352: vadhyantām ṛṣayaḥ sarve bhidyantāṃ yajñabhūmayaḥ // HV_App.I,26.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:6353: na tvāṃ yakṣyāma he daitya ity ūcuḥ kila tāpasāḥ // HV_App.I,26.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:6354: te ca sarvaṃ tathā cakrur dānavā duṣṭacetasaḥ // HV_App.I,26.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6355: yajñabhūmiṃ samāloḍya yajñabhārāṃs ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,26.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:6356: agnīn saṃmiśrayām āsur dadahur darbhapuñjakān // HV_App.I,26.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:6357: kamaṇḍalūn dvidhākṛtya jaṭā ācchidya dūrataḥ / HV_App.I,26.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:6358: prakṣipya dānavāḥ sarve narakeṇa samanvitāḥ // HV_App.I,26.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:6359: yajñavāṭaṃ samāloḍya cakrur bhasma tadā nṛpa / HV_App.I,26.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:6360: tāvat tāni havīṃṣy atra bhakṣayām āsur ojasā / HV_App.I,26.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:6362: teṣv eva cāgnimukhyeṣu dagdhvā te dānavottamāḥ // HV_App.I,26.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:6363: evaṃ te dānavāḥ sarve cakrur vighnakriyāṃ tadā / HV_App.I,26.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:6364: te ca sarve munivarāḥ palāyanti diśo daśa // HV_App.I,26.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:6365: tatra yā munikanyās tu jahāra narakas tadā / HV_App.I,26.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:6366: prāgjyotiṣaṃ jagāmāśu kanyābhis tābhir eva ca / HV_App.I,26.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:6367: yatheṣṭaṃ mumude tatra priyābhiḥ saha dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,26.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6371: tasminn evāśrame ramye mantrayitvā parasparam // HV_App.I,26.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6372: devāya lokanāthāya kṛṣṇāya ca mahātmane / HV_App.I,26.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:6373: nivedayāmaḥ pāpasya dānavasya kṛtaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,26.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6376: yadi sa pratikuryādd hi tan naḥ śreyo bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,26.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:6377: yadi jīved asau pāpo narako dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,26.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:6378: jagan na sthāsyate samyag vinaṣṭaś ca bhavej janaḥ // HV_App.I,26.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6381: gṛhītvā munayaḥ sarve śiṣyair dhamanisaṃtatāḥ // HV_App.I,26.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6382: keśavāya ca tasmai tu badarīphalasaṃhatim / HV_App.I,26.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:6384: te gatvā dūram adhvānaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ mārgam āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,26.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:6385: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca jābālir atha kāśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,26.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:6386: kaṇvo dhūmro bṛhaddurgo bharadvājaś ca gālavah / HV_App.I,26.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:6387: kavaṣo dhūmraketuś ca kāśyaḥ kāpilakas tathā // HV_App.I,26.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:6388: ete cānye ca munayo narakeṇa durātmanā / HV_App.I,26.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:6390: śiṣyaiḥ saha samāyātā ārtā dānavapāpinā / HV_App.I,26.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:6392: gaṅgāṃ ca samanuprāpya sthitās tasyās taṭe taḍā / HV_App.I,26.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:6393: tatra snātuṃ samārabdhā munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,26.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:6394: atra snātvā vayaṃ yāmo draṣṭuṃ lokahitaiṣiṇaṃ / HV_App.I,26.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:6396: iti saṃcintya munayaḥ snānaṃ cakrur yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,26.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:6397: yena yogyā munivarā draṣṭuṃ keśavam avyayam / HV_App.I,26.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:6398: tasmin gaṅgāmbhasi snātvā sarve śuddhās tapodhanāḥ // HV_App.I,26.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:6399: avatīrya tato gaṅgāṃ naubhir munivarās tadā / HV_App.I,26.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:6401: praviśya dvārakāṃ te tu vasiṣṭhādyā munīśvarāḥ / HV_App.I,26.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:6403: yā sabhā lokavikhyātā sudharmeti ca viśrutā / HV_App.I,26.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:6404: tasyā dvāraṃ samāsthāya dvāḥsthaṃ procur maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,26.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:6406: badaryāṃ vai samuṣitā munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,26.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:6407: draṣṭuṃ tvāṃ samanuprāptā pīḍitā dānavottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,26.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:6408: tac chrutvā dvārapālo 'pi keśavāya mahātmane / HV_App.I,26.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:6409: nivedayām āsa tadā yad uktaṃ munisattamaiḥ // HV_App.I,26.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6410: śrutvā tu devadeveśo munīn yaduvarārcitaḥ / HV_App.I,26.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:6411: praveśyantām iti proktāḥ pradyumnaṃ samacodayat // HV_App.I,26.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:6412: arghyaṃ pādyaṃ tadā pātram āsanāni samantataḥ / HV_App.I,26.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:6413: ānīyantāṃ yathāyogaṃ sa ca sarvaṃ cakāra ha // HV_App.I,26.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6414: te praviṣṭā munivarās tāṃ sabhāṃ sabhyapūjitām // HV_App.I,26.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:6415: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 27 transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June 9, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:6417: tāṃ sabhāṃ viviśur hṛṣṭāḥ saśiṣyā munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,27.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6418: tān dṛṣṭvā samanuprāptān keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,27.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6419: namaskṛtya munīn sarvān āsanānīty avocata // HV_App.I,27.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:6421: arghyaṃ ca tebhyaḥ pradadau pādyam ācamanaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,27.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:6422: utsṛjya gāṃ jagannātho madhuparkaṃ dadau punaḥ / HV_App.I,27.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:6423: andhakā vṛṣṇayaś caiva praṇāmaṃ cakrire munīn // HV_App.I,27.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:6424: tair apy anumatāḥ sarve yādavā munisattamaiḥ / HV_App.I,27.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:6425: svaṃ svaṃ hi bhejire te tu āsanaṃ lokaviśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,27.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:6426: [k: The counter for line 10 is wrongly printed after line 9; thus,
GE07hv_apppu:6427: the automatically inserted line counter differs from the printed one for the rest of this appendix. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6428: keśavo 'pi mahārāja svaṃ sthānaṃ samavāpa ha // HV_App.I,27.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:6431: āsīneṣu jagannātho munivīreṣu tatra ha / HV_App.I,27.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:6432: uvāca vacanaṃ kāle sopaskaram idaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,27.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:6433: kuśalaṃ sarvakāryeṣu tapaḥsu ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,27.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:6434: yuṣmadāgamanaṃ mahyaṃ prīṇāti satataṃ bhṛśam // HV_App.I,27.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:6435: yādavāś ca parāṃ prītim āsthitā munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,27.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:6436: yuṣmadāgamanād viprāḥ kim u vaktavyam atra ha // HV_App.I,27.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:6437: kulaṃ pūtaṃ sadā viprā yasmin viprāḥ samāgatāḥ / HV_App.I,27.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:6438: yuṣmadāgamanapraśno na yukto vaktum atra naḥ // HV_App.I,27.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6439: tathāpi no manāṃsīha prasahya munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,27.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:6441: tasmād viprā yathātattvaṃ vaktavyaṃ kāraṇaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,27.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6442: evaṃ pṛṣṭās tadā viprāḥ keśavena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,27.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:6443: ūcuḥ prāñjalayaḥ sarve keśavaṃ keśisūdanam // HV_App.I,27.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:6444: śṛṇu deva jagannātha kāraṇaṃ kāraṇātmaka // HV_App.I,27.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:6445: narako nāma deveśa bhaumo dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,27.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:6446: bādhate no jagannātha dānavair dānavādhamaḥ // HV_App.I,27.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:6447: jaghnus te dānavā deva hutaṃ hotavyam eva ca / HV_App.I,27.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:6448: abhakṣayanta te deva yajñabhāṇḍān sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,27.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6449: idaṃ covāca duṣṭātmā ijyo 'smīti ca mādhava / HV_App.I,27.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:6450: bibhidus te durātmāno dānavā nagayodhinaḥ / HV_App.I,27.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:6451: kamaṇḍalūñ jaṭāś caiva uṭajāni sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,27.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:6452: na kvacic charma deveśa lapsyāmo yadi jīvati // HV_App.I,27.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:6453: tasmin duṣṭe jagannātha dhig gatā nirayaṃ vayam / HV_App.I,27.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:6454: jahi taṃ devadeveśa dānavaṃ duṣṭacetasam // HV_App.I,27.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6455: rakṣa naḥ sakalān hatvā dānavān duṣṭapauruṣān // HV_App.I,27.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:6456: ṛṣipatnīḥ samānīya svapuraṃ nītavān danuḥ / HV_App.I,27.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:6457: rakṣā hi tvayi govinda sthitā nityaṃ jagatpate // HV_App.I,27.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:6458: kṣātraṃ vṛttaṃ samāsthāya dvāravatyāṃ vasan hare / HV_App.I,27.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:6459: nigṛhya duṣṭān rakṣasva sādhūn sādhupriyo hy asi / HV_App.I,27.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:6460: ārtā vayaṃ jagannātha hatās tena durātmanā // HV_App.I,27.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:6461: iyaṃ ca bhavate deva nītā hy asmābhir acyuta / HV_App.I,27.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:6462: badarīsaṃhatir deva pūrvabhuktā tvayā vibho // HV_App.I,27.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:6463: ity uktvā munayas te tu daduḥ sarvaṃ jagatpateḥ / HV_App.I,27.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:6465: yajñabhārān mahārāja darśayām āsur añjasā // HV_App.I,27.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:6466: dṛṣṭvā śrutvā ca deveśo roṣatāmrākulekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,27.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:6467: kaṣṭaṃ kaṣṭaṃ mahaj jātam ṛṣīṇāṃ bhāvitātmanām / HV_App.I,27.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:6468: iti matvā jagannātho nottaraṃ pratyapadyata // HV_App.I,27.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:6469: cintāviṣṭe jagannāthe rakṣam ātmani cintite // HV_App.I,27.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:6471: arthyābhir vāgbhir iṣṭābhir īśvaraṃ praṇatās tadā // HV_App.I,27.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:6487: prabodham āyāti kathaṃ nu lokaḥ || HV_App.I,27.67 ||
GE07hv_apppu:6492: kathaṃ vayaṃ vettum alaṃ jagatpate @ HV_App.I,27.72 @
GE07hv_apppu:6495: jñātuṃ vayaṃ deva yatāmahe guro || HV_App.I,27.75 ||
GE07hv_apppu:6498: sthūlaṃ tu nityaṃ jagatāṃ nivāsa @ HV_App.I,27.78 @
GE07hv_apppu:6500: tam eva nityaṃ janakādayas te @ HV_App.I,27.80 @
GE07hv_apppu:6504: natāḥ sma nityaṃ jagatāṃ nivāsa @ HV_App.I,27.84 @
GE07hv_apppu:6508: namas tubhyaṃ namas tubhyaṃ deva deva hare hare / HV_App.I,27.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:6510: yat padaṃ paramaṃ nityaṃ tava viṣṇo hare param / HV_App.I,27.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:6511: taṃ namāma jagannātha yat tu paśyanti yoginaḥ / HV_App.I,27.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:6512: namo namo hare viṣṇo namo mādhava keśava // HV_App.I,27.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6513: yat tu paśyanti satataṃ yogino yatacetasaḥ / HV_App.I,27.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:6514: yat prāpya na nivartante tan namāma padaṃ tava // HV_App.I,27.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:6515: yā māyā tava govinda durjñeyā yogacintakaiḥ / HV_App.I,27.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:6516: tāṃ natāḥ sma jagannātha yām āśritya sthitiṃ sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,27.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:6517: yā rakṣati jagadviṣṇo tāṃ namāma hare sadā // HV_App.I,27.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:6518: ṛgyajuś ca tathā sāma yaṃ stauti satataṃ hare / HV_App.I,27.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:6521: dvābhyāṃ dvābhyāṃ tribhiś caiva pañcabhiś ca janārdana // HV_App.I,27.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:6522: punaś caiva jagannātha dvābhyāṃ stauti jagadpate / HV_App.I,27.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:6523: taṃ tvāṃ natāḥ sma deveśa ṛgyajuḥsāmarūpiṇam // HV_App.I,27.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:6525: makāro 'si tathā viṣṇo namas te praṇavātmaka // HV_App.I,27.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:6526: udgīthāya namo nityaṃ namo hotre janārdana / HV_App.I,27.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:6527: adhvaryave namas tubhyaṃ yaṣṭṛrūpāya te namaḥ // HV_App.I,27.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:6529: jagat sarvaṃ tvam evāsi jagac ca tvayi tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,27.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:6530: saṃhartā cāsi jagatāṃ tathā pātā jagatpate / HV_App.I,27.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:6531: sraṣṭāsi ca tathā deva sthitau sthitimatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,27.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:6533: vāsudeveśa bho viṣṇo tvayi sṛṣṭiṃ jagatpate / **HV_App.I,27.109**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6534: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ sarvabhūtahṛdi sthita / HV_App.I,27.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:6536: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ bhūyo bhūyo namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,27.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:6537: evaṃ stutvā jagannāthaṃ praṇāmaṃ cakrire hareḥ // HV_App.I,27.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:6538: tataś ca vṛṣṇayaḥ sarve śinivīrapurogamāḥ / HV_App.I,27.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:6539: utthāya cāsanāt sarve praṇāmaṃ cakrire hareḥ // HV_App.I,27.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:6540: sarve te yādavās tatra prasannamanaso 'bhavan / HV_App.I,27.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:6541: so 'yam eṣa jagannāthaḥ pāti no 'smin vasan sadā / HV_App.I,27.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:6542: āśrityainaṃ sukhaṃ sarve vatsyāmo yādavīṃ purīm // HV_App.I,27.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:6543: iti matvā tadā sarve yādavāḥ kṛṣṇam avyayam // HV_App.I,27.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:6544: vavandire mahābhāgāḥ stutaṃ munibhir avyayam // HV_App.I,27.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:6547: evaṃ stuto jagannātho munibhiḥ puṇyakīrtibhiḥ / HV_App.I,27.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:6549: antaḥ prītiyutaś cāsīt prakṛtistho 'pi keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,27.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:6550: pratijñām akarot tebhyo munibhyo yadusaṃsadi // HV_App.I,27.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:6551: eṣo 'smi sagaṇaṃ hatvā narakaṃ duṣṭapūruṣam / HV_App.I,27.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:6552: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokaṃ kariṣyāmi munīśvarāḥ // HV_App.I,27.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:6553: sthāvaraṃ jaṅgamaṃ caiva sukhaṃ svapsyati māciram / HV_App.I,27.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:6554: cakreṇa niśitenaiva śiraś chetsyāmi dānavam // HV_App.I,27.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:6555: muraṃ ca dānavaṃ viprā hatagrīvaṃ ca dānavam / HV_App.I,27.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:6556: sarvān etān haniṣyāmi gacchadhvaṃ vigatajvarāḥ / HV_App.I,27.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:6557: ārabhyantāṃ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kiṃ vilambatha māciram // HV_App.I,27.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:6558: pratijñāte jagannāthe vinedur yādavās tadā / HV_App.I,27.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:6559: munayaś ca tadā deve pratijñāte tu keśave / HV_App.I,27.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:6560: āśīrvādāṃs tadā viprā dadus tasmai mahātmane // HV_App.I,27.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:6561: nirvighnā tava deveśa pratijñā śatrutāpana / HV_App.I,27.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:6563: svasti te 'stu gamiṣyāmo badarīṃ tava śobhanām // HV_App.I,27.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:6564: ity uktvā munayaḥ sarve praṇipatya ca keśavam / HV_App.I,27.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:6565: jagmuḥ śiṣyair mahārāja badarīṃ tāṃ tapodhanāḥ // HV_App.I,27.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:6566: gateṣu teṣu vipreṣu sahaśiṣyeṣu yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,27.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:6567: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā yathāyogam upāsate // HV_App.I,27.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:6568: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 28, transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June 9, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:6569: [k: D6 S ins. after 91.52, D3 after 91.52cd :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6570: śaṅkhaṃ prādhmāpayām āsa śārṅgadhanvā gadādharaḥ / HV_App.I,28.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6571: tasya śaṅkharavaṃ śrutvā narako yuddhadurmadaḥ / HV_App.I,28.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:6572: dhanur ādāya visphārya nādena mahatā tadā / HV_App.I,28.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:6573: nādayan rodasī yāyād yuddhāya narako balī // HV_App.I,28.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:6574: keśavaṃ purato dṛṣṭvā gadinaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,28.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:6575: uvāca narako daityaḥ ko bhavān kim ihāgataḥ / HV_App.I,28.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:6576: daityendro narakaḥ praṣṭā jetā śakrasya saṃyuge // HV_App.I,28.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:6577: ko 'yaṃ pakṣī sthitaḥ pārśve kaiṣā te vada sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,28.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:6578: enāṃ grahītum icchāmi jānīyāṃ yadi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,28.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:6579: evam ukto jagannāthaḥ prahasya suciraṃ tadā / HV_App.I,28.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:6580: ālokya satyabhāmāṃ tu vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,28.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:6581: vāsudevo 'smi daityendra yadi te śrutim āgataḥ / HV_App.I,28.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:6582: eṣā satrājitaḥ putrī bhāryā mama yavīyasī // HV_App.I,28.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:6583: eṣa tārkṣyo garutmāṃs tu vāhanaṃ mama daityapa / HV_App.I,28.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:6584: tvāṃ hantum iha saṃprāpto vadāmi kim ataḥ param // HV_App.I,28.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:6585: śrutvaitad dānavo ghoro vihasya suciraṃ tadā / HV_App.I,28.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:6586: vāsudevo 'si saṃprāpto māṃ hantuṃ kila yādava // HV_App.I,28.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:6587: diṣṭyā saṃprāptavān adya cintanīyaḥ sadā mayā / HV_App.I,28.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:6588: kadāsau dṛśyate yuddhe haniṣyāmīti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,28.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:6589: kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha yaduśreṣṭha kuru yuddhaṃ yadīcchasi / HV_App.I,28.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:6590: hatvā tvām adya saṃprāptam ānayāmi puraṃ mama // HV_App.I,28.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6591: enāṃ padmapalāśākṣīṃ yudhyatāṃ kiṃ vilambase / HV_App.I,28.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:6595: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 28A transliterated by Eva De Clercq; version of June 9, 2002 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:6596: [k: D3.6 T G1.3-5 M4 G(ed.) ins. after 91.55, M1-3 after 91.53 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6599: garuḍaṃ pothayām āsa śarāṇāṃ ca paraḥśataiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:6602: iti saṃcintya manasā śarair vivyādha pañcabhiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:6603: aṣṭābhir dānavaṃ viṣṇur navabhiś ca śitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:6604: dānavo 'pi mahārāja vivyādha niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6606: ṣaḍbhir vivyādha nārācair dānavaṃ devakīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:6607: dānavo 'pi jagannāthaṃ śarair vivyādha saptabhiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:6608: tau tu yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ cakratur yuddhalālasau / HV_App.I,28A.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:6609: yathā devāsure yuddhe purā śambaravāsavau / HV_App.I,28A.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:6610: yathā yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ rāmarāvaṇayor bhuvi // HV_App.I,28A.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:6611: tataḥ kruddho hṛṣīkeśaḥ śareṇa nataparvaṇā / HV_App.I,28A.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:6612: dhvajaṃ vivyādha rājendra narakasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:6613: tam antare sarai rājan vivyādha yudhi dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:6616: vivyādha garuḍaṃ rājan nārācena mahāmatiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6617: vivyadhe garuḍas tasya nārācena samāhataḥ / HV_App.I,28A.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:6618: susrāva rudhiraṃ ghoraṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,28A.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:6619: pakṣe samāhataḥ pakṣī cacāla ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:6621: pakṣeṇa pakṣiṇāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ pothayām āsa dānavam // HV_App.I,28A.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:6622: āhatya sahasā bhūya ājaghne dṛḍhamuṣṭinā / HV_App.I,28A.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:6623: tataś cacāla narako narakeṇeva kilbiṣī // HV_App.I,28A.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:6624: tataḥ sajyaṃ dhanuḥ kṛtvā vyāvidhya ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:6626: ākarṇapūrṇam ākṛṣya jaghāna harim īśvaram // HV_App.I,28A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6627: nārācaḥ sa ca rājendra lalāṭe prāpatat tadā / HV_App.I,28A.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:6628: cacāla ca jagannāthas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:6629: visaṃjñaś ca tato bhūtvā rathopastha upāviśat // HV_App.I,28A.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:6630: satyabhāmā ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā vāsudevaṃ tathāgatam / HV_App.I,28A.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:6631: cāmarair vījayām āsa pakṣābhyāṃ pakṣipuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:6632: āśvasto 'tha hṛṣīkeśaḥ saṃjñāṃ prāpya ca keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:6633: dhanus tasyai tato dattvā śārṅgaṃ bhārasahaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,28A.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:6634: yudhyasva narakaṃ devi śrānto 'smi yudhi pīḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6635: evam uktā tadā devī satyā satyavatāṃ varā / HV_App.I,28A.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:6636: tadā yuddhaṃ samārebhe narakeṇa durātmanā // HV_App.I,28A.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6637: nārācair ardhacandraiś ca bhallaiḥ suniśitair api / HV_App.I,28A.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:6638: jaghāna dānavaṃ satyā mahiṣī śārṅgadhanvanaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:6639: babādha dānavaṃ satyā satyaṃ satyetaraṃ yathā // HV_App.I,28A.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:6640: yudhyantīṃ tāṃ tathā dṛṣṭvā narako dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:6641: stanamadhye 'tha tasyās tu samājaghne śarottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:6642: bāhvantare tathā ṣaḍbhiḥ pārśve saptabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6643: satyabhāmā tataḥ kruddhā bāṇena niśitena ca / HV_App.I,28A.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:6644: dhanuś ciccheda tasyāpi narakasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:6645: dhvajaṃ chatraṃ tathā yaṣṭiṃ ratham aśvās tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,28A.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:6646: etān dvidhākarot sarvān satyabhāmā balānvitā // HV_App.I,28A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:6647: punar anyan mahaccāpam ādade dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:6648: tac cāpi cicchide cāpaṃ mahiṣī śārṅgadhanvanaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:6649: punar anyat samādatte dvidhā tac cāpi sākarot // HV_App.I,28A.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:6650: tataḥ sa dānavaḥ kruddho gadāṃ suniśitāṃ tadā / HV_App.I,28A.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:6651: ādāya prāhiṇot tasyai vāsudevasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,28A.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:6652: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya tilaśaḥ sākarot tadā / HV_App.I,28A.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:6653: tataḥ śaktiṃ samādāya tasyai dātuṃ pracakrame // HV_App.I,28A.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:6655: tāṃ cāpi tilaśaḥ kṛtvā sasvaraṃ prajahāsa ca // HV_App.I,28A.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:6656: tataḥ parigham ādāya vyāvidhya narakas tadā / HV_App.I,28A.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:6657: prāhiṇoc ca tadā tasyai sāntare nijaghāna ha / HV_App.I,28A.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:6658: śaraiś ca niśitai rājan satyā vivyādha dānavam // HV_App.I,28A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:6659: tuṣṭuvuś ca tadā satyāṃ keśavaprāṇavallabhām / HV_App.I,28A.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:6660: divi sthitā devagaṇā ṛṣayaś ca tathāmalāḥ // HV_App.I,28A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:6661: sāratheś ca śiraḥ kāyāc chareṇa nirakṛntata / HV_App.I,28A.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:6662: śaktir bhagavato devī vāsudevasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,28A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:6663: tatra prīto mahāviṣṇuḥ pariṣvajya ca tāṃ vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,28A.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:6665: mahāviṣṇuḥ sasvaje tāṃ satyabhāmāṃ priyāṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,28A.65**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6666: śramāmbhaś cāpi tasyās tu mārjayām āsa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:6667: tasyās tu kaṇṭhābharaṇaṃ dadau prīto janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,28A.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:6668: na dattam atha rukmiṇyā dattaṃ tasyā mahātmanā / HV_App.I,28A.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:6669: mahārghaṃ lokavikhyātaṃ hṛtaṃ balimukhe tadā // HV_App.I,28A.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:6670: satyabhāmā tad ādāya bhūṣaṇaṃ lokaviśrutam / HV_App.I,28A.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:6671: badhvā kaṇṭhe tadā devī rarāja bahuśaḥ śubhā // HV_App.I,28A.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:6672: asakṛd yācamānāpi vihāre śayane tathā / HV_App.I,28A.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:6673: na hi labdhavatī pūrva tadā labdhaṃ jarārdanāt // HV_App.I,28A.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:6674: sthīyatāṃ sāṃprataṃ devi śramārtāsi varānane / HV_App.I,28A.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:6675: ity uktvā dhanur ādāya yuyudhe dānavaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,28A.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:6676: narako ratham āruhya sadhvajaṃ sapatākinam / HV_App.I,28A.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:6677: ādāya paramaṃ cāpaṃ bāṇair vivyādha cāṣṭabhiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:6678: sa vāsudevam āvidhya satyāṃ ca daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.78 /
