GE07hv_apppu:6679: garuḍaṃ pañcaviṃśatyā vāsudevaṃ ca saptabhiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:6680: atho jagatpatir devaḥ kruddhaḥ saṃprati dānave / HV_App.I,28A.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:6681: ādāya niśitaṃ bāṇaṃ dhanuś ciccheda tasya hi / HV_App.I,28A.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:6682: rathaṃ ca sārathiṃ cāpi jaghāna yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,28A.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:6683: tataḥ kruddho rathāt tasmād āplutya narakas tadā / HV_App.I,28A.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:6684: gadām ādāya govindaṃ jaghānāvidhya vakṣasi / HV_App.I,28A.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:6685: garuḍaṃ pothayam āsa talena narakas tadā // HV_App.I,28A.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:6686: punaḥ parigham ādāya vāsudevaṃ samabhyayāt / HV_App.I,28A.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:6688: tataḥ śilāḥ samādāya prāhiṇod yadunandanam / HV_App.I,28A.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:6689: tāś ca sarvāḥ samājaghne śaraiḥ śārṅgaviniḥsṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,28A.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:6690: śailair vṛkṣais tathā pāśair gadāparighapaṭṭasaiḥ / HV_App.I,28A.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:6692: tad yuddham abhavad ghoraṃ narake dānaveśvare // HV_App.I,28A.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6697: hantum aicchaj jagannātho narakaṃ dānaveśvaram // HV_App.I,28A.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:6701: narakaṃ sādhuvidviṣṭaṃ dviṣṭaṃ munigaṇaiḥ sadā / HV_App.I,28A.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:6702: pradīptacakraṃ cakreṇa kṣiptena niśitena ca // HV_App.I,28A.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:6704: dvidhā ciccheda lokeśaḥ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,28A.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:6716: [k: After 92.70, K Ñ2.3 V B D T G M4 ins. a passage given in App. I (No. 29)
GE07hv_apppu:6717: , Ñ1 ins. this after App. I (No. 42). :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6719: prādurbhāve muniśreṣṭha māthure caritaṃ śubham / HV_App.I,29.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6720: [k: M4 om. the ref. T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 ins. after the ref.; M4 bfore line 1; G after line 4 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6722: tad vadāśu guro mahyam aviglānaṃ kathaṃ hariḥ // **HV_App.I,29.1**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:6723: śṛṇvan vai nādhigacchāmi tṛptiṃ kṛṣṇasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:6724: dvārakāyāṃ nivasataḥ kṛtadārasya yad guṇam / HV_App.I,29.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:6725: caritaṃ brūhi kṛṣṇasya sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava // HV_App.I,29.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:6728: nibodha caritaṃ citraṃ tasyaiva sadṛśaṃ prabhoḥ // HV_App.I,29.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:6730: rukmiṇyā sahito devyā yayau raivatakaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,29.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:6732: tarpayiṣyan svayaṃ viprāñ jagāma madhusūdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:6733: kumārāḥ prayayus tatra putrā bhrātara eva ca / HV_App.I,29.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:6735: ṣoḍaśa strīsahasrāṇi jagmur eva ca dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:6736: ṛddhyā paramayā rājan viṣṇor evānurūpayā // HV_App.I,29.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:6737: tatas tatra dvijātīnāṃ kāmān prādād adhokṣajaḥ / HV_App.I,29.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:6740: yaunaiḥ śrautaiś ca mākhaiś ca śuddhānāṃ kurunandana // HV_App.I,29.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:6741: tarpayitvā dvijān kāmair iṣṭair iṣṭaḥ satāṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:6742: jñātīn saṃtarpayām āsa yathārhaṃ dharmavatsalaḥ // HV_App.I,29.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:6746: kadācid atha rukmiṇyā vasan gehe janārdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,29.21**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6747: bahu mene priyāṃ bhāryāṃ rukmiṇīṃ bhīṣmakātmajām // HV_App.I,29.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:6750: āgataṃ cāprameyātmā munim indrānujas tadā / HV_App.I,29.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:6751: śāstradṛṣṭena vidhinā arcayām āsa keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:6752: so 'rcito vāsudevena munir arcyatamaḥ satām / HV_App.I,29.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:6753: pārijātataroḥ puṣpaṃ dadau kṛṣṇāya bhārata // HV_App.I,29.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:6754: tad vṛkṣarājakusumaṃ rukmiṇyāḥ pradadau hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:6755: pārśvasthā sā hi kṛṣṇasya bhojyā naravarābhavat // HV_App.I,29.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:6756: pratigṛhya tu tat puṣpaṃ kāmāraṇir aninditā / HV_App.I,29.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:6759: śuśubhe tena puṣpeṇa dviguṇaṃ rukmiṇī tadā // HV_App.I,29.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:6760: tāṃ nāradas tathovāca munir brahmasutas tadā / HV_App.I,29.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:6761: tavaivaupayikaṃ puṣpam ekaṃ devi pativrate // HV_App.I,29.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:6762: alaṃkṛtaṃ puṣpam etat saṃsargāt tava sarvathā / HV_App.I,29.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:6763: atyarhā ca matā me tvam etat puṣpaṃ dhṛtavrate // HV_App.I,29.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:6765: amlānam etat satataṃ puṣpaṃ bhavati kāmini // HV_App.I,29.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:6767: īpsitān api gandhāṃś ca dadāti vadatāṃ vare // HV_App.I,29.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:6768: śītoṣṇe cepsite devi puṣpam etat prayacchati / HV_App.I,29.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:6769: sravaty api rasān devi manasā kāṅkṣitān varān // HV_App.I,29.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:6770: sevyamānaṃ ca saubhāgyaṃ dadāti varavarṇini / HV_App.I,29.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:6771: sravaty api tathā gandhān īpsitān prativardhanān // HV_App.I,29.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:6772: yāni yāni ca puṣpāṇi tvaṃ devy abhilaṣiṣyasi / HV_App.I,29.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:6773: kusumaṃ vṛkṣarājasya tāni tāni pradāsyati // HV_App.I,29.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:6774: etad eva bhagādhānaṃ dharmiṣṭhe dharmadaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:6775: matiṃ ca nāśubhe dhatte dhāryamāṇaṃ sadā śubhe // HV_App.I,29.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:6776: yad yad icchasi varṇaṃ ca tat sarvaṃ dhārayiṣyati / HV_App.I,29.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:6777: svalpaṃ vā yadi vā sthūlaṃ chandatas te bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:6779: pradīpakarma rātrau ca karoti kamalekṣaṇe // HV_App.I,29.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:6782: bubhukṣā vā pipāsā vā glānir vāpy atha vā jarā / HV_App.I,29.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:6783: devy etaddhārayantyās te svacchandena bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:6784: anugītāni gītāni dāsyaty api ca cintite / HV_App.I,29.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:6785: suvāditrān sumadhurāṃs tathaiva tava saṃmatān // HV_App.I,29.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:6786: pūrṇe saṃvatsare devi puṣpam etat tavāntikāt / HV_App.I,29.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:6789: kṛtir eṣā hi bhadraṃ te pārijātasya suprabhe / HV_App.I,29.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:6792: dhārayed īśvarī nityaṃ puṣpāṇy etāni suprabhe // HV_App.I,29.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:6794: sāvitrī vedamātā ca śrīś ca sarvaguṇodite // HV_App.I,29.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:6795: devapatnyas tathaivānyā devāś ca vasudevatāḥ / HV_App.I,29.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:6796: saṃvatsaraḥ paraḥ kālaḥ sarveṣāṃ tu na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:6797: ṣoḍaśastrīsahasrāṇāṃ madhye tvaṃ khalu vartase / HV_App.I,29.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:6798: adyeṣṭāṃ vāsudevasya vedmi tvāṃ bhojanandini // HV_App.I,29.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:6799: sapatnyas te guṇopete sarvāḥ sarveśvarapriye / HV_App.I,29.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:6801: prakāśam adya saubhāgyam anivāryaṃ yaśaś ca te / HV_App.I,29.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:6802: mandārakusumaṃ dattaṃ yat te madhunighātinā // HV_App.I,29.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:6803: adya sātrājitī devī jñāsyate varavarṇinī / HV_App.I,29.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:6804: saubhāgyāḍhyaṃ sadā vetti yātmānaṃ subhagā satī // HV_App.I,29.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:6805: sāmbamātātha gāndhārī bhāryāś cānyā mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:6807: saubhāgyaikaratho jaitras tava devy adya niḥsṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,29.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:6808: manoratharathānāṃ yaḥ sahasrair api durjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:6810: ātmā dvitīyaḥ kṛṣṇasya bhoje tvam iti bhāmini // HV_App.I,29.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:6812: jīvitātiśayas tena tvayā prāpto haripriye // HV_App.I,29.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:6813: nāradenaivam uktaṃ tu tathyaṃ vākyaṃ narādhipa / HV_App.I,29.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:6814: tatrasthāḥ śuśruvuḥ preṣyāḥ preṣitāḥ satyabhāmayā // HV_App.I,29.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:6815: devīnāṃ ca tathānyāsāṃ sapatnīnāṃ viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:6816: dṛṣṭvā tāṃ saviśeṣaṃ ca nāradenābhyudāhṛtam // HV_App.I,29.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:6817: tac ca śrutvā sunikhilaṃ preṣyābhiḥ strīsvabhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,29.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:6818: prakāśīkṛtam evāsīd viṣṇor antaḥpure tadā // HV_App.I,29.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:6819: karṇākarṇi tato devyaḥ kaulīnam iva sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,29.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:6821: arheti putramāteti jyeṣṭheti ca samāgatāḥ / HV_App.I,29.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:6822: prāyeṇa pravadanti sma hṛṣṭā dāmodarastriyaḥ // HV_App.I,29.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:6823: mamṛṣe na sapatnyās tu tat saubhāgyaguṇodayam / HV_App.I,29.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:6826: satyabhāmā priyā nityaṃ viṣṇor atulatejasaḥ // HV_App.I,29.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:6830: sā śubhaṃ kauṅkumaṃ vāsaḥ samutsṛjya śucismitā / **HV_App.I,29.100**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6835: vahneḥ śikhā śrīr iva vardhitendhanā || HV_App.I,29.104 ||
GE07hv_apppu:6854: upaviṣṭaṃ muniṃ jñātvā rukmiṇyā saha keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:6856: jagāma tvaritaś caiva satyabhāmāgṛhaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,29.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:6858: abhimānavatīm iṣṭāṃ prāṇair api garīyasīm / HV_App.I,29.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:6859: jānan sātrājitīṃ viṣṇur viveśa śanakair iva // HV_App.I,29.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:6860: ruṣitām iva tāṃ devīṃ snehāt saṃkalpayann iva / HV_App.I,29.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:6862: dārukaṃ dvāradeśe tu tiṣṭhety uktvā viveśa ha / HV_App.I,29.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:6864: sa dadarśa priyāṃ dūrat krodhāgāragatāṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:6865: preṣyāmadhyasthitāṃ krodhān niḥśvasantīṃ muhur muhur // HV_App.I,29.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:6867: saṃśleṣayitvā niḥśvasya viharantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:6869: kṛtvā pṛṣṭhe 'tha vadanaṃ vihasantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:6870: karapadme punaḥ śaśvan mukhapadmaṃ niveśya ca / HV_App.I,29.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:6872: [k: for line 138, V3 D3.4 G2 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:6874: sarasaṃ candanaṃ gṛhya preṣyāhastād aninditām / HV_App.I,29.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:6875: prasādhayitvā hṛdayaṃ kṣipantīṃ nirdayaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:6876: punar utthāya śayanāt patantīṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:6877: tās tāś ceṣṭās tathānyāś ca priyāyā dadṛśe hariḥ // HV_App.I,29.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:6878: avaguṇṭhya yadā vaktram upadhāne nyaveśayat / HV_App.I,29.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:6879: idam antaram ity eva tato matvā janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:6880: preṣyājanaṃ samājñāpya anākhyeyo śmi saṃjñayā / HV_App.I,29.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:6881: saśaṅkitapracāraś ca tvarito 'nvagamac ca tām // HV_App.I,29.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:6882: jagrāha vyajanaṃ caiva sthitvā sa paripārśvataḥ / HV_App.I,29.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:6883: śanair avāsṛjad vātaṃ jahāsa śanakair iva // HV_App.I,29.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:6885: babhāra bhagavān gandhaṃ divyaṃ mānuṣadurlabham // HV_App.I,29.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:6886: atyadbhutaṃ sugandhaṃ ca jighritvā vismayānvitā / HV_App.I,29.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:6887: apāvṛṇon mukhaṃ satyā kim etad iti cābravīt // HV_App.I,29.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:6888: sotthitā pṛṣṭhato devam apaśyantī suvismitā / HV_App.I,29.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:6889: paryapṛcchad atho preṣyā gandhasya prabhavaḥ tadā // HV_App.I,29.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:6890: tāḥ pṛṣṭās tv aprabhāṣantyo jānubhyāṃ dharaṇīṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,29.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:6891: adhomukhyas tatas tasthuḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭās tadā // HV_App.I,29.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:6892: tad apūrvam adṛṣṭvaiva gandhaṃ muñcati medinīm / HV_App.I,29.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:6893: katham ekataras tasyā gandho 'yam udabhūt khalu // HV_App.I,29.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:6894: kiṃ tv idaṃ syād iti ca sā vivekṣantī samantataḥ / HV_App.I,29.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:6895: dadṛśe keśavaṃ devī sahasā lokabhāvanam // HV_App.I,29.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:6899: muhūrtam asitāpāṅgī tasthāv anyamukhī śubhā // HV_App.I,29.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:6900: nibadhya bhrūkuṭīṃ vāmāṃ samyag utkṣipya locane / HV_App.I,29.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:6901: niveśya vadanaṃ haste śobhasīty abravīd dharim // HV_App.I,29.166 //
GE07hv_apppu:6902: tasyāḥ susrāva netrābhyāṃ vāri praṇayakopajam / HV_App.I,29.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:6904: samutpatya jalaṃ tatra patitaṃ vadanāmbujāt / HV_App.I,29.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:6905: pratijagrāha padmākṣaḥ karābhyām api satvaram // HV_App.I,29.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:6908: sravaty asitapatrākṣi kimarthaṃ tava bhāmini / HV_App.I,29.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:6909: toyaṃ sundari netrābhyāṃ puṣkarābhyām ivodakam // HV_App.I,29.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:6910: prabhāte pūrṇacandrasya madhyāhne paṅkajasya ca / HV_App.I,29.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:6911: bibharti tava kiṃ vaktraṃ vapur mama manoharam // HV_App.I,29.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:6912: kimarthaṃ kauṅkumaṃ vāso mahārajatam eva ca / HV_App.I,29.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:6915: devābhigamanād ūrdhvaṃ śuklaṃ neṣṭaṃ hi te priye // HV_App.I,29.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:6916: kiṃ cānābharaṇaṃ gātraṃ sugātri tava kathyatām / HV_App.I,29.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:6917: citrakasthānam ākrāntaṃ kasmāc ca varavarṇini // HV_App.I,29.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:6918: śvetena tava paṭṭena vāsasā priyadarśane / HV_App.I,29.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:6919: lalāṭaṃ sevyate kasmāc candanena sugandhinā // HV_App.I,29.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:6922: karoṣi mama cātyarthaṃ mano glāpayasi priye // HV_App.I,29.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:6925: ratnasyābharaṇair muktā tava grīvā na śobhate / HV_App.I,29.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:6928: kim u nābhāṣase mādya sukhenotpalagandhinā // HV_App.I,29.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:6929: ardhākṣṇāpi hi tāvan māṃ kimarthaṃ na nirīkṣase / HV_App.I,29.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:6930: muñcasy eva saniḥśvāsaṃ toyam añjanadurdinam // HV_App.I,29.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:6932: jalam añjanakalmāṣaṃ mā mokṣīr ānanadviṣam // HV_App.I,29.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:6933: tvadīyo 'haṃ yadā devi khyāto jagati kiṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,29.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:6934: nājñāpayasi māṃ kiṃ tvaṃ pureva varavarṇini // HV_App.I,29.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:6935: kim akārṣam ahaṃ devi vipriyaṃ tava bhāmini / HV_App.I,29.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:6937: manasā karmaṇā vācā na tvām aticarāmy aham / HV_App.I,29.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:6938: sarvathā sarvacārvaṅgi satyam etad bravīmy aham // HV_App.I,29.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:6940: dvitīyaṃ na hi me kiṃcid uktaṃ yan meti nāgare // **HV_App.I,29.203**6:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:6941: bahumāno mamānyāsu strīṣu sarvāsu śobhane / HV_App.I,29.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:6942: snehaś ca bahumānaś ca tvām ṛte 'nyāsu nāsti me // HV_App.I,29.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:6943: naiva tvāṃ madano jahyād amṛte mayi māmakaḥ / HV_App.I,29.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:6944: iti me niścitaṃ viddhi cetaḥ surasutopame // HV_App.I,29.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:6946: niścitaṃ viddhi ceto me tvayi nityaṃ suniścalam // **HV_App.I,29.207**7:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:6947: kṣamādayaś ca medinyāṃ śabdādyāś cāmbare guṇāḥ / HV_App.I,29.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:6949: gandho guṇaś ca medinyā khe śabdaś ca yathā guṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,29.208**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:6950: dhruvaṃ paṅkajagarbhābhe tvayi snehas tathā mama // HV_App.I,29.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:6951: rucir agnau yathā divyā prabhā caiva divākare / HV_App.I,29.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:6952: kāntiś ca cāśvatī candre snehas tvayi tathā mama // HV_App.I,29.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:6954: śanair uvāca netrābhyāṃ pramṛjya subhagā jalam // HV_App.I,29.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:6955: madīyas tvam iti hy āsīn mama nityaṃ manaḥ prabho / HV_App.I,29.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:6956: adya sādhāraṇasnehas tvam ity avagatā hy aham // HV_App.I,29.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:6957: nājñāsiṣam ahaṃ pūrvam anityaṃ kālaparyayam / HV_App.I,29.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:6958: adya lokagatiṃ kṛtsnām avagacchāmi na dhruvām // HV_App.I,29.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:6960: adyālokya gatiṃ kṛtsnāṃ maivaṃ jānāmi vā dhruvam // **HV_App.I,29.217**9:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:6961: amṛtāyā dvitīyaṃ hi janmedaṃ mama sarvathā / HV_App.I,29.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:6962: kim atra bahunoktena hṛdayaṃ vetti te 'cyuta // HV_App.I,29.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:6963: vāṅmātram iva paśyāmi mādhuryaṃ saṃprayujyate / HV_App.I,29.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:6964: mayi snehaś ca kṛtakas tavānyatra na kṛtrimaḥ // HV_App.I,29.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:6965: ṛjusvabhāvāṃ bhaktāṃ ca sarvathā puruṣottama / HV_App.I,29.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:6966: avajānāsi jānan māṃ kaitavīṃ vṛttim āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:6967: etāvat khalu paryāptaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ draṣṭavyam adya yat / HV_App.I,29.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:6968: śrutaṃ vāpy atha vā śrāvyaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ snehaphalodayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:6969: yadi tv aham anugrāhyā mām anujñātum arhasi / HV_App.I,29.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:6970: tapasyeyaṃ paraṃ kṛtvā niścayaṃ puruṣottama // HV_App.I,29.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:6971: bhartuś chandena nārīṇāṃ tapo vā vratakāni vā / HV_App.I,29.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:6972: niṣphalaṃ khalu yad bhartur acchandena kriyeta yat // HV_App.I,29.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:6973: itīdam uktvā punar eva śobhanā @ HV_App.I,29.230 @
GE07hv_apppu:6979: nārāyaṇaḥ satyabhāmāṃ punar evātha bhārata / HV_App.I,29.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:6980: provāca praṇayāt kruddhām abhimānavatīṃ satīm // HV_App.I,29.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:6982: kim u tatkāraṇaṃ yena tvam evam ativiklavā // HV_App.I,29.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:6983: śāpitāsi mama prāṇair ācakṣvānatyayo yadi / HV_App.I,29.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:6984: śrotavyaṃ yadi bhaktena bhartrā sarvāṅgaśobhane // HV_App.I,29.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:6985: tataḥ provāca bhartāraṃ satyā satyavrate sthitam / HV_App.I,29.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:6987: tvayaiva sthāpitaṃ pūrvaṃ saubhāgyaṃ mama mānada / HV_App.I,29.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:6988: jagaty amalapatrākṣe tat khyātaṃ keśināśana // HV_App.I,29.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:6989: śiro vahāmi ceṣṭatvāt tavāhaṃ deva garvitā / HV_App.I,29.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:6991: sāham adyāvahāsyāsmi sapatnīnāṃ janasya ca / HV_App.I,29.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:6992: iti preṣyābhir ākhyātaṃ śrutvā tathyaṃ tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,29.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:6993: yat pārijātakusumaṃ dattavān nāradas tava / HV_App.I,29.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:6994: tat kileṣṭajane dattaṃ tvayāhaṃ parivarjitā // HV_App.I,29.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:6996: snehaś ca bahumānaś ca prakāśaṃ gamitas tvayā // HV_App.I,29.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:6997: tām astauṣīt samakṣaṃ te priyāṃ sa kila nāradaḥ / HV_App.I,29.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:6998: tam aśrauṣīś ca hṛṣṭas tvaṃ priyāyāḥ saṃstavaṃ kila // HV_App.I,29.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:6999: stotavyā yadi tāvat sā nāradena tavāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,29.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:7000: durbhago 'yaṃ janas tatra kimartham anuśabditaḥ // HV_App.I,29.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:7001: praṇayasya rasaṃ dattvā paścāttāpaḥ prabho yadi / HV_App.I,29.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:7002: anujñāṃ me prayacchasva tapaḥ kartuṃ prasīda me // HV_App.I,29.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:7003: svapnenāpi na dṛṣṭvāhaṃ śraddadhyāṃ puṣkarekṣaṇa / HV_App.I,29.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:7004: yad anyad eva nirvṛttam aśrauṣaṃ paśyatas tava // HV_App.I,29.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:7005: kāmaḥ kāmaṃ tu tasyaiva muner atulatejasaḥ / HV_App.I,29.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:7006: atra manyus tu me deva sāṃnidhyaṃ tava tatra yat // HV_App.I,29.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:7007: mānārthaṃ jīvyate loke sadbhir ity uktavān asi / HV_App.I,29.262 /
GE07hv_apppu:7008: tad evaṃ sati necchāmi jīvituṃ mānavarjitā // HV_App.I,29.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:7009: mamābhavad yato rakṣā bhayam adya tato mama / HV_App.I,29.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:7010: sarvato rakṣate yo māṃ sa māṃ nādyābhirakṣati // HV_App.I,29.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:7011: hā gatiṃ kāṃ gamiṣyāmi tyaktā deva tvayā vibho / HV_App.I,29.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:7012: kumudvatīgatāṃ nūnaṃ gatiṃ yāsyāmy asaṃgatā // HV_App.I,29.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:7013: kim akārṣam ahaṃ mohād īśvarāṇāṃ priyāpriyam / HV_App.I,29.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:7014: priyā bhūtvāpriyā bhūtā yad ahaṃ tava mānada // HV_App.I,29.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:7015: vasantakusumaiś citraṃ sadā raivatakaṃ girim / HV_App.I,29.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:7016: priyā bhūtvāpriyā bhūtā kathaṃ drakṣyāmy ahaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29.271 //
GE07hv_apppu:7018: kathaṃ nāmānilaṃ dveṣyā seveyaṃ durbhagā satī // HV_App.I,29.273 //
GE07hv_apppu:7019: jalakrīḍāṃ tavāṅkasthā deva kṛtvā mahodadhau / HV_App.I,29.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:7020: kathaṃ daurbhāgyam āpannā paśyeyam api sāgaram // HV_App.I,29.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:7021: sātrājiti priyā nānyā tvatto me 'stīti viddhi mām / HV_App.I,29.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:7022: tvam avocaḥ kva tad yātam atha vā kaḥ smariṣyati // HV_App.I,29.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:7024: mām uvāca bhavāṃs tathyaṃ na nūnam iti cintaye // **HV_App.I,29.277**10:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:7025: yad adrākṣīd dhi māṃ śvaśrūr bahumānena nandinīm / HV_App.I,29.278 /
GE07hv_apppu:7026: avajñātā tvayā rājñī nūnaṃ daurbhāgyakīrtitā // HV_App.I,29.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:7027: kiṃ nu gūḍhena me premṇā susnigdhenāpi mānada / HV_App.I,29.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:7028: yat samānāṃ janair devo māṃ na paśyati nityadā // HV_App.I,29.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:7029: nāhaṃ tvāṃ kitavaṃ dhūrtam ajñāsiṣam ariṃdama / HV_App.I,29.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:7030: adya jñāto 'si tatpakṣaś cañcalo janavañcakaḥ // HV_App.I,29.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:7032: cora jñāto 'si tatpakṣo vāṅmātramadhuraḥ śaṭhaḥ // HV_App.I,29.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:7033: evam īrśyāvaśaṃ prāptāṃ devīṃ sātrājitīṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:7035: maivaṃ padmapalāśākṣi mameśvari vada priye / HV_App.I,29.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:7036: kim atra bahunoktena tvadīyam avagaccha mām // HV_App.I,29.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:7037: tat pārijātakusumaṃ tasyā devi mamāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,29.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:7038: nārado matpriyaṃ kurvan munir akliṣṭakarmakṛt // HV_App.I,29.291 //
GE07hv_apppu:7039: dākṣiṇyād anurodhāc ca dattavān nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,29.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:7042: tadā dātāsmi suśroṇi satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:7044: gṛhe te sthāpayiṣyāmi yāvatkālaṃ tvam icchasi // HV_App.I,29.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:7045: evam uktvā tu hariṇā provāca harivallabhā / HV_App.I,29.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:7046: yady evaṃ sa drumaḥ śakya ihānayitum acyuta // HV_App.I,29.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:7047: manyur eṣa pramṛṣṭo hi bhaved bahuguṇo mama / HV_App.I,29.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:7048: sīmantinīnāṃ sarvāsām adhikā syām adhokṣaja // HV_App.I,29.301 //
GE07hv_apppu:7049: tathāstu prathamaḥ kalpa iti tāṃ madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.302 /
GE07hv_apppu:7053: tataḥ snāto jagannāthaḥ sarveśaḥ sarvabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:7055: dadhyau ca nāradaṃ devaḥ snāto devamuniṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:7057: tam āgataṃ narapate satāṃ gatir adhokṣajaḥ / HV_App.I,29.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:7058: satyayā saha dharmātmā yathāvidhim apūjayat // HV_App.I,29.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:7059: pādau prakṣālayāṃ cakre muneḥ sātrājitī svayam / HV_App.I,29.312 /
GE07hv_apppu:7060: jalaṃ devaḥ svayaṃ kṛṣṇo bhṛṅgāreṇa dadau tadā // HV_App.I,29.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:7062: paramānnaṃ sa munaye prayatātmā jagadguruḥ // HV_App.I,29.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:7063: tal lokakartrā satkṛtya dattaṃ munir udāradhīḥ / HV_App.I,29.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:7064: bubhuje vadatāṃ śreṣṭhaḥ śraddhayā parayānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:7065: upaspṛśya tatas tṛptaḥ pradadau cāśiṣaḥ prabhoḥ / HV_App.I,29.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:7066: tāś ca prītena manasā pratijagrāha keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:7067: tataḥ sātrājitīṃ devīṃ praṇatāṃ nārado 'bravīt / HV_App.I,29.320 /
GE07hv_apppu:7068: prasārya dakṣiṇaṃ hastaṃ sajalaṃ jalajekṣaṇām // HV_App.I,29.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:7069: yathedānīṃ tathaiva tvaṃ bhava devi pativratā / HV_App.I,29.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:7070: saviśeṣaṃ ca subhagā bhava tvaṃ tapaso balāt // HV_App.I,29.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:7071: ity uktā munimukhyena satyabhāmā haripriyā / HV_App.I,29.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:7072: uttasthau mahatā yuktā harṣeṇa tu narādhipa // HV_App.I,29.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:7073: sa kṛṣṇo 'py abhyanujñāṃ tu labdhvā munivarāt tadā / HV_App.I,29.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:7075: tatas tv āvaśyakaṃ kṛtvā satyabhāmāpi bhārata / HV_App.I,29.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:7076: anujñayā tadā bhartur viveśāntargṛhaṃ mudā // HV_App.I,29.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:7078: sthitā pārśve ca kṛṣṇasya namaskṛtvā mahātmane // HV_App.I,29.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:7079: tato muhūrtam āsitvā nāradaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:7080: āpṛcche tvāṃ gamiṣyāmi śakralokam adhokṣaja // HV_App.I,29.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:7081: tatrādyaṃ devam īśānaṃ namaskṛtya maheśvaram / HV_App.I,29.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:7084: māsi māsy ucitaṃ hy etan mahendrasadane vibho / HV_App.I,29.336 /
GE07hv_apppu:7085: pūjārthaṃ devadevasya gāndharvaṃ nṛtyam eva ca // HV_App.I,29.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:7086: antarhito devadevaḥ somaḥ sapravaro vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.338 /
GE07hv_apppu:7088: nimantrito 'haṃ pūrvedyuḥ puṣpaṃ dātuṃ mahādyute / HV_App.I,29.340 /
GE07hv_apppu:7089: pārijātasya bhadraṃ te tarurājño mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.341 //
GE07hv_apppu:7090: yad etad āhṛtaṃ svargāt tat tvadarthaṃ mayā vibho / HV_App.I,29.342 /
GE07hv_apppu:7092: iṣṭaḥ sa vṛkṣaḥ satataṃ śacyāḥ puṣkaralocana / HV_App.I,29.344 /
GE07hv_apppu:7093: saubhāgyam āvahaty eva pūjyamāno 'pi nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,29.345 //
GE07hv_apppu:7094: [k: T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 subst. for line 345 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:7096: puṇyaṃ kartuṃ tadā sṛṣṭaḥ pārijāto mahādrumaḥ / HV_App.I,29.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:7098: purādityā mahātejās toṣitaḥ kila kaśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,29.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:7099: vareṇa cchandayām āsa mārīcas tapaso nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:7100: sovāca subhagā yena bhaveyaṃ munisattama / HV_App.I,29.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:7101: svalaṃkṛtā kāmataś ca sarvair eva vibhūṣaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:7102: īpsitaṃ gītanṛtyaṃ ca bhaven mama tapodhana / HV_App.I,29.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:7103: kumārī nityadā caiva bhaveyaṃ tapasāṃ nidhe // HV_App.I,29.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:7104: virajāḥ śokarahitā bhaveyam api nityadā / HV_App.I,29.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:7105: patibhaktimatī caiva dharmaśīlā tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:7109: sarvapuṣpāṇi dṛśyante tasminn eva mahādrume // HV_App.I,29.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:7110: īdṛśāny asya puṣpāṇi bibharty ekātirūpiṇī / HV_App.I,29.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:7111: bahurūpāṇi cāpy anyā padmāni ca tathāparā // HV_App.I,29.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:7112: mandārād api vṛkṣāc ca sāras uddhṛtya kaśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,29.362 /
GE07hv_apppu:7113: tasmād eṣa taruśreṣṭhaḥ sarveṣāṃ śreṣṭhatāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:7116: tatas tatra nibadhyātha kaśyapaṃ pradadau śubhā / HV_App.I,29.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:7117: aditir mama puṇyārthaṃ saubhāgyārthaṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:7119: adityā kaśyapo dattaḥ puṇyārthaṃ ca tato mama / **HV_App.I,29.365**13:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7121: niṣkrayeṇa mayā muktaḥ kaśyapas tu tapodhanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:7122: indro dattas tathendrāṇyā saubhāgyārthaṃ tato mama // HV_App.I,29.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:7123: somaś cāpy atha rohiṇyā ṛddhyā ca dhanadas tathā / HV_App.I,29.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:7124: evaṃ saubhāgyado vṛkṣaḥ pārijāto na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:7126: mandārapuṣpair yad yukto mandāras tena kathyate // HV_App.I,29.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:7127: ko 'py ayaṃ dārur ity āhur ajānanto yato janāḥ / HV_App.I,29.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:7128: kovidāra iti khyātaḥ saṃtataḥ sa mahātaruḥ // HV_App.I,29.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:7129: mandāraḥ kovidāraś ca pārijātaś ca nāmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,29.374 /
GE07hv_apppu:7130: sa vṛkṣo jñāyate divyo yasyaitat kusumottamam // HV_App.I,29.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:7133: tato jigamiṣuṃ tatra nāradaṃ munisattamam / HV_App.I,29.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:7135: maharṣe dharmatattvajña svargaṃ gatvā tvayānagha / HV_App.I,29.378 /
GE07hv_apppu:7136: dṛṣṭvā sadasyān devasya tripuraghnasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:7138: saṃvarṇayitvā bhrātṛtvaṃ paurāṇaṃ vetsi yan mune // HV_App.I,29.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:7139: yad asrākṣīn muniśreṣṭho bhagavān kaśyapas tarum / HV_App.I,29.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:7141: sa puṇyam atisaubhāgyaṃ dadāti tarusattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:7142: tava dattaṃ purā dānaṃ vrate ca tarusattamam // HV_App.I,29.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:7144: dattaṃ śrutvābhikāṅkṣanti dātuṃ patnyo mama prabho // HV_App.I,29.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:7145: puṇyārthaṃ dānadharmārthaṃ mama prītyartham eva ca / HV_App.I,29.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:7146: ānāyya ca dvāravatīṃ pārijātaṃ mahātarum // HV_App.I,29.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:7147: datte dāne punaḥ svargaṃ tatra taṃ nāyayiṣyasi / HV_App.I,29.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:7148: sa vācya evaṃ bhagavān balabhid bhagavaṃs tvayā // HV_App.I,29.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:7149: tathā tathā prayatnaś ca kāryo munivara tvayā / HV_App.I,29.392 /
GE07hv_apppu:7150: yathā taruvaraṃ dadyāt pārijātaṃ sureśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29.393 //
GE07hv_apppu:7151: tatra dūtaguṇaṃ tāvat paśyāmas te tapodhana / HV_App.I,29.394 /
GE07hv_apppu:7152: saṃbhāvyā sarvakṛtyānāṃ saṃpad dhi tvayi me matā // HV_App.I,29.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:7153: evaṃ nārāyaṇenokto nārado bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / HV_App.I,29.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:7154: prahasyovāca keśighnam idaṃ vākyaṃ tapodhanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:7155: bāḍham evaṃ pravakṣyāmi yadumukhya sureśvaram / HV_App.I,29.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:7156: na tu dāsyati devendraḥ pārijātaṃ kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:7157: mandaraṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ dānavais tridaśais tathā / HV_App.I,29.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:7158: nikṣipya toyadhau pūrvaṃ pārijātaḥ samāhṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:7159: mandaraṃ parvataśreṣṭhaṃ nayituṃ preṣitaḥ purā / HV_App.I,29.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:7161: svayaṃ vijñāpito gatvā tataḥ śakreṇa śaṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,29.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:7162: ākrīḍadruma udyāne śacyāḥ syād iti yācitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:7163: tathāstv iti varo datto mahādevena cānagha / HV_App.I,29.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:7164: na ca nītaḥ pārijāto mandaraṃ citrakandaram // HV_App.I,29.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:7165: krīḍāvṛkṣaḥ sa śacyeti vyapadeśena mokṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:7166: mahendreṇa mahābāho pārijātas taruḥ purā // HV_App.I,29.409 //
GE07hv_apppu:7169: na tatra sūryabhāḥ kṛṣṇa praviśanti nagottame / HV_App.I,29.412 /
GE07hv_apppu:7171: na ca candraprabhāḥ śītā naiva kṛṣṇa sadāgatiḥ // HV_App.I,29.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:7172: śītoṣṇe chandatas tatra śailaputryā bhavanti hi / HV_App.I,29.414 /
GE07hv_apppu:7173: svayaṃprabhaṃ vanaṃ tad dhi mahādevasya tejasā // HV_App.I,29.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:7175: māṃ cānyas tad vanaṃ divyaṃ na prayāti kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29.417 //
GE07hv_apppu:7176: sravanti tatra vārṣṇeya pārijātāḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,29.418 /
GE07hv_apppu:7177: sarvaratnāni mukhyāni manasā kāṅkṣitāni vai // HV_App.I,29.419 //
GE07hv_apppu:7178: gaṇās tāny upabhuñjanti pravarāṇāṃ mahātmanām / HV_App.I,29.420 /
GE07hv_apppu:7180: pārijātād bahuguṇaṃ phalaṃ teṣāṃ tathā dhanam / HV_App.I,29.422 /
GE07hv_apppu:7181: abhimānaṃ prabhā caiva guṇā bhūriguṇās tathā // HV_App.I,29.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:7182: mūrtimantaś ca te vṛkṣāḥ somaṃ devaṃ vṛṣadhvajam / HV_App.I,29.424 /
GE07hv_apppu:7183: upatiṣṭhanti satataṃ pravaraiḥ saha keśava // HV_App.I,29.425 //
GE07hv_apppu:7184: raudreṇa tejasā juṣṭā hīnā duḥkhaiḥ sukhānvitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.426 /
GE07hv_apppu:7185: taravo mandare te hi dayitāḥ śailakanyayā // HV_App.I,29.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:7186: praviveśāndhako nāma ghoras tatra mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:7189: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ vṛtrād daśaguṇaṃ balī // HV_App.I,29.431 //
GE07hv_apppu:7190: evaṃ duḥkhena te deva pārijātaṃ pradāsyati / HV_App.I,29.432 /
GE07hv_apppu:7191: puṣkarākṣa sahasrākṣaḥ satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29.433 //
GE07hv_apppu:7192: satataṃ sahito devyā śacyā sa hi varadrumaḥ / HV_App.I,29.434 /
GE07hv_apppu:7195: mune tad yujyate sādhu mahādevena dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29.436 /
GE07hv_apppu:7196: yac chacīṃ kāraṇaṃ kṛtvā na nītaḥ sa taruḥ purā // HV_App.I,29.437 //
GE07hv_apppu:7197: sa jyeṣṭhaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ lokakṛt prabhavo 'vyayaḥ / HV_App.I,29.438 /
GE07hv_apppu:7198: pārāvaryasya sadṛśaṃ kṛtavān iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,29.439 //
GE07hv_apppu:7199: ahaṃ yavīyān devasya sarvathā balaghātinaḥ / HV_App.I,29.440 /
GE07hv_apppu:7200: lālanīyaś ca bhagavañ jayanta iva sattama // HV_App.I,29.441 //
GE07hv_apppu:7201: sarvathā bhagavāṃs tāvad upāyair bahuvistaraiḥ / HV_App.I,29.442 /
GE07hv_apppu:7202: karotu yatnaṃ prītyarthaṃ śakto hy asi tapodhana // HV_App.I,29.443 //
GE07hv_apppu:7203: mayā mune pratijñātaṃ puṇyārthaṃ satyabhāmayā / HV_App.I,29.444 /
GE07hv_apppu:7204: svargād ihānayiṣyāmi pārijātam iti prabho // HV_App.I,29.445 //
GE07hv_apppu:7205: mayā tad anṛtaṃ śakyaṃ kathaṃ kartuṃ tapodhana / HV_App.I,29.446 /
GE07hv_apppu:7206: nānṛtaṃ hi vaco vipra proktapūrvaṃ mayānagha / HV_App.I,29.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:7207: mayi bhagnapratijñe hi lokānāṃ saṃplavo bhavet // HV_App.I,29.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:7208: yan mayā hi muniśreṣṭha lokā dharmaguṇānvitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:7209: paripālyāḥ sthitau sarve sa kathaṃ hy anṛtaṃ vadet // HV_App.I,29.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:7211: na cāsurā naiva ca yakṣapannagāḥ | HV_App.I,29.452 |
GE07hv_apppu:7214: naiva yakṣapiśācāś ca na ca sarve 'pi pannagāḥ // **HV_App.I,29.452**14:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:7217: sa pārijātaṃ yadi na pradāsyati @ HV_App.I,29.455 @
GE07hv_apppu:7224: tvayāpi kāryaḥ khalu tatra niścayaḥ || HV_App.I,29.462 ||
GE07hv_apppu:7227: nārado 'tha munir gatvā mahendrasadanaṃ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.463 /
GE07hv_apppu:7228: tāṃ rātrim avasat tatra dadṛśe ca mahotsavam // HV_App.I,29.464 //
GE07hv_apppu:7229: tatrādityā mahātmāno vasavaś ca surottamāḥ / HV_App.I,29.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:7230: rājarṣayaś ca vidvāṃsaḥ svargatāḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:7231: nāgā yakṣāś ca siddhāś ca cāraṇāś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29.467 /
GE07hv_apppu:7232: brahmarṣayaś ca śataśo devarṣimanavas tathā // HV_App.I,29.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:7233: suparṇāś ca mahātmāno marutaś ca mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,29.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:7234: divaukasāṃ nikāyāś ca śataśo 'nye samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,29.470 //
GE07hv_apppu:7235: upary upari sarveṣāṃ somo devo maheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29.471 /
GE07hv_apppu:7236: tasthāv amitavikrāntaḥ svair gaṇaiḥ parivāritaḥ // HV_App.I,29.472 //
GE07hv_apppu:7238: kalpāntarasahasreṣu kṣayo yeṣāṃ na vidyate // HV_App.I,29.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:7239: yān arcayanti satataṃ devā deveśvaropamāḥ / HV_App.I,29.475 /
GE07hv_apppu:7240: ātmajñā nāvalepāndhā ye ca dharmapathe sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,29.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:7241: rudrāś ca kāśyapā devam adhyupāsanta bhārata / HV_App.I,29.477 /
GE07hv_apppu:7242: skandaś ca bhagavān raudrir gaṅgā ca saritāṃ varā // HV_App.I,29.478 //
GE07hv_apppu:7243: arciṣmāṃs tumburuś caiva bhāriś ca vadatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29.479 /
GE07hv_apppu:7244: netāro devadevānām ete hi tapasānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,29.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:7246: dharmanityās taponityāḥ satāṃ mārgam upāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,29.482 //
GE07hv_apppu:7247: ye tv ime mānuṣā devān arcayanti śubhārthinaḥ / HV_App.I,29.483 /
GE07hv_apppu:7248: tān arcayanti hy amarās tathā rājañ śubhārthinaḥ // HV_App.I,29.484 //
GE07hv_apppu:7249: pitṛkṛtyeṣu devānāṃ saṃnyāsaṃ ye tv anuṣṭhitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.485 /
GE07hv_apppu:7251: gandharvādhipatiḥ śrīmāṃs tatra citraratho nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.487 /
GE07hv_apppu:7252: saputro vādayām āsa devavādyāni hṛṣṭavat / HV_App.I,29.488 /
GE07hv_apppu:7253: ūrṇāyuś citrasenaś ca hāhā hūhūs tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29.489 /
GE07hv_apppu:7254: ḍambaras tumburuś caiva jagur anye ca tadgaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,29.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:7255: urvaśī pūrvacittiś ca hemā rambhā ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29.491 /
GE07hv_apppu:7256: hemadantā ghṛtācī ca sahajanyā tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29.492 //
GE07hv_apppu:7257: jujoṣa bhagavān devas tadupasthānam ātmavān / HV_App.I,29.493 /
GE07hv_apppu:7258: vṛttena tuṣṭaḥ śakrasya jagāma jagataḥ patiḥ / HV_App.I,29.494 /
GE07hv_apppu:7259: gate bhūtapatau sarve nṛpā jagmur yathāgatam / HV_App.I,29.495 /
GE07hv_apppu:7260: mahendreṇārcitā devāḥ svān eva nilayān gatāḥ // HV_App.I,29.496 //
GE07hv_apppu:7261: tataḥ sarveṣu yāteṣu sukhāsīnaṃ puraṃdaram / HV_App.I,29.497 /
GE07hv_apppu:7262: sadasyaiḥ svaiḥ sahāsīnaṃ nārado 'bhyāyayau muniḥ // HV_App.I,29.498 //
GE07hv_apppu:7263: tam indraḥ pūjayām āsa samutthāya tapodhanam / HV_App.I,29.499 /
GE07hv_apppu:7264: dideśa kuśagarbhaṃ ca pīṭham ātmāsanopamam // HV_App.I,29.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:7265: nārado 'tha mahātejā mahendram idam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.501 /
GE07hv_apppu:7267: kiṃcit kāryaṃ puraskṛtya preṣito 'smi mahātmanā / HV_App.I,29.503 /
GE07hv_apppu:7269: prītivākyāni hṛdyāni prayujya munaye tadā / HV_App.I,29.505 /
GE07hv_apppu:7270: tataḥ prahṛṣṭo bhagavān abravīt pākaśāsanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:7271: kim āha puruṣaśreṣṭhaḥ śīghram ācakṣva me mune / HV_App.I,29.507 /
GE07hv_apppu:7272: cirasya khalu kṛṣṇena saṃsmṛtāḥ sma mahātmanā / HV_App.I,29.508 /
GE07hv_apppu:7273: priyavākyāni hṛdyāni brūhi dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29.509 //
GE07hv_apppu:7275: mahendrendrānujaṃ draṣṭuṃ gato 'haṃ bhrātaraṃ tava / HV_App.I,29.510 /
GE07hv_apppu:7277: taṃ tu raivatake 'drākṣaṃ tadāsīnam ariṃdamam / HV_App.I,29.512 /
GE07hv_apppu:7278: rukmiṇyā sahitaṃ vīram umayeva vṛṣadhvajam // HV_App.I,29.513 //
GE07hv_apppu:7279: pārijātataroḥ puṣpaṃ tasya dattaṃ mayānagha / HV_App.I,29.514 /
GE07hv_apppu:7281: tad dṛṣṭvā tasya patnyas tu vismayaṃ paramaṃ yayuḥ / HV_App.I,29.516 /
GE07hv_apppu:7283: guṇās tāsāṃ mayākhyātās tasya puṣpasya mānada / HV_App.I,29.518 /
GE07hv_apppu:7285: adityā kaśyapo dattaḥ puṇyārthaṃ ca yathā mama / HV_App.I,29.520 /
GE07hv_apppu:7286: puṣpadāmnā veṣṭayitvā kaṇṭhe puṇyārtham ātmavān // HV_App.I,29.521 //
GE07hv_apppu:7287: tvaṃ ca datto yathā śacyā devāś cānye sureśvara / HV_App.I,29.522 /
GE07hv_apppu:7288: niṣkrayaś ca yathā dattaḥ kaśyapādyair mahātmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,29.523 //
GE07hv_apppu:7289: tac chrutvā tasya patny ekā satyabhāmeti viśrutā / HV_App.I,29.524 /
GE07hv_apppu:7290: puṇyakārthaṃ manaś cakre dayitā te yavīyasaḥ // HV_App.I,29.525 //
GE07hv_apppu:7291: tayā cābhyarthito bhartā devyā devagaṇeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29.526 /
GE07hv_apppu:7292: pratijajñe sa dharmātmā yavīyāṃs tava mānada // HV_App.I,29.527 //
GE07hv_apppu:7293: tato mām uktavān vīro viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29.528 /
GE07hv_apppu:7294: yathāvat suramukhyeśa bruvataḥ śṛṇu bhāvana // HV_App.I,29.529 //
GE07hv_apppu:7300: paśyantv amarakalyāṇaṃ matprabhāvāc ca mānuṣāḥ // HV_App.I,29.535 //
GE07hv_apppu:7303: nāradaṃ vadatāṃ śreṣṭham idaṃ vākyam athābravīt // HV_App.I,29.537 //
GE07hv_apppu:7304: bhajāsanaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha śrutam uktaṃ tvayā dvija / HV_App.I,29.538 /
GE07hv_apppu:7306: āsīne nārade śakro labdhānujño 'tha nāradāt / HV_App.I,29.540 /
GE07hv_apppu:7307: svam āsanaṃ tato bheje tasyaiva sadṛśaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:7309: nirīkṣya svabalaṃ vīryaṃ pārṣadaṃ vṛtranāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.543 //
GE07hv_apppu:7310: maharṣe kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭvā vaktavyas te janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.544 /
GE07hv_apppu:7312: madanantaram īśas tvaṃ jagato nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,29.546 /
GE07hv_apppu:7313: tvadīyaḥ pārijātaś ca ratnāny anyāni cācyuta // HV_App.I,29.547 //
GE07hv_apppu:7314: tvaṃ tu bhārāvataraṇaṃ kartuṃ deva mahīṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29.548 /
GE07hv_apppu:7316: tvaṃ tu bhārāvatārāya mahyā deva bhuvaṃ gataḥ / **HV_App.I,29.548**15:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7318: tvayi tīrṇapratijñe hi punaḥ prāpte triviṣṭapam / HV_App.I,29.550 /
GE07hv_apppu:7319: pūrayiṣyāmi vadhvās te iṣṭān kāmān adhokṣaja // HV_App.I,29.551 //
GE07hv_apppu:7320: svargīyāṇi na ratnāni nayitavyāni keśava / HV_App.I,29.552 /
GE07hv_apppu:7321: svalpārthe mānuṣaṃ lokam iti pūrvakṛtā sthitiḥ // HV_App.I,29.553 //
GE07hv_apppu:7322: utkramya hi sthitiṃ daivīṃ pravartāmi mahābala / HV_App.I,29.554 /
GE07hv_apppu:7323: yady ahaṃ kiṃ pravakṣyanti prajāpatigaṇāḥ prabho // HV_App.I,29.555 //
GE07hv_apppu:7325: niyamāḥ sarvakṛtyānāṃ sthāpitā jagato dhruvāḥ // HV_App.I,29.557 //
GE07hv_apppu:7326: prajāpatikṛtaṃ mārgam apāsya vrajato mama / HV_App.I,29.558 /
GE07hv_apppu:7327: śrutvā prajāpatir dhīmāñ śāpam apy utsṛjet prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29.559 //
GE07hv_apppu:7329: bhetsyanty aśaṅkitā daityā daityapakṣās tathāpare // HV_App.I,29.561 //
GE07hv_apppu:7330: strīnimittam ito nīte pārijāte drumeśvare / HV_App.I,29.562 /
GE07hv_apppu:7331: svargaukaso bhaviṣyanti vimanaskāś ca mānada // HV_App.I,29.563 //
GE07hv_apppu:7332: upabhogā manuṣyāṇāṃ vihitā ye svayaṃbhuvā / HV_App.I,29.564 /

GE07hv_apppu:7836: muditamanāḥ svam atho gṛhaṃ jagāma || HV_App.I,29.1027 ||
GE07hv_apppu:7839: atha viṣṇur mahātejā muhūrtābhyudite ravau / HV_App.I,29.1028 /
GE07hv_apppu:7843: raivataṃ ca giriṃ devo gatvā dārukam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.1032 /
GE07hv_apppu:7844: madīyaṃ ratham etaṃ taṃ tvaṃ gṛhītvehaiva dāruka // HV_App.I,29.1033 //
GE07hv_apppu:7845: pratipālaya māṃ saumya dinārdhaṃ cārayan harīn / HV_App.I,29.1034 /
GE07hv_apppu:7847: iti saṃdiśya bhagavān āruroha jayodyataḥ / HV_App.I,29.1036 /
GE07hv_apppu:7849: pṛthag rathena kauravya pradyumnaḥ śatrusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1038 /
GE07hv_apppu:7850: ākāśagāminā rājan pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛṣṇam anviyāt // HV_App.I,29.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:7853: dadarśa yatra bhagavān devayodhān durāsadān / HV_App.I,29.1042 /
GE07hv_apppu:7855: teṣāṃ saṃpaśyatām eva pārijātaṃ mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1044 //
GE07hv_apppu:7856: utpāṭyārpayām āsa pārijātaṃ sātāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29.1045 //
GE07hv_apppu:7858: upasthito vigrahavān pārijātaś ca keśavam // HV_App.I,29.1047 //
GE07hv_apppu:7859: sāntvito vāsudevena pārijātaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1048 /
GE07hv_apppu:7860: uktaś ca vṛkṣa mā bhais tvaṃ keśavena mahātmanā // HV_App.I,29.1049 //
GE07hv_apppu:7861: taṃ prasthitaṃ taruṃ dṛṣṭvā pārijātam adhokṣajaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1050 /
GE07hv_apppu:7862: amarāvatīṃ purīṃ śreṣṭhāṃ tataś cakre pradakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,29.1051 //
GE07hv_apppu:7863: te tu nandanagoptāraḥ pārijātaṃ drumottamam / HV_App.I,29.1052 /
GE07hv_apppu:7864: hriyateti mahendrāya gatvā nṛpa śaśaṃsire // HV_App.I,29.1053 //
GE07hv_apppu:7867: pūrvam abhyāgataṃ dvāraṃ keśavaṃ śatrusūdanam / HV_App.I,29.1056 /
GE07hv_apppu:7870: hāhākāro mahān āsīd dhruvaṃ yat tridivaukasām // **HV_App.I,29.1056**29:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:7871: dṛṣṭvovāca pravṛttaṃ bhoḥ kim idaṃ madhusūdana // HV_App.I,29.1057 //
GE07hv_apppu:7872: praṇamya garuḍastho 'tha keśavaḥ śakram abravīt / HV_App.I,29.1058 /
GE07hv_apppu:7873: vadhvās te puṇyakārthāya nīyate 'yaṃ varadrumaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1059 //
GE07hv_apppu:7874: tam uvāca tataḥ śakro mā maivaṃ puṣkarekṣaṇa / HV_App.I,29.1060 /
GE07hv_apppu:7875: ayodhayitvā na tarur nayitavyas tvayācyuta // HV_App.I,29.1061 //
GE07hv_apppu:7877: praharasva mahābāho prathamaṃ mayi keśava / HV_App.I,29.1062 /
GE07hv_apppu:7878: pratijñā saphalā te 'stu muktvā kaumodakīm api // HV_App.I,29.1063 //
GE07hv_apppu:7879: tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ śarais tīkṣṇair devarājagajottamam / HV_App.I,29.1064 /
GE07hv_apppu:7881: vivyādha garuḍaṃ vajrī divyaiḥ śaravarais tathā / HV_App.I,29.1066 /
GE07hv_apppu:7882: bāṇāṃś ca cchedayām āsa keśavasya tarasvinaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1067 //
GE07hv_apppu:7883: yān yān mumoca devendras tāṃs tāṃś ciccheda mādhavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1068 /
GE07hv_apppu:7884: mādhavena prayuktāṃś ca ciccheda balavṛtrahā // HV_App.I,29.1069 //
GE07hv_apppu:7885: mahendrasya ca śabdena dhanuṣaḥ kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1070 /
GE07hv_apppu:7886: śārṅgasya ca ninādena mumuhuḥ svargavāsinaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1071 //
GE07hv_apppu:7887: tayor vartati saṃgrāme garuḍasthaṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1072 /
GE07hv_apppu:7888: pārijātaṃ jayanto 'tha hartum abhyudito balī // HV_App.I,29.1073 //
GE07hv_apppu:7889: pradyumnam atha kaṃsaghno vārayeti tam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.1074 /
GE07hv_apppu:7890: tatas taṃ vārayām āsa raukmiṇeyaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,29.1075 //
GE07hv_apppu:7891: jayanto jayatāṃ śreṣṭho raukmiṇeyam atheṣubhiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1076 /
GE07hv_apppu:7892: sarvagātreṣu vihasann ājaghāna rathe sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1077 //
GE07hv_apppu:7893: rathastha eva rathinaṃ kāmas tu kamalekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1078 /
GE07hv_apppu:7894: aindrim abhyardayām āsa bāṇair āśīviṣopamaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.1079 //
GE07hv_apppu:7895: sa saṃnipātas tumulo babhūva kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1080 /
GE07hv_apppu:7897: tatas taṃ vārayām āsa jayantaḥ sarvavīrahā / **HV_App.I,29.1080**30:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7898: jayantasya ca vīrasya raukmiṇeyasya cobhayoḥ // HV_App.I,29.1081 //
GE07hv_apppu:7899: kṛtapratikṛtaṃ yuddhe cakratus tau mahābalau / HV_App.I,29.1082 /
GE07hv_apppu:7901: devāś ca munayaś caiva dadṛśur vismayānvitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.1084 /
GE07hv_apppu:7902: taṃ saṃgrāmaṃ mahāghoraṃ siddhāś caiva sacāraṇāḥ // HV_App.I,29.1085 //
GE07hv_apppu:7903: tatas tu pravaro nāma devadūto mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1086 /
GE07hv_apppu:7904: pārijātaṃ punar hartum iyeṣa kurunandana // HV_App.I,29.1087 //
GE07hv_apppu:7905: sakhā sa devarājasya mahāstravid ariṃdamaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1088 /
GE07hv_apppu:7907: brāhmaṇas tapasā siddho jambudvīpād divaṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29.1090 /
GE07hv_apppu:7908: svaśaktyā nṛpa saṃyātaḥ sakhitvaṃ balaghātinaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1091 //
GE07hv_apppu:7909: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya kṛṣṇaḥ sātyakim abravīt / HV_App.I,29.1092 /
GE07hv_apppu:7910: rathastha eva pravaraṃ śarair vāraya sātyake // HV_App.I,29.1093 //
GE07hv_apppu:7911: na tv eva nirdayaṃ bāṇā moktavyāḥ sātyake tvayā / HV_App.I,29.1094 /
GE07hv_apppu:7912: asya brāhmaṇacāpalyaṃ soḍhavyaṃ khalu sarvathā // HV_App.I,29.1095 //
GE07hv_apppu:7913: tataḥ ṣaṣṭyā tatheṣūṇāṃ garuḍasthaṃ dvijas tadā / HV_App.I,29.1096 /
GE07hv_apppu:7914: ājaghāna mahābāho sātyakiṃ pravaro bhṛśam // HV_App.I,29.1097 //
GE07hv_apppu:7915: śiner naptā tatas tasya kṣipataḥ sāyakān nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.1098 /
GE07hv_apppu:7916: ciccheda puruṣavyāghro vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // HV_App.I,29.1099 //
GE07hv_apppu:7917: brāhmaṇo nābhihantavyas tiṣṭha vipra svavartmani / HV_App.I,29.1100 /
GE07hv_apppu:7918: avadhyā yādavānāṃ hi svaparādhe 'pi hi dvijāḥ // HV_App.I,29.1101 //
GE07hv_apppu:7919: pravaras tu prahasyainam uvāca kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1102 /
GE07hv_apppu:7920: alaṃ kṣāntyā nṛṇāṃ śūra yudhya sarvātmanā raṇe // HV_App.I,29.1103 //
GE07hv_apppu:7921: jāmadagnyasya rāmasya śiṣyo 'ham api yādava / HV_App.I,29.1104 /
GE07hv_apppu:7922: nāmataḥ pravaro nāma sakhā śakrasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29.1105 //
GE07hv_apppu:7923: na devā yoddhum icchanti manyanto madhusūdana / HV_App.I,29.1106 /
GE07hv_apppu:7924: ānṛṇyaṃ sauhrdasyāham adya gantāsmi mādhava // HV_App.I,29.1107 //
GE07hv_apppu:7925: tatas tayos tadā raudraḥ saṃgrāmo vavṛdhe nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.1108 /
GE07hv_apppu:7927: dyauś cacāla tadā rājan dyucarāś ca sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1110 /
GE07hv_apppu:7928: tasmin vartati saṃgrāme teṣām atimahātmanām // HV_App.I,29.1111 //
GE07hv_apppu:7929: nātiśiṣye raṇe kārṣṇir aindram astrabhṛtāṃ varaṃ / HV_App.I,29.1112 /
GE07hv_apppu:7930: aindriḥ kārṣṇiṃ mahātmānaṃ māyinaṃ śūrasaṃmatam // HV_App.I,29.1113 //
GE07hv_apppu:7931: hanta gṛhṇa pratīccheti tāv ubhau yodhasattamau / HV_App.I,29.1114 /
GE07hv_apppu:7932: [k: T1-3 G1.3-5 M4 subst. for line 1114 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:7933: tau tu bāṇān pratīcchantāv ubhau bharatasattama / **HV_App.I,29.1114**31:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:7937: so 'straṃ tad atidīpyantam āpatantaṃ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1118 /
GE07hv_apppu:7938: tastambhe bāṇajālena tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,29.1119 //
GE07hv_apppu:7939: tatas tad dīpyamānaṃ tu papāta raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,29.1120 /
GE07hv_apppu:7941: tenāstreṇa ratho dagdhaḥ pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1122 /
GE07hv_apppu:7942: nādahat tat tu ghoraṃ taṃ raukmiṇeyaṃ janādhipa // HV_App.I,29.1123 //
GE07hv_apppu:7943: dahaty agniṃ na khalv agnir uddhato 'pi viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29.1124 /
GE07hv_apppu:7945: atha nārāyaṇasuto viratho rathināṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1126 /
GE07hv_apppu:7946: sthito dhanuṣmān ākāśe jayantam idam abravīt // HV_App.I,29.1127 //
GE07hv_apppu:7947: mahendraputra divyaṃ tvaṃ yad astraṃ muktavān asi / HV_App.I,29.1128 /
GE07hv_apppu:7948: nāham idṛśarūpāṇāṃ śakyo hantuṃ śatair api // HV_App.I,29.1129 //
GE07hv_apppu:7949: prayatnaṃ kuru śikṣāyāṃ yatnaṃ me 'dya pradarśaya / HV_App.I,29.1130 /
GE07hv_apppu:7951: āsīn me sādhvasaṃ dṛṣṭvā rathasthaṃ tvāṃ dhṛtāyudham / HV_App.I,29.1132 /
GE07hv_apppu:7952: bibhemi tava nedānīṃ yuddhe dṛṣṭabalābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1133 //
GE07hv_apppu:7953: manasā smaryatām eṣa pārijātas tvayā taruḥ / HV_App.I,29.1134 /
GE07hv_apppu:7954: śakyaṃ na khalu hastābhyāṃ spraṣṭavyo yas tvayā hy asau // HV_App.I,29.1135 //
GE07hv_apppu:7955: ratho māyāmayo dagdhas tvayā yo hy astratejasā / HV_App.I,29.1136 /
GE07hv_apppu:7956: īdṛśāṇāṃ sahasrāṇi sraṣṭuṃ śakto 'smi māyayā / HV_App.I,29.1137 /
GE07hv_apppu:7957: evam ukto jayantaś ca mumocāstraṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1138 /
GE07hv_apppu:7959: tat pradyumno mahāvegaṃ śarajālair avārayat / HV_App.I,29.1140 /
GE07hv_apppu:7960: catvāry astrāṇi divyāni mumocaivāparāṇi saḥ // HV_App.I,29.1141 //
GE07hv_apppu:7961: dikṣu sarvāsu rurudhus tany astrāṇy atha bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1142 /
GE07hv_apppu:7962: raukmiṇeyaṃ mahātmānam antarikṣe ca pañcamam // HV_App.I,29.1143 //
GE07hv_apppu:7964: mumoca tāni ghorāṇi pradyumnaṃ prati sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,29.1145 //
GE07hv_apppu:7965: tāni sarvāṇi bāṇaughaiḥ kārṣṇir astrāṇy avārayat / HV_App.I,29.1146 /
GE07hv_apppu:7966: jayantaṃ cāparair bāṇair vivyādha niśitais tadā // HV_App.I,29.1147 //
GE07hv_apppu:7967: tato nādaḥ samutsṛṣṭo dyucaraiḥ puṇyakarmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1148 /
GE07hv_apppu:7968: dṛṣṭvā sthairyaṃ ca śaighryaṃ ca pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1149 //
GE07hv_apppu:7971: cicchedeṣvasanaṃ vīro hastāvāpaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29.1151 //
GE07hv_apppu:7972: tato 'nyat sa tu jagrāha mahat tad dhanur uttamam / HV_App.I,29.1152 /
GE07hv_apppu:7974: sa tena vīro mahatā dhanuṣā viprasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1154 /
GE07hv_apppu:7975: śarān mumoca viśikhān arkaraśminibhāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,29.1155 //
GE07hv_apppu:7976: cakarta ca dhanuś citraṃ śaineyasyāmitaujasaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1156 /
GE07hv_apppu:7977: vivyādha sarvagātreṣu bāṇair api ca sātyakim // HV_App.I,29.1157 //
GE07hv_apppu:7978: dhanur ādāya śaineyas tato 'nyat kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1158 /
GE07hv_apppu:7979: dṛḍhaṃ bhārasahaṃ dhīmān vivyādha pravaraṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,29.1159 //
GE07hv_apppu:7980: uccakartatur anyonyaṃ varmaṇī tau śitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1160 /
GE07hv_apppu:7981: gātrebhyaś caiva māṃsāni marmabhidbhiḥ śarottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,29.1161 //
GE07hv_apppu:7983: ciccheda pravaro vīras tribhiś cainam atāḍayat // HV_App.I,29.1163 //
GE07hv_apppu:7984: [k: misprint vīs tribhiś for vīras tribhiś :k]
GE07hv_apppu:7985: anyad iṣvasanaṃ taṃ tu grahītumanasaṃ dvijaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1164 /
GE07hv_apppu:7986: gadayā tāḍayām āsa kṣiptayā laghuhastavat // HV_App.I,29.1165 //
GE07hv_apppu:7987: so 'siṃ carma ca jagrāha sātyakiḥ prahasann iva / HV_App.I,29.1166 /
GE07hv_apppu:7988: na jagrāha dhanur dhīmān gadayābhihato bhṛśam / HV_App.I,29.1167 /
GE07hv_apppu:7989: tataḥ śaraśatāny eva mumoca pravaras tadā // HV_App.I,29.1168 //
GE07hv_apppu:7990: vihastam iva vijñāya sātyakiṃ yadunandanam / HV_App.I,29.1169 /
GE07hv_apppu:7992: tasya ciccheda bhallena nistriṃśaṃ pravaras tadā / HV_App.I,29.1171 /
GE07hv_apppu:7993: tsarudeśe 'pātayac ca pravaraḥ prahasann iva // HV_App.I,29.1172 //
GE07hv_apppu:7994: vyadhamac ca tathā carma śitair bāṇair ajihmagaiḥ / HV_App.I,29.1173 /
GE07hv_apppu:7995: ājaghāna ca śaktyainaṃ hṛdi vipro nanāda ca // HV_App.I,29.1174 //
GE07hv_apppu:7996: taṃ viklavam iva jñātvā pārijātajihīrṣayā / HV_App.I,29.1175 /
GE07hv_apppu:7997: tārkṣyābhyāśe rathenaiva sa tasthau pravaras tadā // HV_App.I,29.1176 //
GE07hv_apppu:7998: taṃ pakṣapuṭavegena cikṣepa garuḍas tadā / HV_App.I,29.1177 /
GE07hv_apppu:7999: gavyūtim ekaṃ sarathaḥ sa papāta mumoha ca // HV_App.I,29.1178 //
GE07hv_apppu:8000: taṃ jayanto nipatyātha patitaṃ brāhmaṇaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29.1179 /
GE07hv_apppu:8001: samāśvāsya rathaṃ śīghraṃ samāropitavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,29.1180 //
GE07hv_apppu:8002: śaineyam api muhyantaṃ patantaṃ ca muhur muhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.1181 /
GE07hv_apppu:8004: taṃ hi pasparśa hastena savyena madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1183 /
GE07hv_apppu:8006: pradyumno dakṣiṇe pārśve vāme tu śinipuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1185 /
GE07hv_apppu:8008: jayantaḥ pravaraś caiva rathenaikena bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1187 /
GE07hv_apppu:8011: balavān eṣa patatāṃ rājā ca vinatāsutaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1190 //
GE07hv_apppu:8012: dakṣiṇe caiva savye ca pārśve mama dhṛtāyudhau / HV_App.I,29.1191 /
GE07hv_apppu:8014: ubhau sthitau yudhyamānaṃ mām eveha prapaśyatam // HV_App.I,29.1192 //
GE07hv_apppu:8015: evam uktau sthitau vīrau tataḥ śakrasya pārśvayoḥ / HV_App.I,29.1193 /
GE07hv_apppu:8019: varuṇo dharmarājas tu dharmado bahubhir vṛtaḥ / **HV_App.I,29.1195**32:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8020: kṛṣṇaṃ ca yodhayām āsa divyāstraiś ca narādhipa // **HV_App.I,29.1195**32:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:8021: sarve devā mahendreṇa kṛṣṇaṃ matvā tu mānuṣam / **HV_App.I,29.1195**32:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:8022: yāvanta eva te devā dadṛśus taṃ tam antike // **HV_App.I,29.1195**32:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8024: sa tān bāṇān agaṇayan vainateyaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,29.1197 /
GE07hv_apppu:8027: ubhau tau sahasā rājan balinau gajapakṣiṇau / HV_App.I,29.1199 /
GE07hv_apppu:8029: radanaiḥ pannagaripuṃ kareṇa śirasā tadā / HV_App.I,29.1201 /
GE07hv_apppu:8030: airāvato gajapatir ājaghāna nadaṃs tadā // HV_App.I,29.1202 //
GE07hv_apppu:8031: tathā nakhāṅkuśais tīkṣṇair vainateyo balotkaṭaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1203 /
GE07hv_apppu:8032: tathā pakṣanipātaiś ca śakranāgaṃ jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,29.1204 //
GE07hv_apppu:8033: muhūrtaṃ sumahān āsīt saṃpāto gajapakṣiṇoḥ / HV_App.I,29.1205 /
GE07hv_apppu:8035: mūrdhny athairāvataṃ tārkṣyas tāḍayām āsa bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1207 /
GE07hv_apppu:8039: patantam api taṃ śakro na mumoca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1211 /
GE07hv_apppu:8040: kāruṇyād atha sauhārdāt pūrvābhyupagamād api // HV_App.I,29.1212 //
GE07hv_apppu:8041: kṛṣṇo 'py anvagamac cainaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ prabhavāvyayaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1213 /
GE07hv_apppu:8043: sa tasthau parvataśreṣṭhe pāriyātre tu vṛtrahā // HV_App.I,29.1215 //
GE07hv_apppu:8044: airāvate samāśvaste saṃgrāmo vavṛdhe punaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1216 /
GE07hv_apppu:8047: tato vajrāyudho vajram āśaniṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1219 /
GE07hv_apppu:8048: mumoca garuḍe rājann airāvaṇaripau nṛpa // HV_App.I,29.1220 //
GE07hv_apppu:8049: vajrāśaninipātāṃs tān sehe śakrasya nāgahā / HV_App.I,29.1221 /
GE07hv_apppu:8050: avadhyo balināṃ śreṣṭho nisargeṇa tapobalāt // HV_App.I,29.1222 //

GE07hv_apppu:8279: yatra devagaṇāḥ sarve sametā dharmacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1437 //
GE07hv_apppu:8280: tato yayur vimānair tu devāḥ sarve triviṣṭapam / HV_App.I,29.1438 /
GE07hv_apppu:8281: ṛddhyā paramayā yuktās teṣām evānurūpayā // HV_App.I,29.1439 //
GE07hv_apppu:8282: kaśyapaś cāditiś caiva tathā śakrajanārdanau / HV_App.I,29.1440 /
GE07hv_apppu:8283: vimānam ekam āruhya gatā rājaṃs triviṣṭapam // HV_App.I,29.1441 //
GE07hv_apppu:8284: te śakrasadanaṃ prāptā ramyaṃ sarvaguṇānvitam / HV_App.I,29.1442 /
GE07hv_apppu:8285: ūṣur ekatra kauravya muditā dharmacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1443 //
GE07hv_apppu:8286: śacī tu kaśyapaṃ patnyā sahitaṃ dharmavatsalā / HV_App.I,29.1444 /
GE07hv_apppu:8288: tatas tasyāṃ prabhātāyāṃ rajanyām abravīd dharim / HV_App.I,29.1446 /
GE07hv_apppu:8290: upendra dvārakaṃ gaccha pārijātaṃ nayasva ca / HV_App.I,29.1448 /
GE07hv_apppu:8292: puṇyake satyayā prāpte punar eṣa tvayā taruḥ / HV_App.I,29.1450 /
GE07hv_apppu:8293: nandane puruṣaśreṣṭha sthāpyaḥ sthāne yathocite // HV_App.I,29.1451 //
GE07hv_apppu:8294: evam astv iti kṛṣṇena devamātā yaśasvinī / HV_App.I,29.1452 /
GE07hv_apppu:8295: uktā dharmaguṇair yuktā yādavena mahātmanā // HV_App.I,29.1453 //
GE07hv_apppu:8296: tato 'bhivādya pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1454 /
GE07hv_apppu:8297: mahendraṃ saha śacyā ca pratasthe dvārakāṃ prati // HV_App.I,29.1455 //
GE07hv_apppu:8298: dadau kṛṣṇāya paulomī niyogāt kurunandana / HV_App.I,29.1456 /
GE07hv_apppu:8299: sarvāsām eva kṛṣṇasya bhāryāṇāṃ dharmacāriṇī // HV_App.I,29.1457 //
GE07hv_apppu:8300: divyānāṃ sarvaratnānāṃ vāsasāṃ ca manasvinī / HV_App.I,29.1458 /
GE07hv_apppu:8302: bhāryāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi yāni ṣodaśa mādhave / HV_App.I,29.1460 /
GE07hv_apppu:8304: tāni saṃbhāvayethās tvaṃ vastrair ābharaṇais tathā / **HV_App.I,29.1460**37:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8305: pratigṛhya mahātejāḥ prayayau dvārakāṃ prati // HV_App.I,29.1461 //
GE07hv_apppu:8307: sasātyakiḥ saputraś ca prāpto raivatakaṃ girim // HV_App.I,29.1463 //
GE07hv_apppu:8308: sa tatra sthāpayitvā ca pārijātaṃ varadrumam / HV_App.I,29.1464 /
GE07hv_apppu:8309: sātyakiṃ preṣayām āsa dvārakāṃ dvāramālimīm // HV_App.I,29.1465 //
GE07hv_apppu:8313: adya dvāravatīṃ caiva pārijātaṃ mahādrumam / HV_App.I,29.1468 /
GE07hv_apppu:8314: praveśayiṣye nagare śobhā prakriyatāṃ śubhā // HV_App.I,29.1469 //
GE07hv_apppu:8315: ity uktaḥ satyako gatvā tathoktvā punar āgataḥ / HV_App.I,29.1470 /
GE07hv_apppu:8316: kumārair nāgaraiḥ sārdhaṃ sāmbaprabhṛtibhiḥ prabho // HV_App.I,29.1471 //
GE07hv_apppu:8317: tato 'grataḥ pārijātam āropya garuḍe tadā / HV_App.I,29.1472 /
GE07hv_apppu:8318: pradyumno dvārakāṃ ramyāṃ viveśa rathināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1473 //
GE07hv_apppu:8320: tasyānu rathamukhyena satyakaḥ sāmba eva ca // HV_App.I,29.1475 //
GE07hv_apppu:8321: ye tv anye nṛpa vārṣṇeyā yānair bahuvidhais tathā / HV_App.I,29.1476 /
GE07hv_apppu:8322: yayuḥ prahṛṣṭās tat karma pūjayanto mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1477 //
GE07hv_apppu:8323: satyakād vistaraṃ śrutvā yādavā nāgarās tathā / HV_App.I,29.1478 /
GE07hv_apppu:8324: vismayaṃ paramaṃ jagmur aprameyasya karmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1479 //
GE07hv_apppu:8326: rājan na tatṛpur hṛṣṭāḥ paśyamānā mahodayam // HV_App.I,29.1481 //
GE07hv_apppu:8327: tam adbhutam acintyaṃ ca madakelikilāṇḍajam / HV_App.I,29.1482 /
GE07hv_apppu:8328: vṛkṣottamaṃ paśyatāṃ vai vṛddhānām agamaj jarā // HV_App.I,29.1483 //
GE07hv_apppu:8329: ye tv andhacakṣuṣaḥ sarve te 'bhavan divyacakṣuṣaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1484 /
GE07hv_apppu:8330: virogā rogiṇaś cāsan ghrātvā gandhaṃ vanaspateḥ // HV_App.I,29.1485 //
GE07hv_apppu:8332: babhūvur hṛṣṭamanaso vavanduś ca janārdanam // HV_App.I,29.1487 //
GE07hv_apppu:8333: nānāvidhāni tūryāṇi geyāni madhurāṇi ca / HV_App.I,29.1488 /
GE07hv_apppu:8334: śuśruvus tasya vṛkṣasya nātidūragatā narāḥ // HV_App.I,29.1489 //
GE07hv_apppu:8335: yo yaṃ saṃkalpayām āsa gandhaṃ hṛdyaṃ naras tadā / HV_App.I,29.1490 /
GE07hv_apppu:8336: sa tadaiva tam ājaghre pārijātasamudbhavam // HV_App.I,29.1491 //
GE07hv_apppu:8337: tataḥ praviśya ramyāṃ tu dvārakāṃ yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1492 /
GE07hv_apppu:8338: vasudevaṃ mahātmānaṃ dadṛśe devakīṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29.1493 //
GE07hv_apppu:8339: kukurādhipatiṃ caiva balaṃ bhrātaram eva ca / HV_App.I,29.1494 /
GE07hv_apppu:8340: vṛddhāṃś ca yādavānāṃ ye mānārhān amaropamān // HV_App.I,29.1495 //
GE07hv_apppu:8341: visarjya tān vai bhagavān anādinidhano 'cyutaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1496 /
GE07hv_apppu:8342: saṃpūjya ca yathānyāyaṃ svam eva bhavanaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29.1497 //
GE07hv_apppu:8343: sa satyabhāmayā vāsaṃ viveśa madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1498 /
GE07hv_apppu:8345: sā devī pūjayām āsa prahṛṣṭā vāsavānujam / HV_App.I,29.1500 /
GE07hv_apppu:8346: pratijagrāha taṃ cāpi pārijātaṃ mahādrumam / HV_App.I,29.1501 /
GE07hv_apppu:8347: manīṣitena sa tarur alpo bhavati bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1502 /
GE07hv_apppu:8348: mahāṃś ca vāsudevasya tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,29.1503 //
GE07hv_apppu:8349: kadācid dvārakāṃ sarvāṃ pracchādayati bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1504 /
GE07hv_apppu:8350: kadācid dhastadhāryas tu bhavaty aṅguṣṭhasaṃnibhaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1505 //
GE07hv_apppu:8351: nananda satyā kauravya devī prāpya manoratham / HV_App.I,29.1506 /
GE07hv_apppu:8352: puṇyakārthaṃ tu saṃbhārān saṃbhartum upacakrame // HV_App.I,29.1507 //
GE07hv_apppu:8353: yāni dravyāṇi kauravya jambudvīpe tu kānicit / HV_App.I,29.1508 /
GE07hv_apppu:8354: yogyāni tāni kṛṣṇena saṃhṛtāni mahātmanā // HV_App.I,29.1509 //
GE07hv_apppu:8355: muniṃ tadā saṃsmṛtavān sa nāradaṃ @ HV_App.I,29.1510 @
GE07hv_apppu:8361: atha kṛṣṇasya kauravya dhyātamātras tapodhanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1514 /
GE07hv_apppu:8362: ājagāma muniśreṣṭho nārado vadatāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1515 //
GE07hv_apppu:8363: taṃ pūjayitvā vidhivad vāsudevo viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29.1516 /
GE07hv_apppu:8365: tataḥ kāle ca saṃprāpte snātaṃ devo mahāmunim / HV_App.I,29.1518 /
GE07hv_apppu:8366: saṃpūjya mālyair gandhaiś ca bhojayām āsa bhārata // HV_App.I,29.1519 //
GE07hv_apppu:8370: babandha kṛṣṇaṃ subhagā pārijāte vanaspatau // HV_App.I,29.1523 //
GE07hv_apppu:8371: adbhir dadau nāradāya tato 'nujñāpya keśavam / HV_App.I,29.1524 /
GE07hv_apppu:8372: devī dhenusahasraṃ ca kāñcanasya ca parvatam // HV_App.I,29.1525 //
GE07hv_apppu:8374: tilamiśrasya ca tathā dhānyair anyair yutasya ca // HV_App.I,29.1527 //
GE07hv_apppu:8375: pratigṛhya tu tat sarvaṃ nārado munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1528 /
GE07hv_apppu:8376: prahṛṣṭo vadatāṃ śreṣṭho bhuktvā keśavam abravīt // HV_App.I,29.1529 //
GE07hv_apppu:8377: bhoḥ keśava madīyas tvam adbhir datto 'si satyayā / HV_App.I,29.1530 /
GE07hv_apppu:8379: sa tvaṃ mām anugacchasva kuru yad yad bravīmy aham // HV_App.I,29.1531 //
GE07hv_apppu:8380: prathamaḥ kalpaḥ ity evam abravīn madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1532 /
GE07hv_apppu:8381: vrajantam anuvavrāja nāradaṃ ca janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1533 //
GE07hv_apppu:8382: parihāsaṃ bahuvidhaṃ kṛtvā munivaras tadā / HV_App.I,29.1534 /
GE07hv_apppu:8384: apanīya tataḥ kaṇṭhāt puṣpadāmainam abravīt / HV_App.I,29.1536 /
GE07hv_apppu:8385: kapilāṃ gāṃ savatsāṃ bho niṣkrayārthaṃ prayaccha me // HV_App.I,29.1537 //
GE07hv_apppu:8386: kṛṣṇājinaṃ tilaiḥ pūrṇaṃ prayaccha ca sakāñcanam / HV_App.I,29.1538 /
GE07hv_apppu:8387: eṣo 'tra niṣkrayaḥ kṛṣṇa vihito vṛṣaketunā // HV_App.I,29.1539 //
GE07hv_apppu:8388: tathety uktvā hṛṣīkeśas tathā cakre janādhipa / HV_App.I,29.1540 /
GE07hv_apppu:8389: sa uvāca muniśreṣṭhaṃ rahite madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1541 /
GE07hv_apppu:8390: varaṃ varaya dharmajña yas te nārada kāṅkṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1542 /
GE07hv_apppu:8391: taṃ te dātāsmi dharmajña parā prītir hi me tvayi // HV_App.I,29.1543 //
GE07hv_apppu:8393: nityam evāstu me prīto bhavān viṣṇo sanātana / HV_App.I,29.1544 /
GE07hv_apppu:8394: tvatprabhāvāc ca sālokyaṃ vrajeyaṃ te mahāmate // HV_App.I,29.1545 //
GE07hv_apppu:8395: ayonijo bhaveyaṃ ca nārāyaṇa satāṃ gate / HV_App.I,29.1546 /
GE07hv_apppu:8396: bhaveyaṃ brāhmaṇaś caiva punarjātyantareṣv aham // HV_App.I,29.1547 //
GE07hv_apppu:8397: evam astv iti taṃ devo viṣṇuḥ provāca bhārata / HV_App.I,29.1548 /
GE07hv_apppu:8398: tutoṣa ca tato dhīmān nārado munisattamaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1549 //
GE07hv_apppu:8401: tāsāṃ dadau saṃniyogam ekaikaṃ harivallabhā / HV_App.I,29.1552 /
GE07hv_apppu:8402: śacyā yo vāsudevasya purā datto narādhipa // HV_App.I,29.1553 //
GE07hv_apppu:8403: pārijāto vasaṃs tatra tataḥ pravavṛdhe tadā / HV_App.I,29.1554 /
GE07hv_apppu:8405: nimantritā gaṇāḥ sarve keśavena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,29.1556 /
GE07hv_apppu:8407: pāṇḍavāṃś cānayām āsa sahaiva pṛthayā hariḥ / HV_App.I,29.1558 /
GE07hv_apppu:8408: draupadyā ca mahātejās tathaiva ca subhadrayā // HV_App.I,29.1559 //
GE07hv_apppu:8409: śrutaśravāṃ ca sasutāṃ bhīṣmakaṃ sasutaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29.1560 /
GE07hv_apppu:8410: anyān api ca kauravya mitrasaṃbandhibāndhavān // HV_App.I,29.1561 //
GE07hv_apppu:8411: reme ca saha pārthena phālgunena janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29.1562 /
GE07hv_apppu:8414: pārijātaṃ punaḥ svargam anayat sarvabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1565 //
GE07hv_apppu:8415: tatrāditiṃ kaśyapaṃ ca dṛṣṭvā svapitarau prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29.1566 /
GE07hv_apppu:8417: tam uvācāditir mātā praṇataṃ madhusūdanam / HV_App.I,29.1568 /
GE07hv_apppu:8418: saubhrātram astu vām evaṃ nityaṃ cāmarasattama // HV_App.I,29.1569 //
GE07hv_apppu:8419: manorathaṃ mamaitaṃ tvaṃ pūrayasva janārdana / HV_App.I,29.1570 /
GE07hv_apppu:8420: tathety evābravīt kṛṣṇas tato mātaram ātmavān // HV_App.I,29.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:8422: vāsudevo mahātejāḥ kālaprāptam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1573 //
GE07hv_apppu:8424: antarbhūmitale vadhyān asurān prati mānada // HV_App.I,29.1575 //
GE07hv_apppu:8425: tad ito daśarātreṇa hantāham asurottamān / HV_App.I,29.1576 /
GE07hv_apppu:8427: jayantena ca vīreṇa dānavānāṃ jighāsayā / HV_App.I,29.1578 /
GE07hv_apppu:8428: eko 'tra mānuṣo devo devaputras tathāparaḥ // HV_App.I,29.1579 //
GE07hv_apppu:8429: avadhyāḥ kila te devair brahmaṇo varadarpitāḥ / HV_App.I,29.1580 /
GE07hv_apppu:8430: asmābhiḥ kila hantavyā mānuṣatvam upāgataiḥ // HV_App.I,29.1581 //
GE07hv_apppu:8431: tatheti kṛṣṇaṃ sa hariḥ prītarūpas tadābravīt / HV_App.I,29.1582 /
GE07hv_apppu:8432: sasvajāte 'tha tau devāv anyonyaṃ janamejaya // HV_App.I,29.1583 //
GE07hv_apppu:8434: prītātmā kuruśārdūla kuṇḍaladvayam eva ca // HV_App.I,29.1585 //
GE07hv_apppu:8436: [h: HV (CE) Appendix 29A, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, version of July-Āugust 2004 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:8437: [k: After App I (No. 29), K Ñ V B D T G M4 cont. with a passage given in App. I (No. 29A). :k]
GE07hv_apppu:8440: dvaipāyanaprasādena sarvaṃ hi viditaṃ tava // HV_App.I,29A.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:8443: śṛṇu yena vidhānena loke djarmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29A.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8445: yayau dvāravatīṃ dhīmān nārado munisattamaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:8448: kṛṣṇena sahitaṃ vipraṃ nāradaṃ dharmavittamam / HV_App.I,29A.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:8449: āsīnaṃ paripapraccha rukmiṇī bhaiṣmakī nṛpa // HV_App.I,29A.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:8450: tatra jāmbavatī devī satyamhāmā ca bhāminī / HV_App.I,29A.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:8452: devyaś ca nṛpa kṛṣṇasya bahvyo 'nyā vai samāgatāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:8455: mune dharmabhṛtāṃ śreṣṭha sarvajñānabhṛtāṃ vara / HV_App.I,29A.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:8456: utpattiṃ puṇyakānāṃ tvaṃn vaktum arhasy aśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:8457: vidhiṃ ca phalayojaṃ ye dānakālaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29A.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:8458: kautūhalaṃ naḥ paramaṃ tac chindhi dvipadāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:8460: śṛṇu vaidarbhi dharmajñe sapatnībhiḥ sahānaghe / HV_App.I,29A.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:8461: puṇyakānāṃ vidhiḥ prokto yathā devyomayā purā // HV_App.I,29A.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:8462: cacāromā vrataṃ devi puṇyakānāṃ śucivratā / HV_App.I,29A.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:8463: vratāvasāne 'tha tayā sakhyo devi nimantritāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:8465: paulomī ca śacī devī khyātā like pativratā // HV_App.I,29A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:8466: rohiṇī ca mahābhāgā somasyadayitā satī / HV_App.I,29A.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:8467: phalgunī ca tahtā pūrvā revatī ca visāṃ pate // HV_App.I,29A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:8468: tathā śatabhiṣā caiva maghā ca kurunandana / HV_App.I,29A.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:8469: etābhir hi mahādevī pūrvam ārādhitā satī // HV_App.I,29A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:8470: gaṅgā sarasvatī caiva celagaṅgā ca nimnagā / HV_App.I,29A.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:8471: tathā vaitaraṇī caiva gaṇḍakī yā ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:8472: anyāś ca sarito ramyā lopāmudrā ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29A.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:8473: satyaś cānyā jagaddevi dhārayanti hi tāḥ śubhāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:8474: śubhāś ca girinandinyo vahnikanyāś ca suvratāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:8475: svāhā vahnipriyā devī sāvitrī ca yaśasvinī // HV_App.I,29A.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:8476: ṛddhiḥ kuberakāntā ca jaleśamahiṣī tathā / HV_App.I,29A.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:8477: bhāryā pitṛpateś caiva vasupatnyas tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:8478: hrīḥ śrīr dhṛtis tathā kīrtir āśā meghā ca suvratā / HV_App.I,29A.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:8479: prītir matiś ca khyātiś ca saṃyatiś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:8480: devyaḥ satyas tathaivānyāḥ sarvabhūtahite ratāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:8481: tāsāṃ vratāvasāne ca pūjāṃ cakre 'mbikā tadā / HV_App.I,29A.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:8483: vāsobhir bahubhir mukhyair nānārāgaiḥ sumadhyame // HV_App.I,29A.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:8484: pratigṛhya tu tāṃ pūjāṃ dattāṃ devyā tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:8485: upaviṣṭāḥ kathāś citrāḥ kurvantyo bhartṛdevatāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:8486: puṇyakārthaṃ kathās tāsām āsan devī śaśaṃsa yāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:8487: vidhiṃ ca puṇyakasyātha satīnāṃ bhartṛdevate // HV_App.I,29A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:8488: tāsāṃ matena sādhvīnāṃ sarvāsāṃ somanandinī / HV_App.I,29A.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:8489: paryapṛcchad umāṃ devīṃ puṇyakānāṃ vidhiṃ varam // HV_App.I,29A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:8490: umā tāsāṃ priyārthaṃ tu puṇyakāny abravīt tadā / HV_App.I,29A.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:8491: samakṣaṃ mama vaidarbhi sarvabhūtahite ratā // HV_App.I,29A.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:8492: mamaiva comayā dattaḥ sa tadā ratnaparvataḥ / HV_App.I,29A.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:8493: pratigṛhya mayā caiva kṛto brāhmaṇāc chubhe // HV_App.I,29A.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:8494: umā tv arundhatīṃ sādhvīm āmantrya yad abhāṣata / HV_App.I,29A.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:8495: śṛṇu kalyāṇi vakṣyāmi sarvābhiḥ sahitā śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:8496: puṇyakānāṃ vidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:8497: yathā caiva mayā dṛṣṭas tata eṣa vidhiḥ śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:8500: sarvajñāhaṃ yadā bhartuḥ prasādena śaucismite / HV_App.I,29A.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:8501: tadā purā mayādiṣṭo dṛṣṭaḥ puṇyavidhiḥ śubhaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:8503: mahādevaprasādena mayā dṛṣṭas tv arundhati // HV_App.I,29A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:8504: puṇyakāni ca sarvāṇi cīrṇavaty asmy anindite / HV_App.I,29A.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:8505: anujñayā bhagavato bhartuḥ śarvasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:8509: puṇyakānāṃ vidhis tasyāḥ purāṇe parikīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:8511: niṣphalāny asatīnāṃ hi puṇyakāni tathā śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:8512: yā vañcayanti bhartāraṃ yoniduṣṭāś ca yāḥ striyaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:8514: sādhvyo jagad dhārayanti suśīlāḥ patidevatāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:8515: ananyā dharmanityāś ca satāṃ panthānam āśritāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:8517: satataṃ sādhuvādinyo dhārayanti jagat khalu // HV_App.I,29A.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:8518: vyādhitaḥ patito vāpi dīno vāpi katkhaṃcana / HV_App.I,29A.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:8519: na tyaktavyaḥ striyā bhartā dharma eṣa sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:8520: akāryakāriṇaṃ vāpi patitaṃ vāpi nirguṇam / HV_App.I,29A.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:8521: strī patiṃ tārayaty eva tathātmānaṃ śubhānane // HV_App.I,29A.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:8522: yoniduṣṭastriyo nāsti prāyaścittaṃ hataiva sā / HV_App.I,29A.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:8523: vāgduṣṭe vihitaṃ sadbhiḥ prāyaścittaṃ purātane // HV_App.I,29A.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:8524: bhartuś chandena kartavyaṃ vratakaṃ sarvadā striyā / HV_App.I,29A.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:8525: upavāso 'pi vā satye kāṇkṣantyā sukṛtāṃ gatim // HV_App.I,29A.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:8526: kalpāntarasahasreṣu na strī sā labhate gatim / HV_App.I,29A.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:8528: yadi syān nāma mānuṣyaṃ strī labhed asatī satī / HV_App.I,29A.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:8530: bhartā devaḥ sadā strīṇāṃ sadbhir dṛṣṭas tapodhane / HV_App.I,29A.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:8531: yasyā hi tuṣyate bhartā sā satī dharmacāriṇī // HV_App.I,29A.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:8532: kautūhalahatānāṃ tu striṇāṃ loko na śobhanaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:8533: bhartary eva mano yāsāṃ sadbhāvena vyavasthitam / HV_App.I,29A.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:8534: karmaṇā manasā vācā patiṃ nāticaranti yāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:8535: tāsāṃ puṇyaphalaṃ saumye puṇyakaiḥ samudāhṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:8536: puṇyakānāṃ vidhiṃ kṛtsnaṃ svarlokaṃ prati śobhane / HV_App.I,29A.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:8537: nibodha saha sarvābhir dṛṣṭo yas tapasā mayā // HV_App.I,29A.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:8538: snātvā strī pratar utthāya patiṃ vijñāpayet satī / HV_App.I,29A.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:8539: upavāsārtham atha vā vratakāryaṃ dhṛtavrate // HV_App.I,29A.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:8540: śvaśurābhyāṃ ca caraṇau satataṃ saṃnamasya ca / HV_App.I,29A.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:8541: grahāyaudambaraṃ pātraṃ sakuśaṃ sākṣataṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:8542: gośṛṅgaṃ dakṣiṇaṃ sicya pratigṛhṇīta taj jalam / HV_App.I,29A.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:8543: tato bhartuḥ satī dadyāt snātasya prayatasya ca // HV_App.I,29A.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:8544: ātmano 'tha niṣektavyaṃ tataḥ śirasi taj jalam / HV_App.I,29A.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:8545: trailokye sarvatīrtheṣu snānam etad udāhṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.100 //
GE07hv_apppu:8546: upavāseṣu kartavyam etad dhi vratakeṣu ca / HV_App.I,29A.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:8547: snānam etad dhi sāmānyaṃ strīṇāṃ puṃsāṃ ca bhāvini // HV_App.I,29A.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:8548: arundhati mayā dṛṣṭaṃ tapasā haratejasā / HV_App.I,29A.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:8549: aśalyaviddhaṃ śayanam āsanaṃ ca tathāvidham / HV_App.I,29A.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:8550: svayaṃ prakṣālanaṃ cāpi pādayor anuśabditam // HV_App.I,29A.105 //
GE07hv_apppu:8551: aśruprapāto roṣaś ca kalahaś ca kṛtaḥ sati / HV_App.I,29A.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:8552: upavāsād vratād vāpi sadyo bhraṃśayati striyaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:8553: śuklam eva sadā vāsaḥ praśastaṃ candrasaṃbhave / HV_App.I,29A.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:8554: antarvāsaṃ coparaṃ caiva upavāse vrate tathā // HV_App.I,29A.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:8555: pādukāryaṃ trṇaiḥ kāryaṃ sarvadā vratake sati / HV_App.I,29A.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:8556: upavāse 'pi ca vidhir eṣa eva prakīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:8557: añjanaṃ rocanaṃ cāpi gandhān sumanasas tathā / HV_App.I,29A.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:8558: vratake copavāse ca nityam eva vivarjayet // HV_App.I,29A.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:8559: dantakāṣṭaṃ śiraḥsnānam udvartanam athāpi vā / HV_App.I,29A.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:8560: vivarjitaṃ mṛdā sarvaḥ śaucarthas tu vidhīyate // HV_App.I,29A.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:8561: bilvāmṛtaphalair nityaṃ śrīphalaiś ca samācaret / HV_App.I,29A.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:8562: prakṣālanaṃ vai śirasaḥ sadā mṛnmiśritair jalaiḥ // HV_App.I,29A.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:8563: śiraso 'bhyañjanaṃ saumye naivam etat praśasyate / HV_App.I,29A.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:8564: na pādayor na gātrasya sneheneti sthitiḥ smṛtā // HV_App.I,29A.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:8565: goyānam uṣṭrayānaṃ ca kharayānaṃ ca varjitam / HV_App.I,29A.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:8566: nagnasnānaṃ ca satataṃ vrate cāpy upavāsake // HV_App.I,29A.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:8568: śubhe taḍāgavāpy ādau vistīrṇe jalajāyute // HV_App.I,29A.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:8569: gatvā snānaṃ praśastaṃ tu sadaive khalu sarvathā / HV_App.I,29A.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:8570: alābhe tv avaruddhā strī ghaṭasnānaṃ samācaret // HV_App.I,29A.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:8571: navaiś ca kumbhaiḥ snātavyaṃ vidhir eṣa purātanaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:8572: snānaṃ ca kāryaṃ śirasā tapaḥphalam avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29A.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:8575: vidhinaitena kṛtsnena strī sadā bhatṛdevatā / HV_App.I,29A.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:8576: caret saṃvatsaraṃ dāntā ṣaṇmāsān māsam eva vā // HV_App.I,29A.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:8577: striyo hy āvāhayet sādhvīr ekādaśa samādhinā / HV_App.I,29A.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:8578: svayaṃ caiva vidhir dṛṣṭo vratakānāṃ vidhiḥ śubhaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:8579: adbhir dadyāt satī sarvā yā mūlavratinī bhavet / HV_App.I,29A.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:8580: tāsāṃ tu niṣkrayo deyo deśakālānurūpataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:8581: tato māsāntaśuklasya tithau ca navamī tathā / HV_App.I,29A.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:8584: ādau cānte ca kurvīta vratakasyāpi siddhaye // HV_App.I,29A.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:8585: kṣurakarma tato bhartur ātmanaś caiva kārayet / HV_App.I,29A.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:8586: utsādanaṃ na snānaṃ ca tasminn ahani saṃsmṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:8587: tato vivāhavat snānaṃ vihitaṃ puṇyake śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:8588: maṇḍanaṃ caiva vihitaṃ mālyadhāraṇam eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:8589: kumbhais tu snāpyamānemaṃ sādhvī mantram udīrayet / HV_App.I,29A.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:8590: bhartuḥ pādau namaskṛtya manasā vātha vā girā // HV_App.I,29A.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:8591: āpo devyo ṛṣīṇāṃ hi viśvadhātryo @ HV_App.I,29A.144 @
GE07hv_apppu:8592: divyā mādantyā yāḥ śaṃkarā dharmadhātryaḥ | HV_App.I,29A.145 |
GE07hv_apppu:8595: apām eṣa smṛto mantraḥ sarvatrānyatra me śṛṇu / HV_App.I,29A.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:8598: bhartrā sākaṃ mama dāsyā vateṇyā | HV_App.I,29A.151 |
GE07hv_apppu:8599: mā karmaṇā manasā vāpi vācā @ HV_App.I,29A.152 @
GE07hv_apppu:8600: bhartur bhaveyaṃ ruśatī syāṃ vaśaṃgā || HV_App.I,29A.153 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8604: sarvāmanā syāṃ na daridrā bhaveyam || HV_App.I,29A.157 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8605: patiś ca me syāt sumukho matpratīkṣo @ HV_App.I,29A.158 @
GE07hv_apppu:8606: nityaṃ madbhaktaḥ syāmn manmatir madgatiś ca | HV_App.I,29A.159 |
GE07hv_apppu:8607: prītiś ca nau syāc cakravākānurūpā @ HV_App.I,29A.160 @
GE07hv_apppu:8608: manovirāgo na bhavet sādhu ca syāt || HV_App.I,29A.161 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8611: ubhe ule yāḥ śubhāḥ pāvayanti @ HV_App.I,29A.164 @
GE07hv_apppu:8612: pitur bhartuś ca patibhaktyorjitāś ca || HV_App.I,29A.165 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8613: bhūmir vāyur jalam ākāśam agnir @ HV_App.I,29A.166 @
GE07hv_apppu:8614: antaḥkṣetrajñaḥ prakṛtir yo mahāṃś ca | HV_App.I,29A.167 |
GE07hv_apppu:8615: ahaṃkāra7s ca mama sākṣye niyuktāḥ @ HV_App.I,29A.168 @
GE07hv_apppu:8616: smareyur me niścayaṃ ca vrataṃ ca || HV_App.I,29A.169 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8619: santv ete me sākṣiṇaḥ sarvasaṃsthā @ HV_App.I,29A.172 @
GE07hv_apppu:8620: vrate cāsmin niścaye cāpi vṛtte || HV_App.I,29A.173 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8622: diśaḥ sarvā daśa cātmā ca me 'yam | HV_App.I,29A.175 |
GE07hv_apppu:8623: santv ete vai sākṣiṇaḥ sarva eva @ HV_App.I,29A.176 @
GE07hv_apppu:8624: vrate cāsmin niścaye cāpi nityam || HV_App.I,29A.177 ||
GE07hv_apppu:8627: snātvātha vāsasī dadyād bhartuḥ kartya svayaṃ śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:8628: athātmakartitaṃ na syāc chubhe vighnena kenacit // HV_App.I,29A.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:8629: vāso 'nyad eva dadyāc ca śvetaṃ mukhyaṃ navaṃ śuci / HV_App.I,29A.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:8630: svakartitaṃ sūtratantuṃ vāsasā tena miśrayet // HV_App.I,29A.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:8631: tato dvijaṃ śuciṃ dāntaṃ jñānavijñānakovidam / HV_App.I,29A.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:8632: bhojayec ca yathāśakti saha bhartrā sumadhyame // HV_App.I,29A.185 //
GE07hv_apppu:8634: śayyā yānaṃ gṛhaṃ dhānyaṃ dāsīdāsaṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.187 //
GE07hv_apppu:8635: alaṃkāraḥ śaktitaś ca ratnaparvata eva ca / HV_App.I,29A.188 /
GE07hv_apppu:8637: vāsobhiś ca praticchanno nānāvarṇair arundhati // HV_App.I,29A.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:8638: hastyaśvājarathāś caiva deyā gaur eva ca dhruvam // HV_App.I,29A.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:8640: guḍasya madhunaś caiva suvarṇasya ca śobhanām // HV_App.I,29A.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:8641: tathaiva sarvagandhānāṃ rasānāṃ pṛthag eva ca / HV_App.I,29A.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:8642: tathā sumanasāṃ dadyād rūpasyaudumbarasya ca // HV_App.I,29A.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:8643: phalānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ vāsasām api nandini / HV_App.I,29A.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:8644: citrapratikṛtiṃ caiva yāṃś cānyān apy abhīpsyati // HV_App.I,29A.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:8645: śilāpratikṛtiṃ caiva dadhno 'tha payasas tathā / HV_App.I,29A.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:8646: sarpiṣā dūrvayā caiva yāṃś cānyān apy abhīpsati // HV_App.I,29A.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:8647: kāladeśānurūpaṃ ca deyaṃ vibhavataḥ sati / HV_App.I,29A.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:8648: alpaṃ vā bahulaṃ vāpi bhartuś chandena sarvadā // HV_App.I,29A.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:8649: tilapātraṃ pradātavyaṃ na deyaṃ na tu śobhane / HV_App.I,29A.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:8650: gaus tv avaśyaṃ pradātavyā kapilā kāṃsyam eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:8651: kṛṣṇājinaṃ ca subhage satilaṃ vāsasānvitam / HV_App.I,29A.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:8652: ādarśaś caiva kūrcaś ca tathājinam anindite // HV_App.I,29A.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:8653: etad dattvā sarvakāmān āpnoti varavarṇinī / HV_App.I,29A.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:8655: mṛṣṭahastā dhanāḍhyā ca strī bhavaty amalekṣāṇā / HV_App.I,29A.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:8656: icchayā labhate caiva kanyāṃ rūpaguṇānvitām / HV_App.I,29A.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:8657: bhavanti subhagāś cāḍhyās tathaiva ca purodhikāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:8658: putravatyo dhanāḍhyāś ca śīlavatyaś ca nityadā // HV_App.I,29A.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:8659: arundhati kṛtaṃ hy etan mayaiva prathamaṃ yataḥ / HV_App.I,29A.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:8660: umāvratakam ity evaṃ khyātam atra mahītale // HV_App.I,29A.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:8661: etad evottamaṃ strīṇāṃ vrataṃ tasmāt samācaret / HV_App.I,29A.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:8662: sarvakāmān avāpnoti strī dattvaivam anindite // HV_App.I,29A.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:8663: etad vratakarāje ca devadevo vṛṣadhvajaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:8664: purābhiṣiktavān saumye priyārthaṃ mama sarvakṛt // HV_App.I,29A.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:8665: vratakasyāvasāne tu deyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca nityadā / HV_App.I,29A.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:8666: strīṇāṃ pradeyāḥ kāmāś ca sadṛśāḥ kāladeśayoḥ // HV_App.I,29A.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:8668: chandato brāhmaṇānāṃ tu deyam annaṃ sadakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,29A.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:8669: pāyasaṃ tatra dātavyaṃ vratake nānyad iṣyate / HV_App.I,29A.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:8670: nātra prāṇivadhaḥ kāryaḥ purāṇe niyatā śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,29A.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:8671: atha dvitīyaṃ vakṣyāmi vratakaṃ somasaṃbhave / HV_App.I,29A.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:8672: mahādevaprasādeva dṛṣṭavaty asmi yac chubhe // HV_App.I,29A.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:8673: sarvāḥ putraphalāḥ nāryaḥ sadbhir etad udāhṛtam / HV_App.I,29A.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:8674: tasmād anviṣyatī dadyāt saputrakarakāñ śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:8675: jyeṣṭhāṣāḍhau śubhau māsau puroktaṃ vidhim ācaret / HV_App.I,29A.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:8676: atha vā jyeṣṭham evaikam āṣāḍhaṃ vā samācaret // HV_App.I,29A.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:8677: tato māsadvaye pūrṇe māse vā varavarṇini / HV_App.I,29A.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:8679: sarpiṣaḥ payasaś caiva dadhno 'tha madhuno 'naghe / HV_App.I,29A.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:8680: jalasya ca tathā dadyāt pūrayitvā śaśiprabhe // HV_App.I,29A.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:8682: saputrakarakān dadyād yāvanto manasaḥ priyāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:8683: icched duhitaraṃ ced dhi strīnāmnā kārayet tataḥ / HV_App.I,29A.236 /
