GE07hv_apppu:8684: kiṃcid dravyaṃ sutākāmāt sutāṃ prāpnoty asaṃśayam // HV_App.I,29A.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:8685: gaur vātha kāñcanaṃ vāpi dakṣiṇārthaṃ praśasyate / HV_App.I,29A.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:8686: viprasyācchādanaṃ deyam avaśyaṃ tu śucismite // HV_App.I,29A.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:8687: yajñopavītaṃ vratake dadyān nārī śucivratā / HV_App.I,29A.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:8691: karakān api dadyāc ca pūrṇe saṃvatsare śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:8692: anujñayā sadā bhartuḥ satyavādiny arundhati // HV_App.I,29A.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:8693: suvarṇasūtraṃ viprāya kaumudyāṃ dātum arhati / HV_App.I,29A.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:8694: yajñopavītaṃ viprasya vrataṃ saṃsthāpya kāmikam // HV_App.I,29A.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:8695: yajñopavītaṃ karakaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ ca svaśaktitaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:8697: parasya putrīti hi tā vaidhavyaṃ prāpnivanti hi / **HV_App.I,29A.48**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8699: prayacchantī satī strībhiḥ sarvān kāmān samaśnute // HV_App.I,29A.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:8700: na ca saṃbhakṣayet kiṃcin nārī dhānyam atho phalam / HV_App.I,29A.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:8701: puṣpaṃ vā nopayuñjīta yāvad evaṃ samācaret // HV_App.I,29A.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:8702: ekabhaktena dharmajñe sā tryahaṃ kṣantum arhati / HV_App.I,29A.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:8703: brāhmaṇāya tato deyaṃ bhartuś ca tadanantaram // HV_App.I,29A.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:8704: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtvā subhagā rūpaśālinī / HV_App.I,29A.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:8705: bhavaty avidhavā caiva strī dhanasya tatheśvarī // HV_App.I,29A.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:8706: vārtākāni na khāded yā strī pūrṇaṃ parivatsaram / HV_App.I,29A.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:8707: na sā putravināśaṃ hi paśyatīty avagamyatām // HV_App.I,29A.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:8708: śaśakaṃ mṛgamāṃsaṃ ca nityam eva vivarjayet / HV_App.I,29A.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:8709: nāpnoti maraṇaṃ nārī prāpnoti patidevatām // HV_App.I,29A.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:8710: alābuṃ varjayen nārī tathaivopodikām api / HV_App.I,29A.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:8711: kalambūṃ kāñcanaṃ dadyād yā bhartuḥ sukham icchati // HV_App.I,29A.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:8712: pūrṇe saṃvatsare dadyād ekaikaṃ śākam ādṛtā / HV_App.I,29A.262 /
GE07hv_apppu:8713: sudakṣiṇaṃ putravatī bhavaty eṣā purodhikā // HV_App.I,29A.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:8714: svayaṃ prakṣālayānā strī svapādāv evam āditaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:8715: pratiṣṭhāṃ labhate nityam udvegaṃ nādhigacchati // HV_App.I,29A.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:8716: divā yā sūryapūtena vartayet strī pativratā / HV_App.I,29A.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:8717: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ pūrṇaṃ rātrāv annaṃ vivarjayet // HV_App.I,29A.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:8718: sā jīvaputrā subhagā bhavaty amaravarṇinī / HV_App.I,29A.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:8719: adhitiṣṭhati sarvāś ca sapatnyo nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:8720: pūrṇe saṃvatsare dadyāt sauvarṇaṃ sūryam uttamam / HV_App.I,29A.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:8722: phalāni vātha puṣpāṇi bhakṣāṇy api ca suvratā / HV_App.I,29A.272 /
GE07hv_apppu:8724: athkāstaṃgamite sūrye bhuṅkte strī niyatā satī / HV_App.I,29A.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:8726: sā dadyāt kāñcanaṃ candraṃ nakṣatrtāṇi grahān api / HV_App.I,29A.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:8727: abhirūpāya viprāya vāsaś ca lavaṇānvitam // HV_App.I,29A.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:8729: subhagā darśanīyā ca putravaty api bhāmini // HV_App.I,29A.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:8730: paurṇamāsyāṃ tu satataṃ prāpte somodaye 'ṅganā / HV_App.I,29A.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:8731: arghyaṃ dadyāt sumanasā sākṣataṃ sakuśaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:8732: yāvakaṃ ca baliṃ dadyād dadhinā saha saṃyutam / HV_App.I,29A.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:8733: evaṃ yā kurute nityaṃ sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29A.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:8734: adṛṣṭvā yā tu nāśnāti sūryaṃ nārī pativratā / HV_App.I,29A.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:8735: durdine vātha vā vyabhre sarvān kāmān avāpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29A.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:8736: kāñcanaṃ śaktito dadyāt sā viprāya manasvinī / HV_App.I,29A.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:8737: subhagā darśanīyā ca bhavaty amaravarṇinī // HV_App.I,29A.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:8740: niveṣṭavyaṃ śarīraṃ yair vratakaiḥ puṇyair api / HV_App.I,29A.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:8741: arundhati pravakṣyāmi sahaitabhir vare śṛṇu // HV_App.I,29A.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:8742: kṛṣṇāṣṭamīṃ yā kṣipati syād vā mūlaphalāśinī / HV_App.I,29A.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:8745: evaṃ saṃvatsaraṃ kṛtvā tato dadyād dvijātaye // HV_App.I,29A.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:8747: dakṣiṇāpūrvam iṣṭānnaṃ śaktyā vāpi śucismite // HV_App.I,29A.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:8749: tasyā bhavanti keśās tu bhavatīṣṭā hi bhartare // HV_App.I,29A.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:8750: śiro nirveṣṭukāmā tu gomayena śiraḥ satī / HV_App.I,29A.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:8751: prakṣālayen malaṃ dhātryā bilvena śrīphalena ca // HV_App.I,29A.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:8752: gomūtraṃ ca sadā prāśec chiraḥsnānaṃ ca miśrayet / HV_App.I,29A.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:8753: kṛṣṇāṃ caturdaśīṃ tv etat kartavyaṃ varavarṇini // HV_App.I,29A.301 //
GE07hv_apppu:8754: bhavaty avidhavā caiva subhagā vijvarā tathā / HV_App.I,29A.302 /
GE07hv_apppu:8755: śirorogair naiva cāsyāḥ śarīram abhitapyate // HV_App.I,29A.303 //
GE07hv_apppu:8756: darśanīyaṃ lalāṭaṃ yā kāṅkṣati strī śucismite / HV_App.I,29A.304 /
GE07hv_apppu:8757: tithiṃ pratipadaṃ nityaṃ sā kṣaped ekabhojanā // HV_App.I,29A.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:8758: payasā ca tathāśnīyād yāvat saṃvatsaro gataḥ / HV_App.I,29A.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:8759: brāhmaṇasya tato dadyāt paṭṭaṃ rūpyamayaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,29A.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:8760: lalāṭaṃ rūpasaṃpannam āpnoti strī sumadhyamā // HV_App.I,29A.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:8761: satataṃ strī dvitīyāyāṃ bhruvor icchet surūpatām / HV_App.I,29A.309 /
GE07hv_apppu:8763: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe brāhmaṇaṃ svasti vācayet / HV_App.I,29A.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:8764: phalaiḥ pariṇataiḥ saumye māsāṇāṃ dakṣiṇānvitaiḥ / HV_App.I,29A.312 /
GE07hv_apppu:8765: lavaṇena ca bhadraṃ te ghṛtapātreṇa cānaghe // HV_App.I,29A.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:8767: bhruvau vidhāya sā dadyān mṛganābhimaye śubhe / **HV_App.I,29A.313**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8768: ātmanaḥ śobhanau karṇāv icchantī strī sumadhyamā / HV_App.I,29A.314 /
GE07hv_apppu:8769: nakṣatre śravaṇe prāpte dhruvaṃ bhuñjīta yāvakam // HV_App.I,29A.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:8770: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe karṇau dadyād dhiraṇmayau / HV_App.I,29A.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:8771: ghṛte prakṣipya viprāya payasā sahitau śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.317 /
GE07hv_apppu:8772: nāsām icchel lalāṭāntām avyaṅgāṃ vyādhivarjitām / HV_App.I,29A.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:8773: tilagulmaṃ sadā siñced yāvat puṣped dhi rakṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:8775: tasmād ādāya puṣpāṇi ghṛte prakṣipya dāpayet // HV_App.I,29A.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:8776: svakṣī bhaveyam iti yā strī kāṅkṣaty amṛtodbhave / HV_App.I,29A.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:8777: anantaraṃ vai bhuñjānā payasā vā ghṛtena vā // HV_App.I,29A.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:8778: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe padmapatrāṇi paṇḍitā / HV_App.I,29A.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:8780: plavamānāni viprāya tato dadyāt satī sati / HV_App.I,29A.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:8781: kṛṣṇasārasamānākṣī tad dattva bhavati sma vai // HV_App.I,29A.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:8782: icched oṣṭhau cārurūpau yā strī dharmaguṇānvitā / HV_App.I,29A.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:8783: sā mṛṇmayena tu pibed udakaṃ vatsaraṃ satī / HV_App.I,29A.329 /
GE07hv_apppu:8785: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe vidrumaṃ dātum arhati // HV_App.I,29A.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:8786: tena bimbaphalābhoṣṭhī strī bhavaty eva śobhane / HV_App.I,29A.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:8788: yā cārurūpān iccheta dantān amaravarṇini / HV_App.I,29A.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:8789: śuklāṣṭamīṃ na sāśnīyād bhaktadvayam aninditā // HV_App.I,29A.335 //
GE07hv_apppu:8790: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe dadyād rūpyamayān satī / HV_App.I,29A.336 /
GE07hv_apppu:8791: dantān prkṣipya dharmajñe payasy atiguṇodite // HV_App.I,29A.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:8792: tena sā tilapuṣpābhān dantān āpnoti sā satī / HV_App.I,29A.338 /
GE07hv_apppu:8793: saubhāgyam api cāpnoti saputratvaṃ tathānaghe // HV_App.I,29A.339 //
GE07hv_apppu:8794: sarvam eva mukhaṃ kāntam icched yā rucirānane / HV_App.I,29A.340 /
GE07hv_apppu:8795: sā paurṇamāsyām aśnātu prāpte candrodaye śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.341 //
GE07hv_apppu:8796: yāvakaṃ payasā siddhaṃ dattvā viprāya bhāminī / HV_App.I,29A.342 /
GE07hv_apppu:8797: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe candraṃ rūpyamayaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,29A.343 //
GE07hv_apppu:8798: padme phulle tu vinyasya brāhmaṇān svasti vācayet / HV_App.I,29A.344 /
GE07hv_apppu:8799: pūrṇacandramukhī tena dānena strī śubhe bhavet // HV_App.I,29A.345 //
GE07hv_apppu:8800: stanāv icchati yā nārī tṛṇarājaphalopamau / HV_App.I,29A.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:8801: ayācitaṃ daśamyāṃ sā nityam aśnīta vāgyatā // HV_App.I,29A.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:8802: saṃvatsare tataḥ pūrṇe dve bilve kāñcane śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:8804: saubhāgyaṃ param āpnoti bahūn putrāṃs tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29A.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:8805: sadonnatau stanau sā strī bibharty amaravarṇini // HV_App.I,29A.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:8807: pañcamyāṃ tu na bhoktavyaṃ annaṃ toyena nityadā // HV_App.I,29A.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:8808: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe dadyāj jatilatāṃ śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:8809: phullāṃ sadakṣiṇāṃ dhanye brāhmaṇāya dhṛtāmane // HV_App.I,29A.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:8810: hastāv icchati yā nārī rūpayuktau sumadhyame / HV_App.I,29A.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:8811: dvādaśīṃ sā kṣaped evaṃ śākaiḥ sarvair aninditaiḥ // HV_App.I,29A.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:8812: saṃvatsare tataḥ pūrṇe raukme padme dadātu sā / HV_App.I,29A.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:8814: śroṇīṃ viśālām anvicchet strī kṣapetv eva suvratā / HV_App.I,29A.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:8815: trayodaśīm ekabhaktam aśnātv evam ayācitam // HV_App.I,29A.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:8816: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe lavaṇaṃ saṃprayacchatu / HV_App.I,29A.362 /
GE07hv_apppu:8818: kāñcanaṃ caiva dātavyaṃ tadākārasya sarvadā / HV_App.I,29A.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:8819: añjanena ca dharmajñe śanakair avacūrṇayet // HV_App.I,29A.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:8820: ratnāni caiva pūrṇāni vāso raktaṃ ca dāpayet / HV_App.I,29A.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:8821: tena śroṇīm abhimatāṃ strī saumye pratipadyate // HV_App.I,29A.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:8822: madhurāṃ vācam icchantī varjayel lavaṇaṃ satī / HV_App.I,29A.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:8823: saṃvatsare vā māsaṃ vā dāpayel lavaṇaṃ tataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:8824: sadakṣiṇaṃ brāhmaṇāya paraṃ mādhuryam icchatī / HV_App.I,29A.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:8827: ṣaṣṭhyāṃ ṣaṣṭhyāṃ varārohe bhoktavyaṃ satilaudanam // HV_App.I,29A.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:8828: agnir vā brāhmaṇo vāpi na spraṣṭavyaḥ padā sadā / HV_App.I,29A.374 /
GE07hv_apppu:8829: padā yadā spṛśet taṃ ca vandeta tapasānvitā // HV_App.I,29A.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:8830: pādena caiva pādaṃ na prakṣālayitum arhati / HV_App.I,29A.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:8831: etair nityavratair yuktā dharmajñā patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:8832: kūrmau rukmamayau dadyād brāhmaṇāya pativrate / HV_App.I,29A.378 /
GE07hv_apppu:8833: tau vācayed brāhmanāya sthāpayitvā ghṛte 'naghe // HV_App.I,29A.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:8834: padme cādhomukhe kṛtvā dadyād viprāya nandini / HV_App.I,29A.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:8836: sarvam eva tu yā gātram icchaty atimanoharam / HV_App.I,29A.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:8837: trirātraṃ puṣpakāle sā karoti patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:8838: kaumudyām atha vāṣāḍhyāṃ māghyāṃ cāśvayuje tathā / HV_App.I,29A.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:8839: mātaraṃ pitaraṃ caiva manyate yadi daivatam // HV_App.I,29A.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:8840: ghṛtaṃ ca nityaṃ viprebhyo dadātu lavaṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29A.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:8841: saṃmārjanaṃ gṛhe caiva karotu patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:8842: upalepanaṃ ca dharmajñe balikarma ca mānini / HV_App.I,29A.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:8843: vāgduṣṭā caiva mā śubhre bhavatv ātmārthapaṇḍitā // HV_App.I,29A.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:8844: paryaśnātu ca sā kaṃcid api śākaṃ yaśasvini / HV_App.I,29A.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:8845: baliṃ sṛjatv atathyaṃ ca parityajatu bhāmini // HV_App.I,29A.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:8846: bāndhavān saguṇān icched ekabhaktena nityadā / HV_App.I,29A.392 /
GE07hv_apppu:8847: saptamīṃ saptamīṃ nityaṃ kṣapet strī patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.393 //
GE07hv_apppu:8848: tataḥ saṃvatsare pūrṇe vṛkṣaṃ dadyād dhiraṇmayam / HV_App.I,29A.394 /
GE07hv_apppu:8850: karañje dīpakaṃ dadyāt sadā yā pramadā vare / HV_App.I,29A.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:8851: pūrṇe saṃvatsare dadyāt sauvarṇaṃ dīpakaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:8852: rucyā sā strī bhaved bhartur iṣṭā putravatī tathā / HV_App.I,29A.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:8853: sapatnīnām adhi tathā dīpavaj jvalate śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:8854: yā śeṣabhojinī nityaṃ naiva ca syād aruṃtudā / HV_App.I,29A.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:8855: na ca syād vyaśanā saumye nityaṃ ca patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:8856: śaucānvitā ca satataṃ na ca rūkṣābhibhāṣiṇī / HV_App.I,29A.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:8858: kiṃ tasyā vratakaiḥ kāryaṃ kiṃ vā syād upavāsakaiḥ / HV_App.I,29A.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:8859: yā bhartur devatā nityaṃ satyadharmaguṇānvitā // HV_App.I,29A.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:8861: yā yonim icchate nārī śubhāṃ saṃkucitām api / **HV_App.I,29A.405**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8862: kṛṣṇāṃ caturdaśīṃ sā tu saṃvatsaram upoṣya ca // **HV_App.I,29A.405**4:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:8864: muktāyugmena saṃyuktāṃ śubhāṃ yoniṃ labhet tataḥ // **HV_App.I,29A.405**4:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8865: vidhavā strī tu yā syād daivayogāt satī sati / HV_App.I,29A.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:8866: tasyā vakṣyāmi yo dharmaḥ purāṇoktaḥ sumadhyame // HV_App.I,29A.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:8867: patiṃ sṃakalpayitvā sā citrasthaṃ vātha mṛnmayam / HV_App.I,29A.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:8868: tasya pūjāṃ sadā kuryāt satāṃ dharmam anusmaret // HV_App.I,29A.409 //
GE07hv_apppu:8869: tata evābhyanujñāṃ ca nityaṃ yācate suvratā / HV_App.I,29A.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:8870: vratake copavāse ca bhojane ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29A.411 //
GE07hv_apppu:8871: bhartṛlokān vrajaty evaṃ na ced vyuccarate patim / HV_App.I,29A.412 /
GE07hv_apppu:8872: śāṇḍilī sūryavad bhāti satataṃ patidevatā // HV_App.I,29A.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:8873: adyaprabhṛti sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ caiva yoṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.414 /
GE07hv_apppu:8874: drakṣyanti puṇyakavidhiṃ paurāṇo yaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:8875: muniś ca nāradaḥ kṛtsnaṃ paurāṇaṃ jñāsyate vidhim / HV_App.I,29A.416 /
GE07hv_apppu:8876: upavāsasya dharmātmā vratakānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.417 //
GE07hv_apppu:8877: aditiś cāpi sendrāṇī tvaṃ ca somasute vare / HV_App.I,29A.418 /
GE07hv_apppu:8878: pravartane vratakānāṃ puṇyakānāṃ ca sarvadā / HV_App.I,29A.419 /
GE07hv_apppu:8879: kīrtanīyāḥ satīnāṃ hi bhaviṣyatha guṇānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,29A.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:8881: prādurbhāveṣu sarveṣu viṣṇor bhāryā mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.422 /
GE07hv_apppu:8882: jñāsyanti puṇyakavidhiṃ nityam eva sanātanam // HV_App.I,29A.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:8883: saviśeṣaṃ ca dharmāṇāṃ strīdharmeṣu praśasyate / HV_App.I,29A.424 /
GE07hv_apppu:8884: patibhaktir aduṣṭatvam avāgduṣṭatvam eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.425 //
GE07hv_apppu:8886: yā patiṃ dūṣayen nārī duṣṭair vākyaiś ca nīcavat / **HV_App.I,29A.425**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:8887: sā yāti narakān ghorān yāvat tapati bhāskaraḥ // **HV_App.I,29A.425**5:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:8888: bhojanaṃ kurute yā tu agrato bhartur eva ca / **HV_App.I,29A.425**5:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:8889: yāvanti pāṃśavo bhūmau tāvad varṣāṇi valgulī // **HV_App.I,29A.425**5:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8891: evam uktās tu tāḥ sādhvyo mahādevyā tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29A.426 /
GE07hv_apppu:8892: jagmur hṛṣṭā mahādevīṃ praṇipatya harapriyām // HV_App.I,29A.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:8893: aditir vratakaṃ cakre śṛṇu yad dharmacāriṇī / HV_App.I,29A.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:8894: umāvratavidhiḥ sarvaḥ pūrvoddiṣṭas tayā kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.429 //
GE07hv_apppu:8895: pārijāte nibadhyātha mama dattas tu kaśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.430 /
GE07hv_apppu:8896: aditivratakaṃ nāma tad dattaṃ satyabhāmayā // HV_App.I,29A.431 //
GE07hv_apppu:8897: tad eva vratakaṃ dattaṃ sāvitryā dharmanityayā // HV_App.I,29A.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:8898: tair eva yuktaiḥ saṃyuktam idaṃ tv abhyadhikaṃ kṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.433 //
GE07hv_apppu:8899: saṃdhyākāle ca saṃprāpte sthāne sthāne tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29A.434 /
GE07hv_apppu:8900: pūjanaṃ vā namaskāro japaś ca dviguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29A.435 //
GE07hv_apppu:8901: sāvitryā vratakaṃ kṛtvā tathādityā vrataṃ satī / HV_App.I,29A.436 /
GE07hv_apppu:8902: bhartuḥ kulaṃ pitṛkulaṃ tathātmānaṃ ca tārayet // HV_App.I,29A.437 //
GE07hv_apppu:8903: indrāṇī vratakaṃ cakre tathaivomā yathāvidhi / HV_App.I,29A.438 /
GE07hv_apppu:8904: raktaṃ abhyadhikaṃ vāso bhojanaṃ caiva sāmiṣam // HV_App.I,29A.439 //
GE07hv_apppu:8905: caturthe divase cāpi puṇyakārthavidhiḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29A.440 /
GE07hv_apppu:8906: ahorātropavāsaś ca deyaṃ kumbhaśataṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29A.441 //
GE07hv_apppu:8907: gaṅgayā vratakaṃ dattaṃ tad evaumaṃ yaśaskari / HV_App.I,29A.442 /
GE07hv_apppu:8908: snānam abhyadhikaṃ kāryaṃ pratyūṣasyātmano jale // HV_App.I,29A.443 //
GE07hv_apppu:8909: anyatra vā jale māgha-- śuklapakṣe haripriye / HV_App.I,29A.444 /
GE07hv_apppu:8910: etad gaṅgāvrataṃ nāma sarvakāmapradaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,29A.445 //
GE07hv_apppu:8911: sapta sapta ca saptātha kulāni harivallabhe / HV_App.I,29A.446 /
GE07hv_apppu:8913: deyaṃ kumbhasahasraṃ tu gaṅgāyā vratake śubhe / HV_App.I,29A.448 /
GE07hv_apppu:8914: tāraṇaṃ pāraṇaṃ caiva tad vrataṃ sārvakāmikam // HV_App.I,29A.449 //
GE07hv_apppu:8915: yamabhāryā cakārātha vrataṃ yāmarathaṃ śubham / HV_App.I,29A.450 /
GE07hv_apppu:8916: hemante tat tukartavyam ākāśe harivallabhe // HV_App.I,29A.451 //
GE07hv_apppu:8917: imāni caiva vākyāni brūyād ākāśam āsthitā / HV_App.I,29A.452 /
GE07hv_apppu:8918: snātā śucisamācārā namaskṛtya patiṃ śubhe // HV_App.I,29A.453 //
GE07hv_apppu:8919: carāmy ahaṃ yāmarathaṃ himaṃ pṛṣṭhena dhāraye / HV_App.I,29A.454 /
GE07hv_apppu:8920: pativratā jīvaputrā bhaveyaṃ ca purodhikā // HV_App.I,29A.455 //
GE07hv_apppu:8921: sapatnīś cādhitiṣṭheyaṃ paśyeyaṃ caiva mā yamam / HV_App.I,29A.456 /
GE07hv_apppu:8922: sabhartṛputrā jīveyaṃ ciraṃ sumukham eva ca // HV_App.I,29A.457 //
GE07hv_apppu:8923: patilokaṃ ca gaccheyaṃ bhaveyaṃ nandinī tathā / HV_App.I,29A.458 /
GE07hv_apppu:8924: sucelā mṛṣṭahastā ca svajaneṣṭā guṇānvitā // HV_App.I,29A.459 //
GE07hv_apppu:8925: evaṃ kṛtvā tato vipraṃ madhunā svasti vācayet / HV_App.I,29A.460 /
GE07hv_apppu:8926: tilair api tathā kṛṣṇaiḥ pāyasena tu bhojayet // HV_App.I,29A.461 //
GE07hv_apppu:8927: evaṃ vratāni devībhiḥ kṛtāny amaravarṇini / HV_App.I,29A.462 /
GE07hv_apppu:8929: ahaṃ bravīmi tapasā madīyena samanvitā / HV_App.I,29A.464 /
GE07hv_apppu:8930: sarvā drakṣyatha puṇyāni vratakāni tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29A.465 //
GE07hv_apppu:8931: paurāṇāny umayā devyā yāni dṛṣṭāni vai purā / HV_App.I,29A.466 /
GE07hv_apppu:8934: rukmiṇī vratakaṃ cakre dṛṣṭvā vratakavistaram / HV_App.I,29A.468 /
GE07hv_apppu:8935: umāyā varadānena dṛṣṭvā divyena cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,29A.469 //
GE07hv_apppu:8938: tathā jāmbavatī cakre puromāvratakaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29A.472 /
GE07hv_apppu:8939: dadāv abhyadhikaṃ sā tu ratnavṛkṣaṃ manoharam // HV_App.I,29A.473 //
GE07hv_apppu:8940: satyā dadau tathaivātha puromāvratakaṃ yathā / HV_App.I,29A.474 /
GE07hv_apppu:8941: pītam abhyadhikaṃ vāsas tayā dattam umāvrate // HV_App.I,29A.475 //
GE07hv_apppu:8942: rohiṇyātha ca phālgunyā maghayā ca purātane / HV_App.I,29A.476 /
GE07hv_apppu:8943: vratāni khalu dattāni bahūni kulavardhane // HV_App.I,29A.477 //
GE07hv_apppu:8944: dadau śatabhiṣā caiva vratakaṃ puṇyalakṣaṇam / HV_App.I,29A.478 /
GE07hv_apppu:8949: sarvair evāsahendraś ca (sic) umā vai rudrasaṃyutā / **HV_App.I,29A.479**6:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:8950: sve sthānena gatā rājan viṣṇor vratakaśāsanāt (sic) // **HV_App.I,29A.479**6:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8953: Appendix 29B, transliterated by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, proof--read by , version of August, 2004 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:8954: [k: After App I (No. 29A), K Ñ2 V B D T G M4 cont. with a passage given in App. I (No. 29B). :k]
GE07hv_apppu:8959: teṣāṃ vadhaṃ muniśreṣṭha kīrtayasvāndhakasya ca // HV_App.I,29B.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:8962: tatra pradhānā bahavo babhūvur asurottamāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:8963: śarāgninā na dagdhāste rudreṇa tripurālayāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:8964: ṣaṣṭiḥ śatasahasrāṇi na nyūnāny adhikāni ca // HV_App.I,29B.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:8965: te jñātivadhasaṃtaptāś cakrur vīrāḥ purā tapaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:8969: teṣām udumbaraṃ rājan gaṇa ekaḥ samāśritaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:8970: vṛkṣaṃ tatrāvasan vīra te kurvanto mahat tapaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:8971: kapitthaṃ vṛkṣam āśritya kecit tatroṣitāḥ purā / HV_App.I,29B.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:8972: sṛgālavāṭīṃ tv aparre cerur ugraṃ tathā tapaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:8973: vaṭamūle tathā cerus tapaḥ kauravanandana / HV_App.I,29B.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:8974: adhīyantaḥ pare brahma vaṭaṃ gatvāsurātmajāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:8975: teṣāṃ tuṣṭaḥ prajākartā naradeva pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:8976: varaṃ dātuṃ suraśreṣṭhaḥ prāpto dharmabhṛtāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:8977: varaṃ varayatety uktās te rājan padmayoninā / HV_App.I,29B.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:8978: te neṣur varadānaṃ tu dviṣantas tryambakaṃ vibhum / HV_App.I,29B.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:8980: tān uvāca tato brahmā sarvajñaḥ kurunandana / HV_App.I,29B.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:8981: viśvasya jagataḥ kartuḥ saṃhartuś ca mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:8982: kaḥ śakto 'pacitiṃ gantum māstu vo 'tha vṛthā śramaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:8984: tam astūya sukhaṃ svarge vastum icchanti ye 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:8985: te neṣus tatra kecit tu durātmāno mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:8986: atheṣur apare rājann asurā bhavyabhāvanāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:8987: neṣur ye sudurātmānas tān uvāca tāmaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:8988: varayadhvaṃ varaṃ vīrā rudrakrodham kṛte 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:8989: te ūcuḥ sarvadevānām avadhyāḥ syāma he vibho / HV_App.I,29B.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:8990: purāṇi ṣaṭ ca no deva bhavantv antar mahītale // HV_App.I,29B.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:8991: sarvakāmasamṛddhārthaṃ ṣaṭpuraṃ cāstu naḥ prabho / HV_App.I,29B.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:8992: vayaṃ ca ṣaṭpuragatās vasema ca sukhaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29B.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:8993: rudrāc ca no bhayaṃ na syād yena no jñātayo hatāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:8994: nihataṃ tripuraṃ dṛṣṭvā bhītāḥ sma tapasāṃ nidhe // HV_App.I,29B.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:8996: asurā bhavatāvadhyā devānāṃ śaṃkarasya ca / HV_App.I,29B.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:8997: na bādhiṣyatha ced viprān satpathasthān satāṃ priyān // HV_App.I,29B.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:8998: vipropaghātaṃ mohāc cet kariṣyatha kathaṃcana / HV_App.I,29B.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:8999: nāśaṃ yāsyatha viprā hi jagataḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:9000: nārāyaṇād dhi bhetavyaṃ kurvadbhir brāhmaṇāhitam / HV_App.I,29B.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:9001: sarvabhūteṣu bhagavān hitaṃ dhatte janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:9002: te gatā asurā rājan brahmaṇā ye visarjitāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:9005: ye 'pi bhaktā mahādevam asurā dharmacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:9006: svaṃ hi darśanaṃ teṣāṃ dadau tripuranāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:9007: śvetaṃ vṛṣabham āruhya somaḥ sapravaraḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29B.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:9008: uvāca cedaṃ bhagavān asurān sa satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:9009: vairaṃ utsṛjya dambhaṃ ca hiṃsāṃ cāsurasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:9010: mām eva cāśritās tasmād varaṃ sādhu dadāmi vaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:9011: yair dīkṣitāḥ stha munibhiḥ satkriyāparamair dvijaiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:9012: saha tair gamyatāṃ svargaḥ prīto 'haṃ vaḥ sukarmaṇā // HV_App.I,29B.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:9013: iha ye caiva vatsyanti tāpasā brahmavādinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:9014: api kāpitthikāvṛkṣe teṣāṃ lokā yathā mama // HV_App.I,29B.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:9015: iha māsāntapakṣāntau yaḥ kariṣyati mānavaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:9016: vānaprathena vidhinā pūjayan māṃ tapodhanaḥn // HV_App.I,29B.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:9017: varṣāṇāṃ sa sahasraṃ tu tapasāṃ prāpsyate phalam / HV_App.I,29B.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:9018: kṛtvā trirātraṃ vidhival lapsyate cepsitaṃ gatim // HV_App.I,29B.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:9019: arkadvīpe nivasato dviguṇaṃ tad bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,29B.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:9020: nīce deśe ca bhadraṃ vo varam etaṃ dadāmy aham // HV_App.I,29B.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:9021: śvetavāhananāmānaṃ yaś ca māṃ pūjayiṣyati / HV_App.I,29B.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:9022: sarvato bhayacitto 'pi gatiṃ sa mama yāsyati // HV_App.I,29B.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:9023: audumbarān vāṭamūlān dvijān kāpitthikān api / HV_App.I,29B.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:9025: munīṃś ca brahmavāṭīyān saviśeṣeṇa ye narāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:9026: pūjayiṣyanti satataṃ te yāsyantīpsitāṃ gatim // HV_App.I,29B.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:9027: ity uktvātha mahādevo bhagavāñ śvetavāhanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:9028: tair eva sahitaḥ sarvai rudralokaṃ jagāma vai // HV_App.I,29B.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:9029: jambūmārgaṃ gamiṣyāmi jambūmārge vasāmy aham / HV_App.I,29B.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:9033: etasminn eva kāle tu caturvedaṣaḍaṅgavit / HV_App.I,29B.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:9036: aśvamedhaḥ kṛtas tena vasudevasya dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:9038: āvartāyāḥ śubhe tīre sunadyā munijuṣṭayā // HV_App.I,29B.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:9039: sakhā tu vasudevasya sahādhyāyī dvijottamaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:9040: upādhyāyaś ca kauravya kṣīrahotā mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:9041: vasudevas tatra yāto devakyā sahitaḥ prabho / HV_App.I,29B.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:9042: yajamānaṃ ṣaṭpurasthaṃ yathā śakro bṛhaspatim // HV_App.I,29B.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:9043: tat satraṃ brahmadattasya bahvannaṃ bahudakṣiṇam / HV_App.I,29B.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:9047: vyāso 'haṃ yājñavalkyaś ca sumantur jaiminis tathā / HV_App.I,29B.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:9048: dhṛtimāñ jājaliś caiva devalādyāś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:9050: yatrepsitān dadau kāmān devakī dharmacāriṇī / HV_App.I,29B.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:9052: tasmin satre vartamāne daityāḥ ṣaṭpuravāsinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:9053: nikumbhādyāḥ samāgamya tam ucur varadarpitāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:9054: kalpyatāṃ yajñabhāgo naḥ somaṃ pāsyāmahe vayam / HV_App.I,29B.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:9055: kanyāś ca brahmadatto no yajamānaḥ prayacchatu // HV_App.I,29B.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:9056: bahvyaḥ santy asya kanyāś ca rūpavatyo mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.93 /
GE07hv_apppu:9057: āhūya tāḥ pradātavyāḥ sarvathaiva hi naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,29B.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:9058: ratnāni ca brahmadatto viśiṣṭāni dadātu naḥ / HV_App.I,29B.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:9059: anyathā tu na yaṣṭavyaṃ vayam ājñāpayāmahe // HV_App.I,29B.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:9060: etac chrutvā brahmadattas tān uvāca mahāsurān / HV_App.I,29B.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:9061: yajñabhāgo na vihitaḥ purā vo 'surasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:9062: kathaṃ sattre somapānaṃ śakyaṃ dātuṃ mayā hi vaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:9064: kanyā hi mama yā deyās tāś ca saṃkalpitā mayā / HV_App.I,29B.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:9066: ratnāni tu prayacchāmi sāntvenāhaṃ vicintya vai / HV_App.I,29B.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:9067: balān naiva pradāsyāmi devakīputram āśritaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:9068: nikumbhādyās tu ruṣitāḥ pāpāḥ ṣaṭpuravāsinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:9069: yajñavāṭaṃ vilulupur jahruḥ kanyāś ca tās tathā // HV_App.I,29B.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:9070: taṃ dṛṣṭvā saṃpravṛttaṃ tu dadhyāv ānakaduṃdubhiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:9071: vāsudevaṃ mahātmānaṃ balabhadraṃ gadaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29B.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:9072: viditārthas tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ pradyumnam idam abravīt / HV_App.I,29B.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:9073: gaccha kanyāparitrāṇaṃ kuru putrāśu māyayā / HV_App.I,29B.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:9074: yāvad yāvanasainyena ṣaṭpuraṃ yāmy ahaṃ prabho // HV_App.I,29B.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:9075: sa yayau ṣaṭpuraṃ vīraḥ pitur ājñākaras tadā // HV_App.I,29B.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:9077: kanyās tā māyayā dhīmān ājahre sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:9078: māyāmayīś ca kṛtvānyā nyastavān rukmiṇīsutaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:9079: mā bhair iti ca dharmātmā devakīm uktavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,29B.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:9080: māyāmayīs tu tā hatvā sutā hy asya durāsadāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:9081: ṣaṭpuraṃ viviśur daityāḥ parituṣṭā nārādhipa // HV_App.I,29B.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:9082: karma cāsārya te tatra vidhidṛṣṭena karmaṇā / HV_App.I,29B.119 /
GE07hv_apppu:9083: yad viśiṣṭaṃ bahuguṇaṃ tad abhūc ca narādhipa // HV_App.I,29B.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:9084: etasminn antare prāptā rājānas tatra bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:9085: satre nimantritāḥ pūrvaṃ brahmadattena dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29B.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:9086: jarāsaṃdho danta vaktraḥ śiśupālas tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29B.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:9087: pāṇḍavā dhārtarāṣṭrāś ca mālavānāṃ gaṇās tathā // HV_App.I,29B.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:9088: rukmī caivāhvṛtiś caiva nīlo nādhrama eva ca / HV_App.I,29B.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:9089: vindānuvindāv āvantyau ślayaḥ śakunir eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:9090: rājānaś cāpare vīrā mahātmāno dṛḍhāyudhāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:9092: ete caiva mahātejā rājānaś ca dṛḍhavratāḥ / **HV_App.I,29B.127**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9093: āvāsitā nātidūre ṣaṭpurasya ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:9094: tān dṛṣṭvā nāradaḥ śrīmān acintayad aninditaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:9095: kṣatrasya yādavānāṃ ca bhaviṣyati samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:9096: atra hetur ayaṃ yuddhe tasmāt tat prayatāmy aham / HV_App.I,29B.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:9097: evaṃ saṃcintayitvā sa nikumbhabhavanaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:9098: pūjitaḥ sa nikumbhena dānavaiś ca tathāparaiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:9099: upaviṣṭaḥ sa dharmātmā nikumbham idam abravīt // HV_App.I,29B.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:9100: kathaṃ virodhaṃ yadubhiḥ kṛtvā svasthair ihāsyate / HV_App.I,29B.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:9101: yo brahmadattaḥ sa kṛṣṇaḥ sa hi tasya pituḥ sakhā // HV_App.I,29B.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:9102: śatāni pañca bhāryāṇāṃ brahmadattasya dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29B.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:9104: śatadvayaṃ brahmaṇīnāṃ rājanyānāṃ tathā śatam / HV_App.I,29B.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:9105: vaiśyānāṃ śataṃ ekaṃ ca śādrīṇāṃ śatam eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:9106: tābhiḥ śuśrūṣito dhīmān durvāsa dharmavittamaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:9107: tena tāsāṃ varo datto muninā puṇyakarmaṇā // HV_App.I,29B.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:9108: ekaikas tanayo rānn ekekā duhitā tathā / HV_App.I,29B.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:9110: kanyā bhavanti tanayās tasyāsure punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:9111: saṃgame saṃgame vīra bhartṛbhiḥ śayane saha // HV_App.I,29B.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:9112: sarvaṃ puṣpamayaṃ gandhaṃ sravanti ca varāṅganāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:9113: sarvadā yauvane nyastāḥ sarvāś caiva pativratāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:9115: jānanti sarvā daiteya varadānena dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:9116: putrāś ca rūpasaṃpannāḥ śāstrārthakuśalās tathā / HV_App.I,29B.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:9118: svīkariṣyanti tāṃś caiva ye samiṣyanti vai nṛpāḥ / **HV_App.I,29B.151**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9119: sve sve sthitā varṇadharme yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:9120: tāḥ kanyā bhaimamukhyānāṃ dattāḥ prāyeṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29B.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:9121: avaśeṣaṃ śataṃ tv ekaṃ yad ānītaṃ kila tvayā // HV_App.I,29B.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:9122: tadarthe yādavān vīrān yodhayiṣyasi sarvathā / HV_App.I,29B.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:9123: sāhāyyārthe tu rājāno vriyantāṃ hetupūrvakam // HV_App.I,29B.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:9124: brahmadattasutārthaṃ ca rātnāni vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,29B.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:9126: ātithyaṃ kriyatāṃ caiva ye sameṣyanti vai nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:9127: evam ukte tathā cakrur asurās te 'tihṛṣṭavat // HV_App.I,29B.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:9128: labdhvā pañcaśataṃ kanyā ratnāni vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,29B.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:9129: yathārheṇa narendrais tā vibhaktā bhaktivatsalāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:9130: ṛte pāṇḍusutān vīrān vāritā nāradena te / HV_App.I,29B.163 /
GE07hv_apppu:9132: tuṣṭais tair asurā hy uktā rājan bhūmipasattamaiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:9134: arcitāḥ sma yathānyāyaṃ kṣatraṃ suraripus tadā / HV_App.I,29B.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:9135: kṣatraṃ nārcitapūrvaṃ hi divyair vīrair bhavadvidhaiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:9136: nikumbho 'thābravīd dhṛṣṭaḥ kṣatraṃ suraripus tadā / HV_App.I,29B.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:9137: anuvarṇayitvā kṣatrasya mahātmyaṃ satyam eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:9138: yuddhaṃ no ripubhiḥ sārdhaṃ bhaviṣyati nṛpottamāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:9139: sāhāyyaṃ dattam iccchāmo bhavadbhis tatra sarvathā // HV_App.I,29B.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:9140: evam astv iti tān ūcuḥ kṣatriyāḥ kṣīṇakilbiṣāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:9141: pāṇḍaveyān ṛte vīrāñ śrutārthān nāradād vibho // HV_App.I,29B.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:9142: kṣatriyāḥ saṃniviṣṭās te yuddhārthaṃ kurunandana / HV_App.I,29B.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:9143: patnyas tu brahmadattasya yajñavāṭaṃ gatā api // HV_App.I,29B.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:9144: kṛṣṇo 'pi senayā sārdhaṃ prayayau ṣaṭpuraṃ vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,29B.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:9145: mahādevasya vacanam udvahan manasā nṛpa // HV_App.I,29B.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:9146: sthāpayitvā dvāravatyāṃ āhukaṃ pārthivaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29B.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:9147: sa tayā senayā sārdhaṃ paurāṇāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29B.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:9150: dattāgulmāpratisaraṃ kṛtvā taṃ vidhivat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29B.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:9151: pradyumnam aṭane śrīmān rakṣārthaṃ viniyujya ca // HV_App.I,29B.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:9155: balaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ sātyakiś ca tārkṣyam āruruhur mudā // HV_App.I,29B.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:9158: āvartāyā jale snātvā rudreṇa varadattayā / HV_App.I,29B.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:9160: pradyumnam agre sainyasya viyati sthāpya mānada / HV_App.I,29B.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:9161: rakṣārthaṃ yajñavāṭasya pāṇḍavān viniyujya ca // HV_App.I,29B.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:9162: śeṣāṃ senāṃ guhādvāri bhagavān viniyujya ca / HV_App.I,29B.193 /
GE07hv_apppu:9163: jayantam atha sasmāra pravaraṃ ca satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:9164: tāv āpetatur evātha svayaṃ cāpaśyatāṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29B.195 /
GE07hv_apppu:9165: viyaty eva niyuktau tau pradyumna iva bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:9166: tataḥ kṛṣṇasya vacanād āhato raṇaduṃdubhiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:9167: jalajā murajāś caiva vādyāny apy aparāṇi ca // HV_App.I,29B.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:9168: mākaro racito vyūhaḥ sāmbena ca gadena ca / HV_App.I,29B.199 /
GE07hv_apppu:9169: sāraṇaś coddhavaś cobhau bhojo vaitaraṇas tathā // HV_App.I,29B.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:9170: anādhṛṣṭiś ca dharmātmā vipṛthuḥ pṛthur eva ca / HV_App.I,29B.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:9171: k,rtavarmā ca daṃṣṭre dve vicakṣur arimardanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:9172: sanatkumāro dhkarmātmā cārudeṇṣaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.203 /
GE07hv_apppu:9174: śeṣā yādavasenā tu vyūhamadhye vyavasthitā / HV_App.I,29B.205 /
GE07hv_apppu:9175: rathair aśvair narair nāgair ākulā kulavardhana // HV_App.I,29B.206 //
GE07hv_apppu:9176: ṣaṭpurād api niṣkrāntā dānavā yuddhadurmadāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.207 /
GE07hv_apppu:9177: āruhya meghanādāṃś ca gardabhān api hastinaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:9178: makarāñ śiśumārāṃś ca hayān api ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:9179: mahiṣān atha khaḍgāṃś ca drutān api ca kacchapān // HV_App.I,29B.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:9180: etair eva rathair yuktair vividhāyudhapāṇayaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.211 /
GE07hv_apppu:9185: nikumbho niryayau agre devānām iva vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.216 //
GE07hv_apppu:9186: bhūmiṃ dyāṃ ca vavṛdhire dānavās te balotkaṭāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.217 /
GE07hv_apppu:9187: nadanto vividhān nādān kṣveḍantaś ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:9192: kaṭhinā nādino vīrā drupadasyandanās tathā / HV_App.I,29B.223 /
GE07hv_apppu:9193: rukmī caivāhvṛtiś caiva tasthatur niścitau raṇe / HV_App.I,29B.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:9195: śalyaś ca śakuniś cobhau bhagadattaś ca pārthivaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:9196: jarāsaṃdhas trijgartaś ca virāṭaś ca sahottaraḥ // HV_App.I,29B.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:9197: yuddhārtham udyatā vīrā nikumbhādyā jayaiṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:9198: yuyutsamānā yadubhir devair iva mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:9199: tato nikumbhaḥ samare śarair āśīviṣopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:9200: mamarda samare senāṃ bhaimnānāṃ bhīmadarśanām // HV_App.I,29B.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:9201: senāpatir anādṛṣṭir mamṛṣe tan na yādavaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:9202: mamarda ghorair bāṇaughaiś citrapuṅkhaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:9203: na ratho 'suramukhyasya dadṛśe na ca vājinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:9204: na dhvajo na nikumbhaś ca sarvaṃ bāṇābhisaṃvṛtam // HV_App.I,29B.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:9205: sa parītya tato vīro nikumbho māyināṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:9208: ruddhvā cābhyagamad vīraṃ māyābalam upāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:9209: punar eva nikumbhas tu kṛtavarmāṇam āhave / HV_App.I,29B.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:9210: anayac cārudeṣṇaṃ ca bhojaṃ vaitaraṇaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,29B.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:9211: sanatkumāraṃ tārkṣyaṃ ca tathaiva niśaṭholmukau / HV_App.I,29B.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:9213: na tasya dadṛśe deho māyācchanno janeśvara / HV_App.I,29B.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:9214: nayato yādavān ghorān guhāṃ ṣaṭpurasaṃjñitām // HV_App.I,29B.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:9215: tad dṛṣṭvā kadanaṃ ghoraṃ bhaimānāṃ bhītivardhanam / HV_App.I,29B.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:9216: cukopa bhagavān kṛṣṇo balaḥ satyaka eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:9217: saviśeṣaṃ tathā kāmaḥ sāmbaś ca paravīrahā / HV_App.I,29B.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:9218: aniruddhaś ca durdharṣo bhaimāś ca bahavo 'pare // HV_App.I,29B.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:9219: tataḥ śārṅgāyudhaḥ śārṅgaṃ kṛtvā sajyaṃ nareśvara / HV_App.I,29B.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:9220: dānaveṣu pravṛtteṣu tṛṇeṣv iva hutāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:9221: taṃ dṛṣṭvā dānavā devam abhidudruvur īśvaram / HV_App.I,29B.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:9222: śalabhāḥ kālapāśārtāḥ pradīptam iva pāvakam // HV_App.I,29B.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:9223: samutsṛjya śataghnīś ca parighāṃś ca sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:9224: śūlāni cāgnitulyāni pradīptāṃś ca paraśvadhān // HV_App.I,29B.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:9225: parvatāgrāṇi vṛkṣāṃś ca ghorāś ca vipulāḥ śilāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:9226: utkṣipya ca gajān mattān rathān api hayān api // HV_App.I,29B.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:9227: nārāyaṇāgnis tān sarvān dadāha prahasann iva / HV_App.I,29B.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:9229: śāradaṃ varṣaṇaṃ yadvat sahed vīra gavāṃ patiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:9230: tadvad yaduvṛṣaḥ sehe bāṇavarṣam ariṃdamaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:9233: na śekuḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ kṛṣṇasyāsurasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:9234: vyāditāsyasya siṃhasya vṛṣabhā iva bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:9235: te vadhyamānāḥ kṛṣṇena divam ācakramus tadā / HV_App.I,29B.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:9237: tān ākāśagatān aindrir jayantaḥ pravaras tadā / HV_App.I,29B.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:9239: nipetur asurāṇāṃ tu śirāṃsi dharaṇītale / HV_App.I,29B.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:9241: nipetur bahavaś cchinnā daityānāṃ vasudhātale / HV_App.I,29B.272 /
GE07hv_apppu:9243: raukmiṇeyas tataḥ sṛṣṭvā ghorāṃ māyāmayīṃ guhām / HV_App.I,29B.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:9244: adṛśyaniṣkramāṃ vīraḥ kṣatraṃ prakṣeptum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:9245: gadena saha dharmātmā sāraṇena śaṭhena ca / HV_App.I,29B.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:9246: sāmbena cāparaiś cāpi pūrvaṃ yena praveśitāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.277 //
GE07hv_apppu:9247: pramathya tarasā karṇaṃ yatantaṃ raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,29B.278 /
GE07hv_apppu:9248: jagrāha balavān kārṣṇiḥ prasphurantaṃ tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:9249: vinadya ca guhāṃ vīro ghorāṃ māyāmayīṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29B.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:9250: duryodhanaṃ ca rājānaṃ virāṭadrupadāv api // HV_App.I,29B.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:9251: śakuniṃ caiva śalyaṃ ca nīlaṃ cāpi nadīsutam / HV_App.I,29B.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:9252: vindānuvindau rājānau jarāsaṃdhaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:9253: trigartān mālavāṃś caiva vasātīṃś ca mahābalān / HV_App.I,29B.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:9255: tathāhvṛtim uvācedaṃ mātulaṃ rukmim eva ca / HV_App.I,29B.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:9256: śiśupālaṃ ca rājānaṃ bhagadattaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:9257: saṃbamdhaṃ ca gurutvaṃ ca mānayāmi narādhipāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:9258: guhām imāṃ ghorarūpāṃ yena prakṣepayāmi vaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:9260: prakṣeptavyā narendrās te guhāyām iti dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29B.291 //
GE07hv_apppu:9261: āśritya śāmbarīṃ māyāṃ nikumbhena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,29B.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:9262: prakṣiptān yādavāṃś caiva mākṣayiṣyāmi sarvathā // HV_App.I,29B.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:9263: ity ukte śiśupālas tu rājā senapatis tathā / HV_App.I,29B.294 /
GE07hv_apppu:9264: śarais tatarda tān bhaimān pradyumnaṃ saviśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:9265: bilvodakeśvaraṃ devaṃ raukmiṇeyo namasya ca / HV_App.I,29B.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:9266: ārambhan nṛpatiṃ baddhuṃ śiśupālaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,29B.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:9268: śailādir abravīd vīraṃ raukmiṇeyaṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,29B.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:9269: bilvodakeśvaro devaḥ prāha tvāṃ yadunandana / HV_App.I,29B.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:9270: sarvaṃ kuru yathā rātryāṃ proktas tvaṃ bhaima māyayā // HV_App.I,29B.301 //
GE07hv_apppu:9271: kanyārthaṃ ratnalubdhāṃs tu badhānemān narādhipān / HV_App.I,29B.302 /
GE07hv_apppu:9272: pāśais tvam eva moktuṃ ca pramāṇaṃ yadunandana // HV_App.I,29B.303 //
GE07hv_apppu:9273: asurāṃs tu mahābāho niḥśeṣān kartum arhasi / HV_App.I,29B.304 /
GE07hv_apppu:9274: evam eva ca vaktavyas tvayā vīra janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:9275: tataḥ sa bhagadattaṃ ca śiśupālaṃ ca bhūmipam / HV_App.I,29B.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:9276: āhvṛtiṃ caiva rumiṃ ca śeṣāṃś cānyān narādhipān // HV_App.I,29B.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:9277: babandha haradattais taiḥ pāśair uttamavīryavān / HV_App.I,29B.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:9278: māyāmayīṃ guhāṃ caiva nināya kurunandana // HV_App.I,29B.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:9279: baddhvā ca raukmiṇeyo 'tha niḥśvasanta ivoragān / HV_App.I,29B.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:9280: aniruddhaṃ cakārātha rakṣitāraṃ svam ātmajam // HV_App.I,29B.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:9282: senapatiṃ kṣatriyāṃś ca kośādhyakṣāṃś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:9283: hastyaśvarathavṛndāṃś ca cakāra ca tathātmasāt / HV_App.I,29B.314 /
GE07hv_apppu:9284: avyagras tu tato hantum asurān udyataḥ prabho // HV_App.I,29B.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:9285: saṃnaddha eva covāca brahmadattaṃ dvijottamam / HV_App.I,29B.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:9286: viśrabdhaṃ vartatāṃ karma mā bhaiḥ paśya dhanaṃjayam // HV_App.I,29B.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:9287: na devebhyo nāsurebhyo nānyebhyo dvijasattama / HV_App.I,29B.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:9288: bhayaṃ hi vidyate tasya goptāro yasya pāṇḍavāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:9289: na cāsurais tava sutāḥ spṛṣṭāḥ khalv api tejasā / HV_App.I,29B.320 /
GE07hv_apppu:9290: yajñavaṭe nirīkṣyaitān māyayā nihitā mayā // HV_App.I,29B.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:9293: rudreṣu bhūmipāleṣu sānugeṣu viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29B.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:9295: diśaḥ prasasrus te vārā vadhyamānāḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,29B.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:9297: nikumbhas tān athovāca ruṣito dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:9298: bhittvā pratijñāṃ kiṃ mohād bhayārtā yātha vihvalāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:9299: hīnapratijñāḥ kāṃl lokān prayāsyatha palāyitāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:9301: phalaṃ jitveha bhoktavyaṃ ripūn samarakarkaśān / HV_App.I,29B.330 /
GE07hv_apppu:9302: hatena cāpi śūreṇa vastavyaṃ tridive sukham // HV_App.I,29B.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:9303: palāyitvā grḥaṃ gatvā kasya drakṣyatha he mukham / HV_App.I,29B.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:9304: dārān vakṣyatha kiṃ cāpi dhig dhik kiṃ kiṃ na lajjatha // HV_App.I,29B.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:9305: evam uktā nivṛttās te lajjamānā nṛpāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:9306: dviguṇena ca vegena yuyudhur yadubhiḥ saha // HV_App.I,29B.335 //
GE07hv_apppu:9308: ye yānti yajñavāṭaṃ tu tān nihati dhanaṃjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.337 //
GE07hv_apppu:9309: yamau bhīmaś ca rājā ca dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.338 /
GE07hv_apppu:9310: dyāṃ prayātāj jaghānaindriḥ pravaraśca dvijottamaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.339 //
GE07hv_apppu:9316: susrāva śoṇitanadī nadīva jalād āgame // HV_App.I,29B.345 //
GE07hv_apppu:9317: tāṃ dṛṣṭvaiva nikumbhas tu vardhamānāṃś ca śātravān / HV_App.I,29B.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:9318: hatān sarvān sahāyāṃś ca vīryād evotpapāta ha // HV_App.I,29B.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:9319: sa vārito jayantena pravareṇa ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:9322: pravaraṃ tāḍayām āsa sa papāta mahītale // HV_App.I,29B.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:9323: aindris taṃ patitaṃ bhūmau bāhubhyāṃ parṣasvaje / HV_App.I,29B.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:9325: tataḥ suniścayaṃ kṛtvā pravaraṃ mucya satvaram / **HV_App.I,29B.352**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9326: viditvā caiva saprāṇaṃ hitvāsuram abhidrutaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:9327: abhidrutya nikumbhaṃ ca nistriṃśena jaghana ha / HV_App.I,29B.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:9329: tatakṣa bahulaṃ gātraṃ nikumbhasyaindrir āhave / HV_App.I,29B.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:9330: sa cintayām āsa tadā vadhyamāno mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29B.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:9331: kṛṣṇena saha yoddhavyaṃ vairiṇā jñātighātinā / HV_App.I,29B.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:9332: śrāvayāmi kim ātmānam āhave śakrasūnunā // HV_App.I,29B.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:9333: evaṃ sa niścayaṃ kṛtvā tattraivāntaradhīyata / HV_App.I,29B.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:9334: jagāma caiva yuddhārthaṃ yatra kṛṣṇo mahābalaḥn // HV_App.I,29B.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:9336: draṣṭum abhyāgato yuddhaṃ jahṛṣe saha daivataiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:9337: sāghu sādhv iti putraṃ ca parituṣṭaḥ sa sasvaje / HV_App.I,29B.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:9338: pravaraṃ cāpi dharmātmā sasvaje mohavarjitam // HV_App.I,29B.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:9340: jayamānaṃ raṇe dṛṣṭvā jayantaṃ raṇadurjayam // HV_App.I,29B.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:9341: dadarśātha nikumbhas tu keśavaṃ raṇadurjayam / HV_App.I,29B.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:9343: sa nādaṃ sumahat kṛtvā pakṣirājam atāḍayat / HV_App.I,29B.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:9344: parigheṇa sughoreṇa balaṃ sātyakim eva ca // HV_App.I,29B.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:9345: nārāyaṇaṃ cārjunaṃ ca bhīmaṃ cātha yudhiṣṭhiram / HV_App.I,29B.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:9346: yamau ca vasudevaṃ ca sāmbaṃ kāmaṃ ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,29B.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:9347: yuyudhe māyayā daityaḥ śīghrakārī ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.374 /
GE07hv_apppu:9348: na cainaṃ dadṛśuḥ sarve sarvaśastraviśāradāḥ // HV_App.I,29B.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:9349: yadā tu naiva paśyanti tadā bilvodakeśvaram / HV_App.I,29B.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:9350: dadhyau devaṃ hṛṣīkeśaḥ pramathānāṃ gaṇeśvaram // HV_App.I,29B.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:9352: yadā tu naiva paśyanti tadā devaṃ janārdanam / **HV_App.I,29B.377**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9354: tatas te dadṛśuḥ sarve prabhāvād atitejasaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.378 /
GE07hv_apppu:9357: āhvayantaṃ raṇe kṛṣṇaṃ vairiṇaṃ jñātināśanam // HV_App.I,29B.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:9358: sajjagāṇḍīva evātha pārthas tasya ratheṣubhiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:9359: parighaṃ caiva gātreṣu vivyādhainam athāsakṛt // HV_App.I,29B.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:9360: te bāṇās tasya gātreṣu parighaś ca janādhipa / HV_App.I,29B.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:9361: bhagnāḥ śilāśitāḥ sarve nipetuḥ kuñcitāḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,29B.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:9362: viphalān astrayuktāṃs tān dṛṣṭvā bāṇān dhanaṃjayaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:9363: papraccha keśavaṃ vīraḥ kim etad iti bhārata // HV_App.I,29B.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:9364: parvatān api bhindanti mama vajropamāḥ śarāḥ / HV_App.I,29B.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:9365: kim idaṃ devakīputra vismayo 'tra mahān mama // HV_App.I,29B.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:9366: tam uvāca tataḥ kṛṣṇaḥ prahasann iva bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:9367: mahadbhūtaṃ nikumbho 'yaṃ kaunteya śṛṇu vistaram // HV_App.I,29B.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:9368: purā gatvottarakurūṃs tapaś cakre mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.392 /
GE07hv_apppu:9370: athainaṃ chandayām āsa vareṇa bhagavān haraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.394 /
GE07hv_apppu:9371: sa vavre trīṇi rūpāṇi navadhyāni surāsuraiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:9374: tam uvāca mahādevo bhagavān vṛṣabhadhvajaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:9375: mama vā brāhmaṇānāṃ vā viṣṇor vāpriyam ācaran // HV_App.I,29B.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:9376: bhaviṣyasi harer vadhyo na tv anyasya mahāsura / HV_App.I,29B.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:9377: bramaṇyo 'haṃ ca viṣṇuś ca viprā naḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:9378: sa eṣa sarvaśastrāṇām avadhyaḥ pāṇḍunandana / HV_App.I,29B.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:9379: trideho 'tipramāthī ca varadattaś ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:9381: avadhyaṃ ṣaṭpuraṃ deham idam asya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.403 //
GE07hv_apppu:9382: ditiṃ śuśrūṣati tv eko deho 'sya tapasānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:9383: anyas tu deho ghoro 'sya yenāvasati ṣaṭpuram // HV_App.I,29B.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:9384: etat te sarvam akhyātaṃ nikumbhacaritaṃ mayā / HV_App.I,29B.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:9385: tvarayāsya vadhe vīra kathā paścād bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29B.407 //
GE07hv_apppu:9386: tayoḥ kathayator evaṃ kṛṣṇayor asuras tadā / HV_App.I,29B.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:9387: guhāṃ ṣaṭpurasaṃjñāṃ tāṃ viveśa taṇadurjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.409 //
GE07hv_apppu:9388: anviṣya tasya bhagavān viveśa madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:9389: tāṃ ṣaṭpuraguhāṃ ghrāṃ durdharṣāṃ kurunandana // HV_App.I,29B.411 //
GE07hv_apppu:9392: yatra praviśya bhagavān apaśyata janādhipān / HV_App.I,29B.414 /
GE07hv_apppu:9393: yuyudhe saha ghoreṇa nikumbhena janādhipa // HV_App.I,29B.415 //
GE07hv_apppu:9394: kṛṣṇasyānu praviṣṭās tu balādyā yādavās tathā / HV_App.I,29B.416 /
GE07hv_apppu:9395: praviṣṭāś ca tataḥ sarve pāṇḍavāś ca mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:9396: sametās tu praviṣṭās te kṛṣṇasyānumatena vai // HV_App.I,29B.418 //
GE07hv_apppu:9397: yuyudhe sa tu kṛṣṇena raukmiṇeyaḥ pracoditaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.419 /
GE07hv_apppu:9401: anayad yādavān sarvān yān ayaṃ baddhavān purā // HV_App.I,29B.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:9402: te muktā raukmiṇeyena prāptā yatra janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.421 /
GE07hv_apppu:9404: rājāno vīra muñceti punaḥ kāmam athābruvan / HV_App.I,29B.423 /
GE07hv_apppu:9405: mumoca cātha tān vīro raukmiṇeyo pratāpavān // HV_App.I,29B.424 //
GE07hv_apppu:9407: lajjayābhiplutā vīrās tasthur naṣṭaśriyas tathā // HV_App.I,29B.426 //
GE07hv_apppu:9408: nikumbham appi govindaḥ prayatantaṃ jayaṃ prati / HV_App.I,29B.427 /
GE07hv_apppu:9409: yodhayām āsa bhagavān ghoram ātmaripuṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,29B.428 //
GE07hv_apppu:9410: parigheṇāhataḥ kṛṣṇo nikumbhena bhṛśaṃ vibho / HV_App.I,29B.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:9411: gadayā cāpi kṛṣṇena nikumbhas tāḍito bhṛśam // HV_App.I,29B.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:9412: tāv ubhau moham āpannau suprahārahatau tadā // HV_App.I,29B.431 //
GE07hv_apppu:9413: tataḥ pravyathitān dṛṣṭvā pāṇḍavāṃś cātha yādavān / HV_App.I,29B.432 /
GE07hv_apppu:9414: jepur muṇigaṇās tatra kṛṣṇasya hitakāmyayā / HV_App.I,29B.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:9415: tuṣṭuvuś ca mahātmānaṃ vedaproktais tathā stavaiḥ // HV_App.I,29B.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:9416: tataḥ pratyāgataprāṇo bhagavān keśavas tadā / HV_App.I,29B.435 /
GE07hv_apppu:9417: dānavaś ca punar vīrau udyatau samaraṃ prati // HV_App.I,29B.436 //
GE07hv_apppu:9418: vṛṣabhāv iva nardantau gajāv iva ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.437 /
GE07hv_apppu:9419: śālāvṛkāv iva kruddhau praharantau raṇotkaṭau // HV_App.I,29B.438 //
GE07hv_apppu:9420: atha kṛṣṇaṃ tadovāca nṛpa vāg aśarīriṇī / HV_App.I,29B.439 /
GE07hv_apppu:9422: iti hovāca bhagavān devo bilvodakeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:9423: dharmaṃ yaśaś ca vipulaṃ prāpnuhi tvaṃ mahābala // HV_App.I,29B.442 //
GE07hv_apppu:9424: tathety uktvā namaskṛtvā lokanāthaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ / HV_App.I,29B.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:9426: tan nikumbhasya ciccheda śiraḥ pravarakuṇḍalam / HV_App.I,29B.445 /
GE07hv_apppu:9428: tat papāta śiras tasya bhūmau jvalitakuṇḍalam / HV_App.I,29B.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:9429: meghamatto gireḥ śṛṅgān mayūra iva bhūtale // HV_App.I,29B.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:9430: nikumbhe nihate tasmin devo bilvodakeśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29B.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:9431: tutoṣa ca naravyāghra jagattrāsakare vibho // HV_App.I,29B.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:9432: papāta puṣpavṛṣṭiś ca śakrasṛṣṭā nabhastalāt / HV_App.I,29B.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:9434: nananda ca jagat kṛtsnaṃ munayaś ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29B.453 //
GE07hv_apppu:9435: daityakanyāś ca bhagavān yadubhyaḥ śataśo dadau / HV_App.I,29B.454 /
GE07hv_apppu:9436: kṣatriyāṇāṃ ca bhagavān sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.455 /
GE07hv_apppu:9437: ratnāni ca vicitrāṇi vāsāṃsi pravarāṇi ca // HV_App.I,29B.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:9442: tad eva cātha pravaraṃ saṭpuraṃ puravardhanaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:9444: sattre samāpte ca tadā śaṅkhacakragadādharaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.461 /
GE07hv_apppu:9445: visarjayitvā tat kṣatraṃ pāṇḍavāṃś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29B.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:9448: niyuddhakuśalān mallān devo mallapriyas tadā / HV_App.I,29B.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:9449: yodhayitvā dadau bhūri vittaṃ vastrāṇi cātmavān // HV_App.I,29B.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:9450: mātāpitṛbhyāṃ sahito yadubhiś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.467 /
GE07hv_apppu:9451: abhivādya brahmadattaṃ yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm // HV_App.I,29B.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:9452: sa viveśa purīṃ ramyāṃ hṛṣṭapuṣṭajanākulām / HV_App.I,29B.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:9453: puṣpacitrapathāṃ vīro vandyamāno naraiḥ pathi // HV_App.I,29B.470 //
GE07hv_apppu:9454: imaṃ yaḥ ṣaṭpuravadhaṃ vijayaṃ cakrapāṇinaḥ / HV_App.I,29B.471 /
GE07hv_apppu:9455: śṛṇuyād vā paṭhed vāppi sa yuddhe jayam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,29B.472 //
GE07hv_apppu:9456: aputro labhate putram adhano labhate dhanam / HV_App.I,29B.473 /
GE07hv_apppu:9457: vyādhito mucyate rogād baddhaś cpay atha bandhanāt // HV_App.I,29B.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:9458: idaṃ puṃsavanaṃ proktaṃ gaubhādhānaṃ ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29B.475 /
GE07hv_apppu:9459: śrāddheṣu paṭhitaṃ samyag akṣayyakaraṇaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,29B.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:9462: satatam iha hi yaḥ paṭhen naraḥ @ HV_App.I,29B.479 @
GE07hv_apppu:9470: Appendix 29C, transliterated and proof--read by Renate Söhnen--Thieme, version of September 2004 :h]
GE07hv_apppu:9471: [k: After App I (No. 29B), K Ñ2 V B D T G M4 cont. with a passage given in App. I (No. 29C). :k]
GE07hv_apppu:9475: bhānumatyāś ca haraṇaṃ nikumbhasya vadhaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29C.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:9476: prabrūhi vadatāṃ śreṣṭha paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_App.I,29C.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:9478: ditir hateṣu putreṣu viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,29C.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:9479: tapasārādhayām āsa mārīcaṃ kaśyapaṃ purā // HV_App.I,29C.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:9480: tapasā kālayuktena tathā śuśrūṣayā muneḥ / HV_App.I,29C.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:9481: ānukūlyena ca tathā mādhuryeṇa ca bhārata // HV_App.I,29C.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:9482: parituṣṭaḥ kaśyapas tu tām uvāca tapodhanām / HV_App.I,29C.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:9483: parituṣṭo 'haṃ te bhadre varaṃ varaya suvrate // HV_App.I,29C.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:9485: hataputrāsmi bhagavan devair dharmabhṛtāṃ vara / HV_App.I,29C.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:9486: avaśyaṃ putram icchāmi devair amitavikramam // HV_App.I,29C.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:9488: avadhyas te suto devi dākṣāyaṇi bhaved iti / HV_App.I,29C.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:9489: devānāṃ saṃśayo nātra kaścit kamalalocane // HV_App.I,29C.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:9490: devadevam ṛte rudraṃ tasya na prabhavāmy aham // HV_App.I,29C.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:9491: ātmā tatas te putreṇa rakṣitavyo hi sarvathā // HV_App.I,29C.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:9492: anvālabhata tāṃ devīṃ kaśyapaḥ satyavāg atha / HV_App.I,29C.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:9493: aṅgulyodaradeśe tu sā putraṃ suṣuve tataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:9495: dvisahasrekṣaṇaṃ caiva tāvaccaraṇam eva ca // HV_App.I,29C.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:9496: sa vrajaty andhavad yasmād anandho 'pi hi bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:9497: tam andhako 'yaṃ nāmneti procus tatranivāsinaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:9498: avadhyo 'smīti lokān sa sarvān bādhati bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:9499: haraty api ca ratnāni sarvāṇy ātmabalāśrayāt // HV_App.I,29C.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:9503: cakāra satataṃ mohād andhakaḥ pāpaniścayaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:9504: trailokyavijayaṃ kartum udyataḥ satu bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:9505: sahāyair asuraiḥ sārdhaṃ bahubhiḥ sarvadharṣibhiḥ // HV_App.I,29C.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:9506: taṃ śrutvā bhagavāñ śakraḥ kaśyapaṃ pitaraṃ bravīt / HV_App.I,29C.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:9508: ājñāpaya vibho kāryam asmākaṃ samanantaram / HV_App.I,29C.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:9509: yavīyasaḥ kathaṃ nāma soḍhavyaṃ syān mune mayā // HV_App.I,29C.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:9510: iṣṭaputre prahartavyaṃ kathaṃ nāma mayā vibho / HV_App.I,29C.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:9511: ihātrabhavatī kuryān manyuṃ mayi hate sute // HV_App.I,29C.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:9513: vārayiṣyāmi devendra sarvathā bhadram astu te // HV_App.I,29C.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:9514: andhakaṃ vārayām āsa dityā saha tu kaśyapaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:9516: vārito 'pi sa duṣṭātmā bādhaty eva divaukasaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:9517: tais tair upāyair duṣṭātmā pramathya ca tathā parān // HV_App.I,29C.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:9518: babhañja kānane vṛkān udyānāni ca durmatiḥ / HV_App.I,29C.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:9519: uccaiḥśravaḥsutān aśvān balād apy ānayad divaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:9520: nāgān diśāgajasutān divyān āpi ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:9521: balād dharati devānāṃ paśyatāṃ baladarpitaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:9522: devān āpyāyante tu ye yajñais tapasā balāt / HV_App.I,29C.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:9523: teṣāṃ cakāra vidhvaṃsaṃ duṣṭātmā devakaṇṭakaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:9524: nejur yajñais trayo varṇās tepur naiva tapāṃsy api / HV_App.I,29C.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:9525: andhakasya bhayād rājan yajñavighnāni kurvataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:9526: tasyecchayā vāti vāyur ādityaś ca tapaty uta / HV_App.I,29C.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:9527: candramāś ca sanakṣatro dṛśyate naiva vā punaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:9528: na bhajanti vimānāni vihāyasy prabhāṃ prabho / HV_App.I,29C.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:9532: kurūn athottarān pāpo drāvayām āsa bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:9533: bhadrāśvān ketumālāṃś ca jambudvīpāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29C.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:9534: mānayanti ca taṃ devā dānavāś ca durāsadāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:9535: bhūtāni ca tathānyāni samarthāny api sarvathā // HV_App.I,29C.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:9536: ṛṣayo vadhyamānās tu sametā brahmavādinaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:9537: acintayann andhakasya vadhaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29C.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:9538: teṣāṃ bṛhaspatir madhye dhīmān idam athābravīt / HV_App.I,29C.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:9539: nāsya rudrād ṛte mṛtyur vidyate ca kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29C.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:9540: tathā vare dīyamāne kaśyapenāpi śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:9541: nāhaṃ rudrāt paritrātuṃ śakta ity eva dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29C.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:9542: tad upāyaṃ cintayāmaḥ śarvo yena sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:9544: viditārtho hi bhagavān avaśyaṃ jagataḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29C.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:9545: aśrupramarjanaṃ devaḥ kariṣyati satāṃ gatiḥ // HV_App.I,29C.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:9546: vrataṃ hi devadevasya bhavasya jagato guroḥ / HV_App.I,29C.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:9547: santo 'sadbhyo rakṣitavyā brāhmaṇās tu viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:9548: te vayaṃ nāradaṃ sarve prayāmaḥ śaraṇaṃ dvijaṃ / HV_App.I,29C.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:9549: upāyaṃ vetsyate tatra vayasyo hi bhavasya saḥ // HV_App.I,29C.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:9550: bṛhaspativacaḥ śrutvā sarve te 'tha tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:9551: [k: Ds1 (marg.) Bom. Poona eds, G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:9555: devarṣe bhagavan sādho kailāsaṃ vraja satvaram / **HV_App.I,29C.75**1:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:9556: vijñaptum arhase devam andhakasya vadhe haram // **HV_App.I,29C.75**1:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:9557: trāṇārthaṃ nāradaṃ procus tāṃs tatheti sa coktavān // HV_App.I,29C.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:9558: ṛṣiṣv atha prayāteṣu tat kāryaṃ nārado muniḥ / HV_App.I,29C.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:9559: vicārya manasā vidvān iti kāryaṃ sa dṛṣṭavān // HV_App.I,29C.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:9560: sa devadevaṃ bhagavān draṣṭuṃ munir athāyayau / HV_App.I,29C.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:9562: sa tatra rajanīm ekām uṣitvā munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:9563: mandārāṇāṃ vane ramnye dayitaḥ śūlapāṇinaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:9564: ājagāma punaḥ svargaṃ labdhvānujñāṃ vṛṣadhvajāt / HV_App.I,29C.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:9565: mandārapuṣpaiḥ sukṛtāṃ mālām ābadhya bhārata // HV_App.I,29C.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:9567: saṃtānamālyadāmaṃ ca sarvais taiḥ kusumaiḥ kṛtam // HV_App.I,29C.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:9568: tac ca kaṇṭhe samāsajya mahāgandhaṃ nārādhipa / HV_App.I,29C.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:9569: āyayāv andhako yatra durātmā baladarpitaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:9570: andhakas tv atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā gandham āghrāya cottamam / HV_App.I,29C.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:9572: kuto 'yaṃ puṣpajātir vā kamanīyā tapodhana / HV_App.I,29C.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:9573: gandhān varṇāñ śubhāṃs tān hi bhoḥ puṣyati muhur muhuḥ // HV_App.I,29C.92 //
GE07hv_apppu:9575: kaḥ prabhus tasya deśasya yaḥ sa sukṛtavān mune / HV_App.I,29C.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:9576: ācakṣya yady anugrāhyā vayaṃ te devatātithe // HV_App.I,29C.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:9578: ācakṣva me mune sarvaṃ saṃsiśasva varaṃ hi vai / **HV_App.I,29C.95**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9580: yad yad iṣṭaṃ mamāpi syāt tad deyaṃ devatātithau / **HV_App.I,29C.95**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9581: tam uvāca muniśreṣṭhaḥ prahasann iva bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:9582: grahāya dakṣiṇe haste mahatas tapaso nidhiḥ // HV_App.I,29C.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:9583: mandaraḥ parvataśreṣṭho vīra kāmagamaṃ vanam / HV_App.I,29C.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:9584: tatra caivaṃvidhaṃ puṣpaṃ bhoḥ sṛṣṭiḥ śūlapāṇinaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:9585: na tu tatra vanaṃ kaścid acchandena mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:9586: praveṣṭuṃ labhate tad dhi rakṣanti pramathottamāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:9589: nityaṃ prakrīḍate tatra somaḥ sapravaro haraḥ / HV_App.I,29C.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:9593: strīratnamaṇiratnāni yāni cānyāni cāpy atha / HV_App.I,29C.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:9594: kāṅkṣitāni phalanti sma te drumā haravallabhāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:9595: na tatra sūryaḥ somo 'tha tapaty atulavikrama / HV_App.I,29C.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:9596: svayaṃprabhaṃ taruvanaṃ tad bho duḥkhavivarjitam // HV_App.I,29C.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:9597: tatra gandhāḥ sravanty anye ratnāny anye mahādrumāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:9598: vāsāṃsi vividhāny anye sugandhāni mahābala // HV_App.I,29C.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:9599: bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ ca peyaṃ ca coṣyaṃ lehyaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29C.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:9600: tarubhyaḥ sravate tebhyo vividhaṃ manasepsitam // HV_App.I,29C.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:9601: pipāsā vā bubhukṣā vā glāniś cintāpi vānagha / HV_App.I,29C.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:9602: na mandāravane vīra bhavatīty upadhāryatām // HV_App.I,29C.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:9603: na te varṇayituṃ śakyā guṇā varṣaśatair api / HV_App.I,29C.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:9604: guṇā ye tatra vartante svargād bahuguṇottarāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:9605: atīva vijayel lokān samahendrān na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:9606: ekāham api yas tatra vased vai ditijottama // HV_App.I,29C.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:9607: svargasyāpi hi tat svargaṃ sukhānām api sat sukham / HV_App.I,29C.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:9608: babhūva jagataḥ sarvam iti me dhīyate manaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:9611: andhako nāradavacaḥ śrutvā tattvena bhārata / HV_App.I,29C.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:9612: mandaraṃ parvataṃ gantuṃ mano dadhre mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29C.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:9614: jagāma mandaraṃ kruddho mahādevālayaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29C.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:9619: vātoddhūtair vanaiḥ phullair nṛtyantam iva ca kvacit / HV_App.I,29C.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:9620: prasrutair dhātubhiś citrair viliptam iva ca kvacit // HV_App.I,29C.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:9621: pakṣisvanaiḥ sumadhurair nadantam iva ca kvacit / HV_App.I,29C.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:9622: haṃsaiḥ śucipadaiḥ kīrṇaṃ saṃpatadbhir itas tataḥ // HV_App.I,29C.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:9623: mahābalaiś ca mahiṣaiś caradbhir daityanāśanaiḥ / HV_App.I,29C.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:9628: sa mandaraṃ giriṃ prāha rūpiṇaṃ baladarppitaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:9629: vetsi tvaṃ hi yathāvadhyo varadānād ahaṃ pituḥ // HV_App.I,29C.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:9630: mama caiva vaśe sarvaṃ trailokyaṃ sacarācaram / HV_App.I,29C.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:9631: pratiyoddhuṃ na māṃ kaścid icchaty api gire bhayāt // HV_App.I,29C.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:9632: pārijātavanaṃ cāsti tava sānau mahāgire / HV_App.I,29C.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:9633: sarvakāmapradaiḥ puṣpair bhūṣitaṃ ratnam uttamam // HV_App.I,29C.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:9634: tad ācakṣvopabhokṣyāmi tad vanaṃ tava sānujam // HV_App.I,29C.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:9635: kiṃ kariṣyasi kruddhas tvaṃ mano hi tvarate mama // HV_App.I,29C.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:9636: trātāraṃ nānupaśyāmi mayā khalv arditasya te / HV_App.I,29C.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:9637: ity ukto mandaras tena tatraivāntarhito 'bhavat / HV_App.I,29C.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:9639: mumoca nādaṃ sumahad idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,29C.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:9640: mayā nāma yācyamāno yasmān na bahu manyase / HV_App.I,29C.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:9641: ahaṃ cūrṇīkaromi tvāṃ balaṃ parvata paśya me // HV_App.I,29C.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:9642: evam uktvā gireḥ śṛṅgam utpāṭya bahuyojanam / HV_App.I,29C.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:9643: niṣpipeṣa gires tasya śṛṅge 'thānyatra vīryavān / HV_App.I,29C.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:9644: saha tair asuraiḥ sarvair varadānena darpitaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:9646: viditvā bhagavān rudraś cakārānugrahaṃ gireḥ // HV_App.I,29C.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:9649: nabhaścyutaiḥ purā yadvat tadvad eva virājate // HV_App.I,29C.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:9650: atha devaprabhāvena śṛṅgāṇy utpāṭitāni tu / HV_App.I,29C.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:9651: kṣiptāni cāsurān eva ghnanti ghorāṇi bhārata // HV_App.I,29C.162 //
GE07hv_apppu:9652: kṣiptvā ye prapalāyante śṛṅgāṇi tu mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.163 /
GE07hv_apppu:9653: śṛṅais tais taiḥ sma vadhyante parvatasya janādhipa // HV_App.I,29C.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:9654: ye svasthās tv asurās tatra tiṣṭhanti girisānuṣu / HV_App.I,29C.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:9655: śṛṅgais te tasya vadhyante mandarasya mahāgireḥ // HV_App.I,29C.166 //
GE07hv_apppu:9656: tato 'ndhakas tadā dṛṣṭvā senāṃ tāṃ sūditāṃ tathā / HV_App.I,29C.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:9658: āhvayaitaṃ vanaṃ yasya yuddhārtham upatiṣṭhatu / HV_App.I,29C.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:9659: kiṃ tvayācala yuddhena hatāḥ sma cchadmanā raṇe // HV_App.I,29C.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:9660: evam ukte tv andhakena vṛṣabheṇa maheśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29C.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:9662: pramathānāṃ gaṇair dhīmān vṛto vai bahulocanaḥ / HV_App.I,29C.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:9663: tathā bhūtagaṇaiś caiva dhīmān bhūtagaṇeśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29C.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:9664: pracakampe tataḥ kṛtsnaṃ trailokyaṃ ruṣite hare / HV_App.I,29C.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:9665: sindhavaś ca pratisrotam ūhuḥ prajvalitodakāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:9666: jagmur diśo 'gnidāhaṃ ca sarvato haratejasā / HV_App.I,29C.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:9667: yuyudhuś ca grahāḥ sarve viparītā janādhipa // HV_App.I,29C.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:9668: celuś ca girayas tatra kāle kurukulodvaha / HV_App.I,29C.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:9670: uṣṇabhāś candramāś cāsīt sūryaḥ śītaprabhas tathā / HV_App.I,29C.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:9671: na brahma vividus tatra munayyo brahmavādinaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:9672: vaḍavāḥ suṣuvur gāś ca gāvo 'śvān api cānagha / HV_App.I,29C.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:9673: petur vṛkṣāś ca medinyām acchinna bhasmasātkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,29C.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:9674: bādhante vṛṣabhā gāś ca gāvaś cāruruhur vṛṣān / HV_App.I,29C.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:9675: rākṣasā yātudhānāś ca piśācāś cāpi sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,29C.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:9678: andhako 'pi mahātejā bāṇair api vavarṣa tam // **HV_App.I,29C.86**5:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:9679: viparītaṃ jagad dṛṣṭvā mahādevas tathā gatam / HV_App.I,29C.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:9681: tat papāta harotsṛṣṭam andhakorasi durdharam / HV_App.I,29C.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:9682: bhasmasāc cākarod raudram andhakaṃ sādhukaṇṭakam // HV_App.I,29C.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:9683: tato devagaṇāḥ sarve munayaś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29C.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:9684: śaṃkaraṃ tuṣṭuvuś caiva jagacchatrau nibarhite // HV_App.I,29C.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:9685: devaduṃdubhayo neduḥ puṣpavṛṣṭiḥ papāta ha / HV_App.I,29C.193 /
GE07hv_apppu:9686: trailokyaṃ virvṛtaṃ cāsīn narendra vigatajvaram // HV_App.I,29C.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:9688: jepuś ca brāhmaṇā vedān ījuś ca kratubhis tathā // HV_App.I,29C.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:9689: grahāḥ prakṛtim āpedur ūhur nadyo yathā purā / HV_App.I,29C.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:9690: na jajvāla jale vahnir āśāḥ sarvāḥ prasedire // HV_App.I,29C.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:9691: mandaraḥ parvataśreṣṭhaḥ pureva virarāja ha / HV_App.I,29C.199 /
GE07hv_apppu:9693: reme somaś ca bhagavān pārijātavane haraḥ / HV_App.I,29C.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:9694: supracārān surān kṛtvā śakrādīn dharmataḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29C.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:9702: [k: K Ñ2 V B D T G M4 cont. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:9704: mune 'ndhakavadhaḥ śrāvyaḥ śruto 'yaṃ khalu bho mayā / HV_App.I,29D.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:9705: śāntis trayāṇāṃ lokānāṃ kṛtā devena dhīmatā // HV_App.I,29D.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:9706: nikumbhasya hataṃ dehaṃ dvitīyaṃ cakrapāṇinā / HV_App.I,29D.3 /

GE07hv_apppu:10278: pārthena sahitas tārkṣyaṃ nāgaśatrum ariṃdamaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:10279: rathe tvam anugaccheti saṃdiśya makaradhvajam / HV_App.I,29E.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:10280: tvareti garuḍaṃ vīraḥ saṃdideśa ca kāśyapam // HV_App.I,29E.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:10281: vajraṃ nagaram āyāntaṃ nikumbhaṃ raṇadurjayam / HV_App.I,29E.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:10283: pradyumnaś ca mahātejā māyināṃ pravaro nṛpa // HV_App.I,29E.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:10286: nikumbhas tv atha taṃ dṛṣṭvā tridhātmānam athākarot // HV_App.I,29E.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:10287: tān sarvān yodhayām āsa nikumbhaḥ prahasann iva / HV_App.I,29E.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:10289: savyenālambya hastena kanyāṃ bhānumatīṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29E.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:10290: dakṣiṇenātha hastena gadayā praharaty uta // HV_App.I,29E.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:10291: kanyārthaṃ na ca kṛṇṣau vā kāmo vā nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,29E.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:10292: nirdayaṃ praharanti sma nikumbhe ca mahāsure // HV_App.I,29E.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:10293: samarthās te mahātmānaḥ śatruṃ hantuṃ durāsadāḥ / HV_App.I,29E.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:10295: śreṣṭho dhanuṣmatāṃ pārthaḥ sarvathā kuśalo yudhi / HV_App.I,29E.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:10296: nārācair vidhinā daityaṃ śaraśaktyā jaghāna ha // HV_App.I,29E.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:10297: te tu vaitastikair bāṇair vividhur dānavaṃ yudhi / HV_App.I,29E.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:10298: na kanyāṃ kalayā yuktyā śikṣayā ca mahīpate // HV_App.I,29E.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:10299: tataḥ sa kanyayā sārdhaṃ tatraivāntaradhīyata / HV_App.I,29E.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:10300: āsurīm āśrito māyāṃ na tāṃ vetti hi kaś cana // HV_App.I,29E.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:10301: taṃ kṛṣṇau raukmiṇeyaś ca pṛṣṭhato 'nuyayus tadā / HV_App.I,29E.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:10302: hārītaḥ śakuno bhūtvā tasthāv atha mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29E.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:10303: taṃ bāṇaiḥ punar evātha vīro bhūyo dhanaṃjayaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:10304: vaitastikair marmabhidbhiḥ kanyāṃ rakṣann atāḍayat // HV_App.I,29E.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:10305: sa imāṃ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ saptadvīpāṃ mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,29E.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:10306: babhrāmānugataś caiva tair vīrair arimardanaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:10308: papāta celagaṅgāyāḥ puline saha kanyayā // HV_App.I,29E.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:10309: na devā nāsurā vāpi laṅghayanti tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,29E.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:10310: gokarṇaṃ tejasā guptaṃ mahādevasya bhārata // HV_App.I,29E.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:10311: etad antaram āsādya pradyumnaḥ śīghravikramaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:10312: kanyāṃ bhānumatīṃ bhaimo jagrāha raṇadurjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:10313: asuraḥ so 'rdito rājan kṛṣṇābhyāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,29E.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:10315: jagāma pṛṣṭhato yātau kṛṣṇau tārkṣyagatau tadā // HV_App.I,29E.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:10316: viveśa ṣaṭpuraṃ caiva jñātīnām ālayaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29E.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:10317: tatra vīrau guhādvāri kṛṣṇau rātriṃ tadoṣatuḥ // HV_App.I,29E.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:10318: raukmiṇeyo 'pi kṛṣṇena saṃdiṣṭo dvārakāṃ purīm / HV_App.I,29E.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:10320: nayitvā cāyayau vīraḥ ṣaṭpuraṃ dānavākulam / HV_App.I,29E.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:10321: dadarśa ca guhādvāri kṛṣṇau bhīmaparākramau // HV_App.I,29E.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:10322: ūṣatur dvāram ākramya ṣaṭpurasya mahābalau / HV_App.I,29E.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:10324: tato 'nantaram etasmād bilād atibalas tadā / HV_App.I,29E.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:10325: nirjagāma balī yoddhuṃ nikumbho bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:10326: tasya nirgacchatas tasmād bilāt pārtho viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29E.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:10327: rurodha sarvato mārgaṃ śarair gāṇḍīvaniḥsṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,29E.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:10328: so 'bhisṛtya gadāṃ ghorām udyamya bahukaṇṭakām / HV_App.I,29E.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:10329: śirasy atāḍayat pārthaṃ nikumbho balināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:10330: gadayābhihate pārthe raktaṃ vamati muhyati / HV_App.I,29E.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:10331: hasitvā so 'suro dṛpto raukmiṇeyam atāḍayat // HV_App.I,29E.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:10332: taṃ prāṅmukhamukhaṃ vīraṃ māyāvī māyināṃ varam / HV_App.I,29E.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:10333: adṛṣṭenāhato vīraḥ śirasy atha mumoha saḥ // HV_App.I,29E.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:10334: tathāgatau tu dṛṣṭvā tau muhyamānau sutāḍitau / HV_App.I,29E.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:10337: tāv anyonyaṃ durādharṣau garjantāv abhipetatuḥ // HV_App.I,29E.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:10338: airāvatagataḥ śakraḥ sarvair devagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,29E.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:10339: dadarśa tan mahāyuddhaṃ ghoraṃ devāsuraṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29E.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:10340: dṛṣṭvā devān hṛṣīkeśaś citrair yuddhair ariṃdamaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:10341: iyeṣa dānavaṃ hantuṃ devānāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,29E.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:10342: sa maṇḍalāni citrāṇi darśayām āsa keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:10345: śikṣayā bhrāmayāṇo 'tha maṇḍalāni cacāra ha // HV_App.I,29E.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:10346: ṛṣabhāv iva garjantau bṛṃhantāv iva kuñjarau / HV_App.I,29E.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:10347: vāsitāntaram āsādya kruddhau sālāvṛkāv iva // HV_App.I,29E.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:10348: ājaghāna nikumbhas tu gadayā gadapūrvajam / HV_App.I,29E.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:10350: tatkālam eva kṛṣṇo 'pi bhrāmayitvā mahāgadām / HV_App.I,29E.88 /
GE07hv_apppu:10351: nikumbhamūrdhani tadā pātayām āsa bhārata // HV_App.I,29E.89 //
GE07hv_apppu:10352: avaṣṭabhya muhūrtaṃ tu hariḥ kaumodakīṃ gadām / HV_App.I,29E.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:10353: tasthau jagadgurur dhīmān mumoha patitaḥ kṣitau // HV_App.I,29E.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:10354: hāhābhūtaṃ jagat sarvaṃ tatkālam abhavat tadā / HV_App.I,29E.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:10355: tathā gate vāsudeve naradeve mahātmani // HV_App.I,29E.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:10358: nūnam ātmecchayā kṛṣṇas tathā cakre surottamaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:10359: ko hi śakto mahātmānaṃ yuddhe mohayituṃ harim // HV_App.I,29E.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:10360: kṛṣṇaḥ pratyāgataprāṇaś cakram udyamya bhārata / HV_App.I,29E.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:10363: śarīraṃ tat parityajya na tu taṃ vetti keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:10364: mumūrṣati mṛto vāyam iti matvā janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:10365: rarakṣa smaramāṇo 'tha vīro vīravrataṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29E.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:10368: pradyumno 'py atha māyāvī viditaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt / HV_App.I,29E.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:10369: nikumbhas tāta nāsty atra gataḥ kvāpi sudurmatiḥ // HV_App.I,29E.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:10370: pradyumnenaiva mukte tu tan nanāśa kalevaram / HV_App.I,29E.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:10371: prajahāsātha bhagavān arjunena saha prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29E.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:10373: dadṛśus te tadā vīrāḥ kṣitau divi ca sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,29E.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:10374: sahasrāṇy eva kṛṣṇaṃ tu tathā pārtham ariṃdamam / HV_App.I,29E.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:10375: raukmiṇeyaṃ tathā vīraṃ tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,29E.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:10376: pāṇḍavasya dhanuḥ kecit kecid asya mahāśarān / HV_App.I,29E.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:10377: anye 'sya jagṛhur hastāv anye pādau mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,29E.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:10378: evaṃ grahāya te vīram agamaṃs te vihāyasi / HV_App.I,29E.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:10379: pārthānām api koṭyas tu gṛhītānāṃ tadābhavan // HV_App.I,29E.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:10380: nāntaṃ dadarśa kṛṣṇaś ca kārṣṇiś ca ripunāśanau / HV_App.I,29E.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:10381: vicchidya tau śarair vīrau nikumbhaṃ pārthavarjitau // HV_App.I,29E.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:10382: ekaikas tu dvidhā chinno dvaidhībhavati bhārata / HV_App.I,29E.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:10383: divyajñānas tadā kṛṣṇo bhagavān atra dṛṣṭvān // HV_App.I,29E.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:10384: nikumbhaṃ tattvataś cāpi dadarśa madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:10385: sraṣṭāraṃ sarvamāyānāṃ hartāraṃ phalgunasya ca // HV_App.I,29E.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:10386: sa cakreṇa śiras tasya cakartāsurasūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:10388: sa muktvā phalgunaṃ rājaṃś chinne śirasi bhārata / HV_App.I,29E.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:10391: kṛṣṇavākyena jagraha kārṣṇir viyati mānada // HV_App.I,29E.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:10392: nikumbhe patite bhūmau samāśvāsya dhanaṃjayam / HV_App.I,29E.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:10394: samiyāyātha dāśarho dvārakāṃ mudito vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,29E.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:10395: nāradaṃ ca mahātmānaṃ vavande yadunandanaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:10396: nārado 'tha mahātejā bhānuṃ yādavam abravīt / HV_App.I,29E.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:10397: bhāno mā kārṣīr manyuṃ tvaṃ śrūyatāṃ bhaimanandana // HV_App.I,29E.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:10399: sa śaśāpa tato roṣān munir duhitaraṃ tava // HV_App.I,29E.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:10401: sutārthe te mayā sārdhaṃ munibhiḥ sa prasāditaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:10402: bālāṃ vratavatīṃ kanyām anāgasam imāṃ mune / HV_App.I,29E.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:10403: śaptavān asi dharmajña kathaṃ dharmabhṛtāṃ vara / HV_App.I,29E.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:10405: asmābhir evam uktas tu durvāsā bhaimanandana / HV_App.I,29E.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:10407: yad avocam ahaṃ vākyaṃ tat tathā na tad anyathā / HV_App.I,29E.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:10408: ripuhastam avaśyaṃ hi gamiṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:10409: adūṣitā tu dharmeṇa bhartāram upalapsyati // HV_App.I,29E.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:10410: bahuputrā bahudhanā subhagā ca bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,29E.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:10411: sugandhagandhā ca sadā kumārī ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29E.149 /
GE07hv_apppu:10412: na ca śokām imaṃ ghoraṃ tan vaṅgī dhārayiṣyati // HV_App.I,29E.150 //
GE07hv_apppu:10413: evaṃ bhānumatī vīra sahadevāya dīyatām / HV_App.I,29E.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:10414: śraddadhānaḥ sa śūraś ca dharmaśīlaś ca pāṇḍavaḥ // HV_App.I,29E.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:10415: tato bhānumatīṃ bhānur dadau mādrīsutāya vai / HV_App.I,29E.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:10416: sahadevāya dharmātmā nāradasya vacaḥ smaran // HV_App.I,29E.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:10417: ānītaḥ sahadevaś ca preṣite cakrapāṇinā / HV_App.I,29E.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:10418: vivāhe ca tadā vṛtte sabhāryaḥ svapuraṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29E.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:10419: imaṃ kṛṣṇasya vijayaṃ yaḥ paṭhec chṛṇuyād atha / HV_App.I,29E.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:10420: vijayaṃ sarvakṛtyeṣu śraddadhāno labhen naraḥ // HV_App.I,29E.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:10428: [k: K Ñ2 V B D T G M4 cont. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10432: krīḍāṃ ca sāgare divyāṃ kṛṣṇīnām atitejasām / HV_App.I,29F.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:10433: aśrauṣaṃ paramāścaryaṃ mune dharmabhṛtāṃ vara // HV_App.I,29F.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:10435: tan me kautūhalaṃ śrotuṃ prasādād bhavato mune // HV_App.I,29F.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:10437: hanta te kīrtayiṣyāmi vajranābhavadhaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:10438: vijayaṃ caiva kāmasya sāmbasya ca mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:10439: meroḥ sānau narapate tapaś cakre mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:10440: vajranābha iti khyāto niścitaḥ samitiṃjayaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:10441: tasya tuṣṭo mahātejā brahmā lokapitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:10442: vareṇa cchandayām āsa tapasā paritoṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:10443: avadhyatāṃ sa devebhyo vavre dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:10444: puraṃ vajrapuraṃ caiva sarvaratnamayaṃ śubham // HV_App.I,29F.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:10445: svacchandena praveśaś ca na vāyor api bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:10449: tathā tad abhavat tasya varadānena bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:10451: koṭiśo varalabdhaṃ tam asurāḥ parivārya te / HV_App.I,29F.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:10452: ūṣur vajrapure rājan saṃvāheṣu tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29F.22 //
