GE07hv_apppu:10456: purasya cātmanaś caiva jagad bādhitum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:10457: mahendram abravīd gatvā devalokaṃ viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29F.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:10458: aham īśitum icchāmi trailokyaṃ pākaśāsana // HV_App.I,29F.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:10459: atha vā me prayacchasva yuddhaṃ devagaṇeśvara / HV_App.I,29F.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:10460: sāmānyaṃ hi jagat kṛtsnaṃ kāśyapānāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,29F.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:10461: sa bṛhaspatinā sārdhaṃ mantrayitvā sureśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:10463: satreṣu dīkṣitaḥ saumya kaśyapo naḥ pitā muniḥ / HV_App.I,29F.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:10464: tasmin vṛtte yathā nyāyyaṃ tathā sa hi kariṣyati // HV_App.I,29F.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:10465: tataḥ sa pitaraṃ gatvā kaśyapaṃ dānavo 'bravīt / HV_App.I,29F.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:10466: yathoktaṃ devarājena tam uvācātha kaśyapaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:10467: satre kṛtte kariṣyāmi yathā nyāyyaṃ bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,29F.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:10468: tvaṃ tu vajrapure putra vasa gaccha samāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:10469: evam ukte vajranābhaḥ svam eva nagaraṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:10470: mahendro 'pi yayau devo dvārakāṃ dvāramālinīm // HV_App.I,29F.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:10471: gatvā cāntarhito devo vāsudevam athābravīt / HV_App.I,29F.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:10472: vajranābhasya vṛttāntaṃ tam uvāca janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:10473: śaurer upasthito deva vājimedho mahākratuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:10474: tasmin vṛtte vajranābhaṃ pātayiṣyāmi vāsava // HV_App.I,29F.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:10475: tatropāyaṃ praveśe tu cintayāvaḥ satāṃ gate / HV_App.I,29F.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:10476: nānicchayā praveśo 'sti tatra vāyor api prabho // HV_App.I,29F.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:10477: tato gato devarājo vāsudevena satkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:10478: vājimedhe ca saṃprāpte vasudevasya bhārata // HV_App.I,29F.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:10479: tasmin yajñe vartamāne praveśārthaṃ surottamau / HV_App.I,29F.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:10480: cintayām āsatur vīrau devarājācyutāv ubhau // HV_App.I,29F.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:10481: tatra yajñe vartamāne sunāṭyena naṭas tadā / HV_App.I,29F.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:10482: maharṣīṃs toṣayām āsa bhadranāmeti nāmataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:10483: taṃ vareṇa muniśreṣṭhāś chandayām āsur ātmavān / HV_App.I,29F.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:10484: sa vavre tu naṭo bhadro varaṃ deveśvaropamaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:10487: bhojyo dvijānāṃ sarveṣāṃ bhaveyaṃ munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:10488: saptadvīpāṃ ca pṛthivīṃ vicareyam imām aham // HV_App.I,29F.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:10490: avadhyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ sthāvarā ye ca jaṅgamāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:10491: yasya yasya va veṣeṇa praviśeyam ahaṃ khalu / HV_App.I,29F.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:10492: mṛtasya jīvato vāpi bhāvenotpāditasya vā // HV_App.I,29F.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:10493: sa bhūyas tādṛśaḥ syāṃ vai jarārogavivarjitaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:10494: tuṣyeyur munayo nityam anye ca mama sarvadā // HV_App.I,29F.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:10495: evam astv iti sa prokto brāhmaṇair nṛpate naṭaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:10497: purāṇi dānavendrāṇām uttarāṃś ca kurūṃs tathā / HV_App.I,29F.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:10498: bhadrāśvān ketumālāṃś ca kālāpadvīpam eva ca // HV_App.I,29F.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:10499: parvaṇīsu tu sarvāsu dvārakāṃ yadumaṇḍitām / HV_App.I,29F.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:10500: āyāti varadattaḥ sa lokavīra mahānaṭaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:10502: uvāca bhagavāñ śakraḥ sāntvayitvā sureśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:10504: vimānavāhā devānāṃ sukṛtīnāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29F.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:10505: devānām asti kartavyaṃ kāryaṃ śatruvadhānvitam / HV_App.I,29F.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:10506: tat kartavyaṃ na mantraś ca bhettavyo vaḥ kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,29F.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:10507: akurvatāṃ devatājñām ugro daṇḍaḥ pated api / HV_App.I,29F.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:10510: ito 'ntaḥpuravāpīṣu caradhvam ucitaṃ hi vaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:10511: tasyāsti kanyāratnaṃ hi trailokyātiśayaṃ śubham / HV_App.I,29F.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:10512: nāmnā prabhāvatī nāma candrābheva prabhāvatī // HV_App.I,29F.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:10513: varadānena sā labdhā mātrā kila varānanā / HV_App.I,29F.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:10514: haimavatyā mahādevyāḥ sakāśād iti naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,29F.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:10515: svayaṃvarā ca sā kanyā bandhubhiḥ sthāpitā satī / HV_App.I,29F.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:10516: ātmecchayā patiṃ haṃsā varayiṣyati śobhanā // HV_App.I,29F.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:10517: tad bhavadbhir guṇā vācyāḥ pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:10518: sadbhūtāḥ kularūpasya śīlasya vayasas tathā // HV_App.I,29F.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:10519: yadā sā raktabhāvā ca vajranābhasutā satī / HV_App.I,29F.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:10520: tasyāḥ sakāśāt saṃdeśo nayitavyaḥ samādhinā // HV_App.I,29F.90 //
GE07hv_apppu:10521: pradyumnasya punas tasmād ānayadhvaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,29F.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:10522: svabuddhyā prāptakālaṃ ca saṃvidheyaṃ hitaṃ mama / HV_App.I,29F.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:10523: netravaktraprasādaś ca kartavyas tatra sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.93 //
GE07hv_apppu:10524: tathā tathā guṇā vācyāḥ pradyumnasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:10525: yathā yathā prabhāvatyā manas tatra bhavet sthiram // HV_App.I,29F.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:10526: vṛttāntaś cānudivasaṃ pradeyo mama sarvathā / HV_App.I,29F.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:10527: dvāravatyāṃ ca kṛṣṇasya bhratur mama yavīyasaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:10528: tāvad yatnaś ca kartayaḥ pradyumno yāvad ātmavit / HV_App.I,29F.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:10530: avadhyās te tu devānāṃ brahmaṇo varadarpitāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:10531: devaputrair hi hantavyāḥ pradyumnapramukhair yudhi // HV_App.I,29F.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:10532: naṭo dattavaras tasya veṣam āsthāya yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:10534: etac ca sarvaṃ kartavyam anyac ca svayam eva hi / HV_App.I,29F.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:10536: praveśas tatra devānāṃ nāsti haṃsāḥ kathaṃcana / HV_App.I,29F.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:10537: vajranābhepsite tatra praveśaḥ khalu sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:10540: te vāsavavacaḥ śrutvā haṃsā vajrapuraṃ yayuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:10541: pūrvocitaṃ hi gamanaṃ tatra teṣāṃ janādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:10542: te dīrghikāsu ramyāsu nipetur vīra pakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:10544: te vai nadanto madhuraṃ saṃskṛtāpūrvabhāṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:10545: pūrvam apy āgatās te tu vismayaṃ janayanti hi // HV_App.I,29F.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:10546: antaḥpuropabhogyāsu cerūr vāpīṣu te nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:10549: sa tān uvāca daiteyo dhartarāṣṭrān idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:10552: āgantavyaṃ jālapādāḥ svam idaṃ bhavatāṃ gṛham / HV_App.I,29F.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:10554: te tathoktāḥ śakunayo vajranābhena bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:10555: tathoty uktvā hi viviśur dānavendraniveśanam // HV_App.I,29F.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:10556: cakruḥ paricayaṃ te ca devakāryavyapekṣayā / HV_App.I,29F.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:10557: mānuṣālāpinas te tu kathāś cakruḥ pṛthagvidhāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:10559: striyo remur viśeṣeṇa śṛṇvantyaḥ saṃgatāḥ kathāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:10560: tato vicaratīṃ haṃsā dadṛśuś cāruhāsinīm / HV_App.I,29F.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:10562: haṃsāḥ paricitāṃ cakrus tāṃ tataś cāruhāsinīm // HV_App.I,29F.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:10563: sakhīṃ śucimukhī cakre haṃsī rājasutāṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29F.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:10564: sā tāṃ kadācit papraccha vajranābhasutāṃ sakhīm / HV_App.I,29F.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:10566: trailokyasundarīṃ vedmi tvām ahaṃ hi prabhāvati / HV_App.I,29F.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:10567: rūpaśīlaguṇair devi kiṃcit tvāṃ vaktum utsahe // HV_App.I,29F.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:10568: vyatikrāmati te bhīru yauvanaṃ cāruhāsini / HV_App.I,29F.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:10569: yad atītaṃ punar naiti gataṃ srota ivāmbhasaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:10570: kāmopabhogatulyā hi ratir devi na vidyate / HV_App.I,29F.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:10571: strīṇāṃ jagati kalyāṇi satyam etad bravīmi te // HV_App.I,29F.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:10572: svayaṃvaratve nyastā tvaṃ pitrā sarvāṅgaśobhane / HV_App.I,29F.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:10573: na ca kiṃcid varayase devāsurakulodbhavam // HV_App.I,29F.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:10574: vrīḍitā yānti suśroṇi pratyākhyātās tvayā śubhe / HV_App.I,29F.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:10575: rūpaśauryaguṇair yuktāḥ sadṛśās tvatkulasya hi // HV_App.I,29F.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:10576: āgatān necchase devi sadṛśān kularūpayoḥ / HV_App.I,29F.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:10577: ihaiṣyati kim arthaṃ tvāṃ pradyumno rukmiṇīsutaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:10578: trailokye yasya rūpeṇa sadṛśo 'tha kulena vā / HV_App.I,29F.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:10579: gunair vā cārusarvāṅgi śauryeṇāpy atha vā śubhe // HV_App.I,29F.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:10580: deveṣu devaḥ suśroṇi dānaveṣu ca dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:10581: mānuṣeṣv api dharmātmā mānuṣaḥ sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:10582: yaṃ sadā devi dṛṣṭvā hi sravanti jaghanāni hi / HV_App.I,29F.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:10583: āpīnānīva dhenūnāṃ srotāṃsi saritām iva // HV_App.I,29F.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:10584: na pūrṇacandreṇa mukhaṃ nayane vā kuśeśayaiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:10585: utsahāmopamātuṃ hi mṛgendreṇātha vā gatim // HV_App.I,29F.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:10586: jagataḥ sāram uddhṛtya putraḥ sa vihitaḥ śubhe / HV_App.I,29F.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:10587: kṛtvānaṅgaṃ vaśe sāṅgaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,29F.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:10588: hṛtena śambaro bālye yena pāpo nibarhitaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:10589: māyāś ca sarvāḥ saṃprāptā na ca śīlaṃ vināśitam // HV_App.I,29F.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:10590: yān yān guṇān pṛthuśroṇi manasā kalpayiṣyasi / HV_App.I,29F.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:10591: eṣṭavyās triṣu lokeṣu pradyumne sarva eva te // HV_App.I,29F.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:10594: prabhāvatī śucimukhīm iti hovāca bhāvinī / HV_App.I,29F.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:10595: viṣṇur mānuṣalokasthaḥ śrutaḥ sa bahuśo mayā // HV_App.I,29F.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:10596: pituḥ kathayataḥ saumye nāradasya ca dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:10597: śatruḥ sa kila daityānāṃ varjanīyaḥ kilānaghe // HV_App.I,29F.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:10598: kulāni kila daityānāṃ tena dagdhāni mānini / HV_App.I,29F.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:10599: pradīptena rathāṅgena śārṅgeṇa gadayā tathā // HV_App.I,29F.167 //
GE07hv_apppu:10601: ity ete dānavendreṇa saṃdiśyante hi taṃ prati // HV_App.I,29F.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:10602: manoratho hi sarvāsāṃ strīṇām evaṃ śucismite / HV_App.I,29F.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:10603: bhaved dhi me patikulaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ pitṛkulād iti // HV_App.I,29F.171 //
GE07hv_apppu:10604: yadi nāmābhyupāyaḥ syāt tasyehāgamanaṃ prati / HV_App.I,29F.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:10605: mahān anugraho me syāt kulaṃ syāt pāvitaṃ ca me // HV_App.I,29F.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:10606: samarthanāṃ me pṛṣṭā tvaṃ prayaccha śucilāpini / HV_App.I,29F.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:10607: pradyumnaḥ syād yathā bhartā mama vṛṣṇikulodbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:10609: asurāṇāṃ striyo vṛddhāḥ kathayantyo mayā śrutāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:10610: pradyumnasya tathā janma purastād api me śrutam / HV_App.I,29F.178 /
GE07hv_apppu:10611: yathā ca tena nihato balavān kālaśambaraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:10612: hṛdi me vartate nityaṃ pradyumnaḥ khalu sattame / HV_App.I,29F.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:10613: hetuḥ sa nāsti tasyārthe yathā mama samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:10614: dāsī tavāhaṃ sakhyārhe dūtye tvāṃ ca visarjaye // HV_App.I,29F.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:10615: paṇḍitāsi vadopāyaṃ mama tasya ca saṃgame // HV_App.I,29F.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:10616: tatas tāṃ sāntvayitvā sā prahasantīdam abravīt / HV_App.I,29F.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:10617: tatra dūtī gamiṣyāmi tavāhaṃ cāruhāsini / HV_App.I,29F.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:10618: imāṃ bhaktiṃ tavodārāṃ pravakṣyāmi śucismite // HV_App.I,29F.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:10619: tathā caiva kariṣyāmi yathaiṣyati tavāntikam / HV_App.I,29F.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:10620: sākṣāt kāmena suśroṇi bhaviṣyasi sakāminī // HV_App.I,29F.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:10621: iti me bhāṣitaṃ satyaṃ smarethāḥ śucilocane / HV_App.I,29F.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:10625: mama tvaṃ tatra me devi hitaṃ samyak prapatsyase / HV_App.I,29F.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:10626: ity uktvā sā tathā cakre yat tat sā tām athābravīt // HV_App.I,29F.192 //
GE07hv_apppu:10627: dānavendraś ca tāṃ haṃsīṃ papracchāntaḥpure tadā / HV_App.I,29F.193 /
GE07hv_apppu:10629: tattvaṃ śucimukhi brūhi kathāṃ yogyatayā vare / HV_App.I,29F.195 /
GE07hv_apppu:10630: kiṃ tvayā dṛṣṭam āścaryaṃ jagaty uttamapakṣiṇi // HV_App.I,29F.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:10631: adṛṣṭapūrvam anyair vā yogyāyogyam anindite / HV_App.I,29F.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:10632: sovāca vajranābhaṃ tu haṃsī naravarottama // HV_App.I,29F.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:10633: śrūyatām ity athāmantrya dānavendraṃ mahādyutim / HV_App.I,29F.199 /
GE07hv_apppu:10634: dṛṣṭā me śāṇḍilī nāma sādhvī dānavasattama / HV_App.I,29F.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:10635: āścaryaṃ karma kurvantī merupārśve manasvinī // HV_App.I,29F.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:10636: sumanā caiva kausalyā sarvabhūtahite ratā / HV_App.I,29F.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:10637: tathāvidūre śāṇḍilyāḥ śailaputryāḥ śubhā sakhī // HV_App.I,29F.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:10638: naṭaś caiva mayā dṛṣṭo munidattavaraḥ śubhaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:10639: kāmarūpī ca bhojyaś ca trailokye nityasaṃmataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:10640: kurūn yātyuttarān vīra kālāmradvīpam eva ca / HV_App.I,29F.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:10641: bhadrāśvān ketumālāṃś ca dvīpān anyāṃs tathānagha // HV_App.I,29F.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:10643: sa vetti devān nṛtyena vismāpayati sarvadā // HV_App.I,29F.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:10645: śrutam etan mayā haṃsi nacirād iva vistaram / HV_App.I,29F.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:10646: cāraṇānāṃ kathayatāṃ siddhānāṃ ca mahātmanām // HV_App.I,29F.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:10647: kutūhalaṃ mamāpy asti sarvathā pakṣinandini / HV_App.I,29F.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:10648: naṭe dattavare tasmin saṃstavas tu na vidyate // HV_App.I,29F.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:10650: saptadvīpān vicarati naṭaḥ sa ditijottama / HV_App.I,29F.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:10651: guṇavantaṃ janaṃ śrutvā guṇahāryaḥ sa sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:10652: tava cecchṛṇuyād vīra sadbhūtaṃ guṇavistaram / HV_App.I,29F.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:10653: naṭaṃ tadāgataṃ viddhi puraṃ tava mahāsura // HV_App.I,29F.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:10655: upāyaḥ sṛjyatāṃ haṃsi yeneha sa naṭaḥ śubhe / HV_App.I,29F.218 /
GE07hv_apppu:10656: āgacchen mama bhadraṃ te viṣayaṃ pakṣinandini // HV_App.I,29F.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:10657: te haṃsā vajranābhena kāryahetor visarjitāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:10658: devendrāyātha kṛṣṇāya śaśaṃsuḥ sarvam eva tat // HV_App.I,29F.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:10659: adhokṣajena pradyumno niyuktas tatra karmaṇi / HV_App.I,29F.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:10660: prabhāvatyāś ca saṃsarge vajranābhavadhe tathā // HV_App.I,29F.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:10661: daivīṃ māyāṃ samāśritya saṃvidhāya harir naṭam / HV_App.I,29F.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:10662: naṭaveṣeṇa bhaimānāṃ preṣayām āsa bharata // HV_App.I,29F.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:10663: pradyumnaṃ nāyakaṃ kṛtvā sāmbaṃ kṛtvā vidūṣakam / HV_App.I,29F.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:10664: pāripārśvaṃ gadaṃ vīram anyān bhaimāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,29F.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:10666: pārśve gadāṃ vīramatyāṃ bhaimānāṃ ca tathaiva hi / **HV_App.I,29F.227**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10667: vāramukhyā naṭīḥ kṛtvā tat tūryasadṛśaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29F.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:10668: tathaiva bhadraṃbhadrasya sahāyāṃś ca tathāvidhān // HV_App.I,29F.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:10669: pradyumnavihitaṃ ramyaṃ vimānaṃ te mahārathāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:10670: jagmur āruhya kāryārthaṃ devānām amitaijasām // HV_App.I,29F.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:10671: ekaikasya samā rūpe puruṣāḥ puruṣasya te / HV_App.I,29F.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:10672: strīṇāṃ ca sadṛśāḥ sarve svararūpair narādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:10674: jagmur dānavasaṃkīrṇaṃ supuraṃ nāma nāmataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:10679: dadāv ājñāṃ vajranābho dīyatāṃ gṛham uttamam / **HV_App.I,29F.236**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10682: bhartur ājñāṃ samālabhya tathā cakruś ca sarvaśaḥ // **HV_App.I,29F.236**3:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:10683: pūrvaśruto naṭaḥ prāptaḥ kautūhalam ajījanat // HV_App.I,29F.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:10684: naṭasyātha dadur daityāḥ satkāraṃ parayā mudā / HV_App.I,29F.238 /
GE07hv_apppu:10685: pratyayārthaṃ daduś cāpi ratnāni subahūny atha // HV_App.I,29F.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:10686: tataḥ sa nanṛte tatra varadatto naṭas tadā / HV_App.I,29F.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:10687: supure puravāsīnāṃ paraṃ harṣaṃ samādadhat // HV_App.I,29F.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:10693: ṛśyaśṛṅgaś ca śāntā ca tathārūpair naṭaiḥ kṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:10694: tatkālajīvito vṛddhā dānavā vismayaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:10695: ācacakṣuś ca teṣāṃ vai rūpatulyatvam acyuta // HV_App.I,29F.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:10696: saṃskārābhinayau teṣāṃ prastāvānāṃ ca dhāraṇam / HV_App.I,29F.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:10697: dṛṣṭvā sarve praveśaṃ ca dānavā vismayaṃ gatāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:10698: te raktā vismayaṃ nedur asurāḥ parayā mudā / HV_App.I,29F.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:10699: utthāyotthāya nāṭyasya viśeṣeṣu punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:10700: dadur vastrāṇi tuṣṭāś ca graiveyavalayāni ca / HV_App.I,29F.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:10702: pṛthagartheṣu datteṣu ślokais te tuṣṭuvur naṭāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:10703: asurāṃś ca munīṃś caiva gotrair abhijanair api // HV_App.I,29F.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:10706: purā śrutārtho daityeśaḥ preṣayām āsa bharata / HV_App.I,29F.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:10707: ānīyatāṃ vajrapuraṃ naṭo 'sāv iti harṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:10709: nītā vajrapuraṃ ramyaṃ naṭaveṣeṇa yādavāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:10710: āvāsaś ca tato dattaḥ sukṛto viśvakarmaṇā / HV_App.I,29F.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:10711: eṣṭavyaṃ yac ca tat sarvaṃ dattaṃ śataguṇottaram // HV_App.I,29F.265 //
GE07hv_apppu:10712: atha kālotsavaṃ cakre vajranābho mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.266 /
GE07hv_apppu:10713: kārayām āsa ramyaṃ ca raṅgavāṭaṃ prahṛṣṭavat // HV_App.I,29F.267 //
GE07hv_apppu:10714: tatas tān pariviśrāntān prekṣārthāya pracodayat / HV_App.I,29F.268 /
GE07hv_apppu:10715: dattvā ratnāni bhūrīṇi vajranābho mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.269 //
GE07hv_apppu:10716: upaviṣṭaś ca tān draṣṭuṃ saha jñātibhir ātmavān / HV_App.I,29F.270 /
GE07hv_apppu:10717: chatre cāntaḥpuraṃ sthāpya cakṣur dṛśye janādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.271 //
GE07hv_apppu:10722: tatas tu devagāndhāraṃ chālikyaṃ śravaṇām ṛtam / HV_App.I,29F.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:10725: viddham āsāritaṃ ramyaṃ jagire svarasaṃpadā // HV_App.I,29F.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:10727: asurāṃs toṣayām āsur utthāyothāya bhārata // HV_App.I,29F.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:10728: nāndīṃ ca vādayām āsa pradyumno gada eva ca / HV_App.I,29F.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:10729: sāmbaś ca vīryasaṃpannaḥ kāryārthaṃ naṭatāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:10730: nāndyante ca tadā ślokaṃ gaṅgāvataraṇāśritam / HV_App.I,29F.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:10732: rambhābhisāraṃ kauveraṃ nāṭakaṃ nanṛtus tataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:10734: nalakūbaras tu pradyumnaḥ sāmbas tasya vidūṣakaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:10735: kailāso rūpitaś cāpi māyayā yadunandanaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:10736: śāpaś ca dattaḥ kruddhena rāvaṇasya durātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:10737: nalakūbareṇātha yathā rambho cāpy atha sāntvitā / HV_App.I,29F.291 /
GE07hv_apppu:10739: evaṃ rāmasya caritaṃ ṣaṭkāṇḍam atha sottaram / **HV_App.I,29F.291**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10740: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ rājñāṃ ca vijayāvaham // **HV_App.I,29F.291**4:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:10743: etat prakaraṇaṃ vīrā nanṛtur yadunandanāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:10744: nāradasya muneḥ kīrtiṃ sarvajñasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:10746: tuṣṭuvur dānavā vīrā bhaimān amitatejasaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.295 //
GE07hv_apppu:10747: te dadur vastramukhyāni ratnāny ābharaṇāni ca / HV_App.I,29F.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:10751: candanāni ca divyāni śītāni rasavanti ca / HV_App.I,29F.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:10752: gurūṇy agurumukhyāni gandhāḍhyāni ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.301 /
GE07hv_apppu:10753: cintāmaṇīn udārāṃś ca cintite sarvakāmadān // HV_App.I,29F.302 //
GE07hv_apppu:10754: prekṣāsu tāsu bahvīṣu dadanto dānavās tadā / HV_App.I,29F.303 /
GE07hv_apppu:10756: striyo dānavamukhyānāṃ tathaiva ca janeśvara // HV_App.I,29F.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:10757: tato haṃsī prabhāvatyāḥ sakhī prāha prabhāvatīm / HV_App.I,29F.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:10758: gatāsmi dvārakāṃ ramyāṃ bhaimaguptām anindite // HV_App.I,29F.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:10759: pradyumnaś ca mayā dṛṣṭo vivikte cārulocane / HV_App.I,29F.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:10760: bhaktiś ca kathitā tasya mayā tava śucismite // HV_App.I,29F.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:10761: tena hṛṣṭena kālaś ca kṛtaḥ kamalalocane / HV_App.I,29F.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:10762: adya pradoṣasamaye tvayā saha samāgamaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:10763: tad adya ruciraśroṇi tava priyasamāgamaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.312 /
GE07hv_apppu:10764: na hy ātmavanto bhāṣanti mithyā bhaimakulodbhavāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:10765: tataḥ prabhāvatī hṛṣṭā haṃsīṃ tām idam abravīt / HV_App.I,29F.314 /
GE07hv_apppu:10766: uṣitāsi mamāvāse svaptum arhasi sundari // HV_App.I,29F.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:10767: tvayāhaṃ sahitāvāse draṣṭum icchāmi kaiśavim / HV_App.I,29F.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:10768: niḥsādhvasā bhaviṣyāmi tvayā saha vihaṃgame // HV_App.I,29F.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:10769: haṃsī tatheti covāca sakhīṃ kamalalocanām / HV_App.I,29F.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:10770: āruroha ca tad dharmyaṃ prabhāvatyā vihaṃgamā // HV_App.I,29F.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:10773: tasmin kṛte saṃvidhāne kāmam ānayituṃ yayau / HV_App.I,29F.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:10774: prabhāvatīm anujñāpya haṃsī vāyusamā gatau // HV_App.I,29F.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:10775: [k: Ds1 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10777: adya bhūtaḥ sa bhagavan samayo vartate niśi / **HV_App.I,29F.323**5:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:10778: tatheti prāha tāṃ kāmaḥ sā nivṛttātha pakṣiṇī // **HV_App.I,29F.323**5:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:10779: sā gatvābhyāgatā haṃsī prabhāvatim athābravīt / HV_App.I,29F.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:10781: pradyumno nīyamānaṃ tu dadṛśe mālyam ātmavān / HV_App.I,29F.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:10782: bhramarair āvṛtaṃ vīraḥ sugandham arimardana // HV_App.I,29F.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:10783: nililye tatra mālye tu bhūtvā madhukaras tadā / HV_App.I,29F.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:10785: praveśitaṃ ca tan mālyaṃ strībhir madhukarāyutam / HV_App.I,29F.330 /
GE07hv_apppu:10786: [k: K1.3.4 V B Dn Ds D1.3.6 T1-3 G1-5 M3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:10788: avidūre ca vinyastaṃ prabhāvatyā janādhipa / HV_App.I,29F.331 /
GE07hv_apppu:10789: bhramarās te yayuḥ saumya saṃdhyākāle hy upasthite // HV_App.I,29F.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:10790: sa bhaimapravaro vīras taiḥ sahāyair vihinataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.333 /
GE07hv_apppu:10791: karṇotpale prabhāvatyā nililye śanakair iva // HV_App.I,29F.334 //
GE07hv_apppu:10792: tataḥ prabhāvatī haṃsīm uvāca vadatāṃ varā / HV_App.I,29F.335 /
GE07hv_apppu:10794: sakhi dahyanti me 'ṅgāni mukhaṃ ca pariśuṣyati / HV_App.I,29F.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:10795: autsukyaṃ hṛdi cātīva ko 'yaṃ vyādhir anauṣadhaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:10796: dadhad dviguṇam autsukyam asau pūrṇaniśākaraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.339 /
GE07hv_apppu:10798: na dṛṣṭapūrvo hi mayā śrutimātreṇa kāṅkṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:10799: aho dhūmayate 'ṅgāni strīsvabhāvasya dhik khalu // HV_App.I,29F.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:10800: kalpayāmi yathā buddhyā yadi nābhyeti me priyaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:10801: kumudvatīgataṃ mārgaṃ hā gamiṣyāmy akiṃcanā / HV_App.I,29F.344 /
GE07hv_apppu:10803: śītavīryāḥ prakṛtyaiva jagato hlādanāḥ sukhāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:10804: dahanti mama gātrāṇi kiṃ nu candragabhastayaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:10806: dāvāgnisadṛśo me 'dya daṃdahīti śubhāṃ tanum // HV_App.I,29F.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:10807: tataḥ saṃkalpaye eva sthairyaṃ kāryam ivātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:10809: vimanaskāsmi muhyāmi vepathur me mahān hṛdi / HV_App.I,29F.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:10810: baṃbhramīti ca me dṛṣṭir hā hā yāmi dhruvaṃ kṣayam // HV_App.I,29F.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:10813: āviṣṭeyaṃ mayā bālā sarvathety avagamya tu / HV_App.I,29F.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:10814: kārṣṇir hṛṣṭena manasā saṃsīm idam uvāca ha // HV_App.I,29F.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:10815: daityendratanayāṃ prāptam avagacchasva mām iha / HV_App.I,29F.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:10816: ṣaṭpadaiḥ saha ṣaṭpādo bhūtvā mālye nilīya tu // HV_App.I,29F.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:10817: vidheyo 'smi prabhāvatyā yatheṣṭaṃ mayi vartatām / HV_App.I,29F.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:10818: ity uktvā darśayām āsa surūpo rūpam ātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:10819: tad dharmyapṛṣṭhaṃ prabhayā dyotitaṃ tasya dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:10820: abhibhūtā prabhā caiva rājaṃś candrodbhavā śubhā // HV_App.I,29F.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:10821: prabhāvatyās tu taṃ dṛṣṭvā vavṛve kāmasāgaraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.362 /
GE07hv_apppu:10822: candrasyevodaye prāpte parvaṇyāṃ saritāṃ patiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:10823: salajjādhomukhī kiṃcit kiṃcit tiryag avekṣiṇī / HV_App.I,29F.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:10828: adhomukhaṃ mukhaṃ kṛtvā na māṃ kiṃcit prabhāṣase // HV_App.I,29F.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:10829: prabhopamardaṃ mā kārṣīr vadanasya varānane / HV_App.I,29F.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:10830: sādhvasaṃ tyajyatāṃ bhīru dāsaḥ sādhv anugṛhyatām // HV_App.I,29F.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:10831: na kālam iva paśyāmi bhīru bhīrutvam utsṛja / HV_App.I,29F.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:10832: yācāmy eṣo 'ñjalaṃ kṛtvā prāptakālaṃ nibodha me // HV_App.I,29F.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:10835: upaspṛśya tato bhaimo maṇisthaṃ jātavedasam / HV_App.I,29F.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:10836: juhāva samaye vīraḥ puṣpair mantrān udīrayan // HV_App.I,29F.377 //
GE07hv_apppu:10838: cakre pradakṣiṇaṃ caiva taṃ maṇisthaṃ hutāśanam // HV_App.I,29F.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:10839: prajajvāla sa tejasvī mānayann acyutātmajam / HV_App.I,29F.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:10840: bhagavāñ jagataḥ sākṣī śubhasyāthāśubhasya ca // HV_App.I,29F.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:10841: uddiśya dakṣiṇāṃ vīro viprāṇāṃ yadunandanaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:10842: uvāca haṃsīṃ dvārasthāṃ tiṣṭhāvāṃ rakṣa pakṣiṇi // HV_App.I,29F.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:10843: tasyāṃ praṇamya yātāyāṃ kāmas tāṃ cārulocanām / HV_App.I,29F.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:10844: grahāya dakṣiṇe haste nināya śayanottamam // HV_App.I,29F.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:10845: ūrāv evopaveśyaināṃ sāntvayitvā punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:10846: cucumba śanakair gaṇḍe vāsayan mukhamārutaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:10847: tato 'syā āpapau vaktraṃ padmaṃ madhukaro yathā / HV_App.I,29F.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:10848: āliliṅge ca suśroṇīṃ krameṇa ratikovidaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:10849: arāmayad rahasy enāṃ na codvejigavāṃs tadā / HV_App.I,29F.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:10850: āpi kṛtsnaṃ caraty arthaṃ ratikāryaviśāradaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.391 /
GE07hv_apppu:10851: uvāsa sa tayā sārdhaṃ raman kṛṣṇasutaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,29F.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:10852: aruṇodayakāle ca yayau yatra naṭālayaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:10853: akāmayā prabhāvatyā kathaṃcit sa visarjitaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.394 /
GE07hv_apppu:10854: tām eva manasā kāntāṃ kāntarupaḥ samudvahan // HV_App.I,29F.395 //
GE07hv_apppu:10855: ta ūṣur naṭaveṣeṇa kāryārthaṃ bhaimavaṃśajāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:10856: pratīkṣantas tadā vākyam indrakeśavayos tadā / HV_App.I,29F.397 /
GE07hv_apppu:10859: kaśyapasya muneḥ satraṃ yāvat tāvan narādhipa // HV_App.I,29F.400 //
GE07hv_apppu:10863: tāvad divāyāṃ daityendraḥ nāṭayaṃś ca naṭān nṛpa / **HV_App.I,29F.402**7:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10864: divāsu nanṛtus te vai rātrāv eva kadācana // **HV_App.I,29F.402**7:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:10865: evaṃ kālapratīkṣāṇāṃ vasatāṃ tatra dhīmatām / HV_App.I,29F.403 /
GE07hv_apppu:10867: ahar niśaṃ ca vṛttāntaṃ prayacchanti manojavāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.405 //
GE07hv_apppu:10869: reme saha prabhāvatyā pradyumnaś cānurūpayā / HV_App.I,29F.407 /
GE07hv_apppu:10871: tair hi vajrapuraṃ haṃsair vasadbhir vāsavājñayā / HV_App.I,29F.409 /
GE07hv_apppu:10872: vyāptaṃ nṛpa naṭāṃs tāṃś ca na viduḥ kālamohitāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:10873: divāpi raukmiṇeyas tu prabhāvatyā nṛpālaye / HV_App.I,29F.411 /
GE07hv_apppu:10875: māyayāsya praticchāyā dṛśyate hi naṭālaye / HV_App.I,29F.413 /
GE07hv_apppu:10876: dehārdhena tu kauravya siṣeva sa prabhāvatīm // HV_App.I,29F.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:10877: saṃnatiṃ vinayaṃ śīlaṃ līlāṃ dākṣyaṃ vilāsitām / HV_App.I,29F.415 /
GE07hv_apppu:10878: spṛhayanty asurā dṛṣṭvā vidvattāṃ ca mahātmanām // HV_App.I,29F.416 //
GE07hv_apppu:10879: rūpaṃ vilāsaṃ gandhaṃ ca mṛjāṃ bhāṣām athāryatām / HV_App.I,29F.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:10881: vajranābhasya tu bhrātā sunābho nāma viśrutaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.419 /
GE07hv_apppu:10882: duhitṛdvayaṃ ca nṛpates tasya rūpaguṇānvitam // HV_App.I,29F.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:10883: ekā candravatī nāmnā guṇavaty atha cāparā / HV_App.I,29F.421 /
GE07hv_apppu:10884: prabhāvatyālayaṃ te tu vrajataḥ khalu nityadā // HV_App.I,29F.422 //
GE07hv_apppu:10885: dadṛśāte tu te tatra ratisaktāṃ prabhāvatīm / HV_App.I,29F.423 /
GE07hv_apppu:10887: sovāca mama vidyāsti yādhītā kāṅkṣitaṃ patim / HV_App.I,29F.425 /
GE07hv_apppu:10888: ratyartham ānayaty āśu saubhagyaṃ ca prayacchati / HV_App.I,29F.426 /
GE07hv_apppu:10889: devaṃ vā dānavaṃ vāpi vivaśaṃ sadya eva hi // HV_App.I,29F.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:10890: sāhaṃ ramāmi kāntena devaputreṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29F.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:10891: dṛśyatāṃ matprabhāvena pradyumnaḥ supriyo mama / HV_App.I,29F.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:10892: te dṛṣṭvā vismayaṃ yāte rūpayauvanasaṃpadam // HV_App.I,29F.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:10893: punar evābravīt te tu bhaginyau cāruhāsinī / HV_App.I,29F.431 /
GE07hv_apppu:10894: prabhāvatī varārohā kālaprāptam idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:10895: devā dharmaratā nityaṃ dambhaśīlā mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:10896: devās tapasi raktā hi sukharaktā mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:10897: devāḥ satyaratā nityam anṛte tu mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.435 /
GE07hv_apppu:10898: dharmastapaś ca satyaṃ ca yatra tatra jayo dhruvam // HV_App.I,29F.436 //
GE07hv_apppu:10899: devaputrau varayataṃ patividyāṃ dadāmy aham / HV_App.I,29F.437 /
GE07hv_apppu:10901: tāṃ tathety ūcatur hṛṣṭe bhaginyau cārulocanām / HV_App.I,29F.439 /
GE07hv_apppu:10902: paripapraccha bhaimaṃ ca kāryaṃ tat prati māninī // HV_App.I,29F.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:10903: sa pitṛvyaṃ gadaṃ vīraṃ sāmbaṃ cāpy abravīt tadā / HV_App.I,29F.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:10904: rūpānvitau suśīlau ca śūrau ca raṇakarmaṇi // HV_App.I,29F.442 //
GE07hv_apppu:10906: parituṣṭena dattā me vidyā durvāsasā purā / HV_App.I,29F.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:10907: parituṣṭena saubhāgyaṃ sadā kanyātvam eva ca // HV_App.I,29F.444 //
GE07hv_apppu:10908: devadānavayakṣāṇāṃ yaṃ dhyāsyasi sa te patiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.445 /
GE07hv_apppu:10909: bhaviteti mayā caiva vīro 'yam abhikāṅkṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:10911: pradyumnaṃ tv aham eṣyāmi yuvāṃ tāv apy avāpsyatha / **HV_App.I,29F.446**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:10912: gṛhṇītaṃ tad imāṃ vidyāṃ sadyo vāṃ priyasaṃgamaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:10913: tato jagṛhatur hṛṣṭe tāṃ vidyāṃ bhaginīmukhāt // HV_App.I,29F.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:10914: dadhyatur gadasāmbau ca vidyām abhyasya te śubhe / HV_App.I,29F.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:10915: tau pradyumnena sahitau praviṣṭau bhaimanandanau // HV_App.I,29F.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:10916: pracchannau māyayā vīrau kārṣṇinā māyinā nṛpa // HV_App.I,29F.451 //
GE07hv_apppu:10924: ity uktas tu prabhāvatyā pradyumno hṛṣṭamānasaḥ / **HV_App.I,29F.451**9:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:10926: gāndharveṇa vivāhena tāv apy aribalārdanau / HV_App.I,29F.452 /
GE07hv_apppu:10927: pāṇiṃ jagṛhatur vīrau mantrapūrvaṃ satāṃ priyau / HV_App.I,29F.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:10928: candravatyā gadaḥ sāmbo guṇavatyā tu kaiśaviḥ // HV_App.I,29F.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:10930: mārgamāṇās tv anujñāṃ te śakrakeśavayos tadā // HV_App.I,29F.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:10943: muñcanti dhārāś ca ghanā nadantas @ HV_App.I,29F.467 @
GE07hv_apppu:10975: na mārutaḥ syād yadi cārugātri @ HV_App.I,29F.499 @
GE07hv_apppu:10976: na meghakālo mama vallabhaḥ syāt || HV_App.I,29F.500 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10980: tataḥ paraṃ kiṃ sukham asti loke || HV_App.I,29F.504 ||
GE07hv_apppu:10985: na bhānti nadyo 'dya sarāṃsi caiva @ HV_App.I,29F.509 @
GE07hv_apppu:11016: gajān gajaiḥ svair iva vīryadṛptān || HV_App.I,29F.540 ||
GE07hv_apppu:11031: na dṛśyate yat tava vaktratulyo @ HV_App.I,29F.555 @
GE07hv_apppu:11035: tadā nu paśyanti janāḥ prahṛṣṭā @ HV_App.I,29F.559 @
GE07hv_apppu:11048: vināpi candreṇa pure pitus te @ HV_App.I,29F.569 @
GE07hv_apppu:11055: yaṃ sāmagāḥ parvaṇi cāpy udāram || HV_App.I,29F.576 ||
GE07hv_apppu:11064: nṛpaḥ kuśāgraiḥ punar eva yaś ca @ HV_App.I,29F.585 @
GE07hv_apppu:11065: dhīmān gato 'gnir divi pūjyate ca | HV_App.I,29F.586 |
GE07hv_apppu:11066: āyuś ca vaṃśe nahuṣaś ca yasya @ HV_App.I,29F.587 @
GE07hv_apppu:11069: vaṃśe harir yasya jagat praṇetā | HV_App.I,29F.590 |
GE07hv_apppu:11071: yaḥ subhru dakṣasya vṛtaḥ sutābhiḥ || HV_App.I,29F.592 ||
GE07hv_apppu:11072: babhūva rājā ca vasuś ca yasya @ HV_App.I,29F.593 @
GE07hv_apppu:11080: na kutsito yasya nṛpo 'sti vaṃśe @ HV_App.I,29F.601 @
GE07hv_apppu:11097: jagmur devāsurāḥ svāni sthānāny amitavikramāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.614 //
GE07hv_apppu:11098: vajranābho 'pi nirvṛtte satre kaśyapam abhyagāt / HV_App.I,29F.615 /
GE07hv_apppu:11100: vajranābha nibodhasva śrotavyaṃ yadi cen mama / HV_App.I,29F.617 /
GE07hv_apppu:11101: vasa vajrapure putra svajanena samāvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.618 //
GE07hv_apppu:11102: tapasābhyadhikaḥ śakraḥ śaktaś caiva svabhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.619 /
GE07hv_apppu:11103: brahmaṇyaś ca kṛtajñaś ca jyeṣṭhaḥ śreṣṭhatamo gunaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.620 //
GE07hv_apppu:11104: rājā kṛtsnasya jagataḥ pātrabhūtaḥ satāṃ gatiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.621 /
GE07hv_apppu:11105: saṃprāpto lokarājyaṃ sa sarvabhūtahite rataḥ // HV_App.I,29F.622 //
GE07hv_apppu:11106: naiva śakyas tvayā jetuṃ vajranābha vihanyase / HV_App.I,29F.623 /
GE07hv_apppu:11107: ahiṃ padā vyutkraman vai na cirād vinaśiṣyasi // HV_App.I,29F.624 //
GE07hv_apppu:11108: vajranābhas tu tad vākyaṃ nābhinandati bharata / HV_App.I,29F.625 /
GE07hv_apppu:11110: abhivādya sa durbuddhiḥ kaśyapaṃ lokabhāvanam / HV_App.I,29F.627 /
GE07hv_apppu:11112: jñātiyodhān samānīya mitrāṇi subahūni ca / HV_App.I,29F.629 /
GE07hv_apppu:11113: pratasthe svargam evāgre vijigīṣur viśāṃ pate // HV_App.I,29F.630 //
GE07hv_apppu:11114: etasminn antare devau kṛṣṇendrau ca mahābalau / HV_App.I,29F.631 /
GE07hv_apppu:11115: preṣayām āsatur haṃsān vajranābhavadhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,29F.632 //
GE07hv_apppu:11117: tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā haṃsā vajrapuraṃ yayuḥ / **HV_App.I,29F.632**12:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11118: ūcuś ca vacanaṃ teṣāṃ śakrakeśavayos tadā // **HV_App.I,29F.632**12:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:11119: samāgatās tu tac chrutvā yadumukhyā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.633 /
GE07hv_apppu:11120: mantrayitvā mahātmānaś cintām āpedire tadā / HV_App.I,29F.634 /
GE07hv_apppu:11122: tayor duhitaro bhāryā bhaktyā tāḥ sarvabhāvanāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.636 //
GE07hv_apppu:11123: sarvāḥ sagarbhās tāś caiva kiṃ tu kāryam anantaram / HV_App.I,29F.637 /
GE07hv_apppu:11124: prāptaḥ prasavakālaś ca tāsāṃ nāticirād iva // HV_App.I,29F.638 //
GE07hv_apppu:11125: saṃmantrayitvaitad arthaṃ haṃsān ūcur mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.639 /
GE07hv_apppu:11126: ākhyeyam arthavat kṛtsnaṃ śakrakeśavayos tadā // HV_App.I,29F.640 //
GE07hv_apppu:11127: haṃsair gatvā tadākhyātaṃ devayos tad yathātatham // HV_App.I,29F.641 //
GE07hv_apppu:11128: tābhyāṃ haṃsās tu saṃdiṣṭā na bhetavyam iti prabho // HV_App.I,29F.642 //
GE07hv_apppu:11129: utpatsyanti gunaiḥ ślāghyāḥ putrā vaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.643 /
GE07hv_apppu:11130: garbhasthāḥ sarvavedāṃś ca sāṅgān vetsyanty aninditāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.644 //
GE07hv_apppu:11131: tathā cānāgataṃ sarvam astrāṇi vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,29F.645 /
GE07hv_apppu:11132: sadya eṣa yuvānaś ca bhaviṣyanti supaṇḍ itāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.646 //
GE07hv_apppu:11133: evam uktvā gatā haṃsāḥ punar vajrapuraṃ vibho / HV_App.I,29F.647 /
GE07hv_apppu:11135: prabhāvatī tadā putraṃ suṣuve sadṛśaṃ pituḥ / HV_App.I,29F.649 /
GE07hv_apppu:11137: māsamātreṇa suṣuve devī candravatī nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.651 /
GE07hv_apppu:11138: candraprabham iti khyātaṃ tanayaṃ sadṛśaṃ pituḥ // HV_App.I,29F.652 //
GE07hv_apppu:11139: sadyaś ca yauvanaprāptaṃ sarvajñatvaṃ ca bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.653 /
GE07hv_apppu:11140: guṇavaty- api putraṃ ca guṇavantam aninditā // HV_App.I,29F.654 //
GE07hv_apppu:11141: yuvānāv atha sadyas tau sarvaśāstrārthakovidau / HV_App.I,29F.655 /
GE07hv_apppu:11143: harmyapṛṣṭhe vardhamānā hṛṣṭās te yadunandanāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.657 /
GE07hv_apppu:11145: niveditāś ca saṃbhrāntair dautair ākāśarakṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.659 /
GE07hv_apppu:11147: vicārya sarve gṛhyantāṃ mamaite gṛhadharṣakāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.661 /
GE07hv_apppu:11149: tataḥ sainyaṃ samājñaptam asurendreṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29F.663 /
GE07hv_apppu:11150: āvārayām āsa diśaḥ sarvāḥ kurukulodvaha // HV_App.I,29F.664 //
GE07hv_apppu:11151: gṛhyantām āśu vadhyantām iti vācas tatas tataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.665 /
GE07hv_apppu:11153: tac chrutvā vyathitās teṣāṃ mātaraḥ putravatsalāḥ / HV_App.I,29F.667 /
GE07hv_apppu:11154: rurudus tā rudantyo 'tha pradyumnaḥ sahasābravīt // HV_App.I,29F.668 //
GE07hv_apppu:11155: mā bhaiṣṭa jīvamāneṣu sthiteṣv asmāsu sarvathā / HV_App.I,29F.669 /
GE07hv_apppu:11156: kiṃ no daityāḥ kariṣyanti sarvathā bhadram astu vaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.670 //
GE07hv_apppu:11157: prabhāvatīm athovāca pradyumno viklavāṃ sthitām / HV_App.I,29F.671 /
GE07hv_apppu:11158: pitā tava gadāpāṇiḥ pitṛvyaś ca sthitas tava // HV_App.I,29F.672 //
GE07hv_apppu:11159: bhrātaraś caiva te devi jñātayaś ca tathāpare / HV_App.I,29F.673 /
GE07hv_apppu:11160: ete pūjyāś ca mānyāś ca tavārthe khalu sarvathā // HV_App.I,29F.674 //
GE07hv_apppu:11161: bhaginyau pṛccha bhadraṃ te kāle 'yaṃ khalu dāruṇaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.675 /
GE07hv_apppu:11162: maraṇaṃ sahamānānāṃ yudhyatāṃ vijayo dhruvam // HV_App.I,29F.676 //
GE07hv_apppu:11164: kim atra kāryam asmābhiḥ sarvaiś cakrāntarasthitaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.678 //
GE07hv_apppu:11165: prabhāvatī rudantī tu pradyumnam idam abravīt / HV_App.I,29F.679 /
GE07hv_apppu:11166: śirasy añjalim ādhāya jānubhyāṃ patitā kṣitau // HV_App.I,29F.680 //
GE07hv_apppu:11167: gṛhāṇa śastram ātmānaṃ rakṣa śatrunibarhaṇa / HV_App.I,29F.681 /
GE07hv_apppu:11168: jīvanputrāṃś ca dārāṃś ca draṣṭāsi yadunandana // HV_App.I,29F.682 //
GE07hv_apppu:11169: āryāṃ nṛvara vaidarbhīm aniruddhaṃ ca mānada / HV_App.I,29F.683 /
GE07hv_apppu:11171: durvāsasā varo datto muninā mama dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29F.685 /
GE07hv_apppu:11173: eṣa me hṛdayāśvāso bhavitā na tad anyathā / HV_App.I,29F.687 /
GE07hv_apppu:11175: ity uktvā sāsim ādāya sūpaspṛṣṭvā manasvinī / HV_App.I,29F.689 /
GE07hv_apppu:11176: pradadau raukmiṇeyāya jayasveti varaṃ varā // HV_App.I,29F.690 //
GE07hv_apppu:11177: sa taṃ jagrāha dharmātmā prahṛṣṭenāntarātmanā / HV_App.I,29F.691 /
GE07hv_apppu:11178: praṇamya śirasā dattaṃ priyayā bhaktiyuktayā // HV_App.I,29F.692 //
GE07hv_apppu:11179: candravaty- api nistriṃśaṃ gadāya pradadau mudā / HV_App.I,29F.693 /
GE07hv_apppu:11180: tathā guṇavatī caiva sāmbāyāsiṃ mahātmane // HV_App.I,29F.694 //
GE07hv_apppu:11181: haṃsaketum athovāca pradyumnaḥ praṇataṃ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.695 /
GE07hv_apppu:11182: ihaiva sāmbasahitau yudhyasva saha dānavaiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.696 //
GE07hv_apppu:11183: ākāśe dikṣu sarvāsu yotsyāmy aham āriṃdama / HV_App.I,29F.697 /
GE07hv_apppu:11184: ity uktvātha rathaṃ cakre māyayā māyināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.698 //
GE07hv_apppu:11185: sahasraśirasaṃ nāgaṃ kṛtvā sārathim ātmavān / HV_App.I,29F.699 /
GE07hv_apppu:11187: sa tena rathamukhyena harṣayan vai prabhāvatīm / HV_App.I,29F.701 /
GE07hv_apppu:11190: bhedanair gādhanaiś caiva tatarda ditisaṃbhavān // HV_App.I,29F.704 //
GE07hv_apppu:11191: asurāś ca raṇe mattāḥ kārṣṇiṃ śatrair itas tataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.705 /
GE07hv_apppu:11192: jaghnuḥ kamalapatrākṣaṃ paraṃ niścayam āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.706 //
GE07hv_apppu:11194: sukuṇḍalāni cānyeṣāṃ śirāṃsy api sa cicchide // HV_App.I,29F.708 //
GE07hv_apppu:11195: kṣuracchinnaiḥ śirobhis taiḥ kāyaiś ca śakalair api // HV_App.I,29F.709 //
GE07hv_apppu:11198: dadarśa mudito yuddhaṃ bhaimānāṃ ditijaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,29F.712 //
GE07hv_apppu:11199: ye gadaṃ caiva sāmbaṃ ca daityāḥ samabhidudruvuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.713 /
GE07hv_apppu:11200: te yayur nidhanaṃ sarve yādāṃsīva mahodadhau // HV_App.I,29F.714 //
GE07hv_apppu:11201: viṣamaṃ tu tadā yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭvā devapatir hariḥ / HV_App.I,29F.715 /
GE07hv_apppu:11202: gadāya preṣayām āsa svarathaṃ harivāhanaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.716 //
GE07hv_apppu:11203: dideśa mātalisutaṃ yantāraṃ ca suvarcasam / HV_App.I,29F.717 /
GE07hv_apppu:11204: sāmbāyairāvaṇaṃ nāgaṃ preṣayām āsa ceśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,29F.718 //
GE07hv_apppu:11205: jayantaṃ raukmiṇeyasya sahāyam adadād vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,29F.719 /
GE07hv_apppu:11206: airāvaṇam adhiṣṭhātuṃ pravaraṃ sa niyuktavān // HV_App.I,29F.720 //
GE07hv_apppu:11211: taṃ mātalisutaṃ caiva gajam airāvaṇaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,29F.723 /
GE07hv_apppu:11212: devaḥ preṣitavāñ śakro vidhijño varakarmasu // HV_App.I,29F.724 //
GE07hv_apppu:11213: kṣīṇam asya tapo vadhyo yadunām eṣa durmatiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.725 /
GE07hv_apppu:11214: praviśanti tu bhūtāni sarvatra tu yathepsitam // HV_App.I,29F.726 //
GE07hv_apppu:11215: pradyumnaś ca jayantaś ca prāptau harmyaṃ mahābalau / HV_App.I,29F.727 /
GE07hv_apppu:11217: parighair vikramantau ca yudhyantau ca raṇājire // HV_App.I,29F.729 //
GE07hv_apppu:11218: gadaṃ kārṣṇis tadovāca durvāryaṃ raṇadurjayaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.730 /
GE07hv_apppu:11219: upendrānuja śakreṇa ratho 'yaṃ preṣitas tava // HV_App.I,29F.731 //
GE07hv_apppu:11220: hariyuṅ mātalisuto yantā cāyaṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.732 /
GE07hv_apppu:11223: śva eṣyati hṛṣīkeśas tasmin vṛtte 'cyutānuja // HV_App.I,29F.735 //
GE07hv_apppu:11226: kariṣyāmi vidhānaṃ tu naiṣa śakraṃ sutānvitam / HV_App.I,29F.738 /
GE07hv_apppu:11227: vijeṣyaty apramādas tu kartavya iti me matiḥ // HV_App.I,29F.739 //
GE07hv_apppu:11228: kalatrarakṣaṇaṃ kāryaṃ sarvopāyair narair yudhi / HV_App.I,29F.740 /
GE07hv_apppu:11230: evaṃ saṃdiśya bhaimaḥ sa gadasāmbau mahābalau / HV_App.I,29F.742 /
GE07hv_apppu:11232: tamaś ca nāśayām āsa daityasṛṣṭaṃ durāsadam / HV_App.I,29F.744 /
GE07hv_apppu:11233: jahṛṣe devarājaś ca taṃ dṛṣṭvā ripumardanam // HV_App.I,29F.745 //
GE07hv_apppu:11234: dadṛśuḥ sarvabhūtāni kārṣṇiṃ sarveṣu śatruṣu / HV_App.I,29F.746 /
GE07hv_apppu:11235: antarātmani vartantaṃ kṣetrajñam iti taṃ viduḥ / HV_App.I,29F.747 /
GE07hv_apppu:11236: evaṃ vyatītā rajanī raukmiṇeyasya yudhyataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.748 /
GE07hv_apppu:11239: asurāṇāṃ tribhāgaś ca nihato nātitejasā // HV_App.I,29F.749 //
GE07hv_apppu:11240: yāvad dhi yodhayām āsa kārṣṇir daityān raṇājire / HV_App.I,29F.750 /
GE07hv_apppu:11242: ayodhayaj jayantaś ca yāvad daityān mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.752 /
GE07hv_apppu:11243: tāvad ākāśagaṅgāyāṃ bhaimaḥ saṃdhyām upāsta vān // HV_App.I,29F.753 //
GE07hv_apppu:11246: jagataś cakṣuṣi tatas trimuhūrtodite ravau / HV_App.I,29F.754 /
GE07hv_apppu:11249: tasthau viyati śakrasya samīpe kurunandana // HV_App.I,29F.757 //
GE07hv_apppu:11250: sametya ca yathānyāyaṃ kṛṣṇo vāsavasaṃnidhau / HV_App.I,29F.758 /
GE07hv_apppu:11251: pāñcajanyaṃ vibhur dadhmau daityānāṃ bhayavardhanam / HV_App.I,29F.759 /
GE07hv_apppu:11252: taṃ śrutvābhyāgatas tatra pradyumnaḥ paravīrahā / HV_App.I,29F.760 /
GE07hv_apppu:11253: vajranābhaṃ jahīty uktaḥ keśavena tvareti ca // HV_App.I,29F.761 //
GE07hv_apppu:11254: tārkṣyam āruhya gaccheti punar eva pracoditaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.762 /
GE07hv_apppu:11255: cakāra sa tathā vīraḥ praṇipatya surottamau // HV_App.I,29F.763 //
GE07hv_apppu:11256: sa manoraṃhasā vīras tārkṣyeṇāśu yayau nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.764 /
GE07hv_apppu:11258: tatas tārkṣyagato vīras tatarda raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,29F.766 /
GE07hv_apppu:11259: vajranābhaṃ sthiro bhūtvā sarvāstravid aninditaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.767 //
GE07hv_apppu:11261: urasy abhihato vīro vajranābho mahātmanā // HV_App.I,29F.769 //
GE07hv_apppu:11262: sa tenābhihato vīro daityo mohavaśaṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.770 /
GE07hv_apppu:11263: cakṣāra ca bhṛśaṃ raktaṃ babhrāma ca gatāsuvat // HV_App.I,29F.771 //
GE07hv_apppu:11264: āśvasety atha taṃ kārṣṇir uvāca raṇadurjayaḥ / HV_App.I,29F.772 /
GE07hv_apppu:11265: labdhasaṃjñaḥ sa vīras tu pradyumnam idam abravīt // HV_App.I,29F.773 //
GE07hv_apppu:11266: sādhu yādava vīryeṇa ślāghyo mama ripur bhavān / HV_App.I,29F.774 /
GE07hv_apppu:11268: evam uktvā mahānādaṃ muktvā meghaśatopamam / HV_App.I,29F.776 /
GE07hv_apppu:11269: gadāṃ mumoca vegena saghaṇṭāṃ bahukaṇṭakām // HV_App.I,29F.777 //
GE07hv_apppu:11270: tayā lalāṭe 'bhihataḥ pradyumno gadayā nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.778 /
GE07hv_apppu:11271: udvaman rudhiraṃ bhūri mumoha yadupuṃgavaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.779 //
GE07hv_apppu:11272: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhagavān kṛṣṇaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ jalodbhavam / HV_App.I,29F.780 /
GE07hv_apppu:11276: tasya cakraṃ kare jātaṃ kṛṣṇacchandena bhārata / HV_App.I,29F.784 /
GE07hv_apppu:11280: vajranābhasya tatkāyād uccakarta śiras tadā / HV_App.I,29F.788 /
GE07hv_apppu:11282: gadaḥ sunābham avadhīd yatamānaṃ raṇājire / HV_App.I,29F.790 /
GE07hv_apppu:11286: nikumbho 'pi hate vīre vajranābhe mahāsure / HV_App.I,29F.794 /
GE07hv_apppu:11289: avatīrṇau mahātmānau harī vajrapuraṃ tadā // HV_App.I,29F.797 //
GE07hv_apppu:11294: sāntvayām āsatuś caiva bālavṛddhaṃ bhayārditam // HV_App.I,29F.799 //
GE07hv_apppu:11296: āyatyāṃ ca tadātve ca bṛhaspatimatānugau // HV_App.I,29F.801 //
GE07hv_apppu:11297: vajranābhasya tad rājyaṃ caturdhā cakratur nṛpa / HV_App.I,29F.802 /
GE07hv_apppu:11307: koṭyaś catasro grāmāṇām adhikās tā viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,29F.806 /
GE07hv_apppu:11309: caturdhā cakratus tatra saṃhṛṣṭau śakrakeśavau // HV_App.I,29F.808 //
GE07hv_apppu:11311: caturdhā cakratur vīrau vīra vāsavakeśavau // HV_App.I,29F.810 //
GE07hv_apppu:11312: tato 'bhiṣiktās te vīro rājāno vāsavājñayā / HV_App.I,29F.811 /
GE07hv_apppu:11314: svayaṃ śakreṇa devena keśavena ca dhīmatā / HV_App.I,29F.813 /
GE07hv_apppu:11316: vijayasya prasiddhaiva gātir viyati dhīmataḥ / HV_App.I,29F.815 /
GE07hv_apppu:11318: abhiṣicya jayantaṃ tu bhagavān vāsavo 'bravīt / HV_App.I,29F.817 /
GE07hv_apppu:11319: tvayaite vīra saṃrakṣyā rājānaḥ samitiṃjaya // HV_App.I,29F.818 //
GE07hv_apppu:11322: gamanāgamanaṃ caiva divi siddhaṃ bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,29F.821 /
GE07hv_apppu:11323: triviṣṭapaṃ dvārakāṃ ca ramyāṃ bhaimābhirakṣitām // HV_App.I,29F.822 //
GE07hv_apppu:11325: icchayaiṣāṃ prayacchasva rathāṃs tvaṣṭṛkṛtān api // HV_App.I,29F.824 //
GE07hv_apppu:11327: prayacchākāśagau vīra sāmbasya ca gadasya ca // HV_App.I,29F.826 //
GE07hv_apppu:11328: ākāśena purīṃ yāntu dvārakāṃ bhaimarakṣitām / HV_App.I,29F.827 /
GE07hv_apppu:11329: āyāntu ca sutaṃ draṣṭuṃ yatheṣṭaṃ bhimanandanau // HV_App.I,29F.828 //
GE07hv_apppu:11330: iti saṃdiśya bhagavān devarājaḥ puraṃdaraḥ / HV_App.I,29F.829 /
GE07hv_apppu:11331: jagāma bhagavān svargaṃ dvārakām api keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,29F.830 //
GE07hv_apppu:11332: ṣaṇmāsān uṣitas tatra gadaḥ pradyumna eva ca / HV_App.I,29F.831 /
GE07hv_apppu:11333: sāmbaś ca dvārakāṃ yātā yānārūḍhā mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.832 //
GE07hv_apppu:11334: adyāpi tāni rājyāni meroḥ pārśve nṛpottare / HV_App.I,29F.833 /
GE07hv_apppu:11335: sthāsyanti ca jagad yāvat tāvat te 'marasaṃnibhāḥ // HV_App.I,29F.834 //
GE07hv_apppu:11336: nivṛtte mausale yuddhe svargaṃ yāteṣu vṛṣṇiṣu / HV_App.I,29F.835 /
GE07hv_apppu:11337: gadapradyumnasāmbās te gatā vajrapuraṃ vibho // HV_App.I,29F.836 //
GE07hv_apppu:11338: tataḥ proṣya punar yānti svargaṃ svaiḥ karmabhiḥ śubhaiḥ / HV_App.I,29F.837 /
GE07hv_apppu:11339: prasādena ca kṛṣṇasya lokakartur janeśvara // HV_App.I,29F.838 //
GE07hv_apppu:11340: pradyumnottaram etat te nṛdeva kathitaṃ mayā / HV_App.I,29F.839 /
GE07hv_apppu:11341: dhanyaṃ yaśasyam āyuṣyaṃ śatrunāśanam eva ca // HV_App.I,29F.840 //
GE07hv_apppu:11343: yaśo vipulam āpnoti dvaipāyanavaco yathā // HV_App.I,29F.842 //
GE07hv_apppu:11350: [k: After 99.26, all Mss. (except Ś1 Ñ1 M1-3) G(ed.) ins. App. I, No. 30 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11351: sarvamāyāsv abhijño 'sau nāma viśrāvya cāvyayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:11352: aho dānava duṣṭātman keśavasyātmajaṃ śiśum / HV_App.I,30.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:11353: harate nirbhayaś caiva bhayam adya karomy aham // HV_App.I,30.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:11354: kathaṃ vai krodham āgacched badhyate vā kathaṃ mayā / HV_App.I,30.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:11355: prathamaṃ kiṃ kariṣyāmi yena kupyati mandadhīḥ // HV_App.I,30.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:11357: toraṇaṃ gṛham āsādya ucchritaṃ meruśṛṅgavat // HV_App.I,30.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:11358: etad unmathya pātiṣye bhallena niśitena vai / HV_App.I,30.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:11360: tato yuddhena hatvājau gantāsmi dvārakāṃ prati // HV_App.I,30.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:11361: ity uktvā sajyam ācakre saśaraṃ cāpam ojasā / HV_App.I,30.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:11362: ciccheda dhvajaratnaṃ tu śambarasya mahābhujaḥ // HV_App.I,30.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:11363: tac chrutvā tu dhvajacchedaṃ pradyumnena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,30.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:11364: kruddhas tv ājñāpayām āsa putrān vai kālaśambaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:11366: naitaṃ vai draṣṭum icchāmi mama vipriyakārakam // HV_App.I,30.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:11367: śrutvā tu śambarād vākyaṃ sutās te śambarasya ha / HV_App.I,30.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:11370: śrutesenaḥ suṣeṇaś ca somaseno damas tathā // HV_App.I,30.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:11371: senānīḥ sainyahantā ca senahā sainikas tathā / HV_App.I,30.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:11373: sutaḥ sākocavikalaḥ sātulaḥ sarakaḥ śuciḥ / HV_App.I,30.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:11374: kumbhaketuḥ sudaṃṣṭraś ca keśir ity evam ādayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:11376: gṛhītvā niryayur hṛṣṭā manyunā paricoditāḥ / HV_App.I,30.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:11377: āhvayantam amitraṃ vai tasthuḥ saṃgrāmamūrdhani // HV_App.I,30.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:11378: pradyumnas tu mahābāhū ratham āruhya satvaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:11379: niryayau cāpam ādāya saṃgrāmābhimukhas tadā // HV_App.I,30.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:11380: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,30.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:11381: śambarasya ca putrāṇāṃ keśavasya ca sūnunā // HV_App.I,30.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:11384: nāradas tumbarus caiva hāhā hūhūś ca gāyanāḥ / HV_App.I,30.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:11387: śaśaṃsa devarājāya vajriṇe citram adbhutam // HV_App.I,30.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:11388: śambarasya śataṃ putrā ekaḥ kṛṣṇasya cātmajaḥ / HV_App.I,30.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:11389: bahūnāṃ yudhyatām eṣa kathaṃ vijayam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,30.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:11390: tac chrutvā bhāṣitaṃ tasya prahasya balasūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:11391: uvāca vacanaṃ cedam śṛṇu yo 'sya parākramaḥ // HV_App.I,30.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:11393: ratyā prasādito devaḥ kāmapatnyā trilocanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:11394: parituṣṭena devena varam asyāḥ pradīyate // HV_App.I,30.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:11395: viṣṇur manuṣyadehas tu dvārakāyāṃ bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,30.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:11396: tasya putratvam asyaiva bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:11397: anaṅga iti vikhyātas trilokeṣu mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,30.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:11400: āsthāya śambaro māyāṃ pradyumnam apaneṣyati // HV_App.I,30.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:11401: tac gaccha śambaragṛhaṃ bhāryā māyāvatī bhava / HV_App.I,30.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:11403: tatra tvam ātmanaḥ kāntaṃ bālarūpaṃ vivardhaya / HV_App.I,30.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:11405: tatas tvayā sahānaṅgo dvārakāṃ vai gamiṣyati / HV_App.I,30.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:11406: ramiṣyati tvayā sārdhaṃ śailāputryā tv ahaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,30.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:11407: evam ādiśya deveśo jagāma puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,30.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:11411: evam eṣa mahābāhuḥ śambaraṃ nihaniṣyati / HV_App.I,30.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:11412: saputriṇo vai pradyumno hantā tasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:11415: saha putreṇa govindo bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,30.62**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:11418: tataḥ pravavṛte yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,30.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:11419: śambarasya tu putrāṇāṃ rukmiṇyā nandanasya ca // HV_App.I,30.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:11422: yugapat pātayanti sma pradyumnopari vegitāḥ // HV_App.I,30.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:11423: kārṣṇāyanis tu saṃkruddhaḥ sarvāstrair dhanuṣaś cyutaiḥ / HV_App.I,30.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:11424: ekaikaṃ paṅcabhiḥ kruddhaś ciccheda raṇamūrdhani // HV_App.I,30.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:11425: tato 'surā kruddhatarāḥ sarve te kṛtaniścayāḥ / HV_App.I,30.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:11427: tataḥ prakupito 'naṅgo dhanur āyamya satvaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:11428: śambarasya jaghānāśu daśa putrān mahaujasaḥ // HV_App.I,30.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:11430: cicchedāśu śiras tasya citrasenasya vīryavān // HV_App.I,30.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:11431: tatas te hataśeṣās tu sametya samayudhyata / HV_App.I,30.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:11433: tataḥ saṃdhāya bāṇāṃs tu vimuṅcan sa raṇotsukaḥ / HV_App.I,30.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:11434: krīḍann iva mahātejās teṣāṃ śīrṣāṇy apātayat // HV_App.I,30.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:11435: nihatya samare sarvāñ śatam uttamadhanvinām / HV_App.I,30.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:11437: hataṃ putraśataṃ śrutvā śambaraḥ krodham ādadhe / HV_App.I,30.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:11438: sūtaṃ saṃcodayām āsa rathaṃ me saṃprayojaya // HV_App.I,30.83 //
GE07hv_apppu:11439: rājño vākyaṃ niśamyātha praṇamya śirasā bhuvi / HV_App.I,30.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:11440: sa sainyaṃ codayām āsa rathaṃ ca susamāhitam // HV_App.I,30.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:11451: virājamānaṃ śrīmantam ārohac chambaras tadā // HV_App.I,30.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:11452: kāñcanaṃ citrasaṃnāhaṃ dhanur gṛhya śarāṃs tathā / HV_App.I,30.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:11454: caturbhiḥ sacivaiḥ sārdhaṃ sainyena mahatā vṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,30.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:11455: durdharaḥ ketumālī ca śatruhantā pramardanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:11456: etaiḥ parivṛto 'mātyair yuyutsuḥ prasthito raṇe // HV_App.I,30.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:11457: daśa nāgasahasrāṇi rathānāṃ dve śate tathā / HV_App.I,30.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:11458: hayānāṃ cāṣṭasāhasraiḥ prayutaiś ca padātinām / HV_App.I,30.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:11459: etaiḥ parivṛto yodhaiḥ śambaraḥ prayayau tadā // HV_App.I,30.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:11460: prayātasya tu saṃgrāme utpātāny utthitāni vai / HV_App.I,30.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:11462: garjanti puruṣaṃ medhā nirghātaś cāmbarāt patat / HV_App.I,30.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:11463: śivā vinedur aśivaṃ sainyaṃ saṃkālayan mahat // HV_App.I,30.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:11464: dhvajaśīrṣe 'patad gṛdhraḥ kāṅkṣan vai dānavāsṛjam / HV_App.I,30.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:11465: rathāgre patitaś cāsya kabandho bhuvi dṛśyate // HV_App.I,30.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:11468: sphurate nayanaṃ cāsya savyaṃ bhayanivedanam / HV_App.I,30.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:11469: bāhuḥ prakampate savyaḥ prāskhalan rathavājinaḥ // HV_App.I,30.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:11470: dhvāṅkṣo mūrdhni nipatitaḥ śambarasya surāriṇaḥ / HV_App.I,30.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:11473: pratodo nyapatad dhastāt sārather hayayāyinaḥ // HV_App.I,30.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:11474: etān acintayitvā tu utpātān samupasthitān / HV_App.I,30.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:11478: tena śabdena mahatā saṃtrastā mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,30.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:11480: raṇamadhye sthitaḥ kārṣṇiś cintayan nidhanaṃ ripoḥ / HV_App.I,30.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:11482: taṃ dṛṣṭvā śambaro māyī raukmiṇeyaṃ mahābalam / **HV_App.I,30.123**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11483: sainyaiḥ parivṛtaḥ saṃkhye yuddhāya kṛtaniścayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:11485: asaṃprāptāṃś ca tān bāṇāṃś ciccheda kṛtahastavat // HV_App.I,30.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:11486: pradyumno dhanur ādāya śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha / HV_App.I,30.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:11487: na tasya sainye 'bhimukho yo na viddhaḥ śareṇa vai // HV_App.I,30.128 //
GE07hv_apppu:11489: śambarasya tathābhyāśe sthitaṃ saṃhṛtya bhītavat // HV_App.I,30.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:11490: svabalaṃ vidrutaṃ dṛṣṭvā śambaraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,30.131 /
GE07hv_apppu:11491: ājñāpayām āsa tadā sacivān dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:11492: gacchadhvaṃ manniyogena praharadhvaṃ ripoḥ sutam / HV_App.I,30.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:11493: nopekṣaṇīyaḥ śatrur vai vadhyatāṃ kṣipram eṣa vai // HV_App.I,30.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:11494: upekṣita iva vyādhiḥ śarīraṃ nāśayed dhruvam / HV_App.I,30.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:11495: tad eṣa durgatiḥ pāpo vadhyatāṃ matpriyecchayā // HV_App.I,30.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:11496: tatas te sacivāḥ kruddhāḥ śirasā gṛhya śāsanam / HV_App.I,30.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:11497: śaravarṣaṃ pramuñcantas tvaritāś codayan rathān // HV_App.I,30.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:11498: tān dṛṣṭvā dhāvataḥ saṃkhye kruddho makaraketanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:11499: cāpam udyamya saṃbhrāntas tasthau pramukhato balī // HV_App.I,30.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:11502: saptatyā śatruhantāraṃ dvyaśītyā tu pramardanam / HV_App.I,30.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:11504: tatas te savicāḥ kruddhā pradyumnaṃ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ / HV_App.I,30.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:11505: [k: After line 145, Dn Cal. ed. ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11506: nijaghnuḥ samare vīrās tad adbhūtam ivābhavat / **HV_App.I,30.145**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11507: ekaikaśo bibhedājau ṣaṣṭibhiḥ ṣaṣṭibhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,30.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:11508: tān aprāptāñ śarān bāṇaiś ciccheda makaradhvajaḥ // HV_App.I,30.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:11509: tato 'rdhacandram ādāya durdharasya sa sārathim / HV_App.I,30.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:11510: jaghāna paśyatāṃ rājñāṃ sarveṣāṃ sainikasya vai // HV_App.I,30.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:11511: caturbhir atha nārācaiḥ suparvaiḥ kaṅkavājitaiḥ / HV_App.I,30.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:11512: jaghāna caturaḥ so 'śvān durdharasya rathaṃ prati // HV_App.I,30.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:11513: ekena yoktraṃ chatraṃ ca dhvajam ekena bandhuram / HV_App.I,30.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:11514: ṣaṣṭyā ca yugacakrākṣaṃ ciccheda makaradhvajaḥ // HV_App.I,30.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:11515: athāparaṃ śaraṃ gṛhya kaṅkapatraṃ sutejitam / HV_App.I,30.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:11517: sa gatāsur gataśrīko gatasattvo gataprabhaḥ / HV_App.I,30.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:11518: nipapāta rathopasthāt kṣīṇapuṇya iva grahaḥ // HV_App.I,30.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:11519: durdhare nihate śūre dānave dānaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:11522: kṛtvābhyadhāvat sahasā tiṣṭha tiṣṭheti cābravīt // HV_App.I,30.161 //
GE07hv_apppu:11523: saṃkruddhaḥ kṛṣṇasūnus tu śaravarṣair avākirat / HV_App.I,30.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:11524: parvataṃ vāridhārābhiḥ prāvṛṣīva yathā ghanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:11525: sa viddho dānavāmātyaḥ pradyumnena dhanuṣmatā / HV_App.I,30.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:11529: nipatyotpatya jagrāha sarveṣām eva paśyatām / HV_App.I,30.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:11530: tenaiva tasya ciccheda ketumāleḥ śiras tadā // HV_App.I,30.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:11531: tad dṛṣṭvā karma vipulaṃ raukmiṇeyasya devarāṭ / HV_App.I,30.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:11532: vismayaṃ paramaṃ prāptaḥ sarvair devagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,30.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:11534: ketumāliṃ hataṃ dṛṣṭvā śatruhantā pramardanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:11536: te gadāṃ musalaṃ cakraṃ prāsatomarasāyakān / HV_App.I,30.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:11537: bhindipālān kuṭhārāṃś ca bhāsvarān kūṭamudgarān / HV_App.I,30.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:11538: yugapat saṃkṣipanti sma vadhārthaṃ kṛṣṇanandane // HV_App.I,30.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:11539: so 'pi tāny astrajālāni śastrajālair anekadhā / HV_App.I,30.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:11540: ciccheda bahudhā vīro darśayan pāṇilāghavam // HV_App.I,30.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:11541: gajān so 'bhyahanat kruddho gajārohān sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,30.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:11542: rathān sārathibhiḥ sārdhaṃ hayāṃś caiva tu mardayan / HV_App.I,30.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:11543: pātayaṃs tāñ śaravrātair nāviddhaḥ kaś cid īkṣyate // HV_App.I,30.181 //
GE07hv_apppu:11544: evaṃ sarvāṇi sainyāni mamantha makaradhvajaḥ / HV_App.I,30.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:11553: nadīṃ dustaraṇīṃ bhīmām anaṅgena pravartitām // HV_App.I,30.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:11556: tān rukmiṇīṣutaḥ śrīmān viloḍayati dhanvinaḥ / HV_App.I,30.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:11557: śatruhantāram āśritya śarān abhyakiran bahūn // HV_App.I,30.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:11558: śatruhantā punaḥ kruddho mumoca śaram uttamam / HV_App.I,30.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:11559: pradyumnaṃ sa samāsādya hṛdaye nipapāta ha // HV_App.I,30.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:11560: sa viddhas tena bāṇena pradyumno na vyakampata / HV_App.I,30.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:11561: śaktiṃ jagrāha balavāñ śatruhantre mumūrṣave // HV_App.I,30.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:11562: sā kṣiptā raukmiṇeyena śaktir jvālākulā raṇe / HV_App.I,30.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:11566: patitaṃ śatruhantāraṃ dṛṣṭvā tasthau pramardanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:11567: jagrāha musalaṃ so'tha vacanaṃ cedam ādade // HV_App.I,30.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:11568: tiṣṭha kiṃ prākṛtair ebhiḥ kariṣyasi raṇapriya / HV_App.I,30.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:11569: māṃ yodhaya sudurbuddhe tatas tvaṃ na bhaviṣyasi // HV_App.I,30.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:11570: vṛṣṇivaṃśakule jātaḥ śatrur asmatpitā tava / HV_App.I,30.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:11571: putraṃ hantāsmy ahaṃ tasya tato 'sau nihato bhavet // HV_App.I,30.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:11572: mṛtena tena durbuddhe sarvadevakṣayo bhavet / HV_App.I,30.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:11573: daiteyā dānavāḥ sarve modantāṃ hataśatravaḥ // HV_App.I,30.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:11574: hate tvayi mamāstreṇa tvatsamutthaiś ca śoṇitaiḥ / HV_App.I,30.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:11575: śambarasya tu putrāṇāṃ karomy udakasatkriyām // HV_App.I,30.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:11576: adya bhīṣmasutā mandā karuṇaṃ vilapiṣyati / HV_App.I,30.214 /
GE07hv_apppu:11577: nihataṃ tvāṃ ca śrutvaiva yauvanasthaṃ gatāyuṣam // HV_App.I,30.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:11578: sa te pitā cakradharo viphalāśo bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,30.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:11579: hataṃ tvāṃ sa viditvā tu prāṇāṃs tyakṣyati mandadhīḥ / HV_App.I,30.217 /
GE07hv_apppu:11580: ity uktvā parigheṇāśu tāḍayad rukmiṇīsutam // HV_App.I,30.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:11581: sa tāḍito mahātejā raukmiṇeyaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,30.219 /
GE07hv_apppu:11582: [k: Line 219: double daṇḍa corrected to single. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11583: dorbhyām ākṣipya tasyaiva rathamukhyaṃ vyacūrṇayat // HV_App.I,30.220 //
GE07hv_apppu:11584: so 'vaplutya rathāt tasmāt padātir avatasthivān / HV_App.I,30.221 /
GE07hv_apppu:11585: tāṃ gadāṃ gṛhya sahasā raukmiṇeyam upādravat / HV_App.I,30.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:11586: tathaiva gadayā kāmaḥ pramardanam apothayat // HV_App.I,30.223 //
GE07hv_apppu:11587: hataṃ pramardanaṃ daityaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve pradudruvuḥ / HV_App.I,30.224 /
GE07hv_apppu:11588: na śaktāḥ pramukhe sthātuṃ siṃhatrāsād gajā iva // HV_App.I,30.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:11589: sārameyaṃ yathā dṛṣṭvā vigaṇo vipraṇaśyate / HV_App.I,30.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:11590: tathā sainyā viṣīdanti pradyumnasya bhayārditāḥ // HV_App.I,30.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:11591: kṣatajādigdhavaktrā vai muktakeśā hy aśobhata / HV_App.I,30.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:11599: śambaras tu tataḥ kruddhaḥ sūtam āha viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,30.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:11600: śatrupramukhato vīra rathaṃ me śīgram āvaha / HV_App.I,30.235 /
GE07hv_apppu:11601: yāvad enaṃ śarair hanmi mama vipriyakārakam // HV_App.I,30.236 //
GE07hv_apppu:11602: tato bhartur vacaḥ śrutvā sūtas tatpriyakārakaḥ / HV_App.I,30.237 /
GE07hv_apppu:11604: taṃ dṛṣṭvā ratham āyāntaṃ pradyumnaḥ phullalocanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.239 /
GE07hv_apppu:11605: saṃdadhe cāpam ādāya śaraṃ kanakabhūṣaṇam / HV_App.I,30.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:11606: tenāhanat susaṃkruddhaḥ kopayañ śambaraṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,30.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:11607: hṛdaye tāḍitas tena devaśatruḥ suviklavaḥ / HV_App.I,30.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:11608: rathopasthaṃ samāśritya tasthau so 'tha vicetanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:11609: sa cetanāṃ punaḥ prāpya dhanur ādāya śambaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:11610: vivyādha kārṣṇiṃ kupitaḥ saptabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,30.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:11611: tān aprāptāñ śarān so 'tha saptabhiḥ saptadhācchinat / HV_App.I,30.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:11612: śambaraṃ ca jaghānātha saptatyā niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,30.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:11614: ahanac chambaraṃ krodhād dhārābhir iva parvatam // HV_App.I,30.249 //
GE07hv_apppu:11616: [k: After line 250, Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11617: sa diśo vidiśaś caiva śaradhārāḥ samāvṛṇot / **HV_App.I,30.250**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11618: andhakārīkṛtaṃ vyoma dineśo naiva dṛśyate // HV_App.I,30.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:11620: pradyumnasya rathopasthe śaravarṣaṃ mumoca ha // HV_App.I,30.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:11622: ciccheda bahudhā rājan darśayan pāṇilāghavam // HV_App.I,30.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:11623: hate tasmin mahāvarṣe śarāṇāṃ kārṣṇinā tadā / HV_App.I,30.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:11626: āgneyāstraṃ mumocātha tena vṛkṣān aśātayat // HV_App.I,30.259 //
GE07hv_apppu:11628: pradyumnas taṃ tu vāyavyaiḥ protsārayata saṃyuge / HV_App.I,30.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:11629: tato māyāṃ parāṃ cakre devaśatruḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,30.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:11630: siṃhān vyāghrān varāhāṃś ca tarakṣūn ṛkṣavānarān / HV_App.I,30.263 /
GE07hv_apppu:11631: vāraṇān vāridaprakhyān hayān uṣṭrān viśāṃ pate // HV_App.I,30.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:11632: mumoca dhanur āyamya pradyumnasya rathopari / HV_App.I,30.265 /
GE07hv_apppu:11634: gāndharvāstreṇa ciccheda sarvāṃs tān khaṇḍaśas tadā // HV_App.I,30.266 //
GE07hv_apppu:11635: pradyumnena tu sā māyā hatā tāṃ vīkṣya śambaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.267 /
GE07hv_apppu:11636: anyāṃ māyāṃ mumocātha śambaraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.268 //
GE07hv_apppu:11639: tām āpatantīṃ māyāṃ tu kārṣṇiḥ kamalalocanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.271 /
GE07hv_apppu:11640: saiṃhīṃ māyāṃ samutsraṣṭuṃ cakre buddhiṃ mahāmanāḥ // HV_App.I,30.272 //
GE07hv_apppu:11641: [k: After line 272, T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11642: utsraṣṭukāmaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭā śambaro 'pi mumoca tām / **HV_App.I,30.272**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11644: māyā nāgamayī naṣṭā ādityeneva śarvarī // HV_App.I,30.274 //
GE07hv_apppu:11645: nihatāṃ hastimāyāṃ tu dṛṣṭvāsau dānaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,30.275 /
GE07hv_apppu:11646: māyāṃ saṃmohanīṃ nāma so 'sṛjad dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.276 //
GE07hv_apppu:11647: tāṃ sṛṣṭāṃ mohinīṃ nāma māyāṃ mayavinirmitām / HV_App.I,30.277 /
GE07hv_apppu:11648: saṃjñāstreṇa tu pradyumno nāśayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,30.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:11649: śambaras tu tataḥ kruddho māyayā naṣṭayā tathā / HV_App.I,30.279 /
GE07hv_apppu:11650: saiṃhīṃ māyāṃ mahātejāḥ so 'sṛjad dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,30.280 //
GE07hv_apppu:11651: siṃhān āpatato dṛṣṭvā raukmiṇeyaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,30.281 /
GE07hv_apppu:11652: astraṃ gāndharvam ādāya śarabhān asṛjat tadā // HV_App.I,30.282 //
GE07hv_apppu:11654: siṃhān vidrāvayām āsur vāyur jaladharān iva // HV_App.I,30.284 //
GE07hv_apppu:11655: siṃhān vidrāvitān dṛṣṭvā māyayāṣṭāpadena vai / HV_App.I,30.285 /
GE07hv_apppu:11656: śambaraś cintayām āsa katham enaṃ nihanmi vai // HV_App.I,30.286 //
GE07hv_apppu:11657: aho mūrkhasvabhāvo 'haṃ yan mayā na hataḥ śiśuḥ / HV_App.I,30.287 /
GE07hv_apppu:11660: manmayā corrected. The vulgate reading “yan mayā” is not recorded by the CE;
GE07hv_apppu:11661: so I deduce it is a misprint. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11662: prāptayauvanadehas tu kṛtāstraś cāpi durmatiḥ / HV_App.I,30.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:11663: tat kathaṃ nihaniṣyāmi śatruṃ raṇaśiraḥsthitam // HV_App.I,30.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:11664: māyā sā tiṣṭhate tīvrā pannagī nāma bhīṣaṇā / HV_App.I,30.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:11667: tayā dahyeta duṣṭātmā hy eṣa māyāmayena vai // HV_App.I,30.293 //
GE07hv_apppu:11668: sā sṛṣṭā pānnagī māyā viṣajvālāsamākulā / HV_App.I,30.294 /
GE07hv_apppu:11669: tayā pannagamayyā tu sarathaṃ sahavājinam / HV_App.I,30.295 /
GE07hv_apppu:11670: sasūtaṃ sa hi pradyumnaṃ babandha śarabandhanaiḥ // HV_App.I,30.296 //
GE07hv_apppu:11671: badhyamānaṃ tadā dṛṣṭvā ātmānaṃ vṛṣṇivaṃśajaḥ / HV_App.I,30.297 /
GE07hv_apppu:11672: māyāṃ saṃcintayām āsa sauparṇīṃ sarpanāśanīm // HV_App.I,30.298 //
GE07hv_apppu:11673: sā cintitā mahāmāyā pradyumnena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,30.299 /
GE07hv_apppu:11674: [k: After line 299, T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11676: suparṇā vicaranti sma sarpā naṣṭā mahāviṣāḥ // HV_App.I,30.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:11678: sādhu vīra mahābāho sādhu rukmiṇinandana / HV_App.I,30.302 /
GE07hv_apppu:11679: yat tvayā dharṣitā māyā tena sma paritoṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,30.303 //
GE07hv_apppu:11681: asti me kāladaṇḍābho mudgaro hemabhūṣitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.305 //
GE07hv_apppu:11683: mayā sṛṣṭaṃ svadehena tapas taptvā suduścaram // HV_App.I,30.307 //
GE07hv_apppu:11684: purā yo mama pārvatyā dattaḥ paramatuṣṭayā / HV_App.I,30.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:11685: gṛhāṇa śambaremaṃ tvaṃ mudgaraṃ hemabhūṣitam // HV_App.I,30.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:11687: anena dānavau raudrau balinau nagacāriṇau / HV_App.I,30.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:11688: śumbhaś caiva niśumbhaś ca sagaṇau sūditau mayā // HV_App.I,30.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:11689: prāṇasaṃśayam āpanne tvayā mokṣyaḥ sa śatrave / HV_App.I,30.313 /
GE07hv_apppu:11690: ity uktvā pārvatī devī tatraivāntaradhīyata // HV_App.I,30.314 //
GE07hv_apppu:11691: tad ahaṃ mudgaraśreṣṭhaṃ mocayiṣyāmi śatrave // HV_App.I,30.315 //
GE07hv_apppu:11692: tasya vijñāya cittaṃ tu devarājo 'bhyabhāṣata / HV_App.I,30.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:11693: gaccha nārada śīgraṃ tvaṃ pradyumnasya rathaṃ prati // HV_App.I,30.317 //
GE07hv_apppu:11694: saṃbodhaya mahābāhuṃ pūrvajātiṃ ca smāraya / HV_App.I,30.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:11695: vaiṣṇavāstraṃ prayacchāsmai vadhārthaṃ śambarasya ca / HV_App.I,30.319 /
GE07hv_apppu:11697: evam ukto maghavatā nāradaḥ prayayau tvaran / HV_App.I,30.321 /
GE07hv_apppu:11699: kumāra paśya māṃ prāptaṃ devagandharvanāradam / HV_App.I,30.323 /
GE07hv_apppu:11700: preṣitaṃ devarājena tava saṃbodhanāya vai // HV_App.I,30.324 //
GE07hv_apppu:11701: smara tvaṃ pūrvakaṃ bhāvaṃ kāmadevo 'si mānada / HV_App.I,30.325 /
GE07hv_apppu:11703: tvaṃ vṛṣṇivaṃśe jāto 'si rukmiṇyā garbhasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,30.327 /
GE07hv_apppu:11704: jāto 'si keśavena tvaṃ pradyumna iti kīrtyase // HV_App.I,30.328 //
GE07hv_apppu:11705: āhṛtya śambareṇa tvam ihānīto 'si mānada / HV_App.I,30.329 /
GE07hv_apppu:11707: vadhārthaṃ śambarasya tvaṃ hriyamāṇo hy apekṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,30.331 /
GE07hv_apppu:11709: yaiṣā māyāvatī nāma bhāryā vai śambarasya tu / HV_App.I,30.333 /
GE07hv_apppu:11710: ratiṃ tāṃ viddhi kalyāṇīṃ tava bhāryāṃ purātanīm / HV_App.I,30.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:11711: tava sā rakṣaṇārthāya śambarasya gṛhe 'vasat // HV_App.I,30.335 //
GE07hv_apppu:11712: māyāṃ śarīrajāṃ nyasya mohanārthaṃ durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,30.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:11713: rater utpādanārthāya preṣayaty aniśaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,30.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:11714: evaṃ pradyumna buddhyā vai tava bhāryā pratiṣṭhitā // HV_App.I,30.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:11715: hatvā tvaṃ śambaraṃ vīra vaiṣṇavāstreṇa saṃyuge / HV_App.I,30.339 /
GE07hv_apppu:11716: gṛhya māyāvatīṃ bhāryāṃ dvārakāṃ gantum arhasi // HV_App.I,30.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:11717: gṛhāṇa vaiṣṇavaṃ cāstraṃ kavacaṃ ca mahāprabham / HV_App.I,30.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:11718: śakreṇa tava saṃgṛhya preṣitaṃ śatrusūdana // HV_App.I,30.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:11719: śṛṇu me hy aparaṃ vākyaṃ kriyatām aviśaṅkayā / HV_App.I,30.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:11720: asya devaripos tāta mudgaro nityapūjitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.344 //
GE07hv_apppu:11723: tad astrapratighātārthaṃ devīṃ saṃsmartum arhasi / HV_App.I,30.347 /
GE07hv_apppu:11725: gṛhāṇa vaiṣṇavaṃ cāstraṃ devyai caiva namasya ca / **HV_App.I,30.347**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11726: stavyā caiva namasyā ca mahādevī raṇotsukaiḥ // HV_App.I,30.348 //
GE07hv_apppu:11727: tatra vai kriyatāṃ yatnaḥ saṃgrāme ripuṇā saha / HV_App.I,30.349 /
GE07hv_apppu:11728: ity uktvā nārado vākyaṃ prayayau yatra vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,30.350 //
GE07hv_apppu:11731: śambaras tu tataḥ kruddho mudgaraṃ taṃ samādade / HV_App.I,30.351 /
GE07hv_apppu:11732: mudgare gṛhyamāṇe tu dvādaśārkāḥ samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,30.352 //
GE07hv_apppu:11733: parvatāś calitāḥ sarve calitaṃ vasudhātalam / HV_App.I,30.353 /
GE07hv_apppu:11734: udmārgāḥ sāgarā jātāḥ saṃkṣubdhāś cāpi devatāḥ / HV_App.I,30.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:11735: gṛdhracakrākulaṃ vyoma ulkāpāto babhūva ha / HV_App.I,30.355 /
GE07hv_apppu:11736: vavarṣa rudhiraṃ devaḥ puruṣaṃ pavano vavau // HV_App.I,30.356 //
GE07hv_apppu:11737: evaṃ dṛṣṭvā mahotpātān pradyumnaḥ sa tvarānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,30.357 /
GE07hv_apppu:11738: avatīrya rathād vīraḥ kṛtāñjalipuṭaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,30.358 //
GE07hv_apppu:11739: devīṃ sasmāra manasā pārvatīṃ śaṃkarapriyām / HV_App.I,30.359 /
GE07hv_apppu:11740: praṇamya śirasā devīṃ stotuṃ samupacakrame // HV_App.I,30.360 //
GE07hv_apppu:11742: oṃ namaḥ kātyāyanyai guhasya jananyai namaḥ / HV_App.I,30.361 /
GE07hv_apppu:11743: namas trailokyamāyāyai kātyāyanyai namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,30.362 //
GE07hv_apppu:11744: namaḥ śatruvināśinyai namo gārgyai girīśaye / HV_App.I,30.363 /
GE07hv_apppu:11746: kālarātriṃ namasye 'haṃ kumārīṃ cāpi nityaśaḥ / HV_App.I,30.365 /
GE07hv_apppu:11749: namasyāmi mahādevīṃ jayāṃ ca vijayāṃ tathā // HV_App.I,30.368 //
GE07hv_apppu:11755: sāvitrīṃ cāpi viprāṇāṃ namasye 'haṃ kṛtāñjaliḥ / HV_App.I,30.374 /
GE07hv_apppu:11756: rakṣa māṃ devi satataṃ saṃgrāme vijayaṃ kuru // HV_App.I,30.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:11757: iti kāmavacaḥ śrutvā durgā suprītamānasā / HV_App.I,30.376 /
GE07hv_apppu:11760: varaṃ varaya vatsa tvam amoghaṃ darśanaṃ mama // HV_App.I,30.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:11761: devyāstu vacanaṃ śrutvā romāñ codgatamānasaḥ / HV_App.I,30.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:11762: praṇamya śirasā devīṃ vijñaptum upacakrame // HV_App.I,30.381 //
GE07hv_apppu:11763: yadi tvaṃ devi tuṣṭāsi dīyatāṃ me yadīpsitam / HV_App.I,30.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:11764: varaṃ ca varade yāce sarvāmitreṣu me jayaḥ // HV_App.I,30.383 //
GE07hv_apppu:11765: yas tvayā mudgaro dattaḥ śambarasyātmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,30.384 /
GE07hv_apppu:11766: eṣa me gātram āsādya mālā padmamayī bhavet // HV_App.I,30.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:11767: tathāstv iti ca sāpy uktvā tatraivantaradhīyata / HV_App.I,30.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:11768: pradyumnas tu mahātejā hṛṣṭo ratham athāruhat // HV_App.I,30.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:11769: mudgaraṃ tu gṛhītvā ca śambaraḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,30.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:11770: bhrāmayitvā sa cikṣepa pradyumnorasi vīryavān // HV_App.I,30.389 //
GE07hv_apppu:11771: sa gatvā madanābhyāśaṃ mālā bhūtvātha pauṣkarī / HV_App.I,30.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:11772: pradyumnasya ca kaṇṭhe sā samāyuktā vyarājata / HV_App.I,30.391 /
GE07hv_apppu:11773: nakṣatrāṇāṃ tu mālāyāṃ yathā parivṛto vidhuḥ // HV_App.I,30.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:11774: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,30.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:11775: sādhu sādhv iti vācocuḥ pūjayan keśavātmajam // HV_App.I,30.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:11776: mudgaraṃ puṣpabhūtaṃ tu dṛṣṭvā pradyumnasaṃnidhau / HV_App.I,30.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:11777: vaiṣṇavaṃ paramāstraṃ tu nāradena yadāhṛtam / HV_App.I,30.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:11778: saṃdadhe cāpam āyamya idaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,30.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:11779: yady ahaṃ rukmiṇīputraḥ keśavasyātmajo hy aham / HV_App.I,30.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:11780: tena satyena bāṇemaṃ jahi tvaṃ śambaraṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,30.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:11781: ity uktvā cāpam ākṛṣya saṃdhāya ca mahāmanāḥ / HV_App.I,30.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:11782: cikṣepa śambarāāyātha dahaṃl lokatrayaṃ tviṣā // HV_App.I,30.401 //
GE07hv_apppu:11783: sa kṣipto vṛṣṇisiṃhena bāṇaḥ kravyādamohanaḥ / HV_App.I,30.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:11784: hṛdayaṃ śambarasyātha bhittvā dharaṇim āgamat // HV_App.I,30.403 //
GE07hv_apppu:11785: naivāsya māṃsaṃ na snāyur nāsthi na tvaṅ na śoṇitam / HV_App.I,30.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:11787: hate daitye mahākāye dānave śambare 'dhame / HV_App.I,30.406 /
GE07hv_apppu:11789: ūrvaśī menakā rambhā vipracittis tilottamā / HV_App.I,30.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:11791: devarājas tu suprītaḥ sarvair devagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,30.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:11797: sa ca samarapariśramaṃ vahan vai @ HV_App.I,30.416 @
GE07hv_apppu:11805: transliterated by Anne Mossner and Horst Brinkhaus,
GE07hv_apppu:11808: [k: T2.4 G M1-3 ins. after adhyāya 105, Dn Ds2 D6 T1 M4 after App. I, No. 42B :k]
GE07hv_apppu:11810: kimarthaṃ bhagavān viṣṇur devadevo janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11811: gataḥ kailāsaśikharam ālayaṃ śaṃkarasya ha // HV_App.I,31.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:11812: nāradād yais tapo vṛddhair munibhis tattvadarśibhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:11813: tatra dṛṣṭo mahādevaḥ śaṃkaro nīlalohitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:11814: keśavena purā vipra kurvatā tapa uttamam / HV_App.I,31.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:11815: arcitas tena devena śaṃkaraś ceti viśrutam // HV_App.I,31.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:11816: devās tatra jagannāthaṃ dṛṣṭavantaḥ purātanam / HV_App.I,31.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:11817: arcayāṃ cakrire sākṣāc chakrādyās taṃ hariṃ haram // HV_App.I,31.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:11818: tau tu devau mahādevāv ekībhūtau dvidhā kṛtau / HV_App.I,31.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:11821: tayos tatra yathāvṛttaṃ kailāse parvatottame // HV_App.I,31.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:11822: ṛṣayaḥ kim aceṣṭanta dṛṣṭvā tau puruṣottamau / HV_App.I,31.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:11823: etat sarvam aśeṣeṇa vaktum arhasi sattama // HV_App.I,31.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:11824: yathāgato harir viṣṇuḥ kṛṣṇo jiṣṇuḥ purātanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:11825: yathā ca śaṃkaraḥ sākṣāt kṛtavān nāgabhūṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:11826: etat sarvaṃ vipravarya brūhi tattvena yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:11828: śṛṇuṣvāvahito rājan yathā kṛṣṇo gato nagam / HV_App.I,31.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:11829: yathā ca dṛṣṭo deveśaḥ śaṃkaro vṛṣavāhanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:11830: yathā cacāra ca tapo yathā te munayo gatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:11831: ekatvaṃ ca tayor yadvat tathā śṛṇu nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:11832: dvaipāyano 'tha bhagavān yathā provāca māṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:11833: namas kṛtvā pravakṣyāmi keśavaṃ khagavāhanam / HV_App.I,31.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:11834: yathāśakti yathāprajñaṃ śṛṇu yatnena suvrata // HV_App.I,31.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:11835: na hy aśuśrūṣave vācyaṃ nṛśaṃsāyātapasvine / HV_App.I,31.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:11836: nānadhītāya vaktavyaṃ puṇyaṃ puṇyavatāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:11837: svargyaṃ yaśasyaṃ dhanyaṃ ca buddhiśuddhikaraṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:11838: dhyeyaṃ puṇyātmanā nityam idaṃ vedārthaniścitam // HV_App.I,31.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:11842: śivayor devayos tatra hareś caiva bhavasya ha // HV_App.I,31.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:11844: hateṣv atha nṛpeṣv eva kiṃcic chiṣṭeṣu śatruṣu // HV_App.I,31.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:11845: śāsati sma tadā viṣṇuḥ pṛthivīṃ puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:11846: dvāravatyāṃ jagannātho vasan vṛṣṇibhir īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:11847: rukmiṇīsaṃgato devo vasaṃs tatra pure hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:11848: kadācic ca tayā sārdhaṃ śete rātrau jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:11849: viharaṃś ca yathāyogaṃ prītaḥ prītiyujā tayā // HV_App.I,31.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:11850: athovāca tadā devī rukmiṇī rukmabhūṣaṇā / HV_App.I,31.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:11851: putram icchāmi deveśa tvatto devakinandana // HV_App.I,31.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:11852: balinaṃ rūpasaṃpannaṃ tvayaiva sadṛṣaṃ prabho / HV_App.I,31.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:11853: vṛṣṇīnām api netāraṃ vīryayuktaṃ taponvitam // HV_App.I,31.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:11855: evam ādiguṇair yuktaṃ dātum arhasi sattama // HV_App.I,31.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:11856: tvayi sarvasya dātṛtvaṃ nityam eva pratiṣṭhitam / HV_App.I,31.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:11857: tvaṃ hi sarvasya kartā ca dātā bhoktā jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:11859: vaktavyaṃ kim u deveśa yadi bhaktāsmi keśava / HV_App.I,31.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:11860: anugraho yadi syān me devadeva jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:11861: dātum arhasi putraṃ tvaṃ vīryavantaṃ janārdana // HV_App.I,31.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:11863: ity ukto devadeveśaḥ priyayā prīyamāṇayā / HV_App.I,31.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:11864: tayā mahiṣyā rukmiṇyā rukmiśatrur yadūdvahaḥ // HV_App.I,31.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:11865: provāca vacanaṃ kāle rukmiṇīṃ yādaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:11866: dātāsmi tādṛśaṃ putraṃ yaṃ tvam icchasi bhāmini // HV_App.I,31.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:11867: nityabhaktāsi me devi nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,31.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:11868: avaśyaṃ tava dāsyāmi putraṃ śatrunibarhaṇam // HV_App.I,31.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:11869: putreṇa lokāñ jayati satām kāmadughā hi ye / HV_App.I,31.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:11870: pud iti narakasyākhyā duḥkaṃ ca narakaṃ viduḥ // HV_App.I,31.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:11871: pudas trāṇāt tataḥ putram ihecchanti paratra ca / HV_App.I,31.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:11872: anantāḥ putriṇo lokāḥ puruṣasya priye śubhāḥ // HV_App.I,31.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:11873: patir jāyāṃ praviśati garbho bhūtvā sa mātaram / HV_App.I,31.62 /
GE07hv_apppu:11874: tasyāṃ punar navo bhūtvā daśame māsi jāyate // HV_App.I,31.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:11876: tajjāyā jāyā bhavati yad asyāṃ jāyate punaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.63**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:11877: putravatāṃ bibhetīndraḥ kiṃ nu te nājitaṃ bhavet / HV_App.I,31.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:11878: nāputro vindate lokān kuputrād vandhyatā varā // HV_App.I,31.65 //
