GE07hv_apppu:11879: kuputro narako yasmāt suputrāt svarga eva hi / HV_App.I,31.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:11880: tasmād vinītaṃ satputraṃ śrutavantaṃ dayāparam // HV_App.I,31.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:11881: vidyā hi vinatir yasmād vidyāyuktaṃ sudhārmikam / HV_App.I,31.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:11882: icchet putraṃ sadā putrī puruṣo yatnavān budhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:11883: tasmād dāsyāmi te putraṃ vidyāvantaṃ sudhārmikam / HV_App.I,31.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:11884: eṣa gacchāmi putrārthaṃ kailāsaṃ parvatottamam // HV_App.I,31.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:11886: tato labdhāsmi putraṃ te bhavād bhūtahite ratāt // HV_App.I,31.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:11887: tapasā brahmacaryeṇa bhavaṃ śaṃkaram avyayam / HV_App.I,31.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:11888: toṣayitvā virūpākṣam ādidevam ajaṃ vibhum // HV_App.I,31.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:11889: gamiṣyāmy aham adyaiva draṣṭuṃ śaṃkaram avyayam / HV_App.I,31.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:11890: sa ca me dāsyate putraṃ toṣitas tapasā mayā // HV_App.I,31.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:11891: tatra gatvā mahādevaṃ namaskṛtya sahomayā / HV_App.I,31.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:11892: praviśya badarīṃ puṇyām ṛṣijuṣṭāṃ tapomayīm // HV_App.I,31.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:11899: idam ekam idaṃ tattvam iti niścitamānasaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.86 /
GE07hv_apppu:11903: prasiddhāṃ mahatīṃ devi yāsyāmi sukṛtālayām / HV_App.I,31.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:11904: ity uktvā virarāmaiva devadevo janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.91 //
GE07hv_apppu:11907: prabhātāyāṃ tu śarvaryāṃ gantum icchañ janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:11909: gāś ca dattvātha viprebhyo namaskṛtya dvijottamān / HV_App.I,31.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:11910: āsthānam aṇḍapaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ praviveśa jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:11911: āsanaṃ mahad āsthāya vṛṣṇīn āhūya sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:11912: balabhadraṃ śineḥ putraṃ hārdikyaṃ śaṭhasāraṇau // HV_App.I,31.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:11914: yasya nītiṃ samāśritya jīvanti yadavaḥ sukham // HV_App.I,31.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:11915: netā ca yaduvṛṣṇīnāṃ sa tu dharmaparaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:11916: yasya bibhyati devāś ca nītes tasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:11917: yasya buddhivaśād viṣṇuḥ śaśāsa pṛthivīṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:11918: taṃ ca vṛṣṇivaraṃ vīram uddhavaṃ devasaprabham // HV_App.I,31.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:11919: anyān api yadūn sarvān uvāca bhagavān hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:11920: śṛṇvantu mama vākyāni yādavāḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,31.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:11921: śṛṇu cāpi vaco mahyaṃ pitar uddhava me sakhe // HV_App.I,31.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:11922: bālyāt prabhṛti yo yatno mama duṣṭanibarhaṇe / HV_App.I,31.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:11923: pratyakṣaṃ bhavatā dṛṣṭaṃ pūtanānidhanaṃ nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,31.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:11924: keśī ca nihato bālye mayā bālena yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,31.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:11925: govardhano dhṛtaḥ śailo gāvaś ca paripālitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:11926: abhiṣikto 'smi śakreṇa devānām agrataḥ sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:11927: kaṃso 'pi nidhanaṃ nīto mayā cāṇūramallakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:11928: ugraseno 'bhiṣiktaś ca kṛtā dvāravatī mayā / HV_App.I,31.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:11929: anye cāpi nṛpā rājan balino nihatā mayā // HV_App.I,31.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:11930: yo 'pi vīro jarāsaṃdho nigṛhīto balān mayā / HV_App.I,31.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:11931: bhīmena balinā rājan nayena mama yādavāḥ // HV_App.I,31.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:11932: sṛgālo nihataḥ saṃkhye gomantād gacchatā mayā / HV_App.I,31.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:11933: yo 'pi vīro durātmāsau dānavo narako hataḥ / HV_App.I,31.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:11934: niṣkaṇṭakam imaṃ lokaṃ kṛtavān rājasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:11935: kiṃ tu vīro nṛpo jajñe sakhā bhaumasya yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,31.120 /
GE07hv_apppu:11936: pauṇḍro vīryavatāṃ netā dveṣṭā cāsau sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:11937: śiṣyo droṇasya rājendro balī brahmāstravitkṛtī / HV_App.I,31.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:11938: śāstrajño nītimān sākṣān netā sainyasya yatnavān / HV_App.I,31.123 /
GE07hv_apppu:11939: yoddhā yuddhapriyo rājā jāmadagnya ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:11940: ekāntaśatrur asmākaṃ chidrānveṣī sadā mama / HV_App.I,31.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:11941: bādhiṣyate purīṃ yoddhā chidraṃ yadi labheta saḥ // HV_App.I,31.126 //
GE07hv_apppu:11942: na hy alpasādhyo balavān puṇḍrasyeśo nṛpottamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.127 /
GE07hv_apppu:11944: yathā na bādhate rājā purīṃ yadukulāśrayām // HV_App.I,31.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:11945: ahaṃ tu yās ye kailāsaṃ kutaścit kāraṇān nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,31.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:11947: yāvad āgamanaṃ mahyaṃ tāvad yattā bhavantv iha // HV_App.I,31.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:11948: mayā virahatāṃ cemaṃ yadi jānāti pauṇḍrakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:11949: āgamiṣyati rājendro rotsyate ca purīm imām / HV_App.I,31.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:11950: imāṃ niryādavāṃ kartuṃ śaknotīti ca me matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:11951: yattā bhavata rājendrāḥ khaḍgaiḥ pāśaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:11955: teṣāṃ madhye mahābāhur uddhavaḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt / **HV_App.I,31.136**2:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:11956: pāṣāṇaiḥ karpaṇasthaiś ca saṃnaddhā bhavata svakaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:11957: pidhāya ca kapāṭāni mahādvārāṇi yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:11958: eka eva mahādvāro gamanāgamane sadā / HV_App.I,31.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:11959: mudrayā saha gacchantu rājāno gantum īpsavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.140 //
GE07hv_apppu:11960: na cāmudraḥ praveṣṭavyo dvārapālasya rakṣataḥ / HV_App.I,31.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:11961: yāvad āgamanaṃ mahyaṃ tāvad evaṃ bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,31.142 //
GE07hv_apppu:11962: mṛgayā nātra kartavyā na ca krīḍā bahiḥ purāt / HV_App.I,31.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:11963: jñātavyāś ca pare sve ca gamanāgamane sadā // HV_App.I,31.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:11967: evamādi kriyā kāryā yāvad āgamanaṃ mama / HV_App.I,31.145 /
GE07hv_apppu:11968: ity uktvā yādavān sarvān sātyakiṃ punar āha ca // HV_App.I,31.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:11971: sātyake śṛṇu madvākyaṃ yatto bhava yudhāṃ vara / HV_App.I,31.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:11972: tvaṃ tu khaḍgī gadī bhūtvā cāpī bāṇī talatravān / HV_App.I,31.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:11973: tiṣṭha yatnena rakṣasva purīṃ bahunṛpāśrayām // HV_App.I,31.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:11974: na ca nidrā tvayā kāryā rātrau yaduvṛṣa prabho / HV_App.I,31.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:11975: na ca vyākhyā tvayā kāryā śāstrāṇāṃ śāstratatpara / HV_App.I,31.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:11976: na ca vādas tvayā kāryo vādibhiḥ saha vṛṣṇipa // HV_App.I,31.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:11977: tvaṃ hi yoddhā balī jetā dhanurvedasya vedavit / HV_App.I,31.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:11978: tathā kuru yathā vīra nopahāsyā bhavemahi // HV_App.I,31.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:11980: kariṣyāmi vacas tubhyaṃ yathāśakti janārdana / HV_App.I,31.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:11981: ājñā tava jagannātha dhāryā yatnena me sadā // HV_App.I,31.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:11983: yāvad āgamanaṃ tubhyaṃ tāvat sthāsyāmi yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:11984: prasādas tava govinda yadi syān mayi mādhava / HV_App.I,31.159 /
GE07hv_apppu:11985: kiṃ nāma mama duḥsādhyaṃ śatrūṇāṃ nigrahe hare // HV_App.I,31.160 //
GE07hv_apppu:11986: yadi śakraṃ yamaṃ vāpi kuberam api pāśinam / HV_App.I,31.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:11987: sarvān etān vijeṣyāmi kim u pauṇḍraṃ nṛpottamam / HV_App.I,31.162 /
GE07hv_apppu:11988: gaccha kāryaṃ kuruṣvedaṃ yatto 'haṃ satataṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.163 //
GE07hv_apppu:11989: uddhavaṃ punar āhendaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ padmanibhekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.164 /
GE07hv_apppu:11990: śṛṇūddhava tvaṃ vākyaṃ me kuryās tv etat prayatnavān // HV_App.I,31.165 //
GE07hv_apppu:11991: rakṣyā nayena rājendra purī dvāravatī tvayā / HV_App.I,31.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:11992: yatto bhava sadā tāta kuru sāhāyyam atra naḥ / HV_App.I,31.167 /
GE07hv_apppu:11993: lajjā mama samutpannā vadatas tava sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:11994: tvaṃ hi netā samas tasya vidyāpārasya sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:11995: ko nu śakṣyati medhāvī vaktuṃ vidyāvataḥ puraḥ // HV_App.I,31.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:11996: yat kāryaṃ tad bhavān vetti hy akāryaṃ cāpi sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:11997: ato 'haṃ virame tāta vaktuṃ saṃprati vṛṣṇipa // HV_App.I,31.172 //
GE07hv_apppu:11999: kim idaṃ tava govinda vartate māṃ prati prabho / HV_App.I,31.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:12000: aho prasannatā mahyaṃ kiṃ tu prītir iyaṃ tava // HV_App.I,31.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:12001: jānāmy ahaṃ jagannātha prasādasyaiṣa vistaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:12002: yasya prasanno bhavasi tasya kiṃ nāsti keśava // HV_App.I,31.176 //
GE07hv_apppu:12003: tvaṃ hi sarvasya jagataḥ kartā hartā pradhānakṛt / HV_App.I,31.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:12004: prabhavaḥ sarvakāryāṇāṃ vaktā śrotā pramāṇavit // HV_App.I,31.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:12005: dhyātā dhyānamayo dhyeya iti brahmavido viduḥ / HV_App.I,31.179 /
GE07hv_apppu:12006: jetā devaripūṇāṃ ca goptā nākasadāṃ bhavān // HV_App.I,31.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:12007: tvannāthā vayam eveti jīvāmo nihatadviṣaḥ / HV_App.I,31.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:12008: iyaṃ nītir ahaṃ manye netā nīter yato bhavān // HV_App.I,31.182 //
GE07hv_apppu:12009: ko nu nāma na yo veda tvāṃ vinā sāṃprataṃ vada / HV_App.I,31.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:12010: nītis tvaṃ sarvakāryāṇām iti me niścitā matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:12011: durgāḍho nayamārgo 'yam ity āhus tadvido janāḥ / HV_App.I,31.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:12012: caturdhā procyate nītiḥ sāmadāne janārdana // HV_App.I,31.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:12013: daṇḍo bhedo manuṣyāṇāṃ nigrahāvagrahe sadā / HV_App.I,31.187 /
GE07hv_apppu:12014: daṇḍyeṣu daṇḍam icchanti sāmānyaṃ tu naye hare // HV_App.I,31.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:12015: balavatsv atha dānaṃ tu trayāṇāṃ cedagocare / HV_App.I,31.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:12016: prayoktavyo mahābheda iti nītimatāṃ matam // HV_App.I,31.190 //
GE07hv_apppu:12017: teṣu teṣv atha sarveṣu pramāṇaṃ tvāṃ vidur budhāḥ / HV_App.I,31.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:12018: kim atra bahunoktena sarvaṃ tvayi samarpitam / HV_App.I,31.192 /
GE07hv_apppu:12019: ity uktvā virarāmaiva uddhavo nītimattaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:12020: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur evam eva nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:12022: ugrasenaṃ nṛpaṃ rājaṃs tathā hārdikyam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:12023: kāmapālaṃ punar viṣṇur idaṃ hovāca yattvavit / HV_App.I,31.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:12024: na pramādas tvayā kāryaḥ sarvadā yatnavān bhava // HV_App.I,31.198 //
GE07hv_apppu:12025: sthite tvayi mahābāho ka pīḍā jagato bhavet // HV_App.I,31.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:12026: gadī bhava sadā ārya na krīḍā sarvadā bhavet // HV_App.I,31.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:12027: rakṣa tvaṃ sarvadā yatnāt purīṃ dvāravatīṃ prabho / HV_App.I,31.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:12028: nopahāsyā yathā syāma tathā kuru gadī bhava // HV_App.I,31.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:12029: utsāhaḥ sarvathā kāryo nirutsāho na yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.203 /
GE07hv_apppu:12030: bāḍham ity abravīd rāmaḥ kṛṣṇaṃ vṛṣṇikulodvaham // HV_App.I,31.204 //
GE07hv_apppu:12031: vṛṣṇayaḥ sarva evaite svaṃ svaṃ sadma samāyayuḥ / HV_App.I,31.205 /
GE07hv_apppu:12032: gantum aicchaj jagannāthaḥ kailāsaṃ parvatottamam // HV_App.I,31.206 //
GE07hv_apppu:12035: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa garuḍaṃ pakṣipuṃgavam / HV_App.I,31.207 /
GE07hv_apppu:12036: āgaccha tvaritaṃ tārkṣya iti viṣnur jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:12037: tataḥ sa bhagavāṃs tārkṣyo vedarāśir iti smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:12038: balavān vikramī yogī śāstranetā kurūdvaha // HV_App.I,31.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:12039: yajñamūrtiḥ purāṇātmā sāmamūrdhā ca pāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.211 /
GE07hv_apppu:12042: pannagāriḥ padmanetraḥ sākṣād indra ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.214 //
GE07hv_apppu:12045: prādur āsīn mahāvīryaḥ keśavasyāgratas tadā / HV_App.I,31.217 /
GE07hv_apppu:12046: jānubhyām apatad bhūmau namo viṣṇo jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:12047: namaste devadeveśa hare svāminn iti bruvan / HV_App.I,31.219 /
GE07hv_apppu:12048: pasparśa pāṇinā kṛṣṇaḥ svāgataṃ tārkṣyapuṃgava // HV_App.I,31.220 //
GE07hv_apppu:12049: ity uvāca tadā tārkṣyaṃ yāsye kailāsaparvatam / HV_App.I,31.221 /
GE07hv_apppu:12050: śūlinaṃ draṣṭum icchāmi śaṃkaraṃ śāśvataṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.222 //
GE07hv_apppu:12051: bāḍham ity abravīt tārkṣya āruhyainaṃ janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.223 /
GE07hv_apppu:12052: tiṣṭhadhvam iti hovāca yādavān pārśvavartinaḥ // HV_App.I,31.224 //
GE07hv_apppu:12053: tato yayau jagannātho diśaṃ prāguttarāṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.225 /
GE07hv_apppu:12054: raveṇa mahatā tārkṣyas trailokyaṃ samakampayat // HV_App.I,31.226 //
GE07hv_apppu:12055: sāgaraṃ kṣobhayām āsa padbhyāṃ pakṣī vrajaṃs tadā / HV_App.I,31.227 /
GE07hv_apppu:12056: pakṣeṇa parvatān sarvān vahan devaṃ janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.228 //
GE07hv_apppu:12057: tato devāḥ sagandharvā ākāśe 'dhiṣṭhitās tadā / HV_App.I,31.229 /
GE07hv_apppu:12058: tuṣṭuvuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ vāgbhir iṣṭābhir īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.230 //
GE07hv_apppu:12059: jaya deva jagannātha naya viṣṇo jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.231 /
GE07hv_apppu:12062: jayājeya hare deva yogidhyeya bhayāpaha // HV_App.I,31.234 //
GE07hv_apppu:12063: nārāyaṇa namo deva kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa hare hare / HV_App.I,31.235 /
GE07hv_apppu:12065: namas te sakaleśāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane / HV_App.I,31.237 /
GE07hv_apppu:12067: acintyamūrtaye tubhyaṃ namas te sakaleśvara / HV_App.I,31.239 /
GE07hv_apppu:12068: ity ādibhis tadā devaṃ vāgbhir īśānam avyayam / HV_App.I,31.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:12070: śṛṇvann eva jagannāthaḥ stutivākyāni tāni ca / HV_App.I,31.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:12071: yayau sārdhaṃ suragaṇair munibhir vedapāragaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:12072: yatra pūrvaṃ svayaṃ viṣṇus tapas tepe sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,31.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:12074: varṣāyutaṃ tapas taptaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,31.246 /
GE07hv_apppu:12075: yatra viṣṇur jagannāthas tapas taptvā sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,31.247 /
GE07hv_apppu:12077: gaṅgā yatra saricchreṣṭhā madhye dhāvati pāvanī / HV_App.I,31.249 /
GE07hv_apppu:12078: yatra śakraḥ svayaṃ hatvā vṛtraṃ vedārthatattvagam // HV_App.I,31.250 //
GE07hv_apppu:12079: brahmahatyā vināśārthaṃ tapo varṣāyutaṃ carat / HV_App.I,31.251 /
GE07hv_apppu:12080: yatra siddhāś ca siddhāḥ syur dhyātvā devaṃ janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.252 //
GE07hv_apppu:12081: yatra hatvā raṇe rāmo rāvaṇaṃ lokarāvaṇam / HV_App.I,31.253 /
GE07hv_apppu:12082: etacchāsanam icchaṃś ca tapo ghoram atapyata // HV_App.I,31.254 //
GE07hv_apppu:12083: devāś ca munayaś caiva siddhiṃ yānti śucivratāḥ / HV_App.I,31.255 /
GE07hv_apppu:12084: yatra nityaṃ jagannāthaḥ sākṣād vasati keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.256 //
GE07hv_apppu:12085: yatra yajñāḥ pravartante nityaṃ munigaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.257 /
GE07hv_apppu:12086: yasyāḥ smaraṇamātreṇa naraḥ svargaṃ gamiṣyati // HV_App.I,31.258 //
GE07hv_apppu:12087: svargasopānam icchanti yāṃ puṇyāṃ munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.259 /
GE07hv_apppu:12088: śatravo mitratāṃ yānti yatra nityaṃ nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.260 //
GE07hv_apppu:12089: yām āhuḥ puṇyaśīlānāṃ sthānam uttamadharmiṇām / HV_App.I,31.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:12090: yatra viṣṇuṃ samārādhya devāḥ svargaṃ samāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:12091: siddhikṣetram idaṃ prāhur ṛṣayo vītamatsarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.263 /
GE07hv_apppu:12092: viśālāṃ badarīṃ viṣṇus tāṃ draṣṭuṃ sakaleśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:12093: sāyāhne cāmaragaṇair munibhis tattva darśibhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.265 /
GE07hv_apppu:12096: nīḍastheṣu vihaṃgeṣu duhyamānāsu goṣu ca // HV_App.I,31.268 //
GE07hv_apppu:12097: bṛsīṣv atha ca tiṣṭhatsu munivīreṣu sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.269 /
GE07hv_apppu:12101: atithau pūjyamāne ca saṃdhyāviṣṭe jaganmaye // HV_App.I,31.273 //
GE07hv_apppu:12102: sa tasyām atha velāyāṃ devaiḥ saha janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.274 /
GE07hv_apppu:12103: viveśa badarīṃ viṣṇur munijuṣṭāṃ tapomayīm // HV_App.I,31.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:12104: āśramasyātha madhyaṃ tu praviśya harir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:12106: pradeśe puṇḍarīkākṣaḥ sthitas tāvat sahāmaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:12109: tato munigaṇā dṛṣṭvā devadevam avasthitam / HV_App.I,31.279 /
GE07hv_apppu:12113: nirmajjānīrasāḥ kecid vetālā iva kecana / HV_App.I,31.283 /
GE07hv_apppu:12116: smarantaḥ sarvadā viṣṇuṃ tadbhaktās tatparāyaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,31.286 //
GE07hv_apppu:12118: dhyānena manasā viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭavantas tapodhanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.288 //
GE07hv_apppu:12121: vasiṣṭho vāmadevaś ca raibhyo dhūmras tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,31.291 /
GE07hv_apppu:12122: jābāliḥ kāśyapaḥ kaṇvo bharadvājo 'tha gautamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.292 //
GE07hv_apppu:12123: atrir aśvaśirā bhadraḥ śaṅkhaḥ śaṇkhanidhiḥ kuṇiḥ / HV_App.I,31.293 /
GE07hv_apppu:12125: kakṣīvān aṅgirāś caiva munir dīrghatamās tathā / HV_App.I,31.295 /
GE07hv_apppu:12126: asito devalas tāta vālmīkiś ca mahātapāḥ // HV_App.I,31.296 //
GE07hv_apppu:12127: ete cānye ca munayo draṣṭum īśvaram avyayam / HV_App.I,31.297 /
GE07hv_apppu:12128: ādāyārghyaṃ yathāyogam uṭajāt svāt samāyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.298 //
GE07hv_apppu:12129: te ca gatvā hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ viṣṇum īśaṃ janārdanam / HV_App.I,31.299 /
GE07hv_apppu:12130: bhaktinamrās tadā devaṃ praṇemur bhaktavatsalam // HV_App.I,31.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:12131: namo 'stu kṛṣṇa krṣneti devadeveti keśavam / HV_App.I,31.301 /
GE07hv_apppu:12132: praṇavātmañ jagannātha natāḥ sma śirasā hare // HV_App.I,31.302 //
GE07hv_apppu:12133: viṣṇo jiṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa keśaveti ca sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.303 /
GE07hv_apppu:12134: praṇām apraṇatā viprāḥ prāhur itthaṃ jagatpatim // HV_App.I,31.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:12135: idam arghyam idaṃ pādyam idaṃ viṣṭaram eva ca / HV_App.I,31.305 /
GE07hv_apppu:12136: kṛtārthāḥ sarvathā deva prasanno no jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.306 //
GE07hv_apppu:12137: kiṃ kurmaḥ kiṃ nu naḥ kṛtyaṃ kaścid doṣaḥ prabho hare / HV_App.I,31.307 /
GE07hv_apppu:12138: iti prāñjalayaḥ sarve sthitā devasya pārśvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:12139: kṛṣno 'pi tad yathāyogam upayujya sahāmaraiḥ / HV_App.I,31.309 /
GE07hv_apppu:12140: kṛtaṃ sarvaṃ munivarā vardhatāṃ tapa uttamam // HV_App.I,31.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:12141: iti bruvan purāṇātmā prītas tena garutmatā / HV_App.I,31.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:12142: āsanaṃ lambhayām āsa rātrau devo janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:12143: kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭavān bhūyo munīnāṃ bhāvitātmanām / HV_App.I,31.313 /
GE07hv_apppu:12144: agnihotreṣu tapasi tathā kṛtyeṣu sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.314 //
GE07hv_apppu:12145: evamādi jagannāthaḥ pṛṣṭavān īśvaras tadā / HV_App.I,31.315 /
GE07hv_apppu:12146: sarvatra kuśalaṃ te tu brūyuḥ kṛṣṇasya tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.316 //
GE07hv_apppu:12147: ātithyaṃ cakrire te tu nīvāraiḥ phalamūlakaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.317 /
GE07hv_apppu:12148: devānām atha sarveṣāṃ viṣṇoḥ kṛṣṇasya yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:12149: ātithyam upayuñjānas tataḥ prīto 'bhavad dhariḥ // HV_App.I,31.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:12152: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur durvijñeyagatiḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,31.320 /
GE07hv_apppu:12153: yatra pūrvaṃ tapas taptam ātmanā yādaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.321 //
GE07hv_apppu:12154: gaṅgāyāś cottare tīre deśaṃ draṣṭum upāgataḥ / HV_App.I,31.322 /
GE07hv_apppu:12155: svayam eva hariḥ sākṣāt praviveśa tamālayam // HV_App.I,31.323 //
GE07hv_apppu:12156: praviśya suciraṃ kālaṃ dadarśa ca manoramam / HV_App.I,31.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:12157: niṣasāda tatas tasminn āśrame puṇyavardhane // HV_App.I,31.325 //
GE07hv_apppu:12158: samādhau yojayām āsa manaḥ padmanibhekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.326 /
GE07hv_apppu:12159: kim apy eṣa jagannātho dhyātvā deveśvaraḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:12160: sthite devagurau tatra samādhau dīpavad dharau / HV_App.I,31.328 /
GE07hv_apppu:12161: tatra śabdo mahān ghoraḥ prādur āsīt samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.329 //
GE07hv_apppu:12162: khāda khāda namo deva yāta yāta mṛgān imān / HV_App.I,31.330 /
GE07hv_apppu:12163: preṣayeha śunaḥ sarvān prasādāc chārṅgadhanvanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:12164: eṣa viṣṇur ayaṃ kṛṣṇo harir īśa ito 'cyutaḥ / HV_App.I,31.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:12165: namo 'stu viṣṇo deveśa svāmin mādhava keśava // HV_App.I,31.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:12166: ity ādiśabdaḥ sumahān āvir āsīt tadā niśi / HV_App.I,31.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:12167: tataś ca sumahānādaḥ siṃhānāṃ mṛgavidviṣām / HV_App.I,31.335 /
GE07hv_apppu:12168: dhāvatāṃ ca śunāṃ rajan mṛgān anu vinardatām // HV_App.I,31.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:12169: mṛgāṇāṃ bhītiyuktānām ṛkṣāṇāṃ dvīpināṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:12170: gajānāṃ nardatāṃ rājan bṛṃhitāni tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:12172: nādas trailokyavitrāsaḥ prādur āsīt tadā niśi // HV_App.I,31.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:12173: śrutvā taṃ tu harir devas tādṛśaṃ tatra viṣṭhitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:12174: samādhi kṣobhanipuṇaṃ niḥśvasya ca jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:12175: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa ko 'yam eṣa mahāsvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:12176: kasyāyam īdṛśaḥ śabdaḥ stutiyukto mama tv iti // HV_App.I,31.344 //
GE07hv_apppu:12177: āhosvin mṛgayā śabdaḥ śunāṃ saṃcaratāṃ vane / HV_App.I,31.345 /
GE07hv_apppu:12178: mṛgāṇām atha sarveṣāṃ nādaś ca sumahān ayam / HV_App.I,31.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:12179: vyāmiśraḥ stutiyuktābhir vāgbhir mama samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.347 //
GE07hv_apppu:12180: iti saṃcintya manasā diśo viprekṣya sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:12181: tata āste haris tatra jñātuṃ tasya samudbhavam // HV_App.I,31.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:12182: tato mṛgāḥ samāyānti yatra tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:12183: tāṃś caivānucaro rājañ śvagaṇaḥ samapadyata // HV_App.I,31.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:12184: atha vai dīpikā rājañ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:12185: tatas tamo 'pi vyanaśad diveva samapadyata // HV_App.I,31.353 //
GE07hv_apppu:12186: tato 'nu bhūtasaṃghāś ca samadṛśyanta tatra ha / HV_App.I,31.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:12187: piśācāś ca mahāghorā nardanto bahuvisvaram // HV_App.I,31.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:12188: bhakṣayanto 'tha piśitaṃ pibanto rudhiraṃ bahu / HV_App.I,31.356 /
GE07hv_apppu:12190: yatrāsau tiṣṭhate deva tāni tatraiva bhārata // **HV_App.I,31.356**4:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:12192: prādur āsan mahāghorāḥ piśācā vikṛtānanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:12193: hanyamānā hatā rājan patantaḥ patitā mṛgāḥ / HV_App.I,31.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:12194: itaś cetaś ca dhāvanto bāṇair viddhā mṛgadviṣaḥ // HV_App.I,31.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:12196: yatrāsau tiṣṭhate devas tatra yātāni bhārata // HV_App.I,31.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:12199: putravatyaḥ samāpetur yatra tiṣṭhati keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:12200: śvagaṇas tatra rājendra caraty eva tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.365 //
GE07hv_apppu:12201: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ sarvam ālokya viṣṭhitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:12202: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā paśyann āste sma keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:12203: kasyaiṣa visṛto nādaḥ kasya vāyaṃ janaḥ patan / HV_App.I,31.368 /
GE07hv_apppu:12204: ko nu māṃ stauti bhaktyā tu bhaviṣye prītimān aham // HV_App.I,31.369 //
GE07hv_apppu:12205: kasya muktiḥ samāyātā prīte mayi sudurlabhā / HV_App.I,31.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:12206: iti saṃcintya bhagavān āste prākṛtavad dhariḥ // HV_App.I,31.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:12209: teṣām anu mahāghorau piśācau vikṛtānanau / HV_App.I,31.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:12212: khādantau māṃsapiṭakaṃ pibantau śoṇitaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.375 //
GE07hv_apppu:12215: karṣantau śavayūthāni bāhubhyāṃ tatra tatra ha / HV_App.I,31.378 /
GE07hv_apppu:12216: hasantau vividhaṃ hāsaṃ svajātisadṛśaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.379 //
GE07hv_apppu:12217: vadantau bahurūpāṇi vacāṃsi prākṛtāni ca / HV_App.I,31.380 /
GE07hv_apppu:12219: sṛkkiṇī lelihantau ca dantān kaṭakaṭāyinau / HV_App.I,31.382 /
GE07hv_apppu:12221: vadantau kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇeti mādhaveti ca saṃtatam // HV_App.I,31.384 //
GE07hv_apppu:12222: kadā nu drakṣyate viṣṇuḥ sa idānīṃ kva tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,31.385 //
GE07hv_apppu:12223: svāmī naḥ kutra vasati kuto draṣṭuṃ yatāmahe / HV_App.I,31.386 /
GE07hv_apppu:12224: atra vā kutra deveśaḥ kuto nu sthāsyate hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.387 //
GE07hv_apppu:12225: kutaḥ padmapalāśākṣaḥ sākṣād indrānujo hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.388 /
GE07hv_apppu:12226: yam āhuḥ puṇḍarīkākṣaṃ brahma brahmavido janāḥ / HV_App.I,31.389 /
GE07hv_apppu:12227: tam ajaṃ puruṣaṃ viṣṇuṃ draṣṭum abhyudyatā vayam // HV_App.I,31.390 //
GE07hv_apppu:12229: tam ajaṃ viśvakartāraṃ kuto drakṣyāma sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:12230: yasya vistāra evaiṣa lokaḥ prāṇinivāsitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:12231: taṃ devaṃ draṣṭum īśānaṃ yatāmaḥ sāṃprataṃ harim // HV_App.I,31.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:12232: daśā ghoratamā loke vidviṣṭā sarvajantubhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:12233: paiśācīyaṃ samutpannā kathaṃ nau prāviśad balāt / HV_App.I,31.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:12235: aho nau duṣkṛtaṃ karma prāktane janmasaṃcaye / HV_App.I,31.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:12236: atraiva mahatī prītir vartate sarvadā tadā // HV_App.I,31.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:12237: yāvanno duṣkṛtaṃ karma tāvat sthāsyati tādṛśī / HV_App.I,31.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:12239: sarvathā duṣkṛtaṃ karma bahubhir janmasaṃcayaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:12240: tathā hi tat phalaṃ ghoram adyāpi na nivartate // HV_App.I,31.403 //
GE07hv_apppu:12241: yat tāḥ smaḥ prāṇino hantuṃ śvagaṇaiḥ saha sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,31.404 /
GE07hv_apppu:12242: tathā hi prāṇino loke bālyam ādau samāsthitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.405 /
GE07hv_apppu:12243: ajñānāvṛtacittāś ca kṛtyākṛtyaṃ na jānate // HV_App.I,31.406 //
GE07hv_apppu:12244: tathā yauvanino mattā viṣayair bahulīkṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,31.407 /
GE07hv_apppu:12245: yatante śreyase naiva tato viṣayasaṃsthitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.408 /
GE07hv_apppu:12247: tathā ca vṛddhabhāve tu vyādhibhir bahubhir vṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,31.410 /
GE07hv_apppu:12249: yatante na hi vai śreyo vinaṣṭendriyagocarāḥ // HV_App.I,31.412 //
GE07hv_apppu:12250: tato mṛtā garbhavāse vasanti satataṃ narāḥ / HV_App.I,31.413 /
GE07hv_apppu:12251: viṇmūtrakalile ghore duḥkhair bahubhir ācitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:12252: cyavante tu tato ghorād garbhāt saṃsāramaṇḍale / HV_App.I,31.415 /
GE07hv_apppu:12254: mahaty evaṃ sadā ghore saṃsāre duḥkhasaṃkule / HV_App.I,31.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:12257: acchedyaḥ śastrasaṃpātair upāyair bahubhiḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.420 /
GE07hv_apppu:12258: etasmān na nivartante martyāḥ prākṛtabuddhayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.421 //
GE07hv_apppu:12259: imaṃ hatvā manuṣyendram idam asmād dharāmy aham / HV_App.I,31.422 /
GE07hv_apppu:12260: corayitvā dhanam idaṃ hariṣyāmy adya yāmy aham // HV_App.I,31.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:12261: nirbhartsyainam idaṃ śāntaṃ hariṣyāmi dhanaṃ balī / HV_App.I,31.424 /
GE07hv_apppu:12262: ityādi vyākulā mūrkhā yatante prāṇipīḍanam / HV_App.I,31.425 /
GE07hv_apppu:12263: asyaiva duḥkhamūlasya saṃsārasya sadā hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.426 //
GE07hv_apppu:12265: ādidevaḥ purāṇātmā ātmā brahmavidāṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:12266: taṃ vayaṃ sarvayatnena drakṣyāmaḥ sarvathā harim / HV_App.I,31.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:12267: itthaṃ piśācau bhāṣantau prādur āstāṃ hareḥ puraḥ // HV_App.I,31.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:12270: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇuḥ piśācau māṃsabhakṣakau / HV_App.I,31.431 /
GE07hv_apppu:12272: vilokayāṃ cakratus tau piśācau devakīsutam / HV_App.I,31.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:12273: sthitaṃ sukhāsane viṣṇuṃ dṛṣṭvā lokeśvaraṃ harim // HV_App.I,31.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:12274: tau ca gatvā samuddeśaṃ piśācau keśavasya ha / HV_App.I,31.435 /
GE07hv_apppu:12275: tatas tāv ūcatur viṣṇum antarīkṛtya keśavam // HV_App.I,31.436 //
GE07hv_apppu:12276: ko bhavān kasya vā martya kutaś cāgamyate tvayā / HV_App.I,31.437 /
GE07hv_apppu:12277: kimartham iha saṃprāpto vane ghoramṛgākule // HV_App.I,31.438 //
GE07hv_apppu:12279: śvāpadaiḥ sevyamāne ca vipine vyāghrasaṃkule // HV_App.I,31.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:12280: sa kumāro 'navadyāṅgaḥ sākṣād viṣṇur ivāparaḥ / HV_App.I,31.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:12281: padmapatrekṣaṇaḥ śyāmaḥ padmābhaḥ śrīpatiḥ svayam // HV_App.I,31.442 //
GE07hv_apppu:12282: asmatprītikaraḥ sākṣāt prāpto viṣṇur ivāparaḥ / HV_App.I,31.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:12283: devo vā yadi vā yakṣo gandharvaḥ kiṃnaro 'pi vā // HV_App.I,31.444 //
GE07hv_apppu:12284: indro vā dhanado vāpi yamo 'tha varuṇo 'pi vā / HV_App.I,31.445 /
GE07hv_apppu:12285: ekākī vipine ghore dhyānārpitamanā iva // HV_App.I,31.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:12286: brūhi martya yathātattvaṃ jñātum icchāmi mānada / HV_App.I,31.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:12287: evaṃ pṛṣṭaḥ piśācābhyām āha viṣṇur urukramaḥ // HV_App.I,31.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:12288: kṣatriyo 'smīti māṃ prāhur manuṣyāḥ prakṛtisthitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:12289: yaduvaṃśe samutpannaḥ kṣātraṃ vṛttam anuṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.450 //
GE07hv_apppu:12290: lokānām atha pātāsmi śāstā duṣṭasya sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:12291: kailāsaṃ gantukāmo 'smi draṣṭuṃ devam upāpatim // HV_App.I,31.452 //
GE07hv_apppu:12292: ity evaṃ mama vṛttāntaḥ kathyatāṃ kau yuvām iti / HV_App.I,31.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:12293: yuvām iha samāyātau kiṃarthaṃ brāhmaṇāśramam // HV_App.I,31.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:12294: eṣā hi badarī puṇyā nānāvipraniṣevitā / HV_App.I,31.455 /
GE07hv_apppu:12295: badarīyaṃ samākhyātā na kṣudrair āśritā kvacit // HV_App.I,31.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:12297: śvagaṇā nātra dṛśyante piśācā māṃsabhojanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.458 //
GE07hv_apppu:12298: na hantavyā mṛgāś cātra mṛgayā nātra vartate / HV_App.I,31.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:12299: na tu kṣudraiḥ praveṣṭavyā na kṛtaghnair na nāstikaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.460 //
GE07hv_apppu:12300: aham asya tu deśasya rakṣitā nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.461 /
GE07hv_apppu:12301: vyatikramo yadi bhavet tasya śāstāsmi yatnataḥ // HV_App.I,31.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:12302: kau bhavantau kva nu yuvāṃ kasyeyaṃ mahatī camūḥ / HV_App.I,31.463 /
GE07hv_apppu:12303: nātaḥ paraṃ praveṣṭavyam ṛṣayas tatra saṃsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.464 //
GE07hv_apppu:12304: vighnas tatra pravarteta tapaḥsu ca tapasvinām / HV_App.I,31.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:12305: ihaiva sthīyatāṃ tāvad vaktavyaṃ ca tataḥ sukham // HV_App.I,31.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:12306: anyathāhaṃ niṣeddhā syāṃ balād bāhvos tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,31.467 /
GE07hv_apppu:12307: evaṃ pṛṣṭau piśācau tu vaktum evaṃ pracakratuḥ // HV_App.I,31.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:12308: tayor eko mahāghoraḥ piśāco dīrghabāhukaḥ / HV_App.I,31.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:12309: uvāca vacanaṃ tatra yathā hṛdi samarpitam / HV_App.I,31.470 /
GE07hv_apppu:12311: namaskṛtya jagannāthaṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ jagatpatim / HV_App.I,31.472 /
GE07hv_apppu:12312: ādidevam ajaṃ viṣṇuṃ vareṇyam anaghaṃ śucim / HV_App.I,31.473 /
GE07hv_apppu:12313: vakṣyāmi sakalaṃ yadvat tathā śṛṇu yadīcchasi // HV_App.I,31.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:12315: māṃsādo vikṛto ghoraḥ sākṣān mṛtyur ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,31.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:12317: mamāyam anujaḥ sākṣād antakasyāntako hy ayam // HV_App.I,31.478 //
GE07hv_apppu:12318: mṛgayāyāṃ samāyātā viṣṇoḥ pūjārtham ity uta / HV_App.I,31.479 /
GE07hv_apppu:12319: mameyaṃ vartate senā śvagaṇo 'pi mamaiva tu // HV_App.I,31.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:12322: satataṃ dūṣayan viṣṇuṃ ghaṇṭām ābadhya karṇayoḥ / HV_App.I,31.483 /
GE07hv_apppu:12323: mama na praviśen nāma viṣṇor iti vicintayan // HV_App.I,31.484 //
GE07hv_apppu:12325: ārādhya taṃ mahādevam astuvaṃ satataṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.486 //
GE07hv_apppu:12326: tataḥ prasanno mām āha vṛṇīṣveti varaṃ haraḥ / HV_App.I,31.487 /
GE07hv_apppu:12327: tato muktir mayā tatra prārthitā devasaṃnidhau // HV_App.I,31.488 //
GE07hv_apppu:12328: muktiṃ prārthayamānaṃ māṃ punar āha trilocanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.489 /
GE07hv_apppu:12329: muktipradātā sarveṣāṃ viṣṇur eva na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:12330: tasmād gatvā ca badarīṃ tatrārādhya janārdanam / HV_App.I,31.491 /
GE07hv_apppu:12332: ity ukto devadevena śūlinā jñātavān aham / HV_App.I,31.493 /
GE07hv_apppu:12333: tam eva paramaṃ matvā govindaṃ garuḍadhvajam / HV_App.I,31.494 /
GE07hv_apppu:12334: tasmāt prārthayamānaḥ san muktideśam imaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,31.495 //
GE07hv_apppu:12335: anyac ca śṛṇu me kāryaṃ yadi kautūhalaṃ tava / HV_App.I,31.496 /
GE07hv_apppu:12336: purī dvāravatī nāma paścimasyodadhes taṭe // HV_App.I,31.497 //
GE07hv_apppu:12338: adhyuvāsa harir viṣṇus tāṃ purīṃ puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.499 //
GE07hv_apppu:12340: nirgatāḥ sāṃprataṃ martya vayam etaiḥ sahānugaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.501 /
GE07hv_apppu:12341: viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaraḥ sākṣād draṣṭavyo 'smābhir adya hi // HV_App.I,31.502 //
GE07hv_apppu:12342: lokānāṃ prabhavaḥ pātā kartā hartā jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.503 /
GE07hv_apppu:12343: āder ādiḥ samastasya prabhavaṃ kāraṇaṃ hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.504 //
GE07hv_apppu:12345: prabhuḥ prabhūṇām api yaḥ sadātmakaḥ | HV_App.I,31.506 |
GE07hv_apppu:12347: draṣṭuṃ hariṃ saṃprati saṃyatāḥ smaḥ || HV_App.I,31.508 ||
GE07hv_apppu:12348: yasya prasādāj jagad evam āsīt @ HV_App.I,31.509 @
GE07hv_apppu:12351: draṣṭuṃ hariṃ saṃprati saṃyatāḥ smaḥ || HV_App.I,31.512 ||
GE07hv_apppu:12353: layaṃ ca yasmin samupaiti kalpe | HV_App.I,31.514 |
GE07hv_apppu:12356: sraṣṭā ca yo 'sau sakalasya devaḥ @ HV_App.I,31.517 @
GE07hv_apppu:12357: pātā ca hartā ca hariḥ sa eva | HV_App.I,31.518 |
GE07hv_apppu:12363: bhuvaś ca kartā harir eka eva | HV_App.I,31.522 |
GE07hv_apppu:12369: pādau ca vikṣipya karau ca dhūnvan || HV_App.I,31.528 ||
GE07hv_apppu:12373: bahir yathābhūtam abhūd idaṃ mahat || HV_App.I,31.532 ||

GE07hv_apppu:12654: vihasya vikṛtaṃ bhūyaḥ pranṛtya ca yathābalam / HV_App.I,31.805 /
GE07hv_apppu:12655: brāhmaṇasya hatasyātha śavam ādāya satvaram // HV_App.I,31.806 //

GE07hv_apppu:12675: aspṛśyaṃ mādṛśair etad brāhmaṇaṃ śavam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.824 //

GE07hv_apppu:12680: tasmāt prīto 'smi bhadraṃ te manonirmalatā yathā / HV_App.I,31.829 /
GE07hv_apppu:12681: manaḥ śuddhiṃ yadāpannaṃ tataḥ prīto 'smi māṃsapa // HV_App.I,31.830 //
GE07hv_apppu:12682: asmatsaṃkīrtanācchaśvac chuddaṃ hi karaṇaṃ tava / HV_App.I,31.831 /

GE07hv_apppu:12690: keyūrī cāṅgadī caiva kauśeyavasanas tadā / HV_App.I,31.839 /
GE07hv_apppu:12691: jñānavān sattvasaṃpannaḥ sākṣād indra ivāparaḥ / HV_App.I,31.840 /
GE07hv_apppu:12692: gandharva iva gāyaṃs tu siddhaḥ siddha iva svayam // HV_App.I,31.841 //
GE07hv_apppu:12693: sākṣāt spṛṣṭaṃ tadā viṣṇoḥ kareṇa mṛdupūrvakam / HV_App.I,31.842 /
GE07hv_apppu:12694: na nūnaṃ tādṛśaṃ rūpam āsīt kalpāntareṣv api // HV_App.I,31.843 //

GE07hv_apppu:12701: tataḥ provāca bhagavān sthitaṃ kāmam ivāparam / HV_App.I,31.850 /
GE07hv_apppu:12702: akṣayaḥ svargavāsas te yāvad indro bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,31.851 //

GE07hv_apppu:12707: dātāsmi sarvataḥ sarvaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.856 //
GE07hv_apppu:12709: yaś cemaṃ saṃgamaṃ deva saṃsmaren niyatātmavān / HV_App.I,31.857 /

GE07hv_apppu:12717: tena stuto jagannāthaḥ pūjayitvā ca taṃ dvijam / **HV_App.I,31.863**8:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:12719: yatra te munayaḥ siddhā agnihotram upāsate / HV_App.I,31.864 /

GE07hv_apppu:12725: tataḥ sa bhagavān viṣṇur munibhyas tattvam āditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.868 /

GE07hv_apppu:12727: tac chrutvā munayaḥ sarve vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.870 /
GE07hv_apppu:12728: aho 'sya karmaṇaḥ pākas tava saṃdarśanād iti // HV_App.I,31.871 //
GE07hv_apppu:12729: arcito munibhiḥ sarvaiḥ prītaḥ prītimatāṃ priyaḥ / HV_App.I,31.872 /
GE07hv_apppu:12730: tataḥ prabhāte vimale sūrye cābhyudite sati // HV_App.I,31.873 //

GE07hv_apppu:12732: bhavadbhis tatra gantavyam ity uktvā munisattamān // HV_App.I,31.875 //
GE07hv_apppu:12733: yatra viśveśvarāḥ siddhās tapasyanti yatavratāḥ / HV_App.I,31.876 /
GE07hv_apppu:12734: yatra vaiśravaṇaḥ sākṣād upāste śaṃkaraṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.877 /
GE07hv_apppu:12735: yatra tanmānasaṃ nāma saro haṃsālayaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,31.878 //
GE07hv_apppu:12736: yatra bhṛṅgī riṭir devam upāste śaṃkaraṃ śivam / HV_App.I,31.879 /
GE07hv_apppu:12737: gāṇapatyam avāpyātha nityaṃ pārśvacaro hare // HV_App.I,31.880 //
GE07hv_apppu:12738: yatra siṃhā varāhāś ca dvipadvīpimṛgaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.881 /
GE07hv_apppu:12740: yatra nadyaḥ samutpannā gaṅgādyāḥ sāgaraṃgamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.883 /
GE07hv_apppu:12741: yatra viśveśvaraḥ śaṃbhur acchinad brahmaṇaḥ śiraḥ / HV_App.I,31.884 /
GE07hv_apppu:12742: yatrotpannā mahāvetrā bhūtānāṃ daṇḍatāṃ yayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.885 //
GE07hv_apppu:12743: umayā yatra sahitaḥ śaṃkaro nīlalohitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.886 /
GE07hv_apppu:12744: ṛṣibhiḥ prārthitaḥ pūrvaṃ dadau yatra nagaḥ sutām / HV_App.I,31.887 /
GE07hv_apppu:12746: yatra lebhe hariś cakram upāsya bahubhir dinaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.889 /
GE07hv_apppu:12747: puṣkaraiḥ śatapatraiś ca netreṇa ca jagatpatim // HV_App.I,31.890 //
GE07hv_apppu:12748: guhāṃ yatra samāśritya krīḍante siddhakiṃnarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.891 /
GE07hv_apppu:12749: priyābhiḥ saha modante pibante madhu cottamam // HV_App.I,31.892 //
GE07hv_apppu:12750: yam uddhṛtya bhujaiḥ sarvaiḥ paulastyo virarāma ha / HV_App.I,31.893 /
GE07hv_apppu:12751: tam āruhya mahāśailaṃ devakīnandano hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.894 /
GE07hv_apppu:12753: tapaś cartuṃ kila harir viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaraḥ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,31.896 /

GE07hv_apppu:12755: tapase dhṛtacittas tu śucau bhūmāv upāviśat // HV_App.I,31.898 //

GE07hv_apppu:12761: tan na vidmo yathākāmaṃ durjñeyeśvaracintanā // HV_App.I,31.904 //
GE07hv_apppu:12762: tapasyati tadā viṣṇau parvate bhūtasevite / HV_App.I,31.905 /
GE07hv_apppu:12764: homārthaṃ vāsudevasya caratas tapa uttamam // HV_App.I,31.907 //
GE07hv_apppu:12765: cakrarājo 'tha puṣpāṇi saṃcinoti tadā hareḥ / HV_App.I,31.908 /
GE07hv_apppu:12766: dikṣu sarvāsu sarvatra rarakṣa jalajas tadā // HV_App.I,31.909 //
GE07hv_apppu:12767: khaḍga āhṛtya yatnena kuśān subahuśas tadā / HV_App.I,31.910 /
GE07hv_apppu:12768: gadā kaumodakī caiva paricaryāṃ cakāra ha // HV_App.I,31.911 //
GE07hv_apppu:12770: sthitaṃ hi puratas tasya yatheṣṭaṃ bhṛtyavat svayam / HV_App.I,31.913 /
GE07hv_apppu:12771: juhoti bhagavān viṣṇur edhobhir bahubhiḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.914 //
GE07hv_apppu:12772: ājyādibhis tadā havyair agniṃ saṃpūjya mādhavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.915 /
GE07hv_apppu:12773: saptārciṣaḥ samāptiṃ ca samastavyas tataḥ kṛtī // HV_App.I,31.916 //
GE07hv_apppu:12774: ekasminn ekadā māse bhuñjāno niyatātmavān / HV_App.I,31.917 /
GE07hv_apppu:12775: dvitīye tv atha paryāye bhuñjann ekena kenacit // HV_App.I,31.918 //
GE07hv_apppu:12776: ekasmin vatsare bhuñjaṃs tathaivaikena kenacit / HV_App.I,31.919 /
GE07hv_apppu:12777: samāpya vatsaraṃ sarvam evam eva jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.920 //
GE07hv_apppu:12778: dvādaśābde tathā pūrṇe ūnamāse jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.921 /
GE07hv_apppu:12779: juhvann agniṃ samādhyāyan paṭhan mantrāñ janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.922 //
GE07hv_apppu:12780: āraṇyakaṃ paṭhan viṣṇuḥ sākṣāt sarveśvaro hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.923 /
GE07hv_apppu:12781: āste dhyānaparas tatra paṭhan praṇavam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.924 //
GE07hv_apppu:12784: tata indraḥ svayaṃ tatra āruhya gajam uttamam / HV_App.I,31.925 /
GE07hv_apppu:12785: draṣṭuṃ sarveśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ tapasyantaṃ samāyayau // HV_App.I,31.926 //
GE07hv_apppu:12786: tato yamas tu bhagavān āruhya mahiṣaṃ varam / HV_App.I,31.927 /
GE07hv_apppu:12787: kiṃ karaiś ca svayaṃ sākṣād āyayau nagam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.928 //
GE07hv_apppu:12788: pracetā haṃsam āruhya vāruṇaiś ca samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.929 /
GE07hv_apppu:12790: yayau kailāsaśikharaṃ draṣṭuṃ keśavam añjasā // HV_App.I,31.931 //
GE07hv_apppu:12791: anye 'pi ca tathā devā ādityā vasavas tathā / HV_App.I,31.932 /

GE07hv_apppu:12793: siddhāś ca munayaś caiva gandharvā yakṣakiṃnarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.934 /
GE07hv_apppu:12795: tato devagaṇaḥ sarvaḥ kailāsaṃ samapadyata / HV_App.I,31.936 /
GE07hv_apppu:12796: parvato nāradaś caiva tathānye munisattamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.937 /
GE07hv_apppu:12799: ko nv atra vismayo bhūyād iti te menire gaṇāḥ / **HV_App.I,31.938**9:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:12802: ko nv atra samayo bhūyād iti te menire gaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,31.941 //
GE07hv_apppu:12808: priyeṇa sakhyā prabhur īśvaraḥ śivaḥ | HV_App.I,31.947 |

GE07hv_apppu:12822: tāṃ cāpi vīkṣan bahuśas tadā śivaḥ || HV_App.I,31.961 ||
GE07hv_apppu:12826: draṣṭuṃ hariṃ keśavam abhyayāc chivaḥ || HV_App.I,31.965 ||
GE07hv_apppu:12827: yam āhur agryaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntaṃ @ HV_App.I,31.966 @
GE07hv_apppu:12831: yam āhur ekaṃ puruṣaṃ purātanaṃ @ HV_App.I,31.970 @
GE07hv_apppu:12833: dakṣasya jajñaṃ vinihatya yo vai @ HV_App.I,31.972 @
GE07hv_apppu:12834: vināśya devāṃś ca purā purātanaḥ || HV_App.I,31.973 ||
GE07hv_apppu:12835: yaṃ vidur bhūtatattvajñaṃ bhūtaṃ bhuteśabhāvanam / HV_App.I,31.974 /
GE07hv_apppu:12836: vāmadevaṃ virūpākṣam āhus tattvavido janāḥ // HV_App.I,31.975 //
GE07hv_apppu:12838: rudraṃ rodananāmānam āhur viśveśvaraṃ śivam // HV_App.I,31.977 //
GE07hv_apppu:12839: aprameyam anādhāram āhur māheśvarā janāḥ / HV_App.I,31.978 /
GE07hv_apppu:12840: nagnaṃ nagnaparītaṃ tu nāginaṃ nagnavarcasam / HV_App.I,31.979 /
GE07hv_apppu:12841: āhur viśveśvaraṃ śāntaṃ śivam ādiṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,31.980 //
GE07hv_apppu:12842: tasya mūrtir imāḥ sarvā dharādyāḥ sakalā nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.981 //
GE07hv_apppu:12843: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ sūryaś ca tathā śaśī / HV_App.I,31.982 /
GE07hv_apppu:12844: agniś ca yajamānaś ca prakṛtiś caivam aṣṭadhā // HV_App.I,31.983 //
GE07hv_apppu:12847: draṣṭuṃ viśveśvaraṃ viṣṇuṃ bhūtasaṃghaiḥ samāyayau // HV_App.I,31.986 //
GE07hv_apppu:12856: tribāhuḥ pañcabāhuś ca vyāghravaktraḥ sitānanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.993 //
GE07hv_apppu:12857: ete cānye ca bahavo dīrghāsyā dīrghalocanāḥ / HV_App.I,31.994 /
GE07hv_apppu:12858: nṛtyantaḥ prahasantaś ca sphoṭayantaḥ parasparam // HV_App.I,31.995 //
GE07hv_apppu:12859: tathānye ghorarūpāś ca tathānye vikṛtānanāḥ / HV_App.I,31.996 /
GE07hv_apppu:12861: śavāni subahūny āśu bhakṣayantas tatas tataḥ / HV_App.I,31.998 /
GE07hv_apppu:12862: pibanto rudhiraṃ ghoraṃ khaṇḍayantaḥ śavaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.999 //
GE07hv_apppu:12864: nagnāś caiva sacīrāś ca śūlāgraprotamānuṣāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1001 //
GE07hv_apppu:12866: ḍiṇḍibhair aṭṭahāsaiś ca nādayanto vasuṃdharām / HV_App.I,31.1003 /
GE07hv_apppu:12867: kapālino bhairavāś ca jaṭilā muṇḍinas tathā / HV_App.I,31.1004 /
GE07hv_apppu:12868: evaṃ bahuvidhā ghorāḥ piśācā vikṛtānanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1005 //
GE07hv_apppu:12869: tathānye munivīrāś ca dhyāyantaḥ parameśvaram / HV_App.I,31.1006 /
GE07hv_apppu:12870: paṭhanto vedaśāstrāṇi sāṅgāni vividhāni ca // HV_App.I,31.1007 //
GE07hv_apppu:12873: stuvantaḥ śaṃkaraṃ bhaktyā stotrair māheśvarais tatha / HV_App.I,31.1010 /
GE07hv_apppu:12874: ekatra te munigaṇā aparatra gaṇās tathā // HV_App.I,31.1011 //
GE07hv_apppu:12875: anyatra siddhagandharvāḥ priyābhiḥ saha saṃgatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1012 /
GE07hv_apppu:12876: nṛtyanti nṛtyakuśalā gāyanti sma ca kanyakāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1013 //
GE07hv_apppu:12877: vidyādharās tathānyatra stuvantaḥ śaṃkaraṃ śivam / HV_App.I,31.1014 /
GE07hv_apppu:12878: nanṛtus tasya purato gacchanto 'psarasāṃ gaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1015 //
GE07hv_apppu:12879: evam etair mahāghoraiḥ piśācair bhūtakiṃnaraiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1016 /
GE07hv_apppu:12880: munibhiś cāpsarobhiś ca samaṃ śarvaḥ samāyayau // HV_App.I,31.1017 //
GE07hv_apppu:12881: yatra viśveśvaro viṣṇus tapas tepe sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,31.1018 /
GE07hv_apppu:12882: yatra te lokapālāś ca tiṣṭhanti sma didṛkṣayā / HV_App.I,31.1019 /
GE07hv_apppu:12885: jaṭī ca sākṣāt praṇavātmakaḥ kṛtī | HV_App.I,31.1022 |
GE07hv_apppu:12890: evaṃ bahuvidhair bhūtaiḥ piśācair uragaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.1025 /
GE07hv_apppu:12891: āgatya bhagavān rudraḥ śaṃkaro vṛṣavāhanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1026 //
GE07hv_apppu:12892: dadarśa viṣṇuṃ deveśaṃ tapantaṃ tapa uttamam / HV_App.I,31.1027 /
GE07hv_apppu:12893: juhvānam agniṃ vidhivad dhavyair medhyair jagatpatim // HV_App.I,31.1028 //
GE07hv_apppu:12897: indrādyair devasaṃghaiś ca vṛtaṃ munigaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.1032 /
GE07hv_apppu:12898: acintyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ dhyāyantaṃ kim api prabhum // HV_App.I,31.1033 //
GE07hv_apppu:12899: avaruhya vṛṣāc charvo bhagavān bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1034 /
GE07hv_apppu:12900: tataḥ prītaḥ prasannātmā lalāṭākṣa umāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1035 /
GE07hv_apppu:12901: tato bhūtapiśācāś ca rākṣasā guhyakās tathā / HV_App.I,31.1036 /
GE07hv_apppu:12902: munayo vipravaryāś ca jayaśabdaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,31.1037 //
GE07hv_apppu:12903: jaya deva jagannātha jaya rudra janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1038 /
GE07hv_apppu:12904: jaya viṣṇo hṛṣīkeśa nārāyaṇa parāyaṇa // HV_App.I,31.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:12905: jaya rudra purāṇātmañ jaya deva hareśvara / HV_App.I,31.1040 /
GE07hv_apppu:12906: ādideva jagannātha jaya śaṃkara bhāvana // HV_App.I,31.1041 //
GE07hv_apppu:12908: jaya cakragadāpāṇe jaya śūliṃs trilocana // HV_App.I,31.1043 //
GE07hv_apppu:12910: iti te munayaḥ sarve praṇāmaṃ cakrire harim // HV_App.I,31.1045 //
GE07hv_apppu:12911: tata utthāya bhagavān dṛṣṭvā devam avasthitam / HV_App.I,31.1046 /
GE07hv_apppu:12913: tato hṛṣṭamanā viśṇus tuṣṭāva haram īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.1048 //
GE07hv_apppu:12915: namas te śitikaṇṭhāya nīlagrīvāya vedhase / HV_App.I,31.1049 /
GE07hv_apppu:12916: namas te astu śociṣe namas te upavāsine // HV_App.I,31.1050 //
GE07hv_apppu:12917: namas te astu mīḍhuṣe nams te gadine hara / HV_App.I,31.1051 /
GE07hv_apppu:12918: namas te viśvamūrtaye vṛṣāya vṛṣarūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1052 //
GE07hv_apppu:12921: amūrtāya ca devāya namas te 'stu pinākine / HV_App.I,31.1053 /
GE07hv_apppu:12924: [k: The *--passage after line 1233 is also numbered as *11! :k]
GE07hv_apppu:12925: nāmaḥ kubjāya kūpāya śivāya śivarūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1054 //
GE07hv_apppu:12926: namas tuṇḍāya tuṣṭāya namas tuṭituṭāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1055 /
GE07hv_apppu:12927: namaḥ śivāya śāntāya giriśāya ca te namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1056 //
GE07hv_apppu:12928: namo harāya hiprāya namo hariharāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1057 /
GE07hv_apppu:12930: namo 'ghaṇṭāya ghaṇṭāya namo ghaṭighaṭāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1059 /
GE07hv_apppu:12931: namaḥ śarvāya śāntāya bhūtādhipataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1060 //
GE07hv_apppu:12932: namo namo virūpāya purāya purahāriṇe / HV_App.I,31.1061 /
GE07hv_apppu:12933: nama ādyāya bījāya śucaye bhasmarūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1062 //
GE07hv_apppu:12935: namas te khaṭvahastāya namas te kṛttivāsase // HV_App.I,31.1064 //
GE07hv_apppu:12936: namas te vāmadevāya nama ākāśamūrtaye / HV_App.I,31.1065 /
GE07hv_apppu:12937: harāya harirūpāya namas te tigmatejase // HV_App.I,31.1066 //
GE07hv_apppu:12940: namaś candrāya devāya sūryāya ca namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1069 /
GE07hv_apppu:12941: namaḥ pradhānadevāya bhūtānāṃ pataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1070 //
GE07hv_apppu:12943: ajāya ca namas tubhyaṃ bhūtabhāvana bhāvana // HV_App.I,31.1072 //
GE07hv_apppu:12944: namo 'stu harikeśāya piṅgalāya namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1073 /
GE07hv_apppu:12948: umāpate namas tubhyaṃ kailāsanilayāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1077 /
GE07hv_apppu:12951: tryambakāya namas tubhyaṃ tryakṣāya ca śivāya ca // HV_App.I,31.1080 //
GE07hv_apppu:12952: varadāya vareṇyāya namas te candraśekhara / HV_App.I,31.1081 /
GE07hv_apppu:12953: nama idhmāya haviṣe dhruvāya ca kuśāya ca // HV_App.I,31.1082 //
GE07hv_apppu:12954: namas te śatudyumnāya nāgapāśapriyāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1083 /
GE07hv_apppu:12959: virūpāya surūpāya mahāghorāya te namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1088 //
GE07hv_apppu:12963: bhūtāvāsa namas tubhyaṃ sarvāvāsa namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1092 //
GE07hv_apppu:12964: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ namas te bhūtidāyine / HV_App.I,31.1093 /
GE07hv_apppu:12965: nams te vāmadevāya mahādevāya te namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1094 //
GE07hv_apppu:12966: kā nu vākstutirūpā te ko nu stotuṃ praśaknuyāt / HV_App.I,31.1095 /
GE07hv_apppu:12967: kasya vā sphurate jihvā stutau stutimatāṃ vara // HV_App.I,31.1096 //
GE07hv_apppu:12968: kṣamasva bhagavan deva bhakto 'haṃ dhyāhi māṃ hara / HV_App.I,31.1097 /
GE07hv_apppu:12969: sarvātman sarvabhūteśa dhyāhi māṃ satataṃ hara // HV_App.I,31.1098 //
GE07hv_apppu:12970: rakṣa deva jagannātha lokān sarvātmanā hara / HV_App.I,31.1099 /
GE07hv_apppu:12971: dhyāhi bhaktān sadā deva bhaktapriya sadā hara // HV_App.I,31.1100 //
GE07hv_apppu:12974: tato vṛṣadhvajo devaḥ śūlī sākṣād umāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1101 /
GE07hv_apppu:12975: karaṃ kareṇa saṃspṛśya viṣṇoś cakradharasya ha // HV_App.I,31.1102 //
GE07hv_apppu:12976: provāca bhagavān rudraḥ keśavaṃ garuḍadhvajam / HV_App.I,31.1103 /
GE07hv_apppu:12978: kim idaṃ devadeveśa cakrapāṇe janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1105 /
GE07hv_apppu:12979: tapaścaryā kim arthaṃ te prārthanā tava kā vibho / HV_App.I,31.1106 /
GE07hv_apppu:12980: svayaṃ viṣṇur bhavān nityas tapas tvaṃ tapasāṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.1107 //
GE07hv_apppu:12981: putrārthaṃ yadi te deva tapaścaryā janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1108 /
GE07hv_apppu:12982: putro datto mayā deva pūrvam eva jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1109 //
GE07hv_apppu:12983: śṛṇu tatrāpi bhagavan kāraṇaṃ kāraṇātmaka // HV_App.I,31.1110 //
GE07hv_apppu:12984: tapaś cartuṃ pravṛtto 'ham kutaścit kāraṇād dhare / HV_App.I,31.1111 /
GE07hv_apppu:12985: varṣāyutaṃ mahāghoram purā kṛtayuge tadā // HV_App.I,31.1112 //
GE07hv_apppu:12986: bhavānī tatra me deva paricartuṃ tadābhavat / HV_App.I,31.1113 /
GE07hv_apppu:12987: pitrā niyuktā deveśa umaiṣā varavarṇinī / HV_App.I,31.1114 /
GE07hv_apppu:12988: bhīta indras tadā deva māraṃ māṃ praiṣayat tadā // HV_App.I,31.1115 //
GE07hv_apppu:12989: madhunā saha saṃyukto māro mām āgatas tadā / HV_App.I,31.1116 /
GE07hv_apppu:12990: lakṣyaṃ mām akarot tatra bāṇasya preṣitasya ha // HV_App.I,31.1117 //
GE07hv_apppu:12991: eṣā māṃ sevate tatra dānāt puṣpādinā hare // HV_App.I,31.1118 //
GE07hv_apppu:12992: tataḥ kruddho 'ham abhavaṃ dṛṣṭvā māraṃ tathāvidham / HV_App.I,31.1119 /
GE07hv_apppu:12993: krudhyato mama deveśa netrād agniḥ papāta ha // HV_App.I,31.1120 //
GE07hv_apppu:12994: so 'yam agnis tadā māraṃ bhasmasāt kṛtavāṃs tadā / HV_App.I,31.1121 /
GE07hv_apppu:12995: acintayaṃ tadā viṣṇo śakrasyaitac cikīrṣitam // HV_App.I,31.1122 //
GE07hv_apppu:12996: tataḥprabhṛti deveśa dayā taṃ prati vartate / HV_App.I,31.1123 /
GE07hv_apppu:12997: brahmaṇā ca niyukto 'smi prītas tatra janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1124 //
GE07hv_apppu:12998: niyuktaḥ putrarūpeṇa sa te deva jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.1125 /
GE07hv_apppu:12999: jyeṣṭhas tava suto deva pradyumnety abhiviśrutaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1126 //
GE07hv_apppu:13000: smaraṃ taṃ viddhi deveśa nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,31.1127 /
GE07hv_apppu:13001: ity uktvā punar āhedaṃ yāthātmyaṃ darśayann iva / HV_App.I,31.1128 /
GE07hv_apppu:13002: munīnāṃ śrotukāmānāṃ yāthātmyaṃ tatra sattama // HV_App.I,31.1129 //
GE07hv_apppu:13003: añjaliṃ saṃpuṭaṃ kṛtvā viṣṇum uddiśya śaṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1130 /
GE07hv_apppu:13004: umayā sārdham īśāno yāthātmyaṃ vaktum aihata // HV_App.I,31.1131 //
GE07hv_apppu:13005: hare kurvati tatraivam añjaliṃ kurusattama / HV_App.I,31.1132 /
GE07hv_apppu:13006: munayo devagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca sahakiṃnarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1133 /
GE07hv_apppu:13007: añjaliṃ cakrire viṣṇau devadeveśvare harau // HV_App.I,31.1134 //
GE07hv_apppu:13009: yat tat kāraṇam āhus tat sāṃkhyāḥ prakṛtisaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,31.1135 /
GE07hv_apppu:13011: sattvaṃ rajas tamo viṣṇo jagadaṇḍaṃ janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1137 /
GE07hv_apppu:13012: tasya kāraṇam āhus tvāṃ sāṃkhyās tattvavido hare / HV_App.I,31.1138 /
GE07hv_apppu:13014: tato mahān samutpannaḥ prakṛtir yasya kāraṇam / HV_App.I,31.1140 /
GE07hv_apppu:13015: tasmāt tu mahato ghorād ahaṃkāro mahān abhūt / HV_App.I,31.1141 /
GE07hv_apppu:13016: sa tvam ādau jagannātha pariṇāmas tathā hi saḥ // HV_App.I,31.1142 //
GE07hv_apppu:13017: ahaṃkārāt prabho deva kāraṇāni mahānti ca / HV_App.I,31.1143 /
GE07hv_apppu:13018: tanmātrāṇi tathā pañca bhūtāni prabhavanty uta // HV_App.I,31.1144 //
GE07hv_apppu:13019: tāni tvām āhur īśānaṃ bhūtānīti jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.1145 /
GE07hv_apppu:13020: pṛthivī vāyur ākāśam āpo jyotiś ca pañcamam // HV_App.I,31.1146 //
GE07hv_apppu:13021: cakṣur ghrāṇaṃ tathā sparṣo rasanā śrotram eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1147 /
GE07hv_apppu:13022: manaḥ ṣaṣṭhaṃ tathā deva prerakaṃ tatra tatra ha // HV_App.I,31.1148 //
GE07hv_apppu:13023: karmendriyāṇi cāpy āhuḥ pādādīni janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1149 /
GE07hv_apppu:13024: tvam eva tāni sarvāṇi karoṣi niyatātmavān // HV_App.I,31.1150 //
GE07hv_apppu:13025: sveṣu sveṣu jagannātha viṣayeṣu tathā hare / HV_App.I,31.1151 /
GE07hv_apppu:13027: yadā tvaṃ rajasā yuktas tadā bhūtāni sṛṣṭavān / HV_App.I,31.1153 /
GE07hv_apppu:13028: yadā ca sattvayukto 'si tadā pātā jagattrayam // HV_App.I,31.1154 //
GE07hv_apppu:13029: yadā te tama utkṛṣṭaṃ tadā saṃharase jagat / HV_App.I,31.1155 /
GE07hv_apppu:13030: tribhir eva guṇair yuktaḥ sṛṣṭirakṣāvināśane // HV_App.I,31.1156 //
GE07hv_apppu:13031: vartase vividhāṃ bhūtim ādāya niyatātmavān / HV_App.I,31.1157 /
GE07hv_apppu:13033: prāṇinām upabhogārtham antaḥ sthitvā jagadguro / HV_App.I,31.1159 /
GE07hv_apppu:13034: tasmāt sarvatra bhūteṣu vartase sarvago bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1160 //
GE07hv_apppu:13035: brahmā tvaṃ sṛṣṭikāle tu sthitau viṣṇur asi prabho / HV_App.I,31.1161 /
GE07hv_apppu:13036: saṃhāre rudranāmāsi tridhāmā tvam iti prabho // HV_App.I,31.1162 //
GE07hv_apppu:13037: bhūmir āpo 'nalo vāyuḥ khaṃ mano buddhir eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1163 /
GE07hv_apppu:13038: etāḥ prakṛtayo deva bhinnāḥ sarvatra te hare // HV_App.I,31.1164 //
GE07hv_apppu:13041: bhūmiṃ sarvām imāṃ prāpya saptadvīpāṃ sasāgarām / HV_App.I,31.1167 /
GE07hv_apppu:13042: aṇuḥ sarvatrago bhūtvā atyatiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam // HV_App.I,31.1168 //
GE07hv_apppu:13043: tvam evedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yad bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,31.1169 /
GE07hv_apppu:13044: tvatto virāṭ prādur abhūt samrāṭ caiva janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1170 //
GE07hv_apppu:13045: tava vaktrāj jagannātha brāhmaṇo lokarakṣakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1171 /
GE07hv_apppu:13046: prādur āsīt purāṇātman ṣaṭkarmanirataḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.1172 //
GE07hv_apppu:13047: rājanyas tu tathā bāhvor āsīt saṃrakṣaṇe rataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1173 /
GE07hv_apppu:13048: ūrvor vaiśyas tathā viṣṇo pādāc chūdra udāhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1174 /
GE07hv_apppu:13049: evaṃ varṇā jagannātha tava dehāt sanātanāt // HV_App.I,31.1175 //
GE07hv_apppu:13050: manasas tava deveśa candramāḥ samapadyata / HV_App.I,31.1176 /
GE07hv_apppu:13053: yasya bhāsā jagat sarvaṃ bhāsate bhānumānasau // HV_App.I,31.1179 //
GE07hv_apppu:13054: mukhād indraś cāgniś ca prāṇād vāyur ajāyata / HV_App.I,31.1180 /
GE07hv_apppu:13055: nābher antarikṣam utpannaṃ tava deva janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1181 //
GE07hv_apppu:13056: dyaur āsīt tu mahāghorā śirasas tava gopate / HV_App.I,31.1182 /
GE07hv_apppu:13057: padbhyāṃ bhūmiḥ samutpannā diśaḥ śrotrāj jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.1183 /
GE07hv_apppu:13058: evaṃ sṛṣṭvā jagat sarvaṃ vyāpya sarvaṃ vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1184 //
GE07hv_apppu:13059: vyāpya sarvān imāṃl lokān sthitaḥ sarvatra keśava / HV_App.I,31.1185 /
GE07hv_apppu:13060: tataś ca viṣṇunāmāsi dhātor vyāpteś ca darśanāt // HV_App.I,31.1186 //
GE07hv_apppu:13061: nārā āpaḥ samākhyātās tāsām ayanam āditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1187 /
GE07hv_apppu:13062: yatas tvaṃ bhūtabhavyeśa tan nārāyaṇaśabditaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1188 //
GE07hv_apppu:13063: vasanād devanād deva vāsudeveti śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1189 /
GE07hv_apppu:13064: harasi prāṇino deva tato harir iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1190 //
GE07hv_apppu:13065: śaṃ karoṣi sadā deva tataḥ śaṃkaranāmavān / HV_App.I,31.1191 /
GE07hv_apppu:13066: bṛhattvād bṛṃhaṇatvāc ca tasmād brahmeti śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1192 /
GE07hv_apppu:13068: hṛṣīkāṇīndriyāṇy āhus teṣām īśo yato bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1194 /
GE07hv_apppu:13069: hṛṣīkeśas tato viṣṇo khyāto vedeṣu paṭhyate // HV_App.I,31.1195 //
GE07hv_apppu:13070: ko brahmeti samākhyāta īśo 'haṃ sarvadehiṣu / HV_App.I,31.1196 /
GE07hv_apppu:13071: āvāṃ tavāṅge saṃbhūtau tataḥ keśavanāmavān // HV_App.I,31.1197 //
GE07hv_apppu:13072: mā vidyā ca hare proktā tasyā īśo yato bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1198 /
GE07hv_apppu:13073: tasmān mādhavanāmāsi dhavaḥ svāmīti śabditaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1199 //
GE07hv_apppu:13074: gaur eṣā tu yato vāṇī tāṃ ca veda yato bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1200 /
GE07hv_apppu:13075: govindas tu tato deva munibhiḥ kathyate bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1201 //
GE07hv_apppu:13076: trir ity eva trayo vedāḥ kīrtitā munisattamaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1202 /
GE07hv_apppu:13077: kramate tāṃs tathā sarvāṃs trivikrama iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1203 //
GE07hv_apppu:13079: mananān munir evāsi yamanād yatir ucyase // HV_App.I,31.1205 //
GE07hv_apppu:13080: apaś carasi yasmāt tvaṃ tapasvīti ca śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1206 /
GE07hv_apppu:13081: vasanti tvayi bhūtāni bhūtāvāsas tato hare // HV_App.I,31.1207 //
GE07hv_apppu:13082: īśas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānām īśvaro 'si tato hare / HV_App.I,31.1208 /
GE07hv_apppu:13083: praṇavaḥ sarvavedānāṃ gāyatrī chandasāṃ prabho // HV_App.I,31.1209 //
GE07hv_apppu:13084: akṣarāṇām akāras tvaṃ sphoṭas tvaṃ varṇasaṃśrayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1210 /
GE07hv_apppu:13085: rudrāṇām aham evāsmi vasūnāṃ pāvako bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1211 /
GE07hv_apppu:13086: ādityānāṃ bhavān viṣṇur indro deveśvaro bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1212 //
GE07hv_apppu:13087: aśvattho vṛkṣajātīnāṃ brahmā lokagurur bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1213 /
GE07hv_apppu:13088: merus tvaṃ parvatendrāṇāṃ devarṣīṇāṃ ca nāradaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1214 //
GE07hv_apppu:13089: dānavānāṃ bhavān daityaḥ prahrādo bhaktavatsala / HV_App.I,31.1215 /
GE07hv_apppu:13090: sarpāṇām eva sarveṣāṃ bhavān vāsukisaṃjñakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1216 //
GE07hv_apppu:13091: guhyakānāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhavān dhanada eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1217 /
GE07hv_apppu:13092: varuṇo yādasāṃ rājā gaṅgā tripathagā bhavān // HV_App.I,31.1218 //
GE07hv_apppu:13093: ādis tvaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ madhyam antas tathā bhavān / HV_App.I,31.1219 /
GE07hv_apppu:13094: tvattaḥ samabhavad viśvaṃ tvayi sarvaṃ pralīyate // HV_App.I,31.1220 //
GE07hv_apppu:13095: ahaṃ tvaṃ sarvago deva tvam evāhaṃ janārdana / HV_App.I,31.1221 /
GE07hv_apppu:13096: āvayor antaraṃ nāsti śabdair arthair jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1222 //
GE07hv_apppu:13097: nāmāni tava govinda yāni loke mahānti ca / HV_App.I,31.1223 /
GE07hv_apppu:13098: tāny eva mama nāmāni nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1224 //
GE07hv_apppu:13099: tvadupāsā jagannātha saivāstu mama gopate / HV_App.I,31.1225 /
GE07hv_apppu:13100: yaś ca tvāṃ dveṣṭi deveśa sa māṃ dveṣṭi na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1226 //
GE07hv_apppu:13101: tvadvistāro yato deva ahaṃ bhūtapatis tataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1227 /
GE07hv_apppu:13102: na tad asti vinā deva yat te virahitaṃ hare // HV_App.I,31.1228 //
GE07hv_apppu:13103: yad āsīd vartate yac ca yac ca bhāvi jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.1229 /
GE07hv_apppu:13104: sarvaṃ tvam eva deveśa vinā kiṃcit tvayā na hi // HV_App.I,31.1230 //
GE07hv_apppu:13105: stuvanti devāḥ satataṃ bhavantaṃ svair guṇaiḥ prabho / HV_App.I,31.1231 /
GE07hv_apppu:13106: ṛk ca tvaṃ yajur evāsi sāmāsi satataṃ vibho // HV_App.I,31.1232 //
GE07hv_apppu:13107: kiṃ ucyate mayā deva sarvaṃ tvaṃ bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1233 /
GE07hv_apppu:13109: namaḥ sarvātmane deva munīn āha punaḥ śivaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.1233**11:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:13110: evaṃ jānīta he viprā ye bhaktā draṣṭum āgatāḥ / **HV_App.I,31.1233**11:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:13111: etad eva paraṃ vastu naitasmāt param asti vaḥ // **HV_App.I,31.1233**11:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:13112: [k: This is a second occurrence of the reference *11. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:13113: namaḥ sarvātmane deva viṣṇo mādhava keśava // HV_App.I,31.1234 //
GE07hv_apppu:13114: namas karomi sarvātman namas te 'stu sadā hare / HV_App.I,31.1235 /
GE07hv_apppu:13115: namaḥ puṣkaranābhāya vande tvām aham īśvara // HV_App.I,31.1236 //
GE07hv_apppu:13118: ity uktvā devadeveśaṃ munīn āha punaḥ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1237 /
GE07hv_apppu:13119: evaṃ jānīta he viprā ye bhaktā draṣṭum āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1238 //
GE07hv_apppu:13120: etad eva paraṃ vastu naitasmāt param asti vaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1239 /
GE07hv_apppu:13121: etad eva vijānīdhvam etad vaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1240 //
GE07hv_apppu:13122: etad eva sadā viprā dhyeyaṃ prathatamānasaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1241 /
GE07hv_apppu:13123: etad vaḥ paramaṃ śreya etad vaḥ paramaṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1242 //
GE07hv_apppu:13124: etad vo janmanaḥ kṛtyam etad vas tapasaḥ phalam / HV_App.I,31.1243 /
GE07hv_apppu:13125: eṣa vaḥ puṇyanicaya eṣa dharmaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1244 //
GE07hv_apppu:13126: eṣa vo mokṣavaśaga eṣa mārga udāhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1245 /
GE07hv_apppu:13127: eṣa puṇyapradaḥ sākṣād etad vaḥ karmaṇāṃ phalam // HV_App.I,31.1246 //
GE07hv_apppu:13128: etad eva praśaṃsanti vidvāṃso brahmavādinaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1247 /
GE07hv_apppu:13129: eṣā trayīgatir viprāḥ prārthyā brahmavidāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.1248 //
GE07hv_apppu:13131: eṣa brahmavidāṃ mārgaḥ kathito vedavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1250 //
GE07hv_apppu:13132: evam eva vijānīta nātra kāryā vicāraṇā / HV_App.I,31.1251 /
GE07hv_apppu:13133: harir ekaḥ sadā dhyeyo bhavadbhiḥ sattvasaṃsthitaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1252 //
GE07hv_apppu:13135: nānyo jagati devo 'sti viṣṇor nārāyaṇāt paraḥ / **HV_App.I,31.1252**12:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:13136: om ity evaṃ sadā viprāḥ paṭhadhvaṃ dhyāta keśavam / HV_App.I,31.1253 /
GE07hv_apppu:13137: tato niḥśreyasaprāptir bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1254 //
GE07hv_apppu:13138: evaṃ dhyāto hariḥ sākṣāt prasanno vo bhaviṣyati / HV_App.I,31.1255 /
GE07hv_apppu:13139: bhavanāśam ayaṃ devaḥ kariṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1256 //
GE07hv_apppu:13140: sadā dhyāta hariṃ viprā yadīcchā prāptum īśvaram / HV_App.I,31.1257 /
GE07hv_apppu:13142: smaradhvaṃ sarvadā viṣṇuṃ paṭhadhvaṃ triśarīriṇam // HV_App.I,31.1259 //
GE07hv_apppu:13143: manaḥsaṃyamanaṃ viprāḥ kurudhvaṃ yatnataḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.1260 /
GE07hv_apppu:13145: dhyātvā māṃ sarvayatnena tato jānīta keśavam / HV_App.I,31.1262 /
GE07hv_apppu:13146: upāsyo 'yaṃ sadā viprā upāyo 'smi hare smṛtau // HV_App.I,31.1263 //
GE07hv_apppu:13147: upāyo 'yaṃ mayā prokto nātra saṃdeha ity api / HV_App.I,31.1264 /
GE07hv_apppu:13148: ayaṃ māyī sadā viprā yatadhvaṃ māyanāśane // HV_App.I,31.1265 //
GE07hv_apppu:13149: yathā vo buddhir akhilā śuddhā bhavati yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1266 /
GE07hv_apppu:13150: tathā kuruta viprendrā yathā devaḥ prasīdati // HV_App.I,31.1267 //
GE07hv_apppu:13151: evam uktās tataḥ sarve yatayaḥ puṇyaśālinaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1268 /
GE07hv_apppu:13153: yathāvad upagṛhṇānā nirastāḥ saṃśayān nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1269 //
GE07hv_apppu:13154: evam eveti te viprāḥ prāhuḥ prāñjalayo haram / HV_App.I,31.1270 /
GE07hv_apppu:13155: chinno naḥ saṃśayaḥ sarvo gṛhīto 'rthaḥ sa tādṛśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1271 //
GE07hv_apppu:13156: etadarthaṃ samāyātā vayam adya tavālayam / HV_App.I,31.1272 /
GE07hv_apppu:13157: saṃgamād yuvayoḥ sarvo naṣṭo moho mahān iha / HV_App.I,31.1273 /
GE07hv_apppu:13158: yathā vadasi deveśa tathā naḥ śreyase param // HV_App.I,31.1274 //
GE07hv_apppu:13159: yathāha bhagavān rudro yatāmaḥ satataṃ harau / HV_App.I,31.1275 /
GE07hv_apppu:13160: iti te munayaḥ prītāḥ praṇemuḥ keśavaṃ harim // HV_App.I,31.1276 //
GE07hv_apppu:13163: tataḥ sa bhagavān rudraḥ sarvān vismāpayann iva / HV_App.I,31.1277 /
GE07hv_apppu:13164: stutyā pracakrame stotuṃ viṣṇuṃ viśveśvaraṃ harim / HV_App.I,31.1278 /
GE07hv_apppu:13165: arthyābhiḥ śrutiyuktābhir munīnāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ tadā // HV_App.I,31.1279 //
GE07hv_apppu:13166: namo bhagavate tubhyaṃ vāsudevāya dhīmate / HV_App.I,31.1280 /
GE07hv_apppu:13167: yasya bhāsā jagat sarvaṃ bhāsate nityam acyuta / HV_App.I,31.1281 /
GE07hv_apppu:13168: namo bhagavate deva nityaṃ sūryātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1282 //
GE07hv_apppu:13169: yaḥ śītayati śītāṃśur lokān sarvān imān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,31.1283 /
GE07hv_apppu:13170: namas te viṣṇave deva tubhyaṃ somātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1284 //
GE07hv_apppu:13171: yaḥ prajāḥ prāṇayaty eko viśvātmā bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1285 /
GE07hv_apppu:13172: namaḥ sarvātmane deva namo vāyvātmane hare // HV_App.I,31.1286 //
GE07hv_apppu:13173: yo dadhāra kareṇāsau kuśacīrādi yat sadā / HV_App.I,31.1287 /
GE07hv_apppu:13174: dadhāra vedān sarvāṃś ca tubhyaṃ brahmātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1288 //
GE07hv_apppu:13175: sarvān saṃharate yas tu saṃhāre viśvadṛk sadā / HV_App.I,31.1289 /
GE07hv_apppu:13176: krodhātmā viśvarūpo 'si tubhyaṃ rudrātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1290 //
GE07hv_apppu:13177: sṛṣṭau sraṣṭā samastānāṃ prāṇināṃ prāṇadāyine / HV_App.I,31.1291 /
GE07hv_apppu:13178: ajāya viṣṇave tubhyaṃ sraṣṭre viśvasṛje namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1292 //
GE07hv_apppu:13179: ādau prakṛtimūlāya bhūtānāṃ prabhavāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1293 /
GE07hv_apppu:13180: namas te devadeveśa pradhānāya namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1294 //
GE07hv_apppu:13181: pṛthivyāṃ gandharūpeṇa saṃsthitaḥ prāṇināṃ hare / HV_App.I,31.1295 /
GE07hv_apppu:13182: dṛḍhāya dṛḍharūpāya tubhyaṃ gandhātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1296 //
GE07hv_apppu:13183: apāṃ rasāya sarvatra prāṇināṃ sukhahetave / HV_App.I,31.1297 /
GE07hv_apppu:13184: namas te viśvarūpāya rasāya ca namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1298 //
GE07hv_apppu:13185: tejasā bhāsvaro yas tu guṇo jantuhitaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.1299 /
GE07hv_apppu:13186: tasmai deva jagannātha namo bhāsvararūpiṇe // HV_App.I,31.1300 //
GE07hv_apppu:13187: vāyoḥ sparśo guṇo yatra śītoṣṇasukhaduḥkhadaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1301 /
GE07hv_apppu:13188: namas te vāyurūpāya namaḥ sparśātmane hare // HV_App.I,31.1302 //
GE07hv_apppu:13190: namas te bhagavan viṣṇo tubhyaṃ śabdātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1304 //
GE07hv_apppu:13191: yo dadhāra jagat sarvaṃ māyāmānuṣadehavān / HV_App.I,31.1305 /
GE07hv_apppu:13193: nama ādyāya bījāya nirguṇāya guṇātmane / HV_App.I,31.1307 /
GE07hv_apppu:13194: acintyāya sucintyāya tasmai cintyātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1308 //
GE07hv_apppu:13196: namo brahmavide tubhyaṃ brahmabrahmātmane namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1310 //
GE07hv_apppu:13199: viśvāya viśvarūpāya viśvakartre namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1313 /
GE07hv_apppu:13200: viśvahartre namo nityaṃ bhūtāvāsa namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1314 //
GE07hv_apppu:13203: agnaye 'gnipate tubhyaṃ jyotiṣāṃ pataye namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1317 /
GE07hv_apppu:13204: namaḥ sūryāya bhadrāya tejasāṃ pataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1318 //
GE07hv_apppu:13205: namaḥ somāya saumyāya namaḥ śītātmane hare / HV_App.I,31.1319 /
GE07hv_apppu:13209: namo yajñāya ījyāya haviṣe havyasaṃskṛte / HV_App.I,31.1321 /
GE07hv_apppu:13210: namaḥ sruvāya pātrāya yajñāṅgāya parāya ca // HV_App.I,31.1322 //
GE07hv_apppu:13211: namaḥ praṇavadehāya kṣarāyāpy akṣarāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1323 /
GE07hv_apppu:13215: gadine khaḍgine tubhyaṃ śaṅkhine cakriṇe namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1325 /
GE07hv_apppu:13216: śūline carmiṇe nityaṃ varadāya namo namaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1326 //
GE07hv_apppu:13217: buddhapriyāya buddhāya prabuddhāya sukhāya ca / HV_App.I,31.1327 /
GE07hv_apppu:13218: haraye viṣṇave tubhyaṃ namaḥ sarvātmane guro // HV_App.I,31.1328 //
GE07hv_apppu:13219: namas te sarvalokeśa sarvakartre namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1329 /
GE07hv_apppu:13220: namaḥ svabhāvaśuddhāya namas te yajñasūkara // HV_App.I,31.1330 //
GE07hv_apppu:13221: namo viṣṇo namo viṣṇo namo viṣṇo namo hare / HV_App.I,31.1331 /
GE07hv_apppu:13222: namas te vāsudevāya vāsudevāya dhīmate // HV_App.I,31.1332 //
GE07hv_apppu:13223: namaḥ kṛṣṇāya kṛṣṇāya sarvāvāsa namo namaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1333 /
GE07hv_apppu:13224: namo bhūyo namas te 'stu pāhi lokāñ janārdana // HV_App.I,31.1334 //
GE07hv_apppu:13225: iti stutvā jagannātham uvāca munisattamān / HV_App.I,31.1335 /
GE07hv_apppu:13226: idaṃ stotram adhīyānā nityaṃ vrajata keśavam / HV_App.I,31.1336 /
GE07hv_apppu:13227: śaraṇyaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ tatra śreyo vidhāsyati // HV_App.I,31.1337 //
GE07hv_apppu:13228: ye cemaṃ dhārayiṣyanti stavaṃ pāpavimocanam / HV_App.I,31.1338 /
GE07hv_apppu:13229: teṣāṃ prītaḥ prasannātmā paṭhatāṃ śṛṇvatāṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.1339 /
GE07hv_apppu:13230: śreyo dāsyati sarvātmā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1340 //
GE07hv_apppu:13231: avaśyaṃ manasā dhyāta keśavaṃ bhaktavatsalam / HV_App.I,31.1341 /
GE07hv_apppu:13232: śreyaḥ prāptuṃ yadīcchanti bhavantaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1342 //
GE07hv_apppu:13233: ity uktvā bhagavān rudras tatraivāntaradhīyata / HV_App.I,31.1343 /
GE07hv_apppu:13234: sagaṇaḥ śaṃkaraḥ sākṣād umayā bhūtabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1344 //
GE07hv_apppu:13235: tatas te munayaḥ sarve parāṃ nirvṛtim āpnuyuḥ / HV_App.I,31.1345 /
GE07hv_apppu:13237: tam eva paramaṃ tattvaṃ matvā nārāyaṇaṃ harim / **HV_App.I,31.1345**15:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:13238: vismayaṃ paramaṃ gatvā menire svakṛtārthatām // HV_App.I,31.1346 //
GE07hv_apppu:13239: lokapālās tadā viṣṇuṃ namaskṛtya hariṃ tadā / HV_App.I,31.1347 /
GE07hv_apppu:13240: jagmuḥ svānyatha veśmāni gaṇaiḥ sarvair nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.1348 //
GE07hv_apppu:13241: āruhya bhagavān viṣṇur garuḍaṃ pakṣipuṃgavam / HV_App.I,31.1349 /
GE07hv_apppu:13242: śaṅkhī cakrī gadī khaḍgī śārṅgī tūṇītalatravān // HV_App.I,31.1350 //
GE07hv_apppu:13243: yathāgataṃ jagannātho yayau badarikām anu / HV_App.I,31.1351 /
GE07hv_apppu:13245: tatra gatvā yathāyogaṃ viśramya harir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1353 /
GE07hv_apppu:13246: arcito munibhiḥ sarvair niṣasāda sukhāsane // HV_App.I,31.1354 //
GE07hv_apppu:13249: etasminn eva kāle tu pauṇḍro nṛpavaro nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.1355 /
GE07hv_apppu:13251: vṛṣṇiśatrus tadā rājā kṛṣṇadveṣṭā balāt tadā / HV_App.I,31.1357 /
GE07hv_apppu:13252: nṛpān sarvān samāhūya provāca nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,31.1358 //
GE07hv_apppu:13253: jitā ca pṛthivī sarvā jitāś ca nṛpasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1359 /
GE07hv_apppu:13254: vṛṣṇayas te balonmattāḥ kṛṣṇam āśritya garvitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1360 //
GE07hv_apppu:13255: na dāsyanti karaṃ sarve mama te kṛṣṇasaṃśrayāt / HV_App.I,31.1361 /
GE07hv_apppu:13256: sa tu kṛṣṇaś ca balavān mām avajñāya tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,31.1362 //
GE07hv_apppu:13257: ahaṃ cakrīti garvo 'bhūt tasya gopasya sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.1363 /
GE07hv_apppu:13258: śaṅkhī cakrī gadī śārṅgī tūṇīśarasahāyavān / HV_App.I,31.1364 /
GE07hv_apppu:13259: evamādir mahāgarvas tasya saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1365 //
GE07hv_apppu:13260: loke ca mama yan nāma vāsudeveti nityaśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1366 /
GE07hv_apppu:13261: agṛhṇān mama tan nāma gopo madabalānvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1367 //
GE07hv_apppu:13262: tasya cakrasya yac cakraṃ mamāpi niśitaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,31.1368 /
GE07hv_apppu:13263: garvahantṛ sadā tasya bali nāmnā sudarśanam // HV_App.I,31.1369 //
GE07hv_apppu:13264: sahasrāraṃ mahāghoraṃ tasya cakrasya nāśanam / HV_App.I,31.1370 /
GE07hv_apppu:13265: anena mahatā cakraṃ gopakasya nṛpottamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1371 //
GE07hv_apppu:13266: mamāpy etad dhanur divyaṃ śārṅgaṃ nāma mahāvaram / HV_App.I,31.1372 /
GE07hv_apppu:13267: nāśayāmi na saṃdehaś cakraṃ tasya yad adbhutam // HV_App.I,31.1373 //
GE07hv_apppu:13268: pāñcajanyo mahāśaṅkho mahānādaḥ sadā babhau / HV_App.I,31.1374 /
GE07hv_apppu:13269: tasya śaṅkhasya jetāsau paśyadhvaṃ nṛpasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1375 //
GE07hv_apppu:13270: gadā kaumodakī nāma mameyaṃ mahatī dṛḍhā / HV_App.I,31.1376 /
GE07hv_apppu:13272: khaḍgo nandakanāmāsau mamāyaṃ vipulo dṛḍhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1378 /
GE07hv_apppu:13273: antakasyāntako ghoras tasya khaḍgasya nāśakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1379 //
GE07hv_apppu:13274: tataś cāhaṃ gadī khaḍgī śārṅgī cakrī talatravān / HV_App.I,31.1380 /
GE07hv_apppu:13275: yudhi jetāsmi kṛṣṇasya nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.1381 //
GE07hv_apppu:13276: māṃ ca brūta nṛpāś caivaṃ gadinaṃ cakriṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.1382 /
GE07hv_apppu:13277: śaṅkhinaṃ śārṅgiṇaṃ vīraṃ brūta nityaṃ nṛpottamāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1383 /
GE07hv_apppu:13278: vāsudeveti māṃ brūta na tu gopaṃ yadūttamam // HV_App.I,31.1384 //
GE07hv_apppu:13279: eko 'haṃ vāsudevo hi hatvā taṃ gopadārakam / HV_App.I,31.1385 /
GE07hv_apppu:13280: sakhyur mama nihantāraṃ narakasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1386 //
GE07hv_apppu:13281: māṃ tathā yadi na brūta daṇḍyā bhāraṃ śataṃ śatam / HV_App.I,31.1387 /
GE07hv_apppu:13282: suvarṇasya ca niṣkasya dhānyānāṃ bahuśas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1388 //
GE07hv_apppu:13283: tathā bruvati rājendre manasā duḥsahaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,31.1389 /
GE07hv_apppu:13285: rasajñā balavīryasya keśavasya sadā nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1391 //
GE07hv_apppu:13286: apare tu nṛpā rājann evam eveti cukruśuḥ / HV_App.I,31.1392 /
GE07hv_apppu:13287: anye balamadotsiktā jeṣyāmaḥ keśavaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,31.1393 //
GE07hv_apppu:13291: nāradaḥ sarvalokajñaḥ pauṇḍrasya nagaraṃ prati // HV_App.I,31.1395 //
GE07hv_apppu:13293: dvāḥsthena ca samājñaptaḥ praviveśa gṛhottamam // HV_App.I,31.1397 //
GE07hv_apppu:13296: kuśalaṃ pṛṣṭavān bhūyo nṛpasya munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1400 /
GE07hv_apppu:13297: uvāca nāradaṃ bhūyaḥ pauṇḍrako balagarvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1401 //
GE07hv_apppu:13298: bhavān sarvatra kuśalaḥ sarvakāryeṣu paṇḍitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1402 /
GE07hv_apppu:13300: sarvatrago nirābādho gantā sarvatra sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.1404 /
GE07hv_apppu:13301: agamyaṃ tava viprendra brahmāṇḍe 'tra na kiṃcana // HV_App.I,31.1405 //
GE07hv_apppu:13302: nāradaivaṃ vada tvaṃ hi yatra yatra gataḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.1406 /
GE07hv_apppu:13303: tatra tatra tapaḥsiddho loke prathitavīryavān // HV_App.I,31.1407 //
GE07hv_apppu:13304: pauṇḍra eva balī khyāto vāsudeveti śabditaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1408 /
GE07hv_apppu:13305: śaṅkhī cakrī gadī śārṅgī khaḍgī tūṇītalatravān // HV_App.I,31.1409 //
GE07hv_apppu:13306: vijetā rājasiṃhānāṃ dātā dānasya sarvadā / HV_App.I,31.1410 /
GE07hv_apppu:13307: bhoktā rājyasya sarvasya śāstā rājñāṃ balād balī / HV_App.I,31.1411 /
GE07hv_apppu:13308: ajeyaḥ śatrusainyānāṃ rakṣitā svajanasya ha // HV_App.I,31.1412 //
GE07hv_apppu:13310: tasya vīryabale na sto nāmnaś ca mama dhāraṇe // HV_App.I,31.1414 //
GE07hv_apppu:13311: sa hi gopo vṛthā bālyād dhārayaty eva nāma me / HV_App.I,31.1415 /
GE07hv_apppu:13312: idaṃ niścinu viprendra eka eva bhavāmy aham // HV_App.I,31.1416 //
GE07hv_apppu:13313: vāsudevo jagaty asmin nirjitya balinaṃ yadum / HV_App.I,31.1417 /
GE07hv_apppu:13314: vṛṣṇīn sarvān balāj jitvā nirdahiṣye ca tāṃ purīṃ // HV_App.I,31.1418 //
GE07hv_apppu:13315: dvārakāṃ vṛṣṇinilayāṃ yoddhā cāhaṃ mahāmate / HV_App.I,31.1419 /
GE07hv_apppu:13316: ete ca balinaḥ sarve nṛpā mama samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1420 //
GE07hv_apppu:13317: aśvāś ca veginaḥ santi rathā vāyujavā mama / HV_App.I,31.1421 /
GE07hv_apppu:13318: nāgā mattāḥ sahasraṃ ca śataṃ niyutam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.1422 //
GE07hv_apppu:13319: etenaiva balenājau haniṣye keśavaṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,31.1423 /
GE07hv_apppu:13320: tasmād evaṃ sadā vipra vada brahman pure mama // HV_App.I,31.1424 //
GE07hv_apppu:13321: indrasyāpi sadā vipra vada nārada sāṃpratam / HV_App.I,31.1425 /
GE07hv_apppu:13322: prārthanaiṣā mama vibho namasye tvāṃ tapodhana // HV_App.I,31.1426 //
GE07hv_apppu:13324: sarvatragaḥ sadā cāsmi yāvad brahmāṇḍasaṃsthitiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1427 /
GE07hv_apppu:13325: avāryaḥ sarvalokeṣu gamane kenacin nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.1428 //
GE07hv_apppu:13326: kiṃ tu vaktuṃ tathā rājan notsahe nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,31.1429 /
GE07hv_apppu:13327: mahīṃ śāsati deveśe cakrapāṇau janārdane // HV_App.I,31.1430 //
GE07hv_apppu:13328: viṣṇau sarvatrage deve duṣṭān hatvā sabāndhavān / HV_App.I,31.1431 /
GE07hv_apppu:13329: vāsudeveti ko nāma tiṣṭhaty asmin harāv iti / HV_App.I,31.1432 /
GE07hv_apppu:13330: ko nāma vaktum evaṃ hi kṛṣṇe śāsati gopatau // HV_App.I,31.1433 //
GE07hv_apppu:13331: ajñānād vaktum evaṃ cet samarthaḥ prākṛto janaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1434 /
GE07hv_apppu:13332: hariḥ sarvatrago viṣṇur darpaṃ te vyaneṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1435 //
GE07hv_apppu:13334: ādidevaḥ purāṇātmā darpaṃ te vyapaneṣyati // HV_App.I,31.1437 //
GE07hv_apppu:13335: hāsyam etan mahārājan yac cakraṃ tava saṃsthitam / HV_App.I,31.1438 /
GE07hv_apppu:13336: śārṅgaṃ śaṅkhaṃ tathā rājan gadā ghoratarā hi te / HV_App.I,31.1439 /
GE07hv_apppu:13337: atīva hāsakālo 'yaṃ tava saṃprati vartate // HV_App.I,31.1440 //
GE07hv_apppu:13340: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja pauṇḍro balamadānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1441 /
GE07hv_apppu:13341: nāradaṃ vipravaryaṃ taṃ provāca nṛpasaṃsadi // HV_App.I,31.1442 //
GE07hv_apppu:13342: mā maivaṃ vada devarṣe rājāhaṃ vijayī sadā / HV_App.I,31.1443 /
GE07hv_apppu:13343: gaccha tvaṃ kāmam adyaiva muniḥ śāpapradaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.1444 /
GE07hv_apppu:13344: bhītas tvatto mahābuddhe gaccha tvaṃ kāmam atra ha // HV_App.I,31.1445 //
GE07hv_apppu:13345: ity ukto nṛpavīryeṇa tūṣṇīm eva sa nāradaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1446 /
GE07hv_apppu:13347: sa gatvā viṣṇusakāśaṃ viṣṇoḥ sarvaṃ śaśaṃsa ha // HV_App.I,31.1448 //
GE07hv_apppu:13348: tac chrutvā bhagavān viṣṇur yatheṣṭaṃ vadatām iti / HV_App.I,31.1449 /
GE07hv_apppu:13350: ity uktvā virarāmaiva tasmin badarikāśrame // HV_App.I,31.1451 //
GE07hv_apppu:13351: tataḥ pauṇḍro mahāvīryo balair bahubhir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.1452 /
GE07hv_apppu:13352: aśvair anekasāhasrair gajair bahubhir anvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1453 //
GE07hv_apppu:13356: aṣṭau hayasahasrāṇi nāgānāṃ niyutaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.1457 /
GE07hv_apppu:13357: prayutaṃ pattisāhasraṃ tad balaṃ samapadyata // HV_App.I,31.1458 //
GE07hv_apppu:13358: etena tu balenājau prasphuran nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,31.1459 /
GE07hv_apppu:13359: virarāja mahārāja udayastho yathā raviḥ // HV_App.I,31.1460 //
GE07hv_apppu:13360: yayau madhyamarātreṇa nagarīṃ dvārakām anu / HV_App.I,31.1461 /
GE07hv_apppu:13361: pattayo dīpikāhastā rātrau mahati dāruṇe // HV_App.I,31.1462 //
GE07hv_apppu:13364: rathaṃ mahāntam āruhya śastraughaiś ca samanvitam / HV_App.I,31.1465 /
GE07hv_apppu:13371: gṛhītadīpiko rājā vīryavān balavān nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.1472 /
GE07hv_apppu:13372: hantum aicchaj jagannāthaṃ vṛṣṇīṃś caiva samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1473 //
GE07hv_apppu:13373: ākarṣan balamukhyāṃs tān rājñaḥ sarvān mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,31.1474 /
GE07hv_apppu:13374: pūrvadvāraṃ samāgamya balaṃ saṃsthāpya yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1475 /
GE07hv_apppu:13375: idaṃ provāca rājā tu nṛpān sarvān avasthitān // HV_App.I,31.1476 //
GE07hv_apppu:13376: tāḍyatām atra bherī tu nāma viśrāvya māmakam / HV_App.I,31.1477 /
GE07hv_apppu:13377: yudhyatāṃ yudhyatām atra deyaṃ vā pratidīyatām // HV_App.I,31.1478 //
GE07hv_apppu:13380: iti te preṣitāḥ sarve samāghnaṃs tūryakān bahūn / HV_App.I,31.1481 /
GE07hv_apppu:13381: dīpikāś ca pradīpyante bahvyaḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1482 //
GE07hv_apppu:13382: itaś cetaś ca rājāno vartante yuddhalālasāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1483 /
GE07hv_apppu:13383: purīṃ te paritas tasthuḥ kṣatriyāḥ śastriṇas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1484 //
GE07hv_apppu:13385: kuto nu vṛṣṇipravaraḥ kuto rājā jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1486 //
GE07hv_apppu:13386: kutaś ca sātyakir vīraḥ kuto hārdikya eva ca / HV_App.I,31.1487 /
GE07hv_apppu:13387: kuto nu balabhadraś ca sarvayādavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1488 /
GE07hv_apppu:13388: ity evaṃ kathayanto vai rājānaḥ sarva eva tu // HV_App.I,31.1489 //
GE07hv_apppu:13390: śarāṃś ca cāpāni mahānti sarve | HV_App.I,31.1491 |
GE07hv_apppu:13395: tataś ca yādavāḥ sarve dṛṣṭvā sainikasaṃcayam / HV_App.I,31.1494 /
GE07hv_apppu:13401: sātyakir balabhadraś ca hārdikyo niśaṭhas tathā / HV_App.I,31.1500 /
GE07hv_apppu:13403: anye ca yādavāḥ sarve kavacapragrahe ratāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1502 /
GE07hv_apppu:13405: khaḍginaḥ śastriṇaś caiva sarve śastrasamākulāḥ / HV_App.I,31.1504 /
GE07hv_apppu:13407: rathino gajinaś caiva sādinaḥ sāyudhās tathā / HV_App.I,31.1506 /
GE07hv_apppu:13409: niryayur nagarāt tūrṇaṃ dīpikābhiḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.1508 /
GE07hv_apppu:13410: kutaḥ pauṇḍraka ity eva bruvantaḥ sarvasātvatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1509 //
GE07hv_apppu:13412: tato vitimiro deśaḥ samantāt pratyapadyata / HV_App.I,31.1511 /
GE07hv_apppu:13413: yuddhaṃ samabhavad ghoraṃ vṛṣṇīnāṃ kṣatriyaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,31.1512 //
GE07hv_apppu:13414: tato mahān samabhavat saṃnādo lomaharṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1513 /
GE07hv_apppu:13415: hayā hayaiḥ samāyuktāḥ gajāś ca rathayūthapaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.1514 //
GE07hv_apppu:13416: rathā rathaiḥ samāyuktāḥ sādinaḥ sādibhis tathā / HV_App.I,31.1515 /
GE07hv_apppu:13417: khaḍgibhiḥ khaḍgino rājan gadibhir gadinas tathā // HV_App.I,31.1516 //
GE07hv_apppu:13421: nighnataitān ity avocan vṛṣṇayaḥ sarvato nṛpān // HV_App.I,31.1520 //
GE07hv_apppu:13422: ayam eṣa mahābāhuḥ khaḍgī patati vīryavān / HV_App.I,31.1521 /
GE07hv_apppu:13423: ayam eṣa śarī ghoro vartate naḥ sudāruṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1522 /
GE07hv_apppu:13424: gadī cāyaṃ mahāvīryaḥ sarvān no bādhate nṛpaḥ // HV_App.I,31.1523 //
GE07hv_apppu:13425: ayaṃ rathī śarī cāpī gadī tūṇīravān prabho / HV_App.I,31.1524 /
GE07hv_apppu:13426: paṭṭasī sarvato yāti kuntapāṇir ayaṃ balī // HV_App.I,31.1525 //
GE07hv_apppu:13427: ayam atra mahāśūlī saṃsthitaḥ sarvatodiśam / HV_App.I,31.1526 /
GE07hv_apppu:13428: gajo 'yaṃ suviṣāṇāgro vartate sarvataḥ pathi // HV_App.I,31.1527 //
GE07hv_apppu:13429: aśvī sarvatragaḥ śūro vegavān vātasaṃnibhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1528 /
GE07hv_apppu:13430: śarāñ śaraiḥ samāhanti daṇḍān daṇḍair jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.1529 //
GE07hv_apppu:13431: kuntān kuntaiḥ samājaghnur gadābhiś ca gadās tathā / HV_App.I,31.1530 /
GE07hv_apppu:13432: parighān parighaiś caiva śūlāñ śūlaiḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.1531 //
GE07hv_apppu:13433: evaṃ teṣāṃ mahārāja kurvatāṃ raṇam uttamam / HV_App.I,31.1532 /
GE07hv_apppu:13434: saṃgrāmaḥ sumahān āsīc chabdaḥ samabhavan mahān // HV_App.I,31.1533 //
GE07hv_apppu:13435: tūryāṇi subahūny ājau śabdavanti mahānti ca / HV_App.I,31.1534 /
GE07hv_apppu:13436: prādur āsan sahasrāṇi śaṅkhānāṃ caiva nisvanāḥ // HV_App.I,31.1535 //
GE07hv_apppu:13437: rātrau prādur abhūc chabdaḥ saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.1536 /
GE07hv_apppu:13438: vartamāne mahāyuddhe vṛṣṇīnāṃ caiva taiḥ saha // HV_App.I,31.1537 //
