GE07hv_apppu:14536: jaye tayor vipravarya tatra śreyo bhaveta naḥ / HV_App.I,31.2583 /
GE07hv_apppu:14537: yatra yatra ca tau gatvā sthitāv ity anuśuśruma / HV_App.I,31.2584 /
GE07hv_apppu:14538: tatra tatra ca hantāhaṃ nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.2585 //
GE07hv_apppu:14541: tataḥ prītaḥ prasannātmā yādaveśvaram āha saḥ / HV_App.I,31.2588 /
GE07hv_apppu:14542: svasty astu bhavate kṛṣṇa jagatāṃ svasti sarvadā // HV_App.I,31.2589 //
GE07hv_apppu:14543: kiṃ nu nāma jagannātha duḥsādhyaṃ tava keśava / HV_App.I,31.2590 /
GE07hv_apppu:14545: devānām api deveśa sarvatra samadarśanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2592 /
GE07hv_apppu:14546: viṣṇo deva hare kṛṣṇa namas te cakrapāṇaye // HV_App.I,31.2593 //
GE07hv_apppu:14547: namaḥ svabhāvaśuddhāya śuddhāya niyatāya ca / HV_App.I,31.2594 /
GE07hv_apppu:14548: śabdāgocara deveśa namas te bhaktavatsala / HV_App.I,31.2595 /
GE07hv_apppu:14549: ajñānād atha vā jñānād yan mayoktaṃ kṣamasva tat // HV_App.I,31.2596 //
GE07hv_apppu:14550: tvam evāhaṃ jagannātha nāvayor antaraṃ pṛthak / HV_App.I,31.2597 /
GE07hv_apppu:14551: ataḥ kṣamasva bhagavan kṣamāsārā hi sādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2598 //
GE07hv_apppu:14553: kṣantavyaṃ bhavatā vipra kṣamāsārā vayaṃ sadā / HV_App.I,31.2599 /
GE07hv_apppu:14554: saṃnyāsinaḥ kṣamāsārāḥ kṣamā teṣāṃ paraṃ balam // HV_App.I,31.2600 //
GE07hv_apppu:14555: kṣamā mokṣakarī nityaṃ tattvajñānam iva dvija / HV_App.I,31.2601 /
GE07hv_apppu:14556: kṣamā dharmaḥ kṣamā satyaṃ kṣamā dānaṃ kṣamā yaśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2602 //
GE07hv_apppu:14557: kṣamā svargasya sopānam iti vedavido viduḥ / HV_App.I,31.2603 /
GE07hv_apppu:14558: tasmāt sarvaprayatnena kṣamāṃ pālayata svakām // HV_App.I,31.2604 //
GE07hv_apppu:14560: ete te yatayo viprāḥ pūjanīyā mayādya vai // HV_App.I,31.2606 //
GE07hv_apppu:14561: bhoktavyā yatayo viprā bhikṣukāḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,31.2607 /
GE07hv_apppu:14562: tatheti te pratijñāya bhoktum aicchan harer gṛhe // HV_App.I,31.2608 //
GE07hv_apppu:14563: tataḥ svabhavanaṃ viṣṇuḥ praviśya harir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2609 /
GE07hv_apppu:14565: bhojayām āsa tān sarvān yatīn yativarārcitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2611 //
GE07hv_apppu:14566: chittvā chittvā ca deveśo dukūlāni mṛdūni saḥ / HV_App.I,31.2612 /
GE07hv_apppu:14567: dadau tebhyas tadā viṣṇuḥ sarvebhyo janamejaya / HV_App.I,31.2613 /
GE07hv_apppu:14568: te ca prītā yathāyogaṃ yataḥ pūrvaṃ tato gatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2614 //
GE07hv_apppu:14571: durvāsās tv atha tatraiva nāradena sahāyavān / HV_App.I,31.2615 /
GE07hv_apppu:14572: cintayan brahmaṇas tattvaṃ vijahāra yathāsukham / HV_App.I,31.2616 /
GE07hv_apppu:14573: bhagavān api govindas tayor vadham amanyata // HV_App.I,31.2617 //
GE07hv_apppu:14574: tatas tau haṃsaḍibhakau tasmin kāle mahīpate / HV_App.I,31.2618 /
GE07hv_apppu:14577: rājasūyaṃ mahāyajñaṃ pitaḥ kuru suyantritaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2621 /
GE07hv_apppu:14578: asmin māsi nṛpaśreṣṭha yatāmo yajñasiddhaye // HV_App.I,31.2622 //
GE07hv_apppu:14579: āvāṃ te 'dya mahārāja diśāṃ vijayatatparau / HV_App.I,31.2623 /
GE07hv_apppu:14580: yatiṣyāvo balaiḥ sārdhaṃ rathair aśvair gajair api // HV_App.I,31.2624 //
GE07hv_apppu:14582: tatheti sa mahārājo brahmadatto 'bravīt tadā // HV_App.I,31.2626 //
GE07hv_apppu:14583: janārdanas tu viprendro dṛṣṭvā sāhasatatparau / HV_App.I,31.2627 /
GE07hv_apppu:14584: aśakyam iti manvāno vayasyaṃ haṃsam abravīt // HV_App.I,31.2628 //
GE07hv_apppu:14585: śṛṇu haṃsa vaco mahyaṃ śrutvā niścitya vīryavān / HV_App.I,31.2629 /
GE07hv_apppu:14586: āyuṣman sāhasaṃ kartuṃ niścito 'si nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2630 //
GE07hv_apppu:14587: sthite bhīṣme jarāsaṃdhe bāhlīke ca nṛpottame / HV_App.I,31.2631 /
GE07hv_apppu:14588: kiṃ ca vīreṣu sarveṣu yādaveṣu nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2632 //
GE07hv_apppu:14589: bhīṣmo hi balavān vṛddhaḥ satyasaṃdho jitendriyaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2633 /
GE07hv_apppu:14590: triḥsaptakṛtvaḥ pṛthivīṃ yo jigāya bhṛgūttamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2634 /
GE07hv_apppu:14591: taṃ yuddhe jitavān bhīṣmaḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2635 //
GE07hv_apppu:14592: jarāsaṃdhasya yad vīryaṃ tad bhavān vetti saṃyuge / HV_App.I,31.2636 /
GE07hv_apppu:14593: vṛṣṇivīrās tu te sarve kṛtāstrā yuddhadurmadāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2637 //
GE07hv_apppu:14594: tatra kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśo jitaśatruḥ kṛtī sadā / HV_App.I,31.2638 /
GE07hv_apppu:14595: jarāsaṃdhena sahitaḥ sadā yuddhe jitaśramaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2639 /
GE07hv_apppu:14596: pramukhe tasya na sthātuṃ śakto jīvan nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.2640 //
GE07hv_apppu:14597: balabhadras tathā mattaḥ kruddho yadi bhaved balī / HV_App.I,31.2641 /
GE07hv_apppu:14598: lokān imān samāhartuṃ śaknotīti matir mama // HV_App.I,31.2642 //
GE07hv_apppu:14599: tathā ca sātyakir vīraḥ śakto jetuṃ raṇe ripūn / HV_App.I,31.2643 /
GE07hv_apppu:14600: tathānye yādavāḥ sarve kṛṣṇam āśritya daṃśitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2644 //
GE07hv_apppu:14601: asmābhiś ca kṛtaḥ pūrvaṃ virodho yatibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.2645 /
GE07hv_apppu:14602: durvāsā yatibhiḥ sārdhaṃ gato draṣṭuṃ sa keśavam // HV_App.I,31.2646 //
GE07hv_apppu:14603: iti śrutaṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha brāhmaṇād bhoktum āgatāt / HV_App.I,31.2647 /
GE07hv_apppu:14604: tathā sati yathā sidhyet tathā cintyaṃ ca mantribhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2648 /
GE07hv_apppu:14605: tataḥ paścād vidhāsyāmo rājasūyaṃ mahākratum // HV_App.I,31.2649 //
GE07hv_apppu:14607: ko nāma bhīṣmo mandātmā vṛddho hīnabalaḥ sadā / HV_App.I,31.2650 /
GE07hv_apppu:14608: āvayoḥ purataḥ sthātuṃ śaktaḥ kila sa vṛddhakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2651 //
GE07hv_apppu:14609: yādavā iti citraṃ naḥ śaktāḥ sthātuṃ raṇe dvija / HV_App.I,31.2652 /
GE07hv_apppu:14610: kaś ca kṛṣṇaḥ puraḥ sthātuṃ baladevaś ca mattakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2653 //
GE07hv_apppu:14611: śaineyaś cāpi viprendra sthātuṃ nālaṃ vicitratā / HV_App.I,31.2654 /
GE07hv_apppu:14612: jarāsaṃdhas tu dharmātmā bandhur eva sadā mama // HV_App.I,31.2655 //
GE07hv_apppu:14613: gaccha vipra yaduśreṣṭhaṃ brūhi madvacanāt tvaran / HV_App.I,31.2656 /
GE07hv_apppu:14614: dīyatāṃ karasarvasvaṃ yajñārthaṃ lavaṇaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.2657 //
GE07hv_apppu:14615: lavaṇāni bahūny āśu gṛhya keśava māciram / HV_App.I,31.2658 /
GE07hv_apppu:14616: āgaccha tvaritaṃ kṛṣṇa na te kāryaṃ vilambanam / HV_App.I,31.2659 /
GE07hv_apppu:14617: iti brūhi yaduśreṣṭhaṃ yāhi tvaritavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2660 //
GE07hv_apppu:14618: na brūyāś cottaraṃ vipra śapeyaṃ tvāṃ priyo 'si me / HV_App.I,31.2661 /
GE07hv_apppu:14619: mitrabhāvād idaṃ brūhi śapāmi tvāṃ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2662 //
GE07hv_apppu:14620: iti saṃcodito vipro nottaraṃ pratyabhāṣata / HV_App.I,31.2663 /
GE07hv_apppu:14621: mitrabhāvāt tathā rājan snehāc ca janamejaya // HV_App.I,31.2664 //
GE07hv_apppu:14622: janārdanas tu dharmātmā nityaṃ gantuṃ samudyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.2665 /
GE07hv_apppu:14623: adya śvo vā paraśvo vā gacchāmīti yateta saḥ // HV_App.I,31.2666 //
GE07hv_apppu:14625: eka eva ca dharmātmā hayam āruhya satvaram // HV_App.I,31.2668 //
GE07hv_apppu:14626: prātar eva jagāmāśu draṣṭuṃ dvāravatīṃ dvijaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2669 /
GE07hv_apppu:14627: hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ manasā saṃsmaran dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2670 //
GE07hv_apppu:14629: prabhuṃ kṛṣṇaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ manasā saṃsmaran harim / **HV_App.I,31.2670**20:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:14632: tataḥ prāyād dhariṃ draṣṭuṃ brāhmaṇo brahmavittamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2671 /
GE07hv_apppu:14633: hayenaikena rājendra tvaritaṃ sa yayau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2672 //
GE07hv_apppu:14635: pāntho yāti jalaṃ dṛṣṭvā tvaritaṃ tatpipāsayā / HV_App.I,31.2674 /
GE07hv_apppu:14636: dhāvaty eva tathā vipro hariṃ draṣṭuṃ janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.2675 //
GE07hv_apppu:14637: gacchan sa cintayām āsa codayan hayam uttamam / HV_App.I,31.2676 /
GE07hv_apppu:14638: haṃsa eva yathā nityaṃ kuryāt priyahitaṃ mama / HV_App.I,31.2677 /
GE07hv_apppu:14639: tathā hi preṣitas tena hariṃ paśyety ahaṃ prabhum // HV_App.I,31.2678 //
GE07hv_apppu:14640: aham eva sadā dhanyo matto hy abhyadhiko na ca / HV_App.I,31.2679 /
GE07hv_apppu:14641: yato drakṣyāmy ahaṃ viṣṇuṃ vasantaṃ dvārakāpure // HV_App.I,31.2680 //
GE07hv_apppu:14642: sā hi me jananī dhanyā hariṃ dṛṣṭvā punar gatam / HV_App.I,31.2681 /
GE07hv_apppu:14643: kṛtārthaṃ sarvathā putraṃ drakṣyaty eṣā manasvinī // HV_App.I,31.2682 //
GE07hv_apppu:14646: vapur drakṣyāmy ahaṃ viṣṇor nīlotpaladalacchavi / HV_App.I,31.2685 /
GE07hv_apppu:14649: paśyāmy aham adīnātmā naṣṭaduḥkho 'smi nirvṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2688 //
GE07hv_apppu:14650: api drakṣyati yogātmā saumyenaiva svacakṣuṣā / HV_App.I,31.2689 /
GE07hv_apppu:14651: api vā matpriyaṃ brūyāt svasti ceti ca vā vadet // HV_App.I,31.2690 //
GE07hv_apppu:14652: drakṣyāmi cakriṇo varṣma antas trailokyasaṃyutam / HV_App.I,31.2691 /
GE07hv_apppu:14653: pādābjaṃ cakriṇo draṣṭuṃ tvarayaty eva māṃ manaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2692 //
GE07hv_apppu:14654: vakṣaḥsthalaṃ sadā viṣṇoḥ sphurad ratnaprabhāyutam / HV_App.I,31.2693 /
GE07hv_apppu:14655: paśyann iva ca gacchāmi smarann aniśam īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2694 //
GE07hv_apppu:14657: īṣat smitādharaṃ viṣṇuṃ paśyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2696 //
GE07hv_apppu:14658: smarataś ca hare rūpaṃ lomaharṣo 'yam īdṛśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2697 /
GE07hv_apppu:14659: gacchataś ca puro bhāti śaṅkhacakragadāsimān // HV_App.I,31.2698 //
GE07hv_apppu:14660: yātīva ca puro bhāti mahyaṃ devo jagadguruḥ / HV_App.I,31.2699 /
GE07hv_apppu:14661: eṣo 'yam iti me vaktuṃ jihvā prasphuratīva tam // HV_App.I,31.2700 //
GE07hv_apppu:14662: idaṃ duḥkhataraṃ manye karaṃ dehīti yad vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2701 /
GE07hv_apppu:14663: idaṃ tat sāhasaṃ manye yad vacas tasya bhūpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.2702 //
GE07hv_apppu:14665: tasya sarvaṃ puro gatvā vaktāhaṃ kila nirdayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2704 //
GE07hv_apppu:14666: mūḍhānām agraṇīr asmi nirlajjaś ca tathā vadan / HV_App.I,31.2705 /
GE07hv_apppu:14667: karaṃ dehi hare viṣṇo haṃsasya yadupuṃgava // HV_App.I,31.2706 //
GE07hv_apppu:14668: lavaṇāni bahūny āśu dātavyāni karātmanā / HV_App.I,31.2707 /
GE07hv_apppu:14669: iti vaktuṃ na me yuktaṃ puratas tasya śārṅgiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2708 //
GE07hv_apppu:14670: tathāpi mitrabhāvāt tu vaktavyaṃ ghoram īdṛśam / HV_App.I,31.2709 /
GE07hv_apppu:14671: kaṣṭo hy ayaṃ mitrabhāvo manuṣyāṇāṃ kṛtātmanām // HV_App.I,31.2710 //
GE07hv_apppu:14672: atha vā sarvavid viṣṇuḥ sarvasya hṛdi saṃsthitam / HV_App.I,31.2711 /
GE07hv_apppu:14673: jānāty eva sadā bhāvaṃ prāṇināṃ śobhane rataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2712 //
GE07hv_apppu:14674: tathā sati na me doṣo mitrabhāvo yato hy ayam / HV_App.I,31.2713 /
GE07hv_apppu:14675: sarvathā rakṣatāṃ viṣṇur ghoraṃ vaktuṃ yatasya me // HV_App.I,31.2714 //
GE07hv_apppu:14679: drakṣyāmi cakriṇaṃ viṣṇuṃ keśavaṃ yādaveśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2718 //
GE07hv_apppu:14682: kṛtārthaḥ sarvathā cāhaṃ bhavāmi vigatajvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2721 /
GE07hv_apppu:14683: adya me saphalaṃ janma sākṣātkṛtavato hariṃ // HV_App.I,31.2722 //
GE07hv_apppu:14684: adya me saphalā yajñāḥ sākṣāt kṛtavato harim / HV_App.I,31.2723 /
GE07hv_apppu:14685: netre me saphale viṣṇuṃ paśyataś ca jaganmayam // HV_App.I,31.2724 //
GE07hv_apppu:14686: prītimānas tu me viṣṇur vaktur ghorasya karmaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2725 /
GE07hv_apppu:14687: unmiṣan netrayugmena drakṣyāmy asakṛd īśvaram // HV_App.I,31.2726 //
GE07hv_apppu:14688: āmūlamastakaṃ viṣṇuṃ paśyāmi ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2727 /
GE07hv_apppu:14689: pibāmi netrayugmena vapuḥ kṛṣṇasya kevalam // HV_App.I,31.2728 //
GE07hv_apppu:14690: dhārayiṣyāmy ahaṃ pāṃśuṃ tatpādaprabhavaṃ śivam / HV_App.I,31.2729 /
GE07hv_apppu:14691: tataḥ kṛtārthatāṃ yāsye svargamārgo hi tadrajaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2730 //
GE07hv_apppu:14692: meghagambhīranirghoṣaṃ śroṣyāmi ca hareḥ svaram / HV_App.I,31.2731 /
GE07hv_apppu:14693: pādābjaṃ cakriṇo viṣṇoḥ paśyāmi ca jagatpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.2732 //
GE07hv_apppu:14695: harer idaṃ jagadrūpaṃ paśyāmīva ca sarvataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2734 //
GE07hv_apppu:14696: prasīdatu sadā viṣṇur ayuktaṃ vaktum icchataḥ / HV_App.I,31.2735 /
GE07hv_apppu:14703: kadā drakṣyāmi deveśam idānīm atha vānyadā / HV_App.I,31.2742 /
GE07hv_apppu:14704: sarvathā kṛtakṛtyo 'haṃ yad vapur draṣṭum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.2743 //
GE07hv_apppu:14705: namo mahyaṃ namo mahyaṃ yato draṣṭum ahaṃ harim / HV_App.I,31.2744 /
GE07hv_apppu:14707: drakṣyāmy avaśyam adyaiva viṣṇuṃ jiṣṇuṃ jagadgurum // HV_App.I,31.2746 //
GE07hv_apppu:14711: tejomayaṃ mama harer vapur astu bhūtyai || HV_App.I,31.2750 ||
GE07hv_apppu:14716: dhyeyaṃ mumukṣubhir ameyam anādy anantaṃ @ HV_App.I,31.2755 @
GE07hv_apppu:14717: sthūlaṃ susūkṣmataram ekam anekam ādyam | HV_App.I,31.2756 |
GE07hv_apppu:14720: cintayann iti viprendro yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm / HV_App.I,31.2759 /
GE07hv_apppu:14721: matvā kṛtārtham ātmānaṃ vāhayan hayam uttamam // HV_App.I,31.2760 //
GE07hv_apppu:14724: sa niveditasarvasvo dvāḥsthena hi janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2761 /
GE07hv_apppu:14725: atha praviśya dharmātmā sudharmāṃ vai dvijottamaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2762 //
GE07hv_apppu:14733: udgīyamānaṃ vipraiś ca sāmabhiḥ sāmagair harim // HV_App.I,31.2770 //
GE07hv_apppu:14734: dṛṣṭvā prītamanā viṣṇuṃ provāca pulakacchaviḥ / HV_App.I,31.2771 /
GE07hv_apppu:14735: nāmnā janārdano 'smīti nanāma caraṇau hareḥ / HV_App.I,31.2772 /
GE07hv_apppu:14736: balabhadraṃ tato bhūyo vavande śirasā dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2773 //
GE07hv_apppu:14737: dūto 'smi devadeveśa haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca / HV_App.I,31.2774 /
GE07hv_apppu:14738: iti bruvāṇaṃ viprendram idam āha sa mādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2775 //
GE07hv_apppu:14739: āssvedaṃ viṣṭaraṃ pūrvaṃ paścād būhi prayojanam / HV_App.I,31.2776 /
GE07hv_apppu:14740: tatheti cābravīd vipro mahad āsanam āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2777 //
GE07hv_apppu:14741: vācā saṃpūjya viprendram apṛcchat kuśalaṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.2778 /
GE07hv_apppu:14742: brahmadattasya rājendra haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca // HV_App.I,31.2779 //
GE07hv_apppu:14743: śrutaṃ cāpi tayor vīryaṃ tataḥ prīto dvijottama / HV_App.I,31.2780 /
GE07hv_apppu:14744: api vā kuśalaṃ vipra pitus tava janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2781 //
GE07hv_apppu:14746: iti śrutvā giraṃ viṣṇos tathety āha janārdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.2781**21:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:14747: saṃgatiś ca girīśāt tu śrutā me vīryatas tayoḥ / HV_App.I,31.2782 /
GE07hv_apppu:14748: iti śrutvā giraṃ viṣṇos tathety āha janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2783 //
GE07hv_apppu:14749: kuśalaṃ brahmadattasya pituś ca mama keśava / HV_App.I,31.2784 /
GE07hv_apppu:14750: tayor eva jagannātha haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca // HV_App.I,31.2785 //
GE07hv_apppu:14752: kim āhatur mahīpālau tau haṃsaḍibhakau nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.2786 /
GE07hv_apppu:14753: brūhi sarvam aśeṣeṇa nātra śaṅkā dvijottama // HV_App.I,31.2787 //
GE07hv_apppu:14754: vācyaṃ vāpy atha vāvācyaṃ kartavyam atha vetaram / HV_App.I,31.2788 /
GE07hv_apppu:14755: śrutvā tasya vidhāsyāmo yuktarūpaṃ dvijottama // HV_App.I,31.2789 //
GE07hv_apppu:14756: dūtasya sarvathā vipra na vācyāvācyakalpanā / HV_App.I,31.2790 /
GE07hv_apppu:14757: yat karma rājanirdiṣṭaṃ tad vācyaṃ dūtajanmanā // HV_App.I,31.2791 //
GE07hv_apppu:14758: nātra śaṅkā tvayā kāryā vaktavyasyetarasya vā / HV_App.I,31.2792 /
GE07hv_apppu:14759: ato vada yathāproktaṃ tābhyāṃ mama janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2793 //
GE07hv_apppu:14760: keśavenaivam uktas tu provācātho janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2794 /
GE07hv_apppu:14761: ajānann iva kiṃ brūṣe sarvaṃ pratyakṣadarśivān // HV_App.I,31.2795 //
GE07hv_apppu:14762: na cāsti te parokṣaṃ tu jagadvṛttāntam acyuta / HV_App.I,31.2796 /
GE07hv_apppu:14763: sarvaṃ hi manasā paśyan kiṃ tvam āttha vadeti mām // HV_App.I,31.2797 //
GE07hv_apppu:14764: vidvadbhir gīyase viṣṇo tvam eva jagatīpate / HV_App.I,31.2798 /
GE07hv_apppu:14766: tvam evedaṃ jagat sarvaṃ jagac ca tvayi tiṣṭhati / HV_App.I,31.2800 /
GE07hv_apppu:14767: na tvayā rahito hy ekaḥ padārthaḥ sacarācaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2801 //
GE07hv_apppu:14768: nāsti kiṃcid avedyaṃ te sarvago 'si jagatpate / HV_App.I,31.2802 /
GE07hv_apppu:14769: tvam indraḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ rudraḥ saṃhārakarmakṛt // HV_App.I,31.2803 //
GE07hv_apppu:14770: rakṣitāsi sadā viṣṇo sarvalokasya mādhava / HV_App.I,31.2804 /
GE07hv_apppu:14771: saṃsārasya bhavān sraṣṭā kiṃ tvam āttha vadeti mām // HV_App.I,31.2805 //
GE07hv_apppu:14772: vidvadbhir gīyase viṣṇo jñānātmeti ca mādhava / HV_App.I,31.2806 /
GE07hv_apppu:14773: prāṇaṃ prāṇavidaḥ prāhus tvām eva puruṣottama // HV_App.I,31.2807 //
GE07hv_apppu:14774: śabdaṃ śabdavidaḥ prāhus tvām eva puruṣottama / HV_App.I,31.2808 /
GE07hv_apppu:14775: tathā sati hṛṣīkeśa kiṃ tvam āttha vadeti mām // HV_App.I,31.2809 //
GE07hv_apppu:14776: tathāpi śṛṇu deveśa codito 'si yatas tvayā / HV_App.I,31.2810 /
GE07hv_apppu:14777: vadety asakṛd evaitat tasmād vakṣyāmi mādhava // HV_App.I,31.2811 //
GE07hv_apppu:14779: tadarthaṃ preṣitas tābhyāṃ haṃsena ḍibhakena ca // HV_App.I,31.2813 //
GE07hv_apppu:14780: karārthaṃ yadumukhyebhyas tava cāmantraṇāya ca / HV_App.I,31.2814 /
GE07hv_apppu:14781: lavaṇaṃ bahu deyaṃ te yajñārthaṃ tasya keśava // HV_App.I,31.2815 //
GE07hv_apppu:14782: ity arthaṃ preṣitas tābhyāṃ karaṃ dehi tadājñayā / HV_App.I,31.2816 /
GE07hv_apppu:14783: idam apy aparaṃ tābhyāṃ uktaṃ śṛṇu jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.2817 //
GE07hv_apppu:14784: lavaṇāni bahūny āśu pragṛhya tvarito bhavān / HV_App.I,31.2818 /
GE07hv_apppu:14785: āgacchatu tayo rājñoḥ seyaṃ keśava vāgvibho // HV_App.I,31.2819 //
GE07hv_apppu:14786: ity uktavati viprendre dūte tatra tayor nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.2820 /
GE07hv_apppu:14787: prahasya suciraṃ kṛṣṇo babhāṣe dūtam īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.2821 //
GE07hv_apppu:14788: śṛṇu dūta vaco mahyaṃ yuktam uktaṃ dvijottama / HV_App.I,31.2822 /
GE07hv_apppu:14789: karaṃ dadāmi tābhyāṃ tu karado 'smi yato nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.2823 //
GE07hv_apppu:14790: dhārṣṭyaṃ etat tayor vipra matto yat tu karagrahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2824 /
GE07hv_apppu:14792: aho dhārṣṭyam aho dhārṣṭyaṃ tayoḥ kṣatriyabījayoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2825 //
GE07hv_apppu:14793: idam aśrutapūrvaṃ me matto yas tu karagrahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2826 /
GE07hv_apppu:14794: ity uktvā keśavo dūtam idam āha sma yādavān // HV_App.I,31.2827 //
GE07hv_apppu:14795: hāsyam etad yaduśreṣṭhā matto yat tu karagrahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2828 /
GE07hv_apppu:14797: tau taṃ yājayitārau ca haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca / HV_App.I,31.2830 /
GE07hv_apppu:14798: voḍhā kila yaduśreṣṭhā lavaṇasya durātmanoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2831 //
GE07hv_apppu:14800: hāsyaṃ hāsyam idaṃ hāsyaṃ śṛṇudhvaṃ yādavā vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2833 //
GE07hv_apppu:14802: yādavāḥ sarva evaite hāsāya samavasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2835 //
GE07hv_apppu:14803: karadaḥ kṛṣṇa ity evaṃ bruvantaḥ sarvasātvatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.2836 /
GE07hv_apppu:14804: hāsaṃ mumucur atyarthaṃ talaṃ dattvā parasparam / HV_App.I,31.2837 /
GE07hv_apppu:14806: sa ca vipro nṛpaśreṣṭha nindayan maitram ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2839 /
GE07hv_apppu:14807: aho kaṣṭam aho kaṣṭaṃ dautyaṃ yat kṛtavān aham / HV_App.I,31.2840 /
GE07hv_apppu:14808: iti lajjāsamāviṣṭas tūṣṇīm āsīd avāṅmukhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2841 //
GE07hv_apppu:14811: hāsaṃ kurvatsu teṣv evaṃ keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2842 /
GE07hv_apppu:14812: uvāca vacanaṃ dūtaṃ gaccha madvacanād dvija / HV_App.I,31.2843 /
GE07hv_apppu:14813: tāv itthaṃ haṃsaḍibhakau brūhi tvaritavikrama // HV_App.I,31.2844 //
GE07hv_apppu:14814: bāṇair dāsyāmi niśitaiḥ śārṅgamuktaiḥ śilāśitaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2845 /
GE07hv_apppu:14816: asinā vātha dāsyāmi niśitena mahātmanoḥ / HV_App.I,31.2847 /
GE07hv_apppu:14817: śiro vaś chetsyate cakraṃ matkaraprahitaṃ bali // HV_App.I,31.2848 //
GE07hv_apppu:14818: yo varaṃ dattavāñ śarvo yuvayor dhārṣṭyakāraṇam / HV_App.I,31.2849 /
GE07hv_apppu:14819: sa eva rakṣitā vāṃ syāt taṃ jitvā vā nihanmy aham // HV_App.I,31.2850 //
GE07hv_apppu:14820: deśo 'yaṃ saṃvidhātavyo yatra naḥ saṃgatir bhavet / HV_App.I,31.2851 /
GE07hv_apppu:14821: tatra gantā tathā cāsmi sabalaḥ sahasainikaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2852 //
GE07hv_apppu:14822: bhavantau nirbhayau bhūtvā gacchetāṃ sabalau nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.2853 /
GE07hv_apppu:14823: puṣkare vā prayāge vā mathurāyām athāpi vā / HV_App.I,31.2854 /
GE07hv_apppu:14824: tatrāhaṃ sabalo yātā nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // HV_App.I,31.2855 //
GE07hv_apppu:14825: atha vā mitrabhāvāc ca vaktum evaṃ tvam akṣamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2856 /
GE07hv_apppu:14826: na śakyaṃ yat tvayā vaktuṃ tat tu vakṣyati sātyakiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2857 /
GE07hv_apppu:14827: tvayā saha tato gatvā sākṣibhūto bhava dvija // HV_App.I,31.2858 //
GE07hv_apppu:14828: idaṃ ca jāne viprendra sneho mama sadā tvayi / HV_App.I,31.2859 /
GE07hv_apppu:14829: tena tvaṃ vijayī bhūyāḥ saṃsāre duḥkhasaṃkule / HV_App.I,31.2860 /
GE07hv_apppu:14830: matkathāparamo nityaṃ sadā bhava janārdana // HV_App.I,31.2861 //
GE07hv_apppu:14833: ity uktvā brāhmaṇaṃ kṛṣṇaḥ sātyakiṃ punar āha ca / HV_App.I,31.2862 /
GE07hv_apppu:14834: gaccha śaineya vipreṇa brūhi madvacanāt tayoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2863 //
GE07hv_apppu:14835: yan mayoktam aśeṣeṇa vada gatvā tayor yado / HV_App.I,31.2864 /
GE07hv_apppu:14836: yathā naḥ saṃgatir yuddhe tathā vada balād yado // HV_App.I,31.2865 //
GE07hv_apppu:14837: dhanur ādāya gaccha tvaṃ baddhagodhāṅgulitravān / HV_App.I,31.2866 /
GE07hv_apppu:14838: ekenāśvena gaccha tvam asahāyo yadūttama // HV_App.I,31.2867 //
GE07hv_apppu:14839: sātyakis taṃ tathety uktvā hayam āruhya śīghragam / HV_App.I,31.2868 /
GE07hv_apppu:14840: gantum aicchat tato rājann asahāyaḥ sa sātyakiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2869 //
GE07hv_apppu:14841: janārdanaṃ visṛjyāśu dūtaṃ taṃ yādaveśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.2870 /
GE07hv_apppu:14842: aho dhārṣṭyam aho dārṣṭyam ity uvāca janārdanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2871 //
GE07hv_apppu:14843: namaskṛtya tato dūto mādhavaṃ yādaveśvaram / HV_App.I,31.2872 /
GE07hv_apppu:14844: sa yayau sālvanagaraṃ śaineyena saha dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2873 //
GE07hv_apppu:14845: tataḥ praviśya dharmātmā brāhmaṇo brahmavittamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2874 /
GE07hv_apppu:14846: āsanaṃ mahad āsthāya visṛjya yadave punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2875 /
GE07hv_apppu:14847: āste yathāsukhaṃ vipraḥ śaineyena samanvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2876 //
GE07hv_apppu:14848: atha taṃ haṃsaḍibhayor darśayām āsa sātyakim / HV_App.I,31.2877 /
GE07hv_apppu:14849: dūto 'yaṃ sātyakiḥ prāptaḥ savyo bāhur ayaṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,31.2878 //
GE07hv_apppu:14850: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā haṃsaḥ prāha vacas tadā / HV_App.I,31.2879 /
GE07hv_apppu:14851: śrutyā samāgataḥ pūrvam adya dṛṣṭo mayā tv asau // HV_App.I,31.2880 //
GE07hv_apppu:14852: dhanurvede ca vede ca śastraśāstre tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,31.2881 /
GE07hv_apppu:14853: nipuṇo 'yaṃ sadā śūra ity evam anuśuśrumaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2882 /
GE07hv_apppu:14854: adya dṛṣṭipathaṃ prāptaḥ prītiṃ me vidadhāty asau // HV_App.I,31.2883 //
GE07hv_apppu:14855: kuśalaṃ vāsudevasya baladevasya cāpi vā / HV_App.I,31.2884 /
GE07hv_apppu:14857: tatheti sātyakiḥ prāha mandam unmiṣitānanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2886 /
GE07hv_apppu:14858: tato janārdanaṃ prāha haṃso vākyaviśāradaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2887 //
GE07hv_apppu:14859: api dṛṣṭas tvayā cakrī siddhaṃ naḥ kāryam īhitam / HV_App.I,31.2888 /
GE07hv_apppu:14860: vada sarvam aśeṣeṇa mā vṛthā kālam atyagāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2889 //
GE07hv_apppu:14863: ity uktavati haṃse ca dharmātmātha janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2890 /
GE07hv_apppu:14864: uvāca prasahan vīraḥ stuvan nārāyaṇaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,31.2891 //
GE07hv_apppu:14886: adrākṣam adrākṣam ahaṃ punaḥ punaḥ @ HV_App.I,31.2908 @
GE07hv_apppu:14899: piban pibaṃs tasya vapuḥ punaḥ punaḥ | HV_App.I,31.2921 |
GE07hv_apppu:14905: saṃsmṛtya saṃsmṛtya tam eva nirvṛtaḥ || HV_App.I,31.2927 ||
GE07hv_apppu:14907: vījyamānaṃ hariṃ kṛṣṇaṃ cāmarāṇāṃ śataiḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.2929 //
GE07hv_apppu:14909: smarantaṃ sarvadā viṣṇuṃ kva vā tau kva ca veti vā // HV_App.I,31.2931 //
GE07hv_apppu:14910: kuto drakṣyāmi tau mandau kuto vā matpurogatau / HV_App.I,31.2932 /
GE07hv_apppu:14911: dhyāyantam itthaṃ deveśaṃ karasaṃśravaṇāt tadā // HV_App.I,31.2933 //
GE07hv_apppu:14912: hasantam evam adrākṣaṃ karaṃ dehīty ataḥ param / HV_App.I,31.2934 /
GE07hv_apppu:14913: vadantaṃ nārade vācaṃ durvāsasi yatīśvare // HV_App.I,31.2935 //
GE07hv_apppu:14915: dṛṣṭvā dṛṣṭvā hariṃ devaṃ punaḥ punar acintayam // HV_App.I,31.2937 //
GE07hv_apppu:14916: asādhyam idam ārabdhaṃ tābhyām iti nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.2938 /
GE07hv_apppu:14917: nārabdhavyam idaṃ kāryam itaḥprabhṛti bhūmipa // HV_App.I,31.2939 //
GE07hv_apppu:14918: nivṛttā sā kathā haṃsa yat karagrahaṇaṃ tava / HV_App.I,31.2940 /
GE07hv_apppu:14919: eṣa te 'śeṣam akhilaṃ vakṣyaty eva hi sātyakiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2941 //
GE07hv_apppu:14920: etad vacanaṃ ākarṇya haṃsaḥ kruddho 'bravīd vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2942 /
GE07hv_apppu:14921: are brāhmaṇadāyāda kā nāma tava vāg iyam / HV_App.I,31.2943 /
GE07hv_apppu:14922: āvayoḥ purato vaktuṃ trailokyaṃ jetum icchatoḥ // HV_App.I,31.2944 //
GE07hv_apppu:14923: māyayā tvāṃ bhramaty eṣa kṛṣṇo līlāvidhānavit / HV_App.I,31.2945 /
GE07hv_apppu:14924: taṃ dṛṣṭvā bhrama evaiṣa tava saṃjāyate mahān // HV_App.I,31.2946 //
GE07hv_apppu:14930: aho 'dya bhrama evaiṣa darśanāt tasya cakriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2952 //
GE07hv_apppu:14931: idānīṃ ca mahātmāsau bhrāmayaty eva keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2953 /
GE07hv_apppu:14932: tvām eva vipra mandātman nindrajālakṛtā hi sā // HV_App.I,31.2954 //
GE07hv_apppu:14933: cāpalyam idam evaitat tava vipra samudbhavam / HV_App.I,31.2955 /
GE07hv_apppu:14934: aho nu khalu sādṛśyaṃ kartavyaṃ bhavatā mama // HV_App.I,31.2956 //
GE07hv_apppu:14935: aham etat tvayā vipra marṣaye 'troditaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2957 /
GE07hv_apppu:14936: sakhibhāvād dvijaśreṣṭha anyathā kaḥ sahed idam // HV_App.I,31.2958 //
GE07hv_apppu:14937: gaccha mandamate vipra yatheṣṭaṃ sāṃprataṃ tv itaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2959 /
GE07hv_apppu:14938: gaccha gaccha yatheṣṭaṃ tvaṃ pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīṃ tava // HV_App.I,31.2960 //
GE07hv_apppu:14939: jitvā gopāladāyādaṃ hatvā yādavakān bahūn / HV_App.I,31.2961 /
GE07hv_apppu:14940: eṣa naḥ prathamaḥ kalpo jeṣyāma iti yādavān / HV_App.I,31.2962 /
GE07hv_apppu:14941: gaccha necchāmi vipra tvāṃ draṣṭuṃ paruṣavādinam // HV_App.I,31.2963 //
GE07hv_apppu:14942: śatrupakṣastutiparaṃ saha bhuktvā sadā mayā / HV_App.I,31.2964 /
GE07hv_apppu:14943: na me vipravadhaḥ kāryaḥ kaṣṭāyām api cāpadi // HV_App.I,31.2965 //
GE07hv_apppu:14944: ity uktvā brāhmaṇaṃ haṃso bhūyaḥ sātyakim abravīt / HV_App.I,31.2966 /
GE07hv_apppu:14945: are yādavadāyāda kimarthaṃ prāptavān iha / HV_App.I,31.2967 /
GE07hv_apppu:14946: kim abravīn nandasutaḥ kiṃ vā me nādiśat karam // HV_App.I,31.2968 //
GE07hv_apppu:14948: idaṃ tasya vaco haṃsa śaṅkhacakragadābhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2969 /
GE07hv_apppu:14950: dāsyāmi karasarvasvam asinā vā śitena ca / HV_App.I,31.2971 /
GE07hv_apppu:14951: śiraś chetsyāmi te haṃsa karadānasya saṃgraham // HV_App.I,31.2972 //
GE07hv_apppu:14952: dhārṣṭyaṃ hi tava mandātman kim ato 'pi nṛpādhama / HV_App.I,31.2973 /
GE07hv_apppu:14953: devadevāj jagannāthāt karam icchati yo nṛpaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2974 /
GE07hv_apppu:14955: tasya śārṅgaravaṃ śrutvā śaṅkhasya ca hareḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.2976 /
GE07hv_apppu:14956: ko nāma jīvitaṃ kāṅkṣaṃs tiṣṭhedānīṃ tvam adya vai / HV_App.I,31.2977 /
GE07hv_apppu:14959: prathamo balabhadro 'sau dvitīyo 'haṃ sa sātyakiḥ // HV_App.I,31.2980 //
GE07hv_apppu:14960: kṛtavarmā tṛtīyas tu caturtho niśaṭho balī / HV_App.I,31.2981 /
GE07hv_apppu:14961: pañcamo 'tha ca babhrus tu ṣaṣṭhaś caivotkalaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2982 //
GE07hv_apppu:14963: aṣṭamas tv atha sāraṅgo navamo vipṛthus tathā / HV_App.I,31.2984 /
GE07hv_apppu:14964: daśamaś coddhavo dhīmān vayam ete balānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.2985 //
GE07hv_apppu:14966: devadevasya yuddheṣu tiṣṭhanty eva divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.2987 //
GE07hv_apppu:14967: yau hi vīrau sutau tasya svātmanā sadṛśau bale / HV_App.I,31.2988 /
GE07hv_apppu:14968: tāv eva vāṃ kṣamau yuddhe hantuṃ balamadānvitau // HV_App.I,31.2989 //
GE07hv_apppu:14969: yo girīśo girāv eva varaṃ dattvā sa tiṣṭhati / HV_App.I,31.2990 /
GE07hv_apppu:14970: yuvāṃ hi kevalau yuddhe tiṣṭhathaḥ saśaraṃ dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,31.2991 /
GE07hv_apppu:14971: gṛhītvā śatrubhiḥ sārdhaṃ yuddhaṃ kartuṃ samudyatau // HV_App.I,31.2992 //
GE07hv_apppu:14972: īdṛśeṣv atha bhṛtyeṣu yuddhaṃ kurvatsu śatrubhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2993 /
GE07hv_apppu:14973: trailokyaṃ rakṣatas tasmāt karam icchan vrajeta kaḥ // HV_App.I,31.2994 //
GE07hv_apppu:14974: haniṣyaty eṣa vāṃ yuddhe trailokyaṃ yo 'dya rakṣati / HV_App.I,31.2995 /
GE07hv_apppu:14976: kva naḥ saṃgrāma ity evaṃ punar āha jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.2997 /
GE07hv_apppu:14977: puṣkare puṇyade nityam uta govardhane girau // HV_App.I,31.2998 //
GE07hv_apppu:14978: mathurāyāṃ prayāge vā darśayetāṃ balāni me / HV_App.I,31.2999 /
GE07hv_apppu:14980: rājasūyaṃ mahāyajñaṃ yaṣṭum icchati kaḥ svayam / HV_App.I,31.3001 /
GE07hv_apppu:14981: vadan vā svastimān martyas tvāṃ vinā ko vrajet sukham // HV_App.I,31.3002 //
GE07hv_apppu:14982: idaṃ jāḍyam idaṃ mauḍhyam idam atyadbhutaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3003 /
GE07hv_apppu:14983: idam icchasi cen mūḍha hāsyatāṃ yāsi bhūtale / HV_App.I,31.3004 /
GE07hv_apppu:14984: ity uktvā sātyakir vīro hasann iva vibho sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3005 //
GE07hv_apppu:14987: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca / HV_App.I,31.3006 /
GE07hv_apppu:14989: didhakṣantau diśaḥ sarvāḥ sarvān vīkṣya nṛpottamān / HV_App.I,31.3008 /
GE07hv_apppu:14990: karaṃ kareṇa niṣpīḍya smarantau tadvaco mahat // HV_App.I,31.3009 //
GE07hv_apppu:14991: kva nu kva vā nandasūnuḥ kva vā rāmo balotkaṭaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3010 /
GE07hv_apppu:14992: iti bruvāṇau sākṣepau sātyakiṃ satyasaṃgaram // HV_App.I,31.3011 //
GE07hv_apppu:14993: are yādavadāyāda kiṃ brūṣe naḥ purogataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3012 /
GE07hv_apppu:14994: ito nirgaccha mandātman dūtas tvam asi sāṃpratam // HV_App.I,31.3013 //
GE07hv_apppu:14995: anyathā vadhya eva tvaṃ pralapan paruṣaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3014 /
GE07hv_apppu:14996: satyaṃ nirlajja evāsi yad brūyā īdṛśaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3015 //
GE07hv_apppu:14997: āvām idaṃ jagat sarvaṃ śāsituṃ saṃyatau nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.3016 /
GE07hv_apppu:14998: ko nāma mānuṣe loke karado naiva jīvati // HV_App.I,31.3017 //
GE07hv_apppu:14999: hatvā gopālakaṃ saṃkhye badhvā yādavakān bahūn / HV_App.I,31.3018 /
GE07hv_apppu:15000: gṛhṇīmaḥ karasarvasvaṃ tato gaccha narādhama // HV_App.I,31.3019 //
GE07hv_apppu:15001: avadhyo dūtatāṃ prāpto bahvabaddhaṃ prabhāṣase / HV_App.I,31.3020 /
GE07hv_apppu:15002: īśvaro nau varaṃ dātā hy astrāṇām api ca prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3021 //
GE07hv_apppu:15003: rakṣitārau mahābhūtau saṃgrāmaṃ gacchatoś ca nau / HV_App.I,31.3022 /
GE07hv_apppu:15004: pitaraṃ yājayiṣyāvo hatvā gopālakān raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3023 //
GE07hv_apppu:15005: ete proktā bhṛśaṃ yuddhe kātarāḥ sarva eva te / HV_App.I,31.3024 /
GE07hv_apppu:15006: hatvā tān sabalān yuddhe punar jeṣyāva keśavam // HV_App.I,31.3025 //
GE07hv_apppu:15012: sacchatrā sadhvajā caiva sabhaṭā sādhu sāmbarā // HV_App.I,31.3031 //
GE07hv_apppu:15013: kalpyatāṃ vāhinī ghorā balādhyakṣāḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3032 /
GE07hv_apppu:15014: avadhya eva gaccha tvaṃ na te maraṇato bhayam // HV_App.I,31.3033 //
GE07hv_apppu:15015: saṃgrāmaḥ puṣkare 'smākaṃ śvaḥ paraśvo 'pi vā nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3034 /
GE07hv_apppu:15016: tato jñāsyāvahe vīryaṃ keśavasya balasya ca / HV_App.I,31.3035 /
GE07hv_apppu:15017: ye tvayoktā nṛpāḥ saṃkhye teṣām api ca yad balam // HV_App.I,31.3036 //
GE07hv_apppu:15019: eṣa gacchāmi vāṃ hantuṃ śvaḥ paraśvo 'pi vā nṛpau / HV_App.I,31.3037 /
GE07hv_apppu:15020: adyaiva hi mayā vadhyau na ced dūto bhavāmy aham // HV_App.I,31.3038 //
GE07hv_apppu:15021: na hi śvo vā paraśvo vā yuvāṃ kaṭukabhāṣiṇau / HV_App.I,31.3039 /
GE07hv_apppu:15022: dautyaṃ hi duḥkham akhilaṃ bhavaty eva sadā nṛṇām // HV_App.I,31.3040 //
GE07hv_apppu:15023: anyathāhaṃ yuvāṃ hatvā tato yāsyāmi nirvṛtim / HV_App.I,31.3041 /
GE07hv_apppu:15024: svavīryaṃ bāhudarpaṃ ca darśayaṃś ca nṛpādhamau // HV_App.I,31.3042 //
GE07hv_apppu:15031: śareṇa niśitenājau darpaṃ vāṃ vyapaneśyati / HV_App.I,31.3049 /
GE07hv_apppu:15032: ity uktvā ratham āruhya pratasthe sātyakiḥ kila // HV_App.I,31.3050 //
GE07hv_apppu:15035: sa praviśya puraṃ viṣṇoḥ sātyakiḥ śinipuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3051 /
GE07hv_apppu:15036: ācacakṣe 'tha kṛṣṇāya yathā vṛttaṃ tayos tadā // HV_App.I,31.3052 //
GE07hv_apppu:15037: tataḥ prabhāte vimale keśavaḥ keśisūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3053 /
GE07hv_apppu:15042: tatheti te pratiśrutya sarvaṃ cakrur anīkapāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3058 //
GE07hv_apppu:15043: ādāya sudṛḍhaṃ cāpaṃ ratham āruhya daṃśitāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3059 /
GE07hv_apppu:15044: agrato jagmur atyarthaṃ senāyāḥ puruṣottamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3060 //
GE07hv_apppu:15045: vanamālī halī rāmo nīlavāsāḥ sitaprabhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3061 /
GE07hv_apppu:15047: sātyakiś ca tathā rājan pragṛhītaśarāsanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3063 /
GE07hv_apppu:15049: anye ca yādavāḥ śūrāḥ pragṛhītamahāyudhāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3065 /
GE07hv_apppu:15050: siṃhanādaṃ prakurvanto jagmur atyartham uttamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3066 //
GE07hv_apppu:15051: haris tu ratham āruhya saṃnaddhaṃ dārukeṇa ha / HV_App.I,31.3067 /
GE07hv_apppu:15052: śārṅgaṃ bhārasahaṃ ghoraṃ gṛhītvā saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3068 //
GE07hv_apppu:15056: yayau rathagato vipraiḥ stūyamāno mudānvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3072 //
GE07hv_apppu:15057: sūtair māgadhaputraiś ca stūyamānas tatas tataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3073 /
GE07hv_apppu:15058: ānīya senāṃ sakalāṃ yayau kāṣṭhām athottarām // HV_App.I,31.3074 //
GE07hv_apppu:15059: pāñcajanyaṃ mukhe nyasya sarvaprāṇena keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3075 /
GE07hv_apppu:15060: dadhmau mahāravaṃ kurvañ śatrūṇāṃ bhayavardhanam // HV_App.I,31.3076 //
GE07hv_apppu:15061: ādhmātas tena hariṇā sa cakre śaṅkharāṭ svanam / HV_App.I,31.3077 /
GE07hv_apppu:15062: ravaḥ sa rodasī rājan pūrayām āsa śaṅkhataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3078 //
GE07hv_apppu:15063: tasmiñ śaṅkhe tathādhmāte neduḥ śaṅkhāḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3079 /
GE07hv_apppu:15064: bheryaś cāpi samādhmātā mṛdaṅgā bahuśo nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3080 /
GE07hv_apppu:15065: nedur atyartham atulaṃ gharmānte jaladā yathā // HV_App.I,31.3081 //
GE07hv_apppu:15066: atho yayur mahārāja puṣkaraṃ puṇyavardhanam / HV_App.I,31.3082 /
GE07hv_apppu:15067: sarasas tasya rājendra puṣkarasya nṛpottamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3083 //
GE07hv_apppu:15069: niveśaṃ kārayām āsur yādavāḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,31.3085 /
GE07hv_apppu:15070: svaṃ svaṃ yathāsukhaṃ rājan pragṛhītakuṭīmaṭham // HV_App.I,31.3086 //
GE07hv_apppu:15071: bhagavān api govindaḥ saro dṛṣṭvā suśobhanam / HV_App.I,31.3087 /
GE07hv_apppu:15072: upaspṛśya jale tasmin praṇamya yatipuṅgavān // HV_App.I,31.3088 //
GE07hv_apppu:15073: tayor āgamanaṃ lipsur āste tīre yathāsukham / HV_App.I,31.3089 /
GE07hv_apppu:15074: śṛṇvan vedadhvaniṃ viṣṇur brāhmaṇānāṃ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3090 //
GE07hv_apppu:15077: atha tau haṃsaḍibhakau jagmatuḥ puṣkaraṃ prati / HV_App.I,31.3091 /
GE07hv_apppu:15082: anyau dvāv iva rudrau tau lokasaṃhārakārakau // HV_App.I,31.3096 //
GE07hv_apppu:15084: akṣauhiṇyo daśaivāsaṃs tayor atha samāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3098 //
GE07hv_apppu:15085: vicakras tu mahārāja dānavo nagasaṃnibhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3099 /
GE07hv_apppu:15086: tayor eva sakhā pūrvam āsīc ca balaśālinoḥ / HV_App.I,31.3100 /
GE07hv_apppu:15087: śakro 'pi yasya purataḥ sthātuṃ śakto na vajrabhṛt // HV_App.I,31.3101 //
GE07hv_apppu:15088: yo hi vīro mahārāja devadaitya samāgame / HV_App.I,31.3102 /
GE07hv_apppu:15089: devān nighnaṃs tadā yuddhe devendram ajayan mahān / HV_App.I,31.3103 /
GE07hv_apppu:15090: akaroc ca purā yuddhaṃ viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā // HV_App.I,31.3104 //
GE07hv_apppu:15091: yo hi dvāravatīṃ prāpya babādhe yadupuṅgavān / HV_App.I,31.3105 /
GE07hv_apppu:15092: sa tadānīṃ mahārāja śrutvā yuddham upasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3106 //
GE07hv_apppu:15094: vṛtaḥ samabhavad daityo vṛṣṇidveṣān nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.3108 /
GE07hv_apppu:15095: haṃsasya ḍibhakasyātha sāhāyyaṃ kartum udyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3109 //
GE07hv_apppu:15097: atīva mitratāṃ yāto dadyāt prāṇāṃś ca saṃyati // HV_App.I,31.3111 //
GE07hv_apppu:15099: yayau tasya sahāyārthaṃ hiḍimbaḥ puruṣādakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3113 //
GE07hv_apppu:15102: tayos tatra mahāsainyaṃ gacchatoḥ keśavaṃ prati / HV_App.I,31.3116 /
GE07hv_apppu:15103: miśritaṃ daityasaṃghaiś ca rākṣasaiś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3117 /
GE07hv_apppu:15105: daityena tena sahitau jagmatuḥ puṣkaraṃ prati / HV_App.I,31.3119 /
GE07hv_apppu:15106: tāv etau haṃsaḍibhakau hantuṃ keśavam añjasā // HV_App.I,31.3120 //
GE07hv_apppu:15107: tataḥ śrutvā jarāsaṃdho vigrahaṃ yadupuṅgavaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3121 /
GE07hv_apppu:15108: nākaron nṛpa sāhāyyaṃ śāpo me bhaviteti ha // HV_App.I,31.3122 //
GE07hv_apppu:15109: gacchatoḥ saṃyugaṃ rājan haṃsasya ḍibhakasya ca / HV_App.I,31.3123 /
GE07hv_apppu:15110: atitvaritavikrāntās te yayuḥ puṣkaraṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3124 //
GE07hv_apppu:15112: aham eva nṛpā yuddhaṃ karomi prathamaṃ hareḥ // HV_App.I,31.3126 //
GE07hv_apppu:15113: ity abruvan nṛpā rājan gacchantaḥ keśavaṃ prati / HV_App.I,31.3127 /
GE07hv_apppu:15114: saṃprāptās te nṛpaśreṣṭhāḥ puṣkaraṃ puṇyavardhanam // HV_App.I,31.3128 //
GE07hv_apppu:15115: munijuṣṭaṃ tapovṛddhair ṛṣibhiś ca niṣevitam / HV_App.I,31.3129 /
GE07hv_apppu:15116: atyantabhadraṃ lokeṣu puṣkaraṃ prathamaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3130 //
GE07hv_apppu:15117: puṣkaraṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo dvāv eva jagatīpate / HV_App.I,31.3131 /
GE07hv_apppu:15118: darśanāt sparśanāc cāpi kilbiṣacchedinau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3132 //
GE07hv_apppu:15119: puṣkaraṃ puṇḍarīkākṣo dvāv eva nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,31.3133 /
GE07hv_apppu:15121: dvāv eva hi naraśreṣṭha kilbiṣaughasya nāśakau / HV_App.I,31.3135 /
GE07hv_apppu:15122: tāv ubhau yatra sahitau tatra te saṃsthitā nṛpāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3136 //
GE07hv_apppu:15123: dṛṣṭavantau hariṃ viṣṇuṃ viṣṭaraśravasaṃ param / HV_App.I,31.3137 /
GE07hv_apppu:15125: tebhyaḥ kuru namaskāraṃ manasā nṛpasattama / HV_App.I,31.3139 /
GE07hv_apppu:15126: aghaṃ niḥśeṣam abhavat tava bhūpa na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3140 //
GE07hv_apppu:15127: sainyaṃ tatra ca saṃprāptaṃ daityarakṣaḥsamākulam / HV_App.I,31.3141 /
GE07hv_apppu:15130: praviśya sarasas tīraṃ puṣkarasya viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,31.3144 /
GE07hv_apppu:15131: adarśayat tatra devaṃ yuddhāya samupasthitam // HV_App.I,31.3145 //
GE07hv_apppu:15133: dve sene saṃgate rājan sadhvaje saparicchade / HV_App.I,31.3146 /
GE07hv_apppu:15138: te śarāḥ kārmukotsṛṣṭā nirbhidyātha śarīriṇām / HV_App.I,31.3151 /
GE07hv_apppu:15139: śarīrāṇi mahārāja jagmur dūraṃ sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3152 //
GE07hv_apppu:15141: sphuṭitāś ca tadā rājañ śirāṃsy āhatya saṃyayuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3154 //
GE07hv_apppu:15142: parighāś ca tadā rājñāṃ bāhubhiḥ paricoditāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3155 /
GE07hv_apppu:15143: tilaśaś cakrur atulāḥ śarīraṃ nṛparakṣasām / HV_App.I,31.3156 /
GE07hv_apppu:15145: daityā rakṣāṃsi rājendra rājānaś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3158 /
GE07hv_apppu:15146: anyonyaṃ parighair jaghnuś cāpamuktair mahāśaraiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3159 /
GE07hv_apppu:15147: śaraiś ca bhogibhogābhais tīkṣṇam anye mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3160 //
GE07hv_apppu:15149: [k: Ds2 T1.4 G1.3-5 M (Dn after line 3167) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15151: nāgā nāgair mahārāja hayāś cāśvaiḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3162 //
GE07hv_apppu:15152: rathā rathaiḥ samājaghnuḥ sādinaḥ sādibhis tathā / HV_App.I,31.3163 /
GE07hv_apppu:15155: bhiṇḍipālair mahāraudrair jaghnur anyonyam āhave // HV_App.I,31.3166 //
GE07hv_apppu:15156: rākṣasā dānavā rājan kṣatriyāś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3167 /
GE07hv_apppu:15157: itaś cetaś ca dhāvantaḥ kurvanto visvaraṃ ravam / HV_App.I,31.3168 /
GE07hv_apppu:15158: hatāḥ kecin mahārāja petur urvyāṃ mahāsibhiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3169 //
GE07hv_apppu:15161: yamarāṣṭraṃ gatāḥ kecit kecit svargaṃ samāyayuḥ / HV_App.I,31.3172 /
GE07hv_apppu:15163: kecit svāṃś ca parāṃś caiva hatvā bhrāntā ivābhavan // HV_App.I,31.3174 //
GE07hv_apppu:15164: etasminn antare rājañ śaṅkhā bheryaḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3175 /
GE07hv_apppu:15165: sasvanuḥ sarvataḥ sainye mṛdaṅgā bahavas tathā / HV_App.I,31.3176 /
GE07hv_apppu:15166: madhyaṃdinagate sūrye tāpaṃ dadhati ghoravat // HV_App.I,31.3177 //
GE07hv_apppu:15167: tataḥ piśācā vikṛtāḥ karālā nirṇatodarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3178 /
GE07hv_apppu:15168: rākṣasāś ca mahāghorāḥ piśitaṃ keśaśāḍvalam / HV_App.I,31.3179 /
GE07hv_apppu:15169: muditā bhakṣayām āsuḥ pibantaḥ śoṇitaṃ bahu // HV_App.I,31.3180 //
GE07hv_apppu:15170: saṃcitāni śavāny āsan kabandhāḥ khaḍgapāṇayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3181 /
GE07hv_apppu:15171: vibhajya deśaṃ bahuśo yuddhabhūmau śavārthinaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3182 //
GE07hv_apppu:15172: atha śyenā balāś caiva kaṅkā gṛdhrās tathāpare / HV_App.I,31.3183 /
GE07hv_apppu:15173: tuṇḍaiḥ śavāni niṣkṛṣya bhakṣayanti tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3184 //
GE07hv_apppu:15176: hataṃ lakṣaṃ mahārāja rathānāṃ rathibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.3187 /
GE07hv_apppu:15177: triṃśatkoṭyo hatās tatra sādinaḥ sāyudhā bhṛśam // HV_App.I,31.3188 //
GE07hv_apppu:15178: madhyaṃdinagate sūrye hatāḥ kecana nirgatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3189 /
GE07hv_apppu:15179: kecic ca nihatā rājan puṣkaraṃ prāviśan saraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3190 //
GE07hv_apppu:15180: kecid bhūmiṃ samālambya bhītā ity abruvan raṇe / HV_App.I,31.3191 /
GE07hv_apppu:15181: muktakeśāḥ patanti sma rathaṃ saṃtyajya kecana // HV_App.I,31.3192 //
GE07hv_apppu:15182: saṃdaṣṭauṣṭhapuṭāḥ kecit svāminaḥ purato hatāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3193 /
GE07hv_apppu:15184: yathā devāsuraṃ yuddhaṃ pūrvam āsīn nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.3195 //
GE07hv_apppu:15187: etasminn antare rājan dvaṃdvayuddham avartata / HV_App.I,31.3196 /
GE07hv_apppu:15188: vicakraṃ yodhayām āsa śārṅgadhanvā gadādharaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3197 //
GE07hv_apppu:15189: balabhadro 'tha haṃsena ḍibhakena ca sātyakiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3198 /
GE07hv_apppu:15191: śeṣāś ca śeṣai rājendra cakrur yuddham adīnagāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3200 //
GE07hv_apppu:15192: vāsudevas trisaptatyā daityaṃ vakṣasy atāḍayat / HV_App.I,31.3201 /
GE07hv_apppu:15193: śarair niśitadhārāgrair vismayaṃ darśayan raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3202 //
GE07hv_apppu:15194: dānavo devadeveśaṃ dṛḍhena niśitena ca / HV_App.I,31.3203 /
GE07hv_apppu:15196: jaghāna stanayor madhye paśyatas tu śacīpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.3205 //
GE07hv_apppu:15197: tena viddho 'tha bhagavān vakṣodeśe janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3206 /
GE07hv_apppu:15198: avamac chonitaṃ viṣṇur ādikāle yathā prajāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3207 //
GE07hv_apppu:15199: tataḥ kruddho hṛṣīkeśaḥ kṣurapreṇāharad dhvajam / HV_App.I,31.3208 /
GE07hv_apppu:15200: aśvāṃś ca caturo hatvā sārathiṃ ca śarais tribhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3209 /
GE07hv_apppu:15201: tato dadhmau śaṅkhavaraṃ yathā tārāmaye raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3210 //
GE07hv_apppu:15202: rathād utplutya sahasā dānavaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3211 /
GE07hv_apppu:15203: gadāṃ gṛhya mahāghorāṃ duḥsahāṃ vīryaśālinīm // HV_App.I,31.3212 //
GE07hv_apppu:15204: tayā jaghāna daityendraḥ kirīṭe keśavasya ha / HV_App.I,31.3213 /
GE07hv_apppu:15205: lalāṭe ca punar viṣṇuṃ siṃhanādam anīnadat // HV_App.I,31.3214 //
GE07hv_apppu:15206: tataḥ śilāṃ ca mahatīṃ pragṛhya danujaḥ kila / HV_App.I,31.3215 /
GE07hv_apppu:15208: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya hastenādāya keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3217 /
GE07hv_apppu:15209: jaghāna ca tadā daityaṃ tāḍitaḥ sa tayā kṣitau / HV_App.I,31.3218 /
GE07hv_apppu:15210: gatāsur iva saṃjajñe śvasann iva papāta ha // HV_App.I,31.3219 //
GE07hv_apppu:15211: prāpya saṃjñāṃ tato daityaḥ krodhād dviguṇam ābabhau / HV_App.I,31.3220 /
GE07hv_apppu:15212: ādāya parighaṃ ghoram idam āha janārdanam // HV_App.I,31.3221 //
GE07hv_apppu:15213: anena tava govinda darpaṃ jātaṃ nihanmy aham / HV_App.I,31.3222 /
GE07hv_apppu:15214: vikramajñaḥ sadā cāsi mama devāsure raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3223 //
GE07hv_apppu:15215: tāv eva vipulau bāhū sa evāsmi janārdana / HV_App.I,31.3224 /
GE07hv_apppu:15216: tathāpi yudhyase vīra jñātvā vai māmakaṃ balam // HV_App.I,31.3225 //
GE07hv_apppu:15219: cikṣepa daityo lokeśaṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3228 //
GE07hv_apppu:15220: taṃ gṛhya bāhunā kṛṣṇo duṣṭo 'sīti vadan hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.3229 /
GE07hv_apppu:15221: khaṇḍaśaḥ kārayām āsa khaḍgena niśitena ca // HV_App.I,31.3230 //
GE07hv_apppu:15222: utpāṭya vṛkṣaṃ daityendraḥ śataśākhaṃ mahāśikham / HV_App.I,31.3231 /
GE07hv_apppu:15223: tena taṃ pothayām āsa viṣṭaraśravasaṃ vibhum / HV_App.I,31.3232 /
GE07hv_apppu:15224: gṛhya taṃ cāpi khaḍgena tilaśaś ca cakāra ha // HV_App.I,31.3233 //
GE07hv_apppu:15225: vikrīḍya suciraṃ kṛṣṇas tena daityena mādhavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3234 /
GE07hv_apppu:15226: hantum aicchat tadā daityam ādāya niśitaṃ śaram / HV_App.I,31.3235 /
GE07hv_apppu:15227: āgneyāstreṇa saṃyojya jaghānainaṃ sa tena ha // HV_App.I,31.3236 //
GE07hv_apppu:15228: pradahya sa śaro daityaṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3237 /
GE07hv_apppu:15229: yathāpūrvaṃ jagāmāśu karaṃ bhagavataḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3238 //
GE07hv_apppu:15230: hataśiṣṭās tadā daityāḥ palāyanta diśo daśa / HV_App.I,31.3239 /
GE07hv_apppu:15231: adyāpi na nivartante gacchanto vai mahodadhim // HV_App.I,31.3240 //
GE07hv_apppu:15234: baladevas tu dharmātmā dhanur ādāya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.3241 /
GE07hv_apppu:15235: jaghāna haṃsaṃ daśabhir bāṇair bāṇabhṛtāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3242 /
GE07hv_apppu:15236: taṃ pratyavidhyan nārācair haṃsaḥ pañcabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3243 //
GE07hv_apppu:15237: tān antare halī chittvā nārācair daśabhiḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3244 /
GE07hv_apppu:15238: nārācenāśu vivyādha lalāṭe haṃsam ojasā // HV_App.I,31.3245 //
GE07hv_apppu:15239: dṛḍhaṃ patan sa nārācas tasya saṃjñāṃ samādade / HV_App.I,31.3246 /
GE07hv_apppu:15240: rathopasthe ciraṃ sthitvā sthūṇākarṇaṃ samādade // HV_App.I,31.3247 //
GE07hv_apppu:15241: labdhvā haṃsaḥ sa saṃjñāṃ tu vidhvā tena yadūttamam / HV_App.I,31.3248 /
GE07hv_apppu:15242: siṃhavad vyanadad dhaṃso devān vismāpayan raṇe // HV_App.I,31.3249 //
GE07hv_apppu:15243: tataḥ kruddho halī viddhas tena bāṇena mādhavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3250 /
GE07hv_apppu:15244: vamañ śoṇitam atyarthaṃ niśaśvāsa raṇājire / HV_App.I,31.3251 /
GE07hv_apppu:15246: nārācaiḥ saptasāhasrair ardayām āsa yādavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3253 /
GE07hv_apppu:15247: haṃsaṃ haṃsagatiṃ vīraṃ nīlavāsā halāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3254 //
GE07hv_apppu:15248: te muktā niśitā ghorā nārācāś ca suvājinaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3255 /
GE07hv_apppu:15249: rathe dhvaje tathā cāpe cakre tūṇīdvaye nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3256 /
GE07hv_apppu:15250: patitāḥ sarvato rājan vyathāṃ caiva tathā dadhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3257 //
GE07hv_apppu:15251: tataḥ kruddho mahārāja haṃso vīryabalānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3258 /
GE07hv_apppu:15252: śareṇa halinaṃ vidhvā dhvajaṃ ciccheda kenacit / HV_App.I,31.3259 /
GE07hv_apppu:15253: śaraiś caturbhir aśvāṃś ca sūtaṃ pretādhipe dadau // HV_App.I,31.3260 //
GE07hv_apppu:15254: tataḥ kruddho halī tasmād gadāṃ gṛhya mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,31.3261 /
GE07hv_apppu:15255: āpapāta mahābāhur haṃsaṃ śeṣa iva śvasan // HV_App.I,31.3262 //
GE07hv_apppu:15256: tayā dhvajaṃ rathaṃ cakram īṣāṃ sūtaṃ halāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3263 /
GE07hv_apppu:15257: babhañja tilaśaḥ sarvaṃ nanāda ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3264 //
GE07hv_apppu:15258: bhūyaś ca gadayā haṃsaṃ cikṣepa ca halī kila / HV_App.I,31.3265 /
GE07hv_apppu:15259: so 'pi haṃso gadāṃ gṛhya rathāt tasmād avāpatat // HV_App.I,31.3266 //
GE07hv_apppu:15260: tatas tau haṃsahalinau yuyudhāte mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,31.3267 /
GE07hv_apppu:15264: yathā devāsure yuddhe śakravṛtrau purāmbare / HV_App.I,31.3271 /
GE07hv_apppu:15267: tataś ca dakṣiṇaṃ mārgaṃ balabhadro 'nvagṛhṇata / HV_App.I,31.3274 /
GE07hv_apppu:15268: savyaṃ tu haṃso rājendra vyagṛhṇāt satyasaṃgaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3275 //
GE07hv_apppu:15269: pothayāṃ cakratur yuddhe gadābhyāṃ gajavikramau / HV_App.I,31.3276 /
GE07hv_apppu:15270: yathāprāṇaṃ mahābāhū jaghnatur maraṇāya vai // HV_App.I,31.3277 //
GE07hv_apppu:15273: devāś ca munayaś caiva vismayaṃ parijagmire / HV_App.I,31.3280 /
GE07hv_apppu:15274: aho khalv īdṛśaṃ yuddhaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ pūrvaṃ na ca śrutam // HV_App.I,31.3281 //
GE07hv_apppu:15277: atha haṃso mahāraṅge dakṣiṇaṃ dakṣiṇottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3284 /
GE07hv_apppu:15278: vyacaran mārgam atyarthaṃ savyaṃ tu balavān balī // HV_App.I,31.3285 //
GE07hv_apppu:15279: vikuñcya jānunī pūrvaṃ cakratur gadayā bhṛśam / HV_App.I,31.3286 /
GE07hv_apppu:15280: raṇaṃ raṇavidāṃ śreṣṭhau paśyatāṃ tridivaukasām // HV_App.I,31.3287 //
GE07hv_apppu:15283: yuddhaṃ cakratur atyarthaṃ tato ḍibhakasātyakī / HV_App.I,31.3288 /
GE07hv_apppu:15284: tāv ubhau balinau vīrau prakhyātau kṣatriyeṣu vai // HV_App.I,31.3289 //
GE07hv_apppu:15286: sātyakir daśabhir vīro ḍibhakaṃ satyavikramam / HV_App.I,31.3291 /
GE07hv_apppu:15287: avidhyan niśitair bāṇaiḥ stanamadhye tathorasi // HV_App.I,31.3292 //
GE07hv_apppu:15288: sa tena viddho balinā ḍibhakaḥ kṣatriyottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3293 /
GE07hv_apppu:15289: nārācaiḥ pañcasāhasrair vivyādha yudhi garvitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3294 //
GE07hv_apppu:15290: tān antare vṛṣṇivīro niṣedhya vyanadad raṇe / HV_App.I,31.3295 /
GE07hv_apppu:15291: atha kruddho nṛpavaro vidhvā saptabhir āśugaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3296 /
GE07hv_apppu:15292: punaḥ śatasahasreṇa pratyavidhyat sa sātyakim // HV_App.I,31.3297 //
GE07hv_apppu:15293: sātyakis tv atha vikrānto dhanuś ciccheda tasya tat / HV_App.I,31.3298 /
GE07hv_apppu:15295: ardhacandreṇa tīkṣṇena ḍibhakasya sa yādavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3299 //
GE07hv_apppu:15298: ājaghne ḍibhako rājan yuyudhānaṃ yudhāṃ varam / HV_App.I,31.3300 /
GE07hv_apppu:15300: sa tena viddho bāṇena vamañ śoṇitakaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3302 /
GE07hv_apppu:15301: atīva śuśubhe rājan vasante kiṃśuko yathā // HV_App.I,31.3303 //
GE07hv_apppu:15302: dhanuś ciccheda bhūyas tu yad gṛhītaṃ punar mahat // HV_App.I,31.3304 //
GE07hv_apppu:15303: tato 'nyad dhanur ādāya ḍibhako yādaveśvaram / HV_App.I,31.3305 /
GE07hv_apppu:15304: jaghāna niśitair bānaiḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3306 //
GE07hv_apppu:15305: sa dhanuḥ punar atyugraṃ ciccheda yudhi sātyakiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3307 /
GE07hv_apppu:15307: tato 'nyad dhanur ādāya satvaraṃ sa nṛpottamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3309 /
GE07hv_apppu:15308: dhanuṣā tena rājendra sātyakiṃ vivyadhe punaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3310 //
GE07hv_apppu:15309: evaṃ dhanūṃṣi rājendra śataṃ pañca ca pañca ca / HV_App.I,31.3311 /
GE07hv_apppu:15310: chittvā nanāda śaineyaḥ sarvakṣatrasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3312 //
GE07hv_apppu:15311: dhanūṃṣi tau samutsṛjya vīrau ḍibhakasātyakī / HV_App.I,31.3313 /
GE07hv_apppu:15312: khaḍgau pragṛhya cātyugrau yuddhāya samupasthitau // HV_App.I,31.3314 //
GE07hv_apppu:15313: tau hi khaḍgavidāṃ śreṣṭhau vīrau ḍibhakasātyakī / HV_App.I,31.3315 /
GE07hv_apppu:15314: dauḥśāsanir mahārāja saumadattis tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,31.3316 //
GE07hv_apppu:15315: abhimanyuś ca vikrānto nakulaś ca tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,31.3317 /
GE07hv_apppu:15316: ete khaḍgavidāṃ śreṣṭhāḥ kīrtitā yudhi sattamāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3318 //
GE07hv_apppu:15317: eṣv etau hi nṛpaśreṣṭhau khaḍge hi nṛpasattamau / HV_App.I,31.3319 /
GE07hv_apppu:15318: tāv etāv asinā yuddhaṃ cakratur yuddhalālasau // HV_App.I,31.3320 //
GE07hv_apppu:15319: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddhaṃ praviddhaṃ bāhuniḥsṛtam / HV_App.I,31.3321 /
GE07hv_apppu:15320: ākaraṃ vikaraṃ bhinnaṃ nirmaryādam amānuṣam // HV_App.I,31.3322 //
GE07hv_apppu:15321: saṃkocitaṃ vikucitaṃ savyajānu vijānu ca / HV_App.I,31.3323 /
GE07hv_apppu:15322: āhitaṃ citrakaṃ kṣiptaṃ kuḍumbaṃ lambanaṃ dhṛtam // HV_App.I,31.3324 //
GE07hv_apppu:15324: tribāhutuṅgabāhū ca savyonnatam udāsi ca // HV_App.I,31.3326 //
GE07hv_apppu:15325: pṛṣṭhataḥpraharaṃ caiva yaudhikaṃ prathitaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.3327 /
GE07hv_apppu:15326: iti pracārān dvātriṃśac cakratuḥ khaḍgayodhinau // HV_App.I,31.3328 //
GE07hv_apppu:15327: punaś ca praharantau tau na ca śramam upeyatuḥ / HV_App.I,31.3329 /
GE07hv_apppu:15329: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhāś ca paramarṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3331 /
GE07hv_apppu:15330: tuṣṭuvus tau mahārāja jaye dhṛtakṛtaśramau / HV_App.I,31.3332 /
GE07hv_apppu:15331: aho vīryam aho vīryam etayor balaśālinoḥ // HV_App.I,31.3333 //
GE07hv_apppu:15332: etāv eva raṇe śaktau khaḍge dhanuṣi pāragau / HV_App.I,31.3334 /
GE07hv_apppu:15333: ekaḥ śiṣyo girīśasya droṇasyānyo hi dhīmataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3335 //
GE07hv_apppu:15334: arjunaḥ sātyakiś caiva vāsudevo jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3336 /
GE07hv_apppu:15335: traya ete mahārāja prathitāḥ saṃgare sadā // HV_App.I,31.3337 //
GE07hv_apppu:15336: ḍibhakaḥ śaktibhṛc charvas traya ete mahārathāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3338 /
GE07hv_apppu:15337: prasiddhāḥ sarva evaite vīryeṣu ca baleṣu ca // HV_App.I,31.3339 //
GE07hv_apppu:15338: iti te devagandharvāḥ siddhā yakṣā mahoragāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3340 /
GE07hv_apppu:15339: divi sthitāḥ samaṃ brūyur yuddhadarśanalālasāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3341 //
GE07hv_apppu:15342: vasudevograsenau ca vṛddhau yuddheṣu nirvṛtau / HV_App.I,31.3342 /
GE07hv_apppu:15346: śarair anekasāhasrair ardayām āsatū raṇe / HV_App.I,31.3346 /
GE07hv_apppu:15348: hiḍimbo rākṣasendras tu bhakṣayan sarvato narān / HV_App.I,31.3348 /
GE07hv_apppu:15356: gajān gajaiḥ samāghnāno hayair aśvān nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.3356 /
GE07hv_apppu:15357: rathān rathaiḥ samāhatya sādinaḥ sādibhis tathā // HV_App.I,31.3357 //
GE07hv_apppu:15358: manuṣyān svapuro dṛṣṭvā nāsyagrāsaṃ cakāra saḥ / HV_App.I,31.3358 /
GE07hv_apppu:15359: kāṃścid dhatvā mahārāja vṛṣṇipālān samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3359 //
GE07hv_apppu:15360: bhakṣayām āsa sahasā hiḍimbaḥ puruṣādakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3360 /
GE07hv_apppu:15361: yān paśyati puro rakṣas tāñ jaghāna virūpadhṛk // HV_App.I,31.3361 //
GE07hv_apppu:15362: bhakṣayann aparān vṛṣṇīn pādātān rākṣasādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3362 /
GE07hv_apppu:15363: cikṣepa sahasā kāṃścid dhiḍimbaḥ puruṣādakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3363 //
GE07hv_apppu:15364: antakāle yathā kruddho rudraḥ prāṇabhṛto nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3364 /
GE07hv_apppu:15365: kṣaṇenaikena sarvāṃs tān bhakṣayām āsa rākṣasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3365 //
GE07hv_apppu:15366: kecid bhītā diśaḥ prāpur vṛṣṇayo vīryaśālinaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3366 /
GE07hv_apppu:15367: kecit tu bhakṣitās tena rakṣasā vṛṣṇipuṅgavāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3367 //
GE07hv_apppu:15368: kumbhakarṇo yathā rājan bhakṣayām āsa vānarān / HV_App.I,31.3368 /
GE07hv_apppu:15369: niḥśeṣaṃ vṛṣṇisainyaṃ tu cakāra puruṣādakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3369 //
GE07hv_apppu:15370: niśceṣṭaṃ vṛṣṇisainyaṃ tu sthitaṃ citrapaṭe yathā // HV_App.I,31.3370 //
GE07hv_apppu:15371: etasminn antare kruddhau vṛddhau yādavapuṅgavau / HV_App.I,31.3371 /
GE07hv_apppu:15372: dhanur gṛhya mahāghoraṃ rākṣasasya puraḥ sthitau // HV_App.I,31.3372 //
GE07hv_apppu:15373: yathā kruddhasya siṃhasya meṣau kruddhatamāv iva / HV_App.I,31.3373 /
GE07hv_apppu:15374: vyādāyāsyaṃ mahad rakṣas tau dṛṣṭvāthābhyadhāvata // HV_App.I,31.3374 //
GE07hv_apppu:15376: paryadhāvat tato rakṣaḥ khādat khādat kalevaram // HV_App.I,31.3376 //
GE07hv_apppu:15377: pūrayām āsatur vīrau śarair yaduvṛṣau nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3377 /
GE07hv_apppu:15379: sarvāṃs tān khādayām āsa devaśatrur virūpadhṛk / HV_App.I,31.3379 /
GE07hv_apppu:15380: dhāvati sma tato rakṣo vyāditāsyaṃ bhayānakam // HV_App.I,31.3380 //
GE07hv_apppu:15381: tayor gṛhītvā dhanuṣī babhañja yudhi satvaram / HV_App.I,31.3381 /
GE07hv_apppu:15382: bāhū prasārya duṣṭātmā rākṣaso vikṛtānanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3382 //
GE07hv_apppu:15386: eṣa vāṃ bhakṣayiṣyāmi vasudeva nṛpādhama / HV_App.I,31.3385 /
GE07hv_apppu:15387: ugrasena kimarthaṃ tvaṃ tiṣṭhase matpuro 'dhama // HV_App.I,31.3386 //
GE07hv_apppu:15388: āgaccha praviśāsyaṃ me grāsabhūtau yuvāṃ mama / HV_App.I,31.3387 /
GE07hv_apppu:15389: vidhinā nirmitau vṛddhau vasudeva hareḥ pitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3388 //
GE07hv_apppu:15390: bubhukṣitaḥ śramārtaś ca yuddhe tvaritavikramaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3389 /
GE07hv_apppu:15391: manmukhān naiva gacchetaṃ praviśantau tvarānvitau // HV_App.I,31.3390 //
GE07hv_apppu:15392: yuvayoḥ śoṇitaṃ pītvā tṛptiṃ yāsyāmi nirvṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3391 /
GE07hv_apppu:15393: khādāmi ca punar māṃsaṃ vṛddhayor yuvayoḥ sukham // HV_App.I,31.3392 //
GE07hv_apppu:15394: iti bruvaṃs tadā kruddho vyāditāsyo mahāhanuḥ / HV_App.I,31.3393 /
GE07hv_apppu:15395: dhāvati sma tadā kṣipraṃ hiḍimbo rākṣaseśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3394 //
GE07hv_apppu:15396: vasudevograsenau ca bhītau viprekṣya sarvataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3395 /
GE07hv_apppu:15398: etasminn antare dṛṣṭvā balabhadraḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.3397 /
GE07hv_apppu:15399: dṛṣṭvā ca tau tathābhūtau vasudevograsenakau // HV_App.I,31.3398 //
GE07hv_apppu:15400: vāsudevaṃ samādiśya haṃsaṃ yudhyantam īśvaram / HV_App.I,31.3399 /
GE07hv_apppu:15401: nirgatya cāntaraṃ tasya rākṣasasya durātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3400 //
GE07hv_apppu:15402: mā kṛthāḥ sāhasaṃ rakṣo muñcaitau rājasattamau / HV_App.I,31.3401 /
GE07hv_apppu:15403: sthito 'smi yudhyatāṃ rakṣo mayā śatrūñ jighāṃsatā // HV_App.I,31.3402 //
GE07hv_apppu:15404: aham eva haniṣye tvāṃ kā ceyaṃ tava bhīṣikā / HV_App.I,31.3403 /
GE07hv_apppu:15405: iti bruvāṇaṃ halinaṃ visṛjyaitau mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,31.3404 //
GE07hv_apppu:15406: mahān ayam asau puṣṭo bhakṣayāmy enam agrataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3405 /
GE07hv_apppu:15407: vidārya pūrvavad vaktraṃ balabhadram upādravat // HV_App.I,31.3406 //
GE07hv_apppu:15408: visṛjya saśaraṃ cāpaṃ rākṣasasya puraḥ sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3407 /
GE07hv_apppu:15409: muṣṭiṃ pragṛhya balavān sphoṭayan bāhum uttamam // HV_App.I,31.3408 //
GE07hv_apppu:15410: hiḍimbas tv atha duṣṭātmā muṣṭiṃ kṛtvā mahāravam / HV_App.I,31.3409 /
GE07hv_apppu:15411: jaghāna vakṣo rāmasya vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3410 //
GE07hv_apppu:15412: kruddho 'tha balabhadras tu muṣṭinā tena tāḍitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3411 /
GE07hv_apppu:15413: jaghāna muṣṭinā rāmo rākṣasendram aninditaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3412 //
GE07hv_apppu:15416: tayoś caṭacaṭāśabdaḥ prādur āsīd bhayānakaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3415 //
GE07hv_apppu:15417: atha rākṣasarājas tu muṣṭinā rāmam āhave / HV_App.I,31.3416 /
GE07hv_apppu:15418: jaghāna vakṣodeśe tu vajreṇeva puraṃdaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3417 //
GE07hv_apppu:15419: atha rāmo balī sākṣān muṣṭiṃ saṃvartya yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3418 /
GE07hv_apppu:15420: hiḍimbaṃ tāḍayām āsa vakṣasy amaravidviṣam // HV_App.I,31.3419 //
GE07hv_apppu:15421: talābhyām atha rāmas tu jaghne vaktre sa rākṣasam // HV_App.I,31.3420 //
GE07hv_apppu:15423: jānubhyām apatad bhūmau gatāsur iva rākṣasaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3422 //
GE07hv_apppu:15424: tata utpatya rāmas tu dorbhyāṃ saṃgṛhya rākṣasam / HV_App.I,31.3423 /
GE07hv_apppu:15425: ādāya bāhuvegena bhrāmayitvā padāt padam // HV_App.I,31.3424 //
GE07hv_apppu:15426: vyāvidhya suciraṃ rāmo darśayann ātmano balam / HV_App.I,31.3425 /
GE07hv_apppu:15427: utkṣipya rākṣasendraṃ taṃ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3426 //
GE07hv_apppu:15428: gavyūtimātraṃ cikṣepa tato deśād dhalāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3427 /
GE07hv_apppu:15429: gatāsur iva rakṣas tu tato deśān nirākramat // HV_App.I,31.3428 //
GE07hv_apppu:15430: ye kecid rākṣasās tatra hataśeṣā mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,31.3429 /
GE07hv_apppu:15431: balabhadrāt tato bhītā jagmuś caiva diśo daśa // HV_App.I,31.3430 //
GE07hv_apppu:15432: atha bhagavān api bhāskaro raviḥ @ HV_App.I,31.3431 @
GE07hv_apppu:15434: astaṃ yayau cakṣur api prajānām @ HV_App.I,31.3433 @
GE07hv_apppu:15446: ubhau tau haṃsaḍibhakau rātrāv eva mahāgirim / HV_App.I,31.3443 /
GE07hv_apppu:15447: jagmatuḥ sahitau rājan govardhanam atho nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3444 //
GE07hv_apppu:15448: atha prabhāte vimale sūrye cābhyudite sati / HV_App.I,31.3445 /
GE07hv_apppu:15450: śaineyo balabhadraś ca yādavāḥ sāraṇādayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3447 /
GE07hv_apppu:15451: gandharvair apsarobhiś ca nāditaṃ bahudhā girim // HV_App.I,31.3448 //
GE07hv_apppu:15452: [k: Ds2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15453: jagmatuḥ sahitau rājan govardhanam atho girim / **HV_App.I,31.3448**25:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15454: godhanair atha sainyaiś ca nāditaṃ bahudhā girim // **HV_App.I,31.3448**25:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:15455: tasyottaraṃ nṛpaśreṣṭha pārśvaṃ saṃprāpya yādavāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3449 /
GE07hv_apppu:15456: nikaṣā yamunāṃ rājaṃs tato yuddham avartata / HV_App.I,31.3450 /
GE07hv_apppu:15457: haṃsena ḍibhakenātha yādavaiś ca samantataḥ // HV_App.I,31.3451 //
GE07hv_apppu:15459: vivyādha haṃsaḍibhakau vasudevaś ca saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3453 /
GE07hv_apppu:15460: sāraṇaḥ pañcaviṃśatyā daśabhiḥ kaṅka eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3454 //
GE07hv_apppu:15462: niśaṭhas triṃśatā rājan sātyakiś cāpi saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3455 /
GE07hv_apppu:15463: aśītyā vipṛthū rājann uddhavo daśabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3456 //
GE07hv_apppu:15464: pradyumnas triṃśatā rājan sāmbaś cāpi ca saptabhiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3457 /
GE07hv_apppu:15465: anādhṛṣṭis tv ekaṣaṣṭyā śarāṇāṃ nataparvaṇām // HV_App.I,31.3458 //
GE07hv_apppu:15466: evaṃ te sahitā rājaṃś cakrur yuddham adīnavat / HV_App.I,31.3459 /
GE07hv_apppu:15467: atyadbhutaṃ mahāghoraṃ yādavāḥ sarva eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3460 //
GE07hv_apppu:15468: cakrus tābhyāṃ mahāyuddhaṃ vāsudevasya paśyataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3461 /
GE07hv_apppu:15469: sarvān atha mahārāja yādavān balavattarān // HV_App.I,31.3462 //
GE07hv_apppu:15470: tāv ubhau haṃsaḍibhakau nṛpāṃs tān pratyavidhyatām / HV_App.I,31.3463 /
GE07hv_apppu:15471: pratyekaṃ daśabhir vidhvā bāṇaiś ca kṛtasaṃyataiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3464 /
GE07hv_apppu:15472: jaghnatuś ca śarais tīkṣṇair atyarthaṃ yādaveśvarān // HV_App.I,31.3465 //
GE07hv_apppu:15473: vyathitāḥ sarva evaite vamantaḥ śoṇitaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,31.3466 /
GE07hv_apppu:15474: mādhave kiṃśukā rājan puṣpitā iva te babhuḥ // HV_App.I,31.3467 //
GE07hv_apppu:15475: bhītāś ca yādavā rājan palāyanaparāyaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3468 /
GE07hv_apppu:15476: etasminn antare rājan vasudevātmajau nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3469 //
GE07hv_apppu:15477: vāsudevo halī yuddhe pramukhe dhanvinau tayoḥ / HV_App.I,31.3470 /
GE07hv_apppu:15478: cakratur yuddham atulaṃ skandaśakrāv ivāmbare // HV_App.I,31.3471 //
GE07hv_apppu:15479: tato devāḥ sagandharvāḥ siddhā yakṣā maharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3472 /
GE07hv_apppu:15480: vimānasthāś ca dadṛśur yuddhaṃ devāsuropamam // HV_App.I,31.3473 //
GE07hv_apppu:15481: tataḥ prādur abhūtāṃ tau bhūtau bhūteśvarasya ha / HV_App.I,31.3474 /
GE07hv_apppu:15482: śūlinā preṣito yuddhe rakṣārthaṃ balinau tayoḥ // HV_App.I,31.3475 //
GE07hv_apppu:15483: haṃso 'tha vāsudevaś ca yuddhaṃ cakratur īśvarau / HV_App.I,31.3476 /
GE07hv_apppu:15484: rāmaś ca ḍibhakaś caiva saṃyuktau yuddhakāṅkṣayā // HV_App.I,31.3477 //
GE07hv_apppu:15485: vikrāntāḥ sarva evaite śastre hy astre tathā bale / HV_App.I,31.3478 /
GE07hv_apppu:15486: śaṅkhān dadhmuḥ pṛthag rājan sve sve sarve rathe sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,31.3479 //
GE07hv_apppu:15487: atha kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśaḥ pāñcajanyaṃ mahāsvanam / HV_App.I,31.3480 /
GE07hv_apppu:15488: dadhmau padmapalāśākṣaḥ sarvān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.3481 //
GE07hv_apppu:15490: dudruvatur mahārāja śūlam ādāya keśavam / HV_App.I,31.3483 /
GE07hv_apppu:15491: śūlena pothayāṃ rājaṃś cakratur yādaveśvaram // HV_App.I,31.3484 //
GE07hv_apppu:15493: īṣasmitādharo devaḥ kiṃcid utplutya satvaram / HV_App.I,31.3486 /
GE07hv_apppu:15494: rathād rathivaraśreṣṭhas tau pragṛhya jagatpatiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3487 //
GE07hv_apppu:15495: bhrāmayitvā śataguṇam alātam iva keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3488 /
GE07hv_apppu:15496: kailāsaṃ ca samuddiśya pracikṣepa tato hariḥ // HV_App.I,31.3489 //
GE07hv_apppu:15497: tāv etya tu gireḥ śṛṅgaṃ kailāsasya mahāmate / HV_App.I,31.3490 /
GE07hv_apppu:15498: dṛṣṭvā tatkarma devasya vismayaṃ jagmatuḥ param // HV_App.I,31.3491 //
GE07hv_apppu:15499: haṃsaś ca dṛṣṭvā tatkarma roṣatāmrāyatekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3492 /
GE07hv_apppu:15500: uvāca vacanaṃ viṣṇuṃ paśyatāṃ tridivaukasām // HV_App.I,31.3493 //
GE07hv_apppu:15501: kimarthaṃ rājasūyasya vighnaṃ carasi keśava / HV_App.I,31.3494 /
GE07hv_apppu:15502: brahmadatto mahīpālo yaṣṭā tasya mahākratoḥ / HV_App.I,31.3495 /
GE07hv_apppu:15503: karaṃ diśa yathāyogaṃ yadi prāṇān prakāṅkṣase // HV_App.I,31.3496 //
GE07hv_apppu:15504: atha cet tvaṃ kṣaṇaṃ tiṣṭha tato jñātvā karaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,31.3497 /
GE07hv_apppu:15505: dadāsi nandaputra tvaṃ tato yaṣṭā sa me guruḥ // HV_App.I,31.3498 //
GE07hv_apppu:15506: īśvaro 'haṃ sadā rājñāṃ devānām iva śūladhṛk / HV_App.I,31.3499 /
GE07hv_apppu:15507: evaṃ te vīryavibhavaṃ nāśayiṣyāmi saṃyuge // HV_App.I,31.3500 //
GE07hv_apppu:15508: ity uktvā saśaraṃ cāpaṃ sālatālopamaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,31.3501 /
GE07hv_apppu:15509: ākṛṣya ca yathāprāṇaṃ nārācena sa keśavam / HV_App.I,31.3502 /
GE07hv_apppu:15510: lalāṭe cikṣipe haṃso lalāma iva so 'bhavat // HV_App.I,31.3503 //
GE07hv_apppu:15511: uvāca sātyakiṃ kṛṣṇo rathaṃ vāhaya me prabho / HV_App.I,31.3504 /
GE07hv_apppu:15512: dārukaṃ pṛṣṭavāhaṃ taṃ kṛtvā keśava īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,31.3505 //
GE07hv_apppu:15513: atha tena samādiṣṭaḥ sātyakir vāhayan ratham / HV_App.I,31.3506 /
GE07hv_apppu:15514: maṇḍalāni bahūny ājau darśayām āsa satvaram // HV_App.I,31.3507 //
GE07hv_apppu:15515: atha viddho dṛḍhaṃ tena śareṇa harir īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.3508 /
GE07hv_apppu:15516: āgneyam astraṃ saṃyojya śare kasmiṃścid īśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,31.3509 /
GE07hv_apppu:15517: uvāca haṃsaṃ rājendra sātyakiṃ preṣayan hayān // HV_App.I,31.3510 //
GE07hv_apppu:15518: anena tvāṃ dahāmy adya yadi śaknoṣi vāraya / HV_App.I,31.3511 /
GE07hv_apppu:15519: alaṃ te bahuyuddhena kṣatriyo 'si sadā śaṭha // HV_App.I,31.3512 //
GE07hv_apppu:15520: mattaś cet karam icchaṃs tvaṃ darśayādya parākramam / HV_App.I,31.3513 /
GE07hv_apppu:15521: yatayo bādhitā haṃsa puṣkare saṃsthitās tvayā // HV_App.I,31.3514 //
GE07hv_apppu:15522: śāstā tvaṃ khalu viprāṇāṃ sthite mayi narādhama / HV_App.I,31.3515 /
GE07hv_apppu:15523: sthite mayi jagannāthe hatvā kṣatriyakaṇṭakān // HV_App.I,31.3516 //
GE07hv_apppu:15524: śāstāsmy atho 'satāṃ loke duṣṭānāṃ brahmavidviṣām / HV_App.I,31.3517 /
GE07hv_apppu:15525: śāpena yatimukhyānāṃ hata eva purādhama // HV_App.I,31.3518 //
GE07hv_apppu:15526: mṛtyave tvāṃ nivedyādya rakṣitā brāhmaṇān aham / HV_App.I,31.3519 /
GE07hv_apppu:15527: iti bruvaṃs tad astraṃ tu mumoca yudhi keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3520 /
GE07hv_apppu:15528: tad astraṃ vāruṇenātha haṃso 'pi pratyaṣedhayat // HV_App.I,31.3521 //
GE07hv_apppu:15529: vāyavyam atha govindo mumoca yudhi haṃsake / HV_App.I,31.3522 /
GE07hv_apppu:15530: tad astraṃ vārayām āsa māhendreṇa nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.3523 //
GE07hv_apppu:15531: atha māheśvaraṃ kṛṣṇo mumocātyugram āhave / HV_App.I,31.3524 /
GE07hv_apppu:15532: raudreṇa tat tato haṃso vārayām āsa tatkṣaṇāt // HV_App.I,31.3525 //
GE07hv_apppu:15533: gāndharvaṃ rākṣasaṃ caiva paiśācam atha keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3526 /
GE07hv_apppu:15534: brahmāstram atha kauberam āsuraṃ yāmyam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3527 //
GE07hv_apppu:15535: chittvāsyaitāni haṃsas tu mumoca yudhi satvaram / HV_App.I,31.3528 /
GE07hv_apppu:15536: vāraṇārthaṃ tadastrāṇāṃ caturṇāṃ mādhavasya ha // HV_App.I,31.3529 //
GE07hv_apppu:15537: atha brahmaśiro nāma ghoraṃ śatruvināśanam / HV_App.I,31.3530 /
GE07hv_apppu:15538: mumoca haṃsam uddiśya keśavaḥ krodhamūrchitaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3531 /
GE07hv_apppu:15541: atha bhīto mahāraudram astraṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpottamaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.3531**26:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:15542: haṃso 'pi tena rājendra vārayām āsa taṃ śaram // HV_App.I,31.3532 //
GE07hv_apppu:15544: astraṃ vaiṣṇavam ādāya śare suniśite hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.3534 /
GE07hv_apppu:15546: yena devā raṇe hatvā rājyam āpuḥ purāsurān / HV_App.I,31.3536 /
GE07hv_apppu:15547: tadastraṃ yojayām āsa vadhārthaṃ tasya bhūpateḥ // HV_App.I,31.3537 //
GE07hv_apppu:15550: atha bhīto mahāraudram astraṃ dṛṣṭvā nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.3538 /
GE07hv_apppu:15551: haṃso rājā mahārāja niśceṣṭa iva saṃbabhau // HV_App.I,31.3539 //
GE07hv_apppu:15552: utplutya sa rathāt tasmād yamunām abhyadhāvata / HV_App.I,31.3540 /
GE07hv_apppu:15553: yatra kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśaḥ kāliyaṃ balaśālinam // HV_App.I,31.3541 //
GE07hv_apppu:15554: mamarda ca mahāghoraṃ yāvat pātālasaṃsthitiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3542 /
GE07hv_apppu:15555: tāvad dīrghaṃ mahānīlaṃ kālāñjananibhaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,31.3543 //
GE07hv_apppu:15556: tasmin hrade mahāghore papātātha sa haṃsakaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3544 /
GE07hv_apppu:15557: haṃse patati tasmiṃs tu mahān rāvo babhūva ha / HV_App.I,31.3545 /
GE07hv_apppu:15558: girīṇāṃ pātyamānānāṃ samudra iva vajriṇā // HV_App.I,31.3546 //
GE07hv_apppu:15559: rathād utplutya kṛṣṇo 'pi tasyopari papāta ha / HV_App.I,31.3547 /
GE07hv_apppu:15560: devadevo jagannātho jagad vismāpayann iva / HV_App.I,31.3548 /
GE07hv_apppu:15561: prāharat taṃ mahābāhuṃ pādābhyām atha keśavaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3549 //
GE07hv_apppu:15562: pādakṣepaṃ tatas tasmāl labdhvā haṃso nṛpottama / HV_App.I,31.3550 /
GE07hv_apppu:15563: mamāra ca nṛpaśreṣṭha kecid evaṃ vadanti hi // HV_App.I,31.3551 //
GE07hv_apppu:15564: anye pātālam āyāto bhakṣitaḥ pannagair iti / HV_App.I,31.3552 /
GE07hv_apppu:15565: adyāpi naiva rājendra dṛṣṭa ity anuśuśrumaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3553 //
GE07hv_apppu:15567: hate tasmin mahārāja dharmaputro yudhiṣṭhiraḥ / HV_App.I,31.3555 /
GE07hv_apppu:15568: akarod rājasūyaṃ ca tava pūrvapitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3556 //
GE07hv_apppu:15569: yadi jīved asau haṃsaḥ ko nu maṃsyati taṃ kratum / HV_App.I,31.3557 /
GE07hv_apppu:15570: sa ca sarvāstravin nityaṃ rudrāl labdhavaraḥ prabho // HV_App.I,31.3558 //
GE07hv_apppu:15571: kṣaṇād eva mahārāja vārteyaṃ gām agāhata / HV_App.I,31.3559 /
GE07hv_apppu:15572: hato haṃso hato haṃsaḥ kṛṣṇena ripumardinā // HV_App.I,31.3560 //
GE07hv_apppu:15575: yamunāyā hrade ghore kṛṣṇeneti divāniśam // HV_App.I,31.3563 //
GE07hv_apppu:15578: śrutvā nihatam atyugraṃ bhrātaraṃ vīryaśālinam / HV_App.I,31.3564 /
GE07hv_apppu:15580: ḍibhako vīryasaṃpanno yamunām anu jagmivān / HV_App.I,31.3566 /
GE07hv_apppu:15581: tam anvadhāvad vegena balabhadro halāyudhaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3567 //
GE07hv_apppu:15582: haṃso hi yatra patitas tatrāsau nipapāta ha / HV_App.I,31.3568 /
GE07hv_apppu:15584: atikruddho 'tha ḍibhako bhrāmayitvā jalaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,31.3570 /
GE07hv_apppu:15585: unmajyonmajya sahasā nimajya ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3571 /
GE07hv_apppu:15586: na dadarśa tadā rājan bhrātaraṃ vīryaśālinam // HV_App.I,31.3572 //
GE07hv_apppu:15587: unmajyātha mahābāhur vāsudevaṃ vilokya ca / HV_App.I,31.3573 /
GE07hv_apppu:15588: uvāca vacanaṃ rājan ḍibhako vīryavattamaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3574 /
GE07hv_apppu:15589: are gopakadāyāda kvāsau haṃsa iti sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3575 //
GE07hv_apppu:15590: vāsudevo 'pi dharmātmā yamunāṃ pṛccha rājaka / HV_App.I,31.3576 /
GE07hv_apppu:15591: ity abravīt prasannātmā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,31.3577 //
GE07hv_apppu:15592: tac chrutvā yamunāṃ bhūyaḥ praviśya ḍibhakaḥ kila / HV_App.I,31.3578 /
GE07hv_apppu:15594: vilalāpa tato rājā ḍibhako bhrāntamānasaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3580 /
GE07hv_apppu:15595: kva nu gacchasi rājendra vihāyaikam abāndhavam // HV_App.I,31.3581 //
GE07hv_apppu:15596: kuto bhrātar ito gaccheḥ parityajyaiva mām iha // HV_App.I,31.3582 //
GE07hv_apppu:15598: ātmatyāge manaḥ kurvan yamunāyā mahāhrade // HV_App.I,31.3584 //
GE07hv_apppu:15600: hastena jihvām ākṛṣya bhūyo bhūyo vilapya ca // HV_App.I,31.3586 //
GE07hv_apppu:15601: tataḥ samūlām ākṛṣya jihvāṃ sāhasakṛt svayam / HV_App.I,31.3587 /
GE07hv_apppu:15602: mamārāntarjale rājan ḍibhako narakāya vai // HV_App.I,31.3588 //
GE07hv_apppu:15603: gate narādhame haṃse ḍibhake ca tadā hate / HV_App.I,31.3589 /
GE07hv_apppu:15604: agamat puṇḍarīkākṣo bhūtān vismāpayann iva // HV_App.I,31.3590 //
GE07hv_apppu:15605: tataḥ prītaḥ prasannātmā vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,31.3591 /
GE07hv_apppu:15607: kaṃcit kālaṃ mahārāja pūrvabhuktam uvāsa ha // HV_App.I,31.3593 //
GE07hv_apppu:15611: govardhanagataṃ śrutvā vāsudevaṃ ca sāgrajam // HV_App.I,31.3595 //
GE07hv_apppu:15612: navanītaṃ ca dadhi ca pāyasaṃ kṛsaraṃ tathā / HV_App.I,31.3596 /
GE07hv_apppu:15613: vanyaṃ puṣpaṃ mahārāja mayūrāṅgadam eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3597 //
GE07hv_apppu:15614: ballavair aparaiḥ sārdhaṃ gopībhiś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,31.3598 /
GE07hv_apppu:15615: jagmatuḥ sahasā prītau govardhanam atho nṛpa // HV_App.I,31.3599 //
GE07hv_apppu:15616: kvacid vṛkṣe samāsaktaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇamṛgekṣaṇam / HV_App.I,31.3600 /
GE07hv_apppu:15617: dadarśatur mahābāhuṃ vāsudevaṃ ca sāgrajam // HV_App.I,31.3601 //
GE07hv_apppu:15618: praṇematuḥ susaṃhṛṣṭau tatra dṛṣṭvā mahābalau / HV_App.I,31.3602 /
GE07hv_apppu:15619: darśayām āsatur devaṃ pāyasāni mahānti ca // HV_App.I,31.3603 //
GE07hv_apppu:15620: nandagopaṃ yaśodāṃ ca dṛṣṭvā prīto 'bhavad dhariḥ / HV_App.I,31.3604 /
GE07hv_apppu:15621: avocac ca tato vākyaṃ nandagopaṃ saballavam / HV_App.I,31.3605 /
GE07hv_apppu:15622: yaśodāṃ mātaraṃ paścād vāsudevaḥ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,31.3606 //
GE07hv_apppu:15623: tāta mātar vraje goṣṭhe kuśalaṃ vā svagodhane / HV_App.I,31.3607 /
GE07hv_apppu:15624: api gāvaḥ kṣīravatyo vatsā vatsatarāḥ pitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3608 //
GE07hv_apppu:15625: api vā suśubhaṃ kṣīram api gāvaḥ suśobhanāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3609 /
GE07hv_apppu:15626: api vā dārakā mātar vatsapālāḥ pitar divā // HV_App.I,31.3610 //
GE07hv_apppu:15627: bahūni cāpi dāmāni kīlakā api vā bahu / HV_App.I,31.3611 /
GE07hv_apppu:15628: tṛṇāni bahurūpāṇi kiṃ vā santi pitaḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3612 //
GE07hv_apppu:15629: śakaṭāni sugandhīni kiṃ vā santi pitar dhruvam / HV_App.I,31.3613 /
GE07hv_apppu:15630: api gopyaḥ putravatyo dārakāḥ kim ajījanan // HV_App.I,31.3614 //
GE07hv_apppu:15631: ghaṭāḥ kiṃ bahavo mātar abhinnāḥ sarvato vraje / HV_App.I,31.3615 /
GE07hv_apppu:15632: kiṃ gāvaḥ kṣīram atulaṃ sravany ahar ahaḥ pitaḥ // HV_App.I,31.3616 //
GE07hv_apppu:15633: haiyaṃgavīnaṃ kṣīrāṇi dadhi vā kim ajījanan / HV_App.I,31.3617 /
GE07hv_apppu:15634: godhanaṃ sarvam evaitan nīrogaṃ saṃprapadyate // HV_App.I,31.3618 //
GE07hv_apppu:15636: sarvam etad yaduśreṣṭha nīrogaṃ bahuśaḥ prabho / HV_App.I,31.3619 /
GE07hv_apppu:15638: rakṣaṇāt tava deveśa sadā kuśalino vayam / HV_App.I,31.3621 /
GE07hv_apppu:15639: sagodhanāḥ savatsāś ca nīrogā eva keśava // HV_App.I,31.3622 //
GE07hv_apppu:15640: ekam eva sadā duḥkhaṃ na tvāṃ drakṣyāma keśava / HV_App.I,31.3623 /
GE07hv_apppu:15641: yad etat kevalaṃ duḥkham iti me dhīyate sadā // HV_App.I,31.3624 //
GE07hv_apppu:15643: evamādi vilapyantaṃ gacchety āha sa keśavaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3625 /
GE07hv_apppu:15644: mātaraṃ punar āhedaṃ mātar gaccha gṛhaṃ prati // HV_App.I,31.3626 //
GE07hv_apppu:15645: ye ca tvāṃ kīrtayiṣyanti te ca svargam avāpnuyuḥ / HV_App.I,31.3627 /
GE07hv_apppu:15646: ye kecit tvāṃ namasyanti te me priyatarāḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3628 //
GE07hv_apppu:15647: madbhaktāḥ sarvadā santu gacchety āha ca tāṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,31.3629 /
GE07hv_apppu:15649: ity uktvā pitarau devo vāsudevaḥ sanātanaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.3629**27:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15650: gāḍham āliṅgya tau prītau preṣayām āsa keśavaḥ // **HV_App.I,31.3629**27:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:15653: iti śrutvā ca tadvākyaṃ kṛṣṇād bhaktipuraḥsaram / **HV_App.I,31.3629**28:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15654: yaśodā nandagopaś ca jagmatuḥ svagṛhaṃ kila // HV_App.I,31.3630 //
GE07hv_apppu:15655: tataḥ kṛṣṇo hṛṣīkeśo yādavair vṛṣṇibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,31.3631 /
GE07hv_apppu:15656: gantum aicchat tadā viṣṇuḥ purīṃ dvāravatīṃ kila // HV_App.I,31.3632 //
GE07hv_apppu:15657: [k: Dn Bom. Poona Cal. eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15658: ya etac chṛṇuyān nityaṃ paṭhed vāpi samāhitaḥ / **HV_App.I,31.3632**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15659: putravān dhanavāṃś caiva ante mokṣaṃ ca gacchati // **HV_App.I,31.3632**29:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:15662: gacchann atha mahāviṣṇuḥ puṣkaraṃ prāpya yādavaiḥ / HV_App.I,31.3633 /
GE07hv_apppu:15663: apaśyan munimukhyāṃs tu puṣkarasthān nṛpottama // HV_App.I,31.3634 //
GE07hv_apppu:15664: te sametya mahādevam ṛṣayo vītamatsarāḥ / HV_App.I,31.3635 /
GE07hv_apppu:15667: atyadbhutam idaṃ viṣṇo tava vīryaṃ janārdana / HV_App.I,31.3638 /
GE07hv_apppu:15668: yena tau nihatau yuddhe haṃso ḍibhaka eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3639 //
GE07hv_apppu:15669: yo vicakro durādharṣo devair api suduḥsahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3640 /
GE07hv_apppu:15670: saṃgare nihato deva duḥsādhya iti no matiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3641 //
GE07hv_apppu:15671: kṣemo naḥ sarvakāryeṣu caratāṃ tapa uttamam / HV_App.I,31.3642 /
GE07hv_apppu:15672: tvatprasādāj jagannātha carāmas tapa uttamam // HV_App.I,31.3643 //
GE07hv_apppu:15673: niṣkalmaṣā bhaviṣyāmas tava saṃsmaraṇād dhare / HV_App.I,31.3644 /
GE07hv_apppu:15674: tvaṃ hi sarvasya duḥkhasya hartā tvāṃ dhyāyatāṃ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3645 //
GE07hv_apppu:15675: tvadanusmaraṇaṃ jantoḥ sadā puṇyapradaṃ prabho / HV_App.I,31.3646 /
GE07hv_apppu:15676: tvaṃ hi naḥ satataṃ dhātā vidhātā tapaso hare // HV_App.I,31.3647 //
GE07hv_apppu:15677: tvam oṃkāro vaṣaṭkāras tvaṃ yajñas tvaṃ pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,31.3648 /
GE07hv_apppu:15678: tvaṃ jyotir brahmaṇo mūrtis tvaṃ brahmā rudra eva ca // HV_App.I,31.3649 //
GE07hv_apppu:15679: prāṇas tvaṃ sarvabhūtānām antarātmeti śabdyase / HV_App.I,31.3650 /
GE07hv_apppu:15680: upāsyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yajñair dānair jagatpate // HV_App.I,31.3651 //
GE07hv_apppu:15681: namo viśvasṛje deva namas te viśvamūrtaye / HV_App.I,31.3652 /
GE07hv_apppu:15682: pāhi lokam imaṃ deva hatvā brahmadviṣaḥ sadā // HV_App.I,31.3653 //
GE07hv_apppu:15683: sa tatheti harir viṣṇur yayau dvāravatīṃ purīm / HV_App.I,31.3654 /
GE07hv_apppu:15684: avasad vṛṣṇibhiḥ sārdhaṃ stūyamānaḥ sa māgadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,31.3655 //
GE07hv_apppu:15685: iyaṃ ca devadevasya ceṣṭā hi janamejaya / HV_App.I,31.3656 /
GE07hv_apppu:15686: proktā te pṛcchate rājan kiṃ bhūyaḥ śrotum icchasi // HV_App.I,31.3657 //
GE07hv_apppu:15695: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:15696: [k: After 107.18, Dn D6 Bom. Poona eds G(ed.) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15697: tataḥ prabhṛti sā devī kāmamohaṃ gatā vibho / HV_App.I,32.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15698: devyās tu vacanaṃ smṛtvā saṃsmarantī patiṃ tadā / HV_App.I,32.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:15699: nidrāṃ na bhajate rātrau na divā bhojanaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,32.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:15700: smarantī patibhāvaṃ sā vilalāpa nṛpātmajā // HV_App.I,32.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:15701: nindantī śaśinaṃ nāke sevatī na ca candanam / HV_App.I,32.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:15702: sā bālā mohitā rājan kāmena paripīḍitā // HV_App.I,32.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:15703: upacaryanti tāṃ sukhyo vijvarām api sajvarām / HV_App.I,32.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:15704: tapyate hṛdayaṃ tasyā lepitaṃ candanena ca // HV_App.I,32.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:15705: kapole pāṇḍimā cihnaṃ netre jalasamanvite / HV_App.I,32.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:15706: jṛmbhaṇaṃ ca tathā svāpo dehe tasyā vyavardhata // HV_App.I,32.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:15708: kṣipanti sakhyo hṛdaye pīḍite manmathāgninā // HV_App.I,32.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:15709: vyajanāni prakurvanti pṛcchanti ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,32.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:15710: kā vyathā kiṃ śarīriṃ te kim idaṃ tava bhāmini // HV_App.I,32.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:15711: kiṃ tubhyaṃ rocate devi tad ākhyāhi varānane / HV_App.I,32.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:15712: kasmād idaṃ samutpannaṃ duḥkhasādhyaṃ manorame // HV_App.I,32.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:15713: tvanmanonugataṃ vākyaṃ vadanty etās tu sārikāḥ / HV_App.I,32.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:15714: śukā nīlatamāḥ subhru paṭhanti hi pumān iva // HV_App.I,32.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:15715: prahlādajananaṃ vākyaṃ kimarthaṃ nādya bhāṣase / HV_App.I,32.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:15716: tava tāto mahāvīro devānām api durjayaḥ // HV_App.I,32.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:15717: tasyāgre tiṣṭhate ko 'pi na bhūmau varavarṇini / HV_App.I,32.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:15718: baleḥ putro mahāvīro bāṇo hi duratikramaḥ // HV_App.I,32.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:15720: yatra saṃtiṣṭhate devaḥ śūlahasto maheśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,32.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:15721: putro 'yamiti jānīhi girijāṃ yo 'bravīd dharaḥ / HV_App.I,32.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:15722: bāṇaṃ prati mahādevas tava tātam uṣe śṛṇu // HV_App.I,32.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:15723: kā vyatheti mukhe cedaṃ nāsāgraṃ ca virājate / HV_App.I,32.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:15725: saṃpūrṇacandrapratimaṃ mukhaṃ candro yathā ghane / HV_App.I,32.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:15726: na śobhite tu vicchāyaṃ kimarthaṃ kāraṇaṃ vada // HV_App.I,32.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:15727: śvāsān muñcasi bāle tvaṃ na ratiṃ yāsi bhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,32.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:15728: gṛhāṇa bhojanaṃ divyaṃ yat te manasi vartate // HV_App.I,32.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:15729: tāmbūlaṃ rocate pūrvaṃ tat kimarthaṃ na gṛhyate / HV_App.I,32.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:15730: miṣṭāni yāni vastūni durlabhānītarair janaiḥ / HV_App.I,32.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:15731: gṛhāṇa devi uttiṣṭha vada pīḍāṃ śarīrajām // HV_App.I,32.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:15732: iti kolāhalaṃ śrutvā uṣā veśmasamudbhavam / HV_App.I,32.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:15733: dāsībhiḥ kīrtitaṃ tatra mātur agre pṛthak pṛthak // HV_App.I,32.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:15734: rājaputrī yadā devi samāyātā gṛhe satī / HV_App.I,32.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:15736: ato dāsījanā devi vadāmas tvāṃ vayaṃ janāḥ / HV_App.I,32.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:15737: ko mohaḥ kim idaṃ maunaṃ kaḥ svāpo mlānatā katham / HV_App.I,32.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:15738: vicārya bhiṣajo devi diśyantāṃ kaṣṭaśāntaye // HV_App.I,32.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:15740: tat kathaṃ sahate devi vyādhibhāraṃ varānane // HV_App.I,32.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:15741: iti śrutvā tadā devī satvarā haṃsagāminī / HV_App.I,32.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:15742: prāpya deśam uṣā yatra kim idaṃ kaṣṭalakṣaṇam // HV_App.I,32.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:15744: spṛṣṭvāṅgulīr anāyāsaṃ sphoṭayām āsa bhāvinī // HV_App.I,32.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:15745: kim asti tava kalyāṇi kā vyathā tava vartate / HV_App.I,32.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:15746: ete vaidyāḥ samāgatya pṛcchanti bhavatīṃ hi tat // HV_App.I,32.50 //
