GE07hv_apppu:15748: jalakrīḍāṃ gatā tatra rājaputrī sakhīgaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,32.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:15749: pārvatyāḥ krīḍitaṃ tatra jānīmaḥ śramasaṃbhavam // HV_App.I,32.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:15750: śramād glāniḥ samutpannā jṛmbhaṇaṃ ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,32.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:15751: svāpaś ca jāyate tena mā bhayaṃ kartum arhasi // HV_App.I,32.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:15753: hṛdaye nihitaṃ vaidyāś candanaṃ himasaṃyutam / HV_App.I,32.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:15754: amātyāḥ kim idaṃ śīghraṃ kim idaṃ budbudāyate // HV_App.I,32.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:15755: atidāho mahān svedaḥ pipāsā na bubhukṣate / HV_App.I,32.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:15756: pralāpa eva kiṃ tasyāṃ śāstrato brūta niścitam // HV_App.I,32.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:15759: rūpeṇāpratimā devī rājaputrī ca bhāvinī / HV_App.I,32.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:15760: dṛṣṭipātaḥ kṛtas tābhis tena putryāṃ vyathābhavat // HV_App.I,32.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:15761: rakṣāmantrais tathā pītaiḥ sarṣapais tāṃ kumārikām / HV_App.I,32.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:15762: pānīyair abhiṣekeṇa parā śāntir bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,32.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:15763: ity uktvā bhiṣajaḥ sarve nivṛttā nṛpaveśmataḥ / HV_App.I,32.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:15764: sūcayanta punaḥ sarve kāmābhiprāyajāṃ vyathām // HV_App.I,32.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:15765: mātṛpṛṣṭā varārohā cirakālam uvāca sā / HV_App.I,32.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:15766: lajjāvatī mahābhāgā mātaraṃ rudatī bhṛśam // HV_App.I,32.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:15767: mātar na rocate nityaṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ na ca bhojanam / HV_App.I,32.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:15768: na cāpy utsavakaṃ mātaḥ sadāhaṃ hṛdayaṃ śṛṇu / HV_App.I,32.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:15769: ity uktvā virarāmātha hy uṣā nārī varāṅganā // HV_App.I,32.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:15770: sarvābhiḥ strībhir ārabdham anyonyaṃ mukhavīkṣaṇam / HV_App.I,32.74 /
GE07hv_apppu:15771: lajjānukāri nārīṇāṃ yauvanaṃ hi bhaved iti // HV_App.I,32.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:15772: iyaṃ ca rājakanyā hi bhartṛyogyā kim ucyate / HV_App.I,32.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:15773: pituḥ prasādān mātuś ca prāpnuyāt sadṛśaṃ varam // HV_App.I,32.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:15776: tatrasthāḥ paramā nāryaś citreṇa paramādbhutāḥ // HV_App.I,32.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:15784: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:15785: [k: After the ref. of adhy. 108, all Mss. (ex. Ś1 Ñ1) ins.: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15786: atha dvāravatīṃ prāpya sthitā sā bhavanāntike / HV_App.I,33.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15788: atha cintayatī sā tu buddhim vṛttiviniścitām / HV_App.I,33.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:15789: nāradaṃ dadṛśe tatra dhyāyantam udake munim // HV_App.I,33.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:15790: [k: After line 4, D6 T1.2 G M ins.: :k]
GE07hv_apppu:15792: taṃ dṛṣṭvā citralekhā tu harṣeṇotphullalocanā / HV_App.I,33.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:15794: nāradas tv āśiṣaṃ dattvā citralehkām athābravīt / HV_App.I,33.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:15795: kim artham iha saṃprāptā śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,33.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:15796: devarṣim atha taṃ divyaṃ nāradaṃ lokapūjitam / HV_App.I,33.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:15798: bhagavañ śrūyatāṃ vākyaṃ dautyenāham ihāgatā / HV_App.I,33.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:15799: aniruddhaṃ mune netuṃ yadarthaṃ ca śṛṇuṣva me // HV_App.I,33.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:15800: nagare śoṇitapure bāṇo nāma mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,33.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:15801: tasya kanyā varārohā nāmnā coṣeti viśrutā / HV_App.I,33.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:15802: bhagavan sānuraktā ca prādyumnau puruṣottame // HV_App.I,33.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:15803: devyā varātisargeṇa tasyā bhartā vinirmitaḥ / HV_App.I,33.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:15804: taṃ ca netuṃ samāyātā tatra siddhiṃ vidhatsva me // HV_App.I,33.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:15805: mayā nīte 'niruddhe tu nagaraṃ śoṇitāhvayam / HV_App.I,33.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:15807: avaśyaṃ bhavitā caiva kṛṣṇena saha saṃgamaḥ / HV_App.I,33.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:15808: bāṇasya sumahān saṃkhye divyo hi sa mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,33.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:15809: na ca śakto 'niruddhas taṃ jetuṃ yuddhe mahāsuram / HV_App.I,33.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:15810: sahasrabāhum āyāntaṃ jayet kṛṣṇo mahābhujaḥ // HV_App.I,33.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:15811: bhagavat saṃnikarṣeṇa siddhaṃ me kāryam īhitam / HV_App.I,33.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:15812: [k: After line 24, K2 D2 ins. (D2 om. line 2):k]
GE07hv_apppu:15813: hṛtaḥ pravṛttiṃ kṛtvā me so 'niruddhaḥ kathaṃ bhavet / **HV_App.I,33.24**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:15815: kathaṃ hi puṇḍarīkākṣo jñāpito 'sau bhaved idam // HV_App.I,33.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:15816: tvat prasādāc ca bhagavan na me kṛṣṇād bhayaṃ bhavet / HV_App.I,33.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:15817: sa hi tattvārthadṛṣṭis tu aniruddhaḥ kathaṃ hriyet // HV_App.I,33.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:15818: kruddho hi sa mahābāhus trailokyam api nirdahet / HV_App.I,33.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:15819: pautraśokābhisaṃtaptaḥ śāpena sa daheta mām // HV_App.I,33.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:15820: etāv arthau hi bhagavaṃś cintituṃ vai tvam arhasi / HV_App.I,33.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:15821: yathā hy uṣā labhet kāntaṃ mama caivābhayaṃ bhavet // HV_App.I,33.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:15822: ity evam ukto bhagavāṃś citralekhāṃ sa nāradaḥ / HV_App.I,33.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:15823: uvāca ca śubhaṃ vākyaṃ mā bhais tvaṃ samayaṃ śṛṇu // HV_App.I,33.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:15824: tvayā nīte 'niruddhe tu kanyāveśma praveśite / HV_App.I,33.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:15825: yadi yuddhaṃ bhavet tatra smartavyo 'haṃ śucismite // HV_App.I,33.35 //
GE07hv_apppu:15826: mamaiṣa paramaḥ kāmo yuddhaṃ draṣṭuṃ manorame / HV_App.I,33.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:15827: yad dṛṣṭvā ca bhavet prītiḥ pravṛttiś ca dṛḍhā bhavet // HV_App.I,33.37 //

GE07hv_apppu:16120: suparṇa sukṛtena tvāṃ śape pannaganāśana // HV_App.I,36.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16121: dāsītvāc ca tvayā mātā mokṣitaikākinā purā / HV_App.I,36.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:16122: pakṣavikṣepam āśritya hatā yodhās tvayā purā // HV_App.I,36.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:16123: bhavān suragaṇān sarvān pṛṣṭham āropya vikramāt / HV_App.I,36.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:16124: gacchase hy agamān deśān vijayaś ca tavāsrayāṭ // HV_App.I,36.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16125: gurutvān merutulyas tvaṃ laghutvāt pavanopamaḥ / HV_App.I,36.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:16126: bhute bhavye bhaviṣye ca na te tulyo 'sti vikrame // HV_App.I,36.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16130: atyadbhutam idaṃ vākyaṃ tava kṛṣṇa mahābhuja / HV_App.I,36.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:16131: tvatprasādāt tu vijayaḥ sarvatra mama keśava // HV_App.I,36.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:16132: dhanyo 'smy anugṛhīto 'smi saṃs tavān madhusūdana / HV_App.I,36.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:16133: stotavyas tvaṃ mayā kṛṣṇa stauṣi māṃ tvaṃ mahābhuja // HV_App.I,36.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16135: amoghadarśanas tvaṃ hi varārthiṣu varapradaḥ // HV_App.I,36.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:16138: dhanurdharaś cakradharo bhavāñ śaṅkhadharo mahān / HV_App.I,36.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:16139: bhavān pūrveṣu deheṣu khyāto bhūmidharaḥ prabho // HV_App.I,36.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:16140: lāṅgalī musalī cakrī devakītanayo bhavān / HV_App.I,36.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:16141: cāṇūramathanaś caiva gopriyaḥ kaṃsahā bhavān // HV_App.I,36.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:16143: mallapriyo mahāmallo mahāpuruṣa ity api // HV_App.I,36.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:16145: brahmaṇyaś ca vareṇyaś ca bhavān dāmodharaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,36.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:16147: asilomnaś ca hantā ca tathā rāvaṇanāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,36.54 //
GE07hv_apppu:16151: varuṇaś ca bhavān khyāto bhavāṃś ca saridudbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,36.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:16152: bhavān khaḍgadharo dhanvī dhanurdharavaro mahān / HV_App.I,36.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:16153: dāśārha iti vikhyāto mahādhanvā dhanuḥ priyaḥ // HV_App.I,36.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:16154: govinda iti vikhyāta udadhis tvaṃ ca suvrata / HV_App.I,36.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:16155: ākāśaś ca tapaś caiva samudramathano bhavān // HV_App.I,36.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:16156: bhavān svargo bahuphalo bhavān svargadharo mahān / HV_App.I,36.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:16157: tvam eva ca mahāmegho bījaniṣpattir eva ca // HV_App.I,36.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:16159: bhavān kāmapradaś caiva kāmaḥ sarvadhanurdharaḥ // HV_App.I,36.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:16160: saṃvarto vartanaś caiva pralayo nilayo mahān / HV_App.I,36.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:16162: īśas tvaṃ ca mahādeva asaṃkhyeyaguṇānvitaḥ / HV_App.I,36.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:16163: stotum icchasi māṃ deva stotavyas tvaṃ yadūttama // HV_App.I,36.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:16164: cakṣuṣā ye tvayā ghorāḥ prāṇinas tu nirīkṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,36.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:16166: ye tvayā parayā prītyā prāṇino vai nirīkṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,36.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:16167: iha ca pretya cāpāpāḥ sarve te svargagāminaḥ // HV_App.I,36.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:16168: eṣa te 'haṃ mahābāho vaśagaḥ śāsane sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,36.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:16171: jayaśabdaṃ tataḥ kṛtvā garuḍaḥ prāha keśavam / HV_App.I,36.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:16172: ayam asmi sthito vīra āruhasva mahābala // HV_App.I,36.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:16173: tataḥ kaṇṭhe pariṣvajya mādhavo garuḍaṃ tataḥ / HV_App.I,36.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:16184: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:16185: [k: After 112.32, K Ñ2.3 V B D T4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16186: etasminn antare tatra rudrapāriṣadā raṇe / HV_App.I,37.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16188: evaṃ sa śūlabhṛt tatra punar yuddhaṃ pracakrame / **HV_App.I,37.1**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16190: sarvāṃs tu nidrāvaśagān kṛtvā makaraketumān / HV_App.I,37.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16191: dānavān nāśayat tatra śarajālena vīryavān / HV_App.I,37.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16194: jvālā prādurabhūd vaktrād dahantīva diśo daśa // HV_App.I,37.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:16195: tatas tu dharaṇī devī pīḍyamānā mahātmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,37.8 /
GE07hv_apppu:16200: aviṣahyam imaṃ bhāraṃ cintayasva pitāmaha / HV_App.I,37.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:16201: laghvībhūtā yathā deva dhārayeyaṃ carācaram // HV_App.I,37.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:16202: tatas tu kāsyapīṃ devīṃ pratyuvāca pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,37.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:16203: muhūrtaṃ dhārayātmānam āśu laghvī bhaviṣyasi // HV_App.I,37.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:16204: dṛṣṭvā tu bhagavān brahmā rudraṃ vacanam abravīt / HV_App.I,37.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:16205: sṛṣṭo mahāsuravadhaḥ kiṃ bhūyaḥ parirakṣase // HV_App.I,37.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:16206: na ca yuddhaṃ mahābāho kṛṣṇena tava rocate / HV_App.I,37.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:16207: na ca budhyasi kṛṣṇaṃ tvam ātmānaṃ hi dvidhākṛtam // HV_App.I,37.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:16208: tataḥ śarīrayogād dhi bhagavān avyayaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,37.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:16209: praviśya paśyate kṛtsnāṃs trīṃ lokān sacarācarān // HV_App.I,37.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:16210: [k: After line 21, Ñ2.3 V B Ds D5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16212: [k: Ñ2.3 V B Ds D5.6 cont.; K1 D1-3 ins. after 1375* [sic] :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16213: praviśya yogaṃ yogātmā varāṃs tān anucintayan / **HV_App.I,37.21**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16214: dvāravatyāṃ yad uktaṃ ca tad anusmṛtya sarvaśaḥ / **HV_App.I,37.21**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:16215: jagāda nottaraṃ kiṃ cin nivṛtto 'sau bhavat tadā // **HV_App.I,37.21**3:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:16216: ātmānaṃ kṛṣṇadehasthaṃ paśyate hy ekayonijam / HV_App.I,37.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:16217: tato niḥsṛtya rudras tu nyastavādo 'bhavan mṛdhe // HV_App.I,37.23 //
GE07hv_apppu:16218: brahmāṇaṃ cābravīd rudro na yotsye bhagavann iti / HV_App.I,37.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:16219: kṛṣṇena saha saṃgrāme laghvī bhavatu medinī // HV_App.I,37.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:16220: tataḥ kṛṣṇo 'tha rudraś ca pariṣvajya parasparam / HV_App.I,37.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:16221: parāṃ prītim upāgamya saṃgrāmād apajagmatuḥ // HV_App.I,37.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:16223: etadarthe purā rājan mārkaṇḍeyaṃ tu nāradaḥ / **HV_App.I,37.27**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16224: na ca tau paśyate kaścid yoginau yogam āgatau / HV_App.I,37.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:16225: eko brahmā tathā kṛtvā paśyaṃl lokapitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,37.29 //
GE07hv_apppu:16227: pārśvathaṃ paripapraccha jñātvā vai dīrghadarśinam // HV_App.I,37.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:16228: mandarasya gireḥ pārśve nalinyāṃ bhavakeśavau / HV_App.I,37.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:16229: rātrau svapnāntare brahman mayā dṛṣṭau harācyutau // HV_App.I,37.33 //
GE07hv_apppu:16230: hariṃ ca hararūpeṇa haraṃ ca harirūpiṇam / HV_App.I,37.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:16233: garuḍasthaṃ cāpi haraṃ hariṃ ca vṛṣabhadhvajam // HV_App.I,37.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:16234: vismayo me mahān brahman dṛṣṭvā tat paramādbhutam / HV_App.I,37.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:16235: etad ācakṣva bhagavan yāthātathyena suvrata // HV_App.I,37.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:16238: yathāntaraṃ na paśyāmi tena tau diśataḥ śivam // HV_App.I,37.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:16240: tad eva te pravakśyāmi rūpaṃ hariharātmakam // HV_App.I,37.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:16241: yo vai viṣṇuḥ sa vai rudro yo rudraḥ sa pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,37.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:16242: ekā mūrtis trayo devā rudraviṣṇupitāmahāḥ // HV_App.I,37.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:16244: ardhanārīśvarās te tu vrataṃ tīvraṃ samāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,37.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:16245: yathā jale jalaṃ kṣiptaṃ jalam eva tu tad bhavet / HV_App.I,37.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:16246: rudraṃ viṣṇuḥ praviṣṭas tu tathā rudramayo bhavet // HV_App.I,37.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:16247: agnim agniḥ praviṣṭas tu agnir eva yathā bhavet / HV_App.I,37.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:16248: tathā viṣṇuṃ praviṣtas tu rudro viṣṇumayo bhavet // HV_App.I,37.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:16249: rudram agnimayaṃ vidyād viṣṇuḥ somātmakaḥ smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,37.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:16251: kartārau cāpahartārau sthāvarasya carasya ca / HV_App.I,37.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:16255: [k: After line 57, Ñ2.3 V1.2 B1.2 Ds1 T4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16256: etau tau ca pravaktārāv etau tau ca prabhāmayau / **HV_App.I,37.57**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16257: [k: Ñ2 V1.2 B1.2 Ds1 T4 cont.; V3 Ds2 D6 ins. after line 57:k]
GE07hv_apppu:16258: jagataḥ pālakāv etāv etau sṣṛṭikarau smṛtau / **HV_App.I,37.57**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16259: ete caiva pravarṣanti bhānti vānti sṛjanti ca / HV_App.I,37.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:16260: etat parataraṃ guhyaṃ kathitaṃ te pitāmaha // HV_App.I,37.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:16261: yaś cainaṃ paṭhate nityaṃ yaś cainaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ / HV_App.I,37.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:16263: devau hariharau stoṣye brahmaṇā saha saṃgatau / HV_App.I,37.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:16264: etau ca paramau devau jagataḥ prabhavāpyayau // HV_App.I,37.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:16265: rudrasya paramo viṣṇur viṣṇoś ca paramaḥ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,37.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:16266: eka eva dvidhā bhūto loke carati nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,37.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:16267: na vinā śaṃkaraṃ viṣṇur na vinā keśavaṃ śivaḥ / HV_App.I,37.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:16268: tasmād ekatvam āyātau rudropendrau tu tau purā // HV_App.I,37.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:16269: namo rudrāya kṛṣṇāya namaḥ saṃhatacāriṇe / HV_App.I,37.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:16270: namaḥ ṣaḍardhanetrāya dvinetrāya ca vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:16271: namaḥ piṅgalanetrāya padmanetrāya vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:16273: namo dharaṇīdharāya ganṅgādharāya vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.73 //
GE07hv_apppu:16275: namaḥ kapālamālāya vanamālāya vai namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.75 //
GE07hv_apppu:16276: namas triśūlahastāya cakrahastāya vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:16277: namaḥ kanakadaṇḍāya namas te vratadaṇḍine // HV_App.I,37.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:16278: namaś carmanivāsāya namas te pītavāsase / HV_App.I,37.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:16279: namo 'stu lakṣmīpataye umāyāḥ pataye namaḥ // HV_App.I,37.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:16282: namaḥ śmaśānavāsāya namas tv āśramavāsine / HV_App.I,37.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:16284: namo 'stv anekarūpāya bahurūpāya vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.84 /
GE07hv_apppu:16285: namaḥ pralayakartre ca namaḥ sṛṣṭikarāya ca // HV_App.I,37.85 //
GE07hv_apppu:16287: virūpākṣāya devāya namaḥ saumyekṣaṇāya ca // HV_App.I,37.87 //
GE07hv_apppu:16290: namaḥ suraripughnāya tripuraghnāya vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:16292: [k: Ñ2 ins. after line 90; K1 D3 after line 94 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16296: namaḥ sahasraśīrṣāya bahuśīrṣāya vai namaḥ / HV_App.I,37.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:16298: namas te bhagavan viṣṇo namas te bhagavañ śiva / HV_App.I,37.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:16299: namas te bhagavan deva namas te devapūjita // HV_App.I,37.97 //
GE07hv_apppu:16300: namas te sāmabhir gīta namas te yajubhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,37.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:16301: namas te suraśatrughna namas te 'surapūjita // HV_App.I,37.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:16302: namas te karmiṇāṃ karma namo 'mitaparākrama / HV_App.I,37.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:16303: hṛṣīkeśa namas te 'stu svarṇakeśa namo 'stu te // HV_App.I,37.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:16304: imaṃ stavaṃ yo rudrasya viṣṇoś caiva mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,37.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:16305: sametya ṛṣibhiḥ sarvaiḥ stutau tau sumahātmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,37.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:16306: vyāsena devaviduṣā nāradena ca dhīmatā / HV_App.I,37.104 /
GE07hv_apppu:16307: bhāradvājena gārgyeṇa viśvāmitreṇa vai tathā / HV_App.I,37.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:16308: [k: After line 104, Ñ2 B2 D6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16310: agastyena pulastyena dhaumyena ca mahātmanā // HV_App.I,37.106 //
GE07hv_apppu:16311: yaś cedaṃ paṭhate stotraṃ nityaṃ hariharātmakam / HV_App.I,37.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:16312: arogo balavāṃś caiva jāyate nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,37.108 /
GE07hv_apppu:16313: śriyaṃ ca labhate nityaṃ na ca svargān nivartate // HV_App.I,37.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:16314: aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā vindati satpatim / HV_App.I,37.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:16315: gurviṇī śṛṇute yā tu varaṃ putraṃ prasūyate // HV_App.I,37.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:16316: rākṣasāś ca piśācāś ca bhūtāni ca vināyakāḥ / HV_App.I,37.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:16317: bhayaṃ tatra na kurvanti yatrāyaṃ paṭhyate stavaḥ // HV_App.I,37.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:16325: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:16327: 38 K2 Ñ2 V2.3 B Dn Ds D3-6 G4.5 ins. after 113.5;
GE07hv_apppu:16331: tato mahābalaṃ devaṃ balabhadraṃ yaśasvinam / HV_App.I,38.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16333: mādhavaṃ ca mahātmānam abhivādya kṛtāñjaliḥ / HV_App.I,38.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16335: tato makaraketuṃ ca citrabāṇadharaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,38.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:16337: sakhīgaṇavṛtā caiva sā coṣā kulanandinī / HV_App.I,38.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:16338: balaṃ cātibalaṃ caiva vāsudevaṃ sudurjayam // HV_App.I,38.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:16339: asaṃkhyātagatiṃ caiva suparṇam abhivādya ca / HV_App.I,38.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:16341: tataḥ śakrasya vacanān nāradaḥ paramadyutiḥ / HV_App.I,38.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16342: vāsudevasamīpaṃ sa prahasan punar āgataḥ // HV_App.I,38.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:16343: vardhāpayati taṃ devaṃ govindaṃ śatrusūdanam / HV_App.I,38.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:16346: āśīrbhir vardhayitvā ca devarṣiḥ kṛṣṇam abravīt // HV_App.I,38.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:16347: aniruddhasya vīryākhyo vivāhaḥ kriyatāṃ vibho / HV_App.I,38.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:16348: jambūlamālikāṃ draṣṭuṃ śraddhā hi mama jāyate // HV_App.I,38.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:16349: tataḥ prahasitāḥ sarve nāradasya vacaḥśravāt / HV_App.I,38.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:16350: kṛṣṇaḥ provāca bhagavān kriyatāmāśu māciram // HV_App.I,38.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:16351: etasminn antare tāta kumbhāṇḍaḥ samupasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,38.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:16352: vaivāhikāṃs tu saṃbhārān gṛhya kṛṣṇaṃ namasya ca // HV_App.I,38.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:16354: kṛṣṇa kṛṣṇa mahābāho bhava tvam abhayapradaḥ / HV_App.I,38.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:16355: śaraṇāgato 'smi te deva prasīdaiṣo 'ñjalis tava // HV_App.I,38.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:16356: nāradasya vacaḥ śrutvā sarvaṃ prāg eva so 'cyutaḥ / HV_App.I,38.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:16357: abhayaṃ yacchate tasmai kumbhāṇḍāya mahātmane // HV_App.I,38.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:16358: kumbhāṇḍa mantriṇāṃ śreṣṭha prīto 'smi tava suvrata / HV_App.I,38.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:16359: sukṛtaṃ te vijānāmi rāṣṭriko 'stu bhavān iha // HV_App.I,38.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16360: sajñātipakṣaḥ susukhī nirvṛto 'stu bhavān iha / HV_App.I,38.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:16361: rājyaṃ ca te mayā dattaṃ ciraṃ jīva mamāśrayāt // HV_App.I,38.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:16362: evaṃ dattvā rājyam asmai kumbhāṇḍāya mahātmane / HV_App.I,38.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:16363: vivāham akarot tatra so 'niruddhasya buddhimān // HV_App.I,38.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16364: tatas tu bhagavān vahniḥ svayaṃ tatra upasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,38.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:16365: vivāho hy aniruddhasya nakṣatre ca śubhe 'bhavat // HV_App.I,38.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16366: tato 'psarogaṇās tatra kautukaṃ kartum udyatāḥ / HV_App.I,38.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:16367: snātaḥ svalaṃkṛtas tatra so 'niruddhaḥ sa bhāryayā // HV_App.I,38.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:16368: tataḥ snigdhaiḥ śubhair vākyair gandharvāś ca jagus tadā / HV_App.I,38.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:16369: nṛtyanty apsarasaś caiva vivāham upaśobhayan // HV_App.I,38.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:16370: tato nirvartayitvā tu vivāhaṃ śatrusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,38.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:16371: aniruddhasya suprājñaḥ sarvair devagaṇair vṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,38.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16372: āmantrya varadaṃ tatra rudraṃ devanamaskṛtam / HV_App.I,38.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:16373: cakāra gamane buddhiṃ kṛṣṇaḥ parapuraṃjayaḥ // HV_App.I,38.42 //
GE07hv_apppu:16375: kambhāṇḍo vacanaṃ prāha prāñjalir madhusūdanam // HV_App.I,38.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:16376: [k: K Ñ2.3 V B1.3 Dn Ds D2-6 T1.2.4 G1.4.5 ins. after line 44; G3 after line 39 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16378: bāṇasya gāvas tiṣṭhanti haste tu varuṇasya vai / HV_App.I,38.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:16379: yāsām amṛtakalpaṃ vai kṣīraṃ kṣarati mādhava / HV_App.I,38.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:16380: tat pītvātibalaś caiva naro bhavati durjayaḥ // HV_App.I,38.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:16381: kumbhāṇḍenaivam ākhyāte hariḥ prītamanās tadā / HV_App.I,38.48 /
GE07hv_apppu:16382: gamanāya matiṃ cakre gantavyam iti niścitaḥ // HV_App.I,38.49 //
GE07hv_apppu:16383: tatas tu bhagavān brahmā vardhāpya sa tu keśavam / HV_App.I,38.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:16384: jagāma brahmalokaṃ sa vṛtaḥ svabhavanālayaiḥ // HV_App.I,38.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:16385: indro marudgaṇaiś caiva dvārakābhimukhaṃ yayau / HV_App.I,38.52 /
GE07hv_apppu:16388: devadeva mahāyuddhe jayet tvāṃ ko nu sattamam // **HV_App.I,38.53**2:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16389: śakto na pramukhe sthātuṃ sākṣād api śatakratuḥ / **HV_App.I,38.53**2:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16390: āroha garuḍaṃ tūrṇaṃ gacchāmo dvārakāṃ purīm // **HV_App.I,38.53**2:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:16391: yataḥ kṛṣṇas tataḥ sarve gacchanti jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,38.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:16393: dvārakābhimukhī soṣā devyā prasthāpitā yayau // HV_App.I,38.55 //
GE07hv_apppu:16394: tato balaś ca kṛṣṇaś ca pradyumnaś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,38.56 /
GE07hv_apppu:16395: ārūḍhavanto garuḍam aniruddhaś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,38.57 //
GE07hv_apppu:16396: prasthitaś ca sa tejasvī garuḍaḥ pakṣiṇāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,38.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:16397: unmūlayaṃs tarugaṇān kampayaṃś cāpi medinīm // HV_App.I,38.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:16398: ākulāś ca diśaḥ sarvā reṇudhvastam ivāmbaram / HV_App.I,38.60 /
GE07hv_apppu:16407: and corrected by James L. Fitzgerald. Fall 2004 and Spring 2005. :h]
GE07hv_apppu:16411: K3.4 Ñ2 V B Dn Ds D2-6 T2 G1 after the addl. colophon (ins. after *1536): :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16413: athāhuko mahābāhuḥ kṛṣṇaṃ prāha mahādyutim / HV_App.I,39.1 /

GE07hv_apppu:16418: uṣāpi ca mahābhāgā sakhībhiḥ parivāritā / HV_App.I,39.5 /

GE07hv_apppu:16421: praveśyatāṃ mahābhāgā vaidarbhīṃ vardhayet punaḥ // HV_App.I,39.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:16422: sāmbāya dīyatāṃ rāmā kumbhāṇḍaduhitā śubhā / HV_App.I,39.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:16423: śeṣāś ca kanyā dīyantāṃ kumārāṇāṃ yathākramam // HV_App.I,39.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:16424: vartate cotsavas tatra aniruddhasya veśmani / HV_App.I,39.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16425: gṛhe śrīdhanvinaś caiva śubhas tatra pravartate // HV_App.I,39.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:16426: vādayanti pure tatra nāryo madavaśaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,39.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:16427: nṛtyante cāparās tatra gāyanti ca tathāparāḥ // HV_App.I,39.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:16428: kāścit pramuditās tatra kāścid anyonyam abruvan / HV_App.I,39.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:16430: abhiyānti tato 'nyonyaṃ kāś cin madavaśāt svayam / HV_App.I,39.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:16431: krīḍanti kāścid akṣais tu harṣād utphullalocanāḥ // HV_App.I,39.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:16432: māyūraṃ ratham āruhya sakhībhiḥ parivāritā / HV_App.I,39.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:16433: uṣā saṃpreṣitā devyā rudrāṇyā pratigṛhyatām // HV_App.I,39.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:16434: iyaṃ caiva kulaślāghyā nāmnoṣā nāma sundarī / HV_App.I,39.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:16435: bāṇaputrī tava vadhūḥ pratigṛhṇīṣva bhāminīm // HV_App.I,39.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:16436: tataḥ pratigṛhītā sā strībhir ācāramaṅgalaiḥ / HV_App.I,39.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:16437: praveśitā ca sā veśma aniruddhasya śobhanā // HV_App.I,39.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:16438: devakī revatī caiva rukmiṇy atha vidarbhajā / HV_App.I,39.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:16440: [k: Ñ3 V1.3 B2.3 D6 ins. after line 26; Ñ2 B1 Ds2 after line 22 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16442: vadhūr vardhasi diṣṭyā tvam aniruddhasya darśanāt // **HV_App.I,39.26**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16443: tatas tūryapraṇādais tā varanāryaḥ śubhānanāḥ / HV_App.I,39.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:16444: kriyāṃ cārebhire kartum uṣā ca gṛhasaṃsthitā // HV_App.I,39.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16448: āpṛcchya ca sakhīvargam uṣāṃ ca tridivaṃ gatā // HV_App.I,39.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16449: gatāsu tāsu sarvāsu sakhīṣv asurasundarī / HV_App.I,39.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:16450: māyāvatyā gṛhaṃ nītā prathamaṃ sā nimantritā // HV_App.I,39.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:16451: tāsāṃ pradyumnagṛhiṇī snuṣāṃ dṛṣṭvā sumadhyamām / HV_App.I,39.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:16452: vāsobhir annapānaiś ca pūjayām āsa sundarīm // HV_App.I,39.36 //
GE07hv_apppu:16453: tataḥ krameṇa sarvās tā vadhūm ūṣāṃ yadustriyaḥ / HV_App.I,39.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:16454: ācāram anupaśyantyaḥ svavarma iti vavrire // HV_App.I,39.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:16455: etat te sarvamākhyātaṃ mayā kurukulodvaha / HV_App.I,39.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:16456: yathā bāṇo jitaḥ saṃkhye jīvanmuktaś ca viṣṇunā // HV_App.I,39.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16464: K Ñ2.3 V B D T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 after appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:16468: bhagavan kena vidhinā śrotavyaṃ bhārataṃ budhaiḥ / HV_App.I,40.1 /

GE07hv_apppu:16472: prajānāṃ patibhiḥ sārdhaṃ devānām ṛṣibhiḥ saha / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:16474: daityānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca yakṣāṇām atha pakṣiṇām / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16480: vicitrāś ca kathāyogā janma cāgryam anuttamam / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:16481: tat kathyamānam asmākaṃ tvayā vai ślakṣṇayā girā / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16484: paurāṇe kiṃ phalaṃ cāsya tad bhavān vaktum arhati / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:14 /
GE07hv_apppu:16486: parvaṇāṃ śravaṇavidhiṃ pāraṇeṣu ca yat phalam / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:15 /
GE07hv_apppu:16487: janamejayena yat pṛṣṭaṃ tasminn avabhṛte kratau / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:16 /
GE07hv_apppu:16491: śrutvākhyānam idaṃ samyak pāvanaṃ vai dvijottama / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:19 /
GE07hv_apppu:16492: ato mahattaraṃ bhūyo vakṣyāmi vidhim uttamam / **HV_App.I,40.1**1:20 /
GE07hv_apppu:16493: phalaṃ kiṃ ke ca devāś ca pūjyā vai pāraṇeṣv iha // HV_App.I,40.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:16494: deyaṃ samāpte bhagavan kiṃ ca parvaṇi parvaṇi / HV_App.I,40.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16495: vācakaḥ kīdṛśaś cātra eṣṭavyas tad bravīhi me // HV_App.I,40.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:16497: śṛṇu rājan vidhim imaṃ phalaṃ yac cāpi bhāratāt / HV_App.I,40.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:16498: [k: After the ref. D6 T1.2 G1.3.5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:16499: samyak pṛṣṭo 'smi rājendra tvayā buddhimatāṃ vara / **HV_App.I,40.4**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16500: mayāpi bhagavān vyāsaḥ pṛṣṭo vedavidāṃ vara / **HV_App.I,40.4**2:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:16501: pṛṣṭena tu mayā guhyaṃ vidhir ukto mahātmanā / **HV_App.I,40.4**2:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:16502: tathā vakṣ[y]āmi te samyak samādhāya punaḥ punaḥ / **HV_App.I,40.4**2:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16503: śrutād bhavati rājendra yat tvaṃ mām anupṛcchasi // HV_App.I,40.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:16504: divi devā mahīpāla krīḍārtham avaniṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,40.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:16505: kṛtvā kāryam idaṃ caiva tataś ca divam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,40.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:16506: hanta yat te pravakṣyāmi tac chṛṇuṣva samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,40.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:16507: ṛṣīṇāṃ devatānāṃ ca saṃbhavaṃ vasudhātale // HV_App.I,40.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:16508: vasurudrās tathā sādhyā viśve devāś ca śāśvatāḥ / HV_App.I,40.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:16509: ādityāś cāśvinau devau lokapālāḥ saharṣibhiḥ // HV_App.I,40.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:16510: guhyakāś ca sagandharvā nāgā vidyādharās tathā / HV_App.I,40.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:16511: siddhā dharmaḥ svayaṃbhūś ca muniḥ kātyāyano varaḥ // HV_App.I,40.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:16512: girayaḥ sāgarā nadyas tathaivāpsarasāṃ gaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,40.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:16513: grahāḥ saṃvatsarāś caiva ayanāny ṛtavas tathā // HV_App.I,40.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:16514: sthāvaraṃ jaṃgamaṃ caiva jagat sarvaṃ surāsuram / HV_App.I,40.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:16515: bhārate bharataśreṣṭha ekastham iha dṛśyate // HV_App.I,40.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:16517: kṛtvāpi pātakaṃ ghoraṃ sadyo mucyeta mānavaḥ // HV_App.I,40.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:16518: itihāsam imaṃ śrutvā yathāvad anupūrvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,40.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:16519: saṃyamyāntaḥśucir bhūtvā pāraṃ gatvā ca bhārate // HV_App.I,40.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:16520: teṣāṃ śreṣṭhāni deyāni śrutvā bhārata bhāratam / HV_App.I,40.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:16521: brāhmaṇebhyo yathāśaktyā bhaktyā ca bharatarṣabha // HV_App.I,40.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:16522: mahādānāni deyāni ratnāni vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,40.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:16523: gāvaḥ kāṃsyopadohāś ca kanyāś caiva svalaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,40.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:16525: bhavanāni ca vicitrāṇi bhūmir vāsāṃsi kāñcanam // HV_App.I,40.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:16526: vāhanāni ca deyāni hayā mattāś ca vāraṇāḥ / HV_App.I,40.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:16527: śayanaṃ śibikāś caiva syandanāś ca svalaṃkṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,40.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:16530: kaṭakaṃ kuṇḍalaṃ caiva yajñasūtraṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,40.30**3:2 /

GE07hv_apppu:16534: kāmāl lobhāt tathā mohān na kartavyānyathā nṛpa / **HV_App.I,40.30**3:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:16535: kurvan sa narakaṃ yāti viparītaṃ phalaṃ labhet / **HV_App.I,40.30**3:7 /

GE07hv_apppu:16537: tat tad deyaṃ dvijātibhya ātmā dārāś ca sūnavaḥ // HV_App.I,40.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:16538: śraddhayā parayā dattaṃ kramaśas tasya pāragaḥ / HV_App.I,40.33 /

GE07hv_apppu:16545: vācake ca guṇāḥ proktā yāvantas tāñ śṛṇuṣva me / **HV_App.I,40.36**5:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:16551: dānamānagṛhītaś ca kāryo bhavati vācakaḥ // HV_App.I,40.40 //
GE07hv_apppu:16557: avilambamanāyas tam adrutaṃ dhīram ūrjitam / HV_App.I,40.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:16560: vācayed vācakaḥ svasthaḥ svāsīnaḥ susamāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,40.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:16561: nārāyaṇaṃ namaskṛtya naraṃ caiva narottamam / HV_App.I,40.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:16562: devīṃ sarasvatīṃ caiva tato jayam udīrayet // HV_App.I,40.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:16563: īdṛśād vācakād rājañ śrutvā bhārata bhāratam / HV_App.I,40.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:16564: niyamasthaḥ śuciḥ śrotā śṛṇvan sa phalam aśnute // HV_App.I,40.48 //

GE07hv_apppu:16569: udyogāntaṃ tṛtīyaṃ tu bhīṣmāntaṃ ca caturthakam // **HV_App.I,40.48**9:4 //

GE07hv_apppu:16577: pāraṇaṃ prathamaṃ prāpya dvijān kāmaiś ca tarpayet / HV_App.I,40.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:16578: agniṣṭomasya yāgasya phalaṃ vai labhate naraḥ // HV_App.I,40.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:16580: prahṛṣṭaḥ sa tu devaiś ca divaṃ yāti samāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,40.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:16582: haṃsayuktaṃ vimānaṃ sa prahṛṣṭaḥ saha devataiḥ / **HV_App.I,40.52**10:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16584: dvitīyaṃ pāraṇaṃ prāpya atirātraphalaṃ labhet / HV_App.I,40.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:16590: svargataś ca mudā yukto ramate nandane vane / **HV_App.I,40.53**11:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:16599: tṛtīyaṃ pāraṇaṃ prāpya dvādaśāhaphalaṃ labhet / HV_App.I,40.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:16600: vasaty amarasaṃkāśo varṣāṇy ayutaśo divi // HV_App.I,40.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:16601: caturthe vājapeyasya pañcame dviguṇaṃ labhet / HV_App.I,40.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:16605: vimānaṃ vibudhaiḥ sārdham āruhya divi gacchati / HV_App.I,40.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:16606: varṣāyutāni bhavane śakrasya divi modate // HV_App.I,40.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:16607: ṣaṣṭhe dviguṇam astīti saptame triguṇaṃ phalam / HV_App.I,40.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:16611: sarvāṃl lokān vicarate dvitīya iva bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,40.67 //
GE07hv_apppu:16612: aṣṭame rājasūyasya pāraṇe labhate phalam / HV_App.I,40.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:16615: sevyamāno varastrīṇāṃ candrāt kāntatarair mukhaiḥ // HV_App.I,40.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:16616: mekhalānāṃ ninādena nūpurāṇāṃ ca nisvanaiḥ / HV_App.I,40.72 /
GE07hv_apppu:16620: phalaṃ sa labhate martyo vimānaṃ caiva kāmikam / **HV_App.I,40.74**15:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:16622: jāmbūnadamayair divyair gavākṣaiḥ sarvato vṛtam // HV_App.I,40.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:16624: vimānaṃ samadhiṣṭhāya śriyā paramayā jvalan // HV_App.I,40.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:16626: modate daivataiḥ sārdhaṃ divi deva ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,40.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:16627: daśamaṃ pāraṇaṃ prāpya dvijātīn abhivandya ca / HV_App.I,40.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:16631: gandharvair gītakuśalair apsarobhiś ca śobhitam / HV_App.I,40.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:16635: divyāṃl lokān vicarati divyair bhogaiḥ samanvitaḥ / HV_App.I,40.89 /
GE07hv_apppu:16636: vibudhānāṃ prasādena śriyā paramayā yutaḥ // HV_App.I,40.90 //

GE07hv_apppu:17046: tad adhyātmavidāṃ cintyaṃ kāraṇaṃ caiva karmaṇām / HV_App.I,41.36 /

GE07hv_apppu:17051: pradhānaṃ puruṣaḥ śāstā yaḥ kaścid abhiśabdyate // HV_App.I,41.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:17052: kālaḥ kālaṃ svapayati draṣṭā svādhīna eva ca / HV_App.I,41.42 /

GE07hv_apppu:17087: tasya tāvacchatī saṃdhyā dviguṇā parikīrtitā // HV_App.I,41.75 //

GE07hv_apppu:17089: śaṭhā naikṛtikāḥ kṣudrā jāyante kurupuṃgava / HV_App.I,41.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:17090: dvābhyāṃ dharmaḥ sthitaḥ padbhyām adharmas tribhir utthitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:17091: viparyayaṃ yānti śanaiḥ kṛte ye dharmasetavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:17094: tathā varṣasahasraṃ tu varṣāṇāṃ dve śate tathā / HV_App.I,41.82 /

GE07hv_apppu:17096: tatrādharmaś catuṣpādaṃ syād dharmaḥ pādavigrahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.84 /

GE07hv_apppu:17103: agamyeṣv abhirajyante vatsyanty evaṃ kalau yuge // HV_App.I,41.91 //

GE07hv_apppu:17113: tato 'hani gate tasmin sarveṣām eva dehinām / HV_App.I,41.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:17115: devatānāṃ ca sarvāsāṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:17117: devarṣīṇāṃ brahmarṣīṇāṃ tathā rājarṣiṇāṃ api / HV_App.I,41.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:17118: kiṃnarāṇām apsarasāṃ bhujaṅgānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,41.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:17119: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca paśūnāṃ caiva bhārata / HV_App.I,41.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:17120: tiryagyonigatānāṃ ca sattvānāṃ kṛmiṇāṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:17121: mahābhūtapatir devaḥ pañca bhūtāni bhūtakṛt / HV_App.I,41.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:17129: bhūtvā nārāyaṇo yogī saptamūrtir vibhāvasuḥ / HV_App.I,41.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:17131: pītvārṇavāṃś ca sarvān sa nadīkūpāṃś ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:17132: parvatānāṃ ca salilaṃ sarvam ādāya raśmibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:17133: bhittvā sahasraśaś caiva mahīṃ gatvā rasātalam / HV_App.I,41.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:17134: rasātalagataṃ kṛtsnaṃ pibate rasam uttamam // HV_App.I,41.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:17135: apsu sṛjan kledam anyad dadāti prāṇināṃ dhruvam / HV_App.I,41.117 /
GE07hv_apppu:17136: tat sarvam aravindākṣa ādatte puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.118 //
GE07hv_apppu:17137: vāyuś ca balavān bhūtvā sa vidhūyākhilaṃ jagat / HV_App.I,41.119 /
GE07hv_apppu:17138: prāṇodayaṃ surāṇāṃ ca vāyunā kurute hariḥ // HV_App.I,41.120 //
GE07hv_apppu:17139: tato devagaṇānāṃ ca sarveṣām eva dehinām / HV_App.I,41.121 /
GE07hv_apppu:17140: ye cendriyagaṇāḥ sarve ye cānye rajasodbhavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:17141: rūpaṃ ghrāṇaṃ śarīraṃ ca pṛthivīm āśritā guṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:17142: jihvā rasaś ca snehaś ca saṃśritāḥ salilaṃ guṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:17143: rūpaṃ cakṣur vipākaś ca jyotir evāśritā guṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:17146: sparśaḥ prāṇaś ca ceṣṭā ca pavanaṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:17148: śabdaṃ śrotraṃ ca yoniś ca gaganaṃ saṃśritā guṇāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.126**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17150: mano buddhiś ca sarveṣāṃ kṣetrajñaś ceti yaḥ śrutaḥ / **HV_App.I,41.126**9:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:17151: parameṣṭhinaṃ vareṇyaṃ ca hṛṣīkeśaṃ samāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,41.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:17152: tato bhagavatā tatra raśmibhiḥ parivāritāḥ / HV_App.I,41.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:17154: teṣāṃ saṃgharṣajodbhūtaḥ pāvakaḥ śatadhā jvalan / HV_App.I,41.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:17155: adahan nikhilāṃl lokān ugraḥ saṃvartako 'nalaḥ // HV_App.I,41.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:17156: sa parvatāṃs tarūn gulmāṃl latāvallīs tṛṇāni ca / HV_App.I,41.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:17157: vimānāni ca divyāni purāṇi vividhāni ca // HV_App.I,41.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:17158: āśramāṃś ca tathā puṇyān divyāny āyatanāni ca / HV_App.I,41.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:17159: yāni cāśrayaṇīyāni tāni sarvāṇi so 'dahat // HV_App.I,41.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:17160: bhasmībhūtāṃs tataḥ sarvāṃl lokāṃl lokagurur hariḥ / HV_App.I,41.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:17162: sahasradṛṅ mahātejā bhūtvā kṛṣṇo mahāghanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:17165: śivena puṇyena mahī nirvāṇam agamat param // HV_App.I,41.141 //
GE07hv_apppu:17166: tena sā jalasaṃchannā payasā sarvato dharā / HV_App.I,41.142 /
GE07hv_apppu:17168: mahābhūtāny api ca taṃ praviṣṭāny amitaujasam / HV_App.I,41.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:17170: saṃśoṣayitvā pītvā ca kalpayitvā ca dehinaḥ / HV_App.I,41.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:17171: dagdhvā saṃtāpayitvā ca vasaty ekaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:17172: paurāṇaṃ rūpaṃ āsthāya kim apy amitabuddhimān / HV_App.I,41.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:17173: ekārṇavajale hy āsīd yogī yogam upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:17178: na cainaṃ kaścid avyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ veditum arhati // HV_App.I,41.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:17180: ekārṇavavidhiḥ ko 'yaṃ yaś caiṣa parikīrtitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:17181: ka eṣa puruṣo nāma kiṃ yogaḥ kaś ca yogavān // HV_App.I,41.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:17183: etāvantam asau kālam ekārṇavavidhiṃ prati / HV_App.I,41.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:17184: kariṣyatīmaṃ bhagavān iti kaścin na budhyate // HV_App.I,41.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:17185: na draṣṭā naiva vaditā na jñātā naiva pārśvataḥ / HV_App.I,41.156 /
GE07hv_apppu:17186: na sma vijñāyate kaścid ṛte taṃ devaṃ uttamam // HV_App.I,41.157 //

GE07hv_apppu:17201: mahato rajaso madhye mahārṇavasamasya vai / HV_App.I,41.164 /

GE07hv_apppu:17209: puruṣo yajña ity evaṃ yat paraṃ parikīrtitam / HV_App.I,41.168 /

GE07hv_apppu:17213: brahmāṇaṃ paramaṃ vaktrād udgātāraṃ ca sāmagam / HV_App.I,41.172 /
GE07hv_apppu:17214: hotāram atha cādhvaryuṃ bāhubhyām asṛjat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.173 //
GE07hv_apppu:17215: brāhmaṇo brāhmaṇacchaṃsī prastotāraṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.174 /
GE07hv_apppu:17216: tanmitraṃ varuṇaṃ sṛṣṭvā pratiṣṭhātāram eva ca // HV_App.I,41.175 //
GE07hv_apppu:17217: udasat pratihartāraṃ hotāraṃ caiva bhārata / HV_App.I,41.176 /
GE07hv_apppu:17218: adhyāpakam athorubhyāṃ neṣṭhāraṃ caiva bhārata // HV_App.I,41.177 //
GE07hv_apppu:17219: pāṇibhyām atha cāgnīdhraṃ brahmaṇyaṃ caiva yajñiyam / HV_App.I,41.178 /
GE07hv_apppu:17220: grāvāṇam atha bāhubhyāṃ sūnetāraṃ ca cakṣuṣaḥ // HV_App.I,41.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:17221: evam evaiṣa bhagavān ṣoḍaśaitāñ jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:17223: tad eṣa vai vedamayaḥ puruṣo yajñasaṃjñitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.182 /
GE07hv_apppu:17224: vedāś ca tanmayāḥ sarve sāṅgopaniṣad akriyāḥ // HV_App.I,41.183 //
GE07hv_apppu:17225: svapity ekārṇave caiva yadāścaryam abhūt tadā / HV_App.I,41.184 /
GE07hv_apppu:17227: jīrṇo bhagavatas tasya kukṣāv eva mahāmuniḥ / HV_App.I,41.186 /
GE07hv_apppu:17230: āśramān api puṇyāṃś ca tīrthāny āyatanāni ca // HV_App.I,41.189 //
GE07hv_apppu:17231: deśān rāṣṭrāṇi citrāṇi purāṇi vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,41.190 /
GE07hv_apppu:17232: japahomarataḥ kṣāntas tapo ghoraṃ samāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:17235: candrādityau tathā vāyum indraṃ varuṇam eva ca // **HV_App.I,41.191**14:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17236: agniṃ yamaṃ bhūtapatiṃ kālamṛtyuṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,41.191**14:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:17243: mārkaṇḍeyas tatas tasya śanair vaktrād viniḥsṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.192 /
GE07hv_apppu:17244: niṣkrāmantaṃ na cātmānaṃ jānīte devamāyayā // HV_App.I,41.193 //
GE07hv_apppu:17245: niṣkrāntas tasya vadanād ekārṇavam atho gataḥ / HV_App.I,41.194 /
GE07hv_apppu:17246: sarvatas tapasā channaṃ mārkaṇḍeyo nirīkṣate // HV_App.I,41.195 //
GE07hv_apppu:17247: tasyotpannaṃ bhayaṃ tīvraṃ saṃśayaś cātmajīvite / HV_App.I,41.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:17252: kiṃ svid bhaved iyaṃ cintā mohaḥ svapno 'nubhūyate // HV_App.I,41.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:17253: vyaktam anyatamo bhāvo hy eteṣāṃ bhavitā mama / HV_App.I,41.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:17254: na hīdṛśam asaṃkliṣṭam ayuktaṃ satyam arhati // HV_App.I,41.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:17256: katamaḥ syād ayaṃ loka iti cintāṃ vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:17258: toyārdram iva jīmūtaṃ madhye magnaṃ mahārṇave // HV_App.I,41.205 //
GE07hv_apppu:17260: salilārdhād adho magnaṃ jīmūtam iva sāgare / **HV_App.I,41.205**16:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17261: tapantam iva tejobhir bhāsvantam iva varcasā / HV_App.I,41.206 /
GE07hv_apppu:17262: jāgrantam iva gāmbhīryāc chvasantam iva pannagam // HV_App.I,41.207 //
GE07hv_apppu:17263: sa devaṃ praṣṭum āyāti ko bhavān iti vismayāt / HV_App.I,41.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:17265: gāmbhīryāj jāgratam iva jvalantam iva tejasā // **HV_App.I,41.208**17:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:17266: tathaiva ca śanair bhūyo muniḥ kukṣiṃ praveśitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:17267: sa praviṣṭaḥ punaḥ kukṣau mārkaṇḍeyaḥ suniścitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.210 /
GE07hv_apppu:17269: sa tathaiva yathāpūrvaṃ pṛthivīm aṭate balāt / HV_App.I,41.212 /
GE07hv_apppu:17270: puṇyatīrthāni pūtāni nirīkṣann iva bhūtale // HV_App.I,41.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:17272: paśyate devakukṣisthān yajñiyāñ śataśo dvijān // HV_App.I,41.215 //
GE07hv_apppu:17273: sadvṛttam āśritāḥ sarve varṇā brāhmaṇapūrvakāḥ / HV_App.I,41.216 /
GE07hv_apppu:17276: carataḥ pṛthivīṃ kṛtsnāṃ na ca kukṣyantam īkṣate // HV_App.I,41.219 //
GE07hv_apppu:17277: tataḥ kadācid atha vai punar vaktrād viniḥsṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.220 /
GE07hv_apppu:17278: suptaṃ nyagrodhaśākhāyāṃ bālam ekaṃ nirīkṣate // HV_App.I,41.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:17282: bālam ādityasaṃkāśaṃ na śaknoty upasarpitum // HV_App.I,41.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:17284: pūrvadṛṣṭam idaṃ neti śaṅkito devamāyayā // HV_App.I,41.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:17285: agādhe salile stabdhe mārkaṇḍeyaḥ plavan muniḥ / HV_App.I,41.228 /
GE07hv_apppu:17287: bāhubhyām asakṛd vipraḥ plavaty eva divāniśam / **HV_App.I,41.228**18:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17288: tadā śramas te bahudhā na pāraṃ tasya paśyati / **HV_App.I,41.228**18:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:17289: tataḥ plavati mūḍhātmā jānāty eva na kiṃcana // **HV_App.I,41.228**18:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:17290: na śāntiṃ labhate tatra tejasā grastavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,41.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:17293: tathaiva bhagavān haṃso gato yogena bālatām / HV_App.I,41.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:17295: mā bhair vatsa na bhetavyaṃ mamaivāyāhi cāntikam / HV_App.I,41.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:17296: mārkaṇḍeya mune vīra bālas tvaṃ śramapīḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.233 //
GE07hv_apppu:17298: ko māṃ nāmnā pīḍayati tapaḥ paribhavan mama / HV_App.I,41.234 /
GE07hv_apppu:17299: bahuvarṣasahasrākhyaṃ dharṣayaṃś caiva me vayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:17300: na hy eṣa samudācāro deveṣv api samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.236 /
GE07hv_apppu:17301: māṃ brahmāpi sa viśvaśo dīrghāyur iti bhāṣate // HV_App.I,41.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:17303: ya 'yaṃ jagadguruḥ sākṣād viṣṇuḥ sarveśvaro hariḥ / **HV_App.I,41.237**20:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17304: sa eṣa vatsa vatseti pitā brūte na saṃśayaḥ / **HV_App.I,41.237**20:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:17306: mārkaṇḍeyeti māṃ proktvā mṛtyum īkṣitum icchati // HV_App.I,41.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:17307: evam ābhāṣate krodhān mārkaṇḍeyo mahāmuniḥ / HV_App.I,41.240 /
GE07hv_apppu:17308: athainaṃ bhagavān bhūyo babhāṣe tatparāyaṇam // HV_App.I,41.241 //
GE07hv_apppu:17309: ahaṃ te janako vatsa hṛṣīkeśaḥ pitā guruḥ / HV_App.I,41.242 /
GE07hv_apppu:17310: āyuḥpradātā paurāṇaḥ kim arthaṃ nopasarpasi // HV_App.I,41.243 //
GE07hv_apppu:17311: māṃ putrakāmaḥ prathamaṃ pitā te hy aṅgirā muniḥ / HV_App.I,41.244 /
GE07hv_apppu:17312: pūrvam ārādhayām āsa tapas tīvramupāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.245 //
GE07hv_apppu:17314: dattavān aham ātmeṣṭaṃ maharṣim amitāyuṣam // HV_App.I,41.247 //
GE07hv_apppu:17316: madaṃśo hi bhavān vatso na kopaṃ kartum arhasi // **HV_App.I,41.247**21:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:17317: na mām utsahate cānyo yo na bhūyo mamātmakaḥ / HV_App.I,41.248 /
GE07hv_apppu:17321: nāmagotraṃ tataḥ śrutvā dīrghāyur lokapūjitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:17322: athākaron namaskāraṃ praṇataḥ śirasā prabhum // HV_App.I,41.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:17326: icche 'haṃ tattvato māyām imāṃ jñātuṃ tavānagha / HV_App.I,41.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:17327: yad ekārṇavamadhyasthaṃ śeṣe tvaṃ bālarupavān // HV_App.I,41.255 //
GE07hv_apppu:17328: kiṃsaṃjñaḥ kaś ca bhagavāṃl loke vijñāyase 'nagha / HV_App.I,41.256 /
GE07hv_apppu:17329: tarkaye tvāṃ mahābhūtaṃ na bhūtam iha tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,41.257 //
GE07hv_apppu:17331: ahaṃ nārāyaṇo brahmā saṃbhavaḥ sarvadehinām / HV_App.I,41.258 /
GE07hv_apppu:17334: ahaṃ brahmā ca rudraś ca sarvavyāpī bhavāmy aham / **HV_App.I,41.259**23:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17335: aham aindre pade śakra ṛtūnām api vatsaraḥ / HV_App.I,41.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:17336: ahaṃ yuge yugākhyaś ca yugasyāvarta eva ca // HV_App.I,41.261 //
GE07hv_apppu:17337: ahaṃ sarvāṇi sattvāni daivatāny akhilāni ca / HV_App.I,41.262 /
GE07hv_apppu:17338: bhūjaṃgānām ahaṃ śeṣas tārkṣyo 'haṃ sarvapakṣiṇām // HV_App.I,41.263 //
GE07hv_apppu:17339: ahaṃ sahasraśīrṣā dyaur yaḥ padair abhisaṃvṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.264 /
GE07hv_apppu:17340: ādityo yajñapuruṣo devo yajñamayo makhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.265 /
GE07hv_apppu:17341: aham agnir havyavāho yādasāṃ patiravyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.266 //
GE07hv_apppu:17342: yaḥ pṛthivyāṃ dvijendrāṇāṃ tapasā bhāvitātmanāṃ / HV_App.I,41.267 /
GE07hv_apppu:17346: ahaṃ karma kriyā jīvaḥ sarveṣāṃ dharmadarśanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.271 /
GE07hv_apppu:17348: pradhānapuruṣo devo 'ham ādyas tv akṣayo 'vyayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.273 /
GE07hv_apppu:17349: ahaṃ dharmas tapaś cāhaṃ sarvāśramanivāsinām // HV_App.I,41.274 //
GE07hv_apppu:17351: ṛtaṃ satyaṃ ca paramam aham ekaḥ prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,41.276 //
GE07hv_apppu:17352: ahaṃ sāṃkhyam ahaṃ yogo ahaṃ tatparamaṃ padam / HV_App.I,41.277 /
GE07hv_apppu:17353: aham īḍyo bhavaś cāham ahaṃ vidyādhipaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.278 //
GE07hv_apppu:17354: ahaṃ jyotir ahaṃ vāyur ahaṃ bhūmir ahaṃ nabhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.279 /
GE07hv_apppu:17355: aham āpaḥ samudrāś ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa / HV_App.I,41.280 /
GE07hv_apppu:17356: ahaṃ varṣam ahaṃ somaḥ parjanyo 'ham ahaṃ raviḥ // HV_App.I,41.281 //
GE07hv_apppu:17357: kṣīrodaḥ sāgaraś cāhaṃ samudro vaḍavāmukhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.282 /
GE07hv_apppu:17358: vahniḥ saṃvartako bhūtvā pibaṃs toyamayaṃ haviḥ // HV_App.I,41.283 //
GE07hv_apppu:17359: ahaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ tathaivāhaṃ parāyaṇam / HV_App.I,41.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:17360: ahaṃ bhūtasya bhavyasya vartamānasya saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.285 //

GE07hv_apppu:17363: yat kiṃcit paśyase caiva yac chṛṇoṣi ca kiṃcana / HV_App.I,41.286 /
GE07hv_apppu:17364: yac cānubhavase loke tat sarvaṃ māmakaṃ smṛtam // HV_App.I,41.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:17365: viśvaṃ sṛṣṭaṃ mayā pūrvaṃ sṛjeyaṃ cādya paśya mām / HV_App.I,41.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:17366: yuge yuge ca srakṣyāmi mārkaṇḍeyākhilaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,41.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:17367: tad etad akhilaṃ sarvaṃ mārkaṇḍeyāvadhāraya / HV_App.I,41.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:17368: śuśrūṣur mama dharmepsuḥ kukṣau cara sukhī bhava / HV_App.I,41.291 /
GE07hv_apppu:17369: mama brahmā śarīrastho devāś ca ṛṣibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:17371: aham ekākṣaro mantras tryakṣaraś caiva sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.294 /
GE07hv_apppu:17373: evam ādipurāṇeṣu vedānte ca mahāmuniḥ / HV_App.I,41.296 /
GE07hv_apppu:17374: vyaktam āhṛtavān āśu mārkaṇḍeyaṃ mahāmunim // HV_App.I,41.297 //
GE07hv_apppu:17375: [k: Ñ2 V3 B Ds D2.5.6 G3.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17377: tato bhagavataḥ kukṣiṃ praviṣṭo munisattamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:17378: rarāma sukham āsādya śuśrūṣur haṃsam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:17379: tad akṣaraṃ vividham apāśrito vapur @ HV_App.I,41.300 @
GE07hv_apppu:17381: śanaiś caran prabhur api haṃsasaṃjñito @ HV_App.I,41.302 @
GE07hv_apppu:17385: āpavaḥ sa vibhur bhūtvā kārayām āsa vai tapaḥ / HV_App.I,41.304 /
GE07hv_apppu:17387: tato mahātmātibalo matiṃ lokasya sarjane / HV_App.I,41.306 /
GE07hv_apppu:17389: tasya cintayatas tatra tapasā bhāvitātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.308 /
GE07hv_apppu:17390: nirākāśe toyamaye sūkṣme jagati gahvare // HV_App.I,41.309 //
GE07hv_apppu:17391: īṣat saṃkṣobhayām āsa so 'rṇavaṃ salile sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.310 /
GE07hv_apppu:17392: so 'nantarormiṇā sūkṣmam atha cchidram abhūt tadā // HV_App.I,41.311 //
GE07hv_apppu:17394: sa labdhvāntaram akṣobhyaṃ vyavardhata samīraṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.313 //
GE07hv_apppu:17397: mahārṇavasya kṣubdhasya tasminn ambhasi manthite / HV_App.I,41.316 /
GE07hv_apppu:17399: tataḥ saṃśoṣayām āsa pāvakaḥ salilaṃ bahu / HV_App.I,41.318 /
GE07hv_apppu:17400: kṣayāj jalanidheś chidram abhavad vistṛtaṃ nabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.319 //
GE07hv_apppu:17407: dṛṣṭvā bhūtāni bhagavāṃl lokasṛṣṭyartham avyayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.324 /
GE07hv_apppu:17410: yat pṛthivyāṃ dvijendrāṇāṃ tapasā bhāvitātmanām // HV_App.I,41.327 //
GE07hv_apppu:17414: devo brahmaṇi viśveśo niyojayati yogavit // HV_App.I,41.331 //
GE07hv_apppu:17415: tatas tasmin mahātoye haviṣo harir acyutaḥ / HV_App.I,41.332 /
GE07hv_apppu:17416: svapan krīḍaṃś ca vividhaṃ modate caiṣa pāvakiḥ // HV_App.I,41.333 //
GE07hv_apppu:17417: padmaṃ nābhyudbhavaṃ caikaṃ samutpāditavāṃs tadā / HV_App.I,41.334 /
GE07hv_apppu:17425: atha yogavidāṃ śreṣṭham asṛjad bhūri tejasam / HV_App.I,41.340 /
GE07hv_apppu:17429: tac ca padmaṃ purāṇajñāḥ pṛthivīruham uttamam / HV_App.I,41.344 /
GE07hv_apppu:17431: yā tu padmāsanā devī pṛthivīṃ tāṃ pracakṣate / HV_App.I,41.346 /
GE07hv_apppu:17433: himavantaṃ ca meruṃ ca nīlaṃ niṣadhameva ca / HV_App.I,41.348 /
GE07hv_apppu:17434: kailāsaṃ muñjavantaṃ ca tathādriṃ gandhamādanam // HV_App.I,41.349 //
GE07hv_apppu:17435: puṇyaṃ triśikharaṃ caiva kāntaṃ mandarameva ca / HV_App.I,41.350 /
GE07hv_apppu:17436: udayaṃ ca giriṃ śreṣṭhaṃ vindhyamastaṃ ca parvatam // HV_App.I,41.351 //
GE07hv_apppu:17437: ete devagaṇānāṃ ca siddhānāṃ ca mahātmanām / HV_App.I,41.352 /
GE07hv_apppu:17439: eteṣām antaro deśo jambūdvīpa iti smṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.354 /
GE07hv_apppu:17440: jambūdvīpasya saṃkhyānaṃ yajñiyā yatra cakrire // HV_App.I,41.355 //
GE07hv_apppu:17442: divyatīrthaśatāpāṅgyas tā divyāḥ saritaḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.357 //
GE07hv_apppu:17443: yāny etāni tu padmasya kesarāṇi samantataḥ / HV_App.I,41.358 /
GE07hv_apppu:17444: asaṃkhyātāḥ pṛthivyāṃ tu viśve te dhātuparvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.359 //
GE07hv_apppu:17445: yāni padmasya patrāṇi bhūrīṇy ūrdhvaṃ narādhipa / HV_App.I,41.360 /
GE07hv_apppu:17446: te durgamāḥ śailacitā mlecchadeśā vikalpitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.361 //
GE07hv_apppu:17447: yāny adhaḥ padmapatrāṇi vāsārthaṃ tān vibhāgaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.362 /
GE07hv_apppu:17448: daityānām uragāṇāṃ ca pātālaṃ tan mahātmanām // HV_App.I,41.363 //
GE07hv_apppu:17449: teṣāṃ adhogataṃ yat tad udakety abhisaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,41.364 /
GE07hv_apppu:17451: padmasyānte bhṛśaṃ yat tad ekārṇavajalaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,41.366 /
GE07hv_apppu:17452: proktās te dikṣu saṃghātāś catvāro jalasāgarāḥ // HV_App.I,41.367 //
GE07hv_apppu:17455: etasmāt kāraṇāt tajjñaiḥ purāṇaiḥ paramarṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.370 /
GE07hv_apppu:17456: yajñiyair vedadṛṣṭārthair yajñe padmavidhiḥ smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.371 //
GE07hv_apppu:17457: evaṃ bhagavataḥ padme viśvasya paramo vidhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.372 /
GE07hv_apppu:17458: parvatānāṃ nadīnāṃ ca deśānāṃ ca vinirmitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.373 //
GE07hv_apppu:17461: utpattiḥ prakṛtā rājann ataḥ pauṣkarikās tu te // **HV_App.I,41.373**27:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17469: vighnas tamasi saṃbhūto madhur nāma mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,41.379 /
GE07hv_apppu:17470: tasyaiva ca sahāyo 'nyo bhūto rajasi kaiṭabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.380 //
GE07hv_apppu:17482: kampayantāv iva hariṃ śayānam arisūdanam / HV_App.I,41.390 /
GE07hv_apppu:17483: tau tatra viharantau sma puṣkare viśvatomukham // HV_App.I,41.391 //
GE07hv_apppu:17484: paśyatāṃ dīptavapuṣaṃ yogināṃ śreṣṭham acyutam / HV_App.I,41.392 /
GE07hv_apppu:17486: yogināṃ śreṣṭham āsādya dīptaṃ dadṛśatus tadā / **HV_App.I,41.392**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17488: daivatāni ca viśvāni mānasāṃś ca sutān ṛṣīn // HV_App.I,41.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:17489: tatas tāv ūcatus tatra brahmāṇam asurottamau / HV_App.I,41.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:17491: kas tvaṃ puṣkaramadhyasthaḥ sitoṣṇīṣaś caturmukhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.397 /
GE07hv_apppu:17492: āvām agaṇayan mohād āsse tvaṃ vigatajvaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.398 //
GE07hv_apppu:17493: ehy āgacchāvayor yuddhaṃ prayaccha kamalodbhava / HV_App.I,41.399 /
GE07hv_apppu:17494: āvābhyām ativīrābhyāṃ na śakyaṃ sthātum āhave // HV_App.I,41.400 //
GE07hv_apppu:17496: āvābhyāṃ paramābhyāṃ tvam aśaktaḥ sthātum arṇave // **HV_App.I,41.400**30:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:17497: kas tvaṃ kaś codbhavas tubhyaṃ kena vāsīha coditaḥ / HV_App.I,41.401 /
GE07hv_apppu:17498: kaḥ sraṣṭā kaś ca te goptā kena nāmnābhidhīyase // HV_App.I,41.402 //
GE07hv_apppu:17500: yaḥ ka ity ucyate loke hy avijñātaḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.403 /
GE07hv_apppu:17501: tatsaṃbhavena yogena kiṃ māṃ nābhyavagacchathaḥ // HV_App.I,41.404 //
GE07hv_apppu:17503: nāvayoḥ paramaṃ loke kiṃcid asti mahāmune / HV_App.I,41.405 /
GE07hv_apppu:17504: āvābhyāṃ chādyate viśvaṃ tamasā rajasā tathā // HV_App.I,41.406 //
GE07hv_apppu:17507: āvābhyāṃ muhyate loka ucchritābhyāṃ yuge yuge / HV_App.I,41.409 /
GE07hv_apppu:17508: āvām arthaś ca kāmaś ca yajñāḥ sarvaparigrahāḥ // HV_App.I,41.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:17509: sukhaṃ yatra mudo yatra śrīḥ saṃnatir nayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.411 /
GE07hv_apppu:17510: eṣāṃ yat kāṅkṣitaṃ caiva tat tad āvāṃ vicintaya // HV_App.I,41.412 //
GE07hv_apppu:17512: yat tad yogavatāṃ śreṣṭhaṃ yac ca pūrvam ayonijam / HV_App.I,41.413 /
GE07hv_apppu:17513: tat samādhāya guṇavān sattve cāsmi pratiṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.414 //
GE07hv_apppu:17514: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for lines 413-414:k]
GE07hv_apppu:17515: yasmin sarvam idaṃ viśvam udbhūtaṃ yugaparyaye / **HV_App.I,41.414**31:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17516: tam eva devaṃ yogeśaṃ āsthito 'haṃ yuge yuge // **HV_App.I,41.414**31:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17518: yūnādyo bhavatī dṛṣṭvā yūyaṃ pūrvaṃ mayā jitāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.414**32:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17519: taṃ māṃ pāpau na bādhetāṃ sattve cāsmin pratiṣṭhitam // **HV_App.I,41.414**32:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17520: yat paraṃ yogayuktānām akṣaraṃ sattvam eva ca / HV_App.I,41.415 /
GE07hv_apppu:17521: rajasas tamasaś caiva yaḥ sraṣṭā jīvasaṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.416 //
GE07hv_apppu:17522: yato bhūtāni jāyante sāttvikānītarāṇi ca / HV_App.I,41.417 /
GE07hv_apppu:17523: sa eva yuktaḥ samare vaśī vāṃ śamayiṣyati // HV_App.I,41.418 //
GE07hv_apppu:17528: na śekatus tau calituṃ śakunāv iva pīḍitau // **HV_App.I,41.419**33:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:17529: tatas tāv āhatur gatvā tadā devaṃ sanātanam / **HV_App.I,41.419**33:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:17530: padmanābhaṃ hṛṣīkeśaṃ praṇipatyātha tāv ubhau // HV_App.I,41.420 //
GE07hv_apppu:17531: jānīvas tvāṃ viśvayonim ekaṃ puruṣasattamam / HV_App.I,41.421 /
GE07hv_apppu:17533: amodhadarśanaṃ satyaṃ yatas tvāṃ viśvaviśvadam / HV_App.I,41.423 /
GE07hv_apppu:17534: tatas tvām abhito deva kāṅkṣāvaḥ prativīkṣitum // HV_App.I,41.424 //
GE07hv_apppu:17535: tad icchāvo varaṃ dattaṃ tvayā hy āvām ariṃdama / HV_App.I,41.425 /
GE07hv_apppu:17538: kān icchato drutaṃ brūtaṃ varān asurasattamau / HV_App.I,41.427 /
GE07hv_apppu:17539: dattāyuṣau mayā bhūyo aho jīvitum icchatha // HV_App.I,41.428 //
GE07hv_apppu:17540: tasmād yad eṣa vāṃ yatnas tat prāpnutaṃ mahābalau / HV_App.I,41.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:17541: [k: Ñ2 V3 B Ds D6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17542: vadhyau bhavantau tu syātāṃ tāv ityevābravīd dhariḥ // **HV_App.I,41.429**34:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:17543: [k: B1 cont., Ñ2 ins. after line 430:k]
GE07hv_apppu:17544: evam astv iti taṃ devaṃ māvayos taṃ hitaṃ varam / **HV_App.I,41.429**35:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17545: ubhāv api mahātmānāv ūrjitau kṣatratatparau // HV_App.I,41.430 //
GE07hv_apppu:17547: yasmin na kaścin mṛtavān deśe tasmin vibho vadham / HV_App.I,41.431 /
GE07hv_apppu:17548: icchāvaḥ putratāṃ caiva tava gantuṃ surādhipa // HV_App.I,41.432 //
GE07hv_apppu:17550: bāḍhaṃ sutau me pravarau bhaviṣye kalpasaṃbhave / HV_App.I,41.433 /
GE07hv_apppu:17551: bhaviṣyatho na saṃdehaḥ satyam etad bravīmi vām // HV_App.I,41.434 //
GE07hv_apppu:17558: sthitvā tasmiṃs tu kamale brahmā brahmavidāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,41.439 /
GE07hv_apppu:17559: ūrdhvabāhur mahābāhus tapo ghoram athāśritaḥ // HV_App.I,41.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:17560: jvalann iva ca tejasvī bhābhiḥ svābhis tamonudaḥ / HV_App.I,41.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:17562: athānyad rūpam āstāya śaṃbhur nārāyaṇo 'vyayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:17565: sāṃkhyācāryaś ca matimān kapilo brahmaṇāṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,41.446 //
GE07hv_apppu:17566: devarṣibhiḥ stutāv etau brahmabrahmavidāṃ varau / HV_App.I,41.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:17567: ubhāv api mahātmānāv ūrjitau kṣetratatparau // HV_App.I,41.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:17568: tau prāptāv ūcatus tatra brahmāṇam amitaujasam / HV_App.I,41.449 /
GE07hv_apppu:17571: bṛhatvād brahmaṇatvāc ca brahmāsi satataṃ vibho / **HV_App.I,41.450**36:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17572: bahutvād bahupādaś ca viśvātmā jagataḥ sthitiḥ / HV_App.I,41.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:17573: grāmaṇīḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ brahmā lokagurur varaḥ // HV_App.I,41.452 //
GE07hv_apppu:17574: tayos tad vacanaṃ śrutvā tisro vyāhṛtayo japan / HV_App.I,41.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:17575: trīn imān kṛtavāṃl lokān yathāha brāhmaṇī śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,41.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:17576: tatra bhūsaṃjñakaṃ putraṃ samutpāditavān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.455 /
GE07hv_apppu:17577: tato gatāgatas tatra brahmā mānasam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:17578: sotpannas tv agre brahmāṇam uvāca mānasaḥ sutaḥ / HV_App.I,41.457 /
GE07hv_apppu:17579: karomi kiṃ te sāhāyyaṃ bravītu bhagavān iti // HV_App.I,41.458 //
GE07hv_apppu:17581: ya eṣa kapilo nāma brahmā nārāyaṇas tathā / HV_App.I,41.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:17582: vadate varadas tvāṃ tu tat kuruṣva mahāmate // HV_App.I,41.460 //
GE07hv_apppu:17583: brahmaṇokte tadā bhūyaḥ saṃśayaṃ samupasthitau / HV_App.I,41.461 /
GE07hv_apppu:17584: śuśrūṣur asmi yuvayoḥ kiṃ kurveti(!) kṛtāñjaliḥ // HV_App.I,41.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:17586: yat satyam akṣaraṃ brahma hy aṣṭāviṃśavidhaṃ smṛtam / HV_App.I,41.463 /
GE07hv_apppu:17587: yat satyam amṛtaṃ caiva paraṃ tat samanusmara // HV_App.I,41.464 //
GE07hv_apppu:17588: etad vaco niśamyātha sa yayau diśam uttarām / HV_App.I,41.465 /
GE07hv_apppu:17589: gatvā ca tatra brahmatvam agamaj jñānacakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,41.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:17590: tato brahmā bhuvaṃ nāma dvitīyam asṛjat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.467 /
GE07hv_apppu:17591: taṃ kalpayitvā manasā manasaiva mahāmanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:17592: tataḥ so 'py abravīd vākyaṃ kiṃ kurveti pitāmaham / HV_App.I,41.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:17595: brahmabhyāṃ sahitaḥ so 'tha bhūyo bhagavatīṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,41.471 /
GE07hv_apppu:17596: prāptaś ca paramaṃ sthānaṃ sa tayoḥ pārśvam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.472 //
GE07hv_apppu:17597: tasminn api gate putre tṛtīyam asṛjat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.473 /
GE07hv_apppu:17598: mokṣopapattikuśalaṃ bhūrbhuvaṃ nāma tad viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.474 //
GE07hv_apppu:17599: āsādya so 'pi taṃ dharmaṃ tayor evāgamad gatim / HV_App.I,41.475 /
GE07hv_apppu:17600: evaṃ putrās trayo 'py ete uktāḥ śaṃbhor mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:17601: tān gṛhītvā sutāṃs tasya prayātau svārjitāṃ gatim / HV_App.I,41.477 /
GE07hv_apppu:17602: nārāyaṇaś ca bhagavān kapilaś ca yatīśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.478 //
GE07hv_apppu:17603: yaṃ kālaṃ tau gatau muktau brahmā tat kālam eva tu / HV_App.I,41.479 /
GE07hv_apppu:17604: tapo ghorataraṃ bhūyaḥ saṃśritaḥ saṃśitavrataḥ // HV_App.I,41.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:17605: na rarāma tato brahmā prabhur ekas tapaś caran / HV_App.I,41.481 /
GE07hv_apppu:17606: śarīrārdhāt tato bhāryāṃ samutpāditavāñ śubhām // HV_App.I,41.482 //
GE07hv_apppu:17608: tapasā tejasā caiva varcasā niyamena ca / HV_App.I,41.483 /
GE07hv_apppu:17609: sadṛśīm ātmano bhāryāṃ samarthāṃ lokasarjane // HV_App.I,41.484 //
GE07hv_apppu:17610: sa tayā sahitas tatra reme brahmā tapomayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.485 /
GE07hv_apppu:17611: tataḥ prajāpatīn sarvān sāgarān saritas tathā // HV_App.I,41.486 //
GE07hv_apppu:17612: tato 'sṛjad vai tripadāṃ gāyatrīṃ vedamātaram / HV_App.I,41.487 /
GE07hv_apppu:17613: akaroc caiva caturo vedān gāyatrisaṃbhavān // HV_App.I,41.488 //
GE07hv_apppu:17615: viśve prajānāṃ patayo yebhyo lokā viniḥsṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:17616: viśveśaṃ prathamaṃ nāma mahātapasam ātmajam / HV_App.I,41.491 /
GE07hv_apppu:17617: sarvāśramapadaṃ puṇyaṃ nāmnā dharmaṃ sa sṛṣṭavān // HV_App.I,41.492 //
GE07hv_apppu:17618: dakṣaṃ marīcim atriṃ ca pulastyam pulahaṃ kratum / HV_App.I,41.493 /
GE07hv_apppu:17619: vasiṣṭhaṃ gautamaṃ caiva bhṛgum aṅgirasaṃ munim // HV_App.I,41.494 //
GE07hv_apppu:17620: atharvabhūtā ity ete khyātā brahmamaharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.495 /
GE07hv_apppu:17621: trayodaśasutānāṃ tu ye vaṃśās tu maharṣiṇām // HV_App.I,41.496 //
GE07hv_apppu:17622: aditir ditir danuḥ kālā anāyuḥ siṃhikā muniḥ / HV_App.I,41.497 /
GE07hv_apppu:17623: prādhā krodhā ca surasā vinatā kadrur eva ca // HV_App.I,41.498 //
GE07hv_apppu:17624: dakṣasyaitā duhitaraḥ kanyā dvādaśa bhārata / HV_App.I,41.499 /
GE07hv_apppu:17625: nakṣatrāṇi ca bhadraṃ te saptāviṃśatir ūrjitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:17626: marīceḥ kaśyapaḥ putras tapasā nirmitaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.501 /
GE07hv_apppu:17629: tasmai kanyā dvādaśemā dakṣas tā anvamanyata // HV_App.I,41.502 //
GE07hv_apppu:17630: nakṣatrākhyāṃś ca somāya vasave dattavān ṛṣiḥ / HV_App.I,41.503 /
GE07hv_apppu:17633: lakṣmīḥ kīrtis tathā sādhyā viśvāvasuratā śubhā / HV_App.I,41.505 /
GE07hv_apppu:17634: devī padmodbhavā caiva brahmaṇā nirmitāḥ purā // HV_App.I,41.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:17635: etāḥ pañca variṣṭhā vai suraśreṣṭhāya bhārata / HV_App.I,41.507 /
GE07hv_apppu:17636: dattā dharmāya bhadraṃ te brahmaṇā dṛṣṭadharmaṇā // HV_App.I,41.508 //
GE07hv_apppu:17637: yā rūpārdhamayī patnī brahmaṇaḥ kāmarūpiṇī / HV_App.I,41.509 /
GE07hv_apppu:17638: surabhiḥ sā tu gaur bhūtvā brahmāṇaṃ samupasthitā // HV_App.I,41.510 //
GE07hv_apppu:17639: tatas tām agamad brahmā maithune lokapūjitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.511 /
GE07hv_apppu:17641: jajñe caikādaśa sutān vipulān dharmasaṃhitān / HV_App.I,41.513 /
GE07hv_apppu:17643: te rudanto dravantaś ca bhagavantaṃ pitāmaham / HV_App.I,41.515 /
GE07hv_apppu:17644: rodanād dravaṇāś caiva tato rudrā iti smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.516 //
GE07hv_apppu:17645: nirṛtiś caiva sarpaś ca tṛtīyo hy aja ekapāt / HV_App.I,41.517 /
GE07hv_apppu:17646: mṛgavyādhaḥ pinākī ca dahano 'theśvaraś ca vai // HV_App.I,41.518 //
GE07hv_apppu:17647: ahirbūdhnyaś ca bhagavān kapālī cāparājitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.519 /
GE07hv_apppu:17648: senānīś ca mahātejā rudrā ekādaśa smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.520 //
GE07hv_apppu:17649: tasyām eva surabhyāṃ vai jajñivān govṛṣas tathā / HV_App.I,41.521 /
GE07hv_apppu:17650: akṛṣṭāś ca tathā māṣāḥ sikatāḥ pṛśnayo 'kṣatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.522 //
GE07hv_apppu:17655: ajāś caikaśaphāś caiva tathaivāmṛtam uttamam / HV_App.I,41.523 /
GE07hv_apppu:17656: oṣadhyaḥ pravarā yāś ca surabhyāṃ tāḥ samutthitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.524 //
GE07hv_apppu:17657: dharmāl lakṣmyudbhavaḥ kāmaḥ sādhyān sādhyā vyajāyata / HV_App.I,41.525 /
GE07hv_apppu:17658: bhavaṃ ca prabhavaṃ caiva īśānam aratiṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.526 //
GE07hv_apppu:17660: mahiṣaṃ ca tanūjaṃ ca vijñānam anaghaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.528 //
GE07hv_apppu:17661: matsaraṃ ca vibhūtiṃ ca sarve surabhisūnavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.529 /
GE07hv_apppu:17662: suvarcasaṃ vṛṣaṃ nāgaṃ sādhyā lokanamaskṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,41.530 //
GE07hv_apppu:17663: vāsavānugatā devī janayām āsa vai sutam / HV_App.I,41.531 /
GE07hv_apppu:17664: dharaṃ ca prathamaṃ devaṃ dvitīyaṃ dhruvam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.532 //
GE07hv_apppu:17665: viśvāvasuṃ tṛtīyaṃ ca caturthaṃ somam īśvaram / HV_App.I,41.533 /
GE07hv_apppu:17667: tato yogāyamānaṃ ca śamas tasmād anantaram / **HV_App.I,41.533**40:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17668: pañcamaṃ parvataṃ caiva yogendraṃ tadanantaram // HV_App.I,41.534 //
GE07hv_apppu:17669: saptamaṃ ca tato vāyum aṣṭamaṃ nirṛtiṃ vasum / HV_App.I,41.535 /
GE07hv_apppu:17670: dharmasyāpatyam etad vai surabhyāṃ samajāyata // HV_App.I,41.536 //
GE07hv_apppu:17671: viśve devāś ca viśvāyāṃ dharmodbhūtā iti śrutiḥ / HV_App.I,41.537 /
GE07hv_apppu:17673: dhanyaś caiva mahābāhur vivasvāṃś ca tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,41.537**41:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17674: dakṣaś caiva mahābāhur vasuś ca suta eva ca / HV_App.I,41.538 /
GE07hv_apppu:17675: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.6 G3.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:17676: sudharmā ca mahābāhuḥ śaṅkhapāc ca mahābalaḥ / **HV_App.I,41.538**42:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17679: ruruś ca ṛṣiputro vai bhāskarapratimadyutiḥ // HV_App.I,41.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:17680: viśve devān devamātā viśveśāñ janayat sutān / HV_App.I,41.542 /
GE07hv_apppu:17681: marutvatī marutvanto devān ajanayac chubhān // HV_App.I,41.543 //
GE07hv_apppu:17682: agniś cakṣur havir jyotiḥ sāvitraṃ mitram eva ca / HV_App.I,41.544 /
GE07hv_apppu:17683: amaraṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ ca saṃkṣayaṃ ca mahābhujam // HV_App.I,41.545 //
GE07hv_apppu:17684: virajaṃ caiva śukraṃ ca viśvāvasuvibhāvasū / HV_App.I,41.546 /
GE07hv_apppu:17685: aśmantaṃ citraraśmiṃ ca tathā niṣṭavinaṃ nṛpam / HV_App.I,41.547 /
GE07hv_apppu:17686: kuyoniṃ ca kṛtiṃ caiva cāritraṃ bahupannagam // HV_App.I,41.548 //
GE07hv_apppu:17687: bṛhantaṃ ca bṛhad rūpaṃ tathaiva tapanānanam / HV_App.I,41.549 /
GE07hv_apppu:17688: marutvatī purā jajñe dharmād vai marutāṃ gaṇam // HV_App.I,41.550 //
GE07hv_apppu:17689: adityāṃ jajñire rājann ādityāḥ kaśyapād atha / HV_App.I,41.551 /
GE07hv_apppu:17690: indro viṣṇur bhagas tvaṣṭā varuṇo 'ṃśo 'ryamā raviḥ // HV_App.I,41.552 //
GE07hv_apppu:17691: pūṣā mitraś ca varado manuḥ parjanya eva ca / HV_App.I,41.553 /
GE07hv_apppu:17692: ity ete dvādaśādityā variṣṭhās tridivaukasaḥ // HV_App.I,41.554 //
GE07hv_apppu:17693: ādityasya sarasvatyāṃ jajñe putradvayaṃ śubham / HV_App.I,41.555 /
GE07hv_apppu:17694: rūpaśreṣṭhaṃ vapuḥśreṣṭhaṃ tridive rūpiṇāṃ varam // HV_App.I,41.556 //
GE07hv_apppu:17696: vairajaṃ caiva babhraṃ ca viśvāvasum adas tathā / **HV_App.I,41.556**43:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17697: danus tu dānavāñ jajñe ditir daityān vyajāyata / HV_App.I,41.557 /
GE07hv_apppu:17698: kālā tu kālakeyān vai asurān rākṣasāṃs tathā // HV_App.I,41.558 //
GE07hv_apppu:17699: anāyuṣāyās tanayā vyādhayaś cādhayas tathā / HV_App.I,41.559 /
GE07hv_apppu:17700: siṃhikā grahamātā ca gandharvajananī muniḥ // HV_App.I,41.560 //
GE07hv_apppu:17701: prādhā cāpsarasāṃ śreṣṭhā apsarāś cāpy ajījanat / HV_App.I,41.561 /
GE07hv_apppu:17702: krodhāyāḥ sarvabhūtāni piśācāś caiva bhārata // HV_App.I,41.562 //
GE07hv_apppu:17703: tathā pakṣigaṇāś caiva guhyakāś ca viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,41.563 /
GE07hv_apppu:17704: catuṣpadāni sarvāṇi ṛte gāvaś ca saurabhāḥ // HV_App.I,41.564 //
GE07hv_apppu:17705: aruṇo garuḍaś caiva vinatāyāṃ vyajāyata / HV_App.I,41.565 /
GE07hv_apppu:17706: mahīdharān sarvanāgān devī kadrūr vyajāyata // HV_App.I,41.566 //
GE07hv_apppu:17707: evaṃ vivṛddhim agaman viśve devāḥ parasparam / HV_App.I,41.567 /
GE07hv_apppu:17708: tadā pauṣkarake rājan prādurbhāve mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.568 //
GE07hv_apppu:17709: purāṇaṃ puṣkaraṃ caiva mayā dvaipāyanāc chrutaṃ / HV_App.I,41.569 /
GE07hv_apppu:17711: yaś cedam agryaṃ paramaṃ purāṇaṃ @ HV_App.I,41.571 @
GE07hv_apppu:17717: kṛtaṃ naḥ paramaṃ brahman viṣṇoś caritam adbhutaṃ / **HV_App.I,41.574**44:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17718: vārāhaṃ caritaṃ cāpi nārasiṃham ataḥ param // **HV_App.I,41.574**44:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:17720: dakṣasya cādhvaraṃ brahmañ chrotum icchāmi tatvataḥ // **HV_App.I,41.574**44:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:17723: suraiś ca munibhiḥ sārdhaṃ hariṇā śaṃkareṇa ca // **HV_App.I,41.574**44:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:17725: tasmin pravṛtte yajñe tu munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.574**44:8 /
GE07hv_apppu:17728: śrutaṃ naḥ paramaṃ brahman svavaṃśacaritaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,41.575 /
GE07hv_apppu:17729: divyam anyonyasaṃbhūtam arcitaṃ bahubhir guṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.576 //
GE07hv_apppu:17730: chandobhir vṛttasaṃjātaiḥ samāsaiś ca suvistaraiḥ / HV_App.I,41.577 /
GE07hv_apppu:17734: brāhmaṇānāṃ prabhāvaiś ca yodhānāṃ ca parākramaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.581 /
GE07hv_apppu:17735: vairaniryātanaiś caiva pratijñānāṃ ca pāragaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.582 //
GE07hv_apppu:17738: ye ca tasmin mahāraudre saṃgrāme nihatā nṛpāḥ / HV_App.I,41.585 /
GE07hv_apppu:17739: teṣāṃ sarvāṇi rāṣṭrāṇi putrāḥ sarve prapedire // HV_App.I,41.586 //
GE07hv_apppu:17741: dharmaś ca bahudhā proktas trayāṇāṃ varṇasaṃpadām / HV_App.I,41.588 /
GE07hv_apppu:17742: śūrāṇām api vikhyātaḥ svargahetur dvijarṣabha // HV_App.I,41.589 //
GE07hv_apppu:17744: caturṇāṃ varṇasaṃjñānāṃ pṛthak pṛthag anekadhā // HV_App.I,41.591 //
GE07hv_apppu:17745: garbhavāsaṃ patantaś ca bhūtānāṃ saṃprabodhitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.592 /
GE07hv_apppu:17746: pṛcchatāṃ devasaṃcāre kṣīṇe puṇye ca karmaṇi // HV_App.I,41.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:17747: dāne yaś cāpi saṃyogaḥ sa cāpi bahudhā kṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.594 /
GE07hv_apppu:17748: dvābhyāṃ saṃyogavihitaṃ madhuvāg vacanaṃ tayoḥ // HV_App.I,41.595 //
GE07hv_apppu:17749: naitac chakyaṃ mayā khyātuṃ bhāratādhyayanaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,41.596 /
GE07hv_apppu:17750: ekāhena mahad brahmann api divyena cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,41.597 //
GE07hv_apppu:17751: brahmaṇo 'hnas tu vistāraṃ saṃkṣepaṃ ca susaṃgraham / HV_App.I,41.598 /
GE07hv_apppu:17752: śrotum icchāmi bhagavan mahat kautūhalaṃ hi me // HV_App.I,41.599 //
GE07hv_apppu:17756: kathāṃ kathayato rājan nirvikāreṇa cetasā // HV_App.I,41.601 //
GE07hv_apppu:17758: purastād brahmasaṃpannaṃ brahmaṇo yad adakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,41.603 //
GE07hv_apppu:17759: avyaktaṃ kāraṇaṃ yat tan nityaṃ sadasadātmakam / HV_App.I,41.604 /
GE07hv_apppu:17761: divyo divyena vapuṣā sarvabhūtapatir vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.606 /
GE07hv_apppu:17762: acintyaś cāvyayaś caiva yugānāṃ prabhavo 'vyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.607 //
GE07hv_apppu:17763: abhūtaś cāpy ajātaś ca sarvatra samatāṃ gataḥ / HV_App.I,41.608 /
GE07hv_apppu:17764: avyaktāt paramaṃ yat tat tat purāṇavido viduḥ // HV_App.I,41.609 //
GE07hv_apppu:17766: sarvataḥ śrutimal loke sarvam āvṛtya tiṣṭati // HV_App.I,41.611 //
GE07hv_apppu:17767: asataś ca sataś caiva vijñeyaṃ tatra kāraṇam / HV_App.I,41.612 /
GE07hv_apppu:17768: avyakto vyaktarūpaś ca carann api na dṛśyate // HV_App.I,41.613 //
GE07hv_apppu:17769: vikārapuruṣo 'vyakto hy arūpī rūpam āśritaḥ / HV_App.I,41.614 /
GE07hv_apppu:17770: caraty acintyaḥ sarveṣu gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu // HV_App.I,41.615 //
GE07hv_apppu:17772: prabhuḥ sarvasya lokasya nāma cāsyeti tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.617 //
GE07hv_apppu:17773: apadāt tu pado jātas tasmān nārāyaṇo 'bhavat / HV_App.I,41.618 /
GE07hv_apppu:17774: avyakto vyaktim āpanno brahmayogena kāmataḥ // HV_App.I,41.619 //
GE07hv_apppu:17775: brahmabhāvena taṃ viddhi sa śabdaṃ labdhavān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.620 /
GE07hv_apppu:17776: prabhavaḥ sarvasya lokasya sthāvarasya carasya ca // HV_App.I,41.621 //
GE07hv_apppu:17777: ahaṃ tv iti sa hovāca prajāḥ srakṣyāmi bhārata / HV_App.I,41.622 /
GE07hv_apppu:17778: prabhavaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yasya tantur imāḥ prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.623 //
GE07hv_apppu:17779: svabhāvāj jāyate sarvaṃ svabhāvāc ca tathābhavat / HV_App.I,41.624 /
GE07hv_apppu:17780: ahaṃkārasvabhāvāc ca sa ca sarvam idaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,41.625 //
GE07hv_apppu:17781: sarvavyāpī nirālambo agrāhyo 'tha jayo dhruvaḥ / HV_App.I,41.626 /
GE07hv_apppu:17782: eṣa brahmamayo jyotir brahmaśabdena śabditaḥ // HV_App.I,41.627 //
GE07hv_apppu:17783: avyakto vyaktim āpannaḥ pañcabhiḥ kratulakṣanaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.628 /
GE07hv_apppu:17784: dhārayan brahmaṇo vyaktiṃ vividhaṃ vitataś caran // HV_App.I,41.629 //
GE07hv_apppu:17785: atha mūrtiṃ samādhāya svabhāvād brahmacoditaḥ / HV_App.I,41.630 /
GE07hv_apppu:17786: sasarja salilaṃ brahmā yena sarvam idaṃ tatam // HV_App.I,41.631 //
GE07hv_apppu:17787: vāyuṃ pūrvam atho dṛṣṭvā yo dhātur dhātṛsattamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.632 /
GE07hv_apppu:17788: dhāraṇād dhātṛśabdaṃ ca labhate lokasamjñitam // HV_App.I,41.633 //
GE07hv_apppu:17789: tad etadvāyusaṃbhūtaṃ kṛtsnaṃ jagad abhūt purā / HV_App.I,41.634 /
GE07hv_apppu:17790: etad devair atikrāntaṃ pūrvam eva sarasvati // HV_App.I,41.635 //
GE07hv_apppu:17791: pṛthaktvaṃ gamitaṃ toyaṃ pṛthivīśabdam icchatā / HV_App.I,41.636 /
GE07hv_apppu:17792: ghanatvāc ca dravatvāc ca nikhilenopalabhyate // HV_App.I,41.637 //
GE07hv_apppu:17793: phalatvāt sīdamānāc ca salile salilodbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.638 /
GE07hv_apppu:17794: vyājahāra śubhāṃ vāṇīṃ samantāt pūrayann iva // HV_App.I,41.639 //
GE07hv_apppu:17795: ūrdhvaṃ vai sthātum icchāmi saṃsīdāmy uddharasva mām / HV_App.I,41.640 /
GE07hv_apppu:17799: śrutvā ca gaditaṃ tasyā giraṃ tāṃ ca subhāṣitām / HV_App.I,41.644 /
GE07hv_apppu:17801: uddhṛtya so 'vaniṃ toyāt kṛtvā karma suduṣkaram / HV_App.I,41.646 /
GE07hv_apppu:17802: samādhau pralayaṃ gatvā pralīno na ca dṛśyate // HV_App.I,41.647 //
GE07hv_apppu:17803: yat tad brahmamayaṃ jyotir ākāśam iti śabditam / HV_App.I,41.648 /
GE07hv_apppu:17805: adyāpi manasā dhātrā dhāryate brahmayoninā / HV_App.I,41.650 /
GE07hv_apppu:17807: bhittvā tu pṛthivīmadhyam upayāti samudbhavam / HV_App.I,41.652 /
GE07hv_apppu:17808: tapanas tūrdhvam ātiṣṭhan raśmibhiḥ pradahann iva // HV_App.I,41.653 //
GE07hv_apppu:17809: tasya maṇḍalamadhyāt tu niḥsṛtaṃ pratimaṇḍalam / HV_App.I,41.654 /
GE07hv_apppu:17810: sa sanātanajo brahmā saumyaṃ somatvam anvagāt // HV_App.I,41.655 //
GE07hv_apppu:17813: sa tu yogamayāj jñānāt svabhāvād brahmasaṃbhavāt / HV_App.I,41.658 /
GE07hv_apppu:17814: sṛjate puruṣaṃ divyaṃ brahmayoniṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.659 //
GE07hv_apppu:17815: dravaṃ yat salilaṃ tasya ghanaṃ yat pṛthivī bhavat / HV_App.I,41.660 /
GE07hv_apppu:17816: chidraṃ tatra tad ākāśaṃ jyotir yac cakṣur eva tat // HV_App.I,41.661 //
GE07hv_apppu:17817: vāyunā spandate caiva saṃghātāj jyotisaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.662 /
GE07hv_apppu:17818: puruṣāt puruśo bhāvaḥ pañcabhūtamayo mahān // HV_App.I,41.663 //
GE07hv_apppu:17819: bhūtātmā vai sa me tasmiṃs tasmin dehaḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.664 /
GE07hv_apppu:17820: guhāyāṃ nihitaṃ jñānaṃ yogād yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.665 //
GE07hv_apppu:17821: tapanasyaiva tad rūpaṃ yo 'gnir vasati dehinām / HV_App.I,41.666 /
GE07hv_apppu:17822: śarīre nityaśo yukte dhātubhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.667 //
GE07hv_apppu:17823: svabhāvāt kṣayam āyāti svabhāvād bhavam eti ca / HV_App.I,41.668 /
GE07hv_apppu:17824: svabhāvād vindate śāntiṃ svabhāvāc ca na vindati // HV_App.I,41.669 //
GE07hv_apppu:17825: indriyair vyatimūḍhātmā mohito brahmaṇaḥ pade / HV_App.I,41.670 /
GE07hv_apppu:17826: saṃbhavaṃ nidhanaṃ caiva karmabhiḥ pratipadyate // HV_App.I,41.671 //
GE07hv_apppu:17827: yāvat tad brahmaviṣayaṃ nopayātīha jñānataḥ / HV_App.I,41.672 /
GE07hv_apppu:17828: tāvat saṃsāram āpnoti saṃbhavāṃś ca punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.673 //
GE07hv_apppu:17829: indriyair vyatirikto vai yadā bhavati yogataḥ / HV_App.I,41.674 /
GE07hv_apppu:17830: tadā brahmatvam āpannaḥ pralayāgre pratiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,41.675 //
GE07hv_apppu:17831: pratiṣiddham amuṃ lokaṃ brahmavāṃś ca bhavaty uta / HV_App.I,41.676 /
GE07hv_apppu:17832: na ca rāgavyayair yāti na ca sajjati karhicit // HV_App.I,41.677 //
GE07hv_apppu:17833: āgatiṃ ca gatiṃ caiva nidhanaṃ saṃbhavaṃ tatha / HV_App.I,41.678 /
GE07hv_apppu:17834: bhūtebhyo vetti sarvajñaḥ parāṃ siddhim upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.679 //
GE07hv_apppu:17835: ātmano gatayaś caiva tathā viṣayagocaram / HV_App.I,41.680 /
GE07hv_apppu:17836: purastāt karmanirvṛttaḥ pade brāhme pratiṣṭhataḥ // HV_App.I,41.681 //
GE07hv_apppu:17837: cittagranthīś ca manasā rundhyāt pūrvāś ca yātanāḥ / HV_App.I,41.682 /
GE07hv_apppu:17839: pacyate hṛdayaṃ līnaṃ parebhyo jñānacakṣuṣā / HV_App.I,41.684 /
GE07hv_apppu:17840: brahmaproktam ihātmā vai vimukto dehabandhanāt // HV_App.I,41.685 //
GE07hv_apppu:17841: sṛjed api paraṃ lokaṃ saṃhared api vidyayā / HV_App.I,41.686 /
GE07hv_apppu:17842: tejomūrtir ivāviddham iha lokaṃ ca saṃsṛjet // HV_App.I,41.687 //
GE07hv_apppu:17843: tiryagyonau gatāṃś caiva karmabhir nirayopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.688 /
GE07hv_apppu:17844: tāny api pratimucyeta brahmayuktena cetasā // HV_App.I,41.689 //
GE07hv_apppu:17845: akṣaraṃ ca kṣaraṃ caiva yogakarmāti vidyate / HV_App.I,41.690 /
GE07hv_apppu:17846: na kṣaraṃ vidyate tatra yad brahma karmabhir dhruvam // HV_App.I,41.691 //
GE07hv_apppu:17849: pṛthivyāṃ yat kṛtaṃ chidraṃ tapanena vivardhatā / HV_App.I,41.692 /
GE07hv_apppu:17851: parvabhiḥ parvatatvaṃ ca labhate nāmasaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,41.694 /
GE07hv_apppu:17852: acalād acalatvaṃ ca svabhāvān merur eva saḥ // HV_App.I,41.695 //
GE07hv_apppu:17853: tasya pṛṣṭhe suvistīrṇe nagasya sumaharddhimān / HV_App.I,41.696 /
GE07hv_apppu:17854: tasmin sa puruṣo vyakto vasati jyotisaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.697 /
GE07hv_apppu:17855: vihitaś ca svabhāvena tenaiva paramātmanā // HV_App.I,41.698 //
GE07hv_apppu:17856: yat tad brahmamayaṃ tejo nihitaṃ śiraso 'ntare / HV_App.I,41.699 /
GE07hv_apppu:17857: tasya jyotirmayaṃ rūpaṃ dīptaṃ puruṣavigraham // HV_App.I,41.700 //
GE07hv_apppu:17858: vadanād abhiniṣkrāntaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / HV_App.I,41.701 /
GE07hv_apppu:17859: caturbhir vadanair yuktaṃ caturbhiś ca bhujottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.702 //
GE07hv_apppu:17860: vaktrād brahma sumudbhūtaṃ brahmā brāhmaṇapuṃgavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.703 /
GE07hv_apppu:17861: tad evaitan mahābhūtaṃ punarbhāvatvam āgatam // HV_App.I,41.704 //
GE07hv_apppu:17862: uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī purastāt salilāśayā / HV_App.I,41.705 /
GE07hv_apppu:17866: brahmatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ sthānād aloko lokatāṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,41.706 //
GE07hv_apppu:17867: padasaṃdhau brahmalokaṃ śṛṅgaṃ meros tadābhavat / HV_App.I,41.707 /
GE07hv_apppu:17868: ucchritaṃ yojanaśataṃ sahasraśatam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.708 //
GE07hv_apppu:17869: evam eva ca vistāraṃ caturbhir guṇitaṃ guṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.709 /
GE07hv_apppu:17870: atha vā naiva saṃkhyātuṃ śakyaṃ bhūtena kenacit / HV_App.I,41.710 /
GE07hv_apppu:17871: samāsahasrair bahubhir api divyena cetasā // HV_App.I,41.711 //
GE07hv_apppu:17873: nagasya yasya rājendra vistāraiḥ śatayojanaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.713 //
GE07hv_apppu:17875: yogayuktaiḥ sadā siddhair nityaṃ brahmaparāyaṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.715 //
GE07hv_apppu:17876: marudbhiḥ saha devendrai rudraiḥ vasubhir eva ca / HV_App.I,41.716 /
GE07hv_apppu:17878: rarakṣa pṛthivīṃ caiva bhagavān viṣṇunā saha / HV_App.I,41.718 /
GE07hv_apppu:17879: vivisvadvaruṇābhyāṃ ca saṃghātaṃ gamitāṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.719 //
GE07hv_apppu:17880: tena brāhmaṇe vapuṣā brahmaprāptena bhārata / HV_App.I,41.720 /
GE07hv_apppu:17881: yat tad viṣṇumayaṃ tejaḥ sarvatra samatāṃ gatam // HV_App.I,41.721 //
GE07hv_apppu:17882: yat tad brahmeti vai proktaṃ brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.722 /
GE07hv_apppu:17884: evam ete trayo lokā brāhme 'hani samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.724 /
GE07hv_apppu:17885: ahani brahma cāvyaktaṃ vyaktaṃ prāṇe pratiṣṭhitam // HV_App.I,41.725 //
GE07hv_apppu:17886: brahmaṇo niyataṃ karma prabhāvena pracoditam / HV_App.I,41.726 /
GE07hv_apppu:17888: etad dhitam iti proktaṃ brāhmaṇair vedapāragaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.728 /
GE07hv_apppu:17889: yad ekaṃ brahma nirdiṣṭaṃ viśvatāṃ gamitaṃ padam // HV_App.I,41.729 //
GE07hv_apppu:17891: yat tad viṣṇumayaṃ tejo viśvatvaṃ gamitaṃ param / **HV_App.I,41.729**46:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:17895: evaṃ dvaṃdvaṃ sa bhagavān prathamaṃ mithunaṃ sṛjat // HV_App.I,41.733 //
GE07hv_apppu:17896: sa eva bhagavān viśvo devyā saha sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.734 /
GE07hv_apppu:17897: vidhāya vipulān bhogān brahmā carati sānugaḥ // HV_App.I,41.735 //
GE07hv_apppu:17898: sa eṣa bhagavān brahmā nityaṃ brahmavidāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,41.736 /
GE07hv_apppu:17902: abhiṣicya ca bhūteśaṃ kṛtvā karma svabhāvataḥ / HV_App.I,41.740 /
GE07hv_apppu:17903: nadati sma tadā nādaṃ tena sā hy ucyate nadī // HV_App.I,41.741 //
GE07hv_apppu:17904: sā brahmalokaṃ sambhāvyam abhibhūya sahasradhā / HV_App.I,41.742 /
GE07hv_apppu:17905: gāṃ gatā gaganād devī saptadhā prasasāra ha // HV_App.I,41.743 //
GE07hv_apppu:17906: sahasradhā ca rājendra bahudhā ca punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,41.744 /
GE07hv_apppu:17907: imaṃ lokam amuṃ caiva bhāvayan kṣarasaṃbhavam // HV_App.I,41.745 //
GE07hv_apppu:17908: tato bhūtāni rohanti mahābhūtaphalāni ca / HV_App.I,41.746 /
GE07hv_apppu:17909: tataḥ sarve kriyārambhāḥ prāvartanta manīṣiṇām // HV_App.I,41.747 //
GE07hv_apppu:17910: caturbhir vadanais tasya mukhapadmād viniḥsṛtā / HV_App.I,41.748 /
GE07hv_apppu:17912: tasya jñānamayaṃ puṇyaṃ catuṣpādaṃ sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.750 /
GE07hv_apppu:17913: patitvenābhavad devo brahmā cātra pitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,41.751 //
GE07hv_apppu:17914: pādā dharmasya catvāro yair idaṃ dhāryate jagat / HV_App.I,41.752 /
GE07hv_apppu:17915: brahmacaryeṇa vyaktena gṛhasthena ca pāvane // HV_App.I,41.753 //
GE07hv_apppu:17917: ity ete dharmapādāḥ syuḥ svargahetoḥ pracoditāḥ // HV_App.I,41.755 //
GE07hv_apppu:17918: nyāyād dharmeṇa guhyena somo vardhati maṇḍale / HV_App.I,41.756 /
GE07hv_apppu:17919: brahmā sabrahmacaraṇā vedā vartanti śāśvatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.757 //
GE07hv_apppu:17920: gṛhasthān abhivākyena tṛpyanti pitaras tadā / HV_App.I,41.758 /
GE07hv_apppu:17921: ṛṣayo 'pi ca dharmeṇa nagasya śirasi sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.759 //
GE07hv_apppu:17922: nagasya tasya saṃpaśya meroḥ śikharam uttamam / HV_App.I,41.760 /
GE07hv_apppu:17923: padbhyāṃ saṃpīḍya vṛṣaṇāv ṛṣibhis tair vicāryate // HV_App.I,41.761 //
GE07hv_apppu:17924: grīvāṃ nigṛhya pṛṣṭhaṃ ca vināmya prahasann iva / HV_App.I,41.762 /
