GE07hv_apppu:17925: nābhideśe karau nyasya sarvaśo 'ṅgāni saṃkṣipan // HV_App.I,41.763 //
GE07hv_apppu:17926: mūrdhni brahma samutkṣipya manasā sa pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.764 /
GE07hv_apppu:17927: asṛjan manasā viṣṇuṃ yogād yogeśvarasya ca // HV_App.I,41.765 //
GE07hv_apppu:17928: vyatiriktendriyo viṣṇur bimbād bimbam ivoddhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.766 /
GE07hv_apppu:17931: virājan nabhaso madhye prabhābhir atulaṃ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.769 //
GE07hv_apppu:17932: nopalabhyati mūḍhātmā pratyakṣaṃ brahma śāśvatam / HV_App.I,41.770 /
GE07hv_apppu:17933: lalāṭamadhye tiṣṭhantaṃ dvidhābhūtaṃ kriyāṃ prati // HV_App.I,41.771 //
GE07hv_apppu:17934: jyotiś cakṣuṣi saṃbaddhaṃ bimbaṃ bhāskarasomayoḥ / HV_App.I,41.772 /
GE07hv_apppu:17935: buddhyā pūrvaṃ tu paśyanti adhyātmaviṣaye ratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.773 //
GE07hv_apppu:17937: netare jātu paśyanti adhyātmaṃ nāvabudhyate // HV_App.I,41.775 //
GE07hv_apppu:17939: bhūtayo bhuvi bhūteśo mohaprāptena cetasā // HV_App.I,41.777 //
GE07hv_apppu:17941: narāṇāṃ yogam ādhāya sveṣu gātreṣu bhārata // HV_App.I,41.779 //
GE07hv_apppu:17943: candramaṇḍalasaṃsthānaṃ jyotis tejo mahat tadā // HV_App.I,41.781 //
GE07hv_apppu:17944: praviśya hṛdayaṃ kṣipraṃ gāyatryā nayanāntare / HV_App.I,41.782 /
GE07hv_apppu:17945: garbhasya saṃbhavo yaś ca caturdhā puruṣātmakaḥ // HV_App.I,41.783 //
GE07hv_apppu:17947: na cendriyaguṇair yukto yuktas tejoguṇena ca // HV_App.I,41.785 //
GE07hv_apppu:17949: netrābhyāṃ janayad devo ṛgvedaṃ yajuṣā saha // HV_App.I,41.787 //
GE07hv_apppu:17950: sāmavedaṃ ca jihvāgrād atharvāṇaṃ ca mūrdhataḥ / HV_App.I,41.788 /
GE07hv_apppu:17951: jātamātrās tu te vedāḥ kṣetraṃ vindanti tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.789 //
GE07hv_apppu:17952: tena vedatvam āpannā yasmād vindanti tatpadam / HV_App.I,41.790 /
GE07hv_apppu:17953: te sṛjanti tadā vedā brahma pūrvaṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.791 //
GE07hv_apppu:17954: puruṣaṃ divyarūpābhaṃ svaiḥ svair bhāvair manobhavaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.792 /
GE07hv_apppu:17955: atharvaṇas tu yo bhāgaḥ śīrṣaṃ yajñasya tat smṛtam // HV_App.I,41.793 //
GE07hv_apppu:17956: grīvābāhvantaraṃ caiva ṛgbhāgaḥ sa bhavet tataḥ / HV_App.I,41.794 /
GE07hv_apppu:17957: hṛdayaṃ caiva pārśvaṃ ca sāmabhāgas tu nirmitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.795 /
GE07hv_apppu:17959: evam eṣa yajurbhāgaḥ saṃghāto yajñakalpitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.797 /
GE07hv_apppu:17960: puruṣo divyarūpābhaḥ saṃbhūto hy amarāt padāt // HV_App.I,41.798 //
GE07hv_apppu:17961: sa hi vedamayo yajñaḥ sarvabhūtasukhāvahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.799 /
GE07hv_apppu:17962: ubhayor lokayos tāta hiṃsāvarjyaḥ sanātanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.800 //
GE07hv_apppu:17964: prabhavaṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ yo vindati sa vedavit // HV_App.I,41.802 //
GE07hv_apppu:17965: sa siddhaḥ procyate loke siddhir eva na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.803 /
GE07hv_apppu:17967: vaiṣṇavaṃ yajñam ity evaṃ bruvate vedapāragāḥ / HV_App.I,41.805 /
GE07hv_apppu:17970: cetasas tūpalambho hi manogrāhyasya kāmataḥ / HV_App.I,41.807 /
GE07hv_apppu:17971: kāraṇaṃ śrotum icchāmi yathātattvaṃ mahāmune // HV_App.I,41.808 //
GE07hv_apppu:17973: na hy asya kāraṇaṃ kiṃcid bāhyaṃ bhavati bhārata / HV_App.I,41.809 /
GE07hv_apppu:17974: antargataṃ kāraṇaṃ tu śārīraṃ mānasaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.810 /
GE07hv_apppu:17975: yena vedyaṃ vidur martyā brāhmaṇāḥ saṃśitavratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.811 //
GE07hv_apppu:17976: avedyam api vedyaṃ ca śakyaṃ vettuṃ na karmaṇā / HV_App.I,41.812 /
GE07hv_apppu:17979: sadā caiva śucir bhūtvā niyato brahmakarmaṇā / HV_App.I,41.815 /
GE07hv_apppu:17980: upatiṣṭheta sa guruṃ baddhāñjalipuṭo dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,41.816 //
GE07hv_apppu:17981: sāyaṃ prātaś ca tattvajño mokṣakarmāṇi kārayet / HV_App.I,41.817 /
GE07hv_apppu:17983: saṃprapadyeta manasā vaiṣṇavaṃ padam uttamam / HV_App.I,41.819 /
GE07hv_apppu:17984: dhyāyann eva prasīdeta samāhitamatir dvijaḥ // HV_App.I,41.820 //
GE07hv_apppu:17985: sa gacchet paramaṃ brahma nirvikāreṇa cetasā / HV_App.I,41.821 /
GE07hv_apppu:17987: tad evākṣaram ity āhur yat tad brahma sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.823 /
GE07hv_apppu:17988: na hi tat karmayogena vidyāyogena darśitam // HV_App.I,41.824 //
GE07hv_apppu:17992: anādānena manasā rājan karmaṇi karmaṇi // HV_App.I,41.828 //
GE07hv_apppu:17993: ādānād badhyate jantur nirādānāt pramucyate / HV_App.I,41.829 /
GE07hv_apppu:17994: brahmaṇebhyaḥ kriyāprāptir jantoḥ pūrvāj janādhipa // HV_App.I,41.830 //
GE07hv_apppu:17995: muktaś cendriyabandhena prātaś ca paramaṃ padam / HV_App.I,41.831 /
GE07hv_apppu:17996: na bhūyaḥ punar āyāti mānuṣaṃ dehavigraham // HV_App.I,41.832 //
GE07hv_apppu:17999: upasargaṃ ca yogaṃ ca dhyātavyaṃ caiva yat padam / HV_App.I,41.833 /
GE07hv_apppu:18000: siddhiṃ siddhiguṇāṃś caiva śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.834 //
GE07hv_apppu:18002: śṛṇu vistarataḥ sarvaṃ yathā pṛcchasi medhayā / HV_App.I,41.835 /
GE07hv_apppu:18004: pañcendriyaguṇāṃs tyaktvā paśyato brahmaṇo nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.837 /
GE07hv_apppu:18007: bahurūpam anaiśvaryāt pravakṣyāmi nibodha tat // HV_App.I,41.840 //
GE07hv_apppu:18010: tejasā mūrdhni cādhāya dhūmo dodhūyate mahān / HV_App.I,41.843 /
GE07hv_apppu:18011: nīlalohitavarṇābhaḥ pītaiḥ śvetaiś ca dhātubhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.844 //
GE07hv_apppu:18017: saṃpatadbhiś ca yugapan meghair iva samāgame // HV_App.I,41.850 //
GE07hv_apppu:18020: nirvemuś caiva toyaughān viviśur vasudhātalam // HV_App.I,41.853 //
GE07hv_apppu:18021: mūrdhni caiva mahān agnir mānaso dhūyate prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.854 /
GE07hv_apppu:18023: tasyāgner visphuliṅgānāṃ sahasrāṇi śatāni ca / HV_App.I,41.856 /
GE07hv_apppu:18025: yāvantyo varṣadhārāś ca tāvantyo 'rcyo 'nalasya tu / HV_App.I,41.858 /
GE07hv_apppu:18027: varṇābhyāṃ yujyamānaś ca vāyur dodhūyate mahān / HV_App.I,41.860 /
GE07hv_apppu:18030: tair eva cāgnisaṃghātair dhātubhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.863 //
GE07hv_apppu:18031: sahasraśo 'tha śataśo mūrtiṃ kṛtvā pṛthagvidhām / HV_App.I,41.864 /
GE07hv_apppu:18032: agnir vāyujalaṃ bhūmir dhātavo brahmacoditāḥ // HV_App.I,41.865 //
GE07hv_apppu:18034: saṃghātaṃ brahmavegena dhātavo gamitā nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.867 //
GE07hv_apppu:18035: yadbrahma cakṣuṣor madhye sa sūkṣmaḥ puruṣo virāṭ / HV_App.I,41.868 /
GE07hv_apppu:18036: tayor anyān bahūn sukṣmān sasṛje puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.869 //
GE07hv_apppu:18037: sa eṣa bhagavān viṣṇur vyaktāvyaktaḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.870 /
GE07hv_apppu:18039: taṃ mūrdhni dhātubhir baddhaṃ viśanti brahmacoditāḥ / HV_App.I,41.872 /
GE07hv_apppu:18040: te 'ntarā puruṣāḥ sarve jñātāraḥ sukhaduḥkhayoḥ // HV_App.I,41.873 //
GE07hv_apppu:18041: atha ceṣṭitum ārabdhā mūrtayo brahmasaṃmitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.874 /
GE07hv_apppu:18042: bhittvā ca dharaṇīṃ devīṃ prapadyante diśo daśa // HV_App.I,41.875 //
GE07hv_apppu:18043: ity ete pārthivāḥ sarve ṛṣayo brahmanirmitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.876 /
GE07hv_apppu:18044: tatraiva pralayaṃ yātā bhūmitvam upayānti ca // HV_App.I,41.877 //
GE07hv_apppu:18046: karmakṣayād vimuktatvād indriyāṇāṃ ca bandhanāt / HV_App.I,41.879 /
GE07hv_apppu:18047: tām eva prakṛtiṃ yānti ajñātāṃ karmagocaraiḥ // HV_App.I,41.880 //
GE07hv_apppu:18048: kṣarād dhūmakṣayaṃ caiva agnigarbhās tapomayāḥ / HV_App.I,41.881 /
GE07hv_apppu:18049: yena tantur iva cchanno bhāvābhāvaḥ pravartate // HV_App.I,41.882 //
GE07hv_apppu:18050: dhūmād abhrās tu saṃbhūtā abhrāt toyaṃ sunirmalam / HV_App.I,41.883 /
GE07hv_apppu:18051: jagatī jalāt tu saṃbhūtā jagaty eva ca yat phalam // HV_App.I,41.884 //
GE07hv_apppu:18052: phalād rasaś ca saṃjajñe rasāt prāṇaś ca dehinām / HV_App.I,41.885 /
GE07hv_apppu:18053: rasas tu tanmayo jajñe yat tad brahma sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.886 //
GE07hv_apppu:18054: pradhānaṃ brahma uddiṣṭaṃ bahubhiḥ kāraṇāntaraiḥ / HV_App.I,41.887 /
GE07hv_apppu:18056: avyaktād vyaktim āpannaṃ svena bhāvena bhārata / HV_App.I,41.889 /
GE07hv_apppu:18057: antaḥsthaṃ sarvabhūteṣu carantaṃ vidyayā saha // HV_App.I,41.890 //
GE07hv_apppu:18058: karma karteti rājendra viṣayastham anekadhā / HV_App.I,41.891 /
GE07hv_apppu:18061: niḥsṛtas tu bhruvor madhyān meghamukta ivāṃśumān // HV_App.I,41.894 //
GE07hv_apppu:18062: caradbhiḥ pakṣival loke nirdvaṃdvair niṣparigrahaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.895 /
GE07hv_apppu:18063: yogadharmeṇa kauravya dhruvam āsādyate phalam // HV_App.I,41.896 //
GE07hv_apppu:18064: prādurbhāvaṃ kṣayaṃ caiva bhūtasya nidhanaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,41.897 /
GE07hv_apppu:18065: vidhatte śataśo brahmā saṃkṣaye ca bhavet tathā // HV_App.I,41.898 //
GE07hv_apppu:18066: karmaṇaḥ karmayogajño bhūtebhyo nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.899 /
GE07hv_apppu:18067: avināśāya lokasya dharmasyāpy āyanena ca // HV_App.I,41.900 //
GE07hv_apppu:18069: etad brahmayugaṃ nāma yugānāṃ prathamaṃ yugam // HV_App.I,41.902 //
GE07hv_apppu:18071: sūkṣmaṃ bhavati lokānāṃ nirvikāram acetanam // HV_App.I,41.904 //
GE07hv_apppu:18072: tathā pralayam āpannaṃ jagat sarvaṃ sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.905 /
GE07hv_apppu:18073: brahma sampadyate sūkṣmaṃ nirmitaṃ kāraṇair guṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.906 //
GE07hv_apppu:18076: prāgvaṃśaṃ śrotum icchāmi vistareṇa mahāmune / HV_App.I,41.907 /
GE07hv_apppu:18077: ādyayor yugayor brahman brahmaprāptasya sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.908 //
GE07hv_apppu:18079: śṛṇu vistaraśaḥ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi medhayā / HV_App.I,41.909 /
GE07hv_apppu:18081: ṛddhiṃ prāptas tu bhagavān yogātmā brahmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.911 /
GE07hv_apppu:18082: bhūtānāṃ bahulatvaṃ ca cakāreheśvaraḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.912 //
GE07hv_apppu:18083: sthito brahmāsane brahmā vikṣiptaḥ sahasā prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.913 /
GE07hv_apppu:18085: raktaś ca mokṣaviṣaye sarvajñānamaye pade / HV_App.I,41.915 /
GE07hv_apppu:18086: yasmāt padasahasrāṇi bhavanti na bhavanti ca // HV_App.I,41.916 //
GE07hv_apppu:18087: brahmayajñaṃ tu yajate yogād vedātmakaṃ sadā / HV_App.I,41.917 /
GE07hv_apppu:18088: brahmaṇo vipulaṃ jñānam aiśvaryaṃ ca prajāyate // HV_App.I,41.918 //
GE07hv_apppu:18089: tataḥ prathamam aiśvaryaṃ yuñjānena pravartitam / HV_App.I,41.919 /
GE07hv_apppu:18090: brahmaṇā brahmabhūtena bhūtānāṃ hitam icchatā // HV_App.I,41.920 //
GE07hv_apppu:18091: yadā tv ākāśam aiśvaryaṃ yuñjānasya pravartate / HV_App.I,41.921 /
GE07hv_apppu:18093: tadāntarikṣaṃ saṃprāptaṃ nirmalaṃ brahma cāvyayam / HV_App.I,41.923 /
GE07hv_apppu:18097: pravartamānam aiśvaryaṃ vāyubhūtaṃ karoti ca / HV_App.I,41.927 /
GE07hv_apppu:18098: vikārair bahubhiḥ prāptaiḥ saṃpatadbhir mahābalaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.928 //
GE07hv_apppu:18099: etair vikāraiḥ saṃvṛttair niruddhaiś ca samantataḥ / HV_App.I,41.929 /
GE07hv_apppu:18100: dhruvam aiśvaryam āpannaḥ siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.930 //
GE07hv_apppu:18102: nirālambo nirālambān ālambya manasā tataḥ // HV_App.I,41.932 //
GE07hv_apppu:18103: aiśvaryabhūto bhūtātmā caran divi na dṛśyate / HV_App.I,41.933 /
GE07hv_apppu:18104: cakṣurbhir bahubhir loke puraṃdarasamair api // HV_App.I,41.934 //
GE07hv_apppu:18105: oṃkāraṃ ye tv adhīyante manasā brahmasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,41.935 /
GE07hv_apppu:18106: vibhaktāḥ sarvakāmebhyas te taṃ paśyanti sādhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.936 //
GE07hv_apppu:18107: etad dhi paramaṃ brahma brāhmaṇānāṃ manīṣiṇām / HV_App.I,41.937 /
GE07hv_apppu:18108: antaścarati bhūtānāṃ viddhi cetanayā saha // HV_App.I,41.938 //
GE07hv_apppu:18109: eṣa śabdo mahānādaḥ purāṇo brahmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.939 /
GE07hv_apppu:18110: vāyūbhūto 'kṣaraṃ prāpto vadanty evaṃ dvijātayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.940 //
GE07hv_apppu:18111: arūpī rūpasaṃpanno dhātubhiḥ saha saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.941 /
GE07hv_apppu:18113: tataḥ pūrvam anudhyāya manasā pūrayann iva / HV_App.I,41.943 /
GE07hv_apppu:18114: vedātmakaṃ tadā yajñaṃ cintayanto manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.944 //
GE07hv_apppu:18115: brāhmaṇāḥ śucayo dāntā yaśo 'yuñjaṃs tadanvayāḥ / HV_App.I,41.945 /
GE07hv_apppu:18116: brahmalokaṃ kāṅkṣamāṇā vaiṣṇavaṃ padam uttamam // HV_App.I,41.946 //
GE07hv_apppu:18117: yasya hetoḥ kriyāḥ sarvāḥ kurvanti vigatajvarāḥ / HV_App.I,41.947 /
GE07hv_apppu:18118: na hy ete prasavādāne bhavam icchanti bhārata // HV_App.I,41.948 //
GE07hv_apppu:18119: mālyopahāraiś ca tribhiḥ pratibhānaiś ca vai dvijāḥ / HV_App.I,41.949 /
GE07hv_apppu:18121: yajanaṃ vikramaṃ caiva brahmapūrvāḥ pracakrire / HV_App.I,41.951 /
GE07hv_apppu:18122: brahmā ca vaiṣṇavaṃ tejo vedoktair vacanair nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.952 //
GE07hv_apppu:18123: brāhmaṇair vedavidbhiś ca brahmajñair brahmavādibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.953 /
GE07hv_apppu:18125: dhātubhir mokṣakāle ca mahātmā saṃpradṛṣyate / HV_App.I,41.955 /
GE07hv_apppu:18126: tad eva paramaṃ brahma vaiṣṇavaṃ paramādbhutam // HV_App.I,41.956 //
GE07hv_apppu:18127: rasātmakaṃ tad aiśvaryaṃ vikārānte pradṛśyate / HV_App.I,41.957 /
GE07hv_apppu:18128: ghorarūpā vikārās te vyathayanti mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.958 //
GE07hv_apppu:18130: ūrmibhiś chādyate caiva śītoṣṇābhir vikārataḥ // HV_App.I,41.960 //
GE07hv_apppu:18131: mahārṇavagataś caiva dahyate na ca sajjate / HV_App.I,41.961 /
GE07hv_apppu:18132: bhagnāś caiva mahānadyaḥ salile caiva sīdati // HV_App.I,41.962 //
GE07hv_apppu:18133: sīdamānaś ca salile sa śīte pātyate balāt / HV_App.I,41.963 /
GE07hv_apppu:18134: aśanāc chādanāc cāpi yujyamāno vicetanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.964 //
GE07hv_apppu:18135: śvabhre prapadyamānaś ca toyena pariṣicyate / HV_App.I,41.965 /
GE07hv_apppu:18136: śuklavarṇena bahunā srotasā mūrdhni sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.966 //
GE07hv_apppu:18137: ūrdhvaṃ jyotir avekṣyaś ca śubhraiḥ pītaiś ca chādyate / HV_App.I,41.967 /
GE07hv_apppu:18138: vāripūrṇaiḥ sugambhīrair vidyudbhir iva bhāsitaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.968 //
GE07hv_apppu:18139: etair vikāraiḥ saṃvṛttair niruddhaiś caiva sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.969 /
GE07hv_apppu:18140: dhruvaiśvaryam athāsādya siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.970 //
GE07hv_apppu:18141: rasātmakaṃ tad aiśvaryaṃ jihvāgrād abhiniḥsṛtam / HV_App.I,41.971 /
GE07hv_apppu:18143: rasāṃś ca vividhān yogān sa siddhaḥ sṛjate prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.973 /
GE07hv_apppu:18145: tejaso rūpam aiśvaryaṃ vikāraiḥ saha vardhate / HV_App.I,41.975 /
GE07hv_apppu:18147: ugrarūpair vikāraiś ca hanyate daṇḍapāṇibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.977 /
GE07hv_apppu:18149: netraṃ samuddharan bhīmaṃ jihvāgraṃ cāsya vindati / HV_App.I,41.979 /
GE07hv_apppu:18150: nadanti yugapan nādāñ jṛmbhamāṇāḥ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.980 //
GE07hv_apppu:18151: punar eva tadā bhūtvā bahurūpās tadābhavan / HV_App.I,41.981 /
GE07hv_apppu:18153: strībhūtāś ca samaṃ sarve yuñjānāś cāvalambire / HV_App.I,41.983 /
GE07hv_apppu:18154: kaṇṭheṣu bahurūpatvād vighnaiś caiva pralobhayan // HV_App.I,41.984 //
GE07hv_apppu:18155: madhurair abhidhānaiś ca vyāharanti nabhītavat / HV_App.I,41.985 /
GE07hv_apppu:18156: patanti yugapat sarve pādayor mūrdhabhir natāḥ // HV_App.I,41.986 //
GE07hv_apppu:18158: bahuprakāraṃ kathayan nṛtyanti ca ramanti ca // HV_App.I,41.988 //
GE07hv_apppu:18159: etair vikāraiḥ saṃvṛttair niruddhaiś caiva sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.989 /
GE07hv_apppu:18160: dhruvam aiśvaryam āsādya siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.990 //
GE07hv_apppu:18163: jyotīṃṣi caiva saṃvṛttā ākāśe guṇasaṃvṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,41.993 /
GE07hv_apppu:18164: caranti satataṃ loke sūryācandramasor gatim // HV_App.I,41.994 //
GE07hv_apppu:18165: candrasūryātmakaṃ divyaṃ jyotiṣmad dhanam uttamam / HV_App.I,41.995 /
GE07hv_apppu:18166: etad vibhrājate loke kālacakraṃ dhruvaṃ caran // HV_App.I,41.996 //
GE07hv_apppu:18167: ardhamāsāś ca māsāś ca ṛtusaṃvatsarāṇy atha / HV_App.I,41.997 /
GE07hv_apppu:18168: kṣaṇā lavā muhūrtāś ca kalāḥ kāṣṭhās tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,41.998 //
GE07hv_apppu:18170: tārāṇāṃ gatayaś caiva grahāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1000 //
GE07hv_apppu:18172: yogayuktās tv abhigrastāḥ prātyante hy acalāsanāt // HV_App.I,41.1002 //
GE07hv_apppu:18174: sīdate vasudhāmadhye bhidyamānaḥ punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1004 //
GE07hv_apppu:18175: bhūtānāṃ bahurūpaiś ca anyaiś ca talavāsibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1005 /
GE07hv_apppu:18176: viṣayair yujyate kṣipraṃ saṃkṣepāt saṃprarudhyate // HV_App.I,41.1006 //
GE07hv_apppu:18178: tataḥ pārthivam aiśvaryaṃ sevamānaś ca sarvataḥ / **HV_App.I,41.1006**47:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:18179: mūrtimadbhiś ca bahudhā dhātubhiḥ sa ca hanyate / HV_App.I,41.1007 /
GE07hv_apppu:18181: asibhiḥ pātyate caiva kṣuradhāraiḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1009 /
GE07hv_apppu:18182: bhidyate caiva bāṇāgraiḥ sutīkṣṇair marmabhedibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1010 //
GE07hv_apppu:18183: ebhir vikāraiḥ sakalair niruddhaiś cāpi sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1011 /
GE07hv_apppu:18184: dhruvam aiśvaryam āpannaḥ siddho bhavati brāhmaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1012 //
GE07hv_apppu:18185: tataḥ pārthivam aiśvaryaṃ nirmuktasya vikārataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1013 /
GE07hv_apppu:18186: prādurbhavati yuñjāne samādhau pralayaṃ gate // HV_App.I,41.1014 //
GE07hv_apppu:18187: divyaṃ tad gandham āghrāti divyārthāṃs tāñ śṛṇoti ca / HV_App.I,41.1015 /
GE07hv_apppu:18188: divyarūpaiś ca puruṣair bhidyate na ca chidyate / HV_App.I,41.1016 /
GE07hv_apppu:18189: gacchan prakṛtito 'nantaḥ pradhānātmā kṣarann iva // HV_App.I,41.1017 //
GE07hv_apppu:18192: tato 'nyāṃ dhāraṇāṃ gatvā manasā sa pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1018 /
GE07hv_apppu:18194: sarvāṅgadhāraṇāṃ kṛtvā manasā prahasann iva / HV_App.I,41.1020 /
GE07hv_apppu:18195: brahmayogena yogajñaḥ sṛjate manasā prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1021 //
GE07hv_apppu:18196: manasā rūpasaṃpannā hy apsarāḥ sṛjate prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1022 /
GE07hv_apppu:18200: brahmayogena yogajñaḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1026 //
GE07hv_apppu:18203: dharmyāṃ śucigiraṃ sevyāṃ brāhmīṃ mūrtimatīṃ śriyam // HV_App.I,41.1029 //
GE07hv_apppu:18204: sasṛje manasā brahmā samyakproktena cetasā / HV_App.I,41.1030 /
GE07hv_apppu:18206: cakṣuṣā rupasaṃpannāḥ sṛjan so 'psarasaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1032 /
GE07hv_apppu:18207: nāsikāgrāc ca gandharvān suvācaḥ supravāditān // HV_App.I,41.1033 //
GE07hv_apppu:18209: anyeṣāṃ caiva viprāṇāṃ gānaṃ brahmaprabhāvitam // HV_App.I,41.1035 //
GE07hv_apppu:18210: padbhyāṃ sṛjati bhūtāni gatimanti dhruvāṇi ca / HV_App.I,41.1036 /
GE07hv_apppu:18212: gajān siṃhāṃś ca vyāghrāṃś ca mṛgāṃś caiva sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1038 /
GE07hv_apppu:18213: tṛṇajātīś ca bahudhā bhāvahetoś catuṣpadān // HV_App.I,41.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:18214: ye tu hastān nikhādanti karmaprāptena hetunā / HV_App.I,41.1040 /
GE07hv_apppu:18215: hastebhyaḥ karma sa sṛjan mantavyaṃ manasā tathā // HV_App.I,41.1041 //
GE07hv_apppu:18216: pāyunā sa visargaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ sukham icchatām / HV_App.I,41.1042 /
GE07hv_apppu:18218: hṛdayād asṛjad gāvo bāhunā pakṣiṇas tathā / HV_App.I,41.1044 /
GE07hv_apppu:18219: anyāni caiva sattvāni tais tair veṣaiḥ pṛthagvidhaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1045 //
GE07hv_apppu:18220: ṛṣiṃ tv aṅgirasaṃ caiva muniṃ jvalitatejasam / HV_App.I,41.1046 /
GE07hv_apppu:18222: bhruvo 'ntare janayate yogād yogīśvaraḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1048 /
GE07hv_apppu:18225: sanatkumāraṃ mūrdhnaś ca mahāyogī pitāmahaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1051 //
GE07hv_apppu:18226: abhiṣiktaṃ ca somaṃ ca yauvarājye pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1052 /
GE07hv_apppu:18227: brāhmaṇānāṃ ca rājānaṃ śāśvataṃ rajanīcaram // HV_App.I,41.1053 //
GE07hv_apppu:18228: tapasā mahatā yukto grahaiḥ saha puraḥsaraḥ / HV_App.I,41.1054 /
GE07hv_apppu:18229: cacāra nabhaso madhye prabhābhir bhāsayañ jagat // HV_App.I,41.1055 //
GE07hv_apppu:18230: sa gātrair manasā yogān bhagavān siddhim āgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1056 /
GE07hv_apppu:18231: sṛṣṭavān sarvabhūtāni sthāvarāṇi carāṇi ca // HV_App.I,41.1057 //
GE07hv_apppu:18232: tatra sthānāni bhūtānāṃ yogaṃś caiva pṛthagvidhān / HV_App.I,41.1058 /
GE07hv_apppu:18234: eṣa brahmamayo yajño yogaḥ sāṃkhyaś ca tattvataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1060 /
GE07hv_apppu:18235: vijñānaṃ ca svabhāvaṃ ca kṣetraṃ kṣetrajñam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1061 //
GE07hv_apppu:18236: ekatvaṃ ca pṛthaktvaṃ ca saṃbhavo nidhanaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,41.1062 /
GE07hv_apppu:18237: kālaḥ kālakṣayaś caiva jñeyo vijñānam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1063 //
GE07hv_apppu:18240: śrutaṃ brahmayugaṃ brahman yugānāṃ prathamaṃ yugam / HV_App.I,41.1064 /
GE07hv_apppu:18241: kṣatrasyāpi yugam brahmañ śrotum icchāmy ahaṃ prabho // HV_App.I,41.1065 //
GE07hv_apppu:18242: sasaṃkṣepaṃ savistaraṃ niyamair bahubhiś citam / HV_App.I,41.1066 /
GE07hv_apppu:18243: upāyajñaiś ca kathitaṃ kratubhiś caiva śobhitam // HV_App.I,41.1067 //
GE07hv_apppu:18245: etat te kathayiṣyāmi yajñakarmabhir arcitam / HV_App.I,41.1068 /
GE07hv_apppu:18246: dānadharmaiś ca vividhaiḥ prajābhir upaśobhitam // HV_App.I,41.1069 //
GE07hv_apppu:18249: pravṛtte cāpravṛtte ca nityaṃ brahmaparāyaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1072 /
GE07hv_apppu:18250: parāyaṇasya saṃgamya brahmaṇas tu mahīpate // HV_App.I,41.1073 //
GE07hv_apppu:18251: śrīvṛtāḥ pāvanāś caiva brāhmaṇāś ca mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.1074 /
GE07hv_apppu:18253: pūrṇe yugasahasrānte pūrvaṃ ye pralayaṃ gatāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1076 /
GE07hv_apppu:18256: dakṣaḥ prajāpatir bhūtvā sṛjate vimalāḥ prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1079 //
GE07hv_apppu:18257: akṣarād brāhmaṇāḥ saumyāḥ kṣarāt kṣatriyabāndhavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1080 /
GE07hv_apppu:18258: vaiśyā vikārataś caiva śūdrā dhūmavikārataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1081 //
GE07hv_apppu:18259: śvetalohitakair varṇaiḥ pītair nīlaiś ca brāhmaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1082 /
GE07hv_apppu:18261: tato varṇatvam āpannāḥ prajā loke caturvidhāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1084 /
GE07hv_apppu:18262: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrāś caiva mahīpate // HV_App.I,41.1085 //
GE07hv_apppu:18265: trayāṇāṃ varṇajātānāṃ vedaproktāḥ kriyāḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1088 /
GE07hv_apppu:18266: tena vā brahmayogena vaiṣṇavena mahīpate // HV_App.I,41.1089 //
GE07hv_apppu:18267: prajñayā tejasā yogāt tena prācetasaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1090 /
GE07hv_apppu:18268: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī karmaṇām antaraṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1091 //
GE07hv_apppu:18270: tasmān nārhanti saṃskāraṃ na hy atra brahma vidyate // HV_App.I,41.1093 //
GE07hv_apppu:18271: yathāgnau dhūmasaṃghāto hy araṇyā mathyamānayā / HV_App.I,41.1094 /
GE07hv_apppu:18272: prādurbhūto visarpan vai nopayujyati karmaṇi // HV_App.I,41.1095 //
GE07hv_apppu:18273: evaṃ śūdrā visarpante bhuvi kārtsnyena janmanā / HV_App.I,41.1096 /
GE07hv_apppu:18275: tato 'nye dakṣaputrās tu saṃbhūtā dharmayonayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1098 /
GE07hv_apppu:18278: antam icchāmy ahaṃ śrotuṃ dhātryāḥ putro 'balo hy aham / HV_App.I,41.1101 /
GE07hv_apppu:18279: tato vidhāsye tattvajñaḥ prajānāṃ vipulaṃ balam / HV_App.I,41.1102 /
GE07hv_apppu:18280: vipulatvād dhi kṣetrāṇāṃ mamāpi vipulāḥ prajāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1103 //
GE07hv_apppu:18281: na teṣāṃ darśayed devī cakṣuṣā rūpam ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1104 /
GE07hv_apppu:18282: prajāpatisutānāṃ vai vipulaṃ sāram icchatām // HV_App.I,41.1105 //
GE07hv_apppu:18283: ātmano bhāvanirvṛtte bhāvye kṛtayuge tadā / HV_App.I,41.1106 /
GE07hv_apppu:18284: janitrī sarvabhūtānām aṇḍajān udbhidāṃs tathā // HV_App.I,41.1107 //
GE07hv_apppu:18285: saṃvedajananī dhātrī ceti mātrā pracoditā / HV_App.I,41.1108 /
GE07hv_apppu:18286: aṇutāṃ tanutāṃ caiva jantūnāṃ karmabhāginām // HV_App.I,41.1109 //
GE07hv_apppu:18289: sādhv ahaṃ śrotum icchāmi tretāyāṃ brāhmaṇottama / HV_App.I,41.1110 /
GE07hv_apppu:18290: yaṃ jñātvā sarvavidyānāṃ paraṃ paśyeyam avyayam // HV_App.I,41.1111 //
GE07hv_apppu:18292: dakṣas tu punar ālambya strībhāvaṃ puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1112 /
GE07hv_apppu:18298: dakṣaḥ prācetasas tasyāṃ kanyāyāṃ janayat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1116 /
GE07hv_apppu:18299: dehād dhi yogavidhinā kanyāḥ padmanibhānanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1117 //
GE07hv_apppu:18300: dakṣaḥ puruṣarūpeṇa strīrūpam apahāya ca / HV_App.I,41.1118 /
GE07hv_apppu:18302: tāḥ kanyāḥ pradadau dakṣaḥ svayaṃ prācetasaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1120 /
GE07hv_apppu:18304: pradadau daśa dharmāya kaśyapāya trayodaśa / HV_App.I,41.1122 /
GE07hv_apppu:18306: dakṣo dattvātha tāḥ kanyā brahmakṣatraṃ prapadyata / HV_App.I,41.1124 /
GE07hv_apppu:18308: tapyamāno mṛgaiḥ sārdhaṃ cacāra vasudhāṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.1126 /
GE07hv_apppu:18309: tṛṇamūlaphalair vṛddho vṛddhaś ca tapasāsakṛt // HV_App.I,41.1127 //
GE07hv_apppu:18310: mṛgās tu tasya modanti phalaṃ modanti brāhmaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1128 /
GE07hv_apppu:18313: karmayajñakṛtāṃ tāta siddhiṃ paśyati lakṣaṇām // HV_App.I,41.1131 //
GE07hv_apppu:18315: mṛgaiḥ saha jarāṃ yānti sapatnīkāḥ saputriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1133 //
GE07hv_apppu:18316: brāhmaṇāḥ stotrasaṃsiddhā janitre prathame pade / HV_App.I,41.1134 /
GE07hv_apppu:18320: yā prajā pūrvam ārūḍhā mānasī brahmacāriṇī / HV_App.I,41.1138 /
GE07hv_apppu:18322: [k: K3.4 Ñ2 B2.3 Dn Ds2 D1.2.4.6 G3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:18325: sthāvarā jaṅgamāś caiva sthūlāḥ sūkṣmāś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1141 /
GE07hv_apppu:18326: kālayogena yogajñā bhavanti na bhavanti ca // HV_App.I,41.1142 //
GE07hv_apppu:18327: etāś caitāḥ prajāḥ sarvā dakṣakanyāsu jajñire / HV_App.I,41.1143 /
GE07hv_apppu:18329: ādityā vasavo rudrā viśve ca samarudgaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1145 /
GE07hv_apppu:18330: nāgāś cānekaśirasaḥ sādhyā vai pannagās tathā // HV_App.I,41.1146 //
GE07hv_apppu:18331: gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāḥ yakṣāḥ suparṇāś ca tathāpare / HV_App.I,41.1147 /
GE07hv_apppu:18332: garutmān saha yakṣaiś ca kiṃnarāś ca suvāsasaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1148 //
GE07hv_apppu:18333: gāvaḥ paśugaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ narāś ca vasudhādhipa / HV_App.I,41.1149 /
GE07hv_apppu:18334: dharādharāś ca vasudhā dhātāraś ca dharādharāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1150 /
GE07hv_apppu:18335: gajāḥ siṃhāś ca vyāghrāś ca hayāḥ pakṣadharās tathā // HV_App.I,41.1151 //
GE07hv_apppu:18336: khaḍgā viṣāṇinaś caiva vṛṣabhāś ca mṛgās tathā // HV_App.I,41.1152 //
GE07hv_apppu:18337: caturviṣāṇā nāgendrāḥ padmābhā varṇataḥ śubhāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1153 /
GE07hv_apppu:18339: tathārūpais tathāgātrais taiḥ śīlais taiḥ parākramaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1155 /
GE07hv_apppu:18340: munayaḥ punar udbhūtā dharmakṣetre sanātane // HV_App.I,41.1156 //
GE07hv_apppu:18341: kṣetrajñā mānuṣe loke dharmiṇo vedagocarāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1157 /
GE07hv_apppu:18342: yatrodbhūtāḥ surāḥ sarve divi loke pratiṣṭhitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1158 //
GE07hv_apppu:18343: ye cānye tapasā siddhā gṛhasthā manujādhipa / HV_App.I,41.1159 /
GE07hv_apppu:18344: brahmacaryeṇa saṃsiddhāḥ paricaryāṃ gatā guroḥ // HV_App.I,41.1160 //
GE07hv_apppu:18345: ye ca yogagatiṃ prāptāḥ siddhihetor mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.1161 /
GE07hv_apppu:18346: kleśādhikaiḥ karmajanyair vṛttiṃ lapsyanti vai dvijāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1162 //
GE07hv_apppu:18348: sarve tv ete divicarā bhavanti caritavratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1164 //
GE07hv_apppu:18356: mantrayajñaparā nityaṃ nityaṃ vratahite ratāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1170 //
GE07hv_apppu:18357: ekam evāgnim ādhāya sarve brāhmaṇapuṃgavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1171 /
GE07hv_apppu:18359: tridhā praṇīto jvalano munibhir vedapāragaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1173 /
GE07hv_apppu:18360: atas te tritvam āpannā yad ekas trividhaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1174 //
GE07hv_apppu:18361: eka eva mahān agnir haviṣā saṃpravartate / HV_App.I,41.1175 /
GE07hv_apppu:18363: svayaṃ ca dakṣaḥ saṃprāpto bhāgavān bhūtasatkṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1177 /
GE07hv_apppu:18365: daṇḍī carmī śarī khaḍgī śikhī padmanibhānanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1179 /
GE07hv_apppu:18367: yajate puṣkare brahmā medhayā saha saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1181 /
GE07hv_apppu:18369: ghṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ yavā vrīhiḥ sarvaṃ paramakaṃ haviḥ / HV_App.I,41.1183 /
GE07hv_apppu:18370: vedaproktaṃ makhe nyastaṃ kalpitaṃ brahmaṇaḥ pade // HV_App.I,41.1184 //
GE07hv_apppu:18372: sa brahmā prathamaṃ tasminn agnim anyaṃ pravartayat // HV_App.I,41.1186 //
GE07hv_apppu:18373: na hy anyad vihitaṃ dravyaṃ yathāgnir yajñakarmaṇi / HV_App.I,41.1187 /
GE07hv_apppu:18374: pravartayed vibhāgair vā hutahavyamayaṃ balam // HV_App.I,41.1188 //
GE07hv_apppu:18375: phalāni taiḥ prayuktāni havīṃṣi vitate 'dhvare / HV_App.I,41.1189 /
GE07hv_apppu:18377: ṣaṇmāsāṃś caturo vedān saṃbabhāṣe bṛhaspatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1191 /
GE07hv_apppu:18378: brahmajño brahmaṇo yajñe parayā varṇasaṃpadā // HV_App.I,41.1192 //
GE07hv_apppu:18382: vibhāti sa makho vyaktaṃ brahmaloka ivāparaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1196 //
GE07hv_apppu:18384: prayogaiḥ saṃprayuktasya jalpann iva sa vardhate // HV_App.I,41.1198 //
GE07hv_apppu:18385: samidbhiḥ somakalaśaiḥ pātraiś caiva savistaraiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1199 /
GE07hv_apppu:18386: yavair vrīhibhir ājyaiś ca pūrṇaiś ca jalabhājanaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1200 //
GE07hv_apppu:18387: kramaprāptaiś ca vasubhiḥ karmabhiś cāparājitaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1201 /
GE07hv_apppu:18388: gobhiḥ payasvinībhiś ca parivatsaiś ca komalaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1202 //
GE07hv_apppu:18389: brahmavṛddho vayovṛddhas tapovṛddhaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1203 /
GE07hv_apppu:18392: brahmajñānamayo devo vidyayā saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1204 //
GE07hv_apppu:18393: mānasaiś ca kriyāmūrtir ye ca bhūtāḥ svayaṃ nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.1205 /
GE07hv_apppu:18394: brahmā juhoti tāṃs tasmān marudbhiḥ sahitas tadā // HV_App.I,41.1206 //
GE07hv_apppu:18395: tejomūrtidharai rūpair na ca tatkarmaṇāspṛśat / HV_App.I,41.1207 /
GE07hv_apppu:18398: yajate kratunā pūrvam agniṣṭomena sa prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1210 /
GE07hv_apppu:18399: sadasyais tatsado vyaktaṃ śuśubhe yajñakarmaṇi / HV_App.I,41.1211 /
GE07hv_apppu:18400: jalpanti madhurā vācaḥ sānusvārāḥ kriyās tataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1212 //
GE07hv_apppu:18404: vasudhām iva saṃprāptaiḥ sarvair eva divaukasaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1216 /
GE07hv_apppu:18407: jvaladbhir iva viprais tais tribhir evādhvare 'gnibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1219 /
GE07hv_apppu:18408: brahmaloka ivābhāti brahmaṇaḥ sa mahākratuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1220 //
GE07hv_apppu:18412: āyayur manayaḥ sarve manobhiḥ śrotravādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1224 //
GE07hv_apppu:18413: hotā cātrābhavad rājan brahmatve ca bṛhaspatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1225 /
GE07hv_apppu:18415: yajamānaś ca yajñānte viṣṇoḥ pūjāṃ prayujya ca / HV_App.I,41.1227 /
GE07hv_apppu:18416: adityāḥ paścime garbhe tapasā saṃbhṛte nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.1228 //
GE07hv_apppu:18417: padaṃ viṣṇur ajo brahmā nirdvaṃdvo niṣparigrahaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1229 /
GE07hv_apppu:18418: yataḥ padasahasrāṇi bhaviṣyanty udbhavanti ca // HV_App.I,41.1230 //
GE07hv_apppu:18419: avandhyaṃ cāprameyaṃ ca vyatiriktaṃ ca karmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1231 /
GE07hv_apppu:18420: ātmāpi yasya munayo bhavanti niṣparigrahāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1232 //
GE07hv_apppu:18421: parigrahāś ca viṣayā doṣaprāptā mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.1233 /
GE07hv_apppu:18422: doṣāṃś ca yugapat sarve chādayanti manobalāt // HV_App.I,41.1234 //
GE07hv_apppu:18424: parigrahaṃ śubhaṃ dharmam avidyālakṣaṇaṃ nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.1236 //
GE07hv_apppu:18425: vadyālakṣaṇasaṃyogān na manaś chādyate nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.1237 /
GE07hv_apppu:18426: yadi cen muniśabdena gṛhyate brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1238 //
GE07hv_apppu:18428: divi lokaḥ satāṃ sthānaṃ lokānāṃ loka ucyate // HV_App.I,41.1240 //
GE07hv_apppu:18429: yatra devā havyapuṣṭā na kṣayaṃ yānti bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1241 /
GE07hv_apppu:18430: yajamānaś ca bhāgaiḥ svaiḥ karmaprāptodite pade / HV_App.I,41.1242 /
GE07hv_apppu:18431: modate saha patnībhir vijvaro vasudhādhipa // HV_App.I,41.1243 //
GE07hv_apppu:18432: yajñāvasāne śailendraṃ dvijebhyaḥ pradadau prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1244 /
GE07hv_apppu:18435: na śekuḥ pravibhāgārthaṃ bhettuṃ sarvodyamair api // HV_App.I,41.1247 //
GE07hv_apppu:18436: tatas te brāhmaṇagaṇā niṣedur vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1248 /
GE07hv_apppu:18438: supārśvo girimukhyas tu vāgbhir madhurabhāṣitā / HV_App.I,41.1250 /
GE07hv_apppu:18439: abravīt praṇataḥ sarvāñ śirasā tān dvijottamān // HV_App.I,41.1251 //
GE07hv_apppu:18440: na hi śakyo balād bhettuṃ yuṣmābhir asusaṅgibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1252 /
GE07hv_apppu:18442: ekībhūtā yadā sarve bhaviṣyatha samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1254 /
GE07hv_apppu:18444: balaṃ hi rāgadveṣābhyāṃ vardhate brahmasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1256 /
GE07hv_apppu:18445: vimuktaṃ rāgadoṣābhyāṃ brahma vardhati śāśvatam // HV_App.I,41.1257 //
GE07hv_apppu:18447: dhātubhiś ca visarpadbhiḥ śikharaiś cānupātibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1259 //
GE07hv_apppu:18448: viśīrṇaiḥ pārśvavivarair nāgaiś cāgalitair bhuvi / HV_App.I,41.1260 /
GE07hv_apppu:18449: bahubhir vyālarūpaiś ca codyamāno guhāśayaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1261 //
GE07hv_apppu:18450: pratigṛhya tu tadvākyaṃ śailendrasya subhāṣitam / HV_App.I,41.1262 /
GE07hv_apppu:18451: tūṣṇīṃ babhūvus te sarve tadā brāhmaṇasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1263 //
GE07hv_apppu:18454: balir homāś ca vardhante ahany ahani bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1264 /
GE07hv_apppu:18456: devatādyāś ca pūjyante tadāprabhṛti bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1266 /
GE07hv_apppu:18457: teṣāṃ brahmavidāṃ rājan pṛthivyāṃ brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1267 //
GE07hv_apppu:18460: vāsaṃ yatra prakurvanti dṛṣṭvā bhagavataḥ kriyām / HV_App.I,41.1270 /
GE07hv_apppu:18463: yatayaś cāpi kāṅkṣanti dharmeṇa harikāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1273 //
GE07hv_apppu:18464: anye karmaphale caiva ratā brāhmaṇapuṃgavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1274 /
GE07hv_apppu:18466: daivayuktena vā yuktāḥ karmaṇā brahmasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1276 /
GE07hv_apppu:18468: caranto brahmacaryaṃ ca yatnam āsthāya dāruṇam / HV_App.I,41.1278 /
GE07hv_apppu:18469: anena vidhinā rājan kramaprāptena sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1279 //
GE07hv_apppu:18470: kramādye vedasaṃskāraṃ puṇyaṃ prāptāḥ sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.1280 /
GE07hv_apppu:18471: pūrvair ācaritaṃ rājan munibhir brahmavādibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1281 //
GE07hv_apppu:18472: nāvedavidvān āgacchen nāpi raudram vrataṃ caret / HV_App.I,41.1282 /
GE07hv_apppu:18473: na ca tyāgena gaccheta gṛhadharmaṃ ca na tyajet // HV_App.I,41.1283 //
GE07hv_apppu:18474: evaṃ na gacched utthānam aprāpto vedasaṃcayam / HV_App.I,41.1284 /
GE07hv_apppu:18475: ṛcaś ca saṃcayaḥ pūrvaḥ sāmagānāṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1285 //
GE07hv_apppu:18477: asaṃcayaś ca saṃcayaṃ ca sāmagānaṃ ca bhārata // **HV_App.I,41.1285**51:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:18478: ye cāpi putriṇo na syuḥ śrutvāpi prāpnuyuḥ phalam / HV_App.I,41.1286 /
GE07hv_apppu:18479: brāhmaṇās tapasā śrāntā guroś ca paricaryayā // HV_App.I,41.1287 //
GE07hv_apppu:18480: yasya naivaṃ śrutam brahman na gṛhītam viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,41.1288 /
GE07hv_apppu:18481: kāmaṃ taṃ dhārmiko rājā śūdrakarmāṇi kārayet // HV_App.I,41.1289 //
GE07hv_apppu:18482: atha vā naiva vidyeta yad brahma nādriyed dvijaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1290 /
GE07hv_apppu:18483: dvābhyāṃ tu śrotraviṣaye manaḥ pūrvaṃ samāhite // HV_App.I,41.1291 //
GE07hv_apppu:18485: brāhmaṇo bhūtisaṃpanno ya icched bhūtim ātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1293 //
GE07hv_apppu:18488: te tu gobrāhmaṇāṃs tāṃś ca candrādityapuraskṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1294 /
GE07hv_apppu:18489: brāhmaṇān pūjayan rājan vasubhir brahmasaṃbhavaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1295 //
GE07hv_apppu:18490: nāradapramukhāś caiva gandharvā ṛṣayo nṛpa / HV_App.I,41.1296 /
GE07hv_apppu:18491: kurvanti satataṃ yajñaiḥ kramaprāptaiḥ pitāmaham // HV_App.I,41.1297 //
GE07hv_apppu:18495: provāca bhagavān brahma diṣṭyā diṣṭyeti bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1301 //
GE07hv_apppu:18496: tataḥ kaśyapam ābhāṣya provāca bhagavān prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1302 /
GE07hv_apppu:18497: bhavān api sutaiḥ sārdhaṃ yakṣyate vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1303 //
GE07hv_apppu:18499: yakṣāḥ surāś ca te sarve yathāpratiguṇaiḥ prabho // HV_App.I,41.1305 //
GE07hv_apppu:18500: vayaṃ yakṣyāmahe sarve pūrvaṃ yakṣyāmahe vayam / HV_App.I,41.1306 /
GE07hv_apppu:18503: yuddhāyaiva pratiṣṭhanti pragṛhya vipulau bhujau // HV_App.I,41.1309 //
GE07hv_apppu:18505: anyaiś ca bahubhir viprair vedavedāṅgapāragaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1311 /
GE07hv_apppu:18506: nivāryamāṇā yudhyanti vṛṣabhā iva gokule // HV_App.I,41.1312 //
GE07hv_apppu:18508: paśyatāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ mṛtyor viṣayam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1314 //
GE07hv_apppu:18509: tataḥ śabdena mahatā paraṃ kṛtvā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1315 /
GE07hv_apppu:18510: rundhanti bāhubhiḥ kruddhāḥ sapakṣā iva pakṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1316 //
GE07hv_apppu:18511: cacāla vasudhā caiva pādākrāntā ca roṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1317 /
GE07hv_apppu:18513: parvatāś ca viśīryante nardamānā vṛṣā iva // HV_App.I,41.1319 //
GE07hv_apppu:18514: cukṣubhuś ca mahānadyas tāḍitā mātariśvanā / HV_App.I,41.1320 /
GE07hv_apppu:18515: tataḥ samabhavad yuddhaṃ madhor viṣṇoś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1321 //
GE07hv_apppu:18518: vahner iva balaṃ dīptaṃ śamayaty ambunā yathā // HV_App.I,41.1324 //
GE07hv_apppu:18523: balavān sa tu daiteyo madhur bhīmaparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1325 /
GE07hv_apppu:18524: babandha pāśair niśitair mahendraṃ parvatāntare // HV_App.I,41.1326 //
GE07hv_apppu:18525: taṃ vai prahrādavacanāl lakṣaṇajñaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1327 /
GE07hv_apppu:18526: aiśvaryam aindram ākāṅkṣan bhaviṣyaṃ buddhisaṃkṣayāt // HV_App.I,41.1328 //
GE07hv_apppu:18527: badhvendraṃ sahasā madhye pāśair marmavivarjitaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1329 /
GE07hv_apppu:18528: āyasair bahubhiś citrair balavadbhir vidāraṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1330 //
GE07hv_apppu:18529: viṣṇum evāgraṇīr ugram āhvayad yuddhakovidaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1331 /
GE07hv_apppu:18530: madhye gaṇānāṃ sarveṣāṃ kālasya vasām āgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1332 //
GE07hv_apppu:18531: dvaidhībhūtāḥ kāśyapeyā madhor vaśam upāgatāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1333 /
GE07hv_apppu:18532: yuddhārtham abhyadhāvanta pragṛhya vipulā gadāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1334 //
GE07hv_apppu:18533: gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś caiva vādye gīte ca kovidāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1335 /
GE07hv_apppu:18534: pranṛtyanti pragāyanti prahasanti ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1336 //
GE07hv_apppu:18536: mano madhor vidhunvanti yudhyamānasya rāgiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1338 //
GE07hv_apppu:18537: madhor balārthaṃ madhuno niyogāt padmayoninaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1339 /
GE07hv_apppu:18538: etān vikārān kurvanti gandharvāḥ satyavādinaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1340 //
GE07hv_apppu:18539: tatra saktā hi gāndharve tasmiñ śabde dadur manaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1341 /
GE07hv_apppu:18540: dānavāś cāsurāś caiva pratyakṣaṃ yānti prāṇadan // HV_App.I,41.1342 //
GE07hv_apppu:18541: madhoś ca mana ākṣipya paśyan yogena cakṣuṣā / HV_App.I,41.1343 /
GE07hv_apppu:18542: mandaraṃ prāpatad viṣṇur gūḍho 'gnir iva dāruṣu // HV_App.I,41.1344 //
GE07hv_apppu:18545: viṣṇuṃ so 'bhyahanat kruddho madhur madhunibhekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1347 /
GE07hv_apppu:18546: bhujena śaṅkhadeśānte na cakampe padāt padam // HV_App.I,41.1348 //
GE07hv_apppu:18547: viṣṇuś cābhyahanad daityaṃ karāgreṇa stanāntare / HV_App.I,41.1349 /
GE07hv_apppu:18548: sa papāta mahīṃ tūrṇaṃ jānubhyāṃ rudhiraṃ vaman // HV_App.I,41.1350 //
GE07hv_apppu:18549: na cainaṃ patitaṃ hanti viṣṇur yuddhaviśāradaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1351 /
GE07hv_apppu:18551: indradhvaja ivottiṣṭhañ jānubhyāṃ sa mahītalāt / HV_App.I,41.1353 /
GE07hv_apppu:18552: madhū roṣaparītātmā nirdahann iva cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,41.1354 //
GE07hv_apppu:18553: paruṣābhis tato vāgbhir anyonyam abhigarjatuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1355 /
GE07hv_apppu:18555: ubhau tau bāhubalināv ubhau yuddhaviśāradau / HV_App.I,41.1357 /
GE07hv_apppu:18556: ubhau ca tapasā śrāntāv ubhau satyaparākramau // HV_App.I,41.1358 //
GE07hv_apppu:18558: śailendrāv iva yudhyantau pakṣaiḥ pāṣāṇasaṃnibhaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1360 //
GE07hv_apppu:18559: vikarṣantau ramantau ca anyonyaṃ vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1361 /
GE07hv_apppu:18560: gajāv iva viṣāṇāgrair nakhāgraiś ca viceratuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1362 //
GE07hv_apppu:18561: tato vraṇamukhaiś caiva susrāva rudhiraṃ bahu / HV_App.I,41.1363 /
GE07hv_apppu:18562: grīṣmānte dhātusaṃsṛṣṭaṃ śailebhya iva kāñcanam // HV_App.I,41.1364 //
GE07hv_apppu:18563: saṃsiktau rudhiraughaiś ca sravadbhiḥ samarañjitau / HV_App.I,41.1365 /
GE07hv_apppu:18564: athodyataiḥ padāgraiś ca tau vyadārayatāṃ mahīm // HV_App.I,41.1366 //
GE07hv_apppu:18565: abhihatya tu tau vīrau parasparam anekadhā / HV_App.I,41.1367 /
GE07hv_apppu:18566: pataṃgāv iva yudhyetāṃ pakṣābhyāṃ māṃsagṛddhinau // HV_App.I,41.1368 //
GE07hv_apppu:18570: śarīraṃ dhātusaṃyuktaṃ saṃyuktaṃ cetanena ca / HV_App.I,41.1372 /
GE07hv_apppu:18571: tad brahma indriyair yuktaṃ tejobhūtaṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.1373 //
GE07hv_apppu:18572: dhruvaṃ tiṣṭhanti bhūtās te sūkṣme pralayatāṃ gate / HV_App.I,41.1374 /
GE07hv_apppu:18573: punaś codbhavate sūkṣmaṃ bahurūpam anekadhā / HV_App.I,41.1375 /
GE07hv_apppu:18574: prabodhya bhāvam bhūtānāṃ triṣu lokeṣu kāmadaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1376 //
GE07hv_apppu:18575: surūpo bahurūpas tāṃl lokān saṃcarate vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1377 /
GE07hv_apppu:18576: mānasīṃ tanum āsthāya bahubhiḥ kāraṇāntaraiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1378 //
GE07hv_apppu:18577: yogātmā dhārayann urvīṃ nāgātmā nandivardhanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1379 /
GE07hv_apppu:18578: brahmabhūtaṃ paraṃ caiva sūkṣmeṇātmānam īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.1380 //
GE07hv_apppu:18579: brāhmeṇa viprān vasati yuddhenaiva ca kṣatriyān / HV_App.I,41.1381 /
GE07hv_apppu:18580: pradānakarmaṇā vaiśyāñ śūdrān paricareṇa ca // HV_App.I,41.1382 //
GE07hv_apppu:18581: gāvaḥ kṣīrapradānena aśvān yajñeṣu prokṣaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1383 /
GE07hv_apppu:18583: caturbhir vyatiriktāṅgais tribhir anyaiś ca dhātubhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1385 /
GE07hv_apppu:18584: saptabhiḥ pitṛbhir nityais trīṃl lokān parirakṣaṇe // HV_App.I,41.1386 //
GE07hv_apppu:18586: prakāśe cāprakāśe ca nigūḍhaṃ svena tejasā // HV_App.I,41.1388 //
GE07hv_apppu:18587: trayas tu pitaro nityaṃ vardhayanti divākaram / HV_App.I,41.1389 /
GE07hv_apppu:18588: caturbhiḥ pitṛbhiś caiva candro vardhati maṇḍale // HV_App.I,41.1390 //
GE07hv_apppu:18589: trayaḥ pitṛgaṇā nityaṃ piṇḍān paścād adanti te / HV_App.I,41.1391 /
GE07hv_apppu:18590: catvāro 'nye pitṛgaṇāḥ siddhāḥ paṇcaka ādade // HV_App.I,41.1392 //
GE07hv_apppu:18591: tvam eva pañca tān dharmās tvam evāpañcatān vibho / HV_App.I,41.1393 /
GE07hv_apppu:18593: tasmāt tat teja ādatte agnir vāyuś ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1395 /
GE07hv_apppu:18594: atas tvaṃ karmaṇā tena ādityaḥ samapadyathāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1396 //
GE07hv_apppu:18595: yad aśnāsi jagat sarvaṃ raśmibhiḥ pradahann iva / HV_App.I,41.1397 /
GE07hv_apppu:18596: yūgāntakāle saṃprāpte parāṃ siddhim upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1398 //
GE07hv_apppu:18597: pakṣasaṃdhāvam āvāsyāṃ lokaṃ carasi mānuṣam / HV_App.I,41.1399 /
GE07hv_apppu:18599: saphalaṃ karma kurvāṇo yajatāṃ puṣṭivardhanam / HV_App.I,41.1401 /
GE07hv_apppu:18600: hetūnām adhikāraṃ ca mā bhūt karmaviparyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1402 //
GE07hv_apppu:18602: bālabhāvāya vasudhāṃ pakṣe pakṣe jarāṃ tava // HV_App.I,41.1404 //
GE07hv_apppu:18604: vasu yad bhuvi kiṃcic ca sarvaṃ tat tvanmayaṃ vibho // HV_App.I,41.1406 //
GE07hv_apppu:18605: tvam eva dvividhaṃ dharmaṃ śāśvataṃ vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1407 /
GE07hv_apppu:18607: dvividhaḥ svargamārgaś ca sūryaś candraś ca nirmalaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1409 /
GE07hv_apppu:18608: candramāḥ pitṛyānaś ca devayānaś ca bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.1410 //
GE07hv_apppu:18609: tvam eva vasudhāyukto viśvaṃ carasi māyayā / HV_App.I,41.1411 /
GE07hv_apppu:18610: ekīkṛtya gaṇān sarvān saṃkṣipyāmutra saṃbhavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1412 //
GE07hv_apppu:18611: ekas tvam asi saṃbhūtaḥ purāṇaḥ puruṣo virāṭ / HV_App.I,41.1413 /
GE07hv_apppu:18612: akṣayaś cāprameyaś ca kāmakārakaro vaśī // HV_App.I,41.1414 //
GE07hv_apppu:18613: mūrtas tejasi saṃbhūto vāyuḥ paryeti khecaraḥ / HV_App.I,41.1415 /
GE07hv_apppu:18614: saptabhī rūpasaṃsthānair nityam āvṛtya tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,41.1416 //
GE07hv_apppu:18615: sādhane vāpi nirvāṇe saṃhāre pralaye tathā / HV_App.I,41.1417 /
GE07hv_apppu:18616: dhātā dhāraṇakāle ca diśaś cakṣuṣi sarpaṇe // HV_App.I,41.1418 //
GE07hv_apppu:18618: karmabhiḥ satyam āpannaiḥ samarāgair jitendriyaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1420 //
GE07hv_apppu:18619: stūyamānaś ca vibudhaiḥ siddhair munivarais tathā / HV_App.I,41.1421 /
GE07hv_apppu:18620: sasmāra vipulaṃ dehaṃ harir hayaśiro mahān // HV_App.I,41.1422 //
GE07hv_apppu:18621: kṛtvā vedamayaṃ rūpaṃ sarvadevamayaṃ vapuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1423 /
GE07hv_apppu:18622: śiromadhye mahādevo brahmā tu hṛdaye sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1424 //
GE07hv_apppu:18624: jaṅghe tu vasavaḥ sādhyāḥ sarvasaṃdhiṣu devatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1426 //
GE07hv_apppu:18625: jihvā vaiśvānaro devaḥ satyā devī sarasvatī / HV_App.I,41.1427 /
GE07hv_apppu:18627: evaṃ kṛtvā tathā rūpaṃ surāṇām adbhutaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,41.1429 /
GE07hv_apppu:18628: asuraṃ pīḍayām āsa krodhād raktāntalocanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1430 //
GE07hv_apppu:18631: medinīty eva śabdaś ca labdhaḥ pṛthvyā narottama / HV_App.I,41.1433 /
GE07hv_apppu:18635: madhor nipātanaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarvabhūtāni puṣkare / HV_App.I,41.1435 /
GE07hv_apppu:18636: prahṛṣṭāni pragāyanti pranṛtyanti ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1436 //
GE07hv_apppu:18637: supārśvo girimukhyas tu kāñcanaiḥ śikharottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1437 /
GE07hv_apppu:18638: bahudhātuvicitraiś ca saṃlikhann iva cābabhau // HV_App.I,41.1438 //
GE07hv_apppu:18639: girayaś cāpi śobhante dhātubhiḥ samarañjitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1439 /
GE07hv_apppu:18640: prāṃśubhiḥ śikharāgraiś ca savidyuta ivāmbudāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1440 //
GE07hv_apppu:18647: kāñcanāḥ parvatāḥ sarve sphāṭikair maṇibhiś citāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1447 /
GE07hv_apppu:18648: sūryakāntaiś ca bahubhiś candrakāntaiś ca nirmalaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1448 //
GE07hv_apppu:18649: himavāṃś ca mahāśailaḥ śvetair dhātubhir ācitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1449 /
GE07hv_apppu:18652: tāmrapuṣpaiś ca śikharair dīpyamānaḥ svatejasā // HV_App.I,41.1452 //
GE07hv_apppu:18653: mandaraś cograśikharaḥ sphāṭikair maṇibhiś citaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1453 /
GE07hv_apppu:18655: saha śṛṅgaiś ca kailāsaḥ śilādhātuvibhūṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1455 /
GE07hv_apppu:18656: toraṇaiś caiva nibiḍaiḥ prāṃśubhiś caiva pādapaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1456 //
GE07hv_apppu:18657: pravādayadbhir gandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca pragāyibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1457 /
GE07hv_apppu:18659: madhurair vādyagītaiś ca nṛtyaiś cābhinayodgataiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1459 /
GE07hv_apppu:18660: śṛṅgāraiḥ sāṅgahāraiś ca kailāso madanāyate // HV_App.I,41.1460 //
GE07hv_apppu:18662: vindhyo nīlāmbudaśyāmo vibhinna iva toyadaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1462 //
GE07hv_apppu:18664: nirvemur vimalaṃ toyaṃ meghajālair ivottamaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1464 //
GE07hv_apppu:18667: grīṣmānte vāyusaṃmūḍhā ghanā iva savidyutaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1467 /
GE07hv_apppu:18668: citraiḥ puṣpais tarugaṇāḥ śobhanta iva bhūṣitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1468 //
GE07hv_apppu:18669: nāgāḥ kanakasaṃbhūtair vicitrair iva bhūṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1469 /
GE07hv_apppu:18670: vihaṃgamābhir līnāś ca latās tarusamāśritāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1470 //
GE07hv_apppu:18671: vilambantyaḥ sapuṣpāś ca nṛtyante vāyughaṭṭitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1471 /
GE07hv_apppu:18673: mumucuḥ puṣpasaṃghātaṃ toyaṃ veleva varṣati / HV_App.I,41.1473 /
GE07hv_apppu:18675: pādapaiḥ parṇabahulair dhriyate ca vasuṃdharā / HV_App.I,41.1475 /
GE07hv_apppu:18678: viṣṇur madhor nihantā ca cakāra madhuvāhinīm / HV_App.I,41.1478 /
GE07hv_apppu:18682: viveśa puṣkaraṃ sā tu brahmaṇo vākyacoditā / HV_App.I,41.1482 /
GE07hv_apppu:18684: dhātrī kapilarūpeṇa gaur bhūtvā kṣarate payaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1484 /
GE07hv_apppu:18685: madhuraṃ vitate yajñe brahmaṇo vākyacoditā // HV_App.I,41.1485 //
GE07hv_apppu:18686: śiraś ca pṛthivībhūtaṃ saṃdhātuṃ prāptavān mahīm / HV_App.I,41.1486 /
GE07hv_apppu:18687: śuddhaṃ ca bhajate lokaṃ śāśvataṃ paramādbhutam // HV_App.I,41.1487 //
GE07hv_apppu:18696: mahāmeror yathā rūpaṃ pañcabhir dhātubhir vṛtam / HV_App.I,41.1496 /
GE07hv_apppu:18699: kariṣyāmy aham apy etan manasā dharmacāriṇam / HV_App.I,41.1499 /
GE07hv_apppu:18700: rūpaṃ bahuvidhaṃ loke pārthivī cetanā yathā // HV_App.I,41.1500 //
GE07hv_apppu:18701: trīṃś ca lokān prapadyeyaṃ pañcabhir dhātulakṣaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1501 /
GE07hv_apppu:18702: ṣaṣṭhena ca visarjeyaṃ manasā dharmacāriṇīm // HV_App.I,41.1502 //
GE07hv_apppu:18703: saṅgeṣu bhāvamohābhyāṃ paśyann iva samṛddhayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1503 /
GE07hv_apppu:18705: na ca vindeta māṃ kaścin manasā kāmarūpiṇam / HV_App.I,41.1505 /
GE07hv_apppu:18707: ye ca viṣṇum adhīyante bahudhā pādavigrahaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1507 /
GE07hv_apppu:18708: te māṃ paśyeyur avyaktaṃ tapasā dagdhakilbiṣāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1508 //
GE07hv_apppu:18709: ye ca mām abhiroheyur narā dharmapathe sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1509 /
GE07hv_apppu:18710: te 'pi svargejitaḥ sarve paśyeyur māṃ gataklamāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1510 //
GE07hv_apppu:18711: yaś caiva parvataḥ prāṃśur merupṛṣṭhe pratiṣṭhitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1511 /
GE07hv_apppu:18712: etam āruhya yudhyeyuḥ prāṇatyāgeṣu nirmalāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1512 //
GE07hv_apppu:18714: nandanaṃ vanam āsādya kāmyakaṃ ca mahad vanam // HV_App.I,41.1514 //
GE07hv_apppu:18715: imāṃ vidyāṃ samāsthāya madbhaktāḥ puṣkareṣv iha / HV_App.I,41.1515 /
GE07hv_apppu:18716: śarīraṃ kṣapayiṣyanti vratair bahuvidhaiḥ kṛśāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1516 //
GE07hv_apppu:18717: siddhiṃ prāpya krameyus te kāmair bahuvidhair narāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1517 /
GE07hv_apppu:18718: imaṃ lokam amuṃ caiva saṃpateyur yathāsukham // HV_App.I,41.1518 //
GE07hv_apppu:18719: gaurī siddheti vikhyātā triṣu lokeṣu vidyayā / HV_App.I,41.1519 /
GE07hv_apppu:18720: prabhāvaṃ tapaso vṛttaṃ darśayanti samāhitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1520 //
GE07hv_apppu:18722: bhaveyus te nirārambhā dhātubhir muktabandhanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1522 //
GE07hv_apppu:18723: sahasraguṇam apy atra dattvā dānaphalād iva / HV_App.I,41.1523 /
GE07hv_apppu:18727: yeṣām iha ca sāṃnidhyaṃ yajñe brāhmaṇasaṃkule / HV_App.I,41.1527 /
GE07hv_apppu:18728: te bhūyo yajamānādyā abhiṣicya punaḥ punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1528 //
GE07hv_apppu:18729: tathā tāṃ manyase gaurīṃ manasā dharmacāriṇīm / HV_App.I,41.1529 /
GE07hv_apppu:18730: anugrahāya bhūtānāṃ mamāgre ca tapodhane // HV_App.I,41.1530 //
GE07hv_apppu:18731: satya eṣa paro divye bhavitā nātra saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1531 /
GE07hv_apppu:18732: nāphalo vidyate dharmaś carito brahmacāriṇā // HV_App.I,41.1532 //
GE07hv_apppu:18735: diśaṃ jigamiṣur divyām uttarāṃ satyasādhanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1533 /
GE07hv_apppu:18736: tathā sa dhātunicaye puṇye parvatarodhasi // HV_App.I,41.1534 //
GE07hv_apppu:18739: ātmany ātmānam ādhāya tapasā brahmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1537 /
GE07hv_apppu:18741: bhāsuro bhasmanācchādya gātrāṇi svayam ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1539 /
GE07hv_apppu:18742: [k: K3 D1.4 subst. for line 1539, K2 ins. after line 1539:k]
GE07hv_apppu:18744: aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi sahasraṃ ca tapodhanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1540 //
GE07hv_apppu:18745: tejasā tena jyotīṃṣi vibhāvya brāhmaṇarṣabhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1541 /
GE07hv_apppu:18746: tiṣṭhate tapasā madhye yogātmā bhāvayañ jagat // HV_App.I,41.1542 //
GE07hv_apppu:18747: somo viṣayam ākṣipya manasā dhārayan manaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1543 /
GE07hv_apppu:18748: yuktaḥ paramadharmātmā brāhmīṃ siddhim upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1544 //
GE07hv_apppu:18749: sarvaṃ paśyati sarvatra divi bhuvy antare tathā / HV_App.I,41.1545 /
GE07hv_apppu:18750: jyotiṣṇuḥ karma kurvāṇo bahurūpaḥ sa saṃpadā // HV_App.I,41.1546 //
GE07hv_apppu:18752: uddhṛtya dakṣiṇaṃ pādaṃ vāyubhakṣaḥ samāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1548 //
GE07hv_apppu:18753: aṣṭau varṣasahasrāṇi sahasraṃ śatam eva ca / HV_App.I,41.1549 /
GE07hv_apppu:18755: atha vāyur ghanībhūtvā ante carati gopateḥ / HV_App.I,41.1551 /
GE07hv_apppu:18756: phenībhūtaṃ samudgāraiḥ pavanaṃ nirgiran mukhāt // HV_App.I,41.1552 //
GE07hv_apppu:18757: sa niṣkrāntas tato vaktrāt prāṇena paramātmavān / HV_App.I,41.1553 /
GE07hv_apppu:18758: niryāsabhūtaḥ patito naivārdro naiva pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1554 //
GE07hv_apppu:18759: sa pheno vāriṇāviśya cacāra vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1555 /
GE07hv_apppu:18760: naivārdro naiva śuṣkāṅgo vāyuḥ saṃghātam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1556 //
GE07hv_apppu:18761: tatkāle phenam utkṣipya pavanaḥ saha vāriṇā / HV_App.I,41.1557 /
GE07hv_apppu:18762: nirālambe nirālambas tv abhrāṇi samapadyata // HV_App.I,41.1558 //
GE07hv_apppu:18763: te kṣipanti payo bhūmāv ātmānaṃ svena ghaṭṭitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1559 /
GE07hv_apppu:18765: brāhmīṃ mūrtiṃ samādhāya vāyuḥ sarvatrago vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1561 /
GE07hv_apppu:18766: samāḥ sahasraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ cacāra vipulaṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1562 //
GE07hv_apppu:18768: tapas tapyad anāhāro maunam āsthāya pauṣkare // HV_App.I,41.1564 //
GE07hv_apppu:18769: varṣāṇāṃ ca sahasrāṇi trīṇi caikaṃ ca yatnataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1565 /
GE07hv_apppu:18770: tasyāgnes tejaḥ saṃbhūto mahān agniḥ pravartate // HV_App.I,41.1566 //
GE07hv_apppu:18773: tapaś carati brahmāgnir lokānāṃ bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1569 /
GE07hv_apppu:18774: tat tamo bhuvi rājendra mānuṣeṣu pratiṣṭhitam / HV_App.I,41.1570 /
GE07hv_apppu:18775: bhāskaras tejasaṃhāras tato bhavati sattamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:18776: martyānāṃ sarvabhūtānāṃ teja ākṣipya vartate / HV_App.I,41.1572 /
GE07hv_apppu:18777: na tu yogabale rājan brāhmaṇasya viśeṣataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1573 /
GE07hv_apppu:18778: tat tamo nāśayed rātrau nāpy aho bhavitā punaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1574 //
GE07hv_apppu:18779: puṣpamitro mahātejā yakṣaḥ sarvatrago vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1575 /
GE07hv_apppu:18780: tapaś carati dharmātmā puṣkare susamāhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1576 //
GE07hv_apppu:18781: mahendraśikharād dhārā yāvantyo yānti medinīm / HV_App.I,41.1577 /
GE07hv_apppu:18782: tāvat svarūpam āsthāya tiṣṭhate nikhilāḥ samāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1578 //
GE07hv_apppu:18783: jānubhyāṃ patito bhūmau jyotir nabhasi paśyati / HV_App.I,41.1579 /
GE07hv_apppu:18784: samāḥ sahasraṃ nikhilaṃ netrair animiṣair jagat // HV_App.I,41.1580 //
GE07hv_apppu:18785: netrāṇi bahudhā tasya netrāntair abhiniḥsṛtaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1581 /
GE07hv_apppu:18786: madhyaṃ dinakare prāpte raśmivān saparigrahaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1582 //
GE07hv_apppu:18787: te raśmayaḥ prabhānetraiḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1583 /
GE07hv_apppu:18788: rarāja tejaḥsaṃyogād vidyūdbhir iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1584 //
GE07hv_apppu:18791: bahudhā tu punar bhūtvā niṣaṇṇo vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1587 /
GE07hv_apppu:18792: samāsahasraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ tapas tepe sudāruṇam // HV_App.I,41.1588 //
GE07hv_apppu:18793: nigṛhītendriyo bhūtvā apsarobhir lalāma ha / HV_App.I,41.1589 /
GE07hv_apppu:18794: meroḥ śikharam āsādya kāmaṃ kāmena nirvaman // HV_App.I,41.1590 //
GE07hv_apppu:18795: tapaḥkāmaḥ sa yakṣas tu kubero naravāhanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1591 /
GE07hv_apppu:18796: viṣṇur eva tapodhyakṣas tejaso 'nte vijṛmbhati // HV_App.I,41.1592 //
GE07hv_apppu:18797: na hi kaścit pumān asti ya evaṃ tapa ācaret / HV_App.I,41.1593 /
GE07hv_apppu:18798: triṣu lokeṣu rājendra ṛte viṣṇuṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,41.1594 //
GE07hv_apppu:18799: vāsukir bahuśīrṣaś ca nāgendro maunam āsthitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1595 /
GE07hv_apppu:18800: tapa ācarate samyaṅ nidhāya manasā manaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1596 //
GE07hv_apppu:18801: śeṣaḥ satyadhṛtir nāgo balavān brahmasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1597 /
GE07hv_apppu:18803: jihvābhir lelihānābhir gātrajaṃ viṣam utsṛjan / HV_App.I,41.1599 /
GE07hv_apppu:18804: samāḥ sahasraṃ saṃpūrṇaṃ nirāhāras tapodhanaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1600 //
GE07hv_apppu:18805: kālakūṭaṃ viṣaṃ tad dhi sūmahat samapadyata / HV_App.I,41.1601 /
GE07hv_apppu:18806: yena loko hy abhigrasto na sukhaṃ vindate nṛpa // HV_App.I,41.1602 //
GE07hv_apppu:18808: jaṅgamaṃ sthāvaraṃ caiva sarvatrānugataṃ viṣam // HV_App.I,41.1604 //
GE07hv_apppu:18810: nāśayaty ātmano 'ṅgāni tena tīkṣṇena bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1606 //
GE07hv_apppu:18811: atha brahmā mahābhāgo bhūtānāṃ hitakāmyayā / HV_App.I,41.1607 /
GE07hv_apppu:18812: mantraṃ visṛjate rājan brahmākṣaram ahiṃsakam // HV_App.I,41.1608 //
GE07hv_apppu:18813: [k: D1 ins. after line 1608, K2 after line 1609 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:18814: āhāraś ca tato yogād vihitās tasya pannagāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.1608**54:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:18816: garutmān vitataiḥ pakṣair nakhāgraiḥ salilaṃ mahīm / HV_App.I,41.1609 /
GE07hv_apppu:18818: parṇabhāraiś ca vikacair vistīrṇair vasudhātale / HV_App.I,41.1611 /
GE07hv_apppu:18819: rarāja vasudhā caiva taiḥ parṇair bahucitritaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1612 //
GE07hv_apppu:18820: yena vṛttena jīveyuḥ sarvabhūtāni bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1613 /
GE07hv_apppu:18821: ihaloke manuṣyendra devaloke ca bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1614 /
GE07hv_apppu:18823: maghavān himasaṃpāte bhavaty ekacaro vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1616 /
GE07hv_apppu:18825: atha sutalam ākramya pṛthivīṃ prāṃśudehinīm / HV_App.I,41.1618 /
GE07hv_apppu:18826: tapaś carati dharmātmā bāhum udyamya dakṣiṇam // HV_App.I,41.1619 //
GE07hv_apppu:18827: sāgraṃ varṣasahasraṃ ca śatam ekaṃ ca suvṛta / HV_App.I,41.1620 /
GE07hv_apppu:18828: tapaś carati saṃyogād vāyubhakṣaḥ samāhitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1621 /
GE07hv_apppu:18830: yeneyaṃ pṛthivī rājan dhāryate brahmayoninā / HV_App.I,41.1623 /
GE07hv_apppu:18832: yo 'sau viṣṇur agādhātmā paramātmā nirākṛtiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1625 /
GE07hv_apppu:18833: dine niṣaṇṇo bhavati rātrau bhavati vai sthiraḥ / HV_App.I,41.1626 /
GE07hv_apppu:18835: tasya yaḥ sodyataḥ pāṇiḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛthivīsamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1628 /
GE07hv_apppu:18836: rātrau sa tapano bhavati maṇḍalaṃ vipulaṃ nabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1629 //
GE07hv_apppu:18837: sa candraviṣayaṃ rājañ śamayām āsa rundhati / HV_App.I,41.1630 /
GE07hv_apppu:18838: grahāṇāṃ gatayaś caiva tārāṇāṃ ca viśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1631 //
GE07hv_apppu:18839: tāṃ chāyām ākṣipat somaḥ sravadbhir maṇḍalena vai / HV_App.I,41.1632 /
GE07hv_apppu:18840: pṛthivyāṃ dakṣiṇo hasto mahāyogī mahāmanāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1633 //
GE07hv_apppu:18841: saiṣā chāyā śaśībhūtā śaśimaṇḍalam āviśat / HV_App.I,41.1634 /
GE07hv_apppu:18842: aliṅgā pṛthivīliṅgād adbhutād akṣayā divi // HV_App.I,41.1635 //
GE07hv_apppu:18843: aṅgāṅgāny upagṛhyaiva tapaś carati niścayāt / HV_App.I,41.1636 /
GE07hv_apppu:18844: prokṣya pādau tu satalau pṛthvī vācyam upāgatā // HV_App.I,41.1637 //
GE07hv_apppu:18848: sphāṭikeva śūbhā yaiṣā kāñcanair dhātubhir vṛtā // HV_App.I,41.1641 //
GE07hv_apppu:18851: raśmibhiḥ punar uttīrṇā tato yogena dhāvati / HV_App.I,41.1644 /
GE07hv_apppu:18853: śītacchāyaiś ca tarubhir latābhiś ca sugandhibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1646 /
GE07hv_apppu:18854: padmakhaṇḍaiś ca vividhaiḥ śuśubhe divyagandhibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1647 //
GE07hv_apppu:18859: sakhyā gaṅgā phalaṃ lebhe puṣkareṇa samāhitā / HV_App.I,41.1652 /
GE07hv_apppu:18860: sutapā candravihitā lokānāṃ dhāraṇe ratā // HV_App.I,41.1653 //
GE07hv_apppu:18861: sarasvatī svarair vyaktair adhīte brahmavādinī / HV_App.I,41.1654 /
GE07hv_apppu:18862: pṛṣṭhāt prayātā śailendre mandare mandagāminī // HV_App.I,41.1655 //
GE07hv_apppu:18863: ṛgādyāṃś caturo vedān pādaiś caturbhir āvṛtān / HV_App.I,41.1656 /
GE07hv_apppu:18864: yajurbhiḥ sāmabhiś caiva grathitāñ śikṣayā tathā // HV_App.I,41.1657 //
GE07hv_apppu:18866: supārśvasya gireḥ pāde paridāyaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1659 //
GE07hv_apppu:18867: nisvanaṃ sarvabhūtāni niyamena ca me śṛṇu / HV_App.I,41.1660 /
GE07hv_apppu:18868: mandarāgre visarpantaṃ jagat kṛsnam atīndriyam // HV_App.I,41.1661 //
GE07hv_apppu:18869: virāmaniyame prāpte tūṣṇīṃbhūtā babhūva ha / HV_App.I,41.1662 /
GE07hv_apppu:18870: na vācam īrayed devī niyamāt satyavādinī // HV_App.I,41.1663 //
GE07hv_apppu:18871: atha bhūtāni sarvāṇi tūṣṇīṃbhūtāni sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1664 /
GE07hv_apppu:18872: na śekur abhidhānārthaṃ vyāhartuṃ vadanair balāt // HV_App.I,41.1665 //
GE07hv_apppu:18873: vibhajya yogaṃ manasā sarvabhūteṣv anugraham / HV_App.I,41.1666 /
GE07hv_apppu:18875: sarasvatyā samāyuktāṃ śikṣāṃ gṛhṇanti dehinaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1668 /
GE07hv_apppu:18876: tasminn evātha te sarve gānaṃ gāyanti śikṣayā // HV_App.I,41.1669 //
GE07hv_apppu:18877: ādityā vasavo rudrā marutaś cāśvibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.1670 /
GE07hv_apppu:18879: gandharvāḥ kiṃnarāś caiva sanāgāḥ saha cāmbhasaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1672 /
GE07hv_apppu:18882: tapaś caranti sahitāḥ puṣkareṣu manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1673 //
GE07hv_apppu:18883: api kīṭapataṃgaiś ca saha sarvaiḥ sarīsṛpaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1674 /
GE07hv_apppu:18885: viṣṇur viṣṇutvam āpanno dehāntaraṃ visṛṣṭavān / HV_App.I,41.1676 /
GE07hv_apppu:18886: saṃrakṣati mahāyogī sarvāṃs tān sahacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1677 //
GE07hv_apppu:18887: puṣkare ramate viṣṇur viṣṇur eva dvidhā kṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1678 /
GE07hv_apppu:18888: dīpyamānaḥ svatejobhir vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1679 //
GE07hv_apppu:18889: so 'gnir manaḥsamudbhūtaḥ pṛthivīṃ tāpayann iva / HV_App.I,41.1680 /
GE07hv_apppu:18890: pradhāvati samaṃ tena maṇḍalaṃ daśayojanam // HV_App.I,41.1681 //
GE07hv_apppu:18893: tasyāgner visphuliṅgānāṃ na śekur laṅghane ratāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1684 /
GE07hv_apppu:18894: viprakīrṇasya bahudhā maryādām iva bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,41.1685 //
GE07hv_apppu:18895: so 'gnir dīpya vibhajyāṃśūn vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1686 /
GE07hv_apppu:18897: so 'gnir dhūmagatas tatra tiṣṭhate vipulas tadā / HV_App.I,41.1688 /
GE07hv_apppu:18898: yāvad viṣṇuḥ kramaprāpto niyamasya samāpanāt // HV_App.I,41.1689 //
GE07hv_apppu:18899: rakṣāṃ kṛtvā na taṃ vidyād viṣṇur viṣṇuparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1690 /
GE07hv_apppu:18900: bhūtvā śataśarīro vai nāgo bālāhako 'bhavat // HV_App.I,41.1691 //
GE07hv_apppu:18901: tam agnim ātmasaṃsṛṣṭaṃ lelihānaṃ mahāmatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1692 /
GE07hv_apppu:18904: nyaṣiñcad dahanaṃ tatra nāgo bālāhakas tadā // HV_App.I,41.1695 //
GE07hv_apppu:18905: tataḥ siddhagaṇair juṣṭaḥ puṣkare tapyate tapaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1696 /
GE07hv_apppu:18907: saṃhṛtya pādagātraṇi mano mūrdhni vidhārayan / HV_App.I,41.1698 /
GE07hv_apppu:18908: acalaṃ sthānam āsādya tūṣṇīṃbhūto babhūva ha // HV_App.I,41.1699 //
GE07hv_apppu:18909: eṣa dharmo hi dharmāṇāṃ nopadhānavikalpitaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1700 /
GE07hv_apppu:18910: hitaḥ sarveṣu bhūteṣu iha cāmutra cobhayoḥ // HV_App.I,41.1701 //
GE07hv_apppu:18911: atha daityā hatās tatra samāgamyodyatāyudhāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1702 /
GE07hv_apppu:18913: agniṃ daityāḥ parvatāgrair abhighnanti paraṃtapa / HV_App.I,41.1704 /
GE07hv_apppu:18915: meghībhūtāś ca māyābhir varṣanti baladarpitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1706 /
GE07hv_apppu:18917: te śailās tv arciṣā dagdhāḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1708 /
GE07hv_apppu:18918: yugante prabhur ādityaḥ prajā iva didhakṣivān // HV_App.I,41.1709 //
GE07hv_apppu:18919: na śekur agniṃ daityās te māyābhimukham udyatam / HV_App.I,41.1710 /
GE07hv_apppu:18920: ādityam iva dīpyantaṃ nabhaḥ sūryodaye yathā // HV_App.I,41.1711 //
GE07hv_apppu:18921: vihatair udyamaiḥ sarvair daityā bhagnaparākramāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1712 /
GE07hv_apppu:18922: gandhamādanam āsādya niṣaṇṇā girir mūrdhani // HV_App.I,41.1713 //
GE07hv_apppu:18923: sa cāgnir vaiṣṇave loke vidyudbhir iva saṃgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1714 /
GE07hv_apppu:18924: antarikṣacarān daityān nirdahan vicaran divi // HV_App.I,41.1715 //
GE07hv_apppu:18925: nāgo bālāhakaś caiva meghaiḥ saṃghātam āgataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1716 /
GE07hv_apppu:18926: mumoca salilaṃ bhūmau parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // HV_App.I,41.1717 //
GE07hv_apppu:18927: mantraiḥ saṃcodito nāgo dvijebhyo vadanodgataiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1718 /
GE07hv_apppu:18930: haviṣā mantrapūtena yathā vai vidhir eva ca // **HV_App.I,41.1718**56:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:18931: mumoca toyasaṃghātaṃ mānayan viprajaṃ janam // HV_App.I,41.1719 //
GE07hv_apppu:18934: saṃyujya tapasā devāḥ kim akurvaṃs tataḥ param / HV_App.I,41.1720 /
GE07hv_apppu:18935: na hi tad vidyate loke tapasā yan na labhyate // HV_App.I,41.1721 //
GE07hv_apppu:18937: atha dīkṣāṃ samāsthāya sarve viṣṇumayā gaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1722 /
GE07hv_apppu:18938: puṣkarād agnim uddhatya praṇīya ca yathāvidhi // HV_App.I,41.1723 //
GE07hv_apppu:18940: haviṣā mantrapūtena yathā vai vidhir eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1725 //
GE07hv_apppu:18941: sa cāgnir vidhivat tatra vardhate brahmatejasā / HV_App.I,41.1726 /
GE07hv_apppu:18943: brahmadaṇḍa iti khyāto vapuṣā nirdahann iva / HV_App.I,41.1728 /
GE07hv_apppu:18945: gadī ca lāṅgalī cakrī śarī carmī paraśvadhī / HV_App.I,41.1730 /
GE07hv_apppu:18946: śūlī vajrī khaḍgapāṇiḥ śaktimān varakārmukī // HV_App.I,41.1731 //
GE07hv_apppu:18947: viṣṇuś cakradharaḥ khaḍgī musalī lāṅgalāyudhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1732 /
GE07hv_apppu:18948: naro lāṅgalam ālambya musalaṃ ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1733 //
GE07hv_apppu:18949: vajram indras tapoyogāc chataparvāṇam ākṣipat / HV_App.I,41.1734 /
GE07hv_apppu:18950: rudraḥ śūlaṃ pinākaṃ ca manasādhārayat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1735 //
GE07hv_apppu:18951: mṛtyur daṇḍaṃ sapāśaṃ ca kālaḥ śaktim agṛhṇata / HV_App.I,41.1736 /
GE07hv_apppu:18952: jagrāha paraśuṃ tvaṣṭā kuberaś ca paraśvadham // HV_App.I,41.1737 //
GE07hv_apppu:18954: viśvakarmā ca tvaṣṭā ca cakrāte hy āyudhāni tu // HV_App.I,41.1739 //
GE07hv_apppu:18955: indrāyāgnī rathaṃ prādāt sūryāya ca pratāpine / HV_App.I,41.1740 /
GE07hv_apppu:18956: paramātmā dadau viṣṇū rudrāya ca mahātmane // HV_App.I,41.1741 //
GE07hv_apppu:18957: chandobhir eva tvaṣṭā tu sa cakārātha vāhinīm / HV_App.I,41.1742 /
GE07hv_apppu:18958: viśvakarmā vimānāni cakāra bahubhiḥ kramaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1743 //
GE07hv_apppu:18960: puṣkarāt parvaṇi ghanān pṛtanārthaṃ prakalpayat // HV_App.I,41.1745 //
GE07hv_apppu:18961: dyāṃ caiva sūryaṝkṣāṇāṃ tvarayā samakalpayat / HV_App.I,41.1746 /
GE07hv_apppu:18962: yayābhiyujya saṃgrāme śatruṃ nirbibhide raṇe // HV_App.I,41.1747 //
GE07hv_apppu:18963: sa taṃ daṇḍaṃ samucitaṃ nirvikāraṃ samāhitam / HV_App.I,41.1748 /
GE07hv_apppu:18964: brahmā jagrāha vidhinā antardhānagataḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,41.1749 //
GE07hv_apppu:18965: svaiḥ prabhāvaiś ca bahudhā so 'stragrāmaṃ caturvidham / HV_App.I,41.1750 /
GE07hv_apppu:18966: aindram āgneyavāyavyaṃ raudraṃ raudreṇa varcasā // HV_App.I,41.1751 //
GE07hv_apppu:18967: ebhir vikāraiḥ saṃyuktā diteḥ putrā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1752 /
GE07hv_apppu:18968: tapasā śikṣayā caiva astraiḥ praharaṇais tathā // HV_App.I,41.1753 //
GE07hv_apppu:18969: balena caturaṅgeṇa vīryeṇa ca samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1754 /
GE07hv_apppu:18970: apradhṛṣyā raṇe sarve kṣaṇenaivābhavaṃs tadā // HV_App.I,41.1755 //
GE07hv_apppu:18971: te vihāya guhāmadhye sabhāṇḍopaskare rathe / HV_App.I,41.1756 /
GE07hv_apppu:18972: mandarasya gireḥ pāde vicerur vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1757 //
GE07hv_apppu:18973: caturaṅgaṃ balaṃ sarvaṃ saṃhṛtya tamasaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1758 /
GE07hv_apppu:18974: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī cacāra vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1759 //
GE07hv_apppu:18975: bhūyo 'nyat tapa āseduś caranto brāhmaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.1760 /
GE07hv_apppu:18976: taiś ca sarvaiḥ suragaṇaiś carmacīranivāsibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1761 //
GE07hv_apppu:18979: brahman khile vartamāne nirmaryāde mahāgrahe / HV_App.I,41.1762 /
GE07hv_apppu:18980: avināśe ca bhūtānāṃ katham āsan prajās tadā // HV_App.I,41.1763 //
GE07hv_apppu:18982: abhyaṣiñcat pṛthuṃ vainyaṃ purā rājye prajāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1764 /
GE07hv_apppu:18983: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B1.3 Ds D3.6 G3 subst. for line 1764:k]
GE07hv_apppu:18986: eṣa vaḥ paramo rājā anurāgād ajāyata / HV_App.I,41.1766 /
GE07hv_apppu:18988: eṣa no vṛttidātā ca śilpānāṃ ca samarpitā / HV_App.I,41.1768 /
GE07hv_apppu:18991: bahubhir niyamaiḥ śrāntā niṣaṇṇā girisānuṣu // HV_App.I,41.1771 //
GE07hv_apppu:18992: atha gandhaṃ samāsādya samantād devadānavāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1772 /
GE07hv_apppu:18993: mādhave samaye prāpte tena gandhena darpitāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1773 //
GE07hv_apppu:18995: manogrāhi sukhaṃ sarvaṃ pārthivaṃ gandham uttamam // HV_App.I,41.1775 //
GE07hv_apppu:18996: te daityās tena gandhena kiṃcid vismayam āgatāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1776 /
GE07hv_apppu:18997: prasannamanaso bhūtvā paraṃ saukhyam upāgatāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1777 //
GE07hv_apppu:18998: ūcuś ca sahitāḥ sarve tena gandhena darpitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1778 /
GE07hv_apppu:18999: puṣpamātrasya yadvīryaṃ kiṃ tasya phalato bhavet // HV_App.I,41.1779 //
GE07hv_apppu:19001: śubhāś caivāśubhāś caiva buddhiprāṇena dehinām // HV_App.I,41.1781 //
GE07hv_apppu:19002: tasmād vayaṃ payomadhye oṣadhīr nirmathāmahe / HV_App.I,41.1782 /
GE07hv_apppu:19004: samudram abhisaṃrambhān mathnīmaḥ somajaṃ jalam / HV_App.I,41.1784 /
GE07hv_apppu:19005: pītvā ca sahitāḥ sarve prasthitāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1785 //
GE07hv_apppu:19006: viṣṇur evāgraṇīs teṣāṃ bhaviṣyati mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1786 /
GE07hv_apppu:19007: divaṃ ca vasudhāṃ caiva bhokṣyāmaḥ saha śatrubhīḥ // HV_App.I,41.1787 //
GE07hv_apppu:19009: sarvagrahāṃś ca gṛhṇīmaḥ sudhāṃ ca vasudhātale // HV_App.I,41.1789 //
GE07hv_apppu:19011: prabhāṣya vacanaṃ devā mandarasya prakampane // HV_App.I,41.1791 //
GE07hv_apppu:19012: samuddhartuṃ pradhāvanti kampayanti sma medinīm / HV_App.I,41.1792 /
GE07hv_apppu:19014: na śekus te samuddhartuṃ śailendraṃ danuvaṃśajāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1794 /
GE07hv_apppu:19015: nipetur jānubhir juṣṭā vipule parvatāntare // HV_App.I,41.1795 //
GE07hv_apppu:19018: teṣāṃ manobhilaṣitaṃ brahmā sarvatrago vaśī / HV_App.I,41.1798 /
GE07hv_apppu:19019: jñātvā bahuvidhair vākyair vyājahāra sarasvatīm // HV_App.I,41.1799 //
GE07hv_apppu:19022: ādityair vasubhiś caiva rudraiś ca samarudgaṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1802 /
GE07hv_apppu:19023: devair yakṣaiḥ sagandharvaiḥ kiṃnaraiś ca pragāthibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1803 //
GE07hv_apppu:19024: sametya sahitaiḥ sarvaiḥ śakya uddharituṃ giriḥ / HV_App.I,41.1804 /
GE07hv_apppu:19028: etac chrutvā ca vacanaṃ sarveṣām antike tadā / HV_App.I,41.1808 /
GE07hv_apppu:19029: daiteyā bāhubalino manobhir vāgbhir eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1809 //
GE07hv_apppu:19032: na ca kecit pibanty anye devā naiva ca dānavāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.1810**58:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19033: yatra puṣkaraṃ vinyastaṃ sahitair devadānavaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1811 //
GE07hv_apppu:19036: mandaraṃ puṣkaraṃ kṛtvā netraṃ vāsukim eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1813 //
GE07hv_apppu:19038: kūrmapṛṣṭaṃ tataḥ prāpya mandaraṃ nyastavāṃs tadā / **HV_App.I,41.1813**59:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19039: viṣṇur eva mahābāhuḥ parvataṃ yantravat tataḥ // **HV_App.I,41.1813**59:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19041: yataḥ pucchaṃ tato devā asurā mastake sthitāḥ / **HV_App.I,41.1813**59:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:19042: etasya ha saniśvāsā ukṣitā asurās tadā // **HV_App.I,41.1813**59:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:19043: samāḥ sahasraṃ mathitaṃ jalam oṣadhibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.1814 /
GE07hv_apppu:19047: mathyamāne tatas tasya samutpattiḥ krameṇa saḥ // **HV_App.I,41.1815**60:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19051: kalaśāt tat samudbhūtam amṛtaṃ tatra dṛṣṭavān // **HV_App.I,41.1815**60:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:19052: taj jahrur asurāḥ pūrvam ākrāntā lobhamanyunā // HV_App.I,41.1816 //
GE07hv_apppu:19053: [k: Ñ2 B G3 ins. after line 1816, V1 after line 1817:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19055: dhanvataris tathā madyaṃ śrīr devī kaustubho maṇiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1817 /
GE07hv_apppu:19056: śaśāṅko vimalaś cāpi samuttasthuḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1818 /
GE07hv_apppu:19057: uccaiḥśravā hayo ramyaḥ pīyūṣaṃ tadanantaram // HV_App.I,41.1819 //
GE07hv_apppu:19058: paścād devās tadādātum udyatā rāhum abruvan / HV_App.I,41.1820 /
GE07hv_apppu:19060: dṛṣṭvā daityaṃ sthitaṃ pātuṃ madhye taṃ rāhum avyayam / **HV_App.I,41.1820**62:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19061: na tu kecit pibanty ete daityā naiva ca dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1821 //
GE07hv_apppu:19062: cicchedātha hariḥ saṃkhye rāhoś cakreṇa kaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,41.1822 /
GE07hv_apppu:19063: anirbhuktaṃ pitṛgaṇair munibhiś ca sanātanaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1823 //
GE07hv_apppu:19064: tandrihastād amṛtaṃ jahāra pṛthivī svayam / HV_App.I,41.1824 /
GE07hv_apppu:19069: daiteyā dānaveyāś ca kim icchanti parākramāt // HV_App.I,41.1827 //
GE07hv_apppu:19071: dānavā rājyam icchanti parākramya mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1828 /
GE07hv_apppu:19072: tapa icchanti sahitā devāḥ satyaparākramāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1829 //
GE07hv_apppu:19073: atha kālasya mahato hiraṇyakaśipus tadā / HV_App.I,41.1830 /
GE07hv_apppu:19074: yajate brahmaṇaḥ kṣetre prāptaiśvaryaḥ sa kāmadaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1831 //
GE07hv_apppu:19077: gaṅgāyamunayor madhye yad abhūd vipulaṃ tapaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1834 /
GE07hv_apppu:19078: sameyus tatra sahitā yajamāne mahāsure // HV_App.I,41.1835 //
GE07hv_apppu:19080: yatayaś cāpare siddhā yogadharmeṇa bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1837 //
GE07hv_apppu:19081: munayo vālakhilyāś ca dhanyā dharmeṇa śodhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1838 /
GE07hv_apppu:19082: bahavo hi dvijā mukhyā nityaṃ dharmaparāyaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1839 //
GE07hv_apppu:19083: ṛṣayaś ca mahābhāgā vipraiḥ pūjyāḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1840 /
GE07hv_apppu:19084: vipulai ratnavibhavair hriyamāṇais tatas tataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1841 //
GE07hv_apppu:19085: śukras tu saha putreṇa daityaṃ yājayate prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1842 /
GE07hv_apppu:19088: kāmād varaṃ dadānīti tad vai saṃpratipadyatām // HV_App.I,41.1845 //
GE07hv_apppu:19089: viṣṇur vāmanarūpeṇa bhikṣāṃ tāṃ pratyagṛhṇata / HV_App.I,41.1846 /
GE07hv_apppu:19090: hiraṇyakaśipor hastād dve pade padam eva ca // HV_App.I,41.1847 //
GE07hv_apppu:19091: tataḥ kramitum ārebhe viṣṇuḥ satyaparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1848 /
GE07hv_apppu:19092: trīṃl lokāṃs tripadaiḥ krāntvā divyaṃ vapur adhārayat // HV_App.I,41.1849 //
GE07hv_apppu:19093: hṛtarājyāś ca daiteyāḥ pātālavivaraṃ yayuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1850 /
GE07hv_apppu:19099: sa tān svadhāmṛtenāśu pitṝn vai samatarpayat // HV_App.I,41.1856 //
GE07hv_apppu:19100: brahmā tad amṛtaṃ divyaṃ mahendrāya prayacchati / HV_App.I,41.1857 /
GE07hv_apppu:19101: akṣayaś cāvyayaś caiva saṃvṛtas tena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,41.1858 //
GE07hv_apppu:19102: tataḥ śaṅkham upadhmāsīd dviṣatāṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,41.1859 /
GE07hv_apppu:19104: taṃ śrutvā śaṅkhaśabdaṃ tu trayo lokāḥ samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1861 /
GE07hv_apppu:19105: nirvṛtiṃ paramāṃ prāptā indraṃ nātham avāpya ca // HV_App.I,41.1862 //
GE07hv_apppu:19106: sarvaiḥ praharaṇaiś caiva saṃyuktā vahnisaṃbhavaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1863 /
GE07hv_apppu:19107: mandarāgreṣu vihatair jvaladbhir iva pāvakaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1864 //
GE07hv_apppu:19110: tato mahati vṛttānte sthite rājye mahodaye / HV_App.I,41.1865 /
GE07hv_apppu:19111: devānāṃ mānuṣāṇāṃ ca sahavāso 'bhavat tadā // HV_App.I,41.1866 //
GE07hv_apppu:19112: ekataḥ samadhīyante sahitāḥ prarudanti ca / HV_App.I,41.1867 /
GE07hv_apppu:19115: svayaṃ ca bhāgaṃ gṛhṇanti yajñakarmaṇi bhārata // HV_App.I,41.1868 //
GE07hv_apppu:19116: prācetasaṃ tato dakṣaṃ dīkṣitvā vai bṛhaspatiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1869 /
GE07hv_apppu:19118: tasmin paitāmahe yajñe dakṣasya viditātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1871 /
GE07hv_apppu:19119: śāmitram akarod rudro bhāgārthe saha nandinā // HV_App.I,41.1872 //
GE07hv_apppu:19120: rudrasyaiva hi tad rūpaṃ dvidhābhūtaṃ tadīpsayā / HV_App.I,41.1873 /
GE07hv_apppu:19122: tena yogena rājendra yat tad brahma sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.1875 /
GE07hv_apppu:19127: devāś ca bhāgaṃ gṛhṇanti dakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ // **HV_App.I,41.1876**64:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:19128: tataḥ kruddho mahādevaś cāpam udyamya vīryavān / **HV_App.I,41.1876**64:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:19129: nandinā saha bhūtaiś ca samuttasthau sabhāntare // **HV_App.I,41.1876**64:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:19130: sarūpaiś cāpy arūpaiś ca virūpākṣair ghaṭodaraiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1877 /
GE07hv_apppu:19131: ūrdhvanetrair mahākāyair vikaṭair vāmanais tathā // HV_App.I,41.1878 //
GE07hv_apppu:19132: śikhibhir jaṭibhiś caiva tryakṣair vai śaṅkukarṇibhiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1879 /
GE07hv_apppu:19137: etaiḥ parivṛto devo makhaṃ taṃ samupārujat // HV_App.I,41.1884 //
GE07hv_apppu:19140: virarājārcibhir dīptair makhair makhavatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1887 /
GE07hv_apppu:19141: kālāgnir iva dīptārcir jagad dagdhum ivodyataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1888 //
GE07hv_apppu:19142: nandī pinākapāṇiś ca jaghnatur makham uttamam / HV_App.I,41.1889 /
GE07hv_apppu:19143: yugānta iva kālāgniḥ kṣipraṃ dagdhum ivodyataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1890 //
GE07hv_apppu:19144: yūpam utkṣipya dhāvanti niśācaragaṇās tataḥ / HV_App.I,41.1891 /
GE07hv_apppu:19146: havīṃṣy anye pibanty eva jihvābhis tāmralocanāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1893 /
GE07hv_apppu:19147: bhakṣayanti paśūn anye rasanāntaiḥ pralambibhiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1894 //
GE07hv_apppu:19148: mumucuś cāpare yūpān prasabhaṃ praharanti ca / HV_App.I,41.1895 /
GE07hv_apppu:19149: vahnim anye prasiñcanti vāribhiḥ prahasanti ca // HV_App.I,41.1896 //
GE07hv_apppu:19150: somam anye jahuḥ kecin netrais tāmrajapopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,41.1897 /
GE07hv_apppu:19151: darbhān kecid vilumpanti hastaiḥ padmadalaprabhaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1898 //
GE07hv_apppu:19152: babhañjire ca śālāgrān kalaśāṃś cāpaviddhire / HV_App.I,41.1899 /
GE07hv_apppu:19153: cicchiduḥ kāñcanān vṛkṣāñ śobhārtham upakalpitān // HV_App.I,41.1900 //
GE07hv_apppu:19154: bibhiduś caiva bāṇaiś ca mumucuś ca hiraṇmayān / HV_App.I,41.1901 /
GE07hv_apppu:19155: lulupuś caiva pātrāṇi mamanthuś cāraṇīm atha // HV_App.I,41.1902 //
GE07hv_apppu:19156: ārujaṃś caiva prāgvaṃśāṃl lulupuś ca samāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1903 /
GE07hv_apppu:19157: cakhādire puroḍāśān nakhāgraiś ca cakartire // HV_App.I,41.1904 //
GE07hv_apppu:19158: evaṃ divā ca rātrau ca bhidyamāno mahāmakhaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1905 /
GE07hv_apppu:19159: cukrośa ca mahānādān bhidyamāna ivārṇavaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1906 //
GE07hv_apppu:19160: dhanuḥ saśaram ādāya pūrvadattaṃ svayaṃbhuvā / HV_App.I,41.1907 /
GE07hv_apppu:19162: pratigṛhya mahādevaḥ sa śare samayojayat / HV_App.I,41.1909 /
GE07hv_apppu:19163: dhanur vigṛhya jānubhyāṃ jaghāna sa mahākratum // HV_App.I,41.1910 //
GE07hv_apppu:19164: sa viddhas tena bāṇena khaṃ samutpatitaḥ kratuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1911 /
GE07hv_apppu:19165: mṛgo bhūtvā nardamāno brahmāṇam upadhāvati // HV_App.I,41.1912 //
GE07hv_apppu:19166: śareṇābhihatas trāṇaṃ na lebhe praśamaṃ bhuvi / HV_App.I,41.1913 /
GE07hv_apppu:19167: śaraṇārthī hy ahaṃ prāptaḥ śareṇāntargatena ca // HV_App.I,41.1914 //
GE07hv_apppu:19168: tam uvāca mṛgaṃ brahmā śubhaṃ sānunayaṃ vacaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1915 /
GE07hv_apppu:19170: evaṃrūpo nabhasi tvaṃ bhaviṣyasi mahāmṛga // HV_App.I,41.1917 //
GE07hv_apppu:19172: tiṣṭhan nakṣatraśirasi saha rudreṇa nityaśaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1919 //
GE07hv_apppu:19173: somena saha saṃyukto hy akṣayeṇāvyayena ca / HV_App.I,41.1920 /
GE07hv_apppu:19174: divi saṃcārabhūtaś ca dhruvaś caiva mahādhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1921 //
GE07hv_apppu:19175: jyotiṣāṃ jyotibhūtas tvaṃ dhruvaś caiva mahādhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1922 //
GE07hv_apppu:19176: yac caitad rudhiraṃ divyaṃ kṣatāt samabhiniḥsṛtam / HV_App.I,41.1923 /
GE07hv_apppu:19177: nabhasy utpatitaṃ caiva pravegena pradhāvataḥ // HV_App.I,41.1924 //
GE07hv_apppu:19179: nimittabhūtaṃ bhūtānāṃ varṣe varṣapradaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,41.1926 //
GE07hv_apppu:19180: sukhaṃ duḥkhaṃ ca bhūtānāṃ darśane saṃpravartate / HV_App.I,41.1927 /
GE07hv_apppu:19182: cakṣuṣī mānuṣe rājan vismayāt samavekṣitum / HV_App.I,41.1929 /
GE07hv_apppu:19183: adbhutaṃ bahucitraṃ ca manasā saṃprakalpitam // HV_App.I,41.1930 //
GE07hv_apppu:19184: na tu rātrau pradṛśyeta khe tu savraṇasaṃjñitam / HV_App.I,41.1931 /
GE07hv_apppu:19185: dinasyaiva sadā tv agre mahat kāryaṃ pradṛśyate / HV_App.I,41.1932 /
GE07hv_apppu:19186: bhūmāv eva samuttiṣṭhed ākāśe pravilīyate // HV_App.I,41.1933 //
GE07hv_apppu:19187: śataśaś ca samaṃ sarve pradhāvanti pracetasaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1934 /
GE07hv_apppu:19188: bhayād rudrasya mahato dhanvino bāṇapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1935 //
GE07hv_apppu:19189: nandī rudragaṇaiḥ sārdhaṃ pinākī samatiṣṭhata / HV_App.I,41.1936 /
GE07hv_apppu:19191: viṣṇuḥ śṛṅgāgrasaṃbhūtaṃ pragṛhya vipulaṃ dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1938 /
GE07hv_apppu:19192: prātiṣṭhata mahābāhuḥ pāṇinā cakram ādadhat // HV_App.I,41.1939 //
GE07hv_apppu:19193: gadāṃ saghaṇṭām anyena khaḍgam anyena pāṇinā / HV_App.I,41.1940 /
GE07hv_apppu:19195: tataḥ śṛṅgāgrasaṃbhūtaṃ pragṛhya vipulaṃ dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,41.1942 /
GE07hv_apppu:19196: śaṅkhaṃ cāpratimaṃ loke śarāṃś ca nataparvaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1943 //
GE07hv_apppu:19197: viṣṇur agre sthito bhāti sabalaḥ saṃhatāñjaliḥ / HV_App.I,41.1944 /
GE07hv_apppu:19199: ādityā vasavaś caiva divyaiḥ praharaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,41.1946 /
GE07hv_apppu:19200: viṣṇum evābhitaḥ sarve tiṣṭhanti jvalanaprabhāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1947 //
GE07hv_apppu:19201: marutaś caiva viśve ca rudram evābhipedire / HV_App.I,41.1948 /
GE07hv_apppu:19202: gandharvakiṃnarāś caiva nāgā yakṣāḥ sapannagāḥ // HV_App.I,41.1949 //
GE07hv_apppu:19203: ṛṣayo nyastadaṇḍāś ca ubhayoḥ pakṣayor hitāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1950 /
GE07hv_apppu:19204: jvalantaḥ śāntaye nityaṃ lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,41.1951 //
GE07hv_apppu:19205: rudraḥ śareṇābhyahanad viṣṇum evāgraṇī raṇe / HV_App.I,41.1952 /
GE07hv_apppu:19207: na cakampe tadā viṣṇuḥ sarvātmā sarvasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1954 /
GE07hv_apppu:19208: na ca roṣamanā nityaṃ vṛtaḥ sarvaiḥ ṣaḍindriyaiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1955 //
GE07hv_apppu:19209: viṣṇuś ca dhanur ādāya śareṇa samayojayat / HV_App.I,41.1956 /
GE07hv_apppu:19211: sa viddhas tena bāṇena mahādevo na kampate / HV_App.I,41.1958 /
GE07hv_apppu:19213: tataḥ prasabham āplutya rudraṃ viṣṇuḥ sanātanam / HV_App.I,41.1960 /
GE07hv_apppu:19214: kaṇṭhe jagrāha bhagavān nīlakaṇṭhas tato 'bhavat // HV_App.I,41.1961 //
GE07hv_apppu:19215: anādinidhano devaḥ kṣamatāṃ bhagavan mama / HV_App.I,41.1962 /
GE07hv_apppu:19216: sarvabhūtāgamācāryo mama kartā ca karmaṇām // HV_App.I,41.1963 //
GE07hv_apppu:19217: karmaṇāṃ ca prakartā ca vikartā caiva bhārata / HV_App.I,41.1964 /
GE07hv_apppu:19218: aroṣatvāc ca bhūtānāṃ sarvabhūteṣu cottamaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1965 //
GE07hv_apppu:19219: svayam eva hi yat karma vidhatte karmayoniṣu / HV_App.I,41.1966 /
GE07hv_apppu:19222: tayoḥ śubhatamo rājan svayam eva tathākarot // HV_App.I,41.1967 //
GE07hv_apppu:19223: antarikṣāc chubhā vācaḥ śrūyante paramādbhutāḥ / HV_App.I,41.1968 /
GE07hv_apppu:19224: siddhānāṃ vadanonmuktāḥ sanātana namo 'stu te // HV_App.I,41.1969 //
GE07hv_apppu:19225: nandī pinākam udyamya balavān rudrasaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1970 /
GE07hv_apppu:19226: mūrdhany abhijaghānājau viṣṇuṃ krodhena mūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1971 //
GE07hv_apppu:19227: tataḥ prahasito viṣṇur nandīṃ dṛṣṭvā surottamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1972 /
GE07hv_apppu:19228: stambhayām āsa bhagavān sarvabhūtapatir hariḥ // HV_App.I,41.1973 //
GE07hv_apppu:19229: viṣṇur brahmasamo bhūtvā tejasā prajvalann iva / HV_App.I,41.1974 /
GE07hv_apppu:19230: kṣamayā ca samāyuktaḥ sthitaḥ sthāṇur ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1975 //
GE07hv_apppu:19231: acintyaś cāprameyaś ca ajeyaś cāpy ariṃdamaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1976 /
