GE07hv_apppu:19232: yugāntāgnisamo bhūtvā śāntātmā harir avyayaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1977 //
GE07hv_apppu:19233: prasannaḥ kalpayām āsa bhāgaṃ rudrāya dhīmate / HV_App.I,41.1978 /
GE07hv_apppu:19234: viṣṇur dharmaparo nityaṃ tyaktakāmaḥ surarṣabhaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1979 //
GE07hv_apppu:19235: viṣṇūnā caiva rājendra sa yajñaḥ saṃdhitaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1980 /
GE07hv_apppu:19236: yathāpakṣaṃ ca te sarve gaṇā āsan mahīpate / HV_App.I,41.1981 /
GE07hv_apppu:19237: tasmin yuddhe mahāghore viṣṇo rudrasya caiva ha // HV_App.I,41.1982 //
GE07hv_apppu:19238: pakṣaṃ pakṣaṃ bhavad yuddhaṃ dakṣayajñavināśane / HV_App.I,41.1983 /
GE07hv_apppu:19239: vināśaś caiva yajñasya tadā loke pratiṣṭhitaḥ // HV_App.I,41.1984 //
GE07hv_apppu:19240: sarvabhūteṣu rājendra hito yajñaḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1985 /
GE07hv_apppu:19241: dakṣo yajñaphalaṃ caiva prāptavān sa prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,41.1986 //
GE07hv_apppu:19242: imāṃ dakṣādhvarāṃ divyāṃ kathām amitabuddhimān / HV_App.I,41.1987 /
GE07hv_apppu:19243: śrāvayed yas tu viprebhyaḥ śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ / HV_App.I,41.1988 /
GE07hv_apppu:19244: adhītya sarvam adhyātmaṃ devaloke mahīyate // HV_App.I,41.1989 //
GE07hv_apppu:19245: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 V1.3 B2 Dn D4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19254: [k: K Ñ2 V1.3 B D cont. after App. I, No. 41; Ñ1 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 cont. after adhyāya 118 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19257: satāṃ kathayatāṃ vipra vārāha iti naḥ śrutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19258: na jāne tv asya caritaṃ nikhilaṃ ca savistaram / HV_App.I,42.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:19259: na dharmaguṇasaṃsthānaṃ na hetuṃ na manīṣitam // HV_App.I,42.4 //
GE07hv_apppu:19260: kimātmako varāho 'sau kiṃvīryaḥ kāsya devatā / HV_App.I,42.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:19261: kimācāraḥ kiṃprabhāvaḥ kiṃ vā tena purā kṛtam // HV_App.I,42.6 //
GE07hv_apppu:19262: etan me śaṃsa tattvena vārāhaṃ śrutivistaram / HV_App.I,42.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:19263: yajñārthaṃ ca sametānāṃ dvijātīnāṃ mahātmanām // HV_App.I,42.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:19266: pramāṇārthaṃ dvijaśreṣṭha tan me vada mahāmune // **HV_App.I,42.8**1:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19268: hanta te kathayiṣyāmi purāṇaṃ vedasaṃmitam / HV_App.I,42.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:19269: [k: Ñ2 B Dn Ds D3.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19271: samāhitamanā bhūtvā śṛṇu rājan yathātatham // HV_App.I,42.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:19273: yathā nārāyaṇo devo vārāhaṃ vapur āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:19278: śuciḥ prayatnavān bhūtvā nibodha janamejaya // HV_App.I,42.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:19279: idaṃ purāṇaṃ paramaṃ puṇyaṃ vedaiś ca saṃmitam / HV_App.I,42.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:19281: purāṇam etad akhilaṃ sāṃkhyaṃ yogaṃ ca veda yaḥ / HV_App.I,42.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:19282: kārtsnyena vidhinā proktaṃ so 'syārthaṃ vedayiṣyati // HV_App.I,42.19 //
GE07hv_apppu:19283: viśvedevās tathā sādhyā rudrādityās tathāśvinau / HV_App.I,42.20 /
GE07hv_apppu:19284: prajānāṃ patayaś caiva sapta caiva maharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:19285: manaḥsaṃkalpajāś caiva pūrvajāś ca maharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,42.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:19286: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 22 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19289: daityāḥ piśācā nāgāś ca bhūtāni vividhāni ca / HV_App.I,42.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:19290: brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā vaiśyāḥ śūdrā mlecchādayo bhuvi // HV_App.I,42.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:19292: jaṅgamāni ca sattvāni yac cānyajjīvasaṃjñitam // HV_App.I,42.27 //
GE07hv_apppu:19295: hiraṇyaretās triśikhas tato bhūtvā vṛṣākapiḥ / HV_App.I,42.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:19296: śikhābhir vidhamaṃl lokān saṃśoṣayati dehinaḥ // HV_App.I,42.31 //
GE07hv_apppu:19297: dadyamānās tatas tasya tejorāśibhir agrataḥ / HV_App.I,42.32 /
GE07hv_apppu:19301: brahmāṇam agrataḥ kṛtvā prabhavaṃ viśvatomukham / HV_App.I,42.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:19302: pūrvadevagaṇāś caiva trayastriṃśac ca chandajāḥ // HV_App.I,42.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:19303: tasminn ahani saṃprāpte taṃ haṃsaṃ mahadakṣaram / HV_App.I,42.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:19304: praviśanti mahāyogaṃ hariṃ nārāyaṇaṃ prabhum // HV_App.I,42.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:19305: teṣāṃ bhūyaḥ praviṣṭānāṃ nidhanotpattir ucyate / HV_App.I,42.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:19306: yathā sūryasya satatam udayāstamayāv iha // HV_App.I,42.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:19307: pūrṇe yugasahasrānte kalpo niḥśeṣa ucyate / HV_App.I,42.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:19308: tasmiñ jīvakṛtaṃ sarvaṃ niḥśeṣam avatiṣṭhate // HV_App.I,42.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:19309: saṃhṛtya lokān sarvān sa sadevāsurapannagān / HV_App.I,42.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:19310: kṛtvātmagarbhaṃ bhagavān āsta eko jagadguruḥ // HV_App.I,42.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:19311: yaḥ sraṣṭā sarvabhūtānāṃ kalpānteṣu punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,42.46 /
GE07hv_apppu:19312: avyaktaḥ śāśvato devas tasya sarvam idaṃ jagat // HV_App.I,42.47 //
GE07hv_apppu:19316: amaryādākule raudre sarvatas tamasā vṛte // HV_App.I,42.51 //
GE07hv_apppu:19324: vakṣo bibhran mahābāhuḥ savidyud iva toyadaḥ // HV_App.I,42.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:19326: patnī cāsya svayaṃ lakṣmīr deham āśritya tiṣṭhati // HV_App.I,42.61 //
GE07hv_apppu:19328: kim apy amitavikrānto yoganidrām upāgataḥ // HV_App.I,42.63 //
GE07hv_apppu:19331: tato yugasahasre tu pūrṇe sa puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42.64 /
GE07hv_apppu:19332: svayam eva vibhur bhūtvā budhyate vibudhādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42.65 //
GE07hv_apppu:19333: tataś cintayate bhūyaḥ sṛṣṭiṃ lokasya lokakṛt / HV_App.I,42.66 /
GE07hv_apppu:19335: tataś cintayate kāryaṃ deveṣu samitiṃjayaḥ / HV_App.I,42.68 /
GE07hv_apppu:19336: saṃbhavaṃ sarvalokasya vidadhāti sa vākpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42.69 //
GE07hv_apppu:19337: kartā caiva vikartā ca saṃhartā ca prajāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.70 /
GE07hv_apppu:19338: dhātā vidhātā prabhavaḥ saṃyamo niyamo yamaḥ // HV_App.I,42.71 //
GE07hv_apppu:19342: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2 Ds T1.2 G4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19344: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B1.2 Ds cont., K Ñ1 B3 Dn D1-6 ins. after line 74:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19347: [k: Ñ1.2 V1.3 B Dn2 Ds D3.5.6 T2 G1.4.5 M4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19348: nārāyaṇaparo devo na bhūto na bhaviṣyati / **HV_App.I,42.75**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19349: sa svayaṃbhūr iti jñeyaḥ sa brahmā bhuvanādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:19350: sa vāyur iti vijñeya eṣa yajñaḥ prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:19351: sadasac ca sa vijñeyaḥ sa yajñaḥ sa prajākaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.78 /
GE07hv_apppu:19352: yad veditavyaṃ tridaśais tad eṣa parivindati / HV_App.I,42.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:19353: yac ca vedyaṃ bhagavato devā api na tad viduḥ // HV_App.I,42.80 //
GE07hv_apppu:19354: prajānāṃ patayaḥ sapta ṛṣayaś ca sahāmaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42.81 /
GE07hv_apppu:19355: nāsyāntam adhigacchanti tenānanta iti śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,42.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:19356: yad asya paramaṃ rūpaṃ tan na paśyanti devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:19357: prādurbhāveṣu saṃbhūtaṃ yat tad arcanti devatāḥ // HV_App.I,42.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:19358: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 84:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19359: prādurbhāve tu yad rūpaṃ tad arcanti divaikasaḥ / **HV_App.I,42.84**9:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19360: darśitaṃ yad anenaiva tad avekṣanti devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:19361: yan na darśitavān devaḥ kas tad anveṣṭum arhati // HV_App.I,42.86 //
GE07hv_apppu:19363: tejasas tapasaś caiva nidhānam amṛtasya ca // HV_App.I,42.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:19366: tad eṣa saṃhṛtya jagat kṛtvā garbhastham ātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.91 /
GE07hv_apppu:19373: tadāsṛjaj jagad idam ātmanā prabhuḥ || HV_App.I,42.96 ||
GE07hv_apppu:19376: jagadaṇḍam idaṃ sarvam āsīt pūrvaṃ hiraṇmayam / HV_App.I,42.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:19377: prajāpater bhūtimayam itīyaṃ vaidikī śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,42.98 //
GE07hv_apppu:19380: bhūyo 'ṣṭadhā bibhedāṇḍaṃ vibhur vai lokayonikṛt / HV_App.I,42.101 /
GE07hv_apppu:19381: cakāra jagataś cātra vibhāgaṃ sarvabhāgavit // HV_App.I,42.102 //
GE07hv_apppu:19382: yac chidram ūrdhvam ākāśaṃ parā sukṛtināṃ gatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.103 /
GE07hv_apppu:19383: vihitaṃ viśvayogena yad adhas tad rasātalam // HV_App.I,42.104 //
GE07hv_apppu:19384: yad aṇḍam akarot pūrvaṃ devalokasisṛkṣayā / HV_App.I,42.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:19385: samantād aṣṭadhā yogī chidrāṇi kṛtavāṃs tu saḥ / HV_App.I,42.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:19386: diśaś ca vidiśaḥ sarvā manasaivākarod vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:19388: bahuvarṇadharāś citrā babhūvus te balāhakāḥ // HV_App.I,42.109 //
GE07hv_apppu:19389: yad aṇḍamadhye skannaṃ tad dravam āsīt samāhitam / HV_App.I,42.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:19390: jātarūpaṃ tad abhavat tat sarvaṃ pṛthivītale // HV_App.I,42.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:19392: pṛthivī nikhilā rājan yugānte sāgarair iva // HV_App.I,42.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:19393: yac cāṇḍam akarot pūrvaṃ devalokacikīrṣayā / HV_App.I,42.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:19394: tatra yat salilaṃ skannaṃ so 'bhavat kāñcano giriḥ // HV_App.I,42.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:19395: tenāmbhasā plutāḥ sarvā diśaś copadiśas tathā / HV_App.I,42.116 /
GE07hv_apppu:19396: antarikṣaṃ ca nākaṃ ca yac cānyat kiṃcid antaram // HV_App.I,42.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:19397: yatra yatra jalaṃ skannaṃ tatra tatrotthito giriḥ / HV_App.I,42.118 /
GE07hv_apppu:19398: śailaiḥ sahasrair gahanā viṣamā medinī kṛtā // HV_App.I,42.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:19400: pīḍitā gurubhir devī pṛthivī vyathitābhavat // HV_App.I,42.121 //
GE07hv_apppu:19402: hiraṇmayaṃ samuddiṣṭaṃ tejo vimalarūpi tat // HV_App.I,42.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:19403: aśaktā vai dhārayitum adhastāt praviveśa ha / HV_App.I,42.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:19404: pīḍyamānā bhagavatas tejasā tena sā kṣitiḥ // HV_App.I,42.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:19405: pṛthivīṃ viśatīṃ dṛṣṭvā tām adho madhusūdanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:19406: uddhārārthaṃ manaś cakre tasyāḥ sa hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,42.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:19408: matteja eva balavat samāsādya tapasvinī / HV_App.I,42.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:19409: rasātalaṃ viśed devī paṅke gaur iva durbalā // HV_App.I,42.129 //
GE07hv_apppu:19418: tvayātmā dhāryate deva tvayā saṃdhāryate jagat / HV_App.I,42.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:19419: tvaṃ dhārayasi bhūtāni bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ bibharṣi ca // HV_App.I,42.135 //
GE07hv_apppu:19420: yat tvayā dhāryate kiṃcit tejasā ca balena ca / HV_App.I,42.136 /
GE07hv_apppu:19421: tatas tava prasādena mayā paścāt tu dhāryate // HV_App.I,42.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:19422: tvayā dhṛtaṃ dhārayāmi nādhṛtaṃ dhārayāmy aham / HV_App.I,42.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:19423: na hi tad vidyate bhūtaṃ yat tvayā nāvadhāryate // HV_App.I,42.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:19424: tvam eva kuruṣe vīra nārāyaṇa yuge yuge / HV_App.I,42.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:19427: trāyasva māṃ suraśreṣṭha tvām eva śaraṇaṃ gatām // HV_App.I,42.143 //
GE07hv_apppu:19428: dānavaiḥ pīḍyamānāhaṃ rākṣasaiś ca durātmabhiḥ / HV_App.I,42.144 /
GE07hv_apppu:19429: tvām eva śaraṇaṃ nityam upayāmi sanātanam // HV_App.I,42.145 //
GE07hv_apppu:19430: tāvan me 'sti bhayaṃ bhūyo yāvan na tvāṃ kakudminam / HV_App.I,42.146 /
GE07hv_apppu:19431: śaraṇaṃ yāmi manasā śataśo 'py upalakṣitā // HV_App.I,42.147 //
GE07hv_apppu:19433: mā bhair dharaṇi kalyāṇi śāntiṃ vraja samāhitā / HV_App.I,42.148 /
GE07hv_apppu:19434: eṣa tvām ucitaṃ sthānaṃ mānayāmi manīṣitam // HV_App.I,42.149 //
GE07hv_apppu:19436: tato mahātmā manasā divyaṃ rūpam acintayat / HV_App.I,42.150 /
GE07hv_apppu:19437: kiṃ nu rūpam ahaṃ kṛtvā uddharāmi vasuṃdharām // HV_App.I,42.151 //
GE07hv_apppu:19438: jale nimagnāṃ dharaṇīṃ yenāhaṃ vai samuddhare / HV_App.I,42.152 /
GE07hv_apppu:19439: ity evaṃ cintayitvā tu devas tatkaraṇe matim // HV_App.I,42.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:19440: jalakrīḍārucis tasmād vārāhaṃ vapur asmarat / HV_App.I,42.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:19441: harir uddharaṇe yuktas tadā bhūmeḥ sa bhūmidhṛk // HV_App.I,42.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:19449: rūpam āsthāya vipulaṃ vārāham amitaṃ hariḥ / HV_App.I,42.163 /
GE07hv_apppu:19454: ājyanāsaḥ sruvas tuṇḍaḥ sāmaghoṣasvano mahān // HV_App.I,42.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:19465: bhūtvā yajñavarāho 'sau drāgadhaḥ prāviśad guruḥ // HV_App.I,42.179 //
GE07hv_apppu:19466: adbhiḥ saṃchāditām urvīṃ sa tām ārchat prajāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.180 /
GE07hv_apppu:19469: tataḥ svasthānam ānīya pṛthivīṃ pṛthivīdharaḥ / HV_App.I,42.183 /
GE07hv_apppu:19470: mumoca pūrvaṃ sahasā dhārayitvā dharādharaḥ // HV_App.I,42.184 //
GE07hv_apppu:19471: tato jagāma nirvāṇaṃ medinī tasya dhāraṇāt / HV_App.I,42.185 /
GE07hv_apppu:19472: cakāra ca namaskāraṃ tasmai devāya śaṃbhave // HV_App.I,42.186 //
GE07hv_apppu:19474: uddhṛtā pṛthivī devī lokānāṃ hitakāmyayā // HV_App.I,42.188 //
GE07hv_apppu:19475: athoddhṛtya kṣitiṃ devo jagataḥ sthāpanecchayā / HV_App.I,42.189 /
GE07hv_apppu:19477: rasātalagatām evaṃ vicintya sa surottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42.191 //
GE07hv_apppu:19480: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for lines 192-193 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19487: tasyopari jalaughasya mahatī naur iva sthitā / HV_App.I,42.196 /
GE07hv_apppu:19488: vitatatvāt tu dehasya na yayau saṃplavaṃ mahī // HV_App.I,42.197 //
GE07hv_apppu:19489: tataḥ sa cintayām āsa pravibhāgaṃ kṣiter vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.198 /
GE07hv_apppu:19490: samucchrayaṃ ca sarveṣāṃ parvatānāṃ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42.199 //
GE07hv_apppu:19491: vilekhanaṃ pramāṇaṃ ca gatiṃ prasavam eva ca / HV_App.I,42.200 /
GE07hv_apppu:19492: māhātmyaṃ ca viśeṣaṃ ca nadīnām anvacintayat // HV_App.I,42.201 //
GE07hv_apppu:19493: caturantāṃ dharāṃ kṛtvā kṛtvā caiva mahārṇavam / HV_App.I,42.202 /
GE07hv_apppu:19494: madhye pṛthivyāḥ sauvarṇam akaron meruparvatam // HV_App.I,42.203 //
GE07hv_apppu:19495: prācīṃ diśam atho gatvā cākarodayaparvatam / HV_App.I,42.204 /
GE07hv_apppu:19499: vividhāṃś ca mahāskandhān kāñcanān puṣkarekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42.208 /
GE07hv_apppu:19500: nityapuṣpaphalān vṛkṣān kṛtavāṃs tatra parvate // HV_App.I,42.209 //
GE07hv_apppu:19502: cakāra sa mahādevaḥ punaḥ saumanasaṃ girim // HV_App.I,42.211 //
GE07hv_apppu:19506: vedikāṃ bahuvarṇāṃ ca saṃdhyābhrābhām akalpayat // HV_App.I,42.213 //
GE07hv_apppu:19510: kṛtavān ātmanaḥ sthānaṃ viśvakarmā prajāpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42.217 //
GE07hv_apppu:19514: cakāra pulinopetāṃ vasudhārām iti śrutiḥ // HV_App.I,42.221 //
GE07hv_apppu:19515: sā diśaṃ nikhilāṃ prācīṃ puṇyair mukhaśataiś citām / HV_App.I,42.222 /
GE07hv_apppu:19518: bhūṣitābhyadhikaṃ kāntaiḥ sā nadītīrajair drumaiḥ // HV_App.I,42.225 //
GE07hv_apppu:19519: kṛtvā prācīvibhāgaṃ tu dakṣiṇāyām atho diśi / HV_App.I,42.226 /
GE07hv_apppu:19520: cakāra parvataṃ ramyaṃ sarvaṃ kāñcanarājatam // HV_App.I,42.227 //
GE07hv_apppu:19522: sa bibhracchuśubhe 'tīva dvau varṇau parvatottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42.229 //
GE07hv_apppu:19523: tejasā yugapad vyāptaṃ sūryācandramasor iva / HV_App.I,42.230 /
GE07hv_apppu:19524: vapuṣmantam atho tatra bhānumantaṃ mahāgirim // HV_App.I,42.231 //
GE07hv_apppu:19525: sarvakāmaphalair vṛkṣair vṛtaṃ ramyair manoramaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.232 /
GE07hv_apppu:19528: ṛṣabhapratimaṃ caiva ṛṣabhaṃ nāma parvatam // HV_App.I,42.235 //
GE07hv_apppu:19530: mahendram atha śailendraṃ śatayojanam ucchritam // HV_App.I,42.237 //
GE07hv_apppu:19532: medinyāṃ kṛtavān devaḥ pratikṣobham ivācalam // HV_App.I,42.239 //
GE07hv_apppu:19536: dakṣiṇasyāṃ diśi śubhaṃ cakāra sa mahācalam / HV_App.I,42.243 /
GE07hv_apppu:19540: suramyāṃ toyakalilāṃ vicitrāṃ dakṣiṇāṃ diśam / HV_App.I,42.247 /
GE07hv_apppu:19542: diśaṃ yāmyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya pratīcīṃ diśam āgamat / HV_App.I,42.249 /
GE07hv_apppu:19543: akarot tatra śailendraṃ śatayojanam ucchritam / HV_App.I,42.250 /
GE07hv_apppu:19544: śobhitaṃ śikharaiś citraiḥ supravṛddhair hiraṇmayaiḥ // HV_App.I,42.251 //
GE07hv_apppu:19545: kāñcanībhiḥ śilābhiś ca guhābhiś ca vibhūṣitam / HV_App.I,42.252 /
GE07hv_apppu:19546: samākulaṃ sūryanibhaiḥ sālais tālaiś ca bhāsvaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42.253 //
GE07hv_apppu:19547: śuśubhe jātarūpaiś ca śrīmadbhiś citravedikaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.254 /
GE07hv_apppu:19549: merupratimarūpāṇi vapuṣā prabhayā ca ha // HV_App.I,42.256 //
GE07hv_apppu:19553: ātmarūpopamaṃ tatra vārāhaṃ nāma nāmataḥ / HV_App.I,42.260 /
GE07hv_apppu:19554: niveśayām āsa vibhur divyaṃ vaidūryaparvatam / HV_App.I,42.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:19555: rājatāḥ kāñcanāś caiva yatra divyāḥ śiloccayāḥ // HV_App.I,42.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:19562: śubhām atirasāṃ caiva ghṛtadhārām iti śrutiḥ / HV_App.I,42.269 /
GE07hv_apppu:19563: varāhaḥ saritaṃ puṇyāṃ pratīcyām akarot prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.270 //
GE07hv_apppu:19564: pratīcyāṃ saṃvidhiṃ kṛtvā parvatān kāñcanojjvalān / HV_App.I,42.271 /
GE07hv_apppu:19568: sa tu deśo visūryo 'pi tasya bhāsā prakāśate // HV_App.I,42.275 //
GE07hv_apppu:19569: tasya lakṣmyādhikaṃ bhāti tapatā raviṇā yathā / HV_App.I,42.276 /
GE07hv_apppu:19572: cakāra ratnasaṃkīrṇaṃ bhūyo 'staṃ nāma parvatam // HV_App.I,42.279 //
GE07hv_apppu:19577: giriṃ triśikharaṃ caiva tathā puṣkaraparvatam / HV_App.I,42.284 /
GE07hv_apppu:19578: śubhraṃ pāṇḍurameghābhaṃ kailāsaṃ ca nagottamam // HV_App.I,42.285 //
GE07hv_apppu:19580: niveśayām āsa harir vārāhīṃ tanum āsthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.287 //
GE07hv_apppu:19581: nadīṃ sarvaguṇopetām uttarasyāṃ diśi prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.288 /
GE07hv_apppu:19582: madhudhārāṃ sa kṛtavān divyāṃ mukhaśatākulām // HV_App.I,42.289 //
GE07hv_apppu:19583: sarve caiva kṣitidharāḥ sapakṣāḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42.290 /
GE07hv_apppu:19584: tadā kṛtā bhagavatā vicitrāḥ parameṣṭhinā // HV_App.I,42.291 //
GE07hv_apppu:19585: sa kṛtvā pravibhāgaṃ tu pṛthivyā lokabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.292 /
GE07hv_apppu:19593: jagatsraṣṭumanā devaś cintayām āsa pūrvajaḥ / HV_App.I,42.298 /
GE07hv_apppu:19594: tasya cintayato vaktrān niḥsṛtaḥ puruṣaḥ kila // HV_App.I,42.299 //
GE07hv_apppu:19595: tataḥ sa puruṣo devaṃ kiṃ karomīty upasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42.300 /
GE07hv_apppu:19596: prayuvāca smitaṃ kṛtvā devadevo jagatpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.301 /
GE07hv_apppu:19597: vibhajātmānam ity uktvā gato 'ntardhānam īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42.302 //
GE07hv_apppu:19599: praśāntasyeva dīpasya gatis tasya na vidyate // HV_App.I,42.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:19600: tatas teneritāṃ vāṇīṃ so 'nvacintayata prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.305 /
GE07hv_apppu:19601: hiraṇyagarbho bhagavān ya eṣa cchandasi śrutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.306 //
GE07hv_apppu:19602: eṣa prajāpatiḥ pūrvam abhavad bhuvanādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42.307 /
GE07hv_apppu:19607: vibhajātmānam ity uktas tenāsmi sumahātmanā / HV_App.I,42.309 /
GE07hv_apppu:19608: katham ātmā vibhajyaḥ syāt saṃśayo hy atra me mahān // HV_App.I,42.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:19609: iti cintayatas tasya om ity evotthitaḥ svaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:19610: sa bhūmāv antarikṣe ca nāke ca kṛtavān svanam // HV_App.I,42.312 //
GE07hv_apppu:19611: taṃ caivābhyasatas tasya manasāramayat prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.313 /
GE07hv_apppu:19616: tatpadaṃ saṃsmaran divyāṃ sāvitrīm akarot prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.318 //
GE07hv_apppu:19618: cakāra nikhilān vedān brahmayuktena karmaṇā // HV_App.I,42.320 //
GE07hv_apppu:19619: tatas tasyaiva manasaḥ sanaḥ sanaka eva ca / HV_App.I,42.321 /
GE07hv_apppu:19620: sanātanaś ca bhagavān varadaś ca sanandanaḥ // HV_App.I,42.322 //
GE07hv_apppu:19621: sanatkumāraś ca vibhus tatra jajñe sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.323 /
GE07hv_apppu:19622: mānasāś caiva pūrvādyā ity ete ṣaṇmaharṣayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.324 //
GE07hv_apppu:19623: brahmāṇaṃ kapilaṃ caiva ṣaḍ etāṃś caiva yoginaḥ / HV_App.I,42.325 /
GE07hv_apppu:19624: yatayo yogatantreṣu yān stuvanti dvijātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.326 //
GE07hv_apppu:19625: tato marīcim atriṃ ca pulastyaṃ pulahaṃ kratum / HV_App.I,42.327 /
GE07hv_apppu:19626: bhṛgum aṅgirasaṃ caiva manuṃ caiva prajāpatim // HV_App.I,42.328 //
GE07hv_apppu:19628: maharṣīn asṛjac chaṃbhur aṣṭāv etāṃs tu mānasān // HV_App.I,42.330 //
GE07hv_apppu:19629: ete yugasahasrānte yāś caiṣām abhavan prajāḥ / HV_App.I,42.331 /
GE07hv_apppu:19630: kalpe niḥśeṣamukte tu tato gacchanti nirvṛtim // HV_App.I,42.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:19633: bhūyo varṣasahasrānte utpattis tu vidhīyate / HV_App.I,42.333 /
GE07hv_apppu:19635: kiṃ tu karmaviśeṣeṇa devatānāṃ yuge yuge / HV_App.I,42.335 /
GE07hv_apppu:19637: aṅguṣṭhād dakṣiṇād dakṣa utpanno bhagavān ṛṣiḥ / HV_App.I,42.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:19638: tasthaiva tu punar bhāryā vāmāṅguṣṭhād ajāyata // HV_App.I,42.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:19639: tatra tasyābhavat kanyā viśrutā lokamātaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.339 /
GE07hv_apppu:19640: yābhir vyāptās trayo lokāḥ prajābhir manujādhipa // HV_App.I,42.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:19641: aditiṃ ca ditiṃ kālām anāyuṃ siṃhikāṃ munim / HV_App.I,42.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:19642: prādhāṃ krodhāṃ ca surabhiṃ vinatāṃ surasāṃ tathā // HV_App.I,42.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:19644: irāṃ krodhavaśāṃ caiva surasāṃ ca trayodaśa / **HV_App.I,42.342**16:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19645: danuṃ kadrūṃ ca duhitṝḥ pradadau kaśyapāya tu / HV_App.I,42.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:19647: arundhatīṃ vasuṃ yāmīṃ lambāṃ bhānuṃ marutvatīm / HV_App.I,42.345 /
GE07hv_apppu:19648: saṃkalpāṃ ca muhūrtāṃ ca sādhyāṃ viśvāṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,42.346 //
GE07hv_apppu:19649: manave brahmaputrāya kanyā dakṣo dadau daśa / HV_App.I,42.347 /
GE07hv_apppu:19650: tāś ca sarvān avadyāṅgyaḥ kanyāḥ kamalalocanāḥ // HV_App.I,42.348 //
GE07hv_apppu:19651: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 B1.3 Ds D3-6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19653: kīrtiṃ lakṣmīṃ dhṛtiṃ puṣṭiṃ buddhiṃ medhāṃ kriyāṃ tathā / HV_App.I,42.349 /
GE07hv_apppu:19654: matiṃ lajjāṃ vasuṃ caiva dakṣo dharmāya vai dadau // HV_App.I,42.350 //
GE07hv_apppu:19655: ātreyas tu tato bhūtas tasya toyātmakaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.351 /
GE07hv_apppu:19656: putro gṛhāṇām adhipaḥ sahasrāṃśus tamisrahā // HV_App.I,42.352 //
GE07hv_apppu:19658: rohiṇīpramukhāḥ kanyā dakṣaḥ prācetaso dadau // HV_App.I,42.354 //
GE07hv_apppu:19659: etāsāṃ putrapautraṃ tu procyamānaṃ mayā śṛṇu / HV_App.I,42.355 /
GE07hv_apppu:19660: kaśyapasya manoś caiva dharmasya śaśinas tathā // HV_App.I,42.356 //
GE07hv_apppu:19661: aryamā varuṇo mitraḥ pūṣā dhātā puraṃdaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.357 /
GE07hv_apppu:19662: tvaṣṭā bhago 'ṃśaḥ savitā parjanyaś ceti viśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,42.358 //
GE07hv_apppu:19663: adityāṃ jajñire devāḥ kaśyapasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.359 /
GE07hv_apppu:19664: dityāṃ putradvayaṃ jajño kaśyapād iti naḥ śrutam // HV_App.I,42.360 //
GE07hv_apppu:19665: hiraṇyakaśipuś caiva hiraṇyākṣaś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,42.361 /
GE07hv_apppu:19666: dvāv apy amitavikrāntau tapasā kaśyapopamau // HV_App.I,42.362 //
GE07hv_apppu:19674: bhavāya tu bhavaṃ devaṃ śrīgarbhaṃ parameśvaram / **HV_App.I,42.362**18:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:19676: akṣayaṃ paramaṃ devam avyayaṃ bhavanaṃ param / **HV_App.I,42.362**18:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:19677: parāc ca paramaṃ devaṃ parāvaraparaṃ param // **HV_App.I,42.362**18:10 //
GE07hv_apppu:19683: [k: K1.2 Ñ1 B Ds D4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19684: prahrādaś caiva saṃhrādas tathānuhrāda eva ca / **HV_App.I,42.363**19:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19685: hradaś caiva tu vikrāntaḥ pañcamo 'nuhradas tathā // **HV_App.I,42.363**19:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19686: prahrādaḥ pūrvajas teṣām anuhrādas tato 'paraḥ // HV_App.I,42.364 //
GE07hv_apppu:19687: saṃhrādaś caiva hrādaś ca kanīyāṃsau babhūvatuḥ / HV_App.I,42.365 /
GE07hv_apppu:19688: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 B1.2 Dn Ds D3.4.6 T2 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19690: virocanaś ca prāhrādir daityendro 'bhūn mahāyaśāḥ // HV_App.I,42.366 //
GE07hv_apppu:19691: virocanaś ca jambhaś ca sujambhaś ceti viśrutāḥ / HV_App.I,42.367 /
GE07hv_apppu:19694: balir virocanasuto bāṇa eko baleḥ sutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.368 //
GE07hv_apppu:19697: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 368:k]
GE07hv_apppu:19698: bales tu putro balavān bāṇa eva pratāpavān // **HV_App.I,42.368**23:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:19699: anuhlādasya ye putrā khyātāḥ sarvatra bhārata / **HV_App.I,42.368**23:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:19700: danoḥ putrās tu bahavo vaṃśe khyātā mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,42.369 /
GE07hv_apppu:19701: vipracittiḥ prathamajas teṣāṃ rājā babhūva ha // HV_App.I,42.370 //
GE07hv_apppu:19702: gaṇaḥ prajajñe krodhāyāḥ putrapautram anantakam / HV_App.I,42.371 /
GE07hv_apppu:19703: raudrāḥ krodhavaśā nāma krūrakarmāṇa eva te // HV_App.I,42.372 //
GE07hv_apppu:19704: siṃhikā suṣuve rāhuṃ grahaṃ candrārkamardanam / HV_App.I,42.373 /
GE07hv_apppu:19705: grastāraṃ caiva candrasya sūryasya ca vināśanam // HV_App.I,42.374 //
GE07hv_apppu:19706: kālāyāḥ kālakalpas tu gaṇaḥ paramadāruṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42.375 /
GE07hv_apppu:19708: sahasraśīrṣā śeṣaś ca vāsukis takṣakas tathā / HV_App.I,42.377 /
GE07hv_apppu:19709: bahūnāṃ kadruputrāṇām ete prādhānyam āgatāḥ // HV_App.I,42.378 //
GE07hv_apppu:19710: dharmātmāno vedavidaḥ sadā prāṇihite ratāḥ / HV_App.I,42.379 /
GE07hv_apppu:19712: tārkṣyaś cāriṣṭanemiś ca garuḍaś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42.381 /
GE07hv_apppu:19713: aruṇaś cāruṇiś caiva vinatāyāḥ sutāḥ smṛtāḥ // HV_App.I,42.382 //
GE07hv_apppu:19714: imāś cāpsarasaḥ puṇyā vividhāḥ puṇyalakṣaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,42.383 /
GE07hv_apppu:19716: anavadyām anūkāṃ ca anūnām aruṇapriyām / HV_App.I,42.385 /
GE07hv_apppu:19717: anugāṃ subhagāṃ caiva striyaḥ prādhā vyajāyata // HV_App.I,42.386 //
GE07hv_apppu:19719: surūpā lakṣmaṇā kṣemā tathā rambhā manoramā // HV_App.I,42.388 //
GE07hv_apppu:19720: amitā ca subāhū ca suvṛttā sumukhī tathā / HV_App.I,42.389 /
GE07hv_apppu:19721: supriyā ca sugandhā ca surathā ca pramāthinī // HV_App.I,42.390 //
GE07hv_apppu:19722: kāśyā śāradvatī caiva mauneyāpsarasaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42.391 /
GE07hv_apppu:19723: viśvāvasur bharaṇyā ca gandharvāś caiva viśrutāḥ // HV_App.I,42.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:19724: menakā sahajanyā ca parṇinī puñjikasthalā / HV_App.I,42.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:19725: ghṛtasthalā ghṛtācī ca viśvācī corvaśī tathā // HV_App.I,42.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:19726: anumloceti vikhyātā pramloceti ca tā daśa / HV_App.I,42.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:19727: manovatī tathā caiva divyā apsarasaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42.396 /
GE07hv_apppu:19728: prajāpates tu saṃkalpāt saṃbhūtā bhuvanaśriyaḥ // HV_App.I,42.397 //
GE07hv_apppu:19729: amṛtaṃ brāhmaṇā gāvo rudrāśceti catuṣṭayam / HV_App.I,42.398 /
GE07hv_apppu:19730: surabhyapatyam ity etat purāṇe niścayo mahān // HV_App.I,42.399 //
GE07hv_apppu:19731: etad vai kaśyapāpatyaṃ manor vaṃśaṃ nibodhata / HV_App.I,42.400 /
GE07hv_apppu:19733: viśvedevās tu viśvāyāḥ sādhyā sādhyān vyajāyata / HV_App.I,42.402 /
GE07hv_apppu:19734: marutvatyā marutvanto vasos tu vasavaḥ smṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42.403 /
GE07hv_apppu:19735: bhānos tu bhānavas tāta muhūrtās tu muhūrtajāḥ // HV_App.I,42.404 //
GE07hv_apppu:19736: lambā ghoṣaṃ vijajñe 'tha nāgavīthī ca jāmijā / HV_App.I,42.405 /
GE07hv_apppu:19738: saṃkalpāyās tu kauravya jajñe saṃkalpa eva ca / HV_App.I,42.407 /
GE07hv_apppu:19739: dharmasya putro lakṣmyās tu kāmo jajñe jagatpriyaḥ // HV_App.I,42.408 //
GE07hv_apppu:19740: yaśo harṣaś ca kāmasya ratyāṃ putradvayaṃ smṛtam / HV_App.I,42.409 /
GE07hv_apppu:19741: somasya putro rohiṇyāṃ jajñe varcā mahāprabhaḥ // HV_App.I,42.410 //
GE07hv_apppu:19742: udayann eva bhagavān varcasvī yena jāyate // HV_App.I,42.411 //
GE07hv_apppu:19744: purūravāś ca bhagavān urvaśī yena yujyate / **HV_App.I,42.411**24:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19745: evaṃ putrasahasrāṇi strīṇāṃ caiva parasparam / HV_App.I,42.412 /
GE07hv_apppu:19746: etāvat tu jaganmūlaṃ yatra lokāḥ pratiṣṭhitāḥ // HV_App.I,42.413 //
GE07hv_apppu:19747: prajāpatis tu bhagavān guṇataḥ prekṣya dehinaḥ / HV_App.I,42.414 /
GE07hv_apppu:19749: diśo daśa kṣitim ṛṣayo 'rṇavān nagān @ HV_App.I,42.416 @
GE07hv_apppu:19752: kriyā makhān atha kṛtavān girīṃś ca saḥ || HV_App.I,42.419 ||
GE07hv_apppu:19755: trayāṇām api lokānām ādityānāṃ ca bhārata / HV_App.I,42.420 /
GE07hv_apppu:19757: sa vajrī kavacī jiṣṇur adityām abhijajñivān / HV_App.I,42.422 /
GE07hv_apppu:19758: smṛtīsahāyo dyutimān yathā so 'dhvaryubhiḥ stutaḥ // HV_App.I,42.423 //
GE07hv_apppu:19759: jātamātro 'tha bhagavān adityā sa kuśair vṛtah / HV_App.I,42.424 /
GE07hv_apppu:19762: brahmā krameṇa rājyāni vyādeṣṭum upacakrame // HV_App.I,42.427 //
GE07hv_apppu:19763: yajñānāṃ tapasāṃ caiva nakṣatragrahayos tathā / HV_App.I,42.428 /
GE07hv_apppu:19764: dvijānām oṣadhīnāṃ ca somaṃ rājye 'bhyaṣecayat // HV_App.I,42.429 //
GE07hv_apppu:19765: dakṣaṃ prajāpatīnāṃ tu ambhasāṃ varuṇaṃ patim / HV_App.I,42.430 /
GE07hv_apppu:19768: gandharvāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ mahādevaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ / **HV_App.I,42.431**25:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19769: gandharvāṇāṃ ca sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāṃ ca śarīriṇām / HV_App.I,42.432 /
GE07hv_apppu:19770: śabdakālabalānāṃ ca vāyur īśas tadā kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.433 //
GE07hv_apppu:19771: sarvabhūtapiśācānāṃ mātṝṇāṃ ca gavāṃ tathā / HV_App.I,42.434 /
GE07hv_apppu:19773: pretānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ mahādevaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.436 /
GE07hv_apppu:19774: yakṣāṇāṃ rākṣasānāṃ ca guhyakānāṃ dhanasya ca // HV_App.I,42.437 //
GE07hv_apppu:19775: ratnānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ kṛto vaiśravaṇaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.438 /
GE07hv_apppu:19776: sarveṣāṃ daṃṣṭriṇāṃ śeṣo nāgānām atha vāsukiḥ / HV_App.I,42.439 /
GE07hv_apppu:19777: sarīsṛṣāṇāṃ sarveṣāṃ prabhur vai takṣakaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.440 //
GE07hv_apppu:19778: sāgarāṇāṃ nadīnāṃ ca meghānāṃ varṣitasya ca / HV_App.I,42.441 /
GE07hv_apppu:19780: gandharvāṇām adhipatiṃ cakre citrarathaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42.443 /
GE07hv_apppu:19781: sarvāpsarogaṇānāṃ ca kāmadevaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.444 //
GE07hv_apppu:19782: catuṣpadānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāhanānāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42.445 /
GE07hv_apppu:19784: daityānāṃ ca mahātejā hiraṇyākṣaḥ prabhuḥ kṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42.447 /
GE07hv_apppu:19785: dānavānāṃ ca sarveṣām anīkānāṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42.448 //
GE07hv_apppu:19788: gaṇānāṃ kālakeyānāṃ mahākālaḥ kṛtaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42.451 /
GE07hv_apppu:19789: anāyuṣāyāḥ putrāṇāṃ vṛtro rājā tadā kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.452 //
GE07hv_apppu:19792: siṃhikātanayo yas tu rāhur nāma mahāgrahaḥ / HV_App.I,42.453 /
GE07hv_apppu:19793: utpātānām anekānām aśubhānāṃ patiḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.454 //
GE07hv_apppu:19794: ṛtūnām atha sarveṣāṃ yugānāṃ caiva bhārata / HV_App.I,42.455 /
GE07hv_apppu:19795: pakṣāṇāṃ ca kṣapāṇāṃ ca tathāhastithiparvaṇām // HV_App.I,42.456 //
GE07hv_apppu:19797: kṛtaḥ saṃvatsaro rājā yogasya gaṇitasya ca // HV_App.I,42.458 //
GE07hv_apppu:19798: pakṣiṇām atha sarveṣāṃ nāgānāṃ ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42.459 /
GE07hv_apppu:19799: suparṇo bhogināṃ caiva guruḍo 'dhipatiḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.460 //
GE07hv_apppu:19801: [k: Ñ2 Bombay Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19802: yogānāṃ caiva sarveṣāṃ sādhyānām adhipaḥ kṛtaḥ // **HV_App.I,42.461**27:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:19804: [k: T2 G1.3-5 ins. after line 461, T1 after line 463 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19806: rājā prācyāṃ diśi tathā vāsavo 'dhipatiḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.462 //
GE07hv_apppu:19807: ādityasya vibhoḥ putro dharmarājo mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,42.463 /
GE07hv_apppu:19810: amburāja iti khyātaḥ pratīcyāṃ diśi pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,42.466 //
GE07hv_apppu:19812: ekākṣaḥ piṅgalo nāma saumyāyāṃ diśi pārthivaḥ // HV_App.I,42.468 //
GE07hv_apppu:19813: evaṃ vibhajya rājyāni svayaṃbhūr lokabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.469 /
GE07hv_apppu:19814: lokāṃś ca tridive divyān adadāt sa pṛthak pṛthak // HV_App.I,42.470 //
GE07hv_apppu:19819: ye ca bhāsā vibhānty agre saumyās tārāgaṇā iva / HV_App.I,42.475 /
GE07hv_apppu:19820: ete sukṛtināṃ lokā ye jātāḥ puṇyakarmiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42.476 //
GE07hv_apppu:19821: ye yajanti makhaiḥ puṇyaiḥ samāptavaradakṣiṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.477 /
GE07hv_apppu:19824: te tyaktarajasaḥ śāntā yānti tatra tapojjvalāḥ // HV_App.I,42.480 //
GE07hv_apppu:19825: evaṃ niyujya tanayān svayaṃ lokapitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,42.481 /
GE07hv_apppu:19831: yaśo divaṃ ca pratipedire śubhaṃ @ HV_App.I,42.487 @
GE07hv_apppu:19835: kadācit tu sapakṣās te parvatā dharaṇīdharāḥ / HV_App.I,42.489 /
GE07hv_apppu:19836: prasthitā dharaṇīṃ tyaktvā nūnaṃ tasyaiva māyayā // HV_App.I,42.490 //
GE07hv_apppu:19838: diśaṃ pratīcīm āgamya hrade 'majjan yathā gajāḥ // HV_App.I,42.492 //
GE07hv_apppu:19840: tac chrutvāthāsurāḥ sarve cakrur udyogam uttamam // HV_App.I,42.494 //
GE07hv_apppu:19841: krūrāṃ ca buddhim atulāṃ pṛthivīharaṇe ratāḥ / HV_App.I,42.495 /
GE07hv_apppu:19842: āyudhāni ca sarvaṇi jagṛhur bhīmavikramāḥ // HV_App.I,42.496 //
GE07hv_apppu:19843: cakrāśanīṃs tathā khaḍgān bhuśuṇḍīś ca dhanūṃṣi ca / HV_App.I,42.497 /
GE07hv_apppu:19844: prāsān pāśāṃś ca śaktīś ca musalāni gadās tathā // HV_App.I,42.498 //
GE07hv_apppu:19845: kecit kavacinaḥ sajjā mattān nāgān samāsthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42.499 /
GE07hv_apppu:19846: kecid aśvarathān yuktā apare 'śvā mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,42.500 //
GE07hv_apppu:19847: kecid uṣṭrāṃs tathā khaḍgān mahiṣān gardabhān api / HV_App.I,42.501 /
GE07hv_apppu:19848: svabāhubalam āsthāya kecic cāpi padātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.502 //
GE07hv_apppu:19850: itaś cetaś ca niścerur hṛṣṭāḥ sarve yuyutsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42.504 //
GE07hv_apppu:19852: daityānāṃ viditodyogāś cakrur udyogam uttamam // HV_App.I,42.506 //
GE07hv_apppu:19855: ugrāyudhadharā devāḥ sveṣv anīkeṣv avasthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42.509 /
GE07hv_apppu:19857: tatas tūryaninādaiś ca bherīṇāṃ ca mahāsvanaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.511 /
GE07hv_apppu:19860: musalaiḥ paṭṭisaiś caiva chādayām āsa vāsavam // HV_App.I,42.514 //
GE07hv_apppu:19863: śiṣṭāś ca daityā balinaḥ śitadhārāparaśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.517 /
GE07hv_apppu:19864: parighair āyasaiḥ khaḍgaiḥ kṣepaṇīyaiś ca mudgaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42.518 //
GE07hv_apppu:19865: gaṇḍaśailaiś ca vipulair aśmabhiś cādrisaṃnibhaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.519 /
GE07hv_apppu:19866: ghātanībhiś ca gurvībhiḥ śataghnībhis tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42.520 //
GE07hv_apppu:19867: yugair yantraiś ca nirmuktair argalaiś ca vidāraṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.521 /
GE07hv_apppu:19868: sarvān devagaṇān daityāḥ saṃnijaghnuḥ savāsavān // HV_App.I,42.522 //
GE07hv_apppu:19873: samudyatāyudhaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve devagaṇās tadā / HV_App.I,42.527 /
GE07hv_apppu:19874: te hiraṇyākṣam asuraṃ daityānām agrataḥ sthitam // HV_App.I,42.528 //
GE07hv_apppu:19875: yugāntasamaye bhīmaṃ sthitaṃ mṛtyum ivāgrataḥ / HV_App.I,42.529 /
GE07hv_apppu:19876: pravivyathuḥ surāḥ sarve tadā śakrapurogamāḥ // HV_App.I,42.530 //
GE07hv_apppu:19877: dṛṣṭvāyāntaṃ hiraṇyākṣaṃ mahādrim iva jaṅgamam / HV_App.I,42.531 /
GE07hv_apppu:19880: sā tu daityacamū reje hiraṇyakavacojjvalā / HV_App.I,42.534 /
GE07hv_apppu:19883: babhañjur bāhubhir bāhūn dvaṃdvam anye yuyutsavaḥ / HV_App.I,42.537 /
GE07hv_apppu:19884: gadānipātair bhagnāṅgā bāṇaiś ca mathitorasaḥ // HV_App.I,42.538 //
GE07hv_apppu:19885: vinipetuḥ pṛthak kecit tathānye vijughūrṇire / HV_App.I,42.539 /
GE07hv_apppu:19886: babhañjire rathān kecit kecit saṃmṛditā rathaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.540 /
GE07hv_apppu:19887: saṃbādham anye saṃprāptā na śekuś calituṃ rathāḥ // HV_App.I,42.541 //
GE07hv_apppu:19888: dānavendrabalaṃ tat tu devānāṃ ca mahad balam / HV_App.I,42.542 /
GE07hv_apppu:19890: hiraṇyākṣaś ca balavān kruddhaḥ sa ditinandanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.544 /
GE07hv_apppu:19891: vyavardhata mahātejāḥ samudra iva parvaṇi // HV_App.I,42.545 //
GE07hv_apppu:19892: tasya kruddhasya sahasā mukhān niścerur arciṣaḥ / HV_App.I,42.546 /
GE07hv_apppu:19894: śastrajālair bahuvidhair dhanurbhiḥ parighair api / HV_App.I,42.548 /
GE07hv_apppu:19895: divyam ākāśam āvavre parvatair ucchritair iva // HV_App.I,42.549 //
GE07hv_apppu:19897: na śekuś calituṃ devā hiraṇyākṣārditā yudhi // HV_App.I,42.551 //
GE07hv_apppu:19898: tena vitrāsitā devā hiraṇyākṣeṇa saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42.552 /
GE07hv_apppu:19899: na śekur yatnavanto 'pi yatnaṃ kartuṃ vicetasaḥ // HV_App.I,42.553 //
GE07hv_apppu:19900: tena śakraḥ sahasrākṣaḥ stambhito 'streṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,42.554 /
GE07hv_apppu:19901: airāvatagataḥ saṃkhye nāśakac calituṃ bhayāt // HV_App.I,42.555 //
GE07hv_apppu:19902: sarvāṃś ca devān akhilān sa parājitya dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42.556 /
GE07hv_apppu:19903: stambhayitvā ca deveśam ātmasthaṃ manyate jagat // HV_App.I,42.557 //
GE07hv_apppu:19910: niṣprayatne surapatau dharṣiteṣu sureṣu ca / HV_App.I,42.562 /
GE07hv_apppu:19912: vārāhaḥ parvato nāma yaḥ pūrvaṃ samudāhṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42.564 /
GE07hv_apppu:19913: sa eṣa bhūtvā bhagavān ājagāmāsurāntakṛt // HV_App.I,42.565 //
GE07hv_apppu:19914: tataś candrapratīkāśaṃ so 'gṛhṇāc chaṅkham uttamam / HV_App.I,42.566 /
GE07hv_apppu:19917: japyate yo 'maraiḥ sarvair guhyair nāmabhir avyayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.569 //
GE07hv_apppu:19918: sa ca sarvātmani śreṣṭhaḥ sadbhir yaḥ sevyate sadā / HV_App.I,42.570 /
GE07hv_apppu:19919: ijyate ca purāṇaiś ca triloke lokabhāvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42.571 //
GE07hv_apppu:19920: yo vaikuṇṭhaḥ surendrāṇām ananto bhoginām api / HV_App.I,42.572 /
GE07hv_apppu:19921: viṣṇur yo yogaviduṣāṃ yo yajño yajñakarmaṇi // HV_App.I,42.573 //
GE07hv_apppu:19922: makhe yasya prasādena bhuvanasthā divaukasaḥ / HV_App.I,42.574 /
GE07hv_apppu:19923: ājyaṃ maharṣibhir dattam aśnuvanti tridhā hutam // HV_App.I,42.575 //
GE07hv_apppu:19924: yo naidhano 'gnir daityānāṃ yaḥ surāṇāṃ parā gatiḥ / HV_App.I,42.576 /
GE07hv_apppu:19925: yaḥ pavitraṃ pavitrāṇāṃ svayaṃbhor api yo vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42.577 //
GE07hv_apppu:19926: yasya cakrapraviṣṭāni dānavānāṃ yuge yuge / HV_App.I,42.578 /
GE07hv_apppu:19927: kulāny ākulatāṃ yānti yāni dṛptāni vīryataḥ // HV_App.I,42.579 //
GE07hv_apppu:19928: tato daityadravakaraṃ paurāṇaṃ śaṅkham uttamam / HV_App.I,42.580 /
GE07hv_apppu:19929: dadhmau prāṇena balavān vikṣipan daityajīvitam // HV_App.I,42.581 //
GE07hv_apppu:19930: śrutvā śaṅkhasvanaṃ ghoram asurāṇāṃ bhayāvaham / HV_App.I,42.582 /
GE07hv_apppu:19931: kṣubhitā dānavāḥ sarve diśo daśa vilokayan // HV_App.I,42.583 //
GE07hv_apppu:19933: ko 'yam ity abravīd roṣān nārāyaṇam udaikṣata // HV_App.I,42.585 //
GE07hv_apppu:19934: varāharūpiṇaṃ devaṃ saṃsthitaṃ puruṣaṃ yathā / HV_App.I,42.586 /
GE07hv_apppu:19937: sūryācandramasor madhye yathā nīlaḥ payodharaḥ // HV_App.I,42.589 //
GE07hv_apppu:19941: na cacāla harir yuddhe 'kampamāna ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,42.593 //
GE07hv_apppu:19943: tataḥ kruddho hiraṇyākṣaḥ provāca harim uddhataḥ / **HV_App.I,42.593**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:19944: tiṣṭha tiṣṭha na me 'dya tvaṃ mokṣyase sahajīvitaḥ // **HV_App.I,42.593**29:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:19945: tataḥ prajvalitāṃ śaktiṃ varāhorasi dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42.594 /
GE07hv_apppu:19946: hiraṇyākṣo mahātejāḥ pātayām āsa vīryavān / HV_App.I,42.595 /
GE07hv_apppu:19947: tasyāḥ śaktyāḥ prahāreṇa brahmā vismayam āgataḥ // HV_App.I,42.596 //
GE07hv_apppu:19948: [k: B D4 Bombay Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:19951: tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu brahmā sādhv iti cābravīt / HV_App.I,42.597 /
GE07hv_apppu:19952: yaḥ prabhuḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ varāhas tena tāḍitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.598 //
GE07hv_apppu:19957: tataś ca bhagavān viṣṇur durvijñeyagatiḥ prabhuḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:19959: mahāvarāhaṃ daityendro muṣṭinā taṃ jaghāna ha // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:19960: tayor yuddhaṃ mahac cāsīd devadaityendrayos tadā / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:19961: tayoḥ śabdo mahān āsīd bāhvoḥ saṃkṣobhajas tadā // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:19962: kṣubdhā devās tadā sarve bhītās tatrāvatathire / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:19964: tasmin yuddhe mahāghore sanakādyās tato harim / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:19987: nirvighnāḥ santu lokāś ca dānavasya vadhād dhare // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:34 //
GE07hv_apppu:19988: ete devā namasyanti bhītās tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:35 /
GE07hv_apppu:19990: ity uktvā te munivarā vācam āyamya saṃsthitāḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:37 /
GE07hv_apppu:19991: devāś ca munayaś caiva saṃsthitā bhayaviklavāḥ // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:38 //
GE07hv_apppu:19994: evaṃ stuto jagannātho vavṛdhe viṣṇur avyayaḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:39 /
GE07hv_apppu:19995: dānavasya karaṃ gṛhya balād daṇḍam ivāyasam // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:40 //
GE07hv_apppu:20004: nanāda bhūyo 'pi tato balāt sa tam | **HV_App.I,42.598**31:49 |
GE07hv_apppu:20031: evaṃ bahūni yuddhāni kṛtvā tau devadānavau / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:76 /
GE07hv_apppu:20033: niśceṣṭaṃ ca jagat sarvaṃ prādur āsīt samantataḥ / **HV_App.I,42.598**31:78 /
GE07hv_apppu:20034: evaṃ saṃkrīḍya bahudhā daityaṃ hantuṃ mano dadhe // **HV_App.I,42.598**31:79 //
GE07hv_apppu:20037: tato bhagavatā cakram āvidhyād ity asaṃnibham / HV_App.I,42.599 /
GE07hv_apppu:20039: tataḥ sthitasyaiva śiras tasya bhūmau papāta ha / HV_App.I,42.601 /
GE07hv_apppu:20041: hiraṇyākṣe hate daitye ye śeṣās tatra dānavāḥ / HV_App.I,42.603 /
GE07hv_apppu:20042: sarve tasya bhayatrastā jagmur ārtā diśo daśa // HV_App.I,42.604 //
GE07hv_apppu:20049: vidrāvya tu raṇe sarvān asurān puruṣottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42.609 /
GE07hv_apppu:20050: mumoca tatra baddhāṃs tān puraṃdaramukhān surān // HV_App.I,42.610 //
GE07hv_apppu:20051: tataḥ prakṛtim āpannāḥ sarve devagaṇās tadā / HV_App.I,42.611 /
GE07hv_apppu:20058: tvatprasādena bhagavaṃs tava bāhubalena ca / HV_App.I,42.613 /
GE07hv_apppu:20059: [k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after the ref. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20060: natāḥ sma devadeveśa tvāṃ vayaṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ / **HV_App.I,42.613**33:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20061: natāḥ sma viṣṇuṃ sakalaṃ niṣkalaṃ bhūtabhāvanam // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20063: natāḥ sma bhūtabhavyeśam īḍyam ādiguruṃ harim // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:20064: natāḥ sma varuṇaṃ devam arcitaṃ bhuvaneśvaram / **HV_App.I,42.613**33:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:20067: namaḥ sarvātmane tubhyaṃ sarvakartre namo namaḥ // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:20069: namaḥ sraṣṭe namo hartre namaḥ kartre jagatpate / **HV_App.I,42.613**33:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:20070: namo goptre jagannātha namaḥ sthātre namo namaḥ // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:11 //
GE07hv_apppu:20071: yaṃ prāpya na nivartante yogino yatacetasaḥ / **HV_App.I,42.613**33:12 /
GE07hv_apppu:20072: tasmai tubhyaṃ pradhānātman sarvāya jagataḥ pate // **HV_App.I,42.613**33:13 //
GE07hv_apppu:20076: tvacchāsanād dhi bhagavan kiṃ kurvantv aditeḥ sutāḥ / HV_App.I,42.615 /
GE07hv_apppu:20077: icchāmaḥ pādaśuśrūṣāṃ tava kartuṃ sanātana // HV_App.I,42.616 //
GE07hv_apppu:20078: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ teṣāṃ puṇḍarīkanibhekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42.617 /
GE07hv_apppu:20079: uvāca vacanaṃ devān mudā yukto hatadviṣaḥ // HV_App.I,42.618 //
GE07hv_apppu:20080: yo 'yaṃ sa bhavatāṃ loko mayaiva vihitaḥ purā / HV_App.I,42.619 /
GE07hv_apppu:20081: pālyatāṃ sa tu yatnena prādhānyena kvacit kvacit // HV_App.I,42.620 //
GE07hv_apppu:20083: mayaiva pūrvaṃ nirdiṣṭo niyogaḥ paripālyatām // HV_App.I,42.622 //
GE07hv_apppu:20084: śakraṃ provāca bhagavān vacanaṃ duṃdubhisvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42.623 /
GE07hv_apppu:20085: idaṃ yathāvat kartavyaṃ satsu cāsatsu ca tvayā // HV_App.I,42.624 //
GE07hv_apppu:20086: gacchantu tapasā svargaṃ munayaḥ saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,42.625 /
GE07hv_apppu:20089: yāyajūkāś ca ye kecid brāhmaṇāḥ kṣatriyā viśaḥ / **HV_App.I,42.625**34:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20091: yajñair iṣṭvā yāyajūkāḥ phalaṃ te prāpnuvantu ca // HV_App.I,42.626 //
GE07hv_apppu:20094: satyaśūrā dānaśūrā raṇaśūrāś ca ye narāḥ / HV_App.I,42.629 /
GE07hv_apppu:20095: te svargaphalam aśnantu sadā ye cānasūyakāḥ // HV_App.I,42.630 //
GE07hv_apppu:20097: abrahmaṇyā nāstikāś ca narakaṃ yāntu mānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42.632 //
GE07hv_apppu:20099: yogino māṃ tu ye devaṃ bhajante yogatatparāḥ / **HV_App.I,42.632**35:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20101: sadā māṃ dhyāhi deveśa śreyas tava bhaviṣyati / **HV_App.I,42.632**35:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20102: matparo bhava deveśa māṃ namaskuru yatnataḥ / **HV_App.I,42.632**35:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:20103: idam eva paraṃ śreyo nātra kāryā vicāraṇā // **HV_App.I,42.632**35:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:20104: etāvat kriyatāṃ vākyaṃ mayoktaṃ tridaśeśvarāḥ / HV_App.I,42.633 /
GE07hv_apppu:20105: tato mayi sthite sarvān bādhiṣyante na cārayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.634 //
GE07hv_apppu:20107: devatānāṃ ca sarveṣām abhavad vismayo mahān // HV_App.I,42.636 //
GE07hv_apppu:20108: etad atyadbhutaṃ dṛṣṭvā varāhacaritaṃ surāḥ / HV_App.I,42.637 /
GE07hv_apppu:20109: namaskṛtvā varāhāya nākapṛṣṭham ito gatāḥ // HV_App.I,42.638 //
GE07hv_apppu:20110: tataḥ svāny ādhipatyāni pratipannāni daivataiḥ / HV_App.I,42.639 /
GE07hv_apppu:20111: sarvalokādhipatye ca pratiṣṭhāṃ vāsavo gataḥ / HV_App.I,42.640 /
GE07hv_apppu:20112: vimuktā dānavagaṇaiḥ prakṛtiṃ dharaṇī gatā // HV_App.I,42.641 //
GE07hv_apppu:20113: sthairyahetor dharaṇyās tu jñātvā cāgaskṛtān girīn / HV_App.I,42.642 /
GE07hv_apppu:20114: sveṣu sthāneṣu saṃsthāpya parvatānāṃ puraṃdaraḥ / HV_App.I,42.643 /
GE07hv_apppu:20115: ciccheda bhagavān pakṣān vajreṇa śataparvaṇā // HV_App.I,42.644 //
GE07hv_apppu:20116: sarveṣām eva pakṣā vai chinnāḥ śakreṇa dhīmatā / HV_App.I,42.645 /
GE07hv_apppu:20117: ekaḥ sapakṣo mainākaḥ surais tatsamayaḥ kṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42.646 //
GE07hv_apppu:20119: vārāha iti viprendraiḥ purāṇe parikīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,42.648 //
GE07hv_apppu:20121: nāśūcerna kṛtaghnāya nṛśaṃsāya na kīrtayet // HV_App.I,42.650 //
GE07hv_apppu:20122: [k: Ñ2 Bombay Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20123: na kṣudrāya na nīcāya na gurudveṣakāriṇe / **HV_App.I,42.650**36:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20124: nāśiṣyāya tathā rājan na kṛtaghnāya caiva hi // **HV_App.I,42.650**36:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20125: āyuṣkāmair yaśaskāmair mahīkāmaiś ca mānavaiḥ / HV_App.I,42.651 /
GE07hv_apppu:20126: jayaiṣibhiś ca śrotavyo devānām eṣa vai jayaḥ // HV_App.I,42.652 //
GE07hv_apppu:20127: purāṇo vedasaṃbaddhaḥ śivaḥ svastyayano mahān / HV_App.I,42.653 /
GE07hv_apppu:20129: eṣa kauravya tattvena kathitas te 'nupūrvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42.655 /
GE07hv_apppu:20131: ye yajanti makhaiḥ puṇyair daivatāni pitṝn api / HV_App.I,42.657 /
GE07hv_apppu:20132: ātmānam ātmanā nityaṃ viṣṇum eva yajanti te // HV_App.I,42.658 //
GE07hv_apppu:20143: [k: K Ñ1.2 V1.3 B D T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 cont. after Appendix I, No. 42 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20145: vārāha eṣa kathito nārasiṃham ataḥ śṛṇu / HV_App.I,42A.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20146: [k: Before the ref., D6 T1 G3-5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20148: vārāha eṣa kathito nārasiṃham ataḥ param / **HV_App.I,42A.0**1:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20150: yatra bhūtvā mṛgendreṇa hiraṇyakaśipur hataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20151: purā kṛtayuge rājan hiraṇyakaśipuḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42A.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20153: daśavarṣasahasrāṇi śatāni daśa pañca ca / HV_App.I,42A.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:20155: tataḥ śamadamābhyāṃ ca brahmacaryeṇa caiva ha / HV_App.I,42A.7 /
GE07hv_apppu:20156: brahmā prīto 'bhavat tasya tapasā niyamena ca // HV_App.I,42A.8 //
GE07hv_apppu:20157: tataḥ svayaṃbhūr bhagavān svayam āgatya tatra ha / HV_App.I,42A.9 /
GE07hv_apppu:20159: ādityair vasubhiḥ sādhyair marudbhir daivataiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42A.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:20161: digbhiś cāpi vidigbhiś ca nadībhiḥ sāgarais tathā / HV_App.I,42A.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:20162: nakṣatraiś ca muhūrtaiś ca khecaraiś ca mahāgrahaiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:20163: devair brahmarṣibhiḥ sārdhaṃ siddhaiḥ saptarṣibhis tathā / HV_App.I,42A.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:20165: carācaraguruḥ śrīmān vṛto devagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42A.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:20166: brahmā brahmavidāṃ śreṣṭho daityaṃ vacanam abravīt // HV_App.I,42A.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:20167: prīto 'smi tava bhaktasya tapasānena suvrata / HV_App.I,42A.19 /
GE07hv_apppu:20168: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi // HV_App.I,42A.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:20169: [k: Ñ2 V1 B Dn Ds D6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20174: na mānuṣāḥ piśācāś ca nihanyur māṃ kathaṃcana // HV_App.I,42A.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:20175: ṛṣayo naiva māṃ kruddhāḥ sarvalokapitāmaha / HV_App.I,42A.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:20176: śapeyus tapasā yuktā vara eṣa vṛto mayā // HV_App.I,42A.24 //
GE07hv_apppu:20177: na śastreṇa na cāstreṇa giriṇā pādapena vā / HV_App.I,42A.25 /
GE07hv_apppu:20178: na śuṣkeṇa na cārdreṇa na cānyenāpi me vadhaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.26 //
GE07hv_apppu:20180: nākāśe vā na bhūmau vā rātrau vā divase 'pi vā / **HV_App.I,42A.26**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20181: nāntardhāne bahir vāpi syād vadho me pitāmaha / **HV_App.I,42A.26**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20182: paśubhir vā mṛgair na syāt pakṣibhir vā sarīsṛpaiḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.26**3:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20183: [k: T1 G3.5 cont., G4 ins. after line 30, M2.4 after line 26 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20184: na kenacid bhaved brahman mṛtyur me lokabhāvana / **HV_App.I,42A.26**4:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20185: na svarge 'py atha pātāle nākāśe nāvanisthale / HV_App.I,42A.27 /
GE07hv_apppu:20186: na cābhyantararātryahnor na cāpyanyena me vadhaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:20188: yo māṃ nāśayituṃ śaktaḥ sa me mṛtyur bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42A.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:20189: bhaveyam aham evārkaḥ somo vāyur hutāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:20190: salilaṃ cāntarikṣaṃ ca nakṣatrāṇi diśo daśa // HV_App.I,42A.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:20191: ahaṃ krodhaś ca kāmaś ca varuṇo vāsavo yamaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:20192: dhanadaś ca dhanādhyakṣo yakṣaḥ kiṃpuruṣādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:20193: mūrtimanti ca divyāni mamāstrāṇi mahāhave / HV_App.I,42A.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:20196: dadāsi ced varān etān devadeva vṛṇomy aham / **HV_App.I,42A.36**5:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20198: ete divyā varās tāta mayā dattās tavādbhutāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.37 /
GE07hv_apppu:20199: sarvakāmapradā vatsa prāpsyase tān na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.38 //
GE07hv_apppu:20201: evam uktvā sa bhagavāñ jagāmākāśam eva ca / HV_App.I,42A.39 /
GE07hv_apppu:20203: tato devāś ca nāgāś ca gandharvā ṛṣibhiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42A.41 /
GE07hv_apppu:20206: vareṇānena bhagavan vadhiṣyati sa no 'suraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.43 /
GE07hv_apppu:20207: tat prasīdasva bhagavan vadho 'py asya vicityatām // HV_App.I,42A.44 //
GE07hv_apppu:20209: bhagavān sarvabhūtānām ādikartā svayaṃ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42A.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:20210: sraṣṭā ca havyakavyānām avyaktaḥ prakṛtir dhruvaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:20211: sarvalokahitaṃ vākyaṃ śrutvā devaḥ prajāpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:20212: āśvāsayām āsa surān suśītair vacanāmbubhiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:20213: avaśyaṃ tridasās tena prāptavyaṃ tapasaḥ phalam / HV_App.I,42A.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:20214: tapaso 'nte 'sya bhagavān vadhaṃ viṣṇuḥ kariṣyati // HV_App.I,42A.50 //
GE07hv_apppu:20215: etac chrutvā surāḥ sarve vākyaṃ paṅkajajanmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:20216: svāni sthānāni divyāni pratijagmur mudānvitāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.52 //
GE07hv_apppu:20217: labdhamātre vare tasmin sarvāḥ so 'bādhata prajāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.53 /
GE07hv_apppu:20219: āśrameṣu munīn sarvān brāhmaṇān saṃśitavratān / HV_App.I,42A.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:20220: satyadharmaratān dāntān dharṣayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,42A.56 //
GE07hv_apppu:20221: [k: T2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins., T1 after line 55 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20223: indraṃ ca pothayām āsa babādhe sa tu saṃyuge // **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20224: sa tu svargaṃ parityajya gataḥ śakraḥ śacīpatiḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:20228: narakasthān samānīya svargasthāṃs tāṃś cakāra ha / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:20230: vāruṇāṃś ca tathā pāśāṃś chitvā dānavapuṃgavaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:20232: saumyāṃ diśam atho gatvā kuberam atha saṃyuge / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:11 /
GE07hv_apppu:20233: gṛhītvā sabalaṃ taṃ tu padmaśaṅkhau samādade / **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:12 /
GE07hv_apppu:20234: alakāyāṃ tathā daityān sthāpayām āsa dānavaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.56**6:13 //
GE07hv_apppu:20235: devāṃs tribhuvanasthāṃś ca parājitya mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:20236: trailokyaṃ vaśam ānīya svarge vasati dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.58 //
GE07hv_apppu:20238: yajñiyān akarod daityān devāṃś caivāpy ayajñiyān // HV_App.I,42A.60 //
GE07hv_apppu:20242: athādityāś ca sādhyāś ca viśve ca vasavas tathā / HV_App.I,42A.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:20245: jitās tena mahārāja daityena ca mahaujasā / **HV_App.I,42A.62**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20246: śaraṇyaṃ śaraṇaṃ viṣṇum upatasthur mahābalam / HV_App.I,42A.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:20247: devaṃ devamayaṃ yajñaṃ brahmadevaṃ sanātanam // HV_App.I,42A.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:20248: bhūtaṃ bhavyaṃ bhaviṣyaṃ ca prajālokanamaskṛtam / HV_App.I,42A.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:20249: nārāyaṇaṃ mahādevaṃ devās tvāṃ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:20250: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo dhātā tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo guruḥ / HV_App.I,42A.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:20251: tvaṃ hi naḥ paramo devo brahmādīnāṃ surottama // HV_App.I,42A.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:20253: kṣayāya ditivaṃśasya śaraṇaṃ bhava naḥ prabho // HV_App.I,42A.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:20254: [k: K4 Ñ2 V1.3 B1.3 Dn Ds D1-3 ins.,
GE07hv_apppu:20256: Ñ1 Ds2 D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 after line 66:k]
GE07hv_apppu:20259: bhayaṃ tyajadhvam amarā abhayaṃ vo dadāmy aham / HV_App.I,42A.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:20260: tathaiva tridivaṃ devāḥ pratipatsyatha māciram // HV_App.I,42A.72 //
GE07hv_apppu:20261: eṣo 'haṃ sagaṇaṃ daityaṃ varadānena darpitam / HV_App.I,42A.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:20262: avadhyam amarendrāṇāṃ dānavendraṃ nihanmy aham // HV_App.I,42A.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:20264: evam uktvā tu bhagavān visṛjya tridivaukasaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:20265: vadhaṃ saṃkalpayitvā tu hiraṇyakaśipoḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42A.76 /
GE07hv_apppu:20266: [k: K3 B1.2 Dn Ds D3.5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20268: kiṃ nu rūpaṃ samāsthāya nihanmy enaṃ mahāsuram / **HV_App.I,42A.76**10:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20269: yat siddhikaram āśu syād vadhāya vibudhadviṣaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.76**10:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:20270: anutpannaṃ tataś cakre so 'tyantaṃ rūpam īśvaraḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.76**10:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:20272: sahāyaṃ tu mahābāhur jagrāhoṃkāram eva ca // HV_App.I,42A.77 //
GE07hv_apppu:20274: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sthānaṃ jagāma prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.79 //
GE07hv_apppu:20275: tejasā bhāskara iva kāntyā candra ivāparaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:20277: nārasiṃhena vapuṣā pāṇiṃ saṃspṛśya pāṇinā // HV_App.I,42A.82 //
GE07hv_apppu:20278: tato 'paśyat suvistīrṇāṃ divyāṃ ramyāṃ manoramām / HV_App.I,42A.83 /
GE07hv_apppu:20280: vistīrṇāṃ yojanaśataṃ śatam adhyardham āyatām / HV_App.I,42A.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:20285: śubhrāsanavatīṃ ramyāṃ jvalantīm iva tejasā // HV_App.I,42A.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:20292: bhāsvarā divyagandhā ca raśmimaty api cātulā / **HV_App.I,42A.93**12:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20293: śayyāsanavatī ramyā jvalantīva ca tejasā // HV_App.I,42A.94 //
GE07hv_apppu:20294: prabhāvatī bhāsurā ca divyagandhā manoramā / HV_App.I,42A.95 /
GE07hv_apppu:20295: nāsukhā na ca duhkhā sā na śītā na ca gharmadā // HV_App.I,42A.96 //
GE07hv_apppu:20296: na kṣutpipāse glāniṃ vā prāpya tāṃ prāpnuvanti ha / HV_App.I,42A.97 /
GE07hv_apppu:20298: stambhair maṇimayair divyaiḥ śāśvatī cākṣayā ca yā / HV_App.I,42A.99 /
GE07hv_apppu:20299: ati candraṃ ca sūryaṃ ca pāvakaṃ ca svayaṃprabhā / HV_App.I,42A.100 /
GE07hv_apppu:20301: sarve ca kāmāḥ pracurā ye divyā ye ca mānuṣāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.102 /
GE07hv_apppu:20302: rasavantaḥ prabhūtāś ca bhakṣyaṃ bhojyaṃ tathākṣayam // HV_App.I,42A.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:20304: uṣṇe śītāni toyāni śīte coṣṇāni santi vai / HV_App.I,42A.105 /
GE07hv_apppu:20306: latāvitānasaṃchannāḥ saraḥsu ca saritsu ca / HV_App.I,42A.107 /
GE07hv_apppu:20307: manoharāṃś ca vividhān dadarśa sa tadā prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42A.108 //
GE07hv_apppu:20308: drumān bahuvidhāṃs tatra mṛgendro dadṛśe prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42A.109 /
GE07hv_apppu:20309: gandhavanti ca puṣpāṇi rasavanti phalāni ca // HV_App.I,42A.110 //
GE07hv_apppu:20310: tāni śītāni toyāni tatra tatra sarāṃsi ca / HV_App.I,42A.111 /
GE07hv_apppu:20311: apaśyat sarvatīrthāni sabhāyāṃ tasya vai prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42A.112 //
GE07hv_apppu:20312: nalinaiḥ puṇḍarīkaiś ca śatapatraiḥ sugandhibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.113 /
GE07hv_apppu:20313: raktaiḥ kuvalayair nīlaiḥ kumudaiḥ saṃtatāni ca // HV_App.I,42A.114 //
GE07hv_apppu:20314: sakāntair dhārtarāṣṭraiś ca rājahaṃsaiḥ saraḥpriyaiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.115 /
GE07hv_apppu:20315: kādambaiś cakravākaiś ca sārasaiḥ kurarair api // HV_App.I,42A.116 //
GE07hv_apppu:20321: cūtā nīpā nāgapuṣpāḥ kadambā bakulā dhavāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.122 //
GE07hv_apppu:20323: sālās tālāḥ priyālāś ca campakāś ca manoharāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.124 //
GE07hv_apppu:20324: tathaivānye vyarājanta sabhāyāṃ puṣpitā drumāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.125 /
GE07hv_apppu:20328: varaṇā vatsanābhāś ca asanāḥ syandanaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42A.129 /
GE07hv_apppu:20329: nīlāḥ sumanasaś caiva pītāḥ sāśvatthatindukāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.130 //
GE07hv_apppu:20330: [k: T1.2 G1.4 M2 ins., G3.5 after line 134b, M4 after line 130a:k]
GE07hv_apppu:20331: nimbāś ca barbarāś caiva vṛkṣāḥ sāśvatthatindukāḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.130**13:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20334: āmrātakās tathā jambūr lakucāś cailavālukāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.132 //
GE07hv_apppu:20335: sarjarasāḥ kundaravāḥ pataṅgāḥ kuṭajās tathā / HV_App.I,42A.133 /
GE07hv_apppu:20336: raktāḥ kurabakāś caiva nīpāś cāgurubhiḥ saha // HV_App.I,42A.134 //
GE07hv_apppu:20337: kadambāś caiva bhavyāś ca dāḍimā bījapūrakāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.135 /
GE07hv_apppu:20338: kālīyakā dukūlāś ca hiṅgavas tailaparṇikāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.136 //
GE07hv_apppu:20339: kharjūrā nārikelāś ca dharmavṛkṣā harītakī / HV_App.I,42A.137 /
GE07hv_apppu:20340: madhukāḥ saptaparṇāś ca bilvāḥ pārāvatās tathā // HV_App.I,42A.138 //
GE07hv_apppu:20341: panasāś ca tamālāś ca nānāgulmalatāvṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.139 /
GE07hv_apppu:20343: ete cānye ca bahavas tatra kānanajā drumāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.141 /
GE07hv_apppu:20346: puṣpitān puṣpitāgrāṃś ca saṃpatanti mahādrumān // HV_App.I,42A.144 //
GE07hv_apppu:20351: tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ daityendro hiraṇyakaśipus tadā / HV_App.I,42A.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:20352: āsīna āsane citre nalvamātre pramāṇataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:20355: tasya daityapater mandaṃ virajaskaḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:20356: divyagandhavahas tatra mārutaḥ susukho vavau // HV_App.I,42A.152 //
GE07hv_apppu:20357: tatra devāḥ sagandharvā gaṇair apsarasāṃ vṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.153 /
GE07hv_apppu:20358: divyatālena divyāni jagur gītāni gāyanāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.154 //
GE07hv_apppu:20359: viśvācī sahajanyā ca pramlocety abhiviśrutāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.155 /
GE07hv_apppu:20360: divyā ca saurabheyī ca samīcī puñjikasthalā // HV_App.I,42A.156 //
GE07hv_apppu:20361: miśrakeśī ca rambhā ca citrasenā śucismitā / HV_App.I,42A.157 /
GE07hv_apppu:20362: cārunetrā ghṛtācī ca menakā corvaśī tathā // HV_App.I,42A.158 //
GE07hv_apppu:20365: [k: T1.2 G1.3.5 M2.4 subst. for line 160, G4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20370: upāsanta diteḥ putrāḥ sarve labdhavarāḥ purā // HV_App.I,42A.164 //
GE07hv_apppu:20371: balir virocanas tatra narakaḥ pṛthivījayaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:20372: prahlādo vipracittiś ca gaviṣṭhaś ca mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.166 //
GE07hv_apppu:20374: ghaṭodaro mahāpārśvaḥ krathanaḥ piṭharas tathā // HV_App.I,42A.168 //
GE07hv_apppu:20375: viśvarūpaḥ surūpaś ca virūpaś ca mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.169 /
GE07hv_apppu:20376: daśagrīvaś ca vālī ca meghavāsā mahāravaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.170 //
GE07hv_apppu:20377: ghaṭābho vikaṭābhaś ca saṃhrādaś cendratāpanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:20379: sragviṇo vāgminaḥ sarve sarve sucaritavratāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.173 /
GE07hv_apppu:20380: sarve labdhavarāḥ śūrāḥ sarve vigatamṛtyavaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.174 //
GE07hv_apppu:20381: ete cānye ca bahavo hiraṇyakaśipuṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42A.175 /
GE07hv_apppu:20383: vimānair vividhair agryair bhrājamānair ivārcibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.177 /
GE07hv_apppu:20384: sragviṇo bhūṣitāḥ sarve yānti cāyānti cāpare // HV_App.I,42A.178 //
GE07hv_apppu:20389: bhūṣitāṅgā diteḥ putrās tam upāsanta sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.180 //
GE07hv_apppu:20390: tasyāṃ sabhāyāṃ divyāyām asurāḥ parvatopamāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.181 /
GE07hv_apppu:20402: tato dṛṣṭvā mahābāhuṃ kālacakram ivāgatam / HV_App.I,42A.191 /
GE07hv_apppu:20405: rūpaudāryaṃ babhau tatra samastaṃ śaśisaṃnibham // HV_App.I,42A.194 //
GE07hv_apppu:20406: aho rūpam idaṃ citraṃ śaṅkhakundendusaṃnibham / HV_App.I,42A.195 /
GE07hv_apppu:20407: abruvan dānavāḥ sarve hiraṇyakaśipuś ca saḥ // HV_App.I,42A.196 //
GE07hv_apppu:20408: evaṃ hi bruvatāṃ teṣāṃ nirdagdhānāṃ mahātmanām / HV_App.I,42A.197 /
GE07hv_apppu:20410: hiraṇyakaśipoḥ putraḥ prahrādo nāma vīryavān / HV_App.I,42A.199 /
GE07hv_apppu:20413: divyena cakṣuṣā siṃham apaśyad devam āgatam // HV_App.I,42A.200 //
GE07hv_apppu:20414: taṃ dṛṣṭvā rukmaśailābham apūrvāṃ tanum āsthitam / HV_App.I,42A.201 /
GE07hv_apppu:20415: vismitā dānavāḥ sarve hiraṇyakaśipuś ca saḥ // HV_App.I,42A.202 //
GE07hv_apppu:20418: na śrutaṃ naiva no dṛṣṭaṃ nārasiṃham idaṃ vapuḥ // HV_App.I,42A.204 //
GE07hv_apppu:20419: avyaktaprabhavaṃ divyaṃ kim idaṃ rūpam adbhutam / HV_App.I,42A.205 /
GE07hv_apppu:20420: daityāntakaraṇaṃ ghoraṃ śaṃsatīva manāṃsi naḥ // HV_App.I,42A.206 //
GE07hv_apppu:20421: asya devāḥ śarīrasthāḥ sāgarāḥ saritas tathā / HV_App.I,42A.207 /
GE07hv_apppu:20422: himavān pāriyātraś ca ye cānye kulaparvatāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.208 //
GE07hv_apppu:20423: candramāḥ saha nakṣatrair ādityāś cāgninā saha / HV_App.I,42A.209 /
GE07hv_apppu:20424: dhanado varuṇaś caiva yamaḥ śakraḥ śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.210 //
GE07hv_apppu:20425: maruto devagandharvā ṛṣayaś ca tapodhanāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.211 /
GE07hv_apppu:20426: nāgā yakṣāḥ piśācāś ca rākṣasā bhīmavikramāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.212 //
GE07hv_apppu:20427: brahmā devaḥ paśupatir lalāṭasthā vibhānti vai / HV_App.I,42A.213 /
GE07hv_apppu:20428: sthāvarāṇi ca bhūtāni jaṅgamāni tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42A.214 //
GE07hv_apppu:20429: bhavāṃś ca sahito 'smābhiḥ sarvadaityagaṇair vṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.215 /
GE07hv_apppu:20431: sarvaṃ tribhuvanaṃ rājaṃl lokadharmaś ca śāśvataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.217 /
GE07hv_apppu:20432: dṛśyate nārasiṃhe 'smin yathendau vimale jagat // HV_App.I,42A.218 //
GE07hv_apppu:20434: grahāś ca yāgāś ca mahī nabhaś ca | HV_App.I,42A.220 |
GE07hv_apppu:20435: utpātakālaś ca dhṛtiḥ smṛtiś ca @ HV_App.I,42A.221 @
GE07hv_apppu:20436: rajaś ca sattvaṃ ca tamo damaś ca || HV_App.I,42A.222 ||
GE07hv_apppu:20438: viśve ca devā vasavaś ca sarve | HV_App.I,42A.224 |
GE07hv_apppu:20439: krodhaś ca kāmaś ca tathaiva harṣo @ HV_App.I,42A.225 @
GE07hv_apppu:20440: darpaś ca mohaḥ pitaraś ca sarve || HV_App.I,42A.226 ||
GE07hv_apppu:20442: ity evam uktvā sa ca daityarājaṃ @ **HV_App.I,42A.226**17:1 @
GE07hv_apppu:20447: pāhi tīvraṃ mahārāja kālarūpo hi dṛśyate / **HV_App.I,42A.226**18:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20448: evaṃ bruvati vai putre roṣākrāntabhayas tadā // **HV_App.I,42A.226**18:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20449: [k: D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M4 ins. after line 226:k]
GE07hv_apppu:20450: yaḥ prāṇaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaḥ kratuḥ svayam eva ha / **HV_App.I,42A.266**19:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20455: yogidhyeyaḥ sadā dāntaḥ pūjyo hi satataṃ prabho // **HV_App.I,42A.266**19:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:20457: namaskuruṣva yatnena bhūyo bhūyaḥ pitaḥ kuru // **HV_App.I,42A.266**19:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:20460: prahrādasya tataḥ śrūtvā hiraṇyakaśipur vacaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.227 /
GE07hv_apppu:20462: dhvaṃseti ca tadā putraṃ roṣād āha nṛpottama / **HV_App.I,42A.227**20:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20463: ko 'yaṃ viṣṇus tvayā jñeyaḥ ko 'yaṃ devaḥ sanātanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.227**20:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20464: ayaṃ kila sadā viṣṇur mokṣibhir dhyeya ity uta // **HV_App.I,42A.227**20:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:20465: ity abaddhaṃ tadā daityaḥ kruddho dṛṣṭvā janārdanam / **HV_App.I,42A.227**20:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:20466: uvāca dānavān sarvān sagaṇāṃś ca gaṇādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.228 //
GE07hv_apppu:20467: mṛgendro gṛhyatāṃ śīghram apūrvāṃ tanum āsthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.229 /
GE07hv_apppu:20468: yadi vā saṃśayaḥ kaścid vadhyatāṃ vanagocaraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.230 //
GE07hv_apppu:20471: śrutvā tu vacanaṃ tasya hiraṇyakaśipos tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.230**21:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20472: tac chrutvā dānavāḥ sarve mṛgendraṃ bhīmavikramam / HV_App.I,42A.231 /
GE07hv_apppu:20473: parikṣipanto muditās trāsayām āsur ojasā // HV_App.I,42A.232 //
GE07hv_apppu:20475: daśa pañca tathā koṭir dānavātha mahābalāḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.232**22:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20479: huṃkāreṇa tadā sarvān dānavāṃs trāsayan hariḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.233**23:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20480: babhañja tāṃ sabhāṃ divyāṃ vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.234 //
GE07hv_apppu:20485: sarvāstrāṇām atha śreṣṭhaṃ daṇḍam astraṃ subhairavam / HV_App.I,42A.237 /
GE07hv_apppu:20487: dharmacakraṃ mahācakram ajitaṃ nāma nāmataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.239 /
GE07hv_apppu:20488: cakram aindraṃ tathā ghoram ṛṣicakraṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42A.240 //
GE07hv_apppu:20489: paitāmahaṃ tathā cakraṃ trailokyam ahitasvaram / HV_App.I,42A.241 /
GE07hv_apppu:20490: vicitrām aśanīṃ caiva śuṣkārdraṃ cāśanidvayam // HV_App.I,42A.242 //
GE07hv_apppu:20491: raudraṃ tad ugraṃ śūlaṃ ca kaṅkālaṃ musalaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,42A.243 /
GE07hv_apppu:20492: astraṃ brahmaśiraś caiva brāhmam astraṃ tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42A.244 //
GE07hv_apppu:20493: aiṣīkam astram aindraṃ ca āgneyaṃ śaiśiraṃ tathā / HV_App.I,42A.245 /
GE07hv_apppu:20494: vāyavyaṃ mathanaṃ nāma kāpālam atha kiṃkaram // HV_App.I,42A.246 //
GE07hv_apppu:20495: tathā cāpratimāṃ śaktiṃ krauñcam astraṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42A.247 /
GE07hv_apppu:20496: astraṃ hayaśiraś caiva somāstraṃ śiśiraprabham // HV_App.I,42A.248 //
GE07hv_apppu:20497: paiśācam astram amitaṃ sārpam astraṃ tathādbhutam / HV_App.I,42A.249 /
GE07hv_apppu:20499: darpaṇaṃ pātanaṃ caiva tvāṣṭraṃ caiva sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,42A.251 /
GE07hv_apppu:20500: kālamudgaram akṣobhyaṃ kṣobhaṇaṃ ca mahābalam // HV_App.I,42A.252 //
GE07hv_apppu:20501: saṃvartaṃ mohanaṃ caiva tathā māyādharaṃ param / HV_App.I,42A.253 /
GE07hv_apppu:20502: gāndharvam astraṃ dayitam asiratnaṃ ca nandakam // HV_App.I,42A.254 //
GE07hv_apppu:20503: prasvāpanaṃ pramathanaṃ vāruṇaṃ cāstram uttamam / HV_App.I,42A.255 /
GE07hv_apppu:20504: astraṃ pāśupataṃ caiva yasyāpratihatā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.256 //
GE07hv_apppu:20505: etāny astrāṇi sarvāṇi hiraṇyakaśipus tadā / HV_App.I,42A.257 /
GE07hv_apppu:20507: astraiḥ prajvalitaiḥ siṃham āvṛṇod asurādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.259 /
GE07hv_apppu:20509: sa hi varṣāniloddhūto daityānāṃ sainyasāgaraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.261 /
GE07hv_apppu:20510: kṣaṇenāplāvayat siṃhaṃ mainākam iva sāgaraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.262 //
GE07hv_apppu:20511: prāsaiḥ pāśaiś ca śūlaiś ca gadābhir musalais tathā / HV_App.I,42A.263 /
GE07hv_apppu:20512: vajrair aśanikalpaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahādrumaiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.264 //
GE07hv_apppu:20514: śataghnībhiś ca dīptābhir daṇḍair api sudāruṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.266 //
GE07hv_apppu:20516: parivārya samantāt tu nihanyus te hariṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.266**25:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20517: svalpam apy asya na kṣuṇṇaṃ ūrjitasya mahātmanaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.266**25:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:20553: pañcāsyā lelihānāś ca kākagṛdhramukhās tathā // HV_App.I,42A.300 //
GE07hv_apppu:20557: avadhyasya mṛgendrasya na vyathāṃ cakrur āhave // HV_App.I,42A.304 //
GE07hv_apppu:20558: evaṃ bhūyo 'parān ghorān asṛjan dānavāḥ śarān / HV_App.I,42A.305 /
GE07hv_apppu:20560: te dānavaśarā ghorā mṛgendrāya samīritāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.307 /
GE07hv_apppu:20561: vilayaṃ jagmur ākāśe khadyotā iva parvate // HV_App.I,42A.308 //
GE07hv_apppu:20562: tataś cakrāṇi divyāni daityāḥ krodhasamanvitāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.309 /
GE07hv_apppu:20563: mṛgendrāya kṣipanty āśu prajvalantīva sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.310 //
GE07hv_apppu:20564: tair āsīd gaganaṃ cakraiḥ saṃpatadbhiḥ samāvṛtam / HV_App.I,42A.311 /
GE07hv_apppu:20569: tāni cakrāṇi vadanaṃ praviśanti vibhānti vai / HV_App.I,42A.313 /
GE07hv_apppu:20571: tāni cakrāṇi sarvāṇi mṛgendreṇa mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42A.315 /
GE07hv_apppu:20573: hiraṇyakaśipur daityo bhūyaḥ prāsṛjad ūrjitām / HV_App.I,42A.317 /
GE07hv_apppu:20575: tām āpatantīṃ saṃprekṣya mṛgendraḥ śaktim uttamām / HV_App.I,42A.319 /
GE07hv_apppu:20576: huṃkāreṇaiva raudreṇa babhañja bhagavāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,42A.320 //
GE07hv_apppu:20577: rarāja bhagnā sā śaktir mṛgendreṇa mahīṃ tale / HV_App.I,42A.321 /
GE07hv_apppu:20579: nārācapaṅktiḥ siṃhasya sṛṣṭā reje vidūrataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.323 /
GE07hv_apppu:20581: garjitvā tu yathākāmaṃ vikramya ca yathāsukham / HV_App.I,42A.325 /
GE07hv_apppu:20582: tat sainyam utsāritavāṃs tṛṇāgrāṇīva mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.326 //
GE07hv_apppu:20585: tad aśmavarṣaṃ siṃhasya gātre nipatitaṃ mahat / HV_App.I,42A.329 /
GE07hv_apppu:20586: diśo daśa prakīrṇaṃ hi khadyotaprakaro yathā // HV_App.I,42A.330 //
GE07hv_apppu:20587: tamaśmaughair ditisutās tadā siṃham ariṃdamam / HV_App.I,42A.331 /
GE07hv_apppu:20588: prācchādayan yathā meghā dhārābhir iva parvatam // HV_App.I,42A.332 //
GE07hv_apppu:20589: na ca taṃ cālayām āsur daityaughā devam āsthitam / HV_App.I,42A.333 /
GE07hv_apppu:20590: bhīmavegā balaśreṣṭhaṃ samudra iva mandaram // HV_App.I,42A.334 //
GE07hv_apppu:20592: dhārābhir akṣamātrābhiḥ prādur āsīt samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.336 //
GE07hv_apppu:20593: nabhasaḥ pracyutā dhārās tigmavegāḥ sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.337 /
GE07hv_apppu:20594: āvṛṇvan sarvato vyoma diśaś copadiśas tathā // HV_App.I,42A.338 //
GE07hv_apppu:20595: dhārāṇāṃ saṃnipātena vāyor visphūrjitena ca / HV_App.I,42A.339 /
GE07hv_apppu:20596: vardhatā caiva varṣeṇa na prājñāyata kiṃcana // HV_App.I,42A.340 //
GE07hv_apppu:20597: dhārā divi ca saṃsaktā vasudhāyāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.341 /
GE07hv_apppu:20598: na spṛśanti sma taṃ tatra nipatantyo 'niśaṃ bhuvi // HV_App.I,42A.342 //
GE07hv_apppu:20599: bāhyato vavṛśe varṣaṃ nopariṣṭāt tu vṛṣṭavān / HV_App.I,42A.343 /
GE07hv_apppu:20601: hate 'śmavarṣe tumule jalavarṣe ca śoṣite / HV_App.I,42A.345 /
GE07hv_apppu:20602: sasṛjur dānavā māyām agniṃ vāyuṃ ca sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.346 //
GE07hv_apppu:20603: nabhasaḥ pracyutaś caiva tigmavegaḥ samantataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.347 /
GE07hv_apppu:20605: sa sṛṣṭaḥ pāvakas tena daityendreṇa mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42A.349 /
GE07hv_apppu:20606: na śaśāka mahātejā dagdhum apratimaujasam // HV_App.I,42A.350 //
GE07hv_apppu:20607: tam indras toyadaiḥ sārdhaṃ sahasrākṣo 'mitadyutiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.351 /
GE07hv_apppu:20608: mahatā toyavarṣeṇa śamayām āsa pāvakam // HV_App.I,42A.352 //
GE07hv_apppu:20609: tasyāṃ pratihatāyāṃ tu māyāyāṃ yudhi dānavāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.353 /
GE07hv_apppu:20610: sasṛjur ghorasaṃkāśaṃ tamas tīvraṃ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.354 //
GE07hv_apppu:20611: tamasā saṃvṛte loke daityeṣv āttāyudheṣu vai / HV_App.I,42A.355 /
GE07hv_apppu:20613: triśikhāṃ bhrukuṭīṃ cāsya dadṛśur dānavā raṇe / HV_App.I,42A.357 /
GE07hv_apppu:20614: lalāṭasthāṃ trikūṭasthāṃ gaṅgāṃ tripathagām iva // HV_App.I,42A.358 //
GE07hv_apppu:20617: tataḥ sarvāsu māyāsu hatāsu ditinandanāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.359 /
GE07hv_apppu:20618: hiraṇyakaśipuṃ daityā viṣaṇṇāḥ śaraṇaṃ gatāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.360 //
GE07hv_apppu:20619: tataḥ prajvalitaḥ krodhāt pradahann iva tejasā / HV_App.I,42A.361 /
GE07hv_apppu:20620: [k: T2 G1 M2 ins., M4 after line 364:k]
GE07hv_apppu:20622: hiraṇyakaśipur daityaś cālayām āsa medinīm // HV_App.I,42A.362 //
GE07hv_apppu:20623: tataḥ prakṣubhitāḥ sarve sāgarāḥ salilākarāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.363 /
GE07hv_apppu:20625: tasmin kruddhe tu daityendre tamobhūtam abhūj jagat / HV_App.I,42A.365 /
GE07hv_apppu:20626: tamasā samavacchannaṃ na prājñāyata kiṃcana // HV_App.I,42A.366 //
GE07hv_apppu:20629: āvahaḥ pravahaś caiva vivahaś ca samīraṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.367 /
GE07hv_apppu:20631: ete cānye ca bahavo ghorā dānavayodhinaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.367**29:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20632: parāvahaḥ saṃvahaś ca udvahaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.368 //
GE07hv_apppu:20633: tathā parivahaḥ śrīmān mārutā bhayaśaṃsinaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.369 /
GE07hv_apppu:20634: ity ete kṣubhitāḥ sapta mārutā gaganecarāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.370 //
GE07hv_apppu:20635: ye grahāḥ sarvalokasya kṣaye prādur bhavanti vai / HV_App.I,42A.371 /
GE07hv_apppu:20636: te grahā gagane hṛṣṭā vicaranti yathāsukham // HV_App.I,42A.372 //
GE07hv_apppu:20638: kalpānta iva samabhavat kṣubdhā devāḥ savāsavāḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.372**30:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20642: ayogataś cacārāśu sarveṣv ṛkṣeṣu candramāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.373 /
GE07hv_apppu:20643: sagrahaṃ sahanakṣatraṃ prajajvāla nabho niśi // HV_App.I,42A.374 //
GE07hv_apppu:20644: vivarṇatvaṃ ca bhagavān gato divi divākaraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.375 /
GE07hv_apppu:20645: kṛṣṇaḥ kabandhaś ca mahāṃl lakṣyate sma nabhastale // HV_App.I,42A.376 //
GE07hv_apppu:20646: amuñcac cāsitāṃ sūryo dhūmavartiṃ mahābhayām / HV_App.I,42A.377 /
GE07hv_apppu:20647: gaganasthaś ca bhagavān abhīkṣṇaṃ pariviṣyate // HV_App.I,42A.378 //
GE07hv_apppu:20648: sapta dhūmanibhā ghorāḥ sūryā divi samutthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.379 /
GE07hv_apppu:20649: somasya gaganasthasya grahās tiṣṭhanti śṛṅgagāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.380 //
GE07hv_apppu:20650: vāme ca dakṣiṇe caiva sthitau śukrabṛhaspatī / HV_App.I,42A.381 /
GE07hv_apppu:20653: śṛṅgāṇi śanakair ghorā yugāntāvartakā grahāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.384 //
GE07hv_apppu:20654: candramāḥ saha nakṣatrair grahaiḥ saptabhir āvṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.385 /
GE07hv_apppu:20656: gṛhīto rāhuṇā candra ulkābhir abhihanyate / HV_App.I,42A.387 /
GE07hv_apppu:20657: ulkāḥ prajvalitāś candre pracelur ghoradarśanāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.388 //
GE07hv_apppu:20658: devānām api yo devaḥ so 'py avarṣata śoṇitam / HV_App.I,42A.389 /
GE07hv_apppu:20660: akāle ca drumāḥ sarve puṣpitāś ca phalanti ca / HV_App.I,42A.391 /
GE07hv_apppu:20661: latāś ca saphalāḥ sarvā yāḥ prādur daityanāśanam // HV_App.I,42A.392 //
GE07hv_apppu:20662: phale phalāny ajāyanta puṣpe puṣpaṃ tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42A.393 /
GE07hv_apppu:20663: unmīlanti nimīlanti hasanti ca rudanti ca // HV_App.I,42A.394 //
GE07hv_apppu:20664: vikrośanti ca gambhīraṃ dhūmāyanti jvalanti ca / HV_App.I,42A.395 /
GE07hv_apppu:20666: āraṇyaiḥ saha saṃsṛṣṭā grāmyāś ca mṛgapakṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.397 /
GE07hv_apppu:20667: cukruśur bhairavaṃ tatra mṛgendre samupasthite // HV_App.I,42A.398 //
GE07hv_apppu:20668: nadyaś ca pratilomāni vahanti kaluṣodakāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.399 /
GE07hv_apppu:20669: [k: K Ñ3 V1.3 B2 D (except D6) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20671: na prakāśanti ca diśo raktareṇusamākulāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.400 //
GE07hv_apppu:20672: vānaspatyā na pūjyante pūjanārhāḥ kathaṃcana / HV_App.I,42A.401 /
GE07hv_apppu:20673: vāyuvegena hanyante bhidyante praṇudanti ca // HV_App.I,42A.402 //
GE07hv_apppu:20674: tadā ca sarvabhūtānāṃ chāyā na parivartate / HV_App.I,42A.403 /

GE07hv_apppu:20678: [k: Ñ3 B Dn Ds D5.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:20680: sa ca dṛṣṭvā mahotpātān hiraṇyakaśipus tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:20681: purohitaṃ tadā śukraṃ vacanaṃ cedam abravīt // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:20682: kim arthaṃ bhagavann ete mahotpātāḥ samutthitāḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:20683: śrotum icchāmi tattvena paraṃ kautūhalaṃ hi me // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:5 //
GE07hv_apppu:20685: śṛṇu rājann avahito vacanaṃ me mahāsura / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:20688: deśo vā hriyate tasya rājā vā vadham arhati // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:9 //
GE07hv_apppu:20689: ato buddhyā samīkṣasva yathā sarvaṃ praṇaśyati / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:20690: bṛhad bhayaṃ hi nacirād bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:11 //
GE07hv_apppu:20691: etāvad uktvā śukras tu hiraṇyakaśipuṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:12 /
GE07hv_apppu:20692: svastīty uktvā tu daityendraṃ jagāma svaṃ niveśanam // **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:13 //
GE07hv_apppu:20693: tasmin gate tu daityendro dhyātavān suciraṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,42A.406**32:14 /
GE07hv_apppu:20695: asurāṇāṃ vināśāya surāṇāṃ vijayāya ca / HV_App.I,42A.407 /
GE07hv_apppu:20697: ete cānye ca bahavo ghorā hy utpātadarśanāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.409 /
GE07hv_apppu:20699: tato hiraṇyakaśipur gadām ādāya satvaram / HV_App.I,42A.411 /

GE07hv_apppu:20706: tathā kruṣṭe nṛpaśreṣṭha tasmin ghore mahāsura / **HV_App.I,42A.414**34:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:20713: elāpatraḥ kāliyaś ca mahāpadmaś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,42A.420 //

GE07hv_apppu:20718: [k: K Ñ1.2 V1.3 B Dn Ds D1-4.6 ins. :k]

GE07hv_apppu:20724: āpaś ca sahasā kruddhā duṣprakampyarasāḥ śubhāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.425 /
GE07hv_apppu:20725: nadī bhāgīrathī caiva sarayūḥ kauśikī tathā // HV_App.I,42A.426 //
GE07hv_apppu:20727: sūryadehā tathā tāpī anyā nadyas tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,42A.426**38:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:20729: suveṇṇā ca mahābhāgā nadī godāvarī tathā // HV_App.I,42A.428 //
GE07hv_apppu:20730: carmaṇvatī ca sindhuś ca tathā nadanadīpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42A.429 /
GE07hv_apppu:20732: susrotā narmadā caiva tathā vetravatī nadī / HV_App.I,42A.431 /
GE07hv_apppu:20733: gomatī gokulākīrṇā tathā pūrvā sarasvatī // HV_App.I,42A.432 //

GE07hv_apppu:20736: sītā cekṣumatī caiva devikā ca mahānadī / **HV_App.I,42A.433**39:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:20741: māgadhāṃś ca mahāgrāmān puṇḍrān vaṅgāṃs tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42A.438 /
GE07hv_apppu:20742: suhmān mallān videhāṃś ca mālavān kāśikosalān // HV_App.I,42A.439 //
GE07hv_apppu:20743: bhavanaṃ vainateyasya suparṇasya ca kampitam / HV_App.I,42A.440 /
GE07hv_apppu:20745: raktatoyo bhīmavego lohito nāma sāgaraḥ / HV_App.I,42A.442 /
GE07hv_apppu:20746: śubhaḥ pāṇḍurameghābhaḥ kṣīrodaś caiva sāgaraḥ // HV_App.I,42A.443 //
GE07hv_apppu:20747: udayaś caiva śailendra ucchritaḥ śatayojanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.444 /
GE07hv_apppu:20750: sālais tālais tamālaiś ca karṇikāraiś ca puṣpitaiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.447 //
GE07hv_apppu:20751: ayomukhaś ca vipulaḥ parvato dhātumaṇḍitaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.448 /
GE07hv_apppu:20752: tamālavanagandhaś ca parvato malayaḥ śubhaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.449 //
GE07hv_apppu:20753: surāṣṭrāś ca subāhlīkāḥ śūrābhīrās tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42A.450 /
GE07hv_apppu:20754: bhojāḥ pāṇḍyāś ca vaṅgāś ca kaliṅgās tāmraliptakāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.451 //
GE07hv_apppu:20755: tathaivāndhrāś ca pauṇḍrāś ca vāmacūḍāḥ sakeralāḥ / HV_App.I,42A.452 /
GE07hv_apppu:20756: kṣobhitās tena daityena sadevāḥ sāpsarogaṇāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.453 //
GE07hv_apppu:20757: agastyabhavanaṃ caiva yad agastyakṛtaṃ purā / HV_App.I,42A.454 /
GE07hv_apppu:20761: giriḥ puṣpitakaś caiva lakṣmīvān priyadarśanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.458 /
GE07hv_apppu:20762: utthitaḥ sāgaraṃ bhittvā vayasyaś candrasūryayoḥ // HV_App.I,42A.459 //
GE07hv_apppu:20763: rarāja sumahāśṛṅgair gaganaṃ vilikhann iva / HV_App.I,42A.460 /
GE07hv_apppu:20765: vidyutvān parvataḥ śrīmān āyataḥ śatayojanam / HV_App.I,42A.462 /
GE07hv_apppu:20766: vidyutāṃ yatra saṃpātā nipātyante nagottame // HV_App.I,42A.463 //
GE07hv_apppu:20767: ṛṣabhaḥ parvataś caiva śrīmān vṛṣabhasaṃsthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.464 /
GE07hv_apppu:20768: kuñjaraḥ parvataś caiva yatrāgastyagṛhaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,42A.465 //
GE07hv_apppu:20769: viśālarathyā durdharṣā sarpāṇām ālayā purī / HV_App.I,42A.466 /
GE07hv_apppu:20771: mahāmegho giriś caiva pāriyātraś ca parvataḥ / HV_App.I,42A.468 /
GE07hv_apppu:20772: cakravāṃś ca giriśreṣṭho vārāhaś caiva parvataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.469 //
GE07hv_apppu:20774: yasmin vasati duṣṭātmā narako nāma dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.471 //
GE07hv_apppu:20776: ṣaṣṭis tatra sahasrāṇi parvatānāṃ viśāṃ pate // HV_App.I,42A.473 //
GE07hv_apppu:20778: devāvāsaḥ śubhaḥ puṇyo girirājo hiraṇmayaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.475 //
GE07hv_apppu:20779: hemaśṛṅgo mahāśailas tathā meghasakho giriḥ / HV_App.I,42A.476 /
GE07hv_apppu:20780: kailāsaś cāpi śailendro dānavendreṇa kampitaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.477 //

GE07hv_apppu:20785: śrīmān manoharaś caiva nityaṃ puṣpitapādapaḥ // HV_App.I,42A.479 //
GE07hv_apppu:20787: kampitaṃ mānasaṃ caiva rājahaṃsair niṣevitam // HV_App.I,42A.481 //
GE07hv_apppu:20788: triśṛṅgaparvataś caiva kumārī ca saridvarā / HV_App.I,42A.482 /
GE07hv_apppu:20790: uśīrabījaś ca girī rudropasthas tathādrirāṭ / HV_App.I,42A.484 /
GE07hv_apppu:20791: prajāpateś ca nilayas tathā puṣkaraparvataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.485 //
GE07hv_apppu:20792: devāvṛtparvataś caiva tathā caivāluko giriḥ / HV_App.I,42A.486 /
GE07hv_apppu:20793: krauñcaḥ saptarṣiśailaś ca dhūmavarṇaś ca parvataḥ // HV_App.I,42A.487 //
GE07hv_apppu:20794: ete cānye ca girayo deśā janapadās tathā / HV_App.I,42A.488 /
GE07hv_apppu:20795: nadyaś ca sāgarāś caiva dānavendreṇa kampitāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.489 //

GE07hv_apppu:20800: na vavau bhagavān vāyur na prabhāti sma bhāskaraḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.492**41:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:20803: ūrdhvago bhīmavegaś ca sarva evābhikampitāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.493 //
GE07hv_apppu:20806: tatrādityāś ca sādhyāś ca viśve ca marutas tathā / HV_App.I,42A.494 /
GE07hv_apppu:20807: rudrā devā mahātmāno vasavaś ca mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,42A.495 //
GE07hv_apppu:20808: āgamya te mṛgendrasya sakāśaṃ sūryavarcasaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.496 /

GE07hv_apppu:20811: durvṛttam asadācāraṃ saha sarvair mahāsuraiḥ // HV_App.I,42A.499 //
GE07hv_apppu:20812: tvaṃ hy eṣām antako nānyo daityānāṃ daityanāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.500 /
GE07hv_apppu:20813: tan nāśaya hitārthāya lokānāṃ svasti vai kuru // HV_App.I,42A.501 //
GE07hv_apppu:20814: tvaṃ guruḥ sarvalokānāṃ tvam indras tvaṃ pitāmahaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.502 /
GE07hv_apppu:20815: ṛte tvadanyaḥ śaraṇaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42A.503 //
GE07hv_apppu:20816: tac chrutvā vacanaṃ devo devānām ādisaṃbhavaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.504 /
GE07hv_apppu:20819: siṃhanādena mahatā hṛdayāni manāṃsi ca // HV_App.I,42A.507 //
GE07hv_apppu:20820: gaṇaḥ krodhavaśo nāma kālakeyas tathāparaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.508 /
GE07hv_apppu:20823: vegaś ca vegaleyaś ca saiṃhikeyaś ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,42A.509 //
GE07hv_apppu:20825: kapilaś ca mahīputro vyāghrākṣaḥ kṣitikampanaḥ / HV_App.I,42A.511 /
GE07hv_apppu:20832: tato nṛsiṃhaḥ saṃkruddhas tān sarvān daityasattamān / **HV_App.I,42A.514**43:3 /

GE07hv_apppu:20835: tatas tān nihatān dṛṣṭvā nṛsiṃhena mahātmanā / **HV_App.I,42A.514**44:2 /

GE07hv_apppu:20842: devārir ditijo dṛpto nṛsiṃhaṃ samupādravat // HV_App.I,42A.518 //

GE07hv_apppu:20850: nadan bhīmaravaṃ ghoraṃ siṃhasya purataḥ sthitaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:20851: mumoca cāstraṃ daityendraḥ siṃho 'pi ca tad agrasat / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:20852: nārāyaṇaṃ tato 'py astraṃ niyojya dhanuṣi sthitaḥ // **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:20853: dṛṣṭvā tat karma daityasya nārasiṃho janārdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:7 /

GE07hv_apppu:20855: jagrāha dhanuratnaṃ tat taṃ ca bāṇaṃ mahādyutiḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:9 /

GE07hv_apppu:20859: bāhubhyāṃ nārasiṃhaṃ tu jagrāha yudhi dānavaḥ / **HV_App.I,42A.518**47:13 /
