GE07hv_apppu:20896: brahmā ca paramaprīto viṣṇoḥ stotram udairayat // HV_App.I,42A.533 //
GE07hv_apppu:20899: bhavān akṣaram avyaktam acintyaṃ guhyam uttamam / HV_App.I,42A.534 /

GE07hv_apppu:22044: dīkṣitas tatra tu balis tasya patnī mahācamūḥ // HV_App.I,42B.859 //
GE07hv_apppu:22045: śambaras tatra śāmitram akarod ditinandanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.860 /
GE07hv_apppu:22046: [k: For line 860, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22047: āgnīdhras tatra balavān akaroc chambaras tadā / **HV_App.I,42B.860**41:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22049: dakṣiṇās tasya yajñasya kālanemir mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.862 /
GE07hv_apppu:22050: vaitāne karmaṇi vibho yaḥ khyāto havyavāḍ iva // HV_App.I,42B.863 //
GE07hv_apppu:22051: tridaśānāṃ tu sainyasya śarīrair gatajīvitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.864 /
GE07hv_apppu:22052: tasmin yajñe tu savanaṃ vardhate daityanirmitam // HV_App.I,42B.865 //
GE07hv_apppu:22053: devānāṃ rudhiraṃ saṃkhye papur ugrā diteḥ sutāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.866 /
GE07hv_apppu:22055: yadā balir mahādaityo vijetā samare surān / HV_App.I,42B.868 /
GE07hv_apppu:22056: tadā hy avabhṛthaṃ yajñe bhaviṣyati na saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.869 //
GE07hv_apppu:22058: vedavanto vṛttavantaḥ śūrāḥ sarve tanutyajaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.871 //
GE07hv_apppu:22061: [k: T1 2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 873 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22063: svaṃ svaṃ karma yathāśaktyā yuddhakarma pravartate // **HV_App.I,42B.873**42:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:22067: svaṃ svaṃ tathā yathā cakrur yuddhakarma viśāradāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.873**42A:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22075: hayānāṃ heṣamāṇānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca garjatām / HV_App.I,42B.880 /
GE07hv_apppu:22077: dānavānāṃ pareṣāṃ ca śastravanti mahānti ca / HV_App.I,42B.882 /
GE07hv_apppu:22082: tato nāgā rathāś caiva jāmbūnadavibhūṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.884 /
GE07hv_apppu:22083: bhrājamānā hy adṛśyanta meghā iva savidyutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.885 //
GE07hv_apppu:22085: cāru bibhrājire tatra sveṣv anīkeṣu bhāgaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.887 //
GE07hv_apppu:22088: dānavānāṃ surāṇāṃ ca samālokyanta sainikāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.890 /
GE07hv_apppu:22090: saṃnaddhāḥ samadṛśyanta jyotīṃṣi gagane yathā / HV_App.I,42B.892 /
GE07hv_apppu:22091: udyatair āyudhaiś citrais talabaddhāḥ patākinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.893 /
GE07hv_apppu:22093: nānāvarṇāḥ patākāś ca dhvajamālāś ca saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.895 /
GE07hv_apppu:22094: yudhyatāṃ raṇaśauṇḍānām īrayām āsa mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.896 //
GE07hv_apppu:22096: raśmibhir bhāsayām āsa raśmivarṇāni raśmimān // HV_App.I,42B.898 //
GE07hv_apppu:22098: rajaḥ pracchādayām āsa patrorṇāḥ pāṇḍurā diśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.900 //
GE07hv_apppu:22104: girikūṭocchrayāḥ sarve tadā te devadānavāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.903 /
GE07hv_apppu:22106: bāṇaiḥ surucirais tīkṣṇaiḥ patravājair durāsadaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.905 //
GE07hv_apppu:22107: mudgarair musalaiḥ śūlair ayastuṇḍair ulūkhalaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.906 /
GE07hv_apppu:22108: vajrair aśanikalpaiś ca khaḍgavṛkṣādibhis tathā // HV_App.I,42B.907 //
GE07hv_apppu:22114: sāvitrasya vadhaṃ prepsur bāṇo jagrāha kārmukam // HV_App.I,42B.909 //
GE07hv_apppu:22116: mantrair huta ivārciṣmān sa prajajvāla tejasā // HV_App.I,42B.911 //
GE07hv_apppu:22119: mārutaḥ sa mahāvegaḥ sāvitraḥ śaktim uttamām / HV_App.I,42B.914 /
GE07hv_apppu:22121: āpatantī ca sā śaktir maholkā jvalitā iva / HV_App.I,42B.916 /
GE07hv_apppu:22123: hatāyām atha śaktyāṃ tu sāvitro devasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.918 /
GE07hv_apppu:22126: agṛhṇān niśitaṃ khaḍgam āśīviṣam ivoragam // HV_App.I,42B.921 //
GE07hv_apppu:22127: taṃ gṛhītvā raṇamukhe prajvalantaṃ mahāprabham / HV_App.I,42B.922 /
GE07hv_apppu:22129: sa taṃ sthitam athālakṣya sāvitraṃ balinandanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.924 /
GE07hv_apppu:22130: lohitākṣaṃ mahākāyaṃ cikṣepa ca nanāda ca // HV_App.I,42B.925 //
GE07hv_apppu:22132: saṃdadhe cāśu bāṇaughān āśīviṣasamān balī // HV_App.I,42B.927 //
GE07hv_apppu:22134: ākarṇapūrṇāṃś cikṣepa śarān ugrān samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.929 //
GE07hv_apppu:22136: sāvitraṃ chādayām āsuḥ kailāsam iva toyadāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.931 //
GE07hv_apppu:22139: parājitya ca sāvitraṃ bāṇaḥ paramaharṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.934 /
GE07hv_apppu:22140: pragṛhya kārmukaṃ ghoraṃ gataḥ śakrarathaṃ prati // HV_App.I,42B.935 //
GE07hv_apppu:22141: balaś cāpy asuraśreṣṭhaḥ pragṛhya mahatīṃ gadām / HV_App.I,42B.936 /
GE07hv_apppu:22142: dhruvāya vasave mūrdhni raudrāṃ cikṣepa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.937 //
GE07hv_apppu:22143: tasya nirmathito deho hemacitraṃ ca varma vai / HV_App.I,42B.938 /
GE07hv_apppu:22144: gadāvegena bhīmena dhruvasya samare tadā // HV_App.I,42B.939 //
GE07hv_apppu:22145: śeṣaś ca vasavaḥ sarve divyāstrair ghoradarśanaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.940 /
GE07hv_apppu:22146: prācchādayan raṇe daityam ādityam iva toyadāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.941 //
GE07hv_apppu:22147: tataḥ so 'marṣito bāṇair balo dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.942 /
GE07hv_apppu:22148: avātarad rathāt tasmād gadām udyamya vegavān // HV_App.I,42B.943 //
GE07hv_apppu:22151: pātayām āsa śatrūṇāṃ samāvidhya mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.944 /
GE07hv_apppu:22152: [k: For line 944, B1.3 Ds D6 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22153: śiraḥsu pātayām āsa śatrūṇāṃ tāṃ gadāṃ tadā / **HV_App.I,42B.944**47:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22154: diśaḥ prādrāvayat sarvāṃs stridaśān sā mahāgadā / HV_App.I,42B.945 /
GE07hv_apppu:22156: tasyāḥ suvidyudghoṣāyās tena śabdena vejitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.947 /
GE07hv_apppu:22157: vyadravanta paribhraṣṭā rathebhyo rathinas tadā // HV_App.I,42B.948 //
GE07hv_apppu:22160: kṣuraprair viśikhair bhallair vatsadantaiḥ śilīmukhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.951 //
GE07hv_apppu:22161: muhur muhur mahātejāḥ pratyavidhyan mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.952 /
GE07hv_apppu:22162: balas tu sa gadāpāṇir vyāditāsya ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.953 //
GE07hv_apppu:22164: pibann iva śaraughāṃs tān devacāpasamutthitān // HV_App.I,42B.955 //
GE07hv_apppu:22166: avasphūrjan diśaḥ sarvāḥ svena vīryeṇa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.957 //
GE07hv_apppu:22167: arujaṃs tridaśān daityaḥ sindhuvegho nagān iva / HV_App.I,42B.958 /
GE07hv_apppu:22168: samṛddhas tarasā devān vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā / HV_App.I,42B.959 /
GE07hv_apppu:22169: śamayaṃś ca maheṣvāsāṇ vasubhyāṃ samasajjata // HV_App.I,42B.960 //
GE07hv_apppu:22170: āpaś caivānilaś caiva vavarṣatur ariṃdamau / HV_App.I,42B.961 /
GE07hv_apppu:22171: śaravarṣāṇi dīptāni meghāv iva paraṃtapau / HV_App.I,42B.962 /
GE07hv_apppu:22172: kṣiptāṃs tān viśikhān dīptān antarikṣe sa cicchide // HV_App.I,42B.963 //
GE07hv_apppu:22174: prāsādān vividhān dīptān antarikṣe ca cicchiduḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.963**48:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22175: amṛṣyamāṇas tat karma dhruvas tam abhidudruve / HV_App.I,42B.964 /
GE07hv_apppu:22176: tau pṛthak śaravarṣābhyām anyonyam abhijaghnatuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.965 //
GE07hv_apppu:22178: tau nakhair iva śārdūlau dantair iva mahādvipau / HV_App.I,42B.967 /
GE07hv_apppu:22180: nirbhindantau ca gātrāṇi vilikhantau ca sāyakaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.969 /
GE07hv_apppu:22181: stambhayantau ca balinau pratudantau sthitau raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.970 /
GE07hv_apppu:22182: carantau vividhān mārgān maṇḍalāni ca bhāgaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.971 //
GE07hv_apppu:22183: mudgarair jaghnatuḥ kruddhāv anyonyam abhimāninau / HV_App.I,42B.972 /
GE07hv_apppu:22184: asibhyāṃ carmaṇī divye vipule ca śarāsane / HV_App.I,42B.973 /
GE07hv_apppu:22187: bāhubhiḥ samasajjetām āyasaiḥ parighair iva // HV_App.I,42B.976 //
GE07hv_apppu:22188: tayor āsīd bhujāghāta+ nigrahaḥ pragrahas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.977 /
GE07hv_apppu:22189: atīva bhīmaḥ saṃhrādo vajraparvatayor iva // HV_App.I,42B.978 //
GE07hv_apppu:22190: dvipāv iva viṣāṇāgraiḥ śṛṅgair iva mahāvṛṣau / HV_App.I,42B.979 /
GE07hv_apppu:22192: tataḥ parājito devo balakena tadā dhruvaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.981 /
GE07hv_apppu:22193: rathaṃ tyaktvā bhayāt tasya pranaṣṭaḥ prāṅmukho vasuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.982 //
GE07hv_apppu:22194: punar eva ca tatrāsīn mahad yuddhaṃ sudāruṇam / HV_App.I,42B.983 /
GE07hv_apppu:22195: kruddhasya namuceś caiva dharasya ca mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.984 //
GE07hv_apppu:22196: saṃrabdhau ca mahābāhū maheṣvāsāv ariṃdamau / HV_App.I,42B.985 /
GE07hv_apppu:22197: parasparam udīkṣetāṃ dahantāv iva locanaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.986 //
GE07hv_apppu:22198: visphārya ca mahac cāpaṃ hemapṛṣṭhaṃ dūrāsadam / HV_App.I,42B.987 /
GE07hv_apppu:22199: saṃrambhāt sa vasuśreṣṭhas tyaktvā prāṇān ayudhyata // HV_App.I,42B.988 //
GE07hv_apppu:22200: sa sāyakamayair jālair vṛto daityarathaṃ prati / HV_App.I,42B.989 /
GE07hv_apppu:22201: bhānumadbhiḥ śilādhautair bhānoḥ pracchādayat prabhām // HV_App.I,42B.990 //
GE07hv_apppu:22202: tataḥ prahasya namucir dharasya ca śilāśitān / HV_App.I,42B.991 /
GE07hv_apppu:22203: asṛjat sāyakān dīptān bhīmavegān durāsadān // HV_App.I,42B.992 //
GE07hv_apppu:22205: vivyādhātiratho daityo navabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.994 //
GE07hv_apppu:22206: sa totrair iva mātaṅgo dāryamāṇaḥ patatribhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.995 /
GE07hv_apppu:22208: tam āpatantaṃ vegena saṃrambhān namucī raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.997 /
GE07hv_apppu:22209: daityaḥ pratyasarad devaṃ matto mattam iva dvipam // HV_App.I,42B.998 //
GE07hv_apppu:22211: vikṣobhya tad balaṃ harṣād uddhūtārṇavasaprabham // HV_App.I,42B.1000 //
GE07hv_apppu:22213: bhiśrayan samare daityo vasuṃ prācchādayac charaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1002 //
GE07hv_apppu:22215: dṛṣṭvā prākampata muhus tridaśānāṃ mahad balam // HV_App.I,42B.1004 //
GE07hv_apppu:22217: garjantāv iva śārdūlau prabhinnāv iva vāraṇau // HV_App.I,42B.1006 //
GE07hv_apppu:22218: mahāmeghopamaṃ raudram āsīd āyodhanaṃ tayoḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1007 /
GE07hv_apppu:22220: samājam iva taṃ dṛṣṭvā prekṣamānau mahārathau / HV_App.I,42B.1009 /
GE07hv_apppu:22221: āśaṃsante jayaṃ tābhyāṃ yodhās te gaṇaśaḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1010 //
GE07hv_apppu:22224: tayoḥ praikṣanta samaraṃ saṃnikṛṣṭaṃ mahāstrayoḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1011 /
GE07hv_apppu:22228: tau chādayantāv anyonyaṃ samare niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1013 /
GE07hv_apppu:22229: śarajālāvṛtaṃ vyoma cakratus tau mahābalau // HV_App.I,42B.1014 //
GE07hv_apppu:22230: tāv anyonyaṃ jighāṃsantau śarais tīkṣnair mahārathau // HV_App.I,42B.1015 //

GE07hv_apppu:22232: āsādayetām anyonyaṃ tau raṇe niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.1015**51:1 //

GE07hv_apppu:22236: tayoḥ śarāḥ prakāśante devadānavayos tadā / HV_App.I,42B.1019 /
GE07hv_apppu:22237: paṅktyaḥ śaradi mattānāṃ sārasānām ivāmbare // HV_App.I,42B.1020 //
GE07hv_apppu:22239: kṣaṇena saṃvṛtā bhūmir meghair iva nabhastalam // HV_App.I,42B.1022 //
GE07hv_apppu:22241: dharāya vasave muktaṃ cakraṃ namucinā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1024 //
GE07hv_apppu:22242: patatā tena cakreṇa dharasya syandanottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1025 //
GE07hv_apppu:22244: sa tyaktvā syandanaṃ devaḥ pradīptaṃ cakratejasā / HV_App.I,42B.1027 /
GE07hv_apppu:22245: bhayāt tasyāsurendrasya gataḥ svagṛham uttamam // HV_App.I,42B.1028 //
GE07hv_apppu:22246: parājitya suraṃ daityo namucir baladarpitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1029 /
GE07hv_apppu:22247: prayātaḥ svena sainyena bhūyaḥ suracamūṃ prati // HV_App.I,42B.1030 //
GE07hv_apppu:22248: yau tau mayaś ca tvaṣṭā ca devadaityeṣu viśrutau / HV_App.I,42B.1031 /
GE07hv_apppu:22250: ghoras tayoḥ saṃprahāraḥ prāvartata sudāruṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1033 /
GE07hv_apppu:22251: [k: For line 1033, B1.3 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22252: tayoḥ prāṇaharas tv āsīt saṃprahāro mahātmanoḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1033**52:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22253: anyonyaspardhinos tatra cirāt prabhṛti saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1034 //
GE07hv_apppu:22254: [k: For line 1034, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22256: tvaṣṭā tu niśitair bāṇair daityaṃ tu baladarpitam / HV_App.I,42B.1035 /
GE07hv_apppu:22257: parākrāntaṃ parākramya vivyādha triṃśatā śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1036 //
GE07hv_apppu:22258: mayas tu prativivyādha tvaṣṭāraṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1037 /
GE07hv_apppu:22260: nanāda ditijaśreṣṭho hatas tvaṣṭuḥ śarair mayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1039 //
GE07hv_apppu:22261: saṃkruddho daityasainyasya vicinvann iva jīvitam / HV_App.I,42B.1040 /
GE07hv_apppu:22263: devo gṛhītvā samare daityendre saṃnyapātayat / HV_App.I,42B.1042 /
GE07hv_apppu:22264: bhīmāṃ sarvāyasīṃ tvaṣṭā puraṃdara ivāśanim // HV_App.I,42B.1043 //
GE07hv_apppu:22266: mayaś ciccheda tīkṣṇāgrais tūrṇaṃ saptabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1045 //
GE07hv_apppu:22267: tataḥ kṣiṇvann iva prāṇāṃs tvaṣṭuḥ kopān mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1046 /
GE07hv_apppu:22268: preṣayām āsa saṃrabdhaḥ śarān barhiṇavāsasaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1047 //
GE07hv_apppu:22269: ciccheda bāṇāṃs tvaṣṭā tāñ jvalitair nataparvabhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1048 /
GE07hv_apppu:22271: tau vṛṣāv iva nardantau balinau vāśitāntare / HV_App.I,42B.1050 /
GE07hv_apppu:22272: śārdūlāv iva cānyonyaṃ prasaktāv abhijaghnatuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1051 //
GE07hv_apppu:22274: anyonyam abhivīkṣantau kruddhāv āśīviṣāv iva // HV_App.I,42B.1053 //
GE07hv_apppu:22277: tataḥ sa vipulāṃ dīptāṃ mayo rukmāṅgadāṃ gadām / HV_App.I,42B.1056 /
GE07hv_apppu:22280: gadayā dānavaḥ kruddho vajreṇendra ivācalān // HV_App.I,42B.1059 //
GE07hv_apppu:22281: tataḥ kruddho mahādaityaḥ kṣurābhyāṃ tasya saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1060 /

GE07hv_apppu:22287: dṛṣṭvā tvaṣṭā hataṃ sūtaṃ kṣurābhyāṃ vinipātitam / HV_App.I,42B.1062 /

GE07hv_apppu:22289: visphārayan mahācāpaṃ sthito bhūmau mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1064 //

GE07hv_apppu:22293: prādahad devasainyāni dāvāgnir iva kānanam // HV_App.I,42B.1068 //
GE07hv_apppu:22296: te papus tasya devasya śoṇitaṃ rukmabhūṣaṇāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1071 /
GE07hv_apppu:22297: āśīviṣā iva kruddhā bhujagāḥ kālacoditāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1072 //
GE07hv_apppu:22298: te kṣitiṃ samavartanta śobhante rudhirokṣitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1073 /
GE07hv_apppu:22299: [k: For line 1073, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22302: te prakāśanta nārācāḥ praviśanto vasuṃdharām / HV_App.I,42B.1075 /
GE07hv_apppu:22303: astaṃ gacchantam ādityaṃ praviśanta ivāṃśavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1076 //
GE07hv_apppu:22304: taṃ pratyavidhyat tvaṣṭā tu jāmbūnadavibhūṣitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1077 /
GE07hv_apppu:22306: te tasya daityasya bhujaṃ savyaṃ nirbhidya patriṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1079 /
GE07hv_apppu:22307: vidārya viviśur bhūmiṃ bhujagā iva vegitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1080 //
GE07hv_apppu:22308: mayas tribhir athānarcchat tvaṣṭāraṃ tu patatribhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1081 /
GE07hv_apppu:22310: [k: For line 1082, B1.3 T1.2 G3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22312: tvaṣṭātha mayanirmuktaiḥ sāyakair arditaḥ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1083 //
GE07hv_apppu:22314: taṃ tatra hatasūtāśvaṃ bhujaṃgam iva nirviṣam / HV_App.I,42B.1085 /
GE07hv_apppu:22315: tvaṣṭāraṃ virathaṃ dṛṣṭvā muditaḥ sa tu dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1086 //
GE07hv_apppu:22316: visphārayan suruciraṃ cāpaṃ rukmāṅgadaṃ dṛḍham / HV_App.I,42B.1087 /
GE07hv_apppu:22317: raṇe 'bhyatiṣṭhad daityendro jvalann iva hutāśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1088 //
GE07hv_apppu:22318: pulomā tu balaślāghī dṛpto dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1089 /
GE07hv_apppu:22322: sarveṣām eva bhūtānāṃ yaḥ prāṇaḥ kathyate dvijaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1091 /
GE07hv_apppu:22323: balinā kālakalpena vāyunā saha saṃgataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1092 //
GE07hv_apppu:22324: pulomnas tatra pavanaḥ śrutvā jyātalanisvanam / HV_App.I,42B.1093 /
GE07hv_apppu:22325: nāmṛṣyata yathā matto gajaḥ pratigajasvanam // HV_App.I,42B.1094 //
GE07hv_apppu:22326: daityacāpacyutair bāṇaiḥ prācchādyanta diśo daśa / HV_App.I,42B.1095 /
GE07hv_apppu:22327: raśmijālair ivārkasya vitataṃ sāmbaraṃ jagat // HV_App.I,42B.1096 //
GE07hv_apppu:22328: sa tāmranayanaḥ kruddhaḥ śvasann iva mahoragaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1097 /
GE07hv_apppu:22329: vṛto daityaśatair vāyū raśmivān iva bhāskaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1098 //
GE07hv_apppu:22331: rukmapuṅkhā vyarājanta haṃsāḥ śreṇīkṛtā iva // HV_App.I,42B.1100 //
GE07hv_apppu:22333: prapatantaḥ sma dṛśyante daityasyāyutaśaḥ śarāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1102 //
GE07hv_apppu:22334: evaṃ sutīkṣṇān khacarāñ śalabhān iva pāvake / HV_App.I,42B.1103 /
GE07hv_apppu:22335: suvarṇavikṛtāṃś citrān mumoca ditijaḥ śarān // HV_App.I,42B.1104 //
GE07hv_apppu:22336: tam antakam iva kruddham āpatantaṃ sa mārutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1105 /
GE07hv_apppu:22337: tyaktvā prāṇān atikramya vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1106 //
GE07hv_apppu:22338: tasya vegam asaṃhāryaṃ dṛṣṭvā vāyuḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1107 /
GE07hv_apppu:22339: uttamaṃ javam āsthāya vyadhamat sāyakavrajān // HV_App.I,42B.1108 //
GE07hv_apppu:22340: tato vidhamya balavāñ śarajālāni mārutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1109 /
GE07hv_apppu:22343: vivyādha daityaṃ viṃśatyā viśikhair nataparvabhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1110 //
GE07hv_apppu:22344: mārudgaṇānāṃ pravarā daśa divyā mahaujasaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1111 /
GE07hv_apppu:22345: sādhu sādhv iti vegena siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.1112 //
GE07hv_apppu:22346: tasmin samutthite śabde tumule lomaharṣaṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1113 /
GE07hv_apppu:22348: te samāsādya pavanaṃ samāvṛṇvañ śarottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1115 /
GE07hv_apppu:22349: [k: For line 1115, B1.3 Ds T1.2G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22352: te pīḍayantaḥ pavanaṃ kruddhāḥ sapta mahārathāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1117 /
GE07hv_apppu:22353: prajāsaṃharaṇe ghorāḥ somaṃ sapta grahā iva // HV_App.I,42B.1118 //
GE07hv_apppu:22355: karaṃ gajakarākāram udyamya yudhi mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1120 //
GE07hv_apppu:22356: teṣāṃ mūrdhasu daityānāṃ pātayām āsa vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.1121 /
GE07hv_apppu:22357: nihatā vāyuvegena sapta tena mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1122 //
GE07hv_apppu:22358: tyaktvā prāṇān pulomā tu vivyādha navabhiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1123 /
GE07hv_apppu:22359: tasyāpi tam asaṃhāryaṃ dṛṣtvā vāyuḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1124 /
GE07hv_apppu:22360: asaṃcintya śaraughāṃs tāñ jvalitān vai pulomataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1125 //
GE07hv_apppu:22361: teṣāṃ vidārya tejāṃsi dānavānāṃ mahātmanām / HV_App.I,42B.1126 /
GE07hv_apppu:22363: te bhinnavarmāsthibhujāḥ patanto bhānti dānavāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1128 /
GE07hv_apppu:22365: teṣāṃ vidāritair dehair dānavānāṃ mahātmanām / HV_App.I,42B.1130 /
GE07hv_apppu:22366: tataḥ prāvartata nadī raudrarūpā bhayāvahā // HV_App.I,42B.1131 //
GE07hv_apppu:22367: prasravantī raṇe raktaṃ bhīrūṇāṃ bhayavardhinī / HV_App.I,42B.1132 /
GE07hv_apppu:22369: raṇabhūmir abhūd raudrā tatra tatra sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1134 //
GE07hv_apppu:22371: sānukarṣapatākaiś ca sopāsaṅgair dhvajai rathaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1136 //
GE07hv_apppu:22372: śīrṇakumbhais tathā nāgair ghaṇṭābhiḥ suvibhūṣitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1137 /
GE07hv_apppu:22378: tanutraiḥ satalatraiś ca hārair niṣkaiś ca śobhanaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1143 /
GE07hv_apppu:22379: hataiś ca ditijais tatra śastrasyandanavarjitaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1144 //
GE07hv_apppu:22380: patitair apaviddhaiś ca śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1145 /
GE07hv_apppu:22384: vimardo devasainyānāṃ sadṛśaḥ karmaṇāṃ babhau // HV_App.I,42B.1147 //
GE07hv_apppu:22387: te jaghnuḥ śatasāhasrāḥ pavanaṃ dānavottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1150 /
GE07hv_apppu:22388: tair vadhyamānaḥ sa babhau samantād arpitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1151 //
GE07hv_apppu:22390: hatvā tu ditijaḥ pṛṣṭham āsādya yudhi varjitān / **HV_App.I,42B.1151**62:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22391: hatvāṣṭau tatra yodhānāṃ śatāni pavanaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1152 /
GE07hv_apppu:22392: kṛtvā mārgaṃ suraśreṣṭhaḥ prayātaḥ sa mahārathaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1153 //
GE07hv_apppu:22393: adyāpi ca suvistīrṇaḥ panthāḥ saṃdṛśyate divi / HV_App.I,42B.1154 /
GE07hv_apppu:22394: nāmnā vāyupatho nāma siddhāḥ paśyanti taṃ divi // HV_App.I,42B.1155 //
GE07hv_apppu:22395: hayagrīvas tu ditijaḥ pūṣāṇaṃ prati vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.1156 /
GE07hv_apppu:22398: pūṣāṇaṃ ditijo 'paśyat kruddho ghoreṇa cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,42B.1159 //
GE07hv_apppu:22399: bhujābhyām ādadānasya saṃdadhānasya vai śarān / HV_App.I,42B.1160 /
GE07hv_apppu:22400: muñcataḥ karṣato vāpi dadṛśus tatra nāntaram // HV_App.I,42B.1161 //
GE07hv_apppu:22403: rukmapuṅkhais tatas tasya cāpamuktaiḥ śitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1164 /
GE07hv_apppu:22404: prācchādyanta śilādhautair diśaḥ sūryasya ca prabhāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1165 //
GE07hv_apppu:22406: nabhaścarāṇāṃ nabhasi dṛśyante bahavo vrajāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1167 //
GE07hv_apppu:22408: śreṇībhūtāḥ prakāśante yāntaḥ śyenā ivāmbare // HV_App.I,42B.1169 //
GE07hv_apppu:22412: mahāvegān prasannāgrān mumoca ditijaḥ śarān // HV_App.I,42B.1171 //
GE07hv_apppu:22414: dehe samavakīryanta pūṣṇaḥ suniśitāḥ śarāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1173 //
GE07hv_apppu:22415: te vyomni vikṛtākārāḥ saṃprakāśanta sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1174 /
GE07hv_apppu:22416: khadyotā iva gharmānte khe carantaḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1175 //
GE07hv_apppu:22417: śilādhautāḥ prasannāgrāḥ pūṣaṇaṃ vikṛtāḥ śarāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1176 /
GE07hv_apppu:22418: parvataṃ vāridhārābhir yathā prāvṛṣi toyadāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1177 //

GE07hv_apppu:22431: te bāṇā bhūtale magnāḥ pūṣṇo bhāti śilāśitāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1177**64C:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:22432: vikramaṃ śaṃsituṃ tūrṇam anantasya ca vai gatāḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.1177**64C:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:22433: [k: Ñ2 D2 ins. after line 2, B2 after line 1 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22438: tatas tu pūṣṇo devasya balaṃ vīryaṃ parākramam / HV_App.I,42B.1178 /
GE07hv_apppu:22439: vyavasāyaṃ ca sattvaṃ ca paśyanti tridaśādbhutam // HV_App.I,42B.1179 //
GE07hv_apppu:22440: tāṃ samudrād ivodbhūtāṃ śaravṛṣṭiṃ samutthitām / HV_App.I,42B.1180 /
GE07hv_apppu:22441: nācintayat tadā pūṣā daityāṃś cābhyadravad raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1181 //
GE07hv_apppu:22442: hemapṛṣṭhaṃ mahānādaṃ pūṣṇa āsīn mahad dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1182 /
GE07hv_apppu:22444: tataḥ śarāḥ prādur āsan pūrayanta ivāmbaram / HV_App.I,42B.1184 /
GE07hv_apppu:22445: suvarṇapuṅkhāḥ pūṣṇas te prabhavantaḥ śarāsanāt // HV_App.I,42B.1185 //
GE07hv_apppu:22446: māleva rukmapuṅkhānāṃ vitatā vyomni patriṇām / HV_App.I,42B.1186 /
GE07hv_apppu:22447: prādur āsīn mahāghorā bṛhataḥ pūṣakārmukāt // HV_App.I,42B.1187 //
GE07hv_apppu:22448: tato vyomni vibhaktāni śarajālāni sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1188 /
GE07hv_apppu:22451: patatāṃ pātyamānānāṃ kham āsīt saṃvṛtaṃ vrajaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1191 //
GE07hv_apppu:22452: pūṣā prāpūrayad bāṇair hayagrīvaṃ śilāśitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1192 /
GE07hv_apppu:22454: tato vyasṛjad ugrāṇi śarajālāni dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1194 /
GE07hv_apppu:22455: amarṣī balavān kruddho didhakṣann iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1195 //
GE07hv_apppu:22456: pūṣṇas tv ājau dhvajaṃ caiva patākāṃ dhanur eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.1196 /
GE07hv_apppu:22457: raśmīn yoktrāṇi cāśvānāṃ hayagrīvo raṇe 'cchinat // HV_App.I,42B.1197 //
GE07hv_apppu:22458: athāsyāśvān punar hatvā caturbhiḥ sāyakottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1198 /
GE07hv_apppu:22459: sārathiṃ sa mahātejā rathopasthād apātayat // HV_App.I,42B.1199 //
GE07hv_apppu:22460: kṛtas tu virathaḥ pūṣā hayagrīveṇa saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1200 /
GE07hv_apppu:22461: pūṣā tasya rathābhyāśāt sa yayau tena vai jitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1201 //
GE07hv_apppu:22462: [k: B1.3 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. for line 1201,
GE07hv_apppu:22467: tatrādbhutam ito bhūyo yuddhaṃ vartata dāruṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1202 /
GE07hv_apppu:22468: kṛtapratikṛtaṃ ghoraṃ śambarasya bhagasya ca // HV_App.I,42B.1203 //
GE07hv_apppu:22471: vikṣipann akṣasadṛśān vyasṛjat sāyakān bahūn / HV_App.I,42B.1206 /
GE07hv_apppu:22474: samakampanta bhītāni sindhor iva mahormayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1209 //
GE07hv_apppu:22475: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya virūpākṣaṃ vibhīṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1210 /
GE07hv_apppu:22477: tato bhago maheṣvāso divyaṃ visphārayan dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1212 /
GE07hv_apppu:22479: tam abhyayād bhago daityaṃ tūrṇam asyantam antikāt / HV_App.I,42B.1214 /
GE07hv_apppu:22480: mātaṅgam iva mātaṅgo vṛṣaḥ prativṛṣaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1215 //
GE07hv_apppu:22481: tau pragṛhya mahāvegau dhanuṣī bhārasādhane / HV_App.I,42B.1216 /
GE07hv_apppu:22482: prācchādayetām anyonyaṃ takṣamāṇau raṇe śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1217 //
GE07hv_apppu:22483: tayoḥ sutumulaṃ yuddham āsīd ghoraṃ mahāraṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1218 /
GE07hv_apppu:22486: vyadārayetām anyonyaṃ kārṣṇe nirbhidya varmaṇī // HV_App.I,42B.1221 //
GE07hv_apppu:22487: tau tu vikṣatasarvāṅgau rudhireṇa samukṣitau / HV_App.I,42B.1222 /
GE07hv_apppu:22488: [k: K3 Ñ2 B Dn D5 (marg.) T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22490: takṣamānau śitair bāṇair nānvīkṣitum aśaknutām // HV_App.I,42B.1223 //
GE07hv_apppu:22491: atha vivyādha samare tvaramāṇo 'suro bhagam / HV_App.I,42B.1224 /
GE07hv_apppu:22493: garutmān iva cākāśe pothayāno mahoragān / HV_App.I,42B.1226 /
GE07hv_apppu:22494: nārācā nyapatan dehe tūrṇaṃ śambaracoditāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1227 //
GE07hv_apppu:22495: tān antarikṣe nārācān bhagaś ciccheda patriṇā / HV_App.I,42B.1228 /
GE07hv_apppu:22499: [k: For line 1231, B T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22501: tadā tat suciraṃ kālaṃ yuddhaṃ samam ivābhavat / HV_App.I,42B.1232 /
GE07hv_apppu:22502: śambarasya ca māyābhir nādṛśyata tato 'mbaram // HV_App.I,42B.1233 //
GE07hv_apppu:22503: dorbhyāṃ vikṣipataś cāpaṃ rathaṃ viṣṭabhya tiṣṭhataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1234 /
GE07hv_apppu:22504: śrūyate dhanuṣaḥ śabdo visphūrjitam ivāśaṇeḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1235 //
GE07hv_apppu:22505: sa bhagasya hayān hatvā chittvā ca dhvajam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1236 /
GE07hv_apppu:22506: abhyavarṣac charair enaṃ parjanya iva vṛṣṭimān // HV_App.I,42B.1237 //
GE07hv_apppu:22507: na tasyāsīd anirbhinnaṃ gātre dvyaṅgulam antaram / HV_App.I,42B.1238 /
GE07hv_apppu:22509: [k: For line 1239 B1.3 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst., Ds ins. after line 1238:k]
GE07hv_apppu:22511: daityasya cādbhutaṃ divyam astram astreṇa vārayan / HV_App.I,42B.1240 /
GE07hv_apppu:22513: mumoca krodhatāṃ rākṣo didhakṣan daityam āhave / **HV_App.I,42B.1240**69:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22514: māyāyuddhena māyāvī śambaras tam ayodhayat / HV_App.I,42B.1241 /
GE07hv_apppu:22515: avañcayad bhagaṃ daityo māyābhir lāghavena ca // HV_App.I,42B.1242 //
GE07hv_apppu:22517: atha daityo bhagaṃ samyag vañcayām āsa lāghavaiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1242**70:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:22519: bhagas tasya rathaṃ sāśvaṃ śaravarṣair avākirat / **HV_App.I,42B.1242**71:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22521: adṛśyata śaraiś channaḥ śambaraḥ śatadhā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1244 //
GE07hv_apppu:22522: adṛśyat patito bhūmau gatacetā ivāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1245 /
GE07hv_apppu:22523: atha sma yudhyate bhūyaḥ śatadhā śailasaṃnibhaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1246 //
GE07hv_apppu:22524: diśāgajendram ārūḍho dṛśyate sma punar balī / HV_App.I,42B.1247 /
GE07hv_apppu:22525: pādeśamātraś ca punar bhūtvā bhavati śailavat / HV_App.I,42B.1248 /
GE07hv_apppu:22526: mahāmegha iva śrīmāṃs tiryag ūrdhvaṃ ca so 'bhavat / HV_App.I,42B.1249 /
GE07hv_apppu:22529: punaḥ kṛtvā virūpāṇi vikṛtāni ca sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1250 /
GE07hv_apppu:22530: sarvāṃ bhīṣayate senāṃ devānāṃ bhīmadarśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1251 //

GE07hv_apppu:22532: te bhītāḥ prapalāyante siṃhatrastā mṛgā iva / **HV_App.I,42B.1251**73:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:22534: gacchaty ūrdhvagatiṃ ghoro diśaḥ śabdena pūrayan / HV_App.I,42B.1253 /
GE07hv_apppu:22535: nabhastalagataś cāpi varṣate vāsavo yathā / HV_App.I,42B.1254 /

GE07hv_apppu:22540: śatavartmā śataśikho dadāha ca punaḥ surān // HV_App.I,42B.1257 //
GE07hv_apppu:22541: muhūrtāc ca mahāśailaḥ śataśīrṣaḥ śatodaraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1258 /
GE07hv_apppu:22542: adṛśyata divaṃ stabdhvā śataśṛṅga ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1259 //
GE07hv_apppu:22543: yo 'nye daityāś ca sādhyāś ca ye ca viśve ca devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1260 /
GE07hv_apppu:22544: kṣipanty astrāṇi divyāni tāni so 'grasatāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1261 //
GE07hv_apppu:22545: yudhyamānaś ca samare sarathaḥ so 'surottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1262 /
GE07hv_apppu:22548: te bhītāḥ samudaikṣanta tridaśā bhīmavikramam / HV_App.I,42B.1264 /
GE07hv_apppu:22550: sa bhago bhayasaṃtrasto dānavendrasya saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1266 /
GE07hv_apppu:22551: rathaṃ tyaktvā mahābhāgo mahendraṃ śaraṇaṃ gataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1267 //
GE07hv_apppu:22552: parājitya tu taṃ devaṃ dānavendraḥ pratāpavān / HV_App.I,42B.1268 /
GE07hv_apppu:22553: gato yatra mahātejā jātavedā mahāprabhaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1269 //
GE07hv_apppu:22554: sa vahnir vāgbhir ugrābhiḥ kruddhas tarjayate balī / HV_App.I,42B.1270 /
GE07hv_apppu:22555: bhavāmy eṣa hi te mṛtyur ity uktvāntaradhīyata // HV_App.I,42B.1271 //
GE07hv_apppu:22556: etasminn antare caiva brāhmaṇendro mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1272 /
GE07hv_apppu:22557: jaghāna somaḥ śītāstro dānavānāṃ camūṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1273 //
GE07hv_apppu:22559: avadhīd dānavān dṛptān daṇḍapāṇir ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1275 //
GE07hv_apppu:22561: daityeṣu vyacarac chrīmān yugānte kālavac chaśī // HV_App.I,42B.1277 //
GE07hv_apppu:22562: sa karṣan rathajālāni ūruvegena candramāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1278 /
GE07hv_apppu:22563: dadāha dānavān sarvān dāvāgnir iva coditaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1279 //
GE07hv_apppu:22564: mṛdgan rathebhyo rathino gajebhyo gajayodhinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1280 /
GE07hv_apppu:22565: sādinaś cāśvapṛṣṭhebhyo bhūmau cāpi padātinaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1281 //
GE07hv_apppu:22566: śītena vyadhamat sarvān vāyur vṛkṣān ivaujasā / HV_App.I,42B.1282 /
GE07hv_apppu:22568: tad astram abhavat tasya pradigdhaṃ śatruśoṇitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1284 /
GE07hv_apppu:22569: pinākam iva rudrasya kruddhasyābhighnataḥ paśūn / HV_App.I,42B.1285 /
GE07hv_apppu:22570: yugāntakopamaḥ śrīmān daityeṣu vyacarad balī // HV_App.I,42B.1286 //
GE07hv_apppu:22571: āvārya mahatīṃ senāṃ pradravantīṃ punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1287 /
GE07hv_apppu:22572: candraṃ mṛtyum ivāyāntaṃ dṛṣṭvā yodhā visiṣmiyuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1288 //
GE07hv_apppu:22573: yato yataḥ prakṣipati śiśirāstraṃ tamonudaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1289 /
GE07hv_apppu:22574: tatas tato vyaśīryanta daityasainyāni saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1290 //
GE07hv_apppu:22577: taṃ tathā bhīmakarmāṇaṃ gṛhītāstraṃ mahāhave / HV_App.I,42B.1293 /
GE07hv_apppu:22578: dṛṣṭvā śaśāṅkam āyāntaṃ daityānāṃ candrabhāskarau // HV_App.I,42B.1294 //
GE07hv_apppu:22580: chādayetāṃ śaraiś candraṃ vṛṣṭim antāv ivāmbudau // HV_App.I,42B.1296 //
GE07hv_apppu:22582: abhavat sumahāśabdo diśaḥ saṃnādayann iva // HV_App.I,42B.1298 //
GE07hv_apppu:22583: vinadadbhir mahānāgair heṣamānaiś ca vājibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1299 /
GE07hv_apppu:22585: yuyutsavas te saṃrabdhā jayagṛddhā yaśasvinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1301 /
GE07hv_apppu:22586: anyonyam abhigarjanto goṣṭheṣv iva mahāvṛṣāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1302 //
GE07hv_apppu:22587: śirasāṃ pātyamānānāṃ samare niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1303 /
GE07hv_apppu:22588: aśmavṛṣṭir ivākāśe hy abhavat senayos tayoḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1304 //
GE07hv_apppu:22590: patitāni sma dṛśyante śirāṃsi raṇamūrdhani // HV_App.I,42B.1306 //
GE07hv_apppu:22591: viśikhonmathitair gātrair bāhubhiś ca sakārmukaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1307 /
GE07hv_apppu:22592: sahasrābharaṇaiś cānyair vicchinnai ruciraiḥ karaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1308 //
GE07hv_apppu:22593: kavacair āvṛtair gātrair urubhiś candanokśitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1309 /
GE07hv_apppu:22596: āsīt sarvā samākīrṇā muhūrtena vasuṃdharā // HV_App.I,42B.1312 //
GE07hv_apppu:22599: sa saṃprahāras tumulaḥ kaṭukaḥ śoṇitodakaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1315 /
GE07hv_apppu:22600: prāvartata surāṇāṃ ca dānavānāṃ ca saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1316 //
GE07hv_apppu:22601: tasmin mahāhave raudre tumule lomaharṣaṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1317 /
GE07hv_apppu:22606: aśvāś ca paryadhāvanta hatārohā diśo daśa / HV_App.I,42B.1320 /
GE07hv_apppu:22608: devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca gajāśvarathināṃ raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1322 /
GE07hv_apppu:22609: samare tatra śūrāṇāṃ pravarāṇāṃ tarasvinām / HV_App.I,42B.1323 /
GE07hv_apppu:22612: nirjaghnur mahatīṃ senām anyonyasya paraṃtapāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1326 //
GE07hv_apppu:22613: bāhūnām uttamāṅgānāṃ kārmukānāṃ ca saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1327 /
GE07hv_apppu:22615: aśvānāṃ kuñjarāṇāṃ ca rathānāṃ ca varūthināṃ / HV_App.I,42B.1329 /
GE07hv_apppu:22617: gadābhir asibhiḥ prāsair bhallaiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1331 /
GE07hv_apppu:22618: yodhās tatrābhyahanyanta hastyaśvam api tad bahu // HV_App.I,42B.1332 //
GE07hv_apppu:22621: hāhākāro mahāśabdo yodhānām abhavat tadā / HV_App.I,42B.1335 /
GE07hv_apppu:22624: abhavat tumulaḥ śabdo meghānām iva garjatām / **HV_App.I,42B.1336**76:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22625: evaṃ tad abhavad yuddhaṃ devānām asuraiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42B.1337 /
GE07hv_apppu:22627: virocanas tu tatraiva viṣvaksenaṃ mahāhave / HV_App.I,42B.1339 /
GE07hv_apppu:22629: tam āyāntam abhiprekṣya viṣvaksenaḥ surair vṛtaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1341 /
GE07hv_apppu:22631: sādhyasya bāṇābhihatas totrārdita iva dvipaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1343 /
GE07hv_apppu:22634: viṣvaksenaṃ bibhedājau dīptaiḥ saptabhir āśugaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1346 //
GE07hv_apppu:22636: mūrcchām abhijagāmāśu dhvajaṃ cāpy āśrayat prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1348 //
GE07hv_apppu:22637: tataḥ sa punar āśvasya sādhyo yuddhe mano dadhe / HV_App.I,42B.1349 /
GE07hv_apppu:22638: visphārya ca mahācāpaṃ daityamadhye vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1350 //
GE07hv_apppu:22639: virocanaś ca balavān abhyayudhyata sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1351 /
GE07hv_apppu:22640: kṣobhayan surasainyāni samantān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1352 //
GE07hv_apppu:22643: tasya vai yudhyamānasya saṃyuge niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1353**77:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22644: śrūyate tumulaḥ śabdo jīmūtasyeva garjataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1354 //
GE07hv_apppu:22645: jagarja ca mahāghoṣo vinighnan devavāhinīm / HV_App.I,42B.1355 /
GE07hv_apppu:22647: diśo vidrāvayām āsa śaravarṣeṇa dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1357 /
GE07hv_apppu:22649: te prādravanta vitrastā rathebhyo rathinas tadā / HV_App.I,42B.1359 /
GE07hv_apppu:22650: sādinaś cāśvapṛṣṭhebhyo bhūmau cāpi padātayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1360 //
GE07hv_apppu:22657: padātīnāṃ yayuḥ saṃghā yatra devaḥ śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1364 //
GE07hv_apppu:22658: viṣvaksenasya sādhyasya sarvataḥ sa mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1365 /
GE07hv_apppu:22661: padātīnāṃ ca saṃgheṣu vinighnan pratyadṛśyata // HV_App.I,42B.1368 //
GE07hv_apppu:22662: vitatya śyenavat pakṣau sarvataḥ sa varūthinīm / HV_App.I,42B.1369 /
GE07hv_apppu:22663: bhittvā bhittvā mahābāhuḥ śirāṃsy ājāv akṛntata // HV_App.I,42B.1370 //
GE07hv_apppu:22664: sādinaś ca padātāś ca hataśeṣā rathās tathā / HV_App.I,42B.1371 /
GE07hv_apppu:22667: tam ekam abhyadhāvantaṃ siṃhanādaṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.1374 //
GE07hv_apppu:22668: tataḥ so 'siṃ samudyamya javam āsthāya dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1375 /
GE07hv_apppu:22669: cakarta rathinām ājau śirāṃsi ca dhanūṃṣi ca // HV_App.I,42B.1376 //
GE07hv_apppu:22671: virocanaś caran mārgān prakārān ekaviṃśatim // HV_App.I,42B.1378 //
GE07hv_apppu:22672: bhrāntam udbhrāntam āviddham āplutaṃ viplutaṃ plutam / HV_App.I,42B.1379 /
GE07hv_apppu:22673: saṃpātaṃ samudīrṇaṃ ca darśayām āsa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1380 //
GE07hv_apppu:22674: kecid varāsinā rugṇā dānavena mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42B.1381 /
GE07hv_apppu:22675: vineduś chinnavarmāṇo nipetuś ca gatāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1382 //
GE07hv_apppu:22677: vidrutāḥ svāny anīkāni jaghnus tridaśavāraṇāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1384 //
GE07hv_apppu:22678: nipetur urvyām ākāśān nikṛttā dṛḍhadhanvinā / HV_App.I,42B.1385 /
GE07hv_apppu:22679: vividhās tomarāś cāpā mahāmātraśirāṃsi ca / HV_App.I,42B.1386 /
GE07hv_apppu:22680: pratīpam āharan nāgān aśvāṃś ca dṛḍhavikramān / HV_App.I,42B.1387 /
GE07hv_apppu:22681: cakarta rathinām ājau śirāṃsi ca dhanūṃṣi ca // HV_App.I,42B.1388 //
GE07hv_apppu:22682: āplutya rathinaḥ kāṃścit parāmṛśya mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1389 /
GE07hv_apppu:22683: sūtāṃś ciccheda khaḍgena rathān api ca dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1390 //
GE07hv_apppu:22684: muhur utpatato dikṣu dhāvataś ca yaśasvinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1391 /
GE07hv_apppu:22685: mārgāṃś carita vai citrān vyasmayanta tato 'surāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1392 //
GE07hv_apppu:22686: nijaghāna padā kāṃścid ākṣipyānyān apothayat / HV_App.I,42B.1393 /
GE07hv_apppu:22687: khaḍgena cānyāṃś ciccheda nādenānyāṃś ca bhīṣayat // HV_App.I,42B.1394 //
GE07hv_apppu:22688: ūrustambhagṛhītāś ca prapatanty apare bhuvi / HV_App.I,42B.1395 /
GE07hv_apppu:22689: apare daityam ālokya bhayāt prāṇān avāsṛjan // HV_App.I,42B.1396 //
GE07hv_apppu:22690: tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne yuddhe mahati dāruṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1397 /
GE07hv_apppu:22694: kujumbho dānavaśreṣṭho hy aṃśam ādityam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1399 /

GE07hv_apppu:22696: yodhayām āsa samare vṛṣaḥ prativṛṣaṃ yathā / **HV_App.I,42B.1399**80:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:22699: sphuradbhir niśitais tīkṣnaiḥ śarair bahubhir āśugaiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1400**81:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22701: tasya bāṇapathaṃ prāpya nābhyavartanta sarvaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1402 //
GE07hv_apppu:22702: praṇeduḥ sarvabhūtāni babhuḥ satimirā diśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1403 /
GE07hv_apppu:22703: devānām ajayaḥ kruraḥ pratyapadyata dāruṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1404 //
GE07hv_apppu:22706: āpatantaṃ gajānīkaṃ kujambho vīkṣya dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1407 /

GE07hv_apppu:22710: sa gajān gadayā nighnan vyacarat samare balī / HV_App.I,42B.1411 /
GE07hv_apppu:22712: viśīrṇadantāṃś ca bahūn bhinnakumbhāṃś ca vāraṇān / HV_App.I,42B.1413 /
GE07hv_apppu:22713: akarod dānavaśreṣṭha uddiśyoddiśya tān balī // HV_App.I,42B.1414 //
GE07hv_apppu:22717: kujambhasya ca ye 'mātyā dānavā ghoravikramāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1415 /
GE07hv_apppu:22718: nārācair vividhais tīkṣṇair apāsya gajayodhinaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1416 //
GE07hv_apppu:22719: kṣuraiḥ kṣuraprair bhallaiś ca pītair añjalikaiḥ śitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1417 /
GE07hv_apppu:22721: śirobhiḥ prapatadbhiś ca gaganaṃ pratyapūryata / HV_App.I,42B.1419 /
GE07hv_apppu:22722: aśmavṛṣṭir ivābhāti bāhubhiś ca sahāṅkuśaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1420 //
GE07hv_apppu:22724: adṛśyanta mahārāja tālā viśiraso yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1422 //
GE07hv_apppu:22726: jaghānaikeṣuṇā kruddhas tataḥ sa vimukho 'bhavat // HV_App.I,42B.1424 //
GE07hv_apppu:22728: vinighnan pravarān sainyān gadayā balināṃ varaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1426 //
GE07hv_apppu:22730: apaśyanta surāḥ sarve parvatān iva pātitān // HV_App.I,42B.1428 //
GE07hv_apppu:22731: kujambhasya ca mārgeṣu viśīrṇās te mahāgajāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1429 /
GE07hv_apppu:22732: vajrāhatā ivendreṇa viśīrṇā iva parvatāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1430 //
GE07hv_apppu:22733: apaśyaṃs tridaśāḥ sarve mūrtimantam ivāntakam / HV_App.I,42B.1431 /
GE07hv_apppu:22735: sa babhau tāṃ gadāṃ bibhrat prokṣitāṃ gajaśoṇitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1433 /
GE07hv_apppu:22737: [k: K1.2 Ñ1.2 B Dn D4 T1 G3 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22738: yathā hi bhagavān kruddhaḥ prajānāṃ saṃkṣaye purā / **HV_App.I,42B.1434**83:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22740: gopāla iva daṇḍena kālayan sa mahāgajān / HV_App.I,42B.1436 /
GE07hv_apppu:22741: kruddhaṃ kālam ivākāśe daṇḍam udyamya dānavam / HV_App.I,42B.1437 /
GE07hv_apppu:22742: apaśyanta surāḥ sarve kujambhaṃ bhīmavikramam // HV_App.I,42B.1438 //
GE07hv_apppu:22743: hatārohās tu tatrānye prabhinnā vāraṇottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1439 /
GE07hv_apppu:22744: te hanyamānā gadayā bāṇaiś ca bhṛśavikṣatāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1440 //
GE07hv_apppu:22746: svāny anīkāni mṛdnantaḥ prādravanta mahāgajāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1442 //
GE07hv_apppu:22747: mahāvāta ivābhrāṇi vidhaman gadayā gajān / HV_App.I,42B.1443 /
GE07hv_apppu:22750: atiṣṭat samare daityaḥ kālaḥ saṃvartako yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1444 //
GE07hv_apppu:22751: tataḥ sarvāṇi sainyāni devarājasya śāsanāt / HV_App.I,42B.1445 /
GE07hv_apppu:22752: abhyadravanta ditijān nandanto bhairavān ravān // HV_App.I,42B.1446 //
GE07hv_apppu:22755: taṃ balaugham aparyantaṃ devānāṃ sudurāsadam / HV_App.I,42B.1447 /
GE07hv_apppu:22757: āpatantam apāraṃ ca samudram iva parvaṇi / **HV_App.I,42B.1447**86:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22759: āpatantaṃ suduṣpāraṃ rajasā sarvato vṛtam / HV_App.I,42B.1449 /
GE07hv_apppu:22761: tad āścaryam apaśyanta aśraddheyam ivādbhutam / HV_App.I,42B.1451 /
GE07hv_apppu:22762: [k: Ds1 M2.4 subst. for line 1452, B1. 3 Ds2 G5 ins. after line 1451 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22764: udīrṇāṃ pṛtanāṃ sarvāṃ sāśvāṃ sarathakuñjarām // HV_App.I,42B.1452 //
GE07hv_apppu:22765: āvārya samare 'tiṣṭhat kujambhas tarasā balī / HV_App.I,42B.1453 /
GE07hv_apppu:22766: sainyārṇavaṃ devatānāṃ girir merur ivācalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1454 /
GE07hv_apppu:22767: anīkinīṃ kujambhas tu gadayā saṃnyavārayat // HV_App.I,42B.1455 //
