GE07hv_apppu:22769: sā tathā vāritā senā vihvalābhūn nirudyamā / **HV_App.I,42B.1455**88:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:22770: tasmiṃs tathā vartamāne saṃprahāre sudāruṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1456 /
GE07hv_apppu:22771: asilomā hariś caiva jaghnatus tau parasparam // HV_App.I,42B.1457 //
GE07hv_apppu:22772: asilomā tu balavān dānavo dānavādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1458 /
GE07hv_apppu:22774: tapaty arka ivāmoghaḥ surasainyāni saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1460 //
GE07hv_apppu:22776: śarair megha ivāvarṣad devānīkaṃ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,42B.1462 //
GE07hv_apppu:22778: raudraḥ krūro durādharṣo durvāryo dhvajinīmukhe // HV_App.I,42B.1464 //
GE07hv_apppu:22779: yudhyate daivataiḥ sārdhaṃ grasamāna iva prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1465 /
GE07hv_apppu:22787: tiṣṭhate dānavaśreṣṭhaḥ saṃyuge vyāghravad balī / HV_App.I,42B.1471 /
GE07hv_apppu:22797: hayān gajān padātīṃś ca rathāṃś ca tarasā bahūn // HV_App.I,42B.1478 //
GE07hv_apppu:22798: nyamajjayat sa samare paravīrān mahārathān / HV_App.I,42B.1479 /
GE07hv_apppu:22799: aplāvayat sa devaughān dāruṇo dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1480 //
GE07hv_apppu:22800: prāmardata yudhi śrīmān yudhi śreṣṭo yudhi sthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1481 /
GE07hv_apppu:22802: saṃnaddhaṃ tatra yudhyantaṃ jvalantam iva pāvakam / HV_App.I,42B.1483 /
GE07hv_apppu:22803: madhyaṃdinagataṃ sūryaṃ jvalantam iva tejasā / HV_App.I,42B.1484 /
GE07hv_apppu:22804: na śekuḥ sarvabhūtāni dānavaṃ prasamīkṣitum // HV_App.I,42B.1485 //
GE07hv_apppu:22805: yathā prarūḍhe gharmānte dahet kakṣaṃ hutāśanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1486 /
GE07hv_apppu:22806: tathā suravarān daityo dahate balatejasā // HV_App.I,42B.1487 //
GE07hv_apppu:22807: devānāṃ dānavānāṃ ca balaṃ nardati dāruṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1488 /
GE07hv_apppu:22808: vimūḍham abhavat sarvam ākulaṃ ca samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1489 //
GE07hv_apppu:22810: āryāṃ buddhiṃ samādāya na tyajanti mahāraṇam // HV_App.I,42B.1491 //
GE07hv_apppu:22811: tad utpiñjalakaṃ yuddhaṃ abhaval lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1492 /
GE07hv_apppu:22814: astraghātāṃś ca vividhān dānavānāṃ tadā raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1495 /
GE07hv_apppu:22815: anyonyaṃ mūḍhacittās te nijaghnur vyākulīkṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1496 /
GE07hv_apppu:22816: svān parān nābhijānanti vimūḍhāḥ śastrapāṇayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1497 //
GE07hv_apppu:22817: śiroruheṣu saṃgṛhya kaścic chūrasya saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1498 /
GE07hv_apppu:22819: bāhubhir muṣṭibhiś caiva vajrakalpaiḥ sudāruṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1500 /
GE07hv_apppu:22820: praharanti raṇe vīrā āttaśastrāḥ parasparam // HV_App.I,42B.1501 //
GE07hv_apppu:22822: saṃkule tumule yuddhe vartamāne mahābhaye // HV_App.I,42B.1503 //
GE07hv_apppu:22823: hayo hayaṃ gajo nāgaṃ vīro vīraṃ mahāhave / HV_App.I,42B.1504 /
GE07hv_apppu:22824: abhyadravañ jighāṃsanto hy asamañja samāhave // HV_App.I,42B.1505 //
GE07hv_apppu:22825: [k: For line 1505, B T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22827: asurāś ca surāś caiva vikramāḍhyā mahārathāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1506 /
GE07hv_apppu:22828: juhvataḥ samare prāṇān nijaghnur itaretaram // HV_App.I,42B.1507 //
GE07hv_apppu:22830: hastaiḥ pādaiś ca yudhyante dānavās tridaśaiḥ saha // HV_App.I,42B.1509 //
GE07hv_apppu:22831: haris tu niśitaṃ bhallaṃ preṣayām āsa saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1510 /
GE07hv_apppu:22832: sa tasya ghanuṣaḥ koṭiṃ chittvā bhūmāv apātayat / HV_App.I,42B.1511 /
GE07hv_apppu:22833: punaś cāpi pṛṣatkānāṃ śatāni nataparvaṇām / HV_App.I,42B.1512 /
GE07hv_apppu:22834: prāhiṇot sahasā tasya dānavendrasya saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1513 //
GE07hv_apppu:22835: tasya dehe vimuktās te mārutena samīritāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1514 /
GE07hv_apppu:22836: magnārdhakāyā viviśuḥ pannagā iva parvate // HV_App.I,42B.1515 //
GE07hv_apppu:22837: sa tair nipatitair gātraiḥ kṣaradbhir asṛg avyayam / HV_App.I,42B.1516 /
GE07hv_apppu:22838: babhau daityo mahābāhur merur dhātum ivotsṛjan // HV_App.I,42B.1517 //
GE07hv_apppu:22839: [k: Ñ1.2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22841: tato 'silomā saṃkruddhaḥ pragṛhyānyan mahad dhanuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1518 /
GE07hv_apppu:22842: rukmapuṅkhāṃś ca niśitān preṣayām āsa sāyakān // HV_App.I,42B.1519 //
GE07hv_apppu:22843: tais tu marmasu vivyādha sarpānalaviṣopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1520 /
GE07hv_apppu:22844: gātraṃ saṃchādayām āsa mahābhrair iva parvatam // HV_App.I,42B.1521 //
GE07hv_apppu:22845: [k: For line 1521, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22847: bhūyaḥ saṃdhāya ca śaraṃ mumocāntakasaṃnibham / HV_App.I,42B.1522 /
GE07hv_apppu:22850: supuṅkhaṃ sūryasaṃkāśaṃ bāṇam apratimaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1523 //
GE07hv_apppu:22852: mumoha sahasā devo bhūmau cāpi papāta ha // HV_App.I,42B.1525 //
GE07hv_apppu:22853: tato hāhākṛtāḥ sarve deve bhūtalam āśrite / HV_App.I,42B.1526 /
GE07hv_apppu:22856: jagat sadevam āvignaṃ yathārkapatane tathā // HV_App.I,42B.1527 //
GE07hv_apppu:22857: parivāraṃ tu samare tasya hatvā mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1528 /
GE07hv_apppu:22859: [k: K1.2 Ñ2 V3 B Dn Ds D4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22861: pragṛhya kārmukaṃ ghoraṃ gataḥ śakrarathaṃ prati // **HV_App.I,42B.1529**96:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:22862: tatraiva tu mahāyuddhe sasainyāv aśvināv ubhau / HV_App.I,42B.1530 /
GE07hv_apppu:22863: prayuddhau saha vṛtreṇa balinā devatāriṇā // HV_App.I,42B.1531 //
GE07hv_apppu:22865: āsādya so 'śvinau daityaḥ sthito girir ivācalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1533 //
GE07hv_apppu:22866: tataḥ śaṅkham upādhmāya dviṣatāṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1534 /
GE07hv_apppu:22873: bhallair vṛtraḥ praciccheda bhīmavegaravais tathā / HV_App.I,42B.1541 /
GE07hv_apppu:22874: antarikṣacarāṇāṃ ca bhūmiṣṭhānāṃ ca garjatām / HV_App.I,42B.1542 /
GE07hv_apppu:22875: śarair vivyādha gātrāṇi devānāṃ priyadarśanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1543 //
GE07hv_apppu:22879: nikṛttāny eva dṛśyante śarīrāṇi śirāṃsi ca // HV_App.I,42B.1545 //
GE07hv_apppu:22885: avidhyat sabalān kruddhaḥ sāyakair marmabhedibhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1551 //
GE07hv_apppu:22886: nadato vividhān nādān arditasyāpi sāyakaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1552 /
GE07hv_apppu:22887: na moham asurendrasya dadṛśus tridaśā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1553 //
GE07hv_apppu:22889: paraśvadhaiś ca śūlaiś ca pravavarṣur mahārathāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1555 //
GE07hv_apppu:22890: tato vṛtraḥ susaṃkruddhas tais tadābhyardito balāt / HV_App.I,42B.1556 /
GE07hv_apppu:22891: [k: For line 1556, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:22893: abhyavarṣac chitair bāṇais tān sarvān satyavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1557 //
GE07hv_apppu:22897: uttarāṃ diśam ājagmus trāsitā dṛḍhadhanvanā // HV_App.I,42B.1561 //
GE07hv_apppu:22899: prāvartata raṇe vṛtras trāsayānaś carācarān // HV_App.I,42B.1563 //
GE07hv_apppu:22900: tatraikas tu mahābāhur asiśūladharaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1564 /
GE07hv_apppu:22901: abhyadhāvata daityendraṃ vṛtram apratimaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1565 //
GE07hv_apppu:22904: tam āpatantaṃ saṃprekṣya prabhinnam iva vāraṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1566 /
GE07hv_apppu:22908: tāṃ pragṛhya mahābhīmām adrisāramayīṃ dṛḍhām / HV_App.I,42B.1570 /
GE07hv_apppu:22909: aśvinaṃ sahasāgamya tāḍayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.1571 //
GE07hv_apppu:22910: dīpyamānaṃ tataḥ śūlam aśvī suvipulaṃ dṛḍham / HV_App.I,42B.1572 /
GE07hv_apppu:22913: aśvinaṃ sahasā bhartsya garutmān iva pannagam // HV_App.I,42B.1575 //
GE07hv_apppu:22914: so 'ntarikṣāt samutpatya vidhūya mahatīṃ gadām / HV_App.I,42B.1576 /
GE07hv_apppu:22916: gadayābhihataḥ so 'śvī tyaktvā śūlam anuttamam / HV_App.I,42B.1578 /
GE07hv_apppu:22917: prayātaḥ sahasā tatra yatra yudhyati vāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1579 //
GE07hv_apppu:22918: parājitya tu saṃgrāme so 'śvinaṃ bhīmavikramam / HV_App.I,42B.1580 /
GE07hv_apppu:22919: jayaśriyā sevyamāno vṛtro yuddhe vyavasthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1581 //
GE07hv_apppu:22921: tatraiva tu mahāyuddhe raṇājir devasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1582 /
GE07hv_apppu:22922: yudhyate saha daityena ekacakreṇa dhīmatā // HV_App.I,42B.1583 //
GE07hv_apppu:22924: ekacakrasya sainyaṃ tac charavarṣair avākirat // HV_App.I,42B.1585 //
GE07hv_apppu:22926: śūlāni ca bhuśuṇḍīś ca kṣipanti sma mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1587 //
GE07hv_apppu:22928: aśivaṃ ditijair muktaṃ durnivāryaṃ carācaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1589 //
GE07hv_apppu:22931: turaṃgamāṇāṃ tu śataṃ tasya yuktaṃ mahārathe / HV_App.I,42B.1592 /
GE07hv_apppu:22933: teṣāṃ ca raṇapātena cakranemisvanena ca / HV_App.I,42B.1594 /
GE07hv_apppu:22935: tasya bāṇanipātaiś ca hatā vai śataśaḥ surāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1595 //
GE07hv_apppu:22936: tataḥ sa laghubhiś citraiḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1596 /
GE07hv_apppu:22937: āyudhān acchinat kruddhaḥ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1597 //
GE07hv_apppu:22939: gamitāḥ prakṣayaṃ kecit tridaśair dānavā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1599 //
GE07hv_apppu:22940: tataḥ prakṣīyamāṇāṃs tān utprekṣya ca dite sutāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1600 /
GE07hv_apppu:22942: te diśo vidiśaś caiva pratirudhya prahāriṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1602 /
GE07hv_apppu:22943: abhyaghnan niśitaiḥ śastrair devān ditisutā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1603 //
GE07hv_apppu:22944: raṇājir jvalitaṃ ghoraṃ paramaṃ tigmatesam / HV_App.I,42B.1604 /
GE07hv_apppu:22945: mumocāstraṃ mahābāhur mathanaṃ nāma saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1605 //
GE07hv_apppu:22946: tataḥ śastrāṇi śūlāni niśitāni sahasraśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1606 /
GE07hv_apppu:22948: chittvā śūlāṃś ca tān sarvān ekacakro mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1608 /
GE07hv_apppu:22949: abhyavidhyata taṃ sādhyaṃ daśabhir niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1609 //
GE07hv_apppu:22951: jvalitair aparaiḥ śīghrais tān avidhyat sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1611 //
GE07hv_apppu:22952: teṣāṃ chinnāni gātrāṇi visṛjanti sma śoṇitam / HV_App.I,42B.1612 /
GE07hv_apppu:22955: ditijaiḥ kālyamānās te vitresuḥ surasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1615 //
GE07hv_apppu:22956: ekacakro raṇe tiṣṭhann apaśyad gajayūthapān / HV_App.I,42B.1616 /
GE07hv_apppu:22958: mattān suvihitān dṛptān mahāmātrair adhiṣṭhitān / HV_App.I,42B.1618 /
GE07hv_apppu:22961: nyahanat surasainyasya gajān gaja ivāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1621 //
GE07hv_apppu:22962: vikṣaranto mahānāgān bhīmavegāṃs tridhā madam / HV_App.I,42B.1622 /
GE07hv_apppu:22963: meghas tanitanirghoṣān mahādrīn iva cotthitān // HV_App.I,42B.1623 //
GE07hv_apppu:22966: ekacakro gadāpāṇir balavān gadinām varaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1626 /
GE07hv_apppu:22967: utsārayām āsa gajān mahābhrāṇīva mārutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1627 //
GE07hv_apppu:22968: nihatya gadayā sarvāṃs tān gajān gajamardanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1628 /
GE07hv_apppu:22971: pārāvatasavarṇāṃś ca haṃsavarṇāṃs tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42B.1631 //
GE07hv_apppu:22974: niṣūdayām āsa balī gadayā bhīmavikramaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1634 //
GE07hv_apppu:22975: raṇājis tasya samare sarvān dṛṣṭvāsuradviṣaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1635 /
GE07hv_apppu:22980: raṇe 'tiṣṭhata daityendro vidhūma iva pāvakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1640 //
GE07hv_apppu:22981: tasminn eva tu saṃgrāme balodrikto mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1641 /
GE07hv_apppu:22982: mṛgavyādhaṃ mahātmānaṃ yodhayaty ajitaṃ raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1642 //
GE07hv_apppu:22985: gajair mattai rathair divyair vājibhiś ca mahājavaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1645 /
GE07hv_apppu:22986: astraiś ca niśitais tīkṣṇaiḥ śaraiś cānalasaṃnibhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1646 //
GE07hv_apppu:22987: tatas te dadṛśur vīrā dīpyamānaṃ mahāsuraṃ / HV_App.I,42B.1647 /
GE07hv_apppu:22991: taṃ saṃīkṣya mahāyodhaṃ dikṣu sarvāsv avasthitam / HV_App.I,42B.1651 /
GE07hv_apppu:22992: tataḥ praharaṇair ghorair abhipetuḥ samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1652 //
GE07hv_apppu:22993: tasya sarvāyasās tīkṣṇāḥ śarāḥ pītamukhāḥ śitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1653 /
GE07hv_apppu:22995: taiś ca saptabhir āviṣṭaḥ śaraiḥ śirasi cārpitaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1655 /
GE07hv_apppu:22996: utpapāta tadā vyomni diśo daśa vinādayan // HV_App.I,42B.1656 //
GE07hv_apppu:22997: tatas taṃ tridaśo vīraḥ sarathaḥ sajyakārmukaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1657 /
GE07hv_apppu:22998: anuvavrāja saṃhṛṣṭaḥ khaṃ tadā sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1658 //
GE07hv_apppu:22999: [k: For line 1658, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23001: asuraṃ chādayām āsa taṃ vyomni śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1659 /
GE07hv_apppu:23002: vṛṣṭimān iva jīmūto nidāghānte dharādharam // HV_App.I,42B.1660 //
GE07hv_apppu:23003: ardyamānas tatas tena mṛgavyādhena dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1661 /
GE07hv_apppu:23004: cakāra ninadaṃ ghoram ambare jalado yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1662 //
GE07hv_apppu:23005: sa dūraṃ sahasotpatya mṛgavyādharathaṃ prati / HV_App.I,42B.1663 /
GE07hv_apppu:23006: nipapāta mahāvegaḥ pakṣavān vai girir yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1664 //
GE07hv_apppu:23007: babhañja ca tato daityo bhagneṣākūbaraṃ rathaṃ / HV_App.I,42B.1665 /
GE07hv_apppu:23008: mṛgavyādhaḥ parityajya sthito bhūmau mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1666 //
GE07hv_apppu:23009: virathaṃ prekṣya rudraṃ tu tasya pāriṣadāḥ śubhāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1667 /
GE07hv_apppu:23011: sa tu taiḥ sahasotthāya viṣṭhito vimale 'mbare / HV_App.I,42B.1669 /
GE07hv_apppu:23012: mudgarair ardito bhīmair vṛkṣaḥ paraśubhir yathā // HV_App.I,42B.1670 //
GE07hv_apppu:23013: teṣāṃ vegavatāṃ vegaṃ nihatya sa mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1671 /
GE07hv_apppu:23015: sa sālavṛkṣam utpāṭya mahāśākhaṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1673 /
GE07hv_apppu:23016: sarvān pāriṣadān saṃkhye sūdayām āsa dānavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1674 //
GE07hv_apppu:23017: sa tair vikṣatadehas tu rudhiraughapariplutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1675 /
GE07hv_apppu:23020: jaghāna tān pāriṣadān samare dānaveśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1678 //
GE07hv_apppu:23021: tatas teṣv avasanneṣu mahāpāriṣadeṣu vai / HV_App.I,42B.1679 /
GE07hv_apppu:23022: balaṃ tad avaśeṣaṃ sa nāśayām āsa vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.1680 //
GE07hv_apppu:23023: aśvair aśvān gajair nāgān yodhān yodhai rathān rathaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1681 /
GE07hv_apppu:23024: dānavaḥ sūdayām āsa yugānte 'ntakavat prajāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1682 //
GE07hv_apppu:23025: hatair aśvaiś ca nāgaiś ca bhagnākṣaiś ca mahārathaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1683 /
GE07hv_apppu:23026: tridaśaiś cābhavad bhūmī ruddhamārgā samantataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1684 //
GE07hv_apppu:23027: evaṃbalaḥ sa daityendro mṛgavyādhaś ca vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.1685 /
GE07hv_apppu:23028: yudhi prayuddhau balinau prabhinnāv iva vāraṇau // HV_App.I,42B.1686 //
GE07hv_apppu:23029: tatraiva yudhyate rudro dvitīyo rāhuṇā saha / HV_App.I,42B.1687 /
GE07hv_apppu:23030: viśrutas triṣu lokeṣu krodhātmā aja ekapāt // HV_App.I,42B.1688 //
GE07hv_apppu:23031: tat tadā sumahad yuddhaṃ tumulaṃ lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1689 /
GE07hv_apppu:23032: āsīt pratibhayaṃ raudraṃ vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatām // HV_App.I,42B.1690 //
GE07hv_apppu:23035: ājaghānātha saṃkruddho rudro raudrākṛtiḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1693 /
GE07hv_apppu:23037: tasya kāñcanacitrāṅgaṃ rathaṃ sāśvaṃ sasārathim / HV_App.I,42B.1695 /
GE07hv_apppu:23038: jaghāna samare śrīmān kruddho daityasya sāyakaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1696 //
GE07hv_apppu:23039: tasya pāriṣadas tv eko rathaśaktyā mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1697 /
GE07hv_apppu:23040: bibheda samare hṛṣṭo dānavaṃ taṃ stanāntare / HV_App.I,42B.1698 /
GE07hv_apppu:23041: sa bhinnagātro rudreṇa tathā pāriṣadair api // HV_App.I,42B.1699 //
GE07hv_apppu:23042: rudrasya ratham āyāntaṃ sa rāhur dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1700 /
GE07hv_apppu:23050: bibheda samare rudraḥ śaraiḥ saṃnataparvabhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1705 //
GE07hv_apppu:23054: nirbibheda śarais tīkṣṇair meruṃ sūrya ivāṃśubhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1709 //
GE07hv_apppu:23056: patitaiḥ parvatābhaiś ca dānavaiḥ kāmarūpibhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1711 //
GE07hv_apppu:23058: tataḥ sa rudraḥ samare muṣṭinābhihatas tadā / **HV_App.I,42B.1711**102:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23059: papāta sarathaḥ sāśvaḥ purāṭṭa iva bhūtale // **HV_App.I,42B.1711**102:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:23062: virejus te tadā daityāḥ puṣpitā iva kiṃśukāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1712**103:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23067: hatānāṃ svanatāṃ tatra daityānāṃ cāpi nisvanaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1715 /
GE07hv_apppu:23068: surāṇām asurāṇāṃ ca saṃbabhūva mahāsvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1716 //
GE07hv_apppu:23070: rurodha mārgaṃ yodhānāṃ cakṣūṃṣi ca dharārajaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1718 //
GE07hv_apppu:23073: āsīt pratibhayaṃ raudraṃ vīrāṇāṃ jayam icchatāṃ // **HV_App.I,42B.1719**105:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:23077: bhagnaiḥ khaḍgair gadābhiś ca śaktitomarapaṭṭiśaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1721 /
GE07hv_apppu:23078: [k: For line 1721, T2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23080: apaviddhaiś ca bhagnaiś ca rathaiḥ sāṃgrāmikair hataiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1722 //
GE07hv_apppu:23081: nihataiḥ kuñjarair mattais tathā tridaśadānavaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1723 /
GE07hv_apppu:23086: nāgā lakṣaṃ hatā rājann aśvā lakṣatrayaṃ nṛpa // **HV_App.I,42B.1725**107:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:23087: utpetuś ca kavandhāni dikṣu sarvāsu saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1726 /
GE07hv_apppu:23091: ajasya caikapādasya rāhoś caiva mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1730 //
GE07hv_apppu:23092: teṣāṃ tu tatra patatāṃ kruddhānām atinisvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1731 /
GE07hv_apppu:23093: udvarta iva bhūtānāṃ samudrāṇāṃ ca śuśruve // HV_App.I,42B.1732 //
GE07hv_apppu:23094: tatraikas tu sadhūmrākṣaḥ śrīmān rudro munīśvaraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1733 /
GE07hv_apppu:23098: ratham āsthāya ca śrīmāṃs taptakāñcanakuṇḍalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1737 /
GE07hv_apppu:23099: dānavaiḥ saṃvṛtaḥ keśī yudhyate yudhi durjayaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1738 //
GE07hv_apppu:23101: niṣpetur ugravīryasya jvālā hi prasṛtā mukhāt // HV_App.I,42B.1740 //
GE07hv_apppu:23104: tasya niṣpatamānasya dānavaiḥ saṃvṛtasya vai / HV_App.I,42B.1743 /
GE07hv_apppu:23105: babhūva sumahānādaḥ kṣobhayaṃs tridivaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,42B.1744 //
GE07hv_apppu:23106: tena śabdena vitrastā tridaśānāṃ mahācamūḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1745 /
GE07hv_apppu:23108: [k: B Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23111: teṣāṃ yuddhaṃ mahāghoraṃ saṃjajñe lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1747 /
GE07hv_apppu:23113: sarve hy atibalāḥ śūrāḥ sarve parvatasaṃnibhāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1749 /
GE07hv_apppu:23117: teṣāṃ ninadatāṃ śabdaḥ saṃyuge meghanisvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1751 /
GE07hv_apppu:23122: udbhūto devadaityaughaiḥ saṃrurodha diśo daśa // HV_App.I,42B.1754 //
GE07hv_apppu:23124: saṃvṛtā bahurūpeṇa dadṛśur na sma kiṃcana // HV_App.I,42B.1756 //
GE07hv_apppu:23125: na dhvajo na patākā vā na varma turago 'pi vā / HV_App.I,42B.1757 /
GE07hv_apppu:23126: āyudhaṃ syandanaṃ vāpi dṛśyate naiva sārathiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1758 //
GE07hv_apppu:23127: sa śabdas tumulas teṣām anyonyam abhidhāvatām / HV_App.I,42B.1759 /
GE07hv_apppu:23128: nipetur ugravīryasya jvālā hi prasṛtā mukhāt // HV_App.I,42B.1760 //
GE07hv_apppu:23131: tasya niṣpatamānasya dānavaiḥ saṃvṛtasya ca / HV_App.I,42B.1763 /
GE07hv_apppu:23132: śrūyate tumulaḥ śabdo na rūpāṇi cakāśire // HV_App.I,42B.1764 //
GE07hv_apppu:23133: dānavās tatra saṃkruddhā dānavān eva jaghnire / HV_App.I,42B.1765 /
GE07hv_apppu:23134: tridaśās tridaśāṃś caiva nijaghnus tumule tadā // HV_App.I,42B.1766 //
GE07hv_apppu:23135: te parāṃś ca vinighnantaḥ svāṃś ca yuddhe mahāsurān / HV_App.I,42B.1767 /
GE07hv_apppu:23136: rudhirārdrāṃ tathā cakrur medinīm asurāḥ surāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1768 //
GE07hv_apppu:23137: tatas tu rudhiraugheṇa saṃsiktaṃ mṛditaṃ rajaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1769 /
GE07hv_apppu:23140: tridaśā dānavāś caiva jaghnur anyonyam āhave // HV_App.I,42B.1772 //
GE07hv_apppu:23141: bāhubhiḥ parighākārair nighnantaḥ parvatais tadā / HV_App.I,42B.1773 /
GE07hv_apppu:23142: rudrapāriṣadān sarvān sūdayanti sma dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1774 //
GE07hv_apppu:23145: etasminn antare kruddhaḥ keśī dānavasattamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1777 /
GE07hv_apppu:23146: saṃgrāmamarṣī ghoraḥ sa svāny anīkāni harṣayan / HV_App.I,42B.1778 /
GE07hv_apppu:23147: teṣāṃ paramasaṃkruddho vajram astram udīrayat // HV_App.I,42B.1779 //
GE07hv_apppu:23148: vajreṇāstreṇa divyena śastreṇa ca mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42B.1780 /
GE07hv_apppu:23149: mahāpāriṣadāḥ sarvaṃ nihatā yudhi durjayāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1781 //
GE07hv_apppu:23151: viprakīrṇadrumāḥ petuḥ śailā vajrahatā iva // HV_App.I,42B.1783 //
GE07hv_apppu:23152: evaṃ tat tumulaṃ yuddham abhaval lomaharṣaṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1784 /
GE07hv_apppu:23153: keśinaḥ saha rudreṇa tad adbhutam ivābhavat // HV_App.I,42B.1785 //
GE07hv_apppu:23156: vṛṣaparvā tu daityendro viśvam adbhutadarśanam / HV_App.I,42B.1786 /
GE07hv_apppu:23159: dhvajinīṃ prekṣya śatrūṇāṃ sārathiṃ tvarito 'bravīt // HV_App.I,42B.1789 //
GE07hv_apppu:23160: atraiva tāvat tvaritaṃ nayemaṃ sārathe ratham / HV_App.I,42B.1790 /
GE07hv_apppu:23161: ete hi devāḥ sahitā ghnanti naḥ samare balam // HV_App.I,42B.1791 //
GE07hv_apppu:23162: etān nihantum icchāmi samaraślāghino raṇe / HV_App.I,42B.1792 /
GE07hv_apppu:23163: etair hi dānavānīkaṃ kṛtacchidram idaṃ mahat // HV_App.I,42B.1793 //
GE07hv_apppu:23164: tataḥ prajavitāśvena rathena rathināṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1794 /
GE07hv_apppu:23165: arīn abhyahanat kruddhaḥ śarajālair mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1795 //
GE07hv_apppu:23168: na sthātuṃ devatāḥ śaktāḥ kiṃ punar yoddhum āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1796 /
GE07hv_apppu:23170: atyarthaṃ vai raṇe śūrāḥ saṃgrāmeṣv anivartinaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1796**112:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23174: tān mṛtyuvaśam āpannān vaivasvatavaśaṃ gatān / HV_App.I,42B.1798 /
GE07hv_apppu:23176: samīkṣya nihatāñ jñātīn avatasthe mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1799 //
GE07hv_apppu:23177: niṣkumbhaṃ tatra taṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te tridaśottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1800 /
GE07hv_apppu:23178: sametya sahitāḥ sarve taṃ drutaṃ paryavārayan // HV_App.I,42B.1801 //
GE07hv_apppu:23179: vyavasthitaṃ ca niṣkumbhaṃ taṃ dṛṣṭvā tridaśottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1802 /
GE07hv_apppu:23181: vṛṣaparvā tu śailābhaṃ niṣkumbhaṃ samare sthitam / HV_App.I,42B.1804 /
GE07hv_apppu:23182: mahendra iva dhārābhiḥ śaravarṣair avākirat // HV_App.I,42B.1805 //
GE07hv_apppu:23183: acintayitvā tu śarāñ śarīre patitān bahūn / HV_App.I,42B.1806 /
GE07hv_apppu:23184: sthitaś ca pramukhe śrīmān sasainyaḥ sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1807 //
GE07hv_apppu:23185: sa prahasya mahātejā vṛṣaparvāṇam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1808 /
GE07hv_apppu:23186: abhidudrāva vegena kampayann iva medinīm // HV_App.I,42B.1809 //
GE07hv_apppu:23187: tasya tv ādhāvamānasya dīpyamānasya tejasā / HV_App.I,42B.1810 /
GE07hv_apppu:23188: babhūva rūpaṃ durdharṣaṃ dīptasyeva vibhāvasoḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1811 //
GE07hv_apppu:23189: rathaṃ tyaktvā sa tu śrīmān sakrodhaḥ kamalekṣaṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1812 /
GE07hv_apppu:23190: vṛkṣam utpāṭayām āsa mahāśākhaṃ mahocchrayam / HV_App.I,42B.1813 /
GE07hv_apppu:23191: tataś cikṣepa taṃ vṛkṣaṃ niṣkumbho vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1814 //
GE07hv_apppu:23192: taṃ gṛhītvā mahāvṛkṣaṃ pāṇinaikena dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1815 /
GE07hv_apppu:23193: vinadya sumahānādaṃ bhrāmayitvā ca vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.1816 //
GE07hv_apppu:23194: sagajān sagajārohān sarathān rathinas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.1817 /
GE07hv_apppu:23195: jaghāna dānavas tena śākhinā tridaśāṃs tadā // HV_App.I,42B.1818 //
GE07hv_apppu:23196: tam antakam iva kruddhaṃ samare prāṇahāriṇam / HV_App.I,42B.1819 /
GE07hv_apppu:23198: tam āpatantaṃ saṃkruddhaṃ tridaśānāṃ bhayāvaham / HV_App.I,42B.1821 /
GE07hv_apppu:23199: ālokya dhanvī niṣkumbhaś cukrodha ca nanāda ca // HV_App.I,42B.1822 //
GE07hv_apppu:23200: sa tatra niśitair bāṇair viṃśadbhir marmavedhibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1823 /
GE07hv_apppu:23202: śaraśaktibhir ugrābhir daityānām adhipaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42B.1825 /
GE07hv_apppu:23203: [k: K1 V1.3 B Dn Ds D3.4.6 T1.2 G1.4.5 M2.4 subst. for line 1825, Ñ2 cont. after 115** :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23209: viddhaḥ samaramadhyastho rudhiraṃ prāsravad bahu // HV_App.I,42B.1826 //
GE07hv_apppu:23210: udvignā muktakeśāś ca bhagnadarpāḥ parājitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1827 /
GE07hv_apppu:23211: śvasanto dudruvuḥ sarve bhayād vai vṛṣaparvaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1828 //
GE07hv_apppu:23212: anyonyaṃ pramamanthus te trāsitā vṛṣaparvaṇā / HV_App.I,42B.1829 /
GE07hv_apppu:23213: pṛṣṭhatas trāsasaṃvignāḥ prekṣamāṇā muhur muhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1830 //
GE07hv_apppu:23214: tyaktapraharaṇāḥ sarve kṛtās te vṛṣaparvaṇā / HV_App.I,42B.1831 /
GE07hv_apppu:23216: tatraiva tu mahāvīryaḥ prahrādaḥ kālam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1833 /
GE07hv_apppu:23217: yodhayām āsa raktākṣo hiraṇyakaśipoḥ sutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1834 //
GE07hv_apppu:23222: cakāra tvarayā yukto bhārgavo vijayāvahāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1836 //
GE07hv_apppu:23223: hutāśanaṃ tarpayato brāhmaṇāṃś ca namasyataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1837 /
GE07hv_apppu:23225: srajaś ca vividhāś citrā jayārtham abhimantritāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1839 /
GE07hv_apppu:23226: prahlādasya śubhe mūrdhni ābabandhośanāḥ svayam / HV_App.I,42B.1840 /
GE07hv_apppu:23227: kālena saha saṃgrāme prayuddhaḥ sa mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1841 //
GE07hv_apppu:23228: prahrādasyātivīryasya śāntiṃ cakre sa bhārgavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1842 /
GE07hv_apppu:23230: tāni dānavavīrāṇāṃ jepuḥ śāntim anuttamām // HV_App.I,42B.1844 //
GE07hv_apppu:23232: [k: K2.3 D4 ins. after line 1845, K1 after line 1846:k]
GE07hv_apppu:23233: raṇapraveśasāntiṃ te kramāc cakruś ca dānavāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1845**117:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23238: balim abhyarcya rājānaṃ prahradāṃ paryavārayan // HV_App.I,42B.1850 //
GE07hv_apppu:23239: āsthāya vipulaṃ divyaṃ rathaṃ pararathārujam / HV_App.I,42B.1851 /
GE07hv_apppu:23242: meroḥ śikharam ākīrṇaṃ dyaur ivāmbudharāgame // HV_App.I,42B.1854 //
GE07hv_apppu:23248: tasya daityasahasrāṇi prayānty agre mahāraṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1860 //
GE07hv_apppu:23250: saptatir vai sahasrāṇi gajās tāvanta eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.1862 //
GE07hv_apppu:23251: madhye vyūhodarasthas tu kālanemir mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1863 /
GE07hv_apppu:23252: dhanur visphārayan ghoraṃ nanāda prajahāsa ca // HV_App.I,42B.1864 //
GE07hv_apppu:23253: tasmiñ śatasahasrāṇi puro yānti mahādyuteḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1865 /
GE07hv_apppu:23255: sa samaṃ vartamānas tu pakṣābhyāṃ vistṛto mahān / HV_App.I,42B.1867 /
GE07hv_apppu:23258: nānāpraharaṇānāṃ ca parimāṇaṃ na vidyate // HV_App.I,42B.1870 //
GE07hv_apppu:23261: garjanto vinadantaś ca vikrośantaḥ punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1873 /
GE07hv_apppu:23263: tatra tūryasahasrāṇāṃ saṃjajñe nisvano mahān / HV_App.I,42B.1875 /
GE07hv_apppu:23264: hayānāṃ ca gajānāṃ ca garjatām abhitaujasām // HV_App.I,42B.1876 //
GE07hv_apppu:23266: śuśruve śaṅkhaśabdaś ca paṭahānāṃ ca nisvanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1878 //
GE07hv_apppu:23268: nirghoṣeṇa rathānāṃ ca krośatīva nabhaḥsthalam // HV_App.I,42B.1880 //
GE07hv_apppu:23273: antarikṣāt papātolkā vāyuś ca paruṣo vavau / HV_App.I,42B.1885 /
GE07hv_apppu:23274: vamantyaḥ pāvakaṃ ghoraṃ śivāś caiva vavāśire // HV_App.I,42B.1886 //
GE07hv_apppu:23275: prahrādas tu mahāvīryaḥ prahasan yuddhadurmadaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1887 /
GE07hv_apppu:23276: uvāca vacanaṃ śrīmāṃs tatkālakṣamam uttamam / HV_App.I,42B.1888 /
GE07hv_apppu:23278: adya madbāṇanihatān devān drakṣyatha saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1890 //
GE07hv_apppu:23279: bāndhavā nihatā yeṣāṃ tridaśair iha saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1891 /
GE07hv_apppu:23280: adya te nirvapiṣyanti śatrumāṃsāni dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1892 //
GE07hv_apppu:23281: imam adya samudbhūtaṃ reṇuṃ samaramūrdhani / HV_App.I,42B.1893 /
GE07hv_apppu:23284: ākāśaṃ saṃpatiṣyanti khadyotā iva me śarāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1896 //
GE07hv_apppu:23285: hṛṣṭāḥ saṃparimodadhvaṃ devebhyas tyajyatāṃ bhayam / HV_App.I,42B.1897 /
GE07hv_apppu:23286: adyāhaṃ nihaniṣyāmi kālendraṃ dhanuṣā raṇe // HV_App.I,42B.1898 //
GE07hv_apppu:23287: toṣayiṣyāmi rājānaṃ baliṃ balavatāṃ varam / HV_App.I,42B.1899 /
GE07hv_apppu:23288: tridaśān sagaṇān hatvā raṇe cāntakasaṃnibhān // HV_App.I,42B.1900 //
GE07hv_apppu:23289: akṣayāḥ santi me tūṇāḥ śarāś cāśīviṣopamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1901 /
GE07hv_apppu:23290: sthātuṃ me purataḥ śaktāḥ ke raṇe jīvitepsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1902 //
GE07hv_apppu:23291: hatvā ripugaṇāṃs tuṣṭir anurāgaś ca rājasu / HV_App.I,42B.1903 /
GE07hv_apppu:23292: hatasya tridive vāso nāsti yuddhasamā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1904 //
GE07hv_apppu:23293: te bhayaṃ pṛṣṭhataḥ kṛtvā raṇe dānavasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1905 /
GE07hv_apppu:23294: nihatyemān arīn sarvān modadhvaṃ nandane vane // HV_App.I,42B.1906 //
GE07hv_apppu:23295: evam uktvā mahāsainyaṃ prahrādo dānavottamaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1907 /
GE07hv_apppu:23297: sarvāstravidvāñ śūraś ca nityaṃ cāpy aparājitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1909 /
GE07hv_apppu:23300: prahrādasyātivīryasya ye tasya tanayā nijāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1912 //
GE07hv_apppu:23301: tais tu kratuśatair iṣṭaṃ vipulair āptadakṣiṇaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1913 /
GE07hv_apppu:23305: yaṣṭāraḥ kratubhir nityaṃ nityaṃ cādhyayane ratāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1917 /
GE07hv_apppu:23312: veṇuśaṅkharavaiś caiva siṃhanādaiś ca puṣkalaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1924 //
GE07hv_apppu:23313: āplutyāplutya sahasā raṇe vavrur anekaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1925 /
GE07hv_apppu:23316: mahāsurair apy ajitā yodhayanti raṇe 'ntakam // HV_App.I,42B.1928 //
GE07hv_apppu:23318: dānavā māninaḥ sarve sarve svargābhikāṅkṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1930 //
GE07hv_apppu:23321: śuśubhe sā camūr dīptā patākādhvajamālinī / HV_App.I,42B.1931 /
GE07hv_apppu:23323: tataḥ kālas tu niryāto bhīmo bhīmaparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1933 /
GE07hv_apppu:23324: vinadan sumahākāyo vyādhibhir bahubhir vṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1934 //
GE07hv_apppu:23325: dadarśa mahatīṃ senāṃ dānavānāṃ balīyasām / HV_App.I,42B.1935 /
GE07hv_apppu:23329: praviśya dhvajinīṃ caiṣāṃ ghātayām āsa vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.1939 /
GE07hv_apppu:23331: prahrādabalam atyugraṃ prahrādaṃ ca mahābalam / HV_App.I,42B.1941 /
GE07hv_apppu:23332: ājaghāna raṇe kālo daṇḍam udgarapaṭṭisaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1942 //
GE07hv_apppu:23333: śaraśaktyṛṣṭikhaḍgāṃś ca śūlāni musalāni ca / HV_App.I,42B.1943 /
GE07hv_apppu:23334: gadāś ca parighāś caiva vividhāś ca paraśvadhāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1944 //
GE07hv_apppu:23335: dhanūṃṣi ca vicitrāṇi śataghnīś ca sthirāyasīḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1945 /
GE07hv_apppu:23336: pātyante vyādhibhir yuddhe dānavānāṃ camūmukhe // HV_App.I,42B.1946 //
GE07hv_apppu:23338: atisārā jvarāś caiva yakṣmāṇaḥ śleṣmajā rujāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.1946**118:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23340: bahavo vyādhayo yuddhe bahūn asurapuṅgavān / HV_App.I,42B.1947 /
GE07hv_apppu:23341: vyādhīn api ca daityaughā nijaghnur bahavo bahūn // HV_App.I,42B.1948 //
GE07hv_apppu:23342: śūlaiḥ pramathitāḥ kecit kecic chinnāḥ paraśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1949 /
GE07hv_apppu:23343: parighair āhatāḥ kecit kecic ca paramāyudhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1950 //
GE07hv_apppu:23344: kecid dvidhākṛtāḥ khaḍgaiḥ sphurantaḥ patitā bhuvi / HV_App.I,42B.1951 /
GE07hv_apppu:23345: vyādhayo dānavair evaṃ nānāśastrair vidāritāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1952 //
GE07hv_apppu:23346: te cāpi vyādhibhiḥ sarve vividhair āyudhottamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1953 /
GE07hv_apppu:23347: khaḍgaiś ca vipulais tīkṣṇaiḥ prāsatomaramudgaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1954 /
GE07hv_apppu:23348: bhinnāś ca dānavāḥ śūlair nikṛttāś ca paraśvadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1955 //
GE07hv_apppu:23349: mudgaraiḥ paṭṭisaiś caiva vyādhibhiś ca mahābalaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1956 /
GE07hv_apppu:23350: kṣatāḥ śastrair anekaiś ca muṣṭibhiś ca mahāmṛdhe // HV_App.I,42B.1957 //
GE07hv_apppu:23352: ārtasvaraṃ ca nadatāṃ siṃhanādāṃś ca garjatām / HV_App.I,42B.1959 /
GE07hv_apppu:23353: babhūva tumulaḥ śabdaḥ saṃgrāme lomaharṣaṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1960 //
GE07hv_apppu:23354: muṣṭibhiś cottamāṅgāni talair gātrāṇi cāsakṛt / HV_App.I,42B.1961 /
GE07hv_apppu:23355: sāditāni mahīṃ jagmus tiṣṭhatām eva saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1962 //
GE07hv_apppu:23368: parasparaṃ samāsādya tayor yudhi durāsadam / HV_App.I,42B.1975 /
GE07hv_apppu:23369: nāśaṃsanta tadā yodhā jīvitāny api saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1976 //
GE07hv_apppu:23372: patitair nipatadbhiś ca pātyamānaiś ca saṃyuge / HV_App.I,42B.1979 /
GE07hv_apppu:23373: babhūva bhūḥ samākīrṇā yodhair udgatajīvitaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1980 //
GE07hv_apppu:23374: na gṛhṇatoḥ śarān ghorān na ca saṃdadhatos tayoḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1981 /
GE07hv_apppu:23375: antaraṃ dadṛśe kaścit prayatnād api saṃyuge // HV_App.I,42B.1982 //
GE07hv_apppu:23376: laghutvāc ca mahābāhū yuddhaśauṇḍau mahābalau / HV_App.I,42B.1983 /
GE07hv_apppu:23384: hatadarpaṃ tu vijñāya prahrādaḥ kālam āhave / HV_App.I,42B.1987 /
GE07hv_apppu:23385: apayātaṃ ca samarād dviṣantaṃ saṃpratarkya tam // HV_App.I,42B.1988 //
GE07hv_apppu:23387: tanūjaḥ śārṅgiṇa iti bhītaṃ nāma tṛṇānanam / **HV_App.I,42B.1988**120:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23388: matvā vaśagataṃ caiva prahrādo yuddhadurmadaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.1989 /
GE07hv_apppu:23389: tatraivānyāṃ camūṃ bhūyaḥ sa mamarda mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.1990 //
GE07hv_apppu:23390: kālaprahrādayo yuddham abhavad yādṛśaṃ purā / HV_App.I,42B.1991 /
GE07hv_apppu:23391: tādṛśaṃ sarvalokeṣu na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.1992 //
GE07hv_apppu:23393: prahrādaḥ parivṛddho 'tra kālas tv apasṛto raṇāt // HV_App.I,42B.1994 //
GE07hv_apppu:23397: sasainyo yodhayām āsa kṣobhayan yakṣavāhinīm // HV_App.I,42B.1996 //
GE07hv_apppu:23399: ardayām āsa saṃkruddho dhanādhyakṣaṃ pratāpavān // HV_App.I,42B.1998 //
GE07hv_apppu:23401: cakāra kadanaṃ ghoraṃ dhanuṣpāṇir mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2000 //
GE07hv_apppu:23402: āvarta iva saṃjajñe balasya mahato mahān / HV_App.I,42B.2001 /
GE07hv_apppu:23404: tridaśānāṃ śarīrais tu dānavānāṃ ca medinī / HV_App.I,42B.2003 /
GE07hv_apppu:23405: babhūva nicitā ghoraiḥ parvatair iva saṃplave // HV_App.I,42B.2004 //
GE07hv_apppu:23406: merupṛṣṭhaṃ tu raktena rañjitaṃ saṃprakāśate / HV_App.I,42B.2005 /
GE07hv_apppu:23407: sarvato mādhave māsi puṣpitair iva kiṃśukaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2006 //
GE07hv_apppu:23408: hatair vīrair gajair aśvaiḥ prāvartata mahānadī / HV_App.I,42B.2007 /
GE07hv_apppu:23416: tridaśā dānavāś caiva terus tāṃ dustarāṃ nadīm / HV_App.I,42B.2015 /
GE07hv_apppu:23417: yathā padmarajodhvas tāṃ nalinīṃ gajayūthapāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2016 //
GE07hv_apppu:23418: tataḥ sṛjantaṃ bānaughān anuhrādaṃ rathe sthitam / HV_App.I,42B.2017 /
GE07hv_apppu:23419: dadarśa tarasā devo nighnantaṃ yakṣavāhinīm // HV_App.I,42B.2018 //
GE07hv_apppu:23420: kruddhas tato daityabalaṃ sūdayām āsa vittapaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2019 /
GE07hv_apppu:23421: vikṣipann iva khe vāyur mahābhrapaṭalaṃ balāt // HV_App.I,42B.2020 //
GE07hv_apppu:23422: samīkṣya tumulaṃ yuddham anuhrādaś ca bhūpatiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2021 /
GE07hv_apppu:23424: sa dhanur dhanināṃ śreṣṭho vikṛṣya raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,42B.2023 /
GE07hv_apppu:23425: utsasarja śitān bāṇān vitteśasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2024 //
GE07hv_apppu:23426: kuberaṃ prāpya te bāṇā nirbhidya susamāhitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2025 /
GE07hv_apppu:23427: aparān pṛṣṭhato jaghnur vyāsaktān yakṣarākṣasān // HV_App.I,42B.2026 //
GE07hv_apppu:23428: devaḥ śarair abhihato niśitair jvalanopamaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2027 /
GE07hv_apppu:23430: tato vaiśravaṇo rājā kruddho yakṣagaṇaiḥ saha / HV_App.I,42B.2029 /
GE07hv_apppu:23431: vavarṣa śaravarṣāṇi dānavaṃ prati vīryavān // HV_App.I,42B.2030 //
GE07hv_apppu:23432: tad yathā śāradaṃ varṣaṃ govṛṣaḥ śīghram āgatam / HV_App.I,42B.2031 /
GE07hv_apppu:23434: evam eva kuberasya śaravarṣaṃ mahāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2033 /
GE07hv_apppu:23435: nimīlitākṣaḥ sahasā daityaḥ sahati dāruṇam // HV_App.I,42B.2034 //
GE07hv_apppu:23438: utpapāta rathāt tūrṇaṃ kṣitiṃ padbhyām upāgataḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2035**121:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23441: utpāṭya kupito daityas taruṃ phalasamanvitam / HV_App.I,42B.2038 /
GE07hv_apppu:23442: nijaghāna hayāñ śreṣṭhān kuberasya mahājavān // HV_App.I,42B.2039 //
GE07hv_apppu:23443: tasya karma mahāghoraṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve mahāsurāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2040 /
GE07hv_apppu:23445: tayos tu tumulaṃ yuddhaṃ saṃjajñe devadaityayoḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2042 //
GE07hv_apppu:23449: anyonyaṃ vividhaiḥ śastrair ghorair jaghnatur āhave // HV_App.I,42B.2044 //
GE07hv_apppu:23450: tridaśā dānavān yuddhe mathitvā prāṇadaṃs tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2045 /
GE07hv_apppu:23451: dānavais tridaśāś cāpi kruddhair bhuvi nipātitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2046 //
GE07hv_apppu:23452: dānavās tv atha saṃkruddhās tridaśān niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2047 /
GE07hv_apppu:23454: vidāryamāṇā daityaughais tridaśās tu mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2049 /
GE07hv_apppu:23455: amarṣitatarā bhūyaś cakruḥ karmāṇy abhītavat // HV_App.I,42B.2050 //
GE07hv_apppu:23456: te gadābhiḥ subhīmābhiḥ paṭṭiśaiḥ śūlam udgaraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2051 /
GE07hv_apppu:23457: parighaiś ca sutīkṣṇāgrair dānavāḥ pīḍitāḥ suraiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2052 //
GE07hv_apppu:23459: jagṛhus te śilāś caiva drumāṃś cāsurasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2054 //
GE07hv_apppu:23460: te bhīmavegā ditijā nardamānāḥ punaḥ punaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2055 /
GE07hv_apppu:23461: mamanthus tridaśān vīrāñ śataśo 'tha sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2056 //
GE07hv_apppu:23462: tataḥ sutumulaṃ yuddhaṃ teṣāṃ samabhivartata / HV_App.I,42B.2057 /
GE07hv_apppu:23463: śilābhir vipulābhiś ca śataśākhaiś ca pādapaiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2058 /
GE07hv_apppu:23464: parighaiḥ paṭṭisair bhallair bhiṇḍipālaiḥ paraśvadhaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2059 //
GE07hv_apppu:23465: kecin nikṛttaśirasaḥ kecic ca vidalīkṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2060 /
GE07hv_apppu:23466: kecid vinihatā bhūmau rudhirārdrāḥ surāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2061 //
GE07hv_apppu:23468: vibhinnahṛdayāḥ kecic chinnapādāś ca śerate / HV_App.I,42B.2063 /
GE07hv_apppu:23469: vidāritās triśūlaiś ca kecit tatra gatāsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2064 //
GE07hv_apppu:23474: kuberaḥ sa dhanuṣpāṇir dānavān raṇamūrdhani / HV_App.I,42B.2069 /
GE07hv_apppu:23475: diśo vidrāvayām āsa saṃkruddhaḥ śaravṛṣṭibhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2070 //
GE07hv_apppu:23476: kubereṇārditaṃ sainyaṃ vidrutaṃ prekṣya dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2071 /
GE07hv_apppu:23477: abhyadravad anuhrādaḥ pragṛhya vipulāṃ śilām // HV_App.I,42B.2072 //
GE07hv_apppu:23479: śilāṃ tāṃ pātayām āsa kuberasya rathottame // HV_App.I,42B.2074 //
GE07hv_apppu:23480: āpatantīṃ śilāṃ dṛṣṭvā gadāpāṇir dhanādhipaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2075 /
GE07hv_apppu:23481: rathād āplutya vegena vasudhāyāṃ vyatiṣṭhata // HV_App.I,42B.2076 //
GE07hv_apppu:23483: bhaṅktvā rathottamaṃ tasya nipapāta śilā bhuvi // HV_App.I,42B.2078 //
GE07hv_apppu:23484: vimathya tu kuberasya prahrādasyānujo ratham / HV_App.I,42B.2079 /
GE07hv_apppu:23485: surāṇāṃ kadanaṃ cakre saskandhaviṭapair drumaiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2080 //
GE07hv_apppu:23487: drumaiḥ pramathitāṅgāś ca nipetur dharaṇītale // HV_App.I,42B.2082 //
GE07hv_apppu:23489: giriśṛṅgaṃ mahad gṛhya kuberam abhidudruve // HV_App.I,42B.2084 //
GE07hv_apppu:23490: tam āpatantaṃ dhanado gadām udyamya vīryavān / HV_App.I,42B.2085 /
GE07hv_apppu:23491: vinardann āhvayām āsa dānavendraṃ mahābalam // HV_App.I,42B.2086 //
GE07hv_apppu:23492: tasya kruddhasya saṃkruddho gadāṃ tāṃ bahukaṇṭakām / HV_App.I,42B.2087 /
GE07hv_apppu:23494: daityas tu krodhatāmrākṣas taṃ prahāram acintayan / HV_App.I,42B.2089 /
GE07hv_apppu:23497: papāta sahasā bhūmau viśīrṇa iva parvataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2092 //
GE07hv_apppu:23498: vitteśaṃ vihvalaṃ dṛṣṭvā sarve te yakṣarākṣasāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2093 /
GE07hv_apppu:23500: muhūrtaṃ vihvalo bhūtvā prabhur viśravasaḥ sutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2095 /
GE07hv_apppu:23501: [k: K1-3 Ñ1 Dn1 Ds D3.4.6 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23503: utthitaḥ sahasā bhūyaḥ piṅgākṣaḥ sa mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2096 //
GE07hv_apppu:23504: nanāda ca mahānādaṃ trailokyam abhinādayan / HV_App.I,42B.2097 /
GE07hv_apppu:23505: janayann iva nirghoṣaṃ vidhamann iva parvatān // HV_App.I,42B.2098 //
GE07hv_apppu:23506: tam avadhyaṃ tu vijñāya nihataṃ punar utthitam / HV_App.I,42B.2099 /
GE07hv_apppu:23507: prekṣya piṅgākṣam āyāntaṃ dānavā vipradudruvuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2100 //
GE07hv_apppu:23508: tāṃs tu vidravato dṛṣṭvā anuhrādo 'suro 'bravīt / HV_App.I,42B.2101 /
GE07hv_apppu:23509: kālanemiṃ ca nemiṃ ca mahānemiṃ ca dānavam // HV_App.I,42B.2102 //
GE07hv_apppu:23510: ātmānaṃ caiva vīryaṃ ca vismṛtyābhijanaṃ tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2103 /
GE07hv_apppu:23511: kva gacchata bhayatrastāḥ prākṛtā iva dānavāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2104 //
GE07hv_apppu:23512: nivartadhvaṃ mahāvīryāḥ kiṃ prāṇān parirakṣatha / HV_App.I,42B.2105 /
GE07hv_apppu:23513: nālaṃ yuddhāya yakṣo 'yaṃ mahatīyaṃ vibhīṣikā // HV_App.I,42B.2106 //
GE07hv_apppu:23514: etāṃ samutthitām adya dānavānāṃ vibhīṣikām / HV_App.I,42B.2107 /
GE07hv_apppu:23515: vikramya vidham iṣyāmi nivartadhvaṃ mahāsurāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2108 //
GE07hv_apppu:23516: te 'surāḥ saṃnivṛtyātha samadā iva kuñjarāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2109 /
GE07hv_apppu:23519: darpotkaṭā bhujair eva saṃprahāraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.2112 //
GE07hv_apppu:23520: pāṃsubhiś caiva kāṣṭhaiś ca śilābhiś ca mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2113 /
GE07hv_apppu:23521: bāhubhiś ca tathānyonyam ākṣipanti sma vegitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2114 //
GE07hv_apppu:23522: muṣtibhiś ca talaiś caiva nakhapātair mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2115 /
GE07hv_apppu:23523: pādapaiś ca mahāśākhair ayudhyanta raṇājire // HV_App.I,42B.2116 //
GE07hv_apppu:23524: anuhrādas tu saṃkruddho devatānāṃ mahācamūm / HV_App.I,42B.2117 /
GE07hv_apppu:23525: mamantha paramāyasto vanāny agnir ivotthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2118 //
GE07hv_apppu:23526: rudhirārdrās tu bahavaḥ śerate yodhasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2119 /
GE07hv_apppu:23527: nikṛttāḥ patitā bhūmau tāmrapuṣpā iva drumāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2120 //
GE07hv_apppu:23528: anuhrādas tu vikrānto devāṃs tv āśīviṣopamān / HV_App.I,42B.2121 /
GE07hv_apppu:23529: yudhyamānāṃś ca samare vyasṛjan niśitāñ śarān // HV_App.I,42B.2122 //
GE07hv_apppu:23531: aṅgāramiśrāḥ kruddhasya mukhān niścerur arciṣaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2124 //
GE07hv_apppu:23533: vivyādha samare kruddho daṇḍapāṇir ivāntakaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2126 //
GE07hv_apppu:23534: kuberas tu śarair bhinnaḥ samantāt kṣatajokṣitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2127 /
GE07hv_apppu:23535: rudhiraṃ parisusrāva giriḥ prasravaṇair iva // HV_App.I,42B.2128 //
GE07hv_apppu:23537: vihvalaś cāpy abhūd devo muhūrtaṃ dhanadādhipaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2128**124:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23538: [k: Ñ2 V3 cont., K4 Dn D1.2 ins. after line 2128 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:23539: labdhvā sa tu punaḥ saṃjñāṃ roṣaraktekṣaṇaḥ suraḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2128**125:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:23540: gadām atha samāsādya bhīmāṃ bhīmaparākramaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2129 /
GE07hv_apppu:23541: cikṣeṣa daityam uddiśya balāt krodhena mūrchitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2130 //
GE07hv_apppu:23542: aprāptām antare so 'tha tāṃ gadāṃ gadayāsuraḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2131 /
GE07hv_apppu:23543: babhañja vinadan kruddhas tad āścaryam abhūt tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2132 /
GE07hv_apppu:23544: pragṛhya tu gadāṃ bhūyo hy abhidudrāva dānavam // HV_App.I,42B.2133 //
GE07hv_apppu:23545: tam āpatantaṃ dṛṣṭvaiva anuhrādo mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2134 /
GE07hv_apppu:23548: tam antakam ivāyāntam ajeyaṃ sakalaiḥ suraiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2137 /
GE07hv_apppu:23549: grasantam iva taṃ daityaṃ trailokyam akhilaṃ ruṣā // HV_App.I,42B.2138 //
GE07hv_apppu:23550: tam ālokya tathārūpaṃ dhanādhyakṣo raṇaṃ bhayāt / HV_App.I,42B.2139 /
GE07hv_apppu:23551: apahāya yayau tatra yatra śakraḥ surādhipaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2140 //
GE07hv_apppu:23552: tasya cāpi mahat karma dṛṣṭvā vittapatis tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2141 /
GE07hv_apppu:23554: nāhaṃ śakto raṇe yoddhum iti matvā dhanādhipaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2141**126:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:24099: śirobhiḥ praṇatāḥ sarve devāḥ kāśyapa eva ca / **HV_App.I,42B.2551**168:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24100: jagmur mūrdhnā śubhau pādau brahmaṇas te divaukasaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2552 //
GE07hv_apppu:24101: śirobhiḥ spṛśya caraṇau tasya te parameṣṭhinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2553 /
GE07hv_apppu:24103: dṛṣtvā tu tān surān sarvān kaśyapena sahāgatān / HV_App.I,42B.2555 /
GE07hv_apppu:24104: āha brahmā mahātejā devānāṃ prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2556 //
GE07hv_apppu:24107: yadartham iha saṃprāptā bhavantaḥ sarva eva hi / HV_App.I,42B.2557 /
GE07hv_apppu:24108: vijānāmy aham avyagram enam arthaṃ mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2558 //
GE07hv_apppu:24109: bhaviṣyati ca vaḥ so 'rthaḥ kāṅkṣito yaḥ surottamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2559 /
GE07hv_apppu:24110: baler dānavamukhyasya yo vai jetā bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.2560 //
GE07hv_apppu:24111: na khalv asurasaṃghānām eko jetā sa viśvakṛt / HV_App.I,42B.2561 /
GE07hv_apppu:24112: [k: For line 2561, T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 subst. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24114: trailokyasyāpi jetāsau devānām api cottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2562 //
GE07hv_apppu:24115: dhātā caiva hi lokānāṃ viśvayoniḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2563 /
GE07hv_apppu:24117: yo mānyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ yaś ca bhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2563**170:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24119: ātmā vai yena vibhunā kṛto 'jeyo mahātmanā / HV_App.I,42B.2565 /
GE07hv_apppu:24120: baler asuramukhyasya viśvasya jagatas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2566 //
GE07hv_apppu:24122: paraṃ devasya viśvasya jagataḥ śāśvatas tathā / **HV_App.I,42B.2566**171:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24123: prabhavaḥ sa hi sarveṣām asmākam api pūrvajaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2567 /
GE07hv_apppu:24124: acintyaḥ sa hi viśvātmā yogayuktaḥ paraṃ tapaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2568 //
GE07hv_apppu:24125: taṃ devāpi mahātmānaṃ na viduḥ ko 'py asāv iti / HV_App.I,42B.2569 /
GE07hv_apppu:24126: vedātmānaṃ ca viśvaṃ ca sa devaḥ puruṣottamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2570 //
GE07hv_apppu:24127: tasyaiva tu prasādena tasya vakṣye parāṃ gatim / HV_App.I,42B.2571 /
GE07hv_apppu:24128: yatra yogaṃ samāsthāya tapaś carati duścaram // HV_App.I,42B.2572 //
GE07hv_apppu:24129: kṣīrodasyottare kūle udīcyāṃ diśi devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2573 /
GE07hv_apppu:24130: amṛtaṃ nāma paramaṃ sthānam āhur manīṣiṇaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2574 //
GE07hv_apppu:24131: bhavantas tatra vai gatvā tapasā saṃśitavratāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2575 /
GE07hv_apppu:24132: amṛtaṃ sthānam āsādya tapaś carata duścaram // HV_App.I,42B.2576 //
GE07hv_apppu:24139: tasya vratasamāptyāṃ tu yāvad vratavisarjanāt / HV_App.I,42B.2583 /
GE07hv_apppu:24140: amoghāṃ tasya devasya viśve devā mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2584 //
GE07hv_apppu:24143: atha yuṣmān harir brūyāt kim āgamanakāraṇam / **HV_App.I,42B.2584**172:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24144: svāgataṃ vaḥ suraśreṣṭhā matsakāśe vyavasthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2585 /
GE07hv_apppu:24145: kasya kaṃ vā varaṃ devā dadāmi varadaḥ sthitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2586 //
GE07hv_apppu:24146: taṃ kaśyapo 'ditiś caiva varaṃ gṛhṇīta vai tataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2587 /
GE07hv_apppu:24147: praṇamya śirasā pādau tasmai yogātmane tadā // HV_App.I,42B.2588 //
GE07hv_apppu:24148: bhagavān eva naḥ putro bhavatv iti na saṃśayaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2589 /
GE07hv_apppu:24149: uktaś ca parayā bhaktyā tathāstv iti sa vakṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.2590 //
GE07hv_apppu:24150: devā bruvantu te sarve bhrātā nas tvaṃ bhaveti ca / HV_App.I,42B.2591 /
GE07hv_apppu:24151: tathāstv iti ca sa śrīmān vakṣyate sarvalokakṛt // HV_App.I,42B.2592 //
GE07hv_apppu:24152: tasmād evaṃ gṛhītvā tu varaṃ tridaśasattamāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2593 /
GE07hv_apppu:24153: kṛtakṛtyāḥ punaḥ sarve gacchadhvaṃ svaṃ svam ālayam // HV_App.I,42B.2594 //
GE07hv_apppu:24154: tathāstv iti surāḥ sarve kaśyapo 'ditir eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2595 /
GE07hv_apppu:24155: vanditvā brahmacaraṇau gatāḥ saumyāṃ diśaṃ prati // HV_App.I,42B.2596 //
GE07hv_apppu:24158: te 'tītya sāgarān sarvān parvatāṃś ca bahūn kṣaṇāt / HV_App.I,42B.2599 /
GE07hv_apppu:24159: nadīś ca vividhā divyāḥ pṛthivyāṃ surasattamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2600 //
GE07hv_apppu:24160: paśyanti ca sughorāṃ vai sarvasattvavivarjitām / HV_App.I,42B.2601 /
GE07hv_apppu:24161: abhāskarām amaryādāṃ tamasā saṃvṛtāṃ diśam // HV_App.I,42B.2602 //
GE07hv_apppu:24162: amṛtaṃ sthānam āsādya kaśyapena surāḥ saha / HV_App.I,42B.2603 /
GE07hv_apppu:24163: dīkṣitāḥ kāmadaṃ divyaṃ vrataṃ varṣasahasrakam // HV_App.I,42B.2604 //
GE07hv_apppu:24164: prasādārthaṃ sureśāya tasmai yogāya dhīmate / HV_App.I,42B.2605 /
GE07hv_apppu:24167: damena ca sūrāḥ sarve tapo duścaram āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2608 //
GE07hv_apppu:24168: kaśyapas tatra bhagavān prasādārthaṃ mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2609 /
GE07hv_apppu:24169: udīrayati vedoktaṃ yam āhuḥ paramaṃ stavam // HV_App.I,42B.2610 //
GE07hv_apppu:24178_0: * namo 'stu te devadeva ekaśṛṅga varāha vṛṣārciṣa vṛṣasindho vṛṣākape suravṛṣabha
GE07hv_apppu:24178_1: suranirmita anirmita bhadra kapila viṣvaksena dhruvadharma dharmarāja vaikuṇṭha śatāvarta
GE07hv_apppu:24178_2: anādimadhyanidhana dhanaṃjaya śuciśravaḥ agnija vṛṣṇija aja ajaya amṛteśa sanātana
GE07hv_apppu:24178_3: vidhātaḥ trikāma tridhāma trikakut kukudmin duṃdubhe mahānābha lokanābha padmanābha
GE07hv_apppu:24178_4: viriñce variṣṭha bahurūpa virūpa viśvarūpa akṣaya akṣara satyākṣara haṃsākṣara havyabhuja
GE07hv_apppu:24178_5: khaṇḍaparaśo śukra muñjakeśa haṃsa mahadakṣara hṛṣīkeśa sūkṣma paramasūkṣma turāṣāṭ
GE07hv_apppu:24178_6: viśvamūrte surāgraja nīla nistama viraja tamorajaḥsattvadhāma sarvalokapratiṣṭha
GE07hv_apppu:24178_7: śipiviṣṭa sutapaḥ tapogra agra agraja dharmanābha gabhastinābha dharmaneme satyadhāma
GE07hv_apppu:24178_8: satyākṣara gabhastineme vipāpman candraratha tvam eva samudravāsī aja ekapāt sahasraśīrṣa
GE07hv_apppu:24178_9: sahasrasaṃmita mahāśīrṣa sahasradṛk sahasrapāt adhomukha mahāmukha mahāpuruṣa puruṣottama
GE07hv_apppu:24178_10: sahasrabāho sahasramūrte sahasrāsya sahasrākṣa sahasrabhuja sahasrabhuva sahasraśas
GE07hv_apppu:24180: * viśvadeva viśvasaṃbhava sarveṣām eva devānāṃ saubhaga ādau gatiḥ viśvaṃ tvam āpyāyanaḥ viśvaṃ tvām āhuḥ puṣpahāsa paramavaradas tvam eva tvam eva vauṣaṭ *||
GE07hv_apppu:24181: ||* oṃkāra vaṣaṭkāraṃ tvām ekam āhur agryaṃ makhabhāgaprāśinam *||
GE07hv_apppu:24183: * śatadhāra sahasradhāra bhūrda bhuvarda svarda bhūrbhuvaḥsvarda tvam eva bhūtaṃ bhuvanaṃ tvaṃ svadhā tvam eva brahmaśaya brahmamaya brahmādis tvam eva *||
GE07hv_apppu:24185: * dyaur asi pṛthivy asi pūṣāsi mātariśvāsi dharmo 'si maghavāsi hotā potā netā hantā mantā homyahotā parātparas tvaṃ homyahotā tvam eva *||
GE07hv_apppu:24187_0: * āpo 'si viśvavāk dhātrā parameṇa dhāmnā tvam eva digbhyaḥ sruk srugbhāṇḍa ijyo
GE07hv_apppu:24187_1: 'si īḍyo 'si tvaṣṭā tvam eva samiddhaḥ tvam eva gatir gatimatām asi mokṣo 'si yogo
GE07hv_apppu:24187_2: 'si guhyo 'si siddho 'si dhanyo 'si dhātāsi paramo 'si yajño 'si somo 'si yūpo 'si
GE07hv_apppu:24189_0: * sthaviṣṭha sthavira viśvaturāṣāṭ hiraṇyagarbha hiraṇyanābha hiraṇyanārāyaṇa nārāyaṇāntara
GE07hv_apppu:24189_1: nṛṇām ayana ādityavarṇa ādityatejaḥ mahāpuruṣa surottama ādideva padmanābha padmeśaya
GE07hv_apppu:24189_2: padmākṣa padmagarbha hiraṇyāgrakeśa śukla viśvadeva viśvatomukha viśvākṣa viśvasaṃbhava
GE07hv_apppu:24191_0: * bhūrivikrama cakrakrama tribhuvanasuvikrama svavikrama svarvikrama babhruḥ suvibhuḥ
GE07hv_apppu:24191_1: prabhākaraḥ śaṃbhuḥ svayaṃbhūś ca bhūtādiḥ bhūtātman mahābhūta viśvabhuk tvam eva
GE07hv_apppu:24191_2: viśvagoptāsi viśvaṃbhara pavitram asi havirviśārada haviḥkarmā amṛtendhana surāsuraguro
GE07hv_apppu:24191_3: mahādideva nṛdeva ūrdhvakarman pūtātman amṛteśa divaspṛk viśvasthapate ghṛtācy asi
GE07hv_apppu:24191_4: anantakarman druhiṇavaṃśa svavaṃśa viśvapās tvaṃ tvam eva viśvaṃ bibharṣi varārthino nas trāyasveti * ||
GE07hv_apppu:24194: nārāyaṇas tu bhagavāñ śrutvemaṃ paramaṃ stavam / HV_App.I,42B.2611 /
GE07hv_apppu:24199: ākāśāc chuśruvur devā darśanaṃ nopalabhyate / HV_App.I,42B.2616 /
GE07hv_apppu:24200: śrīmān prītamanā devaḥ provāca prabur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2617 //
GE07hv_apppu:24201: prīto 'smi vaḥ suraśreṣṭhāḥ sarve matto viniścayan / HV_App.I,42B.2618 /
GE07hv_apppu:24202: varaṃ vṛṇuta bhadraṃ vo varado 'smi surottamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2619 //
GE07hv_apppu:24204: yadaiva bhagavān prītaḥ sarveṣām amarottama / HV_App.I,42B.2620 /
GE07hv_apppu:24205: tadaiva kṛtakṛtyāḥ sma tvaṃ hi naḥ paramā gatiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2621 //
GE07hv_apppu:24206: yadi prasanno bhagavān dātavyo vā paro yadi / HV_App.I,42B.2622 /
GE07hv_apppu:24208: adityāṃ vai mama śrīmān bhagavān astu vai sutaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2624 //
GE07hv_apppu:24210: aditir devamātā ca etam evārtham uttamam / HV_App.I,42B.2625 /
GE07hv_apppu:24211: putrārthe varadaṃ prāha bhagavantaṃ varārthinī // HV_App.I,42B.2626 //
GE07hv_apppu:24212: yācate putrakāmā vai bhavān putro bhavatv iti / HV_App.I,42B.2627 /
GE07hv_apppu:24213: niḥśreyasārthaṃ sarveṣāṃ devānāṃ hi mahātmanām / HV_App.I,42B.2628 /
GE07hv_apppu:24214: bhrātā bhartā ca dhātā ca śaraṇaṃ ca bhavasva naḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2629 //
GE07hv_apppu:24215: adityāḥ putratāṃ yāte tvayi devāḥ savāsavāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2630 /
GE07hv_apppu:24218: tatas tān abravīd viṣṇur devān kaśyapam eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2632 /
GE07hv_apppu:24219: [k: Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.6 G3.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24220: evaṃ bhavatu bhadraṃ vo yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuta / **HV_App.I,42B.2632**175:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24221: sarveṣām eva yuṣmākaṃ ye bhaviṣyanti śatravaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2633 /
GE07hv_apppu:24222: muhūrtam api te sarve na sthāsyanti mamāgrataḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2634 //
GE07hv_apppu:24224: parair mama sukhaṃ cāpi tat kariṣyāmi cādarāt // **HV_App.I,42B.2634**176:1 //
GE07hv_apppu:24225: parituṣṭo 'smi vo devā mamaivaṃ niyamena ca / **HV_App.I,42B.2634**176:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24228: hatvāsuragaṇān sarvān ye cānye devaśatravaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2635 /
GE07hv_apppu:24230: havyādāṃś ca surān sarvān kavyādāṃś ca pitṝn api // HV_App.I,42B.2637 //
GE07hv_apppu:24234: yathāmanīṣitaṃ kartā gacchadhvaṃ tvaṃ svam ālayam // HV_App.I,42B.2641 //
GE07hv_apppu:24235: evam ukte tu vacane viṣṇunā prabhaviṣṇunā / HV_App.I,42B.2642 /
GE07hv_apppu:24236: devāḥ prahṛṣṭamanasaḥ pūjayanti sma sarvaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2643 /
GE07hv_apppu:24237: viśve devā mahātmānaḥ kaśyapo 'ditir eva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2644 //
GE07hv_apppu:24238: [k: K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Ds D3.4.5 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24239: sādhyā marudgaṇāś caiva śakraś caiva mahābalaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2644**177:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24240: namaskṛtya sureśāya tasmai devāya raṃhase / HV_App.I,42B.2645 /
GE07hv_apppu:24241: prayātāḥ prāgdiśaṃ divyaṃ vipulaṃ kaśyapāśramam // HV_App.I,42B.2646 //
GE07hv_apppu:24242: gatvā tam āśramaṃ tatra brahmarṣigaṇasevitam / HV_App.I,42B.2647 /
GE07hv_apppu:24243: ceruḥ svādhyāyaniratā adityā garbham īpsavaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2648 //
GE07hv_apppu:24244: aditir devamātā ca garbhaṃ dadhre 'titejasam / HV_App.I,42B.2649 /
GE07hv_apppu:24254: pūrṇe varṣasahasre tu prasūtā garbham uttamam / HV_App.I,42B.2651 /
GE07hv_apppu:24255: surāṇāṃ śaraṇaṃ devam asurāṇāṃ vināśanam // HV_App.I,42B.2652 //
GE07hv_apppu:24256: garbhasthena tu devena paritrātāḥ surās tadā / HV_App.I,42B.2653 /
GE07hv_apppu:24258: tasmiñ jāte tu deveśe trailokyasya sukhāvahe / HV_App.I,42B.2655 /
GE07hv_apppu:24264: prajānāṃ patayaḥ sapta sapta caiva maharṣayaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2657 /
GE07hv_apppu:24265: tasya devasya jātasya namaskāraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.2658 //
GE07hv_apppu:24270: marīcir aṅgirāś caiva pulastyaḥ pulahaḥ kratuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2663 /
GE07hv_apppu:24271: dakṣaḥ prajāpatiś caiva namaskāraṃ pracakrire // HV_App.I,42B.2664 //
GE07hv_apppu:24272: aurvo vasiṣṭhaputraś ca stambaḥ kaśyapa eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2665 /
GE07hv_apppu:24273: kapīvān akapīvāṃś ca datto niścyavanas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2666 //
GE07hv_apppu:24274: vasiṣṭhaputrāḥ saptāsan vāsiṣṭhā iti viśrutāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2667 /
GE07hv_apppu:24275: hiraṇyagarbhasya sutāḥ aurvāj jātāḥ sutejasaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2668 //
GE07hv_apppu:24276: gārgyaḥ pṛthus tathaivāgryo yāmyo vāmana eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2669 /
GE07hv_apppu:24277: devabāhur yadudhraś ca parjanyaś caiva somajaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2670 //
GE07hv_apppu:24278: hiraṇyaromā vedaśirāḥ satyanetras tathaiva ca / HV_App.I,42B.2671 /
GE07hv_apppu:24279: viśvo 'tiviśvaś cyavanaḥ sudhāmā virajās tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2672 /
GE07hv_apppu:24280: atināmā sahiṣṇuś ca namaskāram akurvata // HV_App.I,42B.2673 //
GE07hv_apppu:24282: upanṛtyanti deveśaṃ viṣṇum apsarasāṃ varāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2675 //
GE07hv_apppu:24284: bahubhiḥ saha gandharvaiḥ prāgāyata ca tumburuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2677 //
GE07hv_apppu:24285: mahāśrutiś citraśirā ūrṇāyur anaghas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2678 /
GE07hv_apppu:24286: gomāyuḥ sūryavarcāś ca somavarcāś ca saptamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2679 //
GE07hv_apppu:24287: yugapas tṛṇapaḥ kārṣṇir nandiś citrarathas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2680 /
GE07hv_apppu:24288: trayodaśaḥ śāliśirāḥ parjanyaś ca caturdaśa // HV_App.I,42B.2681 //
GE07hv_apppu:24289: kaliḥ pañcadaśaś cātra nāradaś caiva ṣoḍaśaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2682 /
GE07hv_apppu:24290: ṣaṭpañcāśad ime proktās tatraiva tu mahīpate // HV_App.I,42B.2683 //
GE07hv_apppu:24291: hāhā hūhūś ca gandharvau haṃsaś caiva mahādyutiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2684 /
GE07hv_apppu:24294: sarve te devagandharvā upagāyanti keśavam // HV_App.I,42B.2685 //
GE07hv_apppu:24297: nanṛtuś ca mahābhāgā jaguś cāyatalocanāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2688 /
GE07hv_apppu:24298: sumadhyāś cārumadhyāś ca priyamukhyo varānanāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2689 //
GE07hv_apppu:24299: anūkā ca tathā jāmī miśrakeśī alaṃbusā / HV_App.I,42B.2690 /
GE07hv_apppu:24300: marīciḥ śucikā caiva vidyutparṇā tilottamā / HV_App.I,42B.2691 /
GE07hv_apppu:24301: adrikā lakṣmaṇā caiva rambhā tadvanmanoramā // HV_App.I,42B.2692 //
GE07hv_apppu:24302: asitā ca subāhuś ca supriyā subhagā tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2693 /
GE07hv_apppu:24303: urvaśī citralekhā ca sugrīvā ca sulocanā // HV_App.I,42B.2694 //
GE07hv_apppu:24306: nandā sarasvatī caiva tathānyās tatra saṃpadāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2694**181:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24307: puṇḍarīkā sugandhā ca surathā ca pramāthinī / HV_App.I,42B.2695 /
GE07hv_apppu:24308: nandā sārasvatī caiva tathānyās tatra saṃghaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2696 //
GE07hv_apppu:24309: menakā sahajanyā ca parṇikā puñjikasthalā / HV_App.I,42B.2697 /
GE07hv_apppu:24310: etāś cāpsaraso 'nyāś ca pranṛtyanti sahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2698 //
GE07hv_apppu:24311: dhātāryamā ca mitraś ca varuṇo 'ṃśo bhagas tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2699 /
GE07hv_apppu:24312: indro vivasvān pūṣā ca tvaṣṭā ca savitā tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2700 /
GE07hv_apppu:24313: kathito viṣṇur ity evaṃ kāśyapeyo gaṇas tathā // HV_App.I,42B.2701 //
GE07hv_apppu:24314: ity ete dvādaśādityā jvalantaḥ sūryavarcasaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2702 /
GE07hv_apppu:24315: cakrus tasya sureśasya namaskāraṃ mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2703 //
GE07hv_apppu:24316: mṛgavyādhaś ca sarpaś ca nirṛtiś ca mahāyaśāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2704 /
GE07hv_apppu:24318: dahano 'atheśvaraś caiva kapālī ca viśāṃ pate / HV_App.I,42B.2706 /
GE07hv_apppu:24319: sthāṇur bhagaś ca bhagavān rudras tatrāvatasthire // HV_App.I,42B.2707 //
GE07hv_apppu:24321: stāṇuś ca bhagavān rudras tathā ekādaśāpare / **HV_App.I,42B.2707**182:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24322: aśvinau vasavaś cāṣṭau marutaś ca mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2708 /
GE07hv_apppu:24323: viśvedevāś ca sādhyāś ca tasya prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2709 /
GE07hv_apppu:24325: kacchapaś cāpahantā ca takṣakaś ca mahābalaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2711 //
GE07hv_apppu:24328: adhṛṣyās tejasā yuktā mahākrodhā mahābalāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2712 /
GE07hv_apppu:24329: ete nāgā mahātmānas tasmai prāñjalayaḥ sthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2713 //
GE07hv_apppu:24331: ete cānye ca bahavo nāgās tasya mahātmanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2713**184:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24333: tārkṣyaś cāriṣṭanemiś ca garuḍaś ca mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2714 /
GE07hv_apppu:24334: aruṇaś cāruṇiś caiva vainateyā hy upasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2715 //
GE07hv_apppu:24338: ṛṣayaḥ pitaraś caiva somapāś cāmbupāś ca ye // **HV_App.I,42B.2715**185:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:24339: trailokyam adahat kṛtsnaṃ sādhyā ye ca tapodhanāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2715**185:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:24341: pitāmahaś ca bhagavān svayam āgamya lokakṛt / HV_App.I,42B.2716 /
GE07hv_apppu:24344: prāha devaguruḥ śrīmān saha sarvair mahātmabhiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2717 //
GE07hv_apppu:24345: yasmāt prasūyate lokaḥ prabhaviṣṇuḥ sanātanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2718 /
GE07hv_apppu:24346: tasmāl lokeśvaraḥ śrīmān viṣṇur eva bhavatv ayam // HV_App.I,42B.2719 //
GE07hv_apppu:24347: evam uktvā tu bhagavān sārdhaṃ devarṣibhiḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2720 /
GE07hv_apppu:24348: namas kṛtvā sureśāya jagāma tridivaṃ punaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2721 //
GE07hv_apppu:24349: sa tu jātaḥ sureśānaḥ kaśyapasyātmajaḥ prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2722 /
GE07hv_apppu:24352: utphullalocanāḥ sarvāḥ paśyanty apsarasas tadā // HV_App.I,42B.2725 //
GE07hv_apppu:24354: yadi bhāḥ sadṛśī sā syād bhāsas tasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2727 //
GE07hv_apppu:24355: surarṣipratimaḥ śrīmān bhūr bhuvo bhūtabhāvanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2728 /
GE07hv_apppu:24357: yo gatiḥ puṇyakīrtīnām agatiḥ pāpakarmiṇām / HV_App.I,42B.2730 /
GE07hv_apppu:24358: yogasiddhaṃ mahātmānaṃ yaṃ vidur yogam uttamam // HV_App.I,42B.2731 //
GE07hv_apppu:24359: yasyāṣṭaguṇam aiśvaryaṃ yam āhur devasattamam / HV_App.I,42B.2732 /
GE07hv_apppu:24360: yaṃ prāpya śāśvataṃ viprā niyatā mokṣakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2733 /
GE07hv_apppu:24363: yaṃ prāhuḥ śāśvataṃ divyaṃ gīyatāṃ mokṣakāñkṣiṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2733**187:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24364: janmato maraṇāc caiva mucyante bhavabhīravaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2734 //
GE07hv_apppu:24365: yad etat tapa ity āhuḥ sarvāśrayanivāsinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2735 /
GE07hv_apppu:24366: sevante yaṃ yatāhārā duścaraṃ vratam āsthitāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2736 //
GE07hv_apppu:24367: yo 'nanta iti nāgeṣu sevyate sarvabhogibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2737 /
GE07hv_apppu:24369: yo yajña iti viprendrair ijyate svargalipsubhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2739 /
GE07hv_apppu:24370: nānāsthānagataḥ śrīmān ekaḥ kavir anuttamaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2740 //
GE07hv_apppu:24371: yaṃ vedā gānti vettāraṃ yajñabhāgapradāyinam / HV_App.I,42B.2741 /
GE07hv_apppu:24373: sa prāha tridaśān sarvān vācā vai parayā vibhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2743 /
GE07hv_apppu:24374: jānann api mahātejā gato yogena bālatām // HV_App.I,42B.2744 //
GE07hv_apppu:24375: kiṃ karomi suraśreṣṭhāḥ kaṃ varaṃ ca dadāmi vaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2745 /
GE07hv_apppu:24376: yat kāṅkṣitaṃ vaḥ sarveṣāṃ tad vai brūta mudā yutāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2746 //
GE07hv_apppu:24377: tasya tad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāmanasya mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2747 /
GE07hv_apppu:24378: sarve te hṛṣṭamanaso devāḥ kaśyapanandanāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2748 /
GE07hv_apppu:24379: ūcuḥ prāñjalayo viṣṇuṃ surāḥ śakrapurogamāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2749 //
GE07hv_apppu:24380: brahmaṇo varadānena hṛtaṃ no nikhilaṃ jagat / HV_App.I,42B.2750 /
GE07hv_apppu:24381: tapasā mahatā caiva vikrameṇa damena ca // HV_App.I,42B.2751 //
GE07hv_apppu:24383: avadhyaḥ kila sarveśāṃ so 'smākaṃ devasattama // HV_App.I,42B.2753 //
GE07hv_apppu:24384: bhavān prabhavate tasya nānyaḥ kaścana suvrata / HV_App.I,42B.2754 /
GE07hv_apppu:24385: tat prapadyāmahe sarvaṃ bhavantaṃ śaraṇārthinaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2755 /
GE07hv_apppu:24387: ṛṣīṇāṃ ca hitārthāya lokānāṃ ca sureśvara // HV_App.I,42B.2757 //
GE07hv_apppu:24388: priyārthaṃ ca tathādityāḥ kaśyapasya tathaiva ca // HV_App.I,42B.2758 //
GE07hv_apppu:24389: kavyaṃ pitṝṇām ucitaṃ surāṇāṃ havyam uttamam / HV_App.I,42B.2759 /
GE07hv_apppu:24391: asmākaṃ ca hitārthāya trailokyasya ca sattama / **HV_App.I,42B.2759**188:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24394: priyahetor adityāś ca kāśyapasya tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,42B.2760**189:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24396: pratyānaya mahendrasya trailokyam idam avyayam // HV_App.I,42B.2762 //
GE07hv_apppu:24397: kratunā vājimeghena yajate sa hi dānavaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2763 /
GE07hv_apppu:24400: asmin sthāne tu te nātha trailokyasya gataiḥ saha / **HV_App.I,42B.2763**190:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24401: yat pratyānayane yuktaṃ lokānāṃ tad vicintaya // HV_App.I,42B.2764 //
GE07hv_apppu:24402: evam uktas tadā devair viṣṇur vāmanarūpadhṛk / HV_App.I,42B.2765 /
GE07hv_apppu:24403: praharṣayann uvācātha sarvān devān idaṃ vacaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2766 //
GE07hv_apppu:24404: tasya yajñasakāśaṃ māṃ maharṣir vedapāragaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2767 /
GE07hv_apppu:24408: tato bṛhaspatiḥ śrīmān anayad vāmanaṃ prabhum / HV_App.I,42B.2771 /
GE07hv_apppu:24410: mauñjī yajñopavītī ca chatrī daṇḍī dhvajī tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2773 /
GE07hv_apppu:24412: taṃ gatvā yajñavāṭaṃ tu brahmarṣigaṇasevitam / HV_App.I,42B.2775 /
GE07hv_apppu:24414: praviśann eva sa śrīmān yajñavāṭaṃ sureśvaraḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2775**191:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24415: ātmānam eva bhagavān varṇayām āsa taṃ kratum // HV_App.I,42B.2776 //
GE07hv_apppu:24416: [k: After line 2776, K1 Ñ2 V1. 3 B Dn Ds D3. 4. 6 T1. 2 G1. 3-5 M2. 4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24429: ārād atha bales tasya ṛtvijām abhitas tathā / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:13 /
GE07hv_apppu:24430: yajñam ātmānam evāsau hetubhiḥ kāraṇair vibhuḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:14 //
GE07hv_apppu:24431: vaidikair aprakāśaiś ca punar apy atha bhārata / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:15 /
GE07hv_apppu:24433: tato niruttarān dṛṣṭvā sopādhyāyān ṛṣīṃś ca tān / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:17 /
GE07hv_apppu:24435: adbhutaṃ cāpi mene sa virocanasuto balī / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:19 /
GE07hv_apppu:24436: mūrdhnā kṛtāñjaliś cedam abravīd dhṛṣṭavad vacaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:20 //
GE07hv_apppu:24437: kutas tvaṃ ko 'si kasyāsi kiṃ cehāsti prayojanam / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:21 /
GE07hv_apppu:24441: nedṛśāḥ santi devānām ṛṣīṇām api sūnavaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:25 /
GE07hv_apppu:24442: na nāgānāṃ na yakṣāṇāṃ nāsurāṇāṃ na rakṣasām // **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:26 //
GE07hv_apppu:24443: na pitṝnāṃ na siddhānāṃ gandharvāṇāṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:27 /
GE07hv_apppu:24444: yo 'si so 'si namaste 'stu brūhi kiṃ karavāṇi te // **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:28 //
GE07hv_apppu:24445: ukta evaṃ hy acintyātmā balinā vāmanas tadā / **HV_App.I,42B.2776**192:29 /
GE07hv_apppu:24449: sureśvarasya śakrasya yamasya varuṇasya ca / HV_App.I,42B.2779 /
GE07hv_apppu:24450: viśeṣitās tvayā yajñā dānavendra mahābala // HV_App.I,42B.2780 //
GE07hv_apppu:24451: yajatā vājimeghena kratūnāṃ pravareṇa ha / HV_App.I,42B.2781 /
GE07hv_apppu:24453: sarvakāmamayo hy eṣa saṃmato brahmavādinām / HV_App.I,42B.2783 /
GE07hv_apppu:24454: kratūnāṃ pravaraḥ śrīmān aśvamedha iti smṛtaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2784 //
GE07hv_apppu:24458: sa viśvayoniḥ paramo hi medhyaḥ || HV_App.I,42B.2788 ||
GE07hv_apppu:24461: yam āhur vai vedavido dvijendrā @ HV_App.I,42B.2791 @
GE07hv_apppu:24464: yathā nṛṇāṃ pravarā brāhmaṇāś ca | HV_App.I,42B.2794 |
GE07hv_apppu:24467: etac chrutvā tu daityendro vāmanena samīritam / HV_App.I,42B.2797 /
GE07hv_apppu:24468: mudā paramayā yuktaḥ prāha daityapatir baliḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2798 //
GE07hv_apppu:24469: kasyāsi brāhmaṇaśreṣṭha kim icchasi dadāmi te / HV_App.I,42B.2799 /
GE07hv_apppu:24470: varaṃ varaya bhadraṃ te yatheṣṭaṃ kāmam āpnuhi // HV_App.I,42B.2800 //
GE07hv_apppu:24472: na rājyaṃ na ca yānāni na ratnāni na ca striyaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2801 /
GE07hv_apppu:24473: kāmaye yadi tuṣṭo 'si dharme ca yadi te matiḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2802 //
GE07hv_apppu:24474: gurvarthaṃ me grayacchasva padāni trīṇi dānava / HV_App.I,42B.2803 /
GE07hv_apppu:24475: tvam agniśaraṇārthāya eṣa me paramo varaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2804 //
GE07hv_apppu:24477: vāmanasya vacaḥ śrutvā prāha daityapatir baliḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2804**193:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24478: [k: While D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2804 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24482: tribhiḥ kiṃ tava viprendra padaiḥ pravadatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,42B.2805 /
GE07hv_apppu:24483: śataṃ śatasahasrāṇāṃ padānāṃ mārgatāṃ bhavān // HV_App.I,42B.2806 //
GE07hv_apppu:24485: mā dadasva mahābāho na taṃ vetsi mahāsura / HV_App.I,42B.2807 /
GE07hv_apppu:24486: eṣa māyāpraticchanno bhagavān pravaro hariḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2808 //
GE07hv_apppu:24488: tvāṃ vañcayitum āyāto baṭurūpadharo vibhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2810 //
GE07hv_apppu:24489: evam uktaḥ sa śukreṇa ciraṃ saṃcintya vai baliḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2811 /
GE07hv_apppu:24491: balir dānavarājas tu avajñāya tu tad vacaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2811**195:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24492: praharṣeṇa samāyuktaḥ kiṃ ataḥ pātram iṣyate // HV_App.I,42B.2812 //
GE07hv_apppu:24493: gṛhya haste tv asaṃbhrānto bhṛṅgāraṃ kanakāmayam / HV_App.I,42B.2813 /
GE07hv_apppu:24495: viprendra prāṅmukhas tiṣṭha sthito 'si kamalekṣaṇa // HV_App.I,42B.2814 //
GE07hv_apppu:24496: pratīccha dehi kiṃ bhūmiṃ kiṃmātrā bhoḥ padatrayam / HV_App.I,42B.2815 /
GE07hv_apppu:24497: dattaṃ vaḥ pātaya jalaṃ naiva mithyā bhaved guruḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2816 //
GE07hv_apppu:24499: bho na deyaṃ kuto daitya vijñāto 'yaṃ yathā dhruvam / HV_App.I,42B.2817 /
GE07hv_apppu:24500: ko 'yaṃ viṣṇur aho prītir vañcitas tvaṃ na vañcitaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2818 //
GE07hv_apppu:24502: kathaṃ sa nātho 'yaṃ viṣṇur yajñe svayam upasthitaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2819 /
GE07hv_apppu:24503: dāsyāmi devadevāya yad yad icchaty ayaṃ prabhuḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2820 //
GE07hv_apppu:24504: ko vānyaḥ pātrabhūto 'smād viṣṇoḥ parataraṃ bhavet / HV_App.I,42B.2821 /
GE07hv_apppu:24505: evam uktvā baliḥ śīghraṃ pātayām āsa vai jalam // HV_App.I,42B.2822 //
GE07hv_apppu:24507: padāni trīṇi daityendra paryāptāni mamānagha / HV_App.I,42B.2823 /
GE07hv_apppu:24508: yan mayā pūrvam uktaṃ hi tat tathā na tad anyathā // HV_App.I,42B.2824 //
GE07hv_apppu:24509: [k: After line 2824, K1 Ñ2 V1.3 B Dn Ds D4.6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24511: ity etad vacanaṃ śrutvā vāmanasya mahaujasaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24513: evam astv iti daityeśo vākyam uktvārisūdanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:24515: vāmano hy asurendrasya cikīrṣuḥ kadanaṃ mahat / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:24517: prāṅmukhaś cāpi daityeśas tasmai sumanasā jalam / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:24518: dātukāmaḥ kare yāvat tāvat taṃ pratyabodhayat // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:8 //
GE07hv_apppu:24521: iṅgitajño 'grataḥ sthitvā prahrādas tv abravīd vacaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:11 //
GE07hv_apppu:24523: mā dadasva jalaṃ haste baṭor vāmanarūpiṇaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:12 /
GE07hv_apppu:24524: sa tv asau yena te pūrvaṃ nihataḥ prapitāmahaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:13 /
GE07hv_apppu:24525: viṣṇur eva mahāprājñas tvāṃ vañcayitum āgataḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:14 //
GE07hv_apppu:24532: devāya pradadau tasmai padāni trīṇi viṣṇave // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:20 //
GE07hv_apppu:24534: dānaveśvara mā dās tvaṃ viprāyāsmai pratigraham / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:21 /
GE07hv_apppu:24535: nainaṃ vipraśiśuṃ manye nedṛśo bhavati dvijaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:22 //
GE07hv_apppu:24536: rūpeṇānena daityendra satyam etad bravīmi te / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:23 /
GE07hv_apppu:24537: nārasiṃham ahaṃ manye tam eva punar āgatam // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:24 //
GE07hv_apppu:24539: prahrādam abravīd vākyam idaṃ nirbhartsayann iva // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:26 //
GE07hv_apppu:24541: dehīti yācate yo hi pratyākhyāti ca yo 'sura / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:27 /
GE07hv_apppu:24542: ubhayor apy alakṣyā vai bhāgas taṃ viśate naram // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:28 //
GE07hv_apppu:24543: pratijñāya tu yo vipre na dadāti pratigraham / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:29 /
GE07hv_apppu:24546: pratigrahītā cāpy anyaḥ kaścid asmād dvijo 'tha vai // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:32 //
GE07hv_apppu:24547: nādhiko vidyate yasmāt tad dadāmi vasuṃdharām / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:33 /
GE07hv_apppu:24548: hṛdayasya ca me tuṣṭiḥ parā bhavati dānava // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:34 //
GE07hv_apppu:24550: eṣa tasmāt pradāsyāmi na sthāsyāmi nivāritaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:36 //
GE07hv_apppu:24551: bhūyaś ca prābravīd enaṃ vāmanaṃ baṭurūpiṇam / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:37 /
GE07hv_apppu:24553: svalpaiḥ svalpamate kiṃ te padais tribhir anuttamam / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:38 /
GE07hv_apppu:24554: kṛtsnāṃ dadāmi te vipra pṛthivīṃ sāgarair vṛtām // **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:39 //
GE07hv_apppu:24556: na pṛthvīṃ kāmaye kṛtsnāṃ saṃtuṣṭo 'smi padais tribhiḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:40 /
GE07hv_apppu:24557: eṣa eva ruciṣyo me varo dānavasattama / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196:41 /
GE07hv_apppu:24559: kṛtvārdhaṃ tanu siṃhasya narasyaiva paraṃ tathā / **HV_App.I,42B.2824**196A:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:24776: tato daityādhipaṃ prāha devo viṣṇuḥ surottamaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2921**213:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:24781: evam uktvā tato viṣṇur atha bhūyo 'surādhipam / **HV_App.I,42B.2923**214:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24782: mā ca śakrasya vacanaṃ pratihāsīḥ kathaṃcana / HV_App.I,42B.2924 /
GE07hv_apppu:24783: aham ājñāpayāmi tvāṃ śreyaś caivam avāpsyasi // HV_App.I,42B.2925 //
GE07hv_apppu:24785: evam uktvā tadā viṣṇu+ narekaśaḥ surādhipam / **HV_App.I,42B.2925**215:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24787: atha daityādhipaṃ prāha viṣṇur devādhipānujaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2926 /
GE07hv_apppu:24788: vācā paramayā devo vareṇyaḥ prabhur īśvaraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2927 //
GE07hv_apppu:24789: yat tvayā salilaṃ dattaṃ gṛhītaṃ pāṇinā mayā / HV_App.I,42B.2928 /
GE07hv_apppu:24790: tasmāt te daitya devebhyo nāsti jātu bhayaṃ kvacit // HV_App.I,42B.2929 //
GE07hv_apppu:24792: te tasmin parituṣṭiś ca varaṃ caitac chṛṇuṣva me / **HV_App.I,42B.2929**216:1 /

GE07hv_apppu:24795: amaratvaṃ hi bhavato nāsti mṛtyuḥ pitus tava / **HV_App.I,42B.2929**217:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24796: dhyāhi māṃ satataṃ daitya matkathāparamo bhava / **HV_App.I,42B.2929**217:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24797: sutalaṃ nāma pātālaṃ tatra tvaṃ sānugo vasa / HV_App.I,42B.2930 /
GE07hv_apppu:24799: na ca te devadevasya śakrasyāmitatejasaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2932 /
GE07hv_apppu:24800: śāsanaṃ pratihantavyaṃ smaratā śāsanaṃ mama / HV_App.I,42B.2933 /
GE07hv_apppu:24801: devatāś cāpi te sarvāḥ pūjyā eva mahāsura // HV_App.I,42B.2934 //
GE07hv_apppu:24804: prāpsyase ca mahābhāga divyān kāmān yathepsitān / HV_App.I,42B.2935 /
GE07hv_apppu:24805: iha cāmutra cākṣayyān vividhāṃś ca paricchadān // HV_App.I,42B.2936 //
GE07hv_apppu:24806: daityādhipatyaṃ ca sadā matprasādād avāpsyasi / HV_App.I,42B.2937 /
GE07hv_apppu:24807: bhogāṃś ca vividhān samyag yajñāṃś ca sahadakṣiṇān // HV_App.I,42B.2938 //
GE07hv_apppu:24808: yadā caitāṃ mayā proktāṃ maryādāṃ cālayiṣyasi / HV_App.I,42B.2939 /
GE07hv_apppu:24809: bandhiṣyanti tadā hi tvāṃ nāgapāśā mahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2940 //
GE07hv_apppu:24810: namaskāryāś ca te nityaṃ mahendrādyā divaukasaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2941 /
GE07hv_apppu:24811: mama jyeṣṭhaḥ suraśreṣṭhaḥ śāsanaṃ pratigṛhyatām // HV_App.I,42B.2942 //
GE07hv_apppu:24816: namas karomi deveśaṃ tvāṃ sadā jagatīpate / **HV_App.I,42B.2944**219:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24817: tvam eva mama govinda śaraṇaṃ nānya eva hi // **HV_App.I,42B.2944**219:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:24818: cintayāmi jagannātha tvām eva satataṃ hare / **HV_App.I,42B.2944**219:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:24819: idaṃ mama hare viṣṇo vadasvādya hitaṃ vibho / **HV_App.I,42B.2944**219:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:24820: tatrāsato me pātāle bhāgaṃ brūhi surottama // HV_App.I,42B.2945 //
GE07hv_apppu:24822: kathaṃ tatra mayā stheyaṃ vibudhānāṃ maheśvara / **HV_App.I,42B.2945**220:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24823: mamānnam aśanaṃ deva prāśanārtham ariṃdama / HV_App.I,42B.2946 /
