GE07hv_apppu:24829: ete pradattās tava daitya bhāgāḥ || HV_App.I,42B.2951 ||
GE07hv_apppu:24830: puṇyaṃ maddveṣiṇāṃ yac ca madbhaktadveṣiṇāṃ tathā / HV_App.I,42B.2952 /
GE07hv_apppu:24832: kathāsu mama daityendra kathyamānāsu yatra ha / **HV_App.I,42B.2952**221:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24833: aśṛṇvan yo naro gacchet tasya saṃvatsarārjitam / **HV_App.I,42B.2952**221:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24834: yatnena mahatā vāpi tava sarvaṃ bhaviṣyati // **HV_App.I,42B.2952**221:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:24835: aśuśrūṣur hared vidyāṃ sā tavāstu bale parā // **HV_App.I,42B.2952**221:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:24836: śudrānnam aśnatām yeṣāṃ puṇyaṃ yac cārjitaṃ mahat / **HV_App.I,42B.2952**221:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:24838: vedoktaṃ yat parityajya dharmam anyaṃ prakurvataḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2952**221:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:24840: aśraddhayā ca yad dānaṃ dadatām yajatāṃ yathā / HV_App.I,42B.2954 /
GE07hv_apppu:24841: tat sarvaṃ tava daityendra matprasādād bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,42B.2955 //
GE07hv_apppu:24843: śaradṛtau dinaikaṃ ca rājyaṃ tava bhaviṣyati / **HV_App.I,42B.2955**222:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24848: etac chrutvā tu vacanaṃ balir viṣṇor mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2956 /
GE07hv_apppu:24851: evam astv iti taṃ proktvā pātālam asuro gataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2957 /
GE07hv_apppu:24854: cintayām āsa bhagavān pravibhāgaṃ jite(?)s tadā // **HV_App.I,42B.2957**224:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:24855: atha cintayatas tasya devā brahmādayo nṛpa / **HV_App.I,42B.2957**224:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:24856: te gatā jatvare(?) cainaṃ bhagavantaṃ mahādyutim / **HV_App.I,42B.2957**224:4 /
GE07hv_apppu:24858: pātālaṃ pātito divyā nigṛhāṇaṃ ca te kṣayāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2957**224:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:24862: indro madhurayā vācā pālyatāṃ tridivaṃ punaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2957**224:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:24864: [k: Ñ2 B Ds D6 T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24869: jāmbavān atha tac chrutvā bherīṃ saṃnādayan bahu / **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:24871: devāḥ svasthānam āyantu daityāḥ sarve hatāśrayāḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:24872: na bhayaṃ vidyate kiṃcij jitaṃ bhagavatā jagat // **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:6 //
GE07hv_apppu:24878: sadā vedā hy adhīyantāṃ śīghraṃ nākaṃ prapadyatām / **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:12 /
GE07hv_apppu:24879: brāhmaṇāḥ svasti vo nityaṃ na bhayaṃ vidyate kvacit / **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:13 /
GE07hv_apppu:24881: ity uktvā jāmbavān ṛkṣaḥ sthito meroś ca mastake / **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:15 /
GE07hv_apppu:24882: samāghnan bahuśas tūryam ājñayā keśavasya hi // **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:16 //
GE07hv_apppu:24883: tasya bherīravaṃ sarvaṃ jagad vikṣobhya saṃsthitam / **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:17 /
GE07hv_apppu:24884: pṛthivīm antarikṣaṃ ca pātālaṃ ca samaspṛśat // **HV_App.I,42B.2958**226:18 //
GE07hv_apppu:24889: bhagavān api rājyānāṃ pravibhāgaṃ cakāra ha / HV_App.I,42B.2959 /
GE07hv_apppu:24890: dadau pūrvāṃ diśaṃ caindrīṃ śakrāyāmitatejase // HV_App.I,42B.2960 //
GE07hv_apppu:24891: yāmyāṃ yamāya devāya pitṛrājñe mahātmane // HV_App.I,42B.2961 //
GE07hv_apppu:24892: paścimām tu diśaṃ prādād varuṇāya mahātmane / HV_App.I,42B.2962 /
GE07hv_apppu:24893: uttarāṃ ca kuberāya yakṣādhipataye diśam / HV_App.I,42B.2963 /
GE07hv_apppu:24894: aghastān nāgarājāya somāyordhvāṃ diśaṃ dadau // HV_App.I,42B.2964 //
GE07hv_apppu:24895: evaṃ vibhajya trailokyaṃ viṣṇur balavatāṃ varaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2965 /
GE07hv_apppu:24898: [k: V1.3 B1.3 Ds D6 ins. after line 2965:k]
GE07hv_apppu:24900: [k: T1.2 G1.3-5 M2.4 ins. after line 2965 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:24901: akṣayaṃ cāmṛtatvaṃ ca dadau jāmbavate hariḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2965**229:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24903: jagāma tridivaṃ devaḥ pūjyamāno maharṣibhiḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2966 /
GE07hv_apppu:24905: nāradena jagannāthaḥ stūto devaiś ca pūjitaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.2966**230:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:24909: iti te kathitaṃ sarvaṃ vāmanatvaṃ yathāgatam / **HV_App.I,44B.2967**231:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:24910: hariḥ sarveśvaro viṣṇuḥ prāptaṃ devair yathā divam / **HV_App.I,44B.2967**231:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:24912: sarve mumudire devāḥ puraskṛtya śatakratum // HV_App.I,42B.2969 //
GE07hv_apppu:24913: gate tu tridivaṃ kṛṣṇe badhvā vairocaniṃ balim / HV_App.I,42B.2970 /
GE07hv_apppu:24917: sa taṃ kṛcchragataṃ dṛṣṭvā kṛpayābhipariplutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2974 /
GE07hv_apppu:24918: uvāca dānavaśreṣṭhaṃ mokṣopāyaṃ dadāmi te // HV_App.I,42B.2975 //
GE07hv_apppu:24922: tadgatas tanmanā bhūtvā drutaṃ mokṣam avāpsyasi // HV_App.I,42B.2979 //
GE07hv_apppu:24923: tato virocanasutaḥ prāñjaliḥ prayataḥ śuciḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2980 /
GE07hv_apppu:24925: tam adhītya stavaṃ divyaṃ nāradena samīritam / HV_App.I,42B.2982 /
GE07hv_apppu:24926: pṛthivī coddhṛtā yena taṃ jajāpa mahāsuraḥ // HV_App.I,42B.2983 //
GE07hv_apppu:24927: auṃ namo 'stv anantapataye akṣayāya mahātmane / HV_App.I,42B.2984 /
GE07hv_apppu:24929: saptasūryavapuḥ kṛtvā trīṃl lokān krāntavān asi / HV_App.I,42B.2986 /
GE07hv_apppu:24930: bhagavan kālakālas tvaṃ tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2987 //
GE07hv_apppu:24932: punaś cintayase lokāṃs tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2989 //
GE07hv_apppu:24934: tvatsthā dṛṣṭā dvijendreṇa tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2991 //
GE07hv_apppu:24935: mārkaṇḍena purākalpe praviśya jaṭharaṃ tava / HV_App.I,42B.2992 /
GE07hv_apppu:24936: carācaragataṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2993 //
GE07hv_apppu:24937: eko vidyāsahāyas tvaṃ yogī yogam upāgataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.2994 /
GE07hv_apppu:24938: punas trailokyam utsṛjya tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2995 //
GE07hv_apppu:24940: lokāṃś cintayase bhūyas tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2997 //
GE07hv_apppu:24942: dharā jaloddhṛtā yena tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.2999 //
GE07hv_apppu:24943: uddhṛtya daṃṣṭrayā yajñāṃs tripiṇḍān kṛtavān asi / HV_App.I,42B.3000 /
GE07hv_apppu:24945: tvaṃ pitṝṇām api hare tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3001 //
GE07hv_apppu:24947: paritrātās tvayā deva tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3003 //
GE07hv_apppu:24949: śiro jahāra cakreṇa tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3005 //
GE07hv_apppu:24951: huṃkāreṇa hato daityas tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3007 //
GE07hv_apppu:24952: dānavābhyāṃ hṛtā vedā brahmaṇaḥ paśyataḥ purā / HV_App.I,42B.3008 /
GE07hv_apppu:24953: paritrātās tvayā deva tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3009 //
GE07hv_apppu:24954: kṛtvā hayaśirorūpam hatvā tu madhukaiṭabhau / HV_App.I,42B.3010 /
GE07hv_apppu:24955: brahmaṇe te 'rpitā vedās tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3011 //
GE07hv_apppu:24957: antaṃ tava na paśyanti tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3013 //
GE07hv_apppu:24958: apāntaratamā nāma jāto devasya vai sutaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3014 /
GE07hv_apppu:24959: kṛtāś ca tena vedārthās tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3015 //
GE07hv_apppu:24961: rahasyaṃ tava devasya tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3017 //
GE07hv_apppu:24962: ṛṣir dhīrghatamā nāma jātyandho guruśāpataḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3018 /
GE07hv_apppu:24963: tvatprasādāc ca cakṣuṣmāṃs tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3019 //
GE07hv_apppu:24964: grāhagrastaṃ gajendraṃ ca dīnaṃ mṛtyuvaśaṃ gatam / HV_App.I,42B.3020 /
GE07hv_apppu:24965: bhaktaṃ mokṣitavāṃs tvaṃ hi tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3021 //
GE07hv_apppu:24966: akṣayaś cāvyayaś ca tvaṃ brahmaṇyo bhaktavatsalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3022 /
GE07hv_apppu:24967: ucchritānāṃ niyantāsi tena satyena mokṣaya // HV_App.I,42B.3023 //
GE07hv_apppu:24968: śaṅkhaṃ cakraṃ gadāṃ padmaṃ śārṅgaṃ garuḍam eva ca / HV_App.I,42B.3024 /
GE07hv_apppu:24969: prasādayāmi śirasā te bandhān mokṣayantu mām // HV_App.I,42B.3025 //
GE07hv_apppu:24971: hariṃ prasādayām āsur baliṃ mokṣaya bandhanāt // HV_App.I,42B.3027 //
GE07hv_apppu:24972: tataḥ prasanno bhagavān ādideśa khageśvaram / HV_App.I,42B.3028 /
GE07hv_apppu:24973: garuḍaṃ nāgahantāraṃ baliṃ mokṣaya bandhanāt // HV_App.I,42B.3029 //
GE07hv_apppu:24975: jagāma vasudhāmūlaṃ yatrāste saṃyato baliḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3031 //
GE07hv_apppu:24976: āgamaṃ tasya vijñāya nāgā muktvā mahāsuram / HV_App.I,42B.3032 /
GE07hv_apppu:24980: dānavendra mahābāho viṣṇus tvām abravīt prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3036 /
GE07hv_apppu:24982: itasvayā na gantavyaṃ gavyūtim api dānava / HV_App.I,42B.3038 /
GE07hv_apppu:24983: samayaṃ yadi bhindyās tvaṃ mūrdhā te śatadhā vrajet // HV_App.I,42B.3039 //
GE07hv_apppu:24985: sthito 'smi samaye tasya anantasya mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3041 //
GE07hv_apppu:24986: jīvyopāyaṃ tu bhagavān mama kiṃcit karotu saḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3042 /
GE07hv_apppu:24988: bales tu vacanaṃ śrutvā garutmān idam abravit / HV_App.I,42B.3044 /
GE07hv_apppu:24989: pūrvam eva kṛtas tena jīvyopāyo mahātmanā // HV_App.I,42B.3045 //
GE07hv_apppu:24990: pravartiṣyanti ye yajñā vidhihīnā hy anṛtvijaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3046 /
GE07hv_apppu:24991: prāyaścittam ajānanto yajñabhāgas tatas tava // HV_App.I,42B.3047 //
GE07hv_apppu:24992: na teṣāṃ yajñabhāgaṃ vai pratigṛhṇanti devatāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3048 /
GE07hv_apppu:24994: saṃdeśam etaṃ bhagavān dattavān kaśyapātmajaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3050 /
GE07hv_apppu:24997: yaḥ paṭheta naro bhaktyā tasya naśyati kilbiṣam // HV_App.I,42B.3053 //
GE07hv_apppu:24999: aputro labhate putraṃ kanyā caivepsitaṃ patim / HV_App.I,42B.3055 /
GE07hv_apppu:25000: lagnagarbhāt pramucyeta garbhiṇī janayet sutam // HV_App.I,42B.3056 //
GE07hv_apppu:25001: ye ca mokṣaiṣiṇo loke yoginaḥ sāṃkhyakāpilāḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3057 /
GE07hv_apppu:25003: sarvakāmaprado hy eṣa stavo 'nantasya kīrtyate // HV_App.I,42B.3059 //
GE07hv_apppu:25004: yaḥ paṭhet prātar utthāya śuciḥ prayatamānasaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3060 /
GE07hv_apppu:25005: sarvakāmam avāpnoti mānavo nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3061 //
GE07hv_apppu:25006: eṣa vai vāmano nāma prādurbhāvo mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3062 /
GE07hv_apppu:25007: vedavidbhir dvijair eva paṭhyate vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ // HV_App.I,42B.3063 //
GE07hv_apppu:25008: yas tv imaṃ vāmanaṃ divyaṃ prādurbhāvaṃ mahātmanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3064 /
GE07hv_apppu:25009: śṛṇuyān niyato bhaktyā sadā parvasu parvasu // HV_App.I,42B.3065 //
GE07hv_apppu:25010: parān vijayate rājā yathā viṣṇur mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3066 /
GE07hv_apppu:25011: yaśo vipulam āpnoti vipulaṃ cāpnute vasu // HV_App.I,42B.3067 //
GE07hv_apppu:25012: priyo bhavati bhūtānāṃ sarveṣāṃ vāmano yathā / HV_App.I,42B.3068 /
GE07hv_apppu:25016: [k: On the other hand, T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 ins. after line 3068, G3.4 after line 3066 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25017: paṭhan nityam idaṃ sarvaṃ caritaṃ vāmanasya ha / **HV_App.I,42B.3068**233:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25018: bhaktyā niṣkalmaṣo bhūtvā dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt / **HV_App.I,42B.3068**233:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25019: [k: T1.2 G1.5 M2.4 cont., G3.4 ins. after line 3070:k]
GE07hv_apppu:25020: cintayed vāmanaṃ nityaṃ śriyaḥ prāptuṃ yad icchasi / **HV_App.I,42B.3068**234:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25021: śrāvayed divyam ākhyānaṃ brāhmaṇebhyo dine dine / **HV_App.I,42B.3068**234:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25024: prīyate paṭhataś cāsya devadevo janārdanaḥ / HV_App.I,42B.3070 /
GE07hv_apppu:25027: abhīkṣṇaṃ garbhiṇī śrutvā namasyati ca vāmanam / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25029: yas tv imāṃ harivaṃśasya saṃhitāṃ nikhilāṃ paṭhet / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:25030: so 'sukṣaye brahmalokaṃ gantā vai nātra saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:25032: pitāmahaḥ pitā caiva viṣṇur eva na saṃśayaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:25035: manasā karmaṇā vācā dveṣam eteṣu varjayet / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:25036: pretyānantyaṃ phalaṃ bhuṅkte iha caiva na saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:10 //
GE07hv_apppu:25038: ko hy anyaḥ puṇḍarīkākṣān mahābhāratakṛd bhavet // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:12 //
GE07hv_apppu:25039: dharmāṇāṃ bhāvināṃ caiva ko brūyāt tam ṛte prabhum / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:13 /
GE07hv_apppu:25040: vartatāṃ te mahāyajño yathā saṃkalpitas tvayā // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:14 //
GE07hv_apppu:25041: saṃkalpitāśvamedhas tvaṃ śrutvā dharmāṃś ca śāsvatān / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:15 /
GE07hv_apppu:25042: āyuṣo 'nte tapas taptvā gantāsi tvaṃ narādhipa // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:16 //
GE07hv_apppu:25043: etat te mahad ākhyānaṃ śrutvā tvaṃ pārthivottama / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:17 /
GE07hv_apppu:25045: prādurbhāvo vāmanasya kathitaś caiṣa te mayā / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:19 /
GE07hv_apppu:25046: rājarṣīṇām ṛṣīṇāṃ ca nāradasya ca saṃnidhau // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:20 //
GE07hv_apppu:25047: eṣā te vaiṣṇavī caryā mayā kārtsnyena kīrtitā / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:21 /
GE07hv_apppu:25049: āścaryaparvam akhilaṃ yo hīdaṃ śṛṇuyān naraḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:23 /
GE07hv_apppu:25050: nāśubhaṃ prāpnuyā[t] kiṃcid dīrgham āyur avāpnuyāt // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:24 //
GE07hv_apppu:25051: yaś cedaṃ brāhmaṇo 'dhīte śucir bhūtvā sanātanaḥ / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:25 /
GE07hv_apppu:25055: ā brahmabhavanāc cāpi yaśaḥ khyātim asaṃśayam / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:29 /
GE07hv_apppu:25056: bhaviṣyati nṛpaśreṣṭha satyam etad bravīmi te // **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:30 //
GE07hv_apppu:25060: śaunakād yair hi saṃkṣepād bistareṇa tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:34 /
GE07hv_apppu:25061: proktas te harivaṃśas tu kim anyat kathayāmi te / **HV_App.I,42B.3071**235:35 /
GE07hv_apppu:25069: [k: K1 V1.3 B Dn Ds D3-5 cont. after Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25071: V2 after line 13 of Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25072: No. 41; D6 cont. after Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25076: tryakṣād vadham ahaṃ brahmañ śrotum icchāmi tattvataḥ / HV_App.I,43.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25079: śṛṇu vistarataḥ sarvaṃ yan māṃ pṛcchasi naidhanam / HV_App.I,43.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:25081: śaṃkareṇa vadhaṃ rājañ śūlais tribhir ajihmagaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.5 /
GE07hv_apppu:25086: maṇibhiś ca prakāśadbhiḥ sarvaratnaiś ca toraṇaiḥ // HV_App.I,43.10 //
GE07hv_apppu:25087: babhāse nabhaso madhye śriyā paramayā jvalat / HV_App.I,43.11 /
GE07hv_apppu:25088: gandharvāṇām ivodagraṃ karmaṇā sādhitaṃ puraṃ // HV_App.I,43.12 //
GE07hv_apppu:25090: puraṃ prabhākaraṃ śreṣṭhaṃ manobhiḥ kāmacāriṇaḥ // HV_App.I,43.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:25091: dhāvanto hreṣamāṇās te vikramaiḥ prāṇasaṃbhṛtaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:25098: bhavanair bahuvarṇaiś ca prāṃśubhiḥ samalaṃkṛtaiḥ // HV_App.I,43.22 //
GE07hv_apppu:25106: babhau valgujanākīrṇaṃ vanaṃ caitrarathaṃ yathā // HV_App.I,43.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:25107: samuddhūtapatākaṃ tad asibhiś ca virājitam / HV_App.I,43.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:25108: rarāja tripuraṃ rājan mahadvidyud ivāmbaram // HV_App.I,43.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:25109: sūryanābhaś ca daityendraś candranābhaś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,43.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:25110: tathānye ca mahāvīryā dānavā baladarpitāḥ // HV_App.I,43.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:25111: mamṛduś ca babhañjuś ca mohitāḥ parameṣṭhinā / HV_App.I,43.33 /
GE07hv_apppu:25112: panthānaṃ devagamanaṃ pitṛyānaṃ ca bhārata // HV_App.I,43.34 //
GE07hv_apppu:25113: tair evam asurāgraiś ca pragṛhītaśarāsanaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.35 /
GE07hv_apppu:25116: brahmāṇam abhyadhāvanta sarve suragaṇās tathā / HV_App.I,43.38 /
GE07hv_apppu:25117: vivarṇavadanā dīnāś chinne ca gatikarmaṇi // HV_App.I,43.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:25120: teṣāṃ caiva vadhopāyaṃ vadasva vadatāṃ vara / HV_App.I,43.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:25121: yaṃ jñātvā bāhubalino vadhema samare parān // HV_App.I,43.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:25122: sāntvayitvātha varado brahmā provāca devatāḥ / HV_App.I,43.44 /
GE07hv_apppu:25124: gacchadhvam amarāḥ sarve rudram ārādhituṃ bhuvi / **HV_App.I,43.44**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25125: sa eva nigrahe śakto daityānāṃ nātra saṃśayaḥ // **HV_App.I,43.44**2:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25127: tapasā tasya devasya samartho vai tato bhavet / **HV_App.I,43.44**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25131: sa eva hatvā tān sarvān kuśalaṃ vo vidhāsyati // **HV_App.I,43.44**4:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25132: śṛṇudhvaṃ devatāḥ sarvāḥ śatrupratikṛtiṃ parām / HV_App.I,43.45 /
GE07hv_apppu:25133: avadhyā dānavāḥ sarve ṛte śaṃkaram avyayam // HV_App.I,43.46 //
GE07hv_apppu:25134: pratigṛhya ca tadvākyaṃ manobhir vāgbhir eva ca / HV_App.I,43.47 /
GE07hv_apppu:25135: bhūmau prapedire sarve saha rudraiś ca bhārata // HV_App.I,43.48 //
GE07hv_apppu:25136: vindhyapāde ca merau ca madhye ca pṛthivītale / HV_App.I,43.49 /
GE07hv_apppu:25137: tapasogreṇa yogajñāḥ sarve te munayo 'bhavan / HV_App.I,43.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:25138: kāśyapeyā haraṃ prāptā japanto brahmasaṃhitāṃ / HV_App.I,43.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:25140: vinyastadarbhanicaye tāmraṃ lohaṃ ca bhūṣaṇam // HV_App.I,43.53 //
GE07hv_apppu:25141: paridhānāni carmāṇi mṛdūni ca śubhāni ca / HV_App.I,43.54 /
GE07hv_apppu:25144: te 'ntarikṣam athopetya viviśur māyayā vṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,43.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:25146: praṇipatyātha te dīnā bhagavantaṃ jagatpatim / HV_App.I,43.59 /
GE07hv_apppu:25148: havir dattam ivājñānād bhasmacchanneṣu vahniṣu / HV_App.I,43.61 /
GE07hv_apppu:25149: varadānaṃ vṛthāsmāsu bhagavan vimukhe tvayi // HV_App.I,43.62 //
GE07hv_apppu:25150: yathādeśaṃ yathākālaṃ kriyatāṃ brahmaṇo vacaḥ / HV_App.I,43.63 /
GE07hv_apppu:25151: yad uktaṃ devadevena khecarāṇāṃ samīpataḥ // HV_App.I,43.64 //
GE07hv_apppu:25158: evaṃ devavacobhiś ca bhāvino 'rthasya vai balāt / HV_App.I,43.65 /
GE07hv_apppu:25159: samanahyan mahādevo devaiḥ saha savāsavaiḥ // HV_App.I,43.66 //
GE07hv_apppu:25160: ādityā ratham āsthāya saṃnaddhāḥ samalaṃkṛtāḥ / HV_App.I,43.67 /
GE07hv_apppu:25161: sarve kāñcana varṇābhā babhur dīptā ivāgnayaḥ // HV_App.I,43.68 //
GE07hv_apppu:25162: rudreṇa sahitā rudrā dahanta iva tejasā / HV_App.I,43.69 /
GE07hv_apppu:25163: saṃnaddhāś cārumukuṭāḥ prāṃśavaḥ parvatā iva // HV_App.I,43.70 //
GE07hv_apppu:25164: viśve viśvena vapuṣā balinaḥ kāmarūpiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,43.71 /
GE07hv_apppu:25166: ebhiḥ saha balādhyakṣaiḥ samantāt parivāritaḥ / HV_App.I,43.73 /
GE07hv_apppu:25167: tripuraṃ yodhayat tryakṣaḥ pragṛhya saśaraṃ dhanuḥ // HV_App.I,43.74 //
GE07hv_apppu:25168: atha daityā bhinnadehāḥ purāṭ ṭālagatā iva / HV_App.I,43.75 /
GE07hv_apppu:25169: nyapatan bhuvi dehais te viśīrṇā iva parvatāḥ // HV_App.I,43.76 //
GE07hv_apppu:25170: abhividdhāḥ praviddhāś ca cayāṭ ṭālagatā nṛpa / HV_App.I,43.77 /
GE07hv_apppu:25171: nyapatan daityasaṃghāś ca vajreṇeva hatā nagāḥ // HV_App.I,43.78 //
GE07hv_apppu:25172: asibhiś ca hatā devaiḥ śakticakraparaśvadhaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.79 /
GE07hv_apppu:25173: bāṇaiś ca bhinnamarmāṇo daityendrā yudhi gocare / HV_App.I,43.80 /
GE07hv_apppu:25174: prapetuḥ sahitā urvyāṃ chinnapakṣā ivācalāḥ // HV_App.I,43.81 //
GE07hv_apppu:25175: tatra saṃjñāṃ vyamuñcanta tena dīptena tejasā / HV_App.I,43.82 /
GE07hv_apppu:25177: nopālabhyanta cakṣurbhyām api divyena cakṣuṣā // HV_App.I,43.84 //
GE07hv_apppu:25178: astaṃ prāpte dinakare surendrās te niśāmukhe / HV_App.I,43.85 /
GE07hv_apppu:25180: atha daityā jayaṃ prāptā niśāyāṃ niśitaiḥ śaraiḥ / HV_App.I,43.87 /
GE07hv_apppu:25181: vinedur vipulair nādair meghā iva mahāravāḥ // HV_App.I,43.88 //
GE07hv_apppu:25183: trāsitās tridaśāḥ sarve saṃgrāme jayakāṅkṣiṇaḥ / HV_App.I,43.90 /
GE07hv_apppu:25185: virejuś ca jayaṃ prāptā uśanohavyabodhitāḥ / HV_App.I,43.92 /
GE07hv_apppu:25187: suraiś ca sahitaḥ sarvai ratham āsthāya śaṃkaraḥ / HV_App.I,43.94 /
GE07hv_apppu:25188: darpitān abhinad daityān prabhindann iva vai diśaḥ // HV_App.I,43.95 //
GE07hv_apppu:25189: yugāntakāle vitato raśmivān iva nirdahan / HV_App.I,43.96 /
GE07hv_apppu:25191: sa ratho vājibhiḥ śīghrair uhyamāno manojavaiḥ / HV_App.I,43.98 /
GE07hv_apppu:25192: vibabhau nabhaso madhye savidyud iva toyadaḥ // HV_App.I,43.99 //
GE07hv_apppu:25194: bhāti sma sa ratho rājan sendrāyudha ivāmbudaḥ // HV_App.I,43.101 //
GE07hv_apppu:25196: karmabhiḥ pūrvajaṃ pūrvaiḥ śucibhis tryambakaṃ tadā // HV_App.I,43.103 //
GE07hv_apppu:25199: gandharvāś copagāyanti gāndharveṇa svareṇa vai / HV_App.I,43.106 /
GE07hv_apppu:25200: prahṛṣṭavadanāḥ saumyāḥ paitrye sthānāntare nṛpa // HV_App.I,43.107 //
GE07hv_apppu:25203: tatas tu śaravarṣāṇi mumucur daityadānavāḥ / HV_App.I,43.110 /
GE07hv_apppu:25204: surāṇām arayo madhye tīkṣṇāgrāṇi samantataḥ // HV_App.I,43.111 //
GE07hv_apppu:25205: śataghnībhiś ca nighnanto bhallaiḥ śūlaiś ca bhārata / HV_App.I,43.112 /
GE07hv_apppu:25206: te cakrire mahatkarma dānavā yuddhakovidāḥ // HV_App.I,43.113 //
GE07hv_apppu:25207: gadābhiś ca gadā jaghnur bhallair bhallāṃś ca cicchiduḥ / HV_App.I,43.114 /
GE07hv_apppu:25208: astrair astrāṇy abādhanta māyāṃ māyābhir eva ca // HV_App.I,43.115 //
GE07hv_apppu:25210: aśanīś ca mahāghorā yuktāḥ śatasahasraśaḥ // HV_App.I,43.117 //
GE07hv_apppu:25212: te vadhyamānā vibudhāḥ śaravarṣair avasthitāḥ // HV_App.I,43.119 //
GE07hv_apppu:25215: daityapraharaṇais taiś ca gurubhir bhārasādibhiḥ / HV_App.I,43.122 /
GE07hv_apppu:25216: citraiś ca bahubhiḥ śastrair atiṣṭhata śacīpatiḥ // HV_App.I,43.123 //
GE07hv_apppu:25217: tato madhye divyaśabdaḥ prādur āsīn mahīpate / HV_App.I,43.124 /
GE07hv_apppu:25218: ṛṣīṇāṃ brahmaputrāṇāṃ mahatām api bhārata // HV_App.I,43.125 //
GE07hv_apppu:25219: sa eṣa śaṃkarasyāgre ratho bhūmiṃ pratiṣṭhitaḥ / HV_App.I,43.126 /
GE07hv_apppu:25220: ajeyo jayyatāṃ prāptaḥ sarvalokasya paśyataḥ // HV_App.I,43.127 //
GE07hv_apppu:25221: tasmin nipatite rājan rathānāṃ pravare rathe / HV_App.I,43.128 /
GE07hv_apppu:25223: viceluḥ parvatāgrāṇi celuś caiva mahādrumāḥ / HV_App.I,43.130 /
GE07hv_apppu:25224: vicukṣubhuḥ samudrāś ca na rejuś ca diśo daśa // HV_App.I,43.131 //
GE07hv_apppu:25225: vṛddhāś ca brāhmaṇās tatra jepuś ca paramaṃ japam / HV_App.I,43.132 /
GE07hv_apppu:25226: yat tad brahmamayaṃ tejaḥ sarvatra vijayaiṣiṇām // HV_App.I,43.133 //
GE07hv_apppu:25227: śāntyartham iha bhūtānām iha loke paratra ca / HV_App.I,43.134 /
GE07hv_apppu:25230: tejasā jvalayan viṣṇos tryakṣasya ca mahātmanaḥ // HV_App.I,43.137 //
GE07hv_apppu:25231: sarveṣāṃ caiva devānāṃ balināṃ kāmarūpiṇām / HV_App.I,43.138 /
GE07hv_apppu:25232: ṛṣīṇāṃ tapasāḍhyānāṃ vasatāṃ vijane vane // HV_App.I,43.139 //
GE07hv_apppu:25233: atha viṣṇur mahāyogī sarvato dṛṣya tattvataḥ / HV_App.I,43.140 /
GE07hv_apppu:25236: balavāṃs tolayitvā tu viṣāṇābhyāṃ mahābalaḥ / HV_App.I,43.143 /
GE07hv_apppu:25239: nanāda balavan nādaṃ samudra iva parvaṇi // HV_App.I,43.146 //
GE07hv_apppu:25240: tato nādena vitrastā daiteyā yuddhadurmadāḥ / HV_App.I,43.147 /
GE07hv_apppu:25241: punas te kṛtasaṃnāhā yuyudhuḥ sumahābalāḥ // HV_App.I,43.148 //
GE07hv_apppu:25244: agniṃ saṃdhāya dhanuṣi taṃ ca bāṇaṃ suyantritam / HV_App.I,43.151 /
GE07hv_apppu:25246: mumuce daityanagare tridhā śabdena saṃjñitam // HV_App.I,43.153 //
GE07hv_apppu:25247: taṃ bāṇaṃ trividhaṃ vīryāt saṃdhāya manasā prabhuḥ / HV_App.I,43.154 /
GE07hv_apppu:25248: satyena brahmayogena tapogreṇa ca bhārata // HV_App.I,43.155 //
GE07hv_apppu:25250: dīptān kanakavarṇābhān suparṇāṃś ca sunirmalān // HV_App.I,43.157 //
GE07hv_apppu:25251: muktvā śaravarān ghorān saviṣān iva pannagān / HV_App.I,43.158 /
GE07hv_apppu:25252: supradīptais tribhir bāṇair vegibhis tad vidāritam // HV_App.I,43.159 //
GE07hv_apppu:25254: gopurāṇy asuraiḥ sārdhaṃ dahyamānāni bhārata / HV_App.I,43.161 /
GE07hv_apppu:25258: tāni tasya tu dagdhāni vaidūryasadṛśāni vai / HV_App.I,43.165 /
GE07hv_apppu:25259: nipetur dahyamānāni śikharāṇi girer iva / HV_App.I,43.166 /
GE07hv_apppu:25262: tatas tu vijayī rudraḥ sevyamāno maharṣibhiḥ / **HV_App.I,43.167**6:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25263: vṛṣarūpaṃ tadā viṣṇuṃ pūjayan prayayau girim // **HV_App.I,43.167**6:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25264: ya imaṃ śṛṇuyān nityaṃ vijayaṃ śaṃkarasya ca / **HV_App.I,43.167**6:3 /
GE07hv_apppu:25265: sarvatra vijayaṃ prāptaḥ sa tu dīrghāyur āpnuyāt // **HV_App.I,43.167**6:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:25266: hate tu tripure devair vāco harṣāt kileritāḥ / HV_App.I,43.168 /
GE07hv_apppu:25267: sarvāñ jahīti śatrūṃs tvaṃ pravṛddhān puruṣottama // HV_App.I,43.169 //
GE07hv_apppu:25268: viṣṇur eva mahāyogī yogena prasmayann iva / HV_App.I,43.170 /
GE07hv_apppu:25269: stūyate brahmasadṛśair ṛṣibhiḥ śaṃkareṇa ca / HV_App.I,43.171 /
GE07hv_apppu:25278: [k: K1 Ñ2 V1 B2 Dn Ds D4.5 cont. after Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25279: No. 43; K2 cont. after Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25280: No. 42B; D3 ins. after line 26 of Appendix I,
GE07hv_apppu:25281: No. 45; D6 cont. after Appendix I, No. 40 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25283: harivaṃśe 'tra vṛttāntāḥ kramād ete ihoditāḥ // HV_App.I,44.1 //
GE07hv_apppu:25284: tatrādya ādisargas tu bhūtasargas tataḥ paraḥ / HV_App.I,44.2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25285: pṛthor vainyasya cākhyānaṃ manūnāṃ kīrtanaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,44.3 //
GE07hv_apppu:25288: pitṛkalpas tathotpattiḥ somasya ca budhasya ca / HV_App.I,44.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:25295: saṃkṣepāt kīrtitā viṣṇoḥ prādurbhāvās tataḥ param // HV_App.I,44.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:25297: yoganidrāsamutthānaṃ viṣṇor vākyaṃ ca vedhasaḥ // HV_App.I,44.13 //
GE07hv_apppu:25298: pṛthvīvākyaṃ ca devānām aṃśāvataraṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,44.14 /
GE07hv_apppu:25302: tato nāradavākyaṃ ca svapnagarbhavidhis tathā // HV_App.I,44.15 //
GE07hv_apppu:25303: āryāstavaḥ punaḥ kṛṣṇa+ samutpattiḥ prapañcataḥ / HV_App.I,44.16 /
GE07hv_apppu:25304: govraje gamanaṃ viṣṇoḥ śakaṭasya nivartanam // HV_App.I,44.17 //
GE07hv_apppu:25305: pūtanāyā vadho bhaṅgo yamalārjunayor api / HV_App.I,44.18 /
GE07hv_apppu:25308: damanaṃ kāliyasyāpi dhenukasya vadhas tathā // HV_App.I,44.21 //
GE07hv_apppu:25309: pralambanidhanaṃ caiva śaradvarṇanam eva ca / HV_App.I,44.22 /
GE07hv_apppu:25313: andhakasya ca vākyāni keśino nidhanaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,44.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:25317: mālākāre mālyayācñā varadānaṃ ca tasya vai / **HV_App.I,44.27**3:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25320: dhanurbhaṇgasya kathanaṃ kaṃsavākyam ataḥ param / HV_App.I,44.28 /
GE07hv_apppu:25324: kaṃsasya nidhanaṃ cāpi vilāpaḥ kaṃsayoṣitām / HV_App.I,44.30 /
GE07hv_apppu:25330: vikadruvākyaṃ rāmasya darśanaṃ bhāṣaṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,44.34 /
GE07hv_apppu:25332: gomantasya girer dāhaḥ karavīrapure gatiḥ / HV_App.I,44.36 /
GE07hv_apppu:25333: śṛgālasya vadhas tatra mathurāgamanaṃ tataḥ // HV_App.I,44.37 //
GE07hv_apppu:25335: upāyena vadhaḥ kāla+ yavanasya prakīrtitaḥ // HV_App.I,44.39 //
GE07hv_apppu:25336: nirmāṇaṃ dvāravatyās tu rukmiṇīharaṇaṃ tathā / HV_App.I,44.40 /
GE07hv_apppu:25337: vivāhaś caiva rukmiṇyā rukmiṇo nidhanaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,44.41 //
GE07hv_apppu:25338: baladevāhnikaṃ puṇyaṃ balamāhātmyam eva ca / HV_App.I,44.42 /
GE07hv_apppu:25339: narakasya vadhaḥ pāri+ jātasya haraṇaṃ tathā // HV_App.I,44.43 //
GE07hv_apppu:25340: [k: K2, V1, D4 subst. for line 43 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25345: dvārakāyāṃ praveśaś ca sabhāyāṃ ca praveśanam // HV_App.I,44.45 //
GE07hv_apppu:25350: tataś chālikyagāndharva+ kam udāharaṇaṃ hareḥ / HV_App.I,44.50 /
GE07hv_apppu:25351: bhānoś ca duhitur bhānum atyāharaṇakīrtanam / HV_App.I,44.51 /
GE07hv_apppu:25355: śambarasya vadhaś caiva dhanyopākhyānam eva ca / HV_App.I,44.55 /
GE07hv_apppu:25358: bhaviṣyaṃ cātra dāhaś ca tripurasya udāhṛtaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.56**8:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25359: bhaviṣyaṃ puṣkaraṃ caiva prapañcenaiva kīrtitam / HV_App.I,44.57 /
GE07hv_apppu:25360: vārāhaṃ nārasiṃhaṃ ca vāmanaṃ bahuvistaram / HV_App.I,44.58 /
GE07hv_apppu:25361: [k: Dn Ds2 Bom. Poona eds. G(ed.) ins. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25380: loke sajjanaṣaṭpadair ahar ahaḥ pepīyamānaṃ mudā @ **HV_App.I,44.58**10:15 @
GE07hv_apppu:25390: iti śrīmanmahābhārate śatasahasrasaṃhitāyāṃ vaiyyāsakyāṃ pārijāte sakalaharicarite khilasaṃjñaṃ samāptam *||
GE07hv_apppu:25392: tripurasyāpi dāhaś ca iti vṛttāntasaṃgrahaḥ // HV_App.I,44.59 //
GE07hv_apppu:25397: [k: follows postscriptum in prose -- not transliterated. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25398: [k: V1 ins. *12 = lines 160-173 of Appendix I, No. 40. :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25401: vṛttāntaṃ śṛṇuyād yas tu sāyaṃ prātaḥ samāhitaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**13:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25402: sa yāti vaiṣṇavaṃ dhāma labdhakāmaḥ kurūdvaha // **HV_App.I,44.59**13:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:25405: imāṃ ca saṃhitāṃ ceti sarvaśāstramayīṃ tathā / **HV_App.I,44.59**14:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25406: ekakālaṃ dvikālaṃ vā trikālaṃ vāpi yaḥ paṭhet // **HV_App.I,44.59**14:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25408: śivālaye tathā kṣetre naimiṣe puṣkare tathā // **HV_App.I,44.59**14:4 //
GE07hv_apppu:25409: śucir bhūtvā dampatī ca vācakaṃ pūjayet sudhīḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**14:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:25411: khilo viṣṇuḥ prasīdeta vācakaḥ paṭhanāt punaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**14:7 /
GE07hv_apppu:25413: śrutvā ca labhate lakṣmīṃ saṃtatiṃ manasepsitāṃ / **HV_App.I,44.59**14:9 /
GE07hv_apppu:25419: kṛṣṇāt paraṃ kim api tattvam ahaṃ na jāne || **HV_App.I,44.59**14:15 ||
GE07hv_apppu:25421: ya idaṃ śrāvayed vidvān samastaṃ tv ardham eva vā / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25422: pādamātraṃ tadardhaṃ vā tv ekaṃ cākhyānaṃ uttamam / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25423: sa namasyaḥ prayatnena viṣṇoḥ saṃprītaye sadā // **HV_App.I,44.59**15:3 //
GE07hv_apppu:25425: tasmai deyaṃ prayatnena viṣṇoḥ saṃprītaye sadā / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:5 /
GE07hv_apppu:25426: ya etat pustakaṃ ramyaṃ leṣayitvā samarpa .. / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:6 /
GE07hv_apppu:25428: atrākhyānāni yāvanti ślokā yāvanta eva hi / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:8 /
GE07hv_apppu:25430: yāvanty api ca mātrāṇi yāvantyaḥ patrapaṅkayaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:10 /
GE07hv_apppu:25434: aputraḥ śṛṇuyād yas tu susnātaḥ śraddhayānvitaḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:14 /
GE07hv_apppu:25438: yasya viśveśvaras tuṣṭas tasmai tacchravaṇe matiḥ / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:18 /
GE07hv_apppu:25440: tac chrotavyaṃ manuṣyeṇa paramaṃ padam icchatā / **HV_App.I,44.59**15:20 /
GE07hv_apppu:25451: [k: Dn D3.5.6 cont. after App. I, No. 44 :k]
GE07hv_apppu:25453: harivaṃśe purāṇe tu śrute munivarottama / HV_App.I,45.1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25454: kiṃ phalaṃ kiṃ ca deyaṃ vai tad brūhi tvaṃ mamāgrataḥ // HV_App.I,45.2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25456: harivaṃśe purāṇe tu śrute ca bharatottama / HV_App.I,45.3 /
GE07hv_apppu:25457: kāyikaṃ vācikaṃ caiva manasā samupārjitam / HV_App.I,45.4 /
GE07hv_apppu:25458: tat sarvaṃ nāśam āyāti himaṃ sūryodaye yathā // HV_App.I,45.5 //
GE07hv_apppu:25459: aṣṭādaśapurāṇānāṃ śravaṇād yat phalaṃ labhet / HV_App.I,45.6 /
GE07hv_apppu:25460: tat phalaṃ samavāpnoti vaiṣṇavo nātra saṃśayaḥ // HV_App.I,45.7 //
GE07hv_apppu:25462: striyaś ca puruṣāś caiva vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyuḥ / **HV_App.I,45.7**1:2 /
GE07hv_apppu:25464: śṛṇvantaḥ śraddhayā yuktā vaiṣṇavaṃ padam āpnuyuḥ // HV_App.I,45.9 //
GE07hv_apppu:25465: jambūdvīpaṃ samāśritya śrotāro durlabhāḥ kalau / HV_App.I,45.10 /
GE07hv_apppu:25466: bhaviṣyanti narā rājan satyaṃ satyaṃ vadāmy aham // HV_App.I,45.11 //
GE07hv_apppu:25467: strībhiś ca putrakāmābhiḥ śrotavyaṃ vaiṣṇavaṃ yaśaḥ / HV_App.I,45.12 /
GE07hv_apppu:25468: dakṣiṇā cātra deyā vai niṣkatrayasuvarṇakam / HV_App.I,45.13 /
GE07hv_apppu:25469: vācakāya yathāśaktyā yathoktaṃ phalam icchatā // HV_App.I,45.14 //
GE07hv_apppu:25470: svarṇaśṛṅgīṃ ca kapilāṃ savatsāṃ vastrasaṃyutām / HV_App.I,45.15 /
GE07hv_apppu:25471: vācakāya pradadyād vai ātmanaḥ śreyakāṅkṣayā // HV_App.I,45.16 //
GE07hv_apppu:25472: alaṃkāraṃ pradadyāc ca pāṇyor vai bharatarṣabha / HV_App.I,45.17 /
GE07hv_apppu:25473: karṇasyābharaṇaṃ dadyād yānaṃ ca saviśeṣataḥ // HV_App.I,45.18 //
GE07hv_apppu:25475: bhūmidānasamaṃ dānaṃ na bhūtaṃ na bhaviṣyati // HV_App.I,45.20 //
GE07hv_apppu:25477: ghoṭakaṃ javinaṃ dadyād vṛṣaṃ ca dhuri yojitam / **HV_App.I,45.20**2:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25478: śṛṇoti śrāvayād vāpi harivaṃśaṃ tu yo naraḥ / HV_App.I,45.21 /
GE07hv_apppu:25481: kuṇḍale caiva dātavye ūrṇāvastraṃ tathaiva ca / **HV_App.I,45.22**3:1 /
GE07hv_apppu:25482: samāptau vidhivad vastraṃ deyaṃ kṣaumaṃ dvijātaye // **HV_App.I,45.22**3:2 //
GE07hv_apppu:25483: pitṝn uddharate sarvān ekādaśa samudbhavān / HV_App.I,45.23 /
GE07hv_apppu:25484: ātmānaṃ sasutaṃ caiva striyaṃ ca bharatarṣabha / HV_App.I,45.24 /
GE07hv_apppu:25485: daśāṃśaś cātra homo vai kāryaḥ śrotrā narādhipa // HV_App.I,45.25 //
GE07hv_apppu:25486: idaṃ mayā tavāgre ca sarvaṃ proktaṃ nararṣabha / HV_App.I,45.26 /
GE07hv_apppu:25488: aputraḥ putram āpnoti adhano dhanam āpnuyāt // HV_App.I,45.28 //
GE07hv_apppu:25489: naramedhāśvamedhābhyāṃ yat phalaṃ prāpyate naraiḥ / HV_App.I,45.29 /
GE07hv_apppu:25490: tat phalaṃ labhate nūnaṃ purāṇaśravaṇād dhareḥ // HV_App.I,45.30 //
GE07hv_apppu:25491: brahmahā bhrūṇahā goghnaḥ surāpo gurutalpagaḥ / HV_App.I,45.31 /
GE07hv_apppu:25492: sakṛt purāṇaśravaṇāt pūto bhavati nānyathā // HV_App.I,45.32 //
GE07hv_apppu:25493: idaṃ mayā te parikīrtitaṃ mahac @ HV_App.I,45.33 @
GE07hv_apppu:25495: śṛṇvan paṭhann āśu samāpnuyāt phalaṃ @ HV_App.I,45.35 @
GE07hv_apppu:25496: yac cāpi lokeṣu sudurlabhaṃ mahat || HV_App.I,45.36 ||
